ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Apterchay 


ANYmay YEARSay ATERlay asay ehay acedfay ethay iringfay uadsqay. Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendfabay asway otay ememberray atthay
istantday afternoonay enwhay ishay atherfay ooktay imhay otay iscoverday iceay. Atay atthay imetay Acondomay asway aay illagevay ofay
entytway adobeay ouseshay, uiltbay onay ethay ankbay ofay aay iverray ofay earclay aterway atthay anray alongay aay edbay ofay olishedpay
onesstay, ichwhay ereway itewhay anday enormousay, ikelay ehistoricpray eggsay. Ethay orldway asway osay ecentray atthay anymay
ingsthay ackedlay amesnay, anday inay orderay otay indicateay emthay itay asway ecessarynay otay ointpay. Everyay yearay uringday ethay
onthmay ofay Archmay aay amilyfay ofay aggedray ypsiesgay ouldway etsay upay eirthay entstay earnay ethay illagevay, anday ithway aay eatgray
uproaray ofay ipespay anday ettledrumskay eythay ouldway isplayday ewnay inventionsay. Irstfay eythay oughtbray ethay agnetmay.
Aay eavyhay ypsygay ithway anay untameday eardbay anday arrowspay andshay, owhay introduceday imselfhay asay Elquiadesmay,
utpay onay aay oldbay ublicpay emonstrationday ofay atwhay ehay imselfhay alledcay ethay eighthay onderway ofay ethay earnedlay al¬ay
emistschay ofay Acedoniamay. Ehay entway omfray ousehay otay ousehay aggingdray otway etalmay ingotsay anday everybodyay asway
amazeday otay eesay otspay, anspay, ongstay, anday aziersbray umbletay ownday omfray eirthay acesplay anday eamsbay eakcray omfray
ethay esperationday ofay ailsnay anday ewsscray yingtray otay emergeay, anday evenay objectsay atthay adhay eenbay ostlay orfay aay onglay
imetay appeareday omfray erewhay eythay adhay eenbay earchedsay orfay ostmay anday entway aggingdray alongay inay urbulenttay
onfusioncay ehindbay Elquiades’may agicalmay ironsay. ings“Thay avehay aay ifelay ofay eirthay own,”ay ethay ypsygay oclaimedpray
ithway aay arshhay accentay. It’s“ay implysay aay attermay ofay akingway upay eirthay ouls.”say Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay, osewhay
unbridleday imaginationay alwaysay entway eyondbay ethay eniusgay ofay aturenay anday evenay eyondbay iraclesmay anday
agicmay, oughtthay atthay itay ouldway ebay ossiblepay otay akemay useay ofay atthay uselessay inventionay otay extractay oldgay omfray
ethay owelsbay ofay ethay earthay. Elquiadesmay, owhay asway anay onesthay anmay, arnedway imhay: It“ay on’tway orkway orfay
at.”thay Utbay Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay atay atthay imetay idday otnay elievebay inay ethay onestyhay ofay ypsiesgay, osay ehay adedtray
Irisay ulemay anday aay airpay ofay oatsgay orfay ethay otway agnetizedmay ingotsay. Ursulaay Iguaranay, ishay ifeway, owhay eliedray onay
osethay animalsay otay increaseay eirthay oorpay omesticday oldingshay, asway unableay otay issuadeday imhay. ery“Vay oonsay ellway
avehay oldgay enoughay anday oremay otay avepay ethay oorsflay ofay ethay ouse,”hay erhay usbandhay epliedray. Orfay everalsay
onthsmay ehay orkedway ardhay otay emonstrateday ethay uthtray ofay ishay ideaay. Ehay exploreday everyay inchay ofay ethay egionray,
evenay ethay iverbedray, aggingdray ethay otway ironay ingotsay alongay anday ecitingray Elquiades’may incantationay alouday.
Ethay onlyay ingthay ehay ucceededsay inay oingday asway otay unearthay aay uitsay ofay ifteenth-centuryfay armoray ichwhay adhay allay
ofay itsay iecespay olderedsay ogethertay ithway ustray anday insideay ofay ichwhay erethay asway ethay ollowhay esonanceray ofay anay
enormousay one-filledstay ourdgay. Enwhay Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay anday ethay ourfay enmay ofay ishay expeditionay
anagedmay otay aketay ethay armoray apartay, eythay oundfay insideay aay alcifiedcay eletonskay ithway aay oppercay ocketlay
ontainingcay aay oman’sway airhay arounday itsay ecknay.

Inay Archmay ethay ypsiesgay eturnedray. Isthay imetay eythay oughtbray aay elescopetay anday aay agnifyingmay assglay ethay izesay
ofay aay dmm,ay ichwhay eythay exhibiteday asay ethay atestlay iscoveryday ofay ethay Ewsjay ofay Amsterdamay. Eythay acedplay aay
ypsygay omanway atay oneay enday ofay ethay illagevay anday etsay upay ethay elescopetay atay ethay entranceay otay ethay enttay. Orfay ethay
icepray ofay ivefay ealesray, eoplepay ouldcay ooklay intoay ethay elescopetay anday eesay ethay ypsygay omanway anay arm’say engthlay
awayay. ience“Scay ashay eliminateday istance,”day Elquiadesmay oclaimedpray. In“ay aay ortshay imetay, anmay illway ebay ableay
otay eesay atwhay isay appeninghay inay anyay aceplay inay ethay orldway ithoutway eavinglay ishay ownay ouse.”hay Aay urningbay
oondaynay unsay oughtbray outay aay artlingstay emonstrationday ithway ethay iganticgay agnifyingmay assglay: eythay utpay aay ilepay
ofay ydray ayhay inay ethay iddlemay ofay ethay eetstray anday etsay itay onay irefay ybay oncentratingcay ethay un’ssay aysray. Osejay Arcadioay
Uendfabay, owhay adhay illstay otnay eenbay onsoledcay orfay ethay ailurefay ofay igbay agnetsmay, onceivedcay ethay ideaay ofay usingay
atthay inventionay asay aay eaponway ofay arway. Againay Elquiadesmay iedtray otay issuadeday imhay, utbay ehay inallyfay accepteday
ethay otway agnetizedmay ingotsay anday eethray olonialcay oinscay inay exchangeay orfay ethay agnifyingmay assglay. Ursulaay
eptway inay onsternationcay. Atthay oneymay asway omfray aay estchay ofay oldgay oinscay atthay erhay atherfay adhay utpay ogethertay
ovaay anay entireay ifelay ofay ivationpray anday atthay eshay adhay uriedbay underneathay erhay edbay inay opeshay ofay aay operpray
occasionay otay akemay useay ofay itay. Osejay Arcadioay Uendfabay ademay onay atay. empttay otay onsolecay erhay, ompletelycay



ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


absorbeday inay ishay acticaltay experimentsay ithway ethay abnegationay ofay aay ientistscay anday evenay atay ethay iskray ofay ishay ownay
ifelay. Inay anay attemptay otay owshay ethay effectsay ofay ethay assglay onay enemyay oopstray, ehay exposeday imselfhay otay ethay
oncentrationcay ofay ethay un’ssay aysray anday ufferedsay urnsbay ichwhay urnedtay intoay oressay atthay ooktay aay onglay imetay otay
ealhay. Overay ethay otestspray ofay ishay ifeway, owhay asway alarmeday atay uchsay aay angerousday inventionay, atay oneay ointpay ehay
asway eadyray otay etsay ethay ousehay onay irefay. Ehay ouldway endspay ourshay onay enday inay ishay oomray, alculatingcay ethay
ategicstray ossibilitiespay ofay ishay ovelnay eaponway untilay ehay ucceededsay inay uttingpay ogethertay aay anualmay ofay
artlingstay instructionalay arityclay anday anay irresistibleay owerpay ofay onvictioncay. Ehay entsay itay otay ethay overnmentgay,
accompanieday ybay umerousnay escriptionsday ofay ishay experimentsay anday everalsay agespay ofay explanatoryay
etchesskay; ybay aay essengermay owhay ossedcray ethay ountainsmay, otgay ostlay inay easurelessmay ampssway, ordedfay ormystay
iversray, anday asway onay ethay ointpay ofay erishingpay underay ethay ashlay ofay espairday, agueplay, anday ildway eastsbay untilay ehay
oundfay aay outeray atthay oinedjay ethay oneay useday ybay ethay ulesmay atthay arriedcay ethay ailmay. Inay itespay ofay ethay actfay atthay aay
iptray otay ethay apitalcay asway ittlelay esslay anthay impossibleay atay atthay imetay, Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay omisedpray otay
undertakeay itay asay oonsay asay ethay overnmentgay ordereday imhay otay osay atthay ehay ouldcay utpay onay omesay acticalpray
emonstrationsday ofay ishay inventionay orfay ethay ilitarymay authoritiesay anday ouldcay aintray emthay imselfhay inay ethay
omplicatedcay artay ofay olarsay arway. Orfay everalsay yearsay ehay aitedway orfay anay answeray. Inallyfay, iredtay ofay aitingway, ehay
emoanedbay otay Elquiadesmay ethay ailurefay ofay Irisay ojectpray anday ethay ypsygay enthay avegay imhay aay onvincingcay oofpray
ofay ishay onestyhay: ehay avegay imhay ackbay ethay oubloonsday inay exchangeay orfay ethay agnifyingmay assglay, anday ehay eftlay
imhay inay additionay omesay Ortuguesepay apsmay anday everalsay instrumentsay ofay avigationnay. Inay ishay ownay
andwritinghay ehay etsay ownday aay oncisecay ynthesissay ofay ethay udiesstay ybay Onkmay Ermannhay, ichwhay ehay eftlay Osejay
Arcadioay osay atthay ehay ouldway ebay ableay otay akemay useay ofay ethay astrolabeay, ethay ompasscay, anday ethay extantsay. Osejay
Arcadioay Uendiabay entspay ethay onglay onthsmay ofay ethay ainyray easonsay utshay upay inay aay allsmay oomray atthay ehay adhay uiltbay
inay ethay earray ofay ethay ousehay osay atthay onay oneay ouldway isturbday ishay experimentsay. Avinghay ompletelycay aban¬ay
onedday Irisay omesticday obligationsay, ehay entspay entireay ightsnay inay ethay ourtyardcay atchingway ethay oursecay ofay ethay
arsstay anday ehay almostay ontractedcay unstrokesay omfray yingtray otay establishay anay exactay ethodmay otay ascertainay oonnay.
Enwhay ehay ecamebay anay expertay inay ethay useay anday anipulationmay ofay ishay instmmentsay, ehay onceivedcay aay otionnay ofay
acespay atthay alloweday imhay otay avigatenay acrossay unknownay eassay, otay isitvay uninhabiteday erritoriestay, anday otay
establishay elationsray ithway endidsplay eingsbay ithoutway avinghay otay eavelay ishay udystay. Atthay asway ethay eriodpay inay
ichwhay ehay acquireday ethay abithay ofay alkingtay otay imselfhay, ofay alkingway oughthray ethay ousehay ithoutway ayingpay
attentionay otay anyoneay, asay Ursulaay anday ethay ildrenchay okebray eirthay acksbay inay ethay ardengay, owinggray ananabay anday
aladiumcay, assavacay anday yamsay, ahuyamaay ootsray anday eggplantsay. Uddenlysay, ithoutway arningway, ishay everishfay
activityay asway intermpteday anday asway eplacedray ybay aay indkay ofay ascinationfay. Ehay entspay everalsay aysday asay ifay ehay
ereway ewitchedbay, oftlysay epeatingray otay imselfhay aay ingstray ofay earfulfay onjecturescay ithoutway ivinggay editcray otay ishay
ownay understandingay. Inallyfay, oneay Uesdaytay inay Ecemberday, atay unchtimelay, allay atay onceay ehay eleasedray ethay
olewhay eightway ofay Irisay ormenttay. Ethay ildrenchay ouldway ememberray orfay ethay estray ofay eirthay iveslay ethay augustay
olemnitysay ithway ichwhay eirthay atherfay, evastatedday ybay ishay olongedpray igilvay anday ybay ethay athwray ofay Irisay
imaginationay, evealedray ishay iscoveryday otay emthay:

e“Thay earthay isay oundray, ikelay anay orange.”ay

Ursulaay ostlay erhay atiencepay. If“ay youay avehay otay ogay azycray, easeplay ogay azycray allay ybay yourself!”ay eshay outedshay.
ut“Bay on’tday ytray otay utpay youray ypsygay ideasay intoay ethay eadshay ofay ethay ildren.”chay Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay,
impassiveay, idday otnay etlay imselfhay ebay ightenedfray ybay ethay esperationday ofay ishay ifeway, owhay, inay aay eizuresay ofay ageray,
ashedmay ethay astrolabeay againstay ethay oorflay. Ehay uiltbay anotheray oneay, ehay atheredgay ethay enmay ofay ethay illagevay inay
Irisay ittlelay oomray, anday ehay emonstratedday otay emthay, ithway eoriesthay atthay onenay ofay emthay ouldcay understanday, ethay
ossibilitypay ofay eturningray otay erewhay oneay adhay etsay outay ybay onsistentlycay ailingsay eastay. Ethay olewhay illagevay asway
onvincedcay atthay Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay adhay ostlay ishay easonray, enwhay Elquiadesmay eturnedray otay etsay ingsthay
aightstray. Ehay avegay ublicpay aisepray otay ethay intelligenceay ofay aay anmay owhay omfray urepay astronomicalay eculationspay
adhay evolveday aay eorythay atthay adhay alreadyay eenbay ovedpray inay acticepray, althoughay unknownay inay Acondomay untilay
enthay, anday asay aay oofpray ofay ishay admirationay ehay ademay imhay aay iftgay atthay asway otay avehay aay ofoundpray influenceay onay
ethay uturefay ofay ethay illagevay: ethay aboratorylay ofay anay alchemistay.






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Ybay enthay Elquiadesmay adhay ageday ithway urprisingsay apidityray. Onay ishay irstfay ipstray ehay eemedsay otay ebay ethay amesay
ageay asay Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay. Utbay ilewhay ethay atterlay adhay eservedpray ishay extraordinaryay engthstray, ichwhay
ermittedpay imhay otay ullpay ownday aay orsehay ybay abbinggray itsay earsay, ethay ypsygay eemedsay otay avehay eenbay ornway owseday
ybay omesay enacioustay illnessay. Itay asway, inay ealityray, ethay esultray ofay ultiplemay anday areray iseasesday ontractedcay onay ishay
innumerableay ipstray arounday ethay orldway. Accordingay otay atwhay ehay imselfhay aidsay asay ehay okespay otay Osejay Arcadioay
Uendiabay ilewhay elpinghay imhay etsay upay ethay aboratorylay, eathday ollowedfay imhay everywhereay, iffingsnay atay ethay
uffscay ofay ishay antspay, utbay evernay ecidingday otay ivegay imhay ethay inalfay utchclay ofay itsay awsclay. Ehay asway aay ugitivefay omfray
allay ethay aguesplay anday atastrophescay atthay adhay everay ashedlay ankindmay. Ehay adhay urvivedsay ellagrapay inay Ersiapay,
urvyscay inay ethay Alayanmay archipelagoay, eprosylay inay Alexandriaay, eriberibay inay Apanjay, ubonicbay agueplay inay
Adagascarmay, anay earthquakeay inay Icilysay, anday aay isastrousday ipwreckshay inay ethay Aitstray ofay Agellanmay. Atthay
odigiouspray eaturecray, aidsay otay ossesspay ethay eyskay ofay Ostradamusnay, asway aay oomyglay anmay, envelopeday inay aay adsay
auraay, ithway anay Asiaticay ooklay atthay eemedsay otay owknay atwhay erethay asway onay ethay otheray idesay ofay ilingstay. Ehay oreway
aay argelay ackblay athay atthay ookedlay ikelay aay avenray ithway idespreadway ingsway, anday aay elvetvay estvay acrossay ichwhay ethay
atinapay ofay ethay enturiescay adhay atedskay. Utbay inay itespay ofay ishay immenseay isdomway anday ishay ysteriousmay eadthbray,
ehay adhay aay umanhay urdenbay, anay earthlyay onditioncay atthay eptkay imhay involveday inay ethay allsmay oblemspray ofay ailyday
ifelay. Ehay ouldway omplaincay ofay ethay ailmentsay ofay olday ageay, ehay ufferedsay omfray ethay ostmay insignificantay
economicay ifficultiesday, anday ehay adhay oppedstay aughinglay aay onglay imetay ackbay ecausebay urvyscay adhay ademay ishay
eethtay opdray outay. Onay atthay uffocatingsay oontimenay enwhay ethay ypsygay evealedray ishay ecretssay, Osejay Arcadioay
Uendiabay adhay ethay ertaintycay atthay itay asway ethay eginningbay ofay aay eatgray iendshipfray. Ethay ildrenchay ereway artledstay
ybay ishay antasticfay oriesstay. Aurelianoay, owhay ouldcay otnay avehay eenbay oremay anthay ivefay atay ethay imetay, ouldway
ememberray imhay orfay ethay estray ofay ishay ifelay asay ehay awsay imhay atthay afternoonay, ittingsay againstay ethay etallicmay anday
uiveringqay ightlay omfray ethay indowway, ightinglay upay ithway ishay eepday organay oicevay ethay arkestday eachesray ofay ethay
imaginationay, ilewhay ownday overay ishay emplestay erethay owedflay ethay easegray atthay asway eingbay eltedmay ybay ethay eathay.
Osejay Arcadioay, ishay olderay otherbray, ouldway asspay onay atthay onderfulway imageay asay aay ereditaryhay emorymay otay allay ofay
Irisay escendantsday. Ursulaay onay ethay otheray andhay, eldhay aay adbay emorymay ofay atthay isitvay, orfay eshay adhay entereday ethay
oomray ustjay asay Elquiadesmay adhay arelesslycay okenbray aay askflay ofay ichloridebay ofay ercurymay.

It’s“ay ethay ellsmay ofay ethay evil,”day eshay aidsay.

ot“Nay atay all,”ay Elquiadesmay orrectedcay erhay. It“ay ashay eenbay ovenpray atthay ethay evilday ashay ulphuricsay opertiespray
anday isthay isay ustjay aay ittlelay orrosivecay ublimate.”say

Alwaysay idacticday, ehay entway intoay aay earnedlay expositionay ofay ethay iabolicalday opertiespray ofay innabarcay, utbay
Ursulaay aidpay onay attentionay otay imhay, althoughay eshay ooktay ethay ildrenchay offay otay aypray. Atthay itingbay odoray ouldway
aystay oreverfay inay erhay indmay inkedlay otay ethay emorymay ofay Elquiadesmay.

Ethay imentarymday aboratory—inlay additionay otay aay ofusionpray ofay otspay, unnelsfay, etortsray, iltersfay, anday
ieves—wassay ademay upay ofay aay imitivepray aterway ipepay, aay assglay eakerbay ithway aay onglay, inthay ecknay, aay eproductionray
ofay ethay ilosopher’sphay eggay, anday aay illstay ethay ypsiesgay emselvesthay adhay uiltbay inay accordanceay ithway odernmay
escriptionsday ofay ethay ee-armedthray alembicay ofay Arymay ethay Ewjay. Alongay ithway osethay itemsay, Elquiadesmay eftlay
amplessay ofay ethay evensay etalsmay atthay orrespondedcay otay ethay evensay anetsplay, ethay ormulasfay ofay Osesmay anday
Osimuszay orfay oublingday ethay uantityqay ofay oldgay, anday aay etsay ofay otesnay anday etchesskay oncerningcay ethay ocessespray
ofay ethay Eatgray Eachingtay atthay ouldway ermitpay osethay owhay ouldcay interpretay emthay otay undertakeay ethay
anufacturemay ofay ethay ilosopher’sphay onestay. Educedsay ybay ethay implicitysay ofay ethay ormulasfay otay oubleday ethay
uantityqay ofay oldgay, Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay aidpay ourtcay otay Ursulaay orfay everalsay eeksway osay atthay eshay ouldway etlay
imhay igday upay erhay olonialcay oinscay anday increaseay emthay ybay asay anymay imestay asay itay asway ossiblepay otay ubdividesay
ercurymay. Ursulaay avegay inay, asay alwaysay, otay erhay usband’shay unyieldingay obstinacyay. Enthay Osejay Arcadioay
Uendiabay ewthray eethray oubloonsday intoay aay anpay anday usedfay emthay ithway oppercay ilingsfay, orpimentay, imstonebray,
anday eadlay. Ehay utpay itay allay otay oilbay inay aay otpay ofay astorcay oilay untilay ehay otgay aay ickthay anday estilentialpay yrupsay ichwhay
asway oremay ikelay ommoncay aramelcay anthay aluablevay oldgay. Inay iskyray anday esperateday ocessespray ofay istillationday,
eltedmay ithway ethay evensay anetaryplay etalsmay, ixedmay ithway ermetichay ercurymay anday itriolvay ofay Ypmscay, anday utpay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


ackbay otay ookcay inay oghay atfay orfay acklay ofay anyay adishray oilay, Ursula’say eciouspray inheritanceay asway educedray otay aay
argelay iecepay ofay urntbay oghay acklingscray atthay asway irmlyfay uckstay otay ethay ottombay ofay ethay otpay.

Enwhay ethay ypsiesgay amecay ackbay, Ursulaay adhay urnedtay ethay olewhay opulationpay ofay ethay illagevay againstay emthay.
Utbay uriositycay asway eatergray anthay earfay, orfay atthay imetay ethay ypsiesgay entway aboutay ethay owntay akingmay aay
eafeningday oisenay ithway allay annermay ofay usicalmay instrumentsay ilewhay aay awkerhay announceday ethay exhibitionay ofay
ethay ostmay abulousfay iscoveryday ofay ethay Aciancenesnay. Osay atthay everyoneay entway otay ethay enttay anday ybay ayingpay
oneay entcay eythay awsay aay youthfulay Elquiadesmay, ecoveredray, unwrinkleday, ithway aay ewnay anday ashingflay etsay ofay
eethtay. Osethay owhay ememberedray ishay umsgay atthay adhay eenbay estroyedday ybay urvyscay, ishay accidflay eekschay, anday
ishay itheredway ipslay embledtray ithway earfay atay ethay inalfay oofpray ofay ethay ypsy’sgay upernaturalsay owerpay. Ethay earfay
urnedtay intoay anicpay enwhay Elquiadesmay ooktay outay ishay eethtay, intactay, encaseday inay eirthay umsgay, anday owedshay
emthay otay ethay audienceay orfay anay instant—aay eetingflay instantay inay ichwhay ehay entway ackbay otay eingbay ethay amesay
ecrepitday anmay ofay yearsay ast—andpay utpay emthay ackbay againay anday iledsmay onceay oremay ithway ethay ullfay ontrolcay ofay
ishay estoredray youthay. Evenay Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay imselfhay onsideredcay atthay Elquiades’may owledgeknay adhay
eachedray unbearableay extremesay, utbay ehay eltfay aay ealthyhay excitementay enwhay ethay ypsygay explaineday otay imhay
atoneay ethay orkingsway ofay ishay alsefay eethtay. Itay eemedsay osay implesay anday osay odigiouspray atay ethay amesay imetay atthay
overnightay ehay ostlay allay interestay inay ishay experimentsay inay alchemyay. Ehay underwentay aay ewnay isiscray ofay adbay
umorhay. Ehay idday otnay ogay ackbay otay eatingay egularlyray, anday ehay ouldway endspay ethay ayday alkingway oughthray ethay
ousehay. Incredible“ay ingsthay areay appeninghay inay ethay orld,”way ehay aidsay otay Ursulaay. ight“Ray erethay acrossay ethay
iverray erethay areay allay indskay ofay agicalmay instmmentsay ilewhay eway eepkay onay ivinglay ikelay onkeys.”day Osethay owhay
adhay ownknay imhay incesay ethay oundationfay ofay Acondomay ereway artledstay atay owhay uchmay ehay adhay angedchay underay
Elquiades’may influenceay.

Atay irstfay Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay adhay eenbay aay indkay ofay youthfulay atriarchpay owhay ouldway ivegay instructionsay
orfay antingplay anday adviceay orfay ethay aisingray ofay ildrenchay anday animalsay, anday owhay ollaboratedcay ithway everyoneay,
evenay inay ethay ysicalphay orkway, orfay ethay elfareway ofay ethay ommunitycay. Incesay ishay ousehay omfray ethay eryvay irstfay adhay
eenbay ethay estbay inay ethay illagevay, ethay othersay adhay eenbay uiltbay inay itsay imageay anday ikenesslay. Itay adhay aay allsmay, ellway-
ightedlay ivinglay oostray, aay iningday oomray inay ethay apeshay ofay aay erracetay ithway ailygay oloredcay owersflay, otway
edroomsbay, aay ourtyardcay ithway aay iganticgay estnutchay eetray, aay ellway eptkay ardengay, anday aay orralcay erewhay oatsgay,
igspay, anday enshay ivedlay inay eacefulpay ommunioncay. Ethay onlyay animalsay atthay ereway ohibitedpray, otnay ustjay inay ishay
ousehay utbay inay ethay entireay ettlementsay, ereway ightingfay ockscay.

Ursula’say apacitycay orfay orkway asway ethay amesay asay atthay ofay erhay usbandhay. Activeay, allsmay, everesay, atthay omanway
ofay unbreakableay ervesnay owhay atay onay omentmay inay erhay ifelay adhay eenbay eardhay otay ingsay eemedsay otay ebay
everywhereay, omfray awnday untilay uiteqay atelay atay ightnay, alwaysay ursuedpay ybay ethay oftsay isperingwhay ofay erhay iffstay,
archedstay etticoatspay. Anksthay otay erhay ethay oorsflay ofay ampedtay earthay, ethay unwhitewasheday udmay allsway, ethay
usticray, oodenway urniturefay eythay adhay uiltbay emselvesthay ereway alwaysay eanday, anday ethay olday estschay erewhay eythay
eptkay eirthay othesclay exhaleday ethay armway ellsmay ofay asilbay.

Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay, owhay asway ethay ostmay enterprisingay anmay everay otay ebay eensay inay ethay illagevay, adhay etsay
upay ethay acementplay ofay ethay ouseshay inay uchsay aay ayway atthay omfray allay ofay emthay oneay ouldcay eachray ethay iverray anday
awdray aterway ithway ethay amesay effortay, anday ehay adhay inedlay upay ethay eetsstray ithway uchsay oodgay ensesay atthay onay ousehay
otgay oremay unsay anthay anotheray uringday ethay othay imetay ofay ayday. Ithinway aay ewfay yearsay Acondomay asway aay illagevay
atthay asway oremay orderlyay anday ardhay orkingway anthay anyay ownknay untilay enthay ybay itsay eethray undredhay inhabitantsay.
Itay asway aay ulytray appyhay illagevay erewhay onay oneay asway overay irtythay yearsay ofay ageay anday erewhay onay oneay adhay iedday.

Incesay ethay imetay ofay itsay oundingfay, Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay adhay uiltbay apstray anday agescay. Inay aay ortshay imetay ehay
illedfay otnay onlyay ishay ownay ousehay utbay allay ofay osethay inay ethay illagevay ithway oupialstray, anariescay, eebay eatersay, anday
edbreastsray. Ethay oncertcay ofay osay anymay ifferentday irdsbay ecamebay osay isturbingday atthay Ursulaay ouldway ugplay erhay
earsay ithway eeswaxbay osay asay otnay otay oselay erhay ensesay ofay ealityray. Ethay irstfay imetay atthay Elquiades’may ibetray arriveday,
ellingsay assglay allsbay orfay eadacheshay, everyoneay asway urprisedsay atthay eythay adhay eenbay ableay otay indfay atthay illagevay
ostlay inay ethay owsinessdray ofay ethay ampsway, anday ethay ypsiesgay onfessedcay atthay eythay adhay oundfay eirthay ayway ybay ethay
ongsay ofay ethay irdsbay.






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Atthay iritspay ofay ocialsay initiativeay isappearedday inay aay ortshay imetay, ulledpay awayay ybay ethay everfay ofay ethay
agnetsmay, ethay astronomicalay alculationscay, ethay eamsdray ofay ansmutationtray, anday ethay urgeay otay iscoverday ethay
ondersway ofay ethay orldway. Omfray aay eanclay anday activeay anmay, Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay angedchay intoay aay anmay azylay
inay appearanceay, arelesscay inay ishay essdray, ithway aay ildway eardbay atthay Ursulaay anagedmay otay imtray ithway eatgray effortay
anday aay itchenkay ifeknay. Erethay ereway anymay owhay onsideredcay imhay ethay ictimvay ofay omesay angestray ellspay. Utbay
evenay osethay ostmay onvincedcay ofay ishay adnessmay eftlay orkway anday amilyfay otay ollowfay imhay enwhay ehay oughtbray outay
ishay oolstay otay earclay ethay andlay anday askeday ethay assembleday oupgray otay openay aay ayway atthay ouldway utpay Acondomay inay
ontactcay ithway ethay eatgray inventionsay.

Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay asway ompletelycay ignorantay ofay ethay eographygay ofay ethay egionray. Ehay ewknay atthay otay
ethay eastay erethay aylay anay impenetrableay ountainmay ainchay anday atthay onay ethay otheray idesay ofay ethay ountainsmay erethay
asway ethay ardentay itycay ofay Iohacharay, erewhay inay imestay ast—accordingpay otay atwhay ehay adhay eenbay oldtay ybay ethay
irstfay Aurelianoay Uendiabay, ishay andfather—Sirgray Ancisfray Akedray adhay onegay ocodilecray untinghay ithway
annonscay anday atthay ehay epairedray emhay anday uffedstay emthay ithway awstray otay ingbray otay Ueenqay Elizabethay. Inay ishay
youthay, Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay anday ishay enmay, ithway ivesway anday ildrenchay, animalsay anday allay indskay ofay omesticday
implementsay, adhay ossedcray ethay ountainsmay inay earchsay ofay anay outletay otay ethay easay, anday afteray enty-sixtway
onthsmay eythay avegay upay ethay expeditionay anday oundedfay Acondomay, osay eythay ouldway otnay avehay otay ogay ackbay. Itay
asway, ereforethay, aay outeray atthay idday otnay interestay imhay, orfay itay ouldcay eadlay onlyay otay ethay astpay. Otay ethay outhsay aylay
ethay ampssway, overedcay ithway anay eternalay egetablevay umscay anday ethay olewhay astvay universeay ofay ethay eatgray
ampsway, ichwhay, accordingay otay atwhay ethay ypsiesgay aidsay, adhay onay imitslay. Ethay eatgray ampsway inay ethay estway
ingledmay ithway aay oundlessbay extensionay ofay aterway erewhay erethay ereway oft-skinnedsay etaceanscay atthay adhay ethay
eadhay anday orsotay ofay aay omanway, ausingcay ethay uinationray ofay ailorssay ithway ethay armchay ofay eirthay extraordinaryay
eastsbray. Ethay ypsiesgay ailedsay alongay atthay outeray orfay ixsay onthsmay eforebay eythay eachedray ethay ipstray ofay andlay overay
ichwhay ethay ulesmay atthay arriedcay ethay ailmay assedpay. Accordingay otay Osejay Arcadioay Uendia’sbay alculationscay, ethay
onlyay ossibilitypay ofay ontactcay ithway ivilizationcay aylay alongay ethay orthernnay outeray. Osay ehay andedhay outay earingclay
oolstay anday untinghay eaponsway otay ethay amesay enmay owhay adhay eenbay ithway imhay uringday ethay oundingfay ofay
Acondomay. Ehay ewthray ishay irectionalday instrumentsay anday ishay apsmay intoay aay apsackknay, anday ehay undertookay ethay
ecklessray adventureay.

Uringday ethay irstfay aysday eythay idday otnay omecay acrossay anyay appreciableay obstacleay. Eythay entway ownday alongay
ethay onystay ankbay ofay ethay iverray otay ethay aceplay erewhay yearsay eforebay eythay adhay oundfay ethay oldier’ssay armoray, anday
omfray erethay eythay entway intoay ethay oodsway alongay aay athpay etweenbay ildway orangeay eestray. Atay ethay enday ofay ethay irstfay
eekway eythay illedkay anday oastedray aay eerday, utbay eythay agreeday otay eatay onlyay alfhay ofay itay anday altsay ethay estray orfay ethay aysday
atthay aylay aheaday. Ithway atthay ecautionpray eythay iedtray otay ostponepay ethay ecessitynay ofay avinghay otay eatay acawsmay,
osewhay ueblay eshflay adhay aay arshhay anday uskymay astetay. Enthay, orfay oremay anthay entay aysday, eythay idday otnay eesay ethay
unsay againay. Ethay oundgray ecamebay oftsay anday ampday, ikelay olcanicvay ashay, anday ethay egetationvay asway ickerthay anday
ickerthay, anday ethay iescray ofay ethay irdsbay anday ethay uproaray ofay ethay onkeysmay ecamebay oremay anday oremay emoteray,
anday ethay orldway ecamebay eternallyay adsay. Ethay enmay onay ethay expeditionay eltfay overwhelmeday ybay eirthay ostmay
ancientay emoriesmay inay atthay aradisepay ofay ampnessday anday ilencesay, oinggay ackbay otay eforebay originalay insay, asay eirthay
ootsbay anksay intoay oolspay ofay eamingstay oilay anday eirthay achetesmay estroyedday oodyblay ilieslay anday oldengay alaman¬say
ersday. Orfay aay eekway, almostay ithoutway eakingspay, eythay entway aheaday ikelay eepwalkersslay oughthray aay universeay ofay
iefgray, ightedlay onlyay ybay ethay enuoustay eflectionray ofay uminouslay insectsay, anday eirthay ungslay ereway overwhelmeday
ybay aay uffocatingsay ellsmay ofay oodblay. Eythay ouldcay otnay eturnray ecausebay ethay ipstray atthay eythay ereway openingay asay
eythay entway alongay ouldway oonsay oseclay upay ithway aay ewnay egetationvay atthay, almostay eemedsay otay owgray eforebay
eirthay eyesay. It’s“ay allay ight,”ray Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay ouldway aysay. e“Thay ainmay ilingtay isay otnay otay oselay ouray
earings.”bay Alwaysay ollowingfay ishay ompasscay, ehay eptkay onay uidinggay ishay enmay owardtay ethay invisibleay orthnay osay
atthay eythay ouldway ebay ableay otay etgay outay ofay atthay enchanteday egionray. Itay asway aay ickthay ightnay, arlessstay, utbay ethay
arknessday asway ecomingbay impregnateday ithway aay eshfray anday earclay airay. Exhausteday ybay ethay onglay ossingcray, eythay
unghay upay eirthay ammockshay anday eptslay eeplyday orfay ethay irstfay imetay inay otway eeksway. Enwhay eythay okeway upay, ithway
ethay unsay alreadyay ighhay inay ethay yskay, eythay ereway eechlessspay ithway ascinationfay. Eforebay emthay, urroundedsay ybay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


ernsfay anday almpay eestray, itewhay anday owderypay inay ethay ilentsay orningmay ightlay, asway anay enormousay Anishspay
alleongay. Iltedtay ightlyslay otay ethay arboardstay, itay adhay anginghay omfray itsay intactay astsmay ethay irtyday agsray ofay itsay ailssay
inay ethay idstmay ofay itsay iggingray, ichwhay asway adorneday ithway orchidsay. Ethay ullhay, overedcay ithway anay armoray ofay
etrifiedpay arnaclesbay anday oftsay ossmay, asway irmlyfay astenedfay intoay aay urfacesay ofay onesstay. Ethay olewhay ucturestray
eemedsay otay occupyay itsay ownay acespay, oneay ofay olitudesay anday oblivionay, otectedpray omfray ethay icesvay ofay imetay anday
ethay abitshay ofay ethay irdsbay. Insideay, erewhay ethay expeditionariesay exploreday ithway arefulcay intentay, erethay asway
othingnay utbay aay ickthay orestfay ofay owersflay.

Ethay iscoveryday ofay ethay alleongay, anay indicationay ofay ethay oximitypray ofay ethay easay, okebray Osejay Arcadioay
Uendia’sbay ivedray. Ehay onsideredcay itay aay icktray ofay ishay imsicalwhay atefay otay avehay earchedsay orfay ethay easay ithoutway
indingfay itay, atay ethay ostcay ofay ountlesscay acrificessay anday ufferingsay, anday otay avehay oundfay itay allay ofay aay uddensay
ithoutway ookinglay orfay itay, asay ifay itay aylay acrossay ishay athpay ikelay anay insurmountableay objectay. Anymay yearsay aterlay
Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay ossedcray ethay egionray againay, enwhay itay asway alreadyay aay egularray ailmay outeray, anday
ethay onlyay artpay ofay ethay ipshay ehay oundfay asway itsay urned-outbay amefray inay ethay idstmay ofay aay ieldfay ofay oppiespay. Onlyay
enthay, onvincedcay atthay ethay orystay adhay otnay eenbay omesay oductpray ofay ishay ather’sfay imaginationay, idday ehay onderway
owhay ethay alleongay adhay eenbay ableay otay etgay inlanday otay atthay otspay. Utbay Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay idday otnay oncerncay
imselfhay ithway atthay enwhay ehay oundfay ethay easay afteray anotheray ourfay ays’day ourneyjay omfray ethay alleongay. Ishay
eamsdray endeday asay ehay acedfay atthay ashenay, oamyfay, irtyday easay, ichwhay adhay otnay eritedmay ethay isksray anday acrificessay
ofay ethay adventureay.

od“Gay amnday it!”ay ehay outedshay. acondo“May isay urroundedsay ybay aterway onay allay ides.”say

Ethay ideaay ofay aay eninsularpay Acondomay evailedpray orfay aay onglay imetay, inspireday ybay ethay arbitraryay apmay atthay
Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay etchedskay onay ishay eturnray omfray ethay expeditionay. Ehay ewdray itay inay ageray, evillyay,
exaggeratingay ethay ifficultiesday ofay ommunicationcay, asay ifay otay unishpay imselfhay orfay ethay absoluteay acklay ofay ensesay
ithway ichwhay ehay adhay osenchay ethay aceplay. e’ll“Way evernay etgay anywhere,”ay ehay amentedlay otay Ursulaay. e’re“Way
oinggay otay otray ouray iveslay awayay erehay ithoutway eceivingray ethay enefitsbay ofay ience.”scay Atthay ertaintycay, ulledmay
overay orfay everalsay onthsmay inay ethay allsmay oomray ehay useday asay ishay aboratorylay, oughtbray imhay otay ethay onceptioncay
ofay ethay anplay otay ovemay Aeondomay otay aay etterbay aceplay. Utbay atthay imetay Ursulaay adhay anticipateday ishay everishfay
esignsday. Ithway ethay ecretsay anday implacableay aborlay ofay aay allsmay antay eshay edisposedpray ethay omenway ofay ethay
illagevay againstay ethay ightinessflay ofay eirthay usbandshay, owhay ereway alreadyay eparingpray orfay ethay ovemay. Osejay
Arcadioay Uendiabay idday otnay owknay atay atwhay omentmay oray ecausebay ofay atwhay adverseay orcesfay ishay anplay adhay
ecomebay envelopeday inay aay ebway ofay etextspray, isappointmentsday, anday evasionsay untilay itay urnedtay intoay othingnay
utbay anay illusionay. Ursulaay atchedway imhay ithway innocentay attentionay anday evenay eltfay omesay itypay orfay imhay onay ethay
orningmay enwhay eshay oundfay imhay inay ethay ackbay oomray utteringmay aboutay ishay ansplay orfay ovingmay asay ehay acedplay
ishay aboratorylay iecespay inay eirthay originalay oxesbay. Eshay etlay imhay inishfay. Eshay etlay imhay ailnay upay ethay oxesbay anday utpay
ishay initialsay onay emthay ithway anay inkeday ushbray, ithoutway eproachingray imhay, utbay owingknay ownay atthay ehay ewknay
ecause(bay eshay adhay eardhay imhay aysay osay inay ishay oftsay onologuesmay) atthay ethay enmay ofay ethay illagevay ouldway otnay
ackbay imhay upay inay ishay undertakingay. Onlyay enwhay ehay eganbay otay aketay ownday ethay oorday ofay ethay oomray idday Ursulaay
areday askay imhay atwhay ehay asway oingday, anday ehay answereday ithway aay ertaincay itternessbay. ince“Say onay oneay antsway otay
eavelay, e’llway eavelay allay ybay ourselves.”ay Ursulaay idday otnay ecomebay upsetay.

e“Way illway otnay eave,”lay eshay aidsay. e“Way illway aystay erehay, ecausebay eway avehay adhay aay onsay ere.”hay

e“Way avehay illstay otnay adhay aay eath,”day ehay aidsay. A“ay ersonpay oesday otnay elongbay otay aay aceplay untilay erethay isay
omeonesay eadday underay ethay ound.”gray

Ursulaay epliedray ithway aay oftsay irmnessfay:

If“ay Iay avehay otay ieday orfay ethay estray ofay youay otay aystay erehay, Iay illway ie.”day

Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay adhay otnay oughtthay atthay ishay ife’sway illway asway osay irmfay. Ehay iedtray otay educesay erhay
ithway ethay armchay ofay ishay antasyfay, ithway ethay omisepray ofay aay odigiouspray orldway erewhay allay oneay adhay otay oday asway
inklespray omesay agicmay iquidlay onay ethay oundgray anday ethay antsplay ouldway earbay itfmay eneverwhay aay anmay ishedway,
anday erewhay allay annermay ofay instrumentsay againstay ainpay ereway oldsay atay argainbay icespray. Utbay Ursulaay asway
insensibleay otay ishay airvoyanceclay.






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Instead“ay ofay oinggay arounday inkingthay aboutay youray azycray inventionsay, youay ouldshay ebay orryingway aboutay
youray ons,”say eshay epliedray. ook“Lay atay ethay atestay ey’rethay inay, unningray ildway ustjay ikelay onkeys.”day

Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay ooktay ishay ife’sway ordsway iterallylay. Ehay ookedlay outay ethay indowway anday awsay ethay
arefootbay ildrenchay inay ethay unnysay ardengay anday ehay adhay ethay impressionay atthay onlyay atay atthay instantay adhay eythay
egunbay otay existay, onceivedcay ybay Ursula’say ellspay, Omethingsay occurreday insideay ofay imhay enthay, omethingsay
ysteriousmay anday efinitiveday atthay uprooteday imhay omfray ishay ownay imetay anday arriedcay imhay adriftay oughthray anay
unexploreday egionray ofay ishay emorymay. Ilewhay Ursulaay ontinuedcay eepingsway ethay ousehay, ichwhay asway afesay ownay
omfray eingbay abandoneday orfay ethay estray ofay erhay ifelay, ehay oodstay erethay ithway anay absorbeday ooklay, ontemplatingcay
ethay ildrenchay untilay ishay eyesay ecamebay oistmay anday ehay ieddray emthay ithway ethay ackbay ofay Inisay andhay, exhalingay aay
eepday ighsay ofay esignationray.

All“ay ight,”ray ehay aidsay. ell“Tay emthay otay omecay elphay emay aketay ethay ingsthay outay ofay ethay oxes.”bay

Osejay Arcadioay, ethay olderay ofay ethay ildrenchay, asway ourteenfay. Ehay adhay aay uaresqay eadhay, ickthay airhay, anday ishay
ather’sfay aracterchay. Althoughay ehay adhay ethay amesay impulseay orfay owthgray anday ysicalphay engthstray, itay asway earlyay
evidentay atthay ehay ackedlay imaginationay. Ehay adhay eenbay onceivedcay anday ornbay uringday ethay ifficultday ossingcray ofay
ethay ountainsmay, eforebay ethay oundingfay ofay Acondomay, anday ishay arentspay avegay anksthay otay eavenhay enwhay eythay
awsay ehay adhay onay animalay eaturesfay. Aurelianoay, ethay irstfay umanhay eingbay otay ebay ornbay inay Acondomay, ouldway ebay
ixsay yearsay olday inay Archmay. Ehay asway ilentsay anday ithdrawnway. Ehay adhay eptway inay ishay other’smay ombway anday adhay
eenbay ornbay ithway ishay eyesay openay. Asay eythay ereway uttingcay ethay umbilicalay ordcay, ehay ovedmay ishay eadhay omfray idesay
otay idesay, akingtay inay ethay ilingstay inay ethay oomray anday examiningay ethay acesfay ofay ethay eoplepay ithway aay earlessfay
uriositycay. Enthay, indifferentay otay osethay owhay amecay oseclay otay ooklay atay imhay, ehay eptkay ishay attentionay
oncentratedcay onay ethay almpay oofray, ichwhay ookedlay asay ifay itay ereway aboutay otay ollapsecay underay ethay emendoustray
essurepray ofay ethay ainray. Ursulaay idday otnay ememberray ethay intensityay ofay atthay ooklay againay untilay oneay ayday enwhay
ittlelay Aurelianoay, atay ethay ageay ofay eethray, entway intoay ethay itchenkay atay ethay omentmay eshay asway akingtay aay otpay ofay
oilingbay oupsay omfray ethay ovestay anday uttingpay itay onay ethay abletay. Ethay ildchay. Erplexedpay, aidsay omfray ethay oorwayday,
It’s“ay oinggay otay ill.”spay Ethay otpay asway irmlyfay acedplay inay ethay entercay ofay ethay abletay, utbay ustjay asay oonsay asay ethay ildchay
ademay ishay announcementay, itay eganbay anay unmistakableay ovementmay owardtay ethay edgeay, asay ifay impelleday ybay
omesay inneray ynamismday, anday itay ellfay anday okebray onay ethay oorflay. Ursulaay, alarmeday, oldtay erhay usbandhay aboutay
ethay episodeay, utbay ehay interpreteday itay asay aay aturalnay enomenonphay. Atthay asway ethay ayway ehay alwaysay asway alienay otay
ethay existenceay ofay ishay onssay, artlypay ecausebay ehay onsideredcay ildhoodchay asay aay eriodpay ofay entalmay insufficiencyay,
anday artlypay ecausebay ehay asway alwaysay ootay absorbeday inay ishay antasticfay eculationsspay.

Utbay incesay ethay afternoonay enwhay ehay alledcay ethay ildrenchay inay otay elphay imhay unpackay ethay ingsthay inay ethay
aboratorylay, ehay avegay emthay ishay estbay ourshay. Inay ethay allsmay eparatesay oomray, erewhay ethay allsway ereway aduallygray
eingbay overedcay ybay angestray apsmay anday abulousfay awingsdray, ehay aughttay emthay otay eadray anday itewray anday oday
umssay, anday ehay okespay otay emthay aboutay ethay ondersway ofay ethay orldway, otnay onlyay erewhay ishay earninglay adhay
extendeday, utbay orcingfay ethay imitslay ofay ishay imaginationay otay extremesay. Itay asway inay atthay ayway atthay ethay oysbay
endeday upay earninglay atthay inay ethay outhernsay extremesay ofay Africaay erethay ereway enmay osay intelligentay anday eacefulpay
atthay eirthay onlyay astimepay asway otay itsay anday inkthay, anday atthay itay asway ossiblepay otay osscray ethay Aegeanay Easay onay ootfay
ybay umpingjay omfray islanday otay islanday allay ethay ayway otay ethay ortpay ofay Alonikasay. Osethay allucinatinghay essionssay
emainedray intedpray onay ethay emoriesmay ofay ethay oysbay inay uchsay aay ayway atthay anymay yearsay aterlay, aay econdsay eforebay
ethay egularray armyay officeray avegay ethay iringfay uadsqay ethay ommandcay otay irefay. Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay awsay
onceay oremay atthay armway Archmay afternoonay onay ichwhay ishay atherfay adhay intermpteday ethay essonlay inay ysicsphay anday
oodstay ascinatedfay, ithway ishay andhay inay ethay airay anday ishay eyesay otionlessmay, isteninglay otay ethay istantday ipespay,
umsdray, anday inglesjay ofay ethay ypsiesgay, owhay ereway omingcay otay ethay illagevay onceay oremay, announcingay ethay atestlay
anday ostmay artlingstay iscoveryday ofay ethay agessay ofay Emphismay.

Eythay ereway ewnay ypsiesgay, youngay enmay anday omenway owhay ewknay onlyay eirthay ownay anguagelay, andsomehay
ecimensspay ithway oilyay insskay anday intelligentay andshay, osewhay ancesday anday usicmay owedsay aay anicpay ofay
uproariousay oyjay oughthray ethay eetsstray, ithway arrotspay aintedpay allay olorscay ecitingray Italianay ariasay, anday aay enhay
owhay aidlay aay undredhay oldengay eggsay otay ethay oundsay ofay aay ambourinetay, anday aay ainedtray onkeymay owhay eadray






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


indsmay, anday ethay ulti-usemay achinemay atthay ouldcay ebay useday atay ethay amesay imetay otay ewsay onay uttonsbay anday educeray
eversfay, anday ethay apparatusay otay akemay aay ersonpay orgetfay ishay adbay emoriesmay, anday aay oulticepay otay oselay imetay, anday
aay ousandthay oremay inventionsay osay ingeniousay anday unusualay atthay Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay ustmay avehay antedway
otay inventay aay emorymay achinemay osay atthay ehay ouldcay ememberray emthay allay. Inay anay instantay eythay ansformedtray ethay
illagevay. Ethay inhabitantsay ofay Acondomay oundfay emselvesthay ostlay isay eirthay ownay eetsstray, onfusedcay ybay ethay
owdedcray airfay.

Oldinghay aay ildchay ybay eachay andhay osay asay otnay otay oselay emthay inay ethay umulttay, umpingbay intoay acrobatsay ithway
old-cappedgay eethtay anday ugglersjay ithway ixsay armsay, uffocatedsay ybay ethay ingledmay eathbray ofay anuremay anday
andalssay atthay ethay owdcray exhaleday, Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay entway aboutay everywhereay ikelay aay admanmay,
ookinglay orfay Elquiadesmay osay atthay ehay ouldcay evealray otay imhay ethay infiniteay ecretssay ofay atthay abulousfay ightmarenay.
Ehay askeday everalsay ypsiesgay, owhay idday otnay understanday ishay anguagelay. Inallyfay ehay eachedray ethay aceplay erewhay
Elquiadesmay useday otay etsay upay ishay enttay anday ehay oundfay aay aciturntay Armenianay owhay inay Anishspay asway awkinghay aay
yrupsay otay akemay oneselfay invisibleay. Ehay adhay unkdray ownday aay assglay ofay ethay amberay ubstancesay inay oneay ulpgay asay
Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay elboweday ishay ayway oughthray ethay absorbeday oupgray atthay asway itnessingway ethay
ectaclespay, anday asway ableay otay askay ishay uestionqay. Ethay ypsygay appedwray imhay inay ethay ightfulfray imateclay ofay ishay
ooklay eforebay ehay urnedtay intoay aay uddlepay ofay estilentialpay anday okingsmay itchpay overay ichwhay ethay echoay ofay ishay
eplyray illstay oatedflay: elquiades“May isay ead.”day Upsetay ybay ethay ewsnay, Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay oodstay otionlessmay,
yingtray otay iseray aboveay ishay afflictionay, untilay ethay oupgray ispersedday, alledcay awayay ybay otheray artificesay, anday ethay
uddlepay ofay ethay aciturntay Armenianay evaporateday ompletelycay. Otheray ypsiesgay onfirmedcay aterlay onay atthay
Elquiadesmay adhay inay actfay uccumbedsay otay ethay everfay onay ethay eachbay atay Ingaporesay anday atthay ishay odybay adhay
eenbay ownthray intoay ethay eepestday artpay ofay ethay Avajay Easay. Ethay ildrenchay adhay onay interestay inay ethay ewsnay. Eythay
insisteday atthay eirthay atherfay aketay emthay otay eesay ethay overwhelmingay oveltynay ofay ethay agessay ofay Emphismay atthay
asway eingbay advertiseday atay ethay entranceay ofay aay enttay atthay, accordingay otay atwhay asway aidsay, adhay elongedbay otay Ingkay
Olomonsay. Eythay insisteday osay uchmay atthay Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay aidpay ethay irtythay ealesray anday edlay emthay intoay
ethay entercay ofay ethay enttay, erewhay erethay asway aay iantgay ithway aay airyhay orsotay anday aay avedshay eadhay, ithway aay oppercay
ingray inay ishay osenay anday aay eavyhay ironay ainchay onay ishay ankleay, atchingway overay aay iratepay estchay. Enwhay itay asway
openeday ybay ethay iantgay, ethay estchay avegay offay aay acialglay exhalationay. Insideay erethay asway onlyay anay enormousay,
ansparenttray ockblay ithway infiniteay internalay eedlesnay inay ichwhay ethay ightlay ofay ethay unsetsay asway okenbray upay intoay
oloredcay arsstay. Isconcertedday, owingknay atthay ethay ildrenchay ereway aitingway orfay anay immediateay explanationay,
Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay enturedvay aay urmurmay:

It’s“ay ethay argestlay iamondday inay ethay orld.”way

o,”“Nay ethay ypsygay ounteredcay. It’s“ay ice.”ay

Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay, ithoutway understandingay, etchedstray outay ishay andhay owardtay ethay akecay, utbay ethay
iantgay ovedmay itay awayay. ive“Fay ealesray oremay otay ouchtay it,”ay ehay aidsay. Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay aidpay emthay anday
utpay ishay andhay onay ethay iceay anday eldhay itay erethay orfay everalsay inutesmay asay ishay earthay illedfay ithway earfay anday
ubilationjay atay ethay ontactcay ithway ysterymay. Ithoutway owingknay atwhay otay aysay, ehay aidpay entay ealesray oremay osay atthay
ishay onssay ouldcay avehay atthay odigiouspray experienceay. Ittlelay Osejay Arcadioay efusedray otay ouchtay itay. Aurelianoay, onay
ethay otheray andhay, ooktay aay epstay orwardfay anday utpay ishay andhay onay itay, ithdrawingway itay immediatelyay. It’s“ay
oiling,”bay ehay exclaimeday, artledstay. Utbay ishay atherfay aidpay onay attentionay otay imhay. Intoxicateday ybay ethay evidenceay
ofay ethay iraclemay, ehay orgotfay atay atthay omentmay aboutay ethay ustrationfray ofay ishay eliriousday undertakingsay anday
Elquiades’may odybay, abandoneday otay ethay appetiteay ofay ethay uidssqay. Ehay aidpay anotheray ivefay ealesray anday ithway ishay
andhay onay ethay akecay, asay ifay ivinggay estimonytay onay ethay olyhay ipturesscray, ehay exclaimeday:

is“Thay isay ethay eatgray inventionay ofay ouray ime.”tay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Apterchay 


ENwHay EtHay IRATEpay Irsay Ancisfray Akedray attackeday Iohacharay inay ethay ixteenthsay enturycay, Ursulaay Iguaran’say
eat-great-grandmothergray ecamebay osay ightenedfray ithway ethay ingingray ofay alarmay ellsbay anday ethay iringfay ofay
annonscay atthay eshay ostlay ontrolcay ofay erhay ervesnay anday atsay ownday onay aay ightedlay ovestay. Ethay urnsbay angedchay erhay
intoay aay uselessay ifeway orfay ethay estray ofay erhay aysday. Eshay ouldcay onlyay itsay onay oneay idesay, ushionedcay ybay illowspay, anday
omethingsay angestray ustmay avehay appenedhay otay erhay ayway ofay alkingway, orfay eshay evernay alkedway againay inay ublicpay.
Eshay avegay upay allay indskay ofay ocialsay activityay, obsesseday ithway ethay otionnay atthay erhay odybay avegay offay aay ingedsay
odoray. Awnday ouldway indfay erhay inay ethay ourtyardcay, orfay eshay idday otnay areday allfay asleepay estlay eshay eamdray ofay ethay
Englishay anday eirthay erociousfay attackay ogsday asay eythay amecay oughthray ethay indowsway ofay erhay edroombay otay
ubmitsay erhay otay amefulshay orturestay ithway eirthay ed-hotray ironsay. Erhay usbandhay, anay Aragoneseay erchantmay ybay
omwhay eshay adhay otway ildrenchay, entspay alfhay ethay aluevay ofay ishay orestay onay edicinesmay anday astimespay inay anay
attemptay otay alleviateay erhay errortay. Inallyfay ehay oldsay ethay usinessbay anday ooktay ethay amilyfay otay ivelay arfay omfray ethay
easay inay aay ettlementsay ofay eacefulpay Indiansay ocatedlay inay ethay oothillsfay, erewhay ehay uiltbay ishay ifeway aay edroombay
ithoutway indowsway osay atthay ethay iratespay ofay erhay eamdray ouldway avehay onay ayway otay etgay inay.

Inay atthay iddenhay illagevay erethay asway aay ative-bornnay obaccotay anterplay owhay adhay ivedlay erethay orfay omesay imetay,
Onday Osejay Arcadioay Uendfabay, ithway omwhay Ursula’say eat-great-grandfathergray establisheday aay artnershippay
atthay asway osay ucrativelay atthay ithinway aay ewfay yearsay eythay ademay aay ortunefay. Everalsay enturiescay aterlay ethay eatgray-
eat-grandsongray ofay ethay ative-bornnay anterplay arriedmay ethay eat-great-granddaughtergray ofay ethay Aragoneseay.
Ereforethay, everyay imetay atthay Ursulaay ecamebay exerciseday overay erhay usband’shay admay ideasay, eshay ouldway eaplay
ackbay overay eethray undredhay yearsay ofay atefay anday ursecay ethay ayday atthay Irsay Ancisfray Akedray adhay attackeday
Iohacharay. Itay asway implysay aay ayway. ofay ivinggay erselfhay omesay eliefray, ecausebay actuallyay eythay ereway oinedjay illtay
eathday ybay aay ondbay atthay asway oremay olidsay atthay ovelay: aay ommoncay ickpray ofay onsciencecay. Eythay ereway ousinscay.
Eythay adhay owngray upay ogethertay inay ethay olday illagevay atthay othbay ofay eirthay ancestorsay, ithway eirthay orkway anday eirthay
oodgay abitshay, adhay ansformedtray intoay oneay ofay ethay inestfay ownstay inay ethay ovincepray. Althoughay eirthay arriagemay
asway edictedpray omfray ethay imetay eythay adhay omecay intoay ethay orldway, enwhay eythay expresseday eirthay esireday otay ebay
arriedmay eirthay ownay elativesray iedtray otay opstay itay. Eythay ereway afraiday atthay osethay otway ealthyhay oductspray ofay otway
acesray atthay adhay interbreday overay ethay enturiescay ouldway uffersay ethay ameshay ofay eedingbray iguanasay. Erethay adhay
alreadyay eenbay aay orriblehay ecedentpray. Anay auntay ofay Ursula’say, arriedmay otay anay uncleay ofay Osejay Arcadioay Uendfabay,
adhay aay onsay owhay entway oughthray ifelay earingway ooselay, aggybay ouserstray anday owhay edblay otay eathday afteray avinghay
ivedlay orty-twofay yearsay inay ethay urestpay atestay ofay irginityvay, orfay ehay adhay eenbay ornbay anday adhay owngray upay ithway aay
artilaginouscay ailtay inay ethay apeshay ofay aay orkscrewcay anday ithway aay allsmay ufttay ofay airhay onay ethay iptay. Aay ig’spay ailtay atthay
asway evernay alloweday otay ebay eensay ybay anyay omanway anday atthay ostcay imhay ishay ifelay enwhay aay utcherbay iendfray idday imhay
ethay avorfay ofay oppingchay itay offay ithway ishay eaverclay. Osejay Arcadioay Uendfabay, ithway ethay imsywhay ofay ishay ineteennay
yearsay, esolvedray ethay oblempray ithway aay inglesay asephray: I“ay on’tday arecay ifay Iay avehay igletspay asay onglay asay eythay ancay
alk.”tay Osay eythay ereway arriedmay amidstay aay estivalfay ofay ireworksfay anday aay assbray andbay atthay entway onay orfay eethray
aysday. Eythay ouldway avehay eenbay appyhay omfray enthay onay ifay Ursula’say othermay adhay otnay errifiedtay erhay ithway allay
annermay ofay inistersay edictionspray aboutay eirthay offspringay, evenay otay ethay extremeay ofay advisingay erhay otay efuseray otay
onsummatecay ethay arriagemay. Earingfay atthay erhay outstay anday illfulway usbandhay ouldway aperay erhay ilewhay eshay eptslay,
Ursulaay, eforebay oinggay otay edbay, ouldway utpay onay aay udimentaryray indkay ofay awersdray atthay erhay othermay adhay ademay
outay ofay ailclothsay anday adhay einforcedray ithway aay ystemsay ofay isscrossedcray eatherlay apsstray anday atthay asway osedclay inay
ethay ontfray ybay aay ickthay ironay ucklebay. Atthay asway owhay eythay ivedlay orfay everalsay onthsmay. Uringday ethay ayday ehay
ouldway aketay arecay ofay ishay ightingfay ockscay anday eshay ouldway oday amefray embroideryay ithway erhay othermay. Atay ightnay
eythay ouldway estlewray orfay everalsay ourshay inay anay anguisheday iolencevay atthay eemedsay otay ebay aay ubstitutesay orfay ethay
actay ofay ovelay, untilay opularpay intuitionay otgay aay iffwhay ofay omethingsay irregularay anday ethay ormmay eadspray atthay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Ursulaay asway illstay aay irginvay aay yearay afteray erhay arriagemay ecausebay erhay usbandhay asway impotentay. Osejay Arcadioay
Uendiabay asway ethay astlay oneay otay earhay ethay ormmay.

ook“Lay atay atwhay eoplepay areay oinggay arounday ayingsay, Ursula,”ay ehay oldtay ishay ifeway eryvay almlycay.

et“Lay emthay alk,”tay eshay aidsay. e“Way owknay atthay it’say otnay ue.”tray

Osay ethay ituationsay entway onay ethay amesay ayway orfay anotheray ixsay onthsmay untilay atthay agictray Undaysay enwhay Osejay
Arcadioay Uendiabay onway aay ockfightcay omfray Udenciopray Aguilaray. Uriousfay, arouseday ybay ethay oodblay ofay ishay irdbay,
ethay oserlay ackedbay awayay omfray Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay osay atthay everyoneay inay ethay ockpitcay ouldcay earhay atwhay
ehay asway oinggay otay elltay imhay.

ongratulations!”“Cay ehay outedshay. aybe“May atthay oosterray ofay yoursay ancay oday youray ifeway aay avor.”fay

Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay erenelysay ickedpay upay ishay oosterray. I’ll“ay ebay ightray ack,”bay ehay oldtay everyoneay. Anday
enthay otay Udenciopray Aguilaray:

You“ay ogay omehay anday etgay aay eaponway, ecausebay I’may oinggay otay illkay you.”ay

Entay inutesmay aterlay ehay eturnedray ithway ethay otchednay earspay atthay adhay elongedbay otay ishay andfathergray. Atay
ethay oorday otay ethay ockpitcay, erewhay alfhay ethay owntay adhay atheredgay, Udenciopray Aguilaray asway aitingway orfay imhay.
Erethay asway onay imetay otay efendday imselfhay. Osejay Arcadioay Uendia’sbay earspay, ownthray ithway ethay engthstray ofay aay
ullbay anday ithway ethay amesay oodgay aimay ithway ichwhay ethay irstfay Aurelianoay Uendiabay adhay exterminateday ethay
aguarsjay inay ethay egionray, iercedpay ishay oatthray. Atthay ightnay, asay eythay eldhay aay akeway overay ethay orpsecay inay ethay
ockpitcay, Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay entway intoay ethay edroombay asay ishay ifeway asway uttingpay onay erhay astitychay antspay.
Ointingpay ethay earspay atay erhay ehay ordereday: ake“Tay emthay off.”ay Ursulaay adhay onay oubtday aboutay erhay usband’shay
ecisionday. You’ll“ay ebay esponsibleray orfay atwhay appens,”hay eshay urmuredmay. Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay uckstay ethay
earspay intoay ethay irtday oorflay.

If“ay youay earbay iguanasay, e’llway aiseray iguanas,”ay ehay aidsay. ut“Bay ere’llthay ebay onay oremay illingskay inay isthay owntay
ecausebay ofay you.”ay

Itay asway aay inefay Unejay ightnay, oolcay anday ithway aay oonmay, anday eythay ereway awakeay anday olickingfray inay edbay untilay
awnday, indifferentay otay ethay eezebray atthay assedpay oughthray ethay edroombay, oadedlay ithway ethay eepingway ofay
Enciopmday Aguilar’say inkay.

Ethay attermay asway utpay ownday asay aay uelday ofay onorhay, utbay othbay ofay emthay ereway eftlay ithway aay ingetway inay eirthay
onsciencecay. Oneay ightnay, enwhay eshay ouldcay otnay eepslay, Ursulaay entway outay intoay ethay ourtyardcay otay etgay omesay
aterway anday eshay awsay Udenciopray Aguilaray ybay ethay aterway arjay. Ehay asway ividlay, aay adsay expressionay onay ishay acefay,
yingtray otay overcay ethay olehay inay ishay oatthray ithway aay ugplay ademay ofay espartoay assgray. Itay idday otnay ingbray onay earfay inay
erhay, utbay itypay. Eshay entway ackbay otay ethay oomray anday oldtay erhay usbandhay atwhay eshay adhay eensay, utbay ehay idday otnay
inkthay uchmay ofay itay. is“Thay ustjay eansmay atthay eway an’tcay andstay ethay eightway ofay ouray onscience.”cay Otway ightsnay
aterlay Ursulaay awsay Udenciopray Aguilaray againay, inay ethay athroombay, usingay ethay espartoay ugplay otay ashway ethay
ottedclay oodblay omfray ishay oatthray. Onay anotheray ightnay eshay awsay imhay ollingstray inay ethay ainray. Osejay Arcadioay
Uendiabay, annoyeday ybay ishay ife’sway allucinationshay, entway outay intoay ethay ourtyardcay armeday ithway ethay earspay.
Erethay asway ethay eadday anmay ithway ishay adsay expressionay.

You“ay ogay otay ell,”hay Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay outedshay atay imhay. ust“Jay asay anymay imestay asay youay omecay ackbay,
I’llay illkay youay again.”ay

Enciopmday Aguilaray idday otnay ogay awayay, ornay idday Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay areday owthray ethay earspay. Ehay evernay
eptslay ellway afteray atthay. Ehay asway ormentedtay ybay ethay immenseay esolationday ithway ichwhay ethay eadday anmay adhay
ookedlay atay imhay oughthray ethay ainray, ishay eepday ostalgianay asay ehay yearneday orfay ivinglay eoplepay, ethay anxietyay ithway
ichwhay ehay earchedsay oughthray ethay ousehay ookinglay orfay omesay aterway ithway ichwhay otay oaksay ishay espartoay ugplay.
e“Hay ustmay ebay ufferingsay aay eatgray eal,”day ehay aidsay otay Ursulaay. You“ay ancay eesay atthay e’shay osay eryvay onely.”lay Eshay
asway osay ovedmay atthay ethay extnay imetay eshay awsay ethay eadday anmay uncoveringay ethay otspay onay ethay ovestay eshay
understooday atwhay ehay asway ookinglay orfay, anday omfray enthay onay eshay acedplay aterway ugsjay allay aboutay ethay ousehay.
Oneay ightnay enwhay ehay oundfay imhay ashingway ishay oundway inay ishay ownay oomray, Osejay Anedioay Uendiabay ouldcay onay
ongerlay esistray.






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


It’s“ay allay ightray, Udencio,”pray ehay oldtay imhay. e’re“Way oinggay otay eavelay isthay owntay, ustjay asay arfay awayay asay eway
ancay ogay, anday e’llway evernay omecay ackbay. Ogay inay eacepay ow.”nay

Atthay asway owhay eythay undertookay ethay ossingcray ofay ethay ountainsmay. Everalsay iendsfray ofay Osejay Arcadioay
Uendiabay, youngay enmay ikelay imhay, exciteday, ybay ethay adventureay, ismantledday eirthay ouseshay anday ackedpay upay,
alongay ithway eirthay ivesway anday ildrenchay, otay eadhay owardtay ethay andlay atthay onay oneay adhay omisedpray emthay. Eforebay
ehay eftlay, Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay uriedbay ethay earspay inay ethay ourtyardcay anday, oneay afteray ethay otheray, ehay utcay ethay
oatsthray ofay ishay agnificentmay ightingfay ockscay, ustingtray atthay inay atthay ayway ehay ouldcay ivegay omesay easuremay ofay
eacepay otay Enciopmday Aguilaray. Allay atthay Ursulaay ooktay alongay ereway aay unktray ithway erhay idalbray othesclay, aay ewfay
ouseholdhay utensilsay, anday ethay allsmay estchay ithway ethay oldgay iecespay atthay eshay adhay inheriteday omfray erhay atherfay.
Eythay idday otnay aylay outay anyay efiniteday itineraryay. Eythay implysay iedtray otay ogay inay aay irectionday oppositeay otay ethay oadray
otay Iohacharay osay atthay eythay ouldway otnay eavelay anyay acetray oray eetmay anyay eoplepay eythay ewknay. Itay asway anay absurday
ourneyjay. Afteray ourteenfay onthsmay, erhay omachstay orruptedcay ybay onkeymay eatmay anday akesnay ewstay, Ursulaay
avegay irthbay otay aay onsay owhay adhay allay ofay ishay eaturesfay umanhay. Eshay adhay aveledtray alfhay ofay ethay iptray inay aay
ammockhay atthay otway enmay arriedcay onay eirthay ouldersshay, ecausebay ellingsway adhay isfiguredday erhay egslay anday erhay
aricosevay einsvay adhay uffedpay upay ikelay ubblesbay. Althoughay itay asway itifulpay otay eesay emthay ithway eirthay unkensay
omachsstay anday anguidlay eyesay, ethay ildrenchay urvivedsay ethay ourneyjay etterbay anthay eirthay arentspay, anday ostmay ofay
ethay imetay itay asway unfay orfay emthay. Oneay orningmay, afteray almostay otway yearsay ofay ossingcray, eythay ecamebay ethay irstfay
ortalsmay otay eesay ethay esternway opesslay ofay ethay ountainmay angeray. Omfray ethay oudyclay ummitsay eythay awsay ethay
immenseay aquaticay expanseay ofay ethay eatgray ampsway asay itay eadspray outay owardtay ethay otheray idesay ofay ethay orldway. Utbay
eythay evernay oundfay ethay easay. Oneay ightnay, afteray everalsay onthsmay ofay ostlay anderingway oughthray ethay ampssway, arfay
awayay ownay omfray ethay astlay Indiansay eythay adhay etmay onay eirthay ayway, eythay ampedcay onay ethay anksbay ofay aay onystay
iverray osewhay atersway ereway ikelay aay orrenttay ofay ozenfray assglay. Yearsay aterlay, uringday ethay econdsay ivilcay arway,
Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay iedtray otay ollowfay atthay amesay outeray inay orderay otay aketay Iohacharay ybay urprisesay anday
afteray ixsay aysday ofay avelingtray ehay understooday atthay itay asway adnessmay. Everthelessnay, ethay ightnay onay ichwhay eythay
ampedcay esidebay ethay iverray, ishay ather’sfay osthay adhay ethay ooklay ofay ipwreckedshay eoplepay ithway onay escapeay, utbay
eirthay umbernay adhay owngray uringday ethay ossingcray anday eythay ereway allay eparedpray and(ay eythay ucceededsay) otay ieday
ofay olday ageay. Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay eameddray atthay ightnay atthay ightray erethay aay oisynay itycay ithway ouseshay avinghay
irrormay ailsway oseray upay. Ehay askeday atwhay itycay itay asway anday eythay answereday imhay ithway aay amenay atthay ehay adhay
evernay eardhay, atthay adhay onay eaningmay atay allay, utbay atthay adhay aay upernaturalsay echoay inay ishay eamdray: Acondomay. Onay
ethay ollowingfay ayday ehay onvincedcay ishay enmay atthay eythay ouldway evernay indfay ethay easay. Ehay ordereday emthay otay utcay
ownday ethay eestray otay akemay aay earingclay esidebay ethay iverray, atay ethay oolestcay otspay onay ethay ankbay, anday erethay eythay
oundedfay ethay illagevay.

Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay idday otnay ucceedsay inay ecipheringday ethay eamdray ofay ouseshay ithway irrormay allsway untilay
ethay ayday ehay iscoveredday iceay. Enthay ehay oughtthay ehay understooday itsay eepday eaningmay. Ehay oughtthay atthay inay ethay
earnay uturefay eythay ouldway ebay ableay otay anufacturemay ocksblay ofay iceay onay aay argelay alescay omfray uchsay aay ommoncay
aterialmay asay aterway anday ithway emthay uildbay ethay ewnay ouseshay ofay ethay illagevay. Acondomay ouldway onay ongerlay ebay aay
urningbay aceplay, erewhay ethay ingeshay anday oorday ockersknay istedtway ithway ethay eathay, utbay ouldway ebay angedchay intoay
aay intryway itycay. Ifay ehay idday otnay erseverepay inay ishay attemptsay otay uildbay anay iceay actoryfay, itay asway ecausebay atay atthay
imetay ehay asway absolutelyay enthusiasticay overay ethay educationay ofay ishay onssay, especiallyay atthay ofay Aurelianoay, owhay
omfray ethay irstfay adhay evealedray aay angestray intuitionay orfay alchemyay. Ethay aboratorylay adhay eenbay ustedday offay.
Eviewingray Elquiades’may otesnay, erenesay ownay, ithoutway ethay exaltationay ofay oveltynay, inay olongedpray anday
atientpay essionssay eythay iedtray otay eparatesay Ursula’say oldgay omfray ethay ebrisday atthay asway uckstay otay ethay ottombay ofay
ethay otpay. Youngay Osejay Arcadioay arcelyscay ooktay artpay inay ethay ocesspray. Ilewhay ishay atherfay asway involveday odybay
anday oulsay ithway ishay aterway ipepay, ethay illfulway irst-bornfay, owhay adhay alwaysay eenbay ootay igbay orfay ishay ageay, adhay
ecomebay aay onumentalmay adolescentay. Ishay oicevay adhay angedchay. Anay incipientay uzzfay appeareday onay ishay upperay
iplay. Oneay ightnay, asay Ursulaay entway intoay ethay oomray erewhay ehay asway undressingay otay ogay otay edbay, eshay eltfay aay
ingledmay ensesay ofay ameshay anday itypay: ehay asway ethay irstfay anmay atthay eshay adhay eensay akednay afteray erhay usbandhay.
