anday ehay asway osay ell-equippedway orfay ifelay atthay ehay eemedsay abnormalay. Ursulaay, egnantpray orfay ethay irdthay imetay,
elivedray erhay ewlywednay errortay.

Arounday atthay imetay aay errymay, oul-mouthedfay, ovocativepray omanway amecay otay ethay ousehay otay elphay ithway ethay
oreachay, anday eshay ewknay owhay otay eadray ethay uturefay inay ardscay. Ursulaay okespay otay erhay aboutay erhay onsay. Eshay
oughtthay atthay ishay isproportionateday izesay asway omethingsay asay unnaturalay asay erhay ousin’scay ailtay ofay aay igpay.
Ethay omanway etlay outay anay expansiveay aughlay atthay esoundedray oughthray ethay ousehay ikelay aay ayspray ofay okenbray
assglay. ust“Jay ethay opposite,”ay eshay aidsay. e’ll“Hay ebay eryvay ucky.”lay Inay orderay otay onfirmcay erhay edictionpray eshay
oughtbray erhay ardscay otay ethay ousehay aay ewfay aysday aterlay anday ockedlay erselfhay upay ithway Osejay Arcadioay inay aay anarygray
offay ethay itchenkay. Eshay almlycay acedplay erhay ardscay onay anay olday arpenter’scay enchbay, ayingsay anythingay atthay amecay
intoay erhay eadhay, ilewhay ethay oybay aitedway esidebay erhay, oremay oredbay anthay intrigueday. Uddenlysay eshay eachedray outay
erhay andhay anday ouchedtay imhay. ordy!”“Lay eshay aidsay, incerelysay artledstay, anday atthay asway allay eshay ouldcay aysay. Osejay
Arcadioay eltfay ishay onesbay illingfay upay ithway oamfay, aay anguidlay earfay, anday aay erribletay esireday otay eepway. Ethay omanway
ademay onay insinuationsay. Utbay Osejay Arcadioay eptkay ookinglay orfay erhay allay ightnay onglay, orfay ethay ellsmay ofay okesmay
atthay eshay adhay underay erhay armpitsay anday atthay adhay otgay aughtcay underay ishay inskay. Ehay antedway otay ebay ithway erhay allay
ethay imetay, ehay antedway erhay otay ebay ishay othermay, orfay emthay evernay otay eavelay ethay anarygray, anday orfay erhay otay aysay
ordy!”“Lay otay imhay. Oneay ayday ehay ouldcay otnay andstay itay anyay oremay anday. ehay entway ookinglay orfay erhay atay erhay ousehay:
Ehay ademay aay ormalfay isitvay, ittingsay uncomprehendinglyay inay ethay ivinglay oomray ithoutway ayingsay aay ordway. Atay
atthay omentmay ehay adhay onay esireday orfay erhay. Ehay oundfay erhay ifferentday, entirelyay oreignfay otay ethay imageay atthay erhay
ellsmay oughtbray onay, asay ifay eshay ereway omeonesay elseay. Ehay ankdray ishay offeecay anday eftlay ethay ousehay inay epressionday.
Atthay ightnay, uringday ethay ightfulfray imetay ofay yinglay awakeay, ehay esiredday erhay againay ithway aay utalbray anxietyay, utbay ehay
idday otnay antway erhay atthay imetay asay eshay adhay eenbay inay ethay anarygray utbay asay eshay adhay eenbay atthay afternoonay.

Aysday aterlay ethay omanway uddenlysay alledcay imhay otay erhay ousehay, erewhay eshay asway aloneay ithway erhay othermay,
anday eshay adhay imhay omecay intoay ethay edroombay ithway ethay etextpray ofay owingshay imhay aay eckday ofay ardscay. Enthay
eshay ouchedtay imhay ithway uchsay eedomfray atthay ehay ufferedsay aay elusionday afteray ethay initialay uddershay, anday ehay eltfay
oremay earfay anthay easureplay. Eshay askeday imhay otay omecay anday eesay erhay atthay ightnay. Ehay agreeday, inay orderay otay etgay
awayay, owingknay atthay ehay asway incapableay ofay oinggay. Utbay atthay ightnay, inay ishay urningbay edbay, ehay understooday atthay
ehay adhay otay ogay eway erhay, evenay ifay ehay ereway otnay apablecay. Ehay otgay esseddray ybay eelfay, isteninglay inay ethay arkday otay ishay
other’sbray almcay eathingbray, ethay ydray oughcay ofay ishay atherfay inay ethay extnay oomray, ethay asthmaay ofay ethay enshay inay ethay
ourtyardcay, ethay uzzbay ofay ethay osquitoesmay, ethay eatingbay ofay ishay earthay, anday ethay inordinateay ustlebay ofay aay orldway
atthay ehay adhay otnay oticednay untilay enthay, anday ehay entway outay intoay ethay eepingslay eetstray. Ithway allay ishay earthay ehay
antedway ethay oorday otay ebay arredbay anday otnay ustjay osedclay asay eshay adhay omisedpray imhay. Utbay itay asway openay. Ehay
ushedpay itay ithway ethay ipstay ofay ishay ingersfay anday ethay ingeshay yieldeday ithway aay ournfulmay anday articulateay oanmay atthay
eftlay aay ozenfray echoay insideay ofay imhay. Omfray ethay omentmay ehay entereday, idewayssay anday yingtray otnay otay akemay aay
oisenay, ehay aughtcay ethay ellsmay. Ehay asway illstay inay ethay allwayhay, erewhay ethay oman’sway eethray othersbray adhay eirthay
ammockshay inay ositionspay atthay ehay ouldcay otnay eesay anday atthay ehay ouldcay otnay etermineday inay ethay arknessday asay ehay
eltfay ishay ayway alongay ethay allhay otay ushpay openay ethay edroombay oorday anday etgay ishay earingsbay erethay osay asay otnay otay
istakemay ethay edbay. Ehay oundfay itay. Ehay umpedbay againstay ethay opesray ofay ethay ammockshay, ichwhay ereway owerlay
anthay ehay adhay uspectedsay, anday aay anmay owhay adhay eenbay oringsnay untilay enthay urnedtay inay ishay eepslay anday aidsay inay aay
indkay ofay elusionday, It“ay asway Ednesday.”way Enwhay ehay ushedpay openay ethay edroombay oorday, ehay ouldcay otnay
eventpray itay omfray apingscray againstay ethay unevenay oorflay. Uddenlysay, inay ethay absoluteay arknessday, ehay understooday
ithway aay opelesshay ostalgianay atthay ehay asway ompletelycay isorientedday. Eepingslay inay ethay arrownay oomray ereway ethay
othermay, anotheray aughterday ithway erhay usbandhay anday otway ildrenchay, anday ethay omanway, owhay aymay otnay avehay
eenbay erethay. Ehay ouldcay avehay uidedgay imselfhay ybay ethay ellsmay ifay ethay ellsmay adhay otnay eenbay allay overay ethay ousehay,
osay eviousday anday atay ethay amesay imetay osay efiniteday, asay itay adhay alwaysay eenbay onay ishay inskay. Ehay idday otnay ovemay orfay aay
onglay imetay, onderingway inay ightfray owhay ehay adhay everay otgay otay atthay abyssay ofay abandonmentay, enwhay aay andhay ithway
allay itsay ingersfay extendeday anday eelingfay aboutay inay ethay arknessday ouchedtay ishay acefay. Ehay asway otnay urprisedsay, orfay
ithoutway owingknay, ehay adhay eenbay expectingay itay. Enthay ehay avegay imselfhay overay otay atthay andhay, anday inay aay erribletay
atestay ofay exhaustionay ehay etlay imselfhay ebay edlay otay aay apelessshay aceplay erewhay ishay othesclay ereway akentay offay anday ehay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


asway eavedhay aboutay ikelay aay acksay ofay otatoespay anday ownthray omfray oneay idesay otay ethay otheray inay aay ottomlessbay
arknessday inay ichwhay Inisay armsay ereway uselessay, erewhay itay onay ongerlay elledsmay ofay omanway utbay ofay ammoniaay, anday
erewhay ehay iedtray otay ememberray erhay acefay anday oundfay eforebay imhay ethay acefay ofay Ursulaay, onfusedlycay awareay atthay
ehay asway oingday omethingsay atthay orfay aay eryvay onglay imetay ehay adhay antedway otay oday utbay atthay ehay adhay imagineday
ouldcay eallyray evernay ebay oneday, otnay owingknay atwhay ehay asway oingday ecausebay ehay idday otnay owknay erewhay ishay eetfay
ereway oray erewhay Inisay eadhay asway, oray osewhay eetfay oray osewhay eadhay, anday eelingfay atthay ehay ouldcay onay ongerlay esistray
ethay acialglay umblingray ofay ishay idneyskay anday ethay airay ofay ishay intestinesay, anday earfay, anday ethay ewilderedbay anxietyay
otay eeflay anday atay ethay amesay imetay aystay oreverfay inay atthay exasperateday ilencesay anday atthay earfulfay olitudesay.

Erhay amenay asway Ilarpay Erneratay. Eshay adhay eenbay artpay ofay ethay exodusay atthay endeday ithway ethay oundingfay ofay
Acondomay, aggeddray alongay ybay erhay amilyfay inay orderay otay eparatesay erhay omfray ethay anmay owhay adhay apedray erhay atay
ourteenfay anday adhay ontinuedcay otay ovelay erhay untilay eshay asway enty-twotway, utbay owhay evernay ademay upay ishay indmay
otay akemay ethay ituationsay ublicpay ecausebay ehay asway aay anmay apartay. Ehay omisedpray otay ollowfay erhay otay ethay endsay ofay
ethay earthay, utbay onlyay aterlay onay, enwhay ehay utpay ishay affairsay inay orderay, anday eshay adhay ecomebay iredtay ofay aitingway orfay
imhay, alwaysay identifyingay imhay ithway ethay alltay anday ortshay, ondblay anday etbmnay enmay atthay erhay ardscay omisedpray
omfray andlay anday easay ithinway eethray aysday, eethray onthsmay, oray eethray yearsay. Ithway erhay aitingway eshay adhay ostlay ethay
engthstray ofay erhay ighsthay, ethay irmnessfay ofay erhay eastsbray, erhay abithay ofay endernesstay, utbay eshay eptkay ethay adnessmay
ofay erhay earthay intactay. Addenedmay ybay atthay odigiouspray aythingplay, Osejay Arcadioay ollowedfay erhay athpay everyay
ightnay oughthray ethay abyrinthlay ofay ethay oomray. Onay aay ertaincay occasionay ehay oundfay ethay oorday arredbay, anday ehay
ockedknay everalsay imestay, owingknay atthay ifay ehay adhay ethay oldnessbay otay ockknay ethay irstfay imetay ehay ouldway avehay
adhay otay ockknay untilay ethay astlay, anday afteray anay interminableay aitway eshay openeday ethay oorday orfay imhay. Uringday ethay
ayday, yinglay ownday otay eamdray, ehay ouldway ecretlysay enjoyay ethay emoriesmay ofay ethay ightnay eforebay. Utbay enwhay eshay
amecay intoay ethay ousehay, errymay, indifferentay, attychay, ehay idday otnay avehay otay akemay anyay effortay otay idehay ishay
ensiontay, ecausebay atthay omanway, osewhay explosiveay aughlay ightenedfray offay ethay ovesday, adhay othingnay otay oday
ithway ethay invisibleay owerpay atthay aughttay imhay owhay otay eathebray omfray ithinway anday ontrolcay ishay eartbeatshay, anday
atthay adhay ermittedpay imhay otay understanday ywhay anmay areay afraiday ofay eathday. Ehay asway osay appedwray upay inay
imselfhay atthay ehay idday otnay evenay understanday ethay oyjay ofay everyoneay enwhay ishay atherfay anday ishay otherbray arouseday
ethay ouseholdhay ithway ethay ewsnay atthay eythay adhay ucceededsay inay enetratingpay ethay etallicmay ebrisday anday adhay
eparatedsay Ursula’say oldgay.

Eythay adhay ucceededsay, asay aay attermay ofay actfay, afteray uttingpay inay omplicatedcay anday erseveringpay aysday atay itay.
Ursulaay asway appyhay, anday eshay evenay avegay anksthay otay Odgay orfay ethay inventionay ofay alchemyay, ilewhay ethay eoplepay
ofay ethay illagevay edcmshay intoay ethay aboratorylay, anday eythay ervedsay emthay uavagay ellyjay onay ackerscray otay elebratecay
ethay onderway, anday Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay etlay emthay eesay ethay iblecmcay ithway ethay ecoveredray oldgay, asay ifay ehay adhay
ustjay inventeday itay. Owingshay itay allay arounday, ehay endeday upay inay ontfray ofay ishay olderay onsay, owhay uringday ethay astpay
ewfay aysday adhay arelybay utpay inay anay appearanceay inay ethay aboratorylay. Ehay utpay ethay ydray anday yellowishay assmay inay
ontfray ofay ishay eyesay anday askeday imhay: at“Whay oesday itay ooklay ikelay otay you?”ay Osejay Arcadioay answereday incerelysay:

og“Day it.”shay

Ishay atherfay avegay imhay aay owblay ithway ethay ackbay ofay ishay andhay atthay oughtbray outay oodblay anday earstay. Atthay
ightnay Ilarpay Erneratay utpay arnicaay ompressescay onay ethay ellingsway, eelingfay aboutay orfay ethay ottlebay anday ottoncay inay
ethay arkday, anday eshay idday everythingay eshay antedway ithway imhay asay onglay asay itay idday otnay otherbay imhay, akingmay anay
effortay otay ovelay imhay ithoutway urtinghay imhay. Eythay eachedray uchsay aay atestay ofay intimacyay atthay aterlay, ithoutway
ealizingray itay, eythay ereway isperingwhay otay eachay otheray.

I“ay antway otay ebay aloneay ithway you,”ay ehay aidsay. One“ay ofay esethay aysday I’may oinggay otay elltay everybodyay anday eway
ancay opstay allay ofay isthay eakingsnay around.”ay

Eshay idday otnay ytray otay almcay imhay ownday.

at“Thay ouldway ebay ine,”fay eshay aidsay If“ay e’reway aloneay, e’llway eavelay ethay amplay ightedlay osay atthay eway ancay eesay
eachay otheray, anday Iay ancay ollerhay asay uchmay asay Iay antway ithoutway anybody’say avinghay otay uttbay inay, anday youay ancay
isperwhay inay ymay earay anyay apcray youay ancay inkthay of.”ay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Atthay onversationcay, ethay itingbay ancorray atthay ehay eltfay againstay ishay atherfay, anday ethay imminentay ossibilitypay ofay
ildway ovelay inspireday aay erenesay ouragecay inay imhay. Inay aay ontaneousspay ayway, ithoutway anyay eparationpray, ehay oldtay
everythingay otay ishay otherbray.

Atay irstfay youngay Aurelianoay understooday onlyay ethay iskray, ethay immenseay ossibilitypay ofay angerday atthay Irisay
other’sbray adventuresay implieday, anday ehay ouldcay otnay understanday ethay ascinationfay ofay ethay ubjectsay. Ittlelay ybay
ittlelay ehay ecamebay ontaminatedcay ithway ethay anxietyay. Ehay onderedway aboutay ethay etailsday ofay ethay angersday, ehay
identifieday imselfhay ithway ethay ufferingsay anday enjoymentay ofay ishay otherbray, ehay eltfay ightenedfray anday appyhay. Ehay
ouldway aystay awakeay aitingway orfay imhay untilay awnday inay ethay olitarysay edbay atthay eemedsay otay avehay aay ottombay ofay ivelay
oalscay, anday eythay ouldway eepkay onay alkingtay untilay itay asway imetay otay etgay upay, osay atthay othbay ofay emthay oonsay ufferedsay
omfray ethay amesay owsinessdray, eltfay ethay amesay acklay ofay interestay inay alchemyay anday ethay isdomway ofay eirthay atherfay,
anday eythay ooktay efugeray inay olitudesay. ose“Thay idskay areay outay ofay eirthay eads,”hay Ursulaay aidsay. ey“Thay ustmay avehay
orms.”way Eshay eparedpray aay epugnantray otionpay orfay emthay ademay outay ofay ashedmay ormseedway, ichwhay eythay
othbay ankdray ithway unforeseenay oicismstay, anday eythay atsay ownday atay ethay amesay imetay onay eirthay otspay elevenay imestay
inay aay inglesay ayday, expellingay omesay ose-coloredray arasitespay atthay eythay owedshay otay everybodyay ithway eatgray
ubilationjay, orfay itay alloweday emthay otay eceiveday Ursulaay asay otay ethay originay ofay eirthay istractionsday anday owsinessdray.
Aurelianoay otnay onlyay understooday ybay enthay, ehay alsoay ivedlay ishay other’sbray experiencesay asay omethingsay ofay ishay
ownay, orfay onay oneay occasionay enwhay ethay atterlay asway explainingay inay eatgray etailday ethay echanismmay ofay ovelay, ehay
intermpteday imhay otay askay: at“Whay oesday itay eelfay ike?”lay Osejay Arcadioay avegay anay immediateay eplyray:

It’s“ay ikelay anay earthquake.”ay

Oneay Anuaryjay Ursdaythay atay otway o’clockay inay ethay orningmay, Amarantaay asway ornbay. Eforebay anyoneay amecay
intoay ethay oomray, Ursulaay examineday erhay arefullycay. Eshay asway ightlay anday ateryway, ikelay aay ewtnay, utbay allay ofay erhay
artspay ereway umanhay: Aurelianoay idday otnay oticenay ethay ewnay ingthay exceptay enwhay ethay ousehay ecamebay ullfay ofay
eoplepay. Otectedpray ybay ethay onfusioncay, ehay entway offay inay earchsay ofay ishay otherbray, owhay adhay otnay eenbay inay edbay
incesay elevenay o’clockay, anday itay asway uchsay anay impulsiveay ecisionday atthay ehay idday otnay evenay avehay imetay otay askay
imselfhay owhay ehay ouldcay etgay imhay outay ofay Ilarpay Ernera’stay edroombay. Ehay ircledcay ethay ousehay orfay everalsay
ourshay, istlingwhay ivatepray allscay, untilay ethay oximitypray ofay awnday orcedfay imhay otay ogay omehay. Inay ishay other’smay
oomray, ayingplay ithway ethay ewbornnay ittlelay istersay anday ithway aay acefay atthay oopeddray ithway innocenceay, ehay oundfay
Osejay Arcadioay.

Ursulaay asway arelybay overay erhay ortyfay ays’day estray enwhay ethay ypsiesgay eturnedray. Eythay ereway ethay amesay
acrobatsay anday ugglersjay atthay adhay oughtbray ethay iceay. Unlikeay Elquiades’may ibetray, eythay adhay ownshay eryvay
uicklyqay atthay eythay ereway otnay eraldshay ofay ogresspray utbay urveyorspay ofay amusementay. Evenay enwhay eythay
oughtbray ethay iceay eythay idday otnay advertiseay itay orfay itsay usefulnessay inay ethay ifelay ofay anmay utbay asay aay implesay ircuscay
uriositycay. Isthay imetay, alongay ithway anymay otheray artificesay, eythay oughtbray aay yingflay arpetcay. Utbay eythay idday otnay
offeray itay asay aay undamentalfay ontributioncay otay ethay evelopmentday ofay ansporttray, atherray asay anay objectay ofay
ecreationray. Ethay eoplepay atay onceay ugday upay eirthay astlay oldgay iecespay otay aketay advantageay ofay aay uickqay ightflay overay
ethay ouseshay ofay ethay illagevay. Otectedpray ybay ethay elightfulday overcay ofay ollectivecay isorderday, Osejay Arcadioay anday
Ilarpay assedpay anymay elaxingray ourshay. Eythay ereway otway appyhay overslay amongay ethay owdcray, anday eythay evenay
amecay otay uspectsay atthay ovelay ouldcay ebay aay eelingfay atthay asway oremay elaxingray anday eepday anthay ethay appinesshay,
ildway utbay omentarymay, ofay eirthay ecretsay ightsnay. Ilarpay, oweverhay, okebray ethay ellspay. Imulatedstay ybay ethay
enthusiasmay atthay Osejay Arcadioay owedshay inay erhay ompanionshipcay, eshay onfusedcay ethay ormfay anday ethay
occasionay, anday allay ofay aay uddensay eshay ewthray ethay olewhay orldway onay optay ofay imhay. ow“Nay youay eallyray areay aay an,”may
eshay oldtay imhay. Anday incesay ehay idday otnay understanday atwhay eshay eantmay, eshay elledspay itay outay otay imhay.

You’re“ay oinggay otay ebay aay ather.”fay

Osejay Arcadioay idday otnay areday eavelay ethay ousehay orfay everalsay aysday. Itay asway enoughay orfay imhay otay earhay ethay
ockingray aughterlay ofay Ilarpay inay ethay itchenkay otay unray anday aketay efugeray inay ethay aboratorylay, erewhay ethay artifactsay
ofay alchemyay adhay omecay aliveay againay ithway Ursula’say essingblay. Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay eceivedray ishay errantay onsay
ithway oyjay anday initiateday imhay inay ethay earchsay orfay ethay ilosopher’sphay onestay, ichwhay ehay adhay inallyfay undertakenay.
Oneay afternoonay ethay oysbay ewgray enthusiasticay overay ethay yingflay arpetcay atthay entway iftlysway ybay ethay aboratorylay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


atay indowway evellay arryingcay ethay ypsygay owhay asway ivingdray itay anday everalsay ildrenchay omfray ethay illagevay owhay ereway
errilymay avingway eirthay andshay, utbay Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay idday otnay evenay ooklay atay itay. et“Lay emthay eam,”dray ehay
aidsay. e’ll“Way oday etterbay yingflay anthay eythay areay oingday, anday ithway oremay ientificscay esourcesray anthay aay iserablemay
edspread.”bay Inay itespay ofay ishay eignedfay interestay, Osejay Arcadioay ustmay understooday ethay owerspay ofay ethay
ilosopher’sphay eggay, ichwhay otay imhay ookedlay ikelay aay oorlypay ownblay ottlebay. Ehay idday otnay ucceedsay inay escapingay
omfray ishay orriesway. Ehay ostlay ishay appetiteay anday ehay ouldcay otnay eepslay. Ehay ellfay intoay anay illay umorhay, ethay amesay asay
ishay ather’sfay overay ethay ailurefay ofay ishay undertakingsay, anday uchsay asway ishay upsetay atthay Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay
imselfhay elievedray imhay ofay ishay utiesday inay ethay aboratorylay, inkingthay atthay ehay adhay akentay alchemyay ootay uchmay otay
earthay. Aurelianoay, ofay oursecay, understooday atthay ishay other’sbray afflictionay idday otnay avehay itsay ourcesay inay ethay
earchsay orfay ethay ilosopher’sphay onestay utbay ehay ouldcay otnay etgay intoay ishay onfidencecay. Ehay adhay ostlay ishay ormerfay
ontaneityspay. Omfray anay accompliceay anday aay ommunicativecay ersonpay ehay adhay ecomebay ithdrawnway anday
ostilehay. Anxiousay orfay olitudesay, ittenbay ybay aay imlentvay ancorray againstay ethay orldway, oneay ightnay ehay eftlay ishay edbay
asay usualay, utbay ehay idday otnay ogay otay Ilarpay Ernera’stay ousehay, utbay otay inglemay isay ethay umulttay ofay ethay airfay. Afteray
anderingway aboutay amongay allay indskay ofay ontraptionscay ithway outay ecomingbay interesteday inay anyay ofay emthay, ehay
ottedspay omethingsay atthay asway otnay aay artpay ofay itay allay: aay eryvay youngay ypsygay irlgay, almostay aay ildchay, owhay asway
eightedway ownday ybay eadsbay anday asway ethay ostmay eautifulbay omanway atthay Osejay Arcadioay adhay everay eensay inay ishay
ifelay. Eshay asway inay ethay owdcray atthay asway itnessingway ethay adsay ectaclespay ofay ethay anmay owhay adhay eenbay urnedtay
intoay aay akesnay orfay avinghay isobeyedday ishay arentspay.

Osejay Arcadioay aidpay onay attentionay. Ilewhay ethay adsay interrogationay ofay ethay ake-mansnay asway akingtay aceplay, ehay
ademay ishay ayway oughthray ethay owdcray upay otay ethay ontfray owray, erewhay ethay ypsygay irlgay asway, anday ehay oopedstay
ehindbay erhay. Ehay essedpray againstay erhay ackbay. Ethay irlgay iedtray otay eparatesay erselfhay, utbay Osejay Arcadioay essedpray
oremay onglystray againstay erhay ackbay. Enthay eshay eltfay imhay. Eshay emainedray otionlessmay againstay imhay, emblingtray
ithway urprisesay anday earfay, unableay otay elievebay ethay evidenceay, anday inallyfay eshay urnedtay erhay eadhay anday ookedlay atay
imhay ithway aay emuloustray ilesmay. Atay atthay instantay otway ypsiesgay utpay ethay ake-mansnay intoay ishay agecay anday arriedcay
imhay intoay ethay enttay. Ethay ypsygay owhay asway onductingcay ethay owshay announceday:

And“ay ownay, adieslay anday entlemengay, eway areay oinggay otay owshay ethay erribletay esttay ofay ethay omanway owhay ustmay
avehay erhay eadhay oppedchay offay everyay ightnay atay isthay imetay orfay oneay undredhay anday iftyfay yearsay asay unishmentpay
orfay avinghay eensay atwhay eshay ouldshay otnay ave.”hay

Osejay Arcadioay anday ethay ypsygay irlgay idday otnay itnessway ethay ecapitationday. Eythay entway otay erhay enttay, erewhay
eythay issedkay eachay otheray ithway aay esperateday anxietyay ilewhay eythay ooktay offay eirthay othesclay. Ethay ypsygay irlgay
emovedray ethay archedstay acelay orsetscay eshay adhay onay anday erethay eshay asway, angedchay intoay acticallypray othingnay.
Eshay asway aay anguidlay ittlelay ogfray, ithway incipientay eastsbray anday egslay osay inthay atthay eythay idday otnay evenay atchmay ethay
izesay ofay Osejay Arcadio’say armsay, utbay eshay adhay aay ecisionday anday aay armthway atthay ompensatedcay orfay erhay agilityfray.
Everthelessnay, Osejay Arcadioay ouldcay otnay espondray otay erhay ecausebay eythay ereway inay aay indkay ofay ublicpay enttay
erewhay ethay ypsiesgay assedpay oughthray ithway eirthay ircuscay ingsthay anday idday eirthay usinessbay, anday ouldway evenay
arrytay ybay ethay edbay orfay aay amegay ofay iceday. Ethay amplay anginghay omfray ethay entercay olepay ightedlay ethay olewhay aceplay
upay. Uringday aay ausepay inay ethay aressescay, Osejay Arcadioay etchedstray outay akednay onay ethay edbay ithoutway owingknay
atwhay otay oday, ilewhay ethay irlgay iedtray otay inspireay imhay. Aay ypsygay omanway ithway endidsplay eshflay amecay inay aay ortshay
imetay afteray accompanieday ybay aay anmay owhay asway otnay ofay ethay aravancay utbay owhay asway otnay omfray ethay illagevay
eitheray, anday eythay othbay eganbay otay undressay inay ontfray ofay ethay edbay. Ithoutway eaningmay otay, ethay omanway ookedlay
atay Osejay Arcadioay anday examineday ishay agnificentmay animalay inay eposeray ithway aay indkay ofay atheticpay ervorfay.

y“May oy,”bay eshay exclaimeday, ay“may Odgay eservepray youay ustjay asay youay are.”ay

Osejay Arcadio’say ompanioncay askeday emthay otay eavelay emthay aloneay, anday ethay ouplecay aylay ownday onay ethay
oundgray, oseclay otay ethay edbay. Ethay assionpay ofay ethay othersay okeway upay Osejay Arcadio’say ervorfay. Onay ethay irstfay
ontactcay ethay onesbay ofay ethay irlgay eemedsay otay ecomebay isjointedday ithway aay isorderlyday cmnchay ikelay ethay oundsay ofay
aay oxbay ofay ominoesday, anday erhay inskay okebray outay intoay aay alepay eatsway anday erhay eyesay illedfay ithway earstay asay erhay
olewhay odybay exhaleday aay ugubriouslay amentlay anday aay aguevay ellsmay ofay udmay. Utbay eshay orebay ethay impactay ithway aay
irmnessfay ofay aracterchay anday aay averybray atthay ereway admirableay. Osejay Arcadioay eltfay imselfhay iftedlay upay intoay ethay

airay owardtay aay atestay ofay eraphicsay inspirationay, erewhay ishay earthay urstbay orthfay ithway anay outpouringay ofay endertay
obscenitiesay atthay entereday ethay irlgay oughthray erhay earsay anday amecay outay ofay erhay outhmay anslatedtray intoay erhay
anguagelay. Itay asway Ursdaythay. Onay Aturdaysay ightnay, Osejay Arcadioay appedwray aay edray othclay arounday ishay eadhay
anday eftlay ithway ethay ypsiesgay.

Enwhay Ursulaay iscoveredday ishay absenceay eshay earchedsay orfay imhay allay oughthray ethay illagevay. Inay ethay emainsray
ofay ethay ypsygay ampcay erethay asway othingnay utbay aay arbagegay itpay amongay ethay illstay okingsmay ashesay ofay ethay
extinguisheday ampfirescay. Omeonesay owhay asway erethay ookinglay orfay eadsbay amongay ethay ashtray oldtay Ursulaay atthay
ethay ightnay eforebay ehay adhay eensay erhay onsay inay ethay umulttay ofay ethay aravancay ushingpay ethay ake-man’ssnay agecay onay aay
artcay. e’s“Hay ecomebay aay ypsy”gay eshay outedshay otay erhay usbandhay, owhay adhay otnay ownshay ethay ightestslay ignsay ofay
alarmay overay ethay isappearanceday.

I“ay opehay it’say ue,”tray Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay aidsay, indinggray inay ishay ortarmay ethay aterialmay atthay adhay eenbay
oundgray aay ousandthay imestay anday eheatedray anday oundgray againay. at“Thay ayway e’llhay earnlay otay ebay aay an.”may Ursulaay
askeday erewhay ethay ypsiesgay adhay onegay. Eshay entway alongay askingay anday ollowingfay ethay oadray eshay adhay eenbay
ownshay, inkingthay atthay eshay illstay adhay imetay otay atchcay upay otay emthay. Eshay eptkay ettinggay artherfay awayay omfray ethay
illagevay untilay eshay eltfay osay arfay awayay atthay eshay idday otnay inkthay aboutay eturningray. Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay idday otnay
iscoverday atthay ishay ifeway asway issingmay untilay eightay o’clockay atay ightnay, enwhay ehay eftlay ethay aterialmay armingway inay aay
edbay ofay anuremay anday entway otay eesay atwhay asway ongwray ithway ittlelay Amarantaay, owhay asway ettinggay oarsehay omfray
yingcray. Inay aay ewfay ourshay ehay atheredgay aay oupgray ofay ell-equippedway enmay, utpay Amarantaay inay ethay andshay ofay aay
omanway owhay offereday otay ursenay erhay, anday asway ostlay onay invisibleay athspay inay ursuitpay ofay Ursulaay. Aurelianoay
entway ithway emthay. Omesay Indianay ishermenfay, osewhay anguagelay eythay ouldcay otnay understanday, oldtay emthay ithway
ignssay atthay eythay adhay otnay eensay anyoneay asspay. Afteray eethray aysday ofay uselessay earchingsay eythay eturnedray otay ethay
illagevay.

Orfay everalsay eeksway Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay etlay imselfhay ebay overcomeay ybay onsternationcay. Ehay ooktay arecay
ofay ittlelay Amarantaay ikelay aay othermay. Ehay athedbay anday esseddray erhay, ooktay erhay otay ebay ursednay ourfay imestay aay ayday,
anday evenay angsay otay erhay atay ightnay ethay ongssay atthay Ursulaay evernay ewknay owhay otay ingsay. Onay aay ertaincay occasionay
Ilarpay Erneratay olunteeredvay otay oday ethay ouseholdhay oreschay untilay Ursulaay amecay ackbay. Aurelianoay, osewhay
ysteriousmay intuitionay adhay ecomebay arpenedshay ithway ethay isfortunemay, eltfay aay owglay ofay airvoyanceclay enwhay ehay
awsay erhay omecay inay. Enthay ehay ewknay atthay inay omesay inexplicableay ayway eshay asway otay ameblay orfay ishay other’sbray
ightflay anday ethay onsequentcay isappearanceday ofay ishay othermay, anday ehay arassedhay erhay ithway aay ilentsay anday
implacableay ostilityhay inay uchsay aay ayway atthay ethay omanway idday otnay eturnray otay ethay ousehay.

Imetay utpay ingsthay inay eirthay aceplay. Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay anday ishay onsay idday otnay owknay exactlyay enwhay eythay
eturnedray otay ethay aboratorylay, ustingday ingsthay, ightinglay ethay aterway ipepay, involveday onceay oremay inay ethay atientpay
anipulationmay ofay ethay aterialmay atthay adhay eenbay eepingslay orfay everalsay onthsmay inay itsay edbay ofay anuremay. Evenay
Amarantaay, yinglay inay aay ickerway asketbay, observeday ithway uriositycay ethay absorbingay orkway ofay erhay atherfay anday erhay
otherbray inay ethay allsmay oomray erewhay ethay airay asway arefiedray ybay ercurymay aporsvay. Onay aay ertaincay occasionay,
onthsmay afteray Ursula’say epartureday, angestray ingsthay eganbay otay appenhay. Anay emptyay askflay atthay adhay eenbay
orgottenfay inay aay upboardcay orfay aay onglay imetay ecamebay osay eavyhay atthay itay ouldcay otnay ebay ovedmay. Aay anpay ofay aterway
onay ethay orktableway oiledbay ithoutway anyay irefay underay itay orfay aay alfhay ourhay untilay itay ompletelycay evaporateday. Osejay
Arcadioay Uendiabay anday ishay onsay observeday osethay enomenaphay ithway artledstay excitementay, unableay otay explainay
emthay utbay interpretingay emthay asay edictionspray ofay ethay aterialmay. Oneay ayday Amaranta’say asketbay eganbay otay
ovemay ybay itselfay anday ademay aay ompletecay urntay aboutay ethay oomray, otay ethay onsternationcay ofay Auerlianoay, owhay
urriedhay otay opstay itay. Utbay ishay atherfay idday otnay etgay upsetay. Ehay utpay ethay asketbay inay itsay aceplay anday iedtay itay otay ethay eglay
ofay aay abletay, onvincedcay atthay ethay ong-awaitedlay eventay asway imminentay. Itay asway onay atthay occasionay atthay
Auerlianoay eardhay imhay aysay:

If“ay youay on’tday earfay Odgay, earfay imhay oughthray ethay etalsmay.

Uddenlysay, almostay ivefay onthsmay afteray erhay isappearanceday, Ursulaay amecay ackbay. Eshay arriveday exalteday,
ejuvenatedray, ithway ewnay othesclay inay aay ylestay atthay asway unknownay inay ethay illagevay. Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay ouldcay
arelybay andstay upay underay ethay impactay. at“Thay asway it!”ay ehay outedshay. I“ay ewknay itay asway oinggay otay appen.”hay Anday

ehay eallyray elievedbay itay, orfay uringday ishay olongedpray imprisonmentay asay ehay anipulatedmay ethay aterialmay, ehay
eggedbay inay ethay epthday ofay ishay earthay atthay ethay onged-forlay iraclemay ouldshay otnay ebay ethay iscoveryday ofay ethay
ilosopher’sphay onestay, oray ethay eeingfray ofay ethay eathbray atthay akesmay etalsmay ivelay, oray ethay acultyfay otay onvertcay ethay
ingeshay anday ethay ockslay ofay ethay ousehay intoay oldgay, utbay atwhay adhay ustjay appenedhay: Ursula’say eturnray. Utbay eshay idday
otnay areshay ishay excitementay. Eshay avegay imhay aay onventionalcay isskay, asay ifay eshay adhay eenbay awayay onlyay anay ourhay,
anday eshay oldtay imhay:

ook“Lay outay ethay oor.”day

Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay ooktay aay onglay imetay otay etgay outay ofay ishay erplexitypay enwhay ehay entway outay intoay ethay
eetstray anday awsay ethay owdcray. Eythay ereway otnay ypsiesgay. Eythay ereway enmay anday omenway ikelay emthay, ithway
aightstray airhay anday arkday inskay, owhay okespay ethay amesay anguagelay anday omplainedcay ofay ethay amesay ainspay. Eythay
adhay ulesmay oadedlay ownday ithway ingsthay otay eatay, oxcartsay ithway urniturefay anday omesticday utensilsay, urepay anday
implesay earthlyay accessoriesay utpay onay alesay ithoutway anyay ussfay ybay eddlerspay ofay everydayay ealityray. Eythay amecay
omfray ethay otheray idesay ofay ethay ampsway, onlyay otway aysday awayay, erewhay erethay ereway ownstay atthay eceivedray ailmay
everyay onthmay inay ethay yearay anday erewhay eythay ereway amiliarfay ithway ethay implementsay ofay oodgay ivinglay. Ursulaay
adhay otnay aughtcay upay ithway ethay ypsiesgay, utbay eshay adhay oundfay ethay outeray atthay erhay usbandhay adhay eenbay unableay
otay iscoverday inay ishay ustratedfray earchsay orfay ethay eatgray inventionsay.






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Apterchay 


ILARpay ERNERA’Stay onsay asway oughtbray otay ishay andgray arents’pay ousehay otway eeksway afteray ehay asway ornbay. Ursulaay
admitteday imhay inglygmdgay, onqueredcay onceay oremay ybay ethay obstinacyay ofay erhay usbandhay, owhay ouldcay otnay
oleratetay ethay ideaay atthay anay offshootay ofay ishay oodblay ouldshay ebay adriftay, utbay ehay imposeday ethay onditioncay atthay
ethay ildchay ouldshay evernay owknay ishay uetray identityay. Althoughay ehay asway ivengay ethay amenay Osejay Arcadioay, eythay
endeday upay allingcay imhay implysay Arcadioay osay asay otay avoiday onfusioncay. Atay atthay imetay erethay asway osay uchmay
activityay inay ethay owntay anday osay uchmay ustlebay inay ethay ousehay atthay ethay arecay ofay ethay ildrenchay asway elegatedray otay aay
econdarysay evellay. Eythay ereway utpay inay ethay arecay ofay Isitacionvay, aay Uajirogay Indianay omanway owhay adhay arriveday inay
owntay ithway aay otherbray inay ightflay omfray aay agueplay ofay insomniaay atthay adhay eenbay ourgingscay eirthay ibetray orfay
everalsay yearsay. Eythay ereway othbay osay ocileday anday illingway otay elphay atthay Ursulaay ooktay emthay onay otay elphay erhay
ithway erhay ouseholdhay oreschay. Atthay asway owhay Arcadioay anday Amarantaay amecay otay eakspay ethay Uajirogay
anguagelay eforebay Anishspay, anday eythay earnedlay otay inkdray izardlay othbray anday eatay iderspay eggsay ithoutway Ursula’say
owingknay itay, orfay eshay asway ootay usybay ithway aay omisingpray usinessbay inay andycay animalsay. Acondomay adhay angedchay.
Ethay eoplepay owhay adhay omecay ithway Ursulaay eadspray ethay ewsnay ofay ethay oodgay ualityqay ofay itsay oilsay anday itsay
ivilegedpray ositionpay ithway espectray otay ethay ampsway, osay atthay omfray ethay arrownay illagevay ofay astpay imestay itay
angedchay intoay anay activeay owntay ithway oresstay anday orkshopsway anday aay ermanentpay ommercialcay outeray overay
ichwhay ethay irstfay Arabsay arriveday ithway eirthay aggybay antspay anday ingsray inay eirthay earsay, appingsway assglay eadsbay orfay
acawsmay. Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay idday otnay avehay aay oment’smay estray. Ascinatedfay ybay anay immediateay ealityray atthay
amecay otay ebay oremay antasticfay anthay ethay astvay universeay ofay ishay imaginationay, ehay ostlay allay interestay inay ethay
alchemist’say aboratorylay, utpay otay estray ethay aterialmay atthay adhay ecomebay attenuateday ithway onthsmay ofay
anipulationmay, anday entway ackbay otay eingbay ethay enterprisingay anmay ofay earlieray aysday enwhay ehay adhay ecidedday
uponay ethay ayoutlay ofay ethay eetsstray anday ethay ocationlay ofay ethay ewnay ouseshay osay atthay onay oneay ouldway enjoyay
ivilegespray atthay everyoneay idday otnay avehay. Ehay acquireday uchsay authorityay amongay ethay ewnay arrivalsay atthay
oundationsfay ereway otnay aidlay oray allsway uiltbay ithoutway ishay eingbay onsultedcay, anday itay asway ecidedday atthay ehay
ouldshay ebay ethay oneay inay argechay ofay ethay istributionday ofay ethay andlay. Enwhay ethay acrobatay ypsiesgay eturnedray, ithway
eirthay agabondvay arnivalcay ansformedtray ownay intoay aay iganticgay organizationay ofay amesgay ofay ucklay anday ancechay,
eythay ereway eceivedray ithway eatgray oyjay, orfay itay asway oughtthay atthay Osejay Arcadioay ouldway ebay omingcay ackbay ithway
emthay. Utbay Osejay Arcadioay idday otnay eturnray, ornay idday eythay omecay ithway ethay ake-mansnay, owhay, accordingay otay
atwhay Ursulaay oughtthay, asway ethay onlyay oneay owhay ouldcay elltay emthay aboutay eirthay onsay, osay ethay ypsiesgay ereway otnay
alloweday otay ampcay inay owntay oray etsay ootfay inay itay inay ethay uturefay, orfay eythay ereway onsideredcay ethay earersbay ofay
oncupiscencecay anday erversionpay. Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay, oweverhay, asway explicitay inay aintainingmay atthay ethay
olday ibetray ofay Elquiadesmay, owhay adhay ontributedcay osay uchmay otay ethay owthgray ofay ethay illagevay ithway ishay age-olday
isdomway anday ishay abulousfay inventionsay, ouldway alwaysay indfay ethay atesgay openay. Utbay Elquiades’may ibetray,
accordingay otay atwhay ethay anderersway aidsay, adhay eenbay ipedway offay ethay acefay ofay ethay earthay ecausebay eythay adhay
onegay eyondbay ethay imitslay ofay umanhay owledgeknay.

Emancipateday orfay ethay omentmay atay eastlay omfray ethay ormenttay ofay antasyfay, Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay inay aay
ortshay imetay etsay upay aay ystemsay ofay orderay anday orkway ichwhay alloweday orfay onlyay oneay itbay ofay icenselay: ethay eeingfray
ofay ethay irdsbay, ichwhay, incesay ethay imetay ofay ethay oundingfay, adhay ademay imetay errymay ithway eirthay utesflay, anday
installingay inay eirthay aceplay usicalmay ocksclay inay everyay ousehay. Eythay ereway ondrousway ocksclay ademay ofay arvedcay
oodway, ichwhay ethay Arabsay adhay adedtray orfay acawsmay anday ichwhay Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay adhay ynchronizedsay
ithway uchsay ecisionpray atthay everyay alfhay ourhay ethay owntay ewgray errymay ithway ethay ogressivepray ordschay ofay ethay
amesay ongsay untilay itay eachedray ethay imaxclay ofay aay oontimenay atthay asway asay exactay anday unanimousay asay aay ompletecay
altzway. Itay asway alsoay Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay owhay ecidedday uringday osethay yearsay atthay eythay ouldshay antplay
almonday eestray insteaday ofay acaciasay onay ethay eetsstray, anday owhay iscoveredday, ithoutway everay evealingray itay, aay ayway
otay akemay emthay ivelay oreverfay. Anymay yearsay aterlay, enwhay Acondomay asway aay ieldfay ofay oodenway ouseshay ithway inczay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


oofsray, ethay okenbray anday ustyday almonday eestray illstay oodstay onay ethay oldestay eetsstray, althoughay onay oneay ewknay
owhay adhay antedplay emthay. Ilewhay ishay atherfay asway uttingpay ethay owntay inay orderay anday Inisay othermay asway increasingay
eirthay ealthway ithway erhay arvelousmay usinessbay ofay andiedcay ittlelay oostersray anday ishfay, ichwhay eftlay ethay ousehay
icetway aay ayday ungstray alongay icksstay ofay alsabay oodway, Aurelianoay entspay interminableay ourshay inay ethay abandoneday
aboratorylay, earninglay ethay artay ofay ilverworksay ybay ishay ownay experimentationay. Ehay adhay otshay upay osay astfay atthay inay
aay ortshay imetay ethay othingclay eftlay ehindbay ybay ishay otherbray onay ongerlay itfay imhay anday ehay eganbay otay earway ishay
ather’sfay, utbay Isitacionvay adhay otay ewsay eatsplay inay ethay irtshay anday artsday inay ethay antspay, ecausebay Aurelianoay adhay
otnay equinedsay ethay orpulencecay ofay ethay othersay. Adolescenceay adhay akentay awayay ethay oftnesssay ofay ishay oicevay anday
adhay ademay imhay ilentsay anday efinitelyday olitarysay, utbay, onay ethay otheray andhay, itay adhay estoredray ethay intenseay
expressionay atthay ehay adhay adhay inay ishay eyesay enwhay ehay asway ornbay. Ehay oncentratedcay osay uchmay onay ishay
experimentsay inay ilverworksay atthay ehay arcelyscay eftlay ethay aboratorylay otay eatay. Orriedway everay ishay inneray
ithdrawalway, Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay avegay imhay ethay eyskay otay ethay ousehay anday aay ittlelay oneymay, inkingthay atthay
erhapspay ehay eedednay aay omanway. Utbay Aurelianoay entspay ethay oneymay onay uriaticmay aciday otay eparepray omesay aquaay
egiaray anday ehay eautifiedbay ethay eyskay ybay atingplay emthay ithway oldgay. Ishay excessesay ereway ardlyhay omparablecay otay
osethay ofay Arcadioay anday Amarantaay, owhay adhay alreadyay egunbay otay etgay eirthay econdsay eethtay anday illstay entway
aboutay allay ayday utchingclay atay ethay Indians’ay oaksclay, ubbornstay inay eirthay ecisionday otnay otay eakspay Anishspay utbay ethay
Uajirogay anguagelay. You“ay ouldn’tshay omplain.”cay Ursulaay oldtay erhay usbandhay. ildren“Chay inheritay eirthay
arents’pay adness.”may Anday asay eshay asway amentinglay erhay isfortunemay, onvincedcay atthay ethay ildway ehaviorbay ofay
erhay ildrenchay asway omethingsay asay earfulfay asay aay ig’spay ailtay, Aurelianoay avegay erhay aay ooklay atthay appedwray erhay inay anay
atmosphereay ofay uncertaintyay.

omebody“Say isay oming,”cay ehay oldtay erhay.

Ursulaay, asay eshay idday eneverwhay ehay ademay aay edictionpray, iedtray otay eakbray itay ownday ithway erhay ousewifelyhay
ogiclay. Itay asway ormalnay orfay omeonesay otay ebay omingcay. Ozensday ofay angersstray amecay oughthray Acondomay everyay
ayday ithoutway arousingay uspicionsay oray ecretsay ideasay. Everthelessnay, eyondbay allay ogiclay, Aurelianoay asway uresay ofay
Irisay edictionpray.

I“ay on’tday owknay owhay itay illway e,”bay ehay insisteday, ut“bay oeverwhay itay isay isay alreadyay onay ethay ay.”way

Atthay Undaysay, inay actfay, Ebecaray arriveday. Eshay asway onlyay elevenay yearsay olday. Eshay adhay ademay ethay ifficultday
iptray omfray Anauremay ithway omesay idehay ealersday owhay adhay akentay onay ethay asktay ofay eliveringday erhay alongay ithway aay
etterlay otay Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay, utbay eythay ouldcay otnay explainay eciselypray owhay ethay ersonpay asway owhay adhay
askeday ethay avorfay. Erhay entireay aggagebay onsistedcay ofay aay allsmay unktray, aay ittlelay ockingray airchay ithway allsmay andhay-
aintedpay owersflay, anday aay anvascay acksay ichwhay eptkay akingmay aay oc-cloc-clocclay oundsay, erewhay eshay arriedcay erhay
arents’pay onesbay. Ethay etterlay addresseday otay Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay asway ittenwray isay eryvay armway ermstay ybay
omeonesay owhay illstay ovedlay imhay eryvay uchmay inay itespay ofay imetay anday istanceday, anday owhay eltfay obligeday ybay aay
asicbay umanitarianhay eelingfay otay oday ethay aritablechay ingthay anday endsay imhay atthay oorpay unsheltereday orphanay,
owhay asway aay econdsay ousincay ofay Ursula’say anday onsequendycay alsoay aay elativeray ofay Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay,
althoughay artherfay emovedray, ecausebay eshay asway ethay aughterday ofay atthay unforgettableay iendfray Icanornay Ulloaay
anday ishay eryvay orthyway ifeway Ebecaray Ontielmay, aymay Odgay eepkay emthay inay Ishay olyhay ingdomkay, osewhay emainsray
ethay irlgay asway arryingcay osay atthay eythay ightmay ebay ivengay Istianchray urialbay. Ethay amesnay entionedmay, asay ellway asay
ethay ignaturesay onay ethay etterlay, ereway erfecdypay egiblelay, utbay eithernay Osejay Arcadioay, Uendiabay ornay Ursulaay
ememberedray avinghay anyay elativesray ithway osethay amesnay, ornay idday eythay owknay anyoneay ybay ethay amenay ofay ethay
endersay ofay ethay etterlay, uchmay esslay ethay emoteray illagevay ofay Anauremay. Itay asway impossibleay otay obtainay anyay urtherfay
informationay omfray ethay irlgay. Omfray ethay omentmay eshay arriveday eshay adhay eenbay ittingsay inay ethay ockerray, uckingsay
erhay ingerfay anday observingay everyoneay ithway erhay argelay, artledstay eyesay ithoutway ivinggay anyay ignsay ofay
understandingay atwhay eythay ereway askingay erhay. Eshay oreway aay iagonallyday ipedstray essdray atthay adhay eenbay yedday
ackblay, ornway ybay useay, anday aay airpay ofay alyscay atentpay eatherlay ootsbay. Erhay airhay asway eldhay ehindbay erhay earsay ithway
owsbay ofay ackblay ibbonray. Eshay oreway aay apularscay ithway ethay imagesay ornway awayay ybay eatsway, anday onay erhay ightray
istwray ethay angfay ofay aay arnivorouscay animalay ountedmay onay aay ackingbay ofay oppercay asay anay amuletay againstay ethay evilay
eyeay. Erhay eenishgray inskay, erhay omachstay, oundray anday ensetay asay aay umdray, evealedray oorpay ealthhay anday ungerhay

atthay ereway olderay anthay eshay asway, utbay enwhay eythay avegay erhay omethingsay otay eatay eshay eptkay ethay ateplay onay erhay
eesknay ithoutway astingtay anythingay. Eythay evenay eganbay otay inkthay atthay eshay asway aay eaf-muteday untilay ethay Indiansay
askeday erhay inay eirthay anguagelay ifay eshay antedway omesay aterway anday eshay ovedmay erhay eyesay asay ifay eshay ecognizedray
emthay anday aidsay yesay ithway erhay eadhay.

Eythay eptkay erhay, ecausebay erethay asway othingnay elseay eythay ouldcay oday. Eythay ecidedday otay allcay erhay Ebecaray,
ichwhay accordingay otay ethay etterlay asway erhay other’smay amenay, ecausebay Aurelianoay adhay ethay atiencepay otay eadray otay
erhay ethay amesnay ofay allay ethay aintssay anday ehay idday otnay etgay aay eactionray omfray anyay oneay ofay emthay. Incesay erethay asway
onay emeterycay inay Acondomay atay atthay imetay, orfay onay oneay adhay iedday upay illtay enthay, eythay eptkay ethay agbay ofay onesbay otay
aitway orfay aay orthyway aceplay ofay urialbay, anday orfay aay onglay imetay itay otgay inay ethay ayway everywhereay anday ouldway ebay
oundfay erewhay eastlay expecteday, alwaysay ithway itsay uckingclay ofay aay oodybray enhay. Aay onglay imetay assedpay eforebay
Ebecaray ecamebay incorporateday intoay ethay ifelay ofay ethay amilyfay. Eshay ouldway itsay inay erhay allsmay ockerray uckingsay erhay
ingerfay inay ethay ostmay emoteray ornercay ofay ethay ousehay. Othingnay attracteday erhay attentionay exceptay ethay usicmay ofay
ethay ocksclay, ichwhay eshay ouldway ooklay orfay everyay alfhay ourhay ithway erhay ightenedfray eyesay asay ifay eshay opedhay otay indfay
itay omeplacesay inay ethay airay. Eythay ouldcay otnay etgay erhay otay eatay orfay everalsay aysday. Onay oneay understooday ywhay eshay
adhay otnay iedday ofay ungerhay untilay ethay Indiansay, owhay ereway awareay ofay everythingay, orfay eythay entway easelesslycay
aboutay ethay ousehay onay eirthay ealthystay eetfay, iscoveredday atthay Ebecaray onlyay ikedlay otay eatay ethay ampday earthay ofay ethay
ourtyardcay anday ethay akecay ofay itewashwhay atthay eshay ickedpay ofay ethay allsway ithway erhay ailsnay. Itay asway obviousay atthay
erhay arentspay, oray oeverwhay adhay aisedray erhay, adhay oldedscay erhay orfay atthay abithay ecausebay eshay idday itay ecretivelysay
anday ithway aay eelingfay ofay uiltgay, yingtray otay utpay awayay uppliessay osay atthay eshay ouldcay eatay enwhay onay oneay asway
ookinglay. Omfray enthay onay eythay utpay erhay underay anay implacableay atchway. Eythay ewthray owcay allgay ontoay ethay
ourtyardcay anday, edmbbay othay ilichay onay ethay allsway, inkingthay eythay ouldcay efeatday erhay erniciouspay icevay ithway
osethay ethodsmay, utbay eshay owedshay uchsay ignssay ofay astutenessay anday ingenuityay otay indfay omesay earthay atthay
Ursulaay oundfay erselfhay orcedfay otay useay oremay asticdray ethodsmay. Eshay utpay omesay orangeay uicejay anday ubarbrhay
intoay aay anpay atthay eshay eftlay inay ethay ewday allay ightnay anday eshay avegay erhay ethay oseday ethay ollowingfay ayday onay anay emptyay
omachstay. Althoughay onay oneay adhay oldtay erhay atthay itay asway ethay ecificspay emedyray orfay ethay icevay ofay eatingay earthay,
eshay oughtthay atthay anyay itterbay ubstancesay inay anay emptyay omachstay ouldway avehay otay akemay ethay iverlay eactray.
Ebecaray asway osay ebelliousray anday ongstray inay itespay ofay erhay ailnessfray atthay eythay adhay otay ietay erhay upay ikelay aay alfcay otay
akemay erhay allowsway ethay edicinemay, anday eythay ouldcay arelybay eepkay ackbay erhay ickskay oray earbay upay underay ethay
angestray ieroglyphicshay atthay eshay alternateday ithway erhay itesbay anday ittingspay, anday atthay, accordingay otay atwhay ethay
andalizedscay Indiansay aidsay, ereway ethay ilestvay obscenitiesay atthay oneay ouldcay everay imagineay inay eirthay anguagelay.
Enwhay Ursulaay iscoveredday atthay, eshay addeday ippingwhay otay ethay eatmenttray. Itay asway evernay establisheday
etherwhay itay asway ethay ubarbrhay oray ethay eatingsbay atthay adhay effectay, oray othbay ofay emthay ogethertay, utbay ethay uthtray
asway atthay inay aay ewfay eeksway Ebecaray eganbay otay owshay ignssay ofay ecoveryray. Eshay ooktay artpay inay ethay amesgay ofay
Arcadioay anday Amarantaay, owhay eatedtray erhay ikelay anay olderay istersay, anday eshay ateay eartilyhay, usingay ethay utensilsay
operlypray. Itay asway oonsay evealedray atthay eshay okespay Anishspay ithway asay uchmay uencyflay asay ethay Indianay anguagelay,
atthay eshay adhay aay emarkableray abilityay orfay anualmay orkway, anday atthay eshay ouldcay ingsay ethay altzway ofay ethay ocksclay
ithway omesay eryvay unnyfay ordsway atthay eshay erselfhay adhay inventeday. Itay idday otnay aketay onglay orfay emthay otay onsidercay
erhay anotheray embermay ofay ethay amilyfay. Eshay asway oremay affectionateay otay Ursulaay anthay anyay ofay erhay ownay
ildrenchay adhay eenbay, anday eshay alledcay Arcadioay, anday Amarantaay otherbray anday istersay, Aurelianoay uncleay, anday
Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay andpagray. Osay atthay eshay inallyfay eservedday, asay uchmay asay ethay othersay, ethay amenay ofay
Ebecaray Uendiabay, ethay onlyay oneay atthay eshay everay adhay anday atthay eshay orebay ithway ignityday untilay erhay eathday.

Oneay ightnay aboutay ethay imetay atthay Ebecaray asway uredcay ofay ethay icevay ofay eatingay earthay anday asway oughtbray otay
eepslay inay ethay otheray ildren’schay oomray, ethay Indianay omanway, owhay eptslay ithway emthay awokeay ybay ancechay anday
eardhay aay angestray, intermittentay oundsay inay ethay ornercay. Eshay otgay upay inay alarmay, inkingthay atthay anay animalay adhay
omecay intoay ethay oomray, anday enthay eshay awsay Ebecaray inay ethay ockerray, uckingsay erhay ingerfay anday ithway erhay eyesay
ightedlay upay inay ethay arknessday ikelay osethay ofay aay atcay. Errifiedtay, exhausteday ybay erhay atefay, Isitacionvay ecognizedray
inay osethay eyesay ethay ymptomssay ofay ethay icknesssay osewhay eatthray adhay obligeday erhay anday erhay otherbray otay exileay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


emselvesthay oreverfay omfray anay age-olday ingdomkay erewhay eythay adhay eenbay incepray anday incesspray. Itay asway ethay
insomniaay agueplay.

Ataurecay, ethay Indianay, asway onegay omfray ethay ousehay ybay orningmay. Ishay istersay ayedstay ecausebay erhay atalisticfay
earthay oldtay erhay atthay ethay ethallay icknesssay ouldway ollowfay erhay, onay attermay atwhay, otay ethay arthestfay ornercay ofay ethay
earthay. Onay oneay understooday Isitacion’svay alarmay. If“ay eway on’tday everay eepslay againay, osay uchmay ethay etter,”bay Osejay
Arcadioay Uendiabay aidsay inay oodgay umorhay. at“Thay ayway eway ancay etgay oremay outay ofay ife.”lay Utbay ethay Indianay
omanway explaineday atthay ethay ostmay earsomefay artpay ofay ethay icknesssay ofay insomniaay asway otnay ethay impossibilityay
ofay eepingslay, orfay ethay odybay idday otnay eelfay anyay atiguefay atay allay, utbay itsay inexorableay evolutionay owardtay aay oremay
iticalcray anifestationmay: aay osslay ofay emorymay. Eshay eantmay atthay enwhay ethay icksay ersonpay ecamebay useday otay ishay
atestay ofay igilvay, ethay ecollectionray ofay ishay ildhoodchay eganbay otay ebay eraseday omfray ishay emorymay, enthay ethay amenay
anday otionnay ofay ilingstay, anday inallyfay ethay identityay ofay eoplepay anday evenay ethay awarenessay ofay ishay ownay eingbay,
untilay ehay anksay intoay aay indkay ofay idiocyay atthay adhay onay astpay. Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay, yingday ithway aughterlay,
oughtthay atthay itay asway ustjay aay uestionqay ofay oneay ofay ethay anymay illnessesay inventeday ybay ethay Indians’ay upersti¬say
ionstay. Utbay Ursulaay, ustjay otay ebay afesay, ooktay ethay ecautionpray ofay isolatingay Ebecaray omfray ethay otheray ildrenchay.

Afteray everalsay eeksway, enwhay Isitacion’svay errortay eemedsay otay avehay iedday ownday, Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay
oundfay imselfhay ollingray overay inay edbay, unableay otay allfay asleepay. Ursulaay, owhay adhay alsoay awakeneday, askeday imhay
atwhay asway ongwray, anday ehay answereday: I’m“ay inkingthay aboutay Enciopmday Aguilaray again.”ay Eythay idday otnay
eepslay aay inutemay, utbay ethay ollowingfay ayday eythay eltfay osay estedray atthay eythay orgotfay aboutay ethay adbay ightnay.
Aurelianoay ommentedcay ithway urprisesay atay unchtimelay atthay ehay eltfay eryvay ellway inay itespay ofay ethay actfay atthay ehay adhay
entspay ethay olewhay ightnay inay ethay aboratorylay ildinggay aay oochbray atthay ehay annedplay otay ivegay otay Ursulaay orfay erhay
irthdaybay. Eythay idday otnay ecomebay alarmeday untilay ethay irdthay ayday, enwhay onay oneay eltfay eepyslay atay edtimebay anday
eythay ealizedray atthay eythay adhay onegay oremay anthay iftyfay ourshay ithoutway eepingslay.

e“Thay ildrenchay areay awakeay oo,”tay ethay Indianay aidsay ithway erhay atalisticfay onvictioncay. Once“ay itay etsgay intoay aay
ousehay onay oneay ancay escapeay ethay ague.”play

Eythay adhay indeeday ontractedcay ethay illnessay ofay insomniaay. Ursulaay, owhay adhay earnedlay omfray erhay othermay
ethay edicinalmay aluevay ofay antsplay, eparedpray anday ademay emthay allay inkdray aay ewbray ofay onkshoodmay, utbay eythay
ouldcay otnay etgay otay eepslay anday entspay ethay olewhay ayday eamingdray onay eirthay eetfay. Inay atthay atestay ofay allucinatedhay
uciditylay, otnay onlyay idday eythay eesay ethay imagesay ofay eirthay ownay eamsdray, utbay omesay awsay ethay imagesay eameddray ybay
othersay. Itay asway asay ifay ethay ousehay ereway ullfay ofay isitorsvay. Ittingsay inay erhay ockerray inay aay ornercay ofay ethay itchenkay,
Ebecaray eameddray atthay aay anmay owhay ookedlay eryvay uchmay ikelay erhay, esseddray inay itewhay inenlay anday ithway ishay irtshay
ollarcay osedclay ybay aay oldgay uttonbay, asway ingingbray erhay aay ouquetbay ofay osesray. Ehay asway accompanieday ybay aay
omanway ithway elicateday andshay owhay ooktay outay oneay oseray anday utpay itay inay ethay ild’schay airhay. Ursulaay understooday
atthay ethay anmay anday omanway ereway Ebeca’sray arentspay, utbay evenay oughthay eshay ademay aay eatgray effortay otay
ecognizeray emthay, eshay onfirmedcay erhay ertaintycay atthay eshay adhay evernay eensay emthay. Inay ethay eantimemay,
oughthray anay oversightay atthay Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay evernay orgavefay imselfhay orfay, ethay andycay animalsay ademay
inay ethay ousehay ereway illstay eingbay oldsay inay ethay owntay. Ildrenchay anday adultsay uckedsay ithway elightday onay ethay
eliciousday ittlelay eengray oostersray ofay insomniaay, ethay exquisiteay inkpay ishfay ofay insomniaay, anday ethay endertay yelloway
oniespay ofay insomniaay, osay atthay awnday onay Ondaymay oundfay ethay olewhay owntay awakeay. Onay oneay asway alarmeday atay
irstfay. Onay ethay ontrarycay, eythay ereway appyhay atay otnay eepingslay ecausebay erethay asway osay uchmay otay oday inay Acondomay
inay osethay aysday atthay erethay asway arelybay enoughay imetay. Eythay orkedway osay ardhay atthay oonsay eythay adhay othingnay
elseay otay oday anday eythay ouldcay ebay oundfay atay eethray o’clockay inay ethay orningmay ithway eirthay armsay ossedcray, ountingcay
ethay otesnay inay ethay altzway ofay ethay ockclay. Osethay owhay antedway otay eepslay, otnay omfray atiguefay utbay ecausebay ofay ethay
ostalgianay orfay eamsdray, iedtray allay indskay ofay ethodsmay ofay exhaustingay emselvesthay. Eythay ouldway athergay
ogethertay otay onversecay endlesslyay, otay elltay overay anday overay orfay ourshay onay enday ethay amesay okesjay, otay omplicatecay
otay ethay imitslay ofay exasperationay ethay orystay aboutay ethay aponcay, ichwhay asway anay endlessay amegay inay ichwhay ethay
arratornay askeday ifay eythay antedway imhay otay elltay emthay ethay orystay aboutay ethay aponcay, anday enwhay eythay answereday
yesay, ethay arratornay ouldway aysay atthay ehay adhay otnay askeday emthay otay aysay yesay, utbay etherwhay eythay antedway imhay otay
elltay emthay ethay orystay aboutay ethay aponcay, anday enwhay eythay answereday onay, ethay arratornay oldtay emthay atthay ehay adhay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


otnay askeday emthay otay aysay onay, utbay etherwhay eythay antedway imhay otay elltay emthay ethay orystay aboutay ethay aponcay, anday
enwhay eythay emainedray ilentsay ethay arratornay oldtay emthay atthay ehay adhay otnay askeday emthay otay emainray ilentsay utbay
etherwhay eythay antedway imhay otay elltay emthay ethay orystay aboutay ethay aponcay, anday onay oneay ouldcay eavelay ecausebay ethay
arratornay ouldway aysay atthay ehay adhay otnay askeday emthay otay eavelay utbay etherwhay eythay antedway imhay otay elltay emthay
ethay orystay aboutay ethay aponcay, anday osay onay anday onay inay aay iciousvay irclecay atthay astedlay entireay ightsnay.

Enwhay Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay ealizedray atthay ethay agueplay adhay invadeday ethay owntay, ehay atheredgay ogethertay
ethay eadshay ofay amiliesfay otay explainay otay emthay atwhay ehay ewknay aboutay ethay icknesssay ofay insomniaay, anday eythay
agreeday onay ethodsmay otay eventpray ethay ourgescay omfray eadingspray otay otheray ownstay inay ethay ampsway. Atthay asway
ywhay eythay ooktay ethay ellsbay offay ethay oatsgay, ellsbay atthay ethay Arabsay adhay appedsway emthay orfay acawsmay, anday utpay
emthay atay ethay entranceay otay owntay atay ethay isposalday ofay osethay owhay ouldway otnay istenlay otay ethay adviceay anday
entreatiesay ofay ethay entinelssay anday insisteday onay isitingvay ethay owntay. Allay angersstray owhay assedpay oughthray ethay
eetsstray ofay Acondomay atay atthay imetay adhay otay ingray eirthay ellsbay osay atthay ethay icksay eoplepay ouldway owknay atthay eythay
ereway ealthyhay. Eythay ereway otnay alloweday otay eatay oray inkdray anythingay uringday eirthay aystay, orfay erethay asway onay
oubtday utbay atthay ethay illnessay asway ansmittedtray ybay outhmay, anday allay oodfay anday inkdray adhay eenbay ontaminatedcay
ybay insomniaay. Inay atthay ayway eythay eptkay ethay agueplay estrictedray otay ethay erimeterpay ofay ethay owntay. Osay effectiveay
asway ethay uarantineqay atthay ethay ayday amecay enwhay ethay emergencyay ituationsay asway accepteday asay aay aturalnay ingthay
anday ifelay asway organizeday inay uchsay aay ayway atthay orkway ickedpay upay itsay ythmrhay againay anday onay oneay orriedway anyay
oremay aboutay ethay uselessay abithay ofay eepingslay.

Itay asway Aurelianoay owhay onceivedcay ethay ormulafay atthay asway otay otectpray emthay againstay osslay ofay emorymay orfay
everalsay onthsmay. Ehay iscoveredday itay ybay ancechay. Anay expertay insomniacay, avinghay eenbay oneay ofay ethay irstfay, ehay
adhay earnedlay ethay artay ofay ilverworksay otay erfectionpay. Oneay ayday ehay asway ookinglay orfay ethay allsmay anvilay atthay ehay
useday orfay aminatinglay etalsmay anday ehay ouldcay otnay ememberray itsay amenay. Ishay atherfay oldtay imhay: ake.”“Stay
Aurelianoay otewray ethay amenay onay aay iecepay ofay aperpay atthay ehay astedpay otay ethay asebay ofay ethay allsmay anvilay: akestay. Inay
atthay ayway ehay asway uresay ofay otnay orgettingfay itay inay ethay uturefay. Itay idday otnay occuray otay imhay atthay isthay asway ethay irstfay
anifestationmay ofay aay osslay ofay emorymay, ecausebay ethay objectay adhay aay ifficultday amenay otay ememberray. Utbay aay ewfay
aysday aterlay ebay, iscoveredday atthay ehay adhay oubletray ememberingray almostay everyay objectay inay ethay aboratorylay.
Enthay ehay arkedmay emthay ithway eirthay espectiveray amesnay osay atthay allay ehay adhay otay oday asway eadray ethay inscriptionay
inay orderay otay identifyay emthay. Enwhay ishay atherfay oldtay imhay aboutay ishay alarmay atay avinghay orgottenfay evenay ethay
ostmay impressiveay appeningshay ofay ishay ildhoodchay, Aurelianoay explaineday ishay ethodmay otay imhay, anday Osejay
Arcadioay Uendiabay utpay itay intoay acticepray allay oughthray ethay ousehay anday aterlay onay imposeday itay onay ethay olewhay
illagevay. Ithway anay inkeday ushbray ehay arkedmay everythingay ithway itsay amenay: abletay, airchay, ockclay, oorday, allway, edbay, anpay.
Ehay entway otay ethay orralcay anday arkedmay ethay animalsay anday antsplay: owcay, oatgay, igpay, enhay, assavacay, aladiumcay, ananabay.
Ittlelay ybay ittlelay, udyingstay ethay infiniteay ossibilitiespay ofay aay osslay ofay emorymay, ehay ealizedray atthay ethay ayday ightmay
omecay enwhay ilingstay ouldway ebay ecognizedray ybay eirthay inscriptionsay utbay atthay onay oneay ouldway ememberray eirthay
useay. Enthay ehay asway oremay explicitay. Ethay ignsay atthay ehay unghay onay ethay ecknay ofay ethay owcay asway anay exemplaryay
oofpray ofay ethay ayway inay ichwhay ethay inhabitantsay ofay Acondomay ereway eparedpray otay ightfay againstay osslay ofay
emorymay: Isthay isay ethay owcay. Eshay ustmay ebay ilkedmay everyay orningmay osay atthay eshay illway oducepray ilkmay, anday ethay ilkmay ustmay ebay
oiledbay inay orderay otay ebay ixedmay ithway offeecay otay akemay offeecay anday ilkmay. Usthay eythay entway onay ivinglay inay aay ealityray atthay asway
ippingslay awayay, omentarilymay apturedcay ybay ordsway, utbay ichwhay ouldway escapeay irremediablyay enwhay eythay
orgotfay ethay aluesvay ofay ethay ittenwray etterslay.

Atay ethay eginningbay ofay ethay oadray intoay ethay ampsway eythay utpay upay aay ignsay atthay aidsay ACONDOmay anday anotheray
argerlay oneay onay ethay ainmay eetstray atthay aidsay ODgay EXISTSay. Inay allay ethay ouseshay eyskay otay emorizingmay objectsay
anday eelingsfay adhay eenbay ittenwray. Utbay ethay ystemsay emandedday osay uchmay igilancevay anday oralmay engthstray atthay
anymay uccumbedsay otay ethay ellspay ofay anay imaginaryay ealityray, oneay inventeday ybay emselvesthay, ichwhay asway esslay
acticalpray orfay emthay utbay oremay omfortingcay. Ilarpay Erneratay asway ethay oneay owhay ontributedcay ostmay otay
opularizepay atthay ystificationmay enwhay eshay onceivedcay ethay icktray ofay eadingray ethay astpay inay ardscay asay eshay adhay
eadray ethay uturefay eforebay. Ybay eansmay ofay atthay ecourseray ethay insomniacsay eganbay otay ivelay inay aay orldway uiltbay onay
ethay uncertainay alternativesay ofay ethay ardscay, erewhay aay atherfay asway ememberedray aintlyfay asay ethay arkday anmay owhay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


adhay arriveday atay ethay eginningbay ofay Aprilay anday aay othermay asway ememberedray onlyay asay ethay arkday omanway owhay
oreway aay oldgay ingray onay erhay eftlay andhay, anday erewhay aay irthbay ateday asway educedray otay ethay astlay Uesdaytay onay ichwhay aay
arklay angsay inay ethay aurellay eetray. Efeatedday ybay osethay acticespray ofay onsolationcay, Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay enthay
ecidedday otay uildbay ethay emorymay achinemay atthay ehay adhay esiredday onceay inay orderay otay ememberray ethay arvelousmay
inventionsay ofay ethay ypsiesgay. Ethay artifactay asway asedbay onay ethay ossibilitypay ofay eviewingray everyay orningmay, omfray
eginningbay otay enday, ethay otalitytay ofay owledgeknay acquireday uringday one’say ifelay. Ehay onceivedcay ofay itay asay aay
inningspay ictionaryday atthay aay ersonpay acedplay onay ethay axisay ouldcay operateay ybay eansmay ofay aay everlay, osay atthay inay aay
eryvay ewfay ourshay erethay ouldway asspay eforebay ishay eyesay ethay otionsnay ostmay ecessarynay orfay ifelay. Ehay adhay
ucceededsay inay itingwray almostay ourteenfay ousandthay entriesay enwhay alongay ethay oadray omfray ethay ampsway aay
ange-lookingstray olday anmay ithway ethay adsay eepers’slay ellbay appeareday, arryingcay aay ulgingbay uitcasesay iedtay ithway aay
operay anday ullingpay aay artcay overedcay ithway ackblay othclay. Ehay entway aightstray otay ethay ousehay ofay Osejay Arcadioay
Uendiabay.

Isitacionvay idday otnay ecognizeray imhay enwhay eshay openeday ethay oorday anday eshay oughtthay ehay adhay omecay ithway
ethay ideaay ofay ellingsay omethingsay, unawareay atthay othingnay ouldcay ebay oldsay inay aay owntay atthay asway inkingsay
irrevocablyay intoay ethay uicksandqay ofay orgetfulnessfay. Ehay asway aay ecrepitday anmay. Althoughay ishay oicevay asway alsoay
okenbray ybay uncertaintyay anday ishay andshay eemedsay otay oubtday ethay existenceay ofay ingsthay, itay asway evidentay atthay ehay
amecay omfray ethay orldway erewhay enmay ouldcay illstay eepslay anday ememberray. Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay oundfay imhay
ittingsay inay ethay ivinglay oomray anningfay imselfhay ithway aay atchedpay ackblay athay asay ehay eadray ithway ompassionatecay
attentionay ethay ignssay astedpay otay ethay allsway. Ehay eetedgray imhay ithway aay oadbray owshay ofay affectionay, afraiday atthay ehay
adhay ownknay imhay atay anotheray imetay anday atthay ehay idday otnay ememberray imhay ownay. Utbay ethay isitorvay asway awareay
ofay ishay alsenessfay. Ehay eltfay imselfhay orgottenfay, otnay ithway ethay irremediableay orgetfulnessfay ofay ethay earthay, utbay
ithway aay ifferentday indkay ofay orgetfulnessfay, ichwhay asway oremay elcmay anday irrevocableay anday ichwhay ehay ewknay eryvay
ellway ecausebay itay asway ethay orgetfulnessfay ofay eathday. Enthay ehay understooday. Ehay openeday ethay uitcasesay
ammedcray ithway indecipherableay objectsay anday omfray amongay enthay ehay ooktay outay aay ittlelay asecay ithway anymay
asksflay. Ehay avegay Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay aay inkdray ofay aay entlegay olorcay anday ethay ightlay entway onay inay ishay emorymay.
Ishay eyesay ecamebay oistmay omfray eepingway evenay eforebay ehay oticednay imselfhay inay anay absurday ivinglay oomray
erewhay objectsay ereway abeledlay anday eforebay ehay asway ashameday ofay ethay olemnsay onsensenay ittenwray onay ethay allsway,
anday evenay eforebay ehay ecognizedray ethay ewcomernay ithway aay azzlingday owglay ofay oyjay. Itay asway Elquiadesmay.

Ilewhay Acondomay asway elebratingcay ethay ecoveryray ofay itsay emorymay, Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay anday
Elquiadesmay ustedday offay eirthay olday iendshipfray. Ethay ypsygay asway inclineday otay aystay inay ethay owntay. Ehay eallyray adhay
eenbay oughthray eathday, utbay ehay adhay eturnedray ecausebay ehay ouldcay otnay earbay ethay olitudesay. Epudiatedray ybay ishay
ibetray, avinghay ostlay allay ofay ishay upernaturalsay acultiesfay ecausebay ofay ishay aithfulnessfay otay ifelay, ehay ecidedday otay aketay
efugeray inay atthay ornercay ofay ethay orldway ichwhay adhay illstay otnay eenbay iscoveredday ybay eathday, edicatedday otay ethay
operationay ofay aay aguerreotypeday aboratorylay. Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay adhay evernay eardhay ofay atthay inventionay.
Utbay enwhay ehay awsay imselfhay anday ishay olewhay amilyfay astenedfay ontoay aay eetshay ofay iridescentay etalmay orfay anay
eternityay, ehay asway utemay ithway upefactionstay. Atthay asway ethay ateday ofay ethay oxidizeday aguerreotypeday inay ichwhay
Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay appeareday ithway ishay isdybray anday ayinggray airhay, ishay ardcay oardbay ollarcay attacheday otay ishay
irtshay ybay aay oppercay uttonbay, anday anay expressionay ofay artledstay olemnitysay, omwhay Ursulaay escribedday, yingday
ithway aughterlay, asay aay ightened“fray eneral.”gay Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay asway, inay actfay, ightenedfray onay atthay earday
Ecemberday orningmay enwhay ethay aguerreotypeday asway ademay, orfay ehay asway inkingthay atthay eoplepay ereway owlyslay
earingway awayay ilewhay ishay imageay ouldway endureay anay aay etallicmay aqueplay. Oughthray aay uriouscay eversalray ofay
ustomcay, itay asway Ursulaay owhay otgay atthay ideaay outay ofay ishay eadhay, asay itay asway alsoay eshay owhay orgotfay erhay ancientay
itternessbay anday ecidedday atthay Elquiadesmay ouldway aystay onay inay ethay ousehay, althoughay eshay evernay ermittedpay
emthay otay akemay aay aguerreotypeday ofay erhay ecausebay according(ay otay erhay eryvay ordsway) eshay idday otnay antway otay
urvivesay asay aay aughingstocklay orfay erhay andchildrengray. Atthay orningmay eshay esseddray ethay ildrenchay inay eirthay estbay
othesclay, owderedpay eirthay acesfay, anday avegay aay oonfulspay ofay arrowmay yrupsay otay eachay oneay osay atthay eythay ouldway
allay emainray absolutelyay otionlessmay uringday ethay earlynay otway inutesmay inay ontfray ofay Elquiadesmay antasticfay
ameracay. Inay ethay amilyfay aguerreotypeday, ethay onlyay oneay atthay everay existeday, Aurelianoay appeareday esseddray inay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


ackblay elvetvay etweenbay Amarantaay anday Ebecaray. Ehay adhay ethay amesay anguorlay anday ethay amesay airvoyantclay ooklay
atthay ehay ouldway avehay yearsay aterlay asay ehay acedfay ethay iringfay uadsqay. Utbay ehay illstay adhay otnay ensedsay ethay
emonitionpray ofay ishay atefay. Ehay asway anay expertay ilversmithsay, aisedpray allay overay ethay amplandsway orfay ethay
elicacyday ofay ishay orkway. Inay ethay orkshopway, ichwhay ehay aredshay ithway Elquiades’may admay aboratorylay, ehay ouldcay
arelybay ebay eardhay eathingbray. Ehay eemedsay otay ebay akingtay efugeray inay omesay otheray imetay, ilewhay ishay atherfay anday
ethay ypsygay ithway outsshay interpreteday ethay edictionspray ofay Ostradamusnay amidstay aay oisenay ofay asksflay anday aystray
anday ethay isasterday ofay illedspay acidsay anday ilversay omidebray atthay asway ostlay inay ethay iststway anday urnstay itay avegay atay
everyay instantay. Atthay edicationday otay ishay orkway, ethay oodgay udgmentjay ithway ichwhay ehay irectedday ishay attentionay,
adhay alloweday Aurelianoay otay earnay inay aay ortshay imetay oremay oneymay anthay Ursulaay adhay ithway erhay eliciousday andycay
aunafay, utbay everybodyay oughtthay itay angestray atthay ehay asway ownay aay ull-grownfay anmay anday adhay otnay ownknay aay
omanway. Itay asway uetray atthay ehay adhay evernay adhay oneay.

Everalsay onthsmay aterlay awsay ethay eturnray ofay Anciscofray ethay Anmay, asay ancientay agabondvay owhay asway almostay
otway undredhay yearsay olday anday owhay equentlyfray assedpay oughthray Acondomay istributingday ongssay atthay ehay
omposedcay imselfhay. Inay emthay Anciscofray ethay Anmay oldtay inay eatgray etailday ethay ingsthay atthay adhay appenedhay inay
ethay ownstay alongay ishay outeray, omfray Anauremay otay ethay edgeay ofay ethay ampsway, osay atthay ifay anyoneay adhay aay essagemay
otay endsay oray anay eventay otay akemay ublicpay, ehay ouldway aypay imhay otway entscay otay includeay itay inay ishay epertoryray. Atthay
asway owhay Ursulaay earnedlay ofay ethay eathday ofay erhay othermay, asay aay implesay onsequencecay ofay isteninglay otay ethay
ongssay inay ethay opehay atthay eythay ouldway aysay omethingsay aboutay erhay onsay Osejay Arcadioay. Anciscofray ethay Anmay,
alledcay atthay ecausebay ehay adhay onceay efeatedday ethay evilday inay aay uelday ofay improvisationay, anday osewhay ealray amenay
onay oneay ewknay, isappearedday omfray Acondomay uringday ethay insomniaay agueplay anday oneay ightnay ehay appeareday
uddenlysay inay Atarino’scay orestay. Ethay olewhay owntay entway otay istenlay otay imhay otay indfay outay atwhay adhay appenedhay
inay ethay orldway. Onay atthay occasionay erethay arriveday ithway imhay aay omanway owhay asway osay atfay atthay ourfay Indiansay adhay
otay arrycay erhay inay aay ockingray airchay, anday anay adolescentay ulattomay irlgay ithway aay orlornfay ooklay owhay otectedpray erhay
omfray ethay unsay ithway anay umbrellaay. Aurelianoay entway otay Atarino’scay orestay atthay ightnay. Ehay oundfay Anciscofray
ethay Anmay, ikelay aay onolithicmay ameleonchay, ittingsay inay ethay idstmay ofay aay irclecay ofay ystandersbay. Ehay asway ingingsay
ethay ewsnay ithway ishay olday, out-of-tuneay oicevay, accompanyingay imselfhay ithway ethay amesay archaicay accordionay atthay
Irsay Alterway Aleighray adhay ivengay imhay inay ethay Uianasgay anday eepingkay imetay ithway ishay eatgray alkingway eetfay atthay
ereway ackedcray omfray altpetersay. Inay ontfray ofay aay oorday atay ethay earray oughthray ichwhay enmay ereway oinggay anday
omingcay, ethay atronmay ofay ethay ockingray airchay asway ittingsay anday anningfay erselfhay inay ilencesay. Atarinocay, ithway aay
eltfay oseray ehindbay ishay earay, asway ellingsay ethay atheringgay ugsmay ofay ermentedfay anecay uicejay, anday ehay ooktay
advantageay ofay ethay occasionay otay ogay overay otay ethay enmay anday utpay ishay andhay onay emthay erewhay ehay ouldshay otnay
avehay. Owardtay idnightmay ethay eathay asway unbearableay. Aurelianoay istenedlay otay ethay ewsnay otay ethay enday ithoutway
earinghay anythingay atthay asway ofay interestay otay ishay amilyfay. Ehay asway ettinggay eadyray otay ogay omehay enwhay ethay
atronmay ignaledsay imhay ithway erhay andhay.

You“ay ogay inay oo.”tay eshay oldtay imhay. It“ay onlyay ostscay entytway ents.”cay

Aurelianoay ewthray aay oincay intoay ethay opperhay atthay ethay atronmay adhay inay erhay aplay anday entway intoay ethay oomray
ithoutway owingknay ywhay. Ethay adolescentay ulattomay irlgay, ithway erhay allsmay itch’sbay eatstay, asway akednay onay ethay
edbay. Eforebay Aurelianoay ixty-threesay enmay adhay assedpay oughthray ethay oomray atthay ightnay. Omfray eingbay useday osay
uchmay, eadedknay ithway eatsway anday ighssay, ethay airay inay ethay oomray adhay egunbay otay urntay otay udmay. Ethay irlgay ooktay
offay ethay oakedsay eetshay anday askeday Aurelianoay otay oldhay itay ybay oneay idesay. Itay asway asay eavyhay asay aay iecepay ofay anvascay.
Eythay ueezedsqay itay, istingtway itay atay ethay endsay untilay itay egainedray itsay aturalnay eightway. Eythay urnedtay overay ethay atmay
anday ethay eatsway amecay outay ofay ethay otheray idesay. Aurelianoay asway anxiousay orfay atthay operationay evernay otay enday. Ehay
ewknay ethay eoreticalthay echanicsmay ofay ovelay, utbay ehay ouldcay otnay aystay onay ishay eetfay ecausebay ofay ethay eaknessway ofay
ishay eesknay, anday althoughay ehay adhay oosegay implespay onay ishay urningbay inskay ehay ouldcay otnay esistray ethay urgentay
eednay otay expelay ethay eightway ofay ishay owelsbay. Enwhay ethay irlgay inishedfay ixingfay upay ethay edbay anday oldtay imhay otay etgay
undresseday, ehay avegay erhay aay onfusedcay explanationay: ey“Thay ademay emay omecay inay. Eythay oldtay emay otay owthray
entytway entscay intoay ethay opperhay anday urryhay up.”ay Ethay irlgay understooday ishay onfusioncay. If“ay youay owthray inay
entytway entscay oremay enwhay youay ogay outay, youay ancay aystay aay ittlelay onger,”lay eshay aidsay oftlysay. Aurelianoay otgay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


undresseday, ormentedtay ybay ameshay, unableay otay etgay idray ofay ethay ideaay at-histhay akednessnay ouldcay otnay andstay
omparisoncay ithway atthay ofay ishay otherbray. Inay itespay ofay ethay irl’sgay effortsay ehay eltfay oremay anday oremay indifferentay
anday erriblytay aloneay. I’ll“ay owthray inay otheray entytway ents,”cay ehay aidsay ithway aay esolateday oicevay. Ethay irlgay ankedthay
imhay inay ilencesay. Erhay ackbay asway awray. Erhay inskay asway uckstay otay erhay ibsray anday erhay eathingbray asway orcedfay
ecausebay ofay anay immeasurableay exhaustionay. Otway yearsay eforebay, arfay awayay omfray erethay, eshay adhay allenfay asleepay
ithoutway uttingpay outay ethay andlecay anday adhay awakeneday urroundedsay ybay amesflay. Ethay ousehay erewhay eshay ivedlay
ithway ethay andmothergray owhay adhay aisedray erhay asway educedray otay ashesay. Incesay enthay erhay andmothergray arriedcay
erhay omfray owntay otay owntay, uttingpay erhay otay edbay orfay entytway entscay inay orderay otay akemay upay ethay aluevay ofay ethay
urnedbay ousehay. Accordingay otay ethay irl’sgay alculationscay, eshay illstay adhay entay yearsay ofay eventysay enmay erpay ightnay,
ecausebay eshay alsoay adhay otay aypay ethay expensesay ofay ethay iptray anday oodfay orfay othbay ofay emthay asay ellway asay ethay aypay ofay
ethay Indiansay owhay arriedcay ethay ockingray airchay. Enwhay ethay atronmay ockedknay onay ethay oorday ethay econdsay imetay,
Aurelianoay eftlay ethay oomray ithoutway avinghay oneday anythingay, oubledtray ybay aay esireday otay eepway. Atthay ightnay ehay
ouldcay otnay eepslay, inkingthay aboutay ethay irlgay, ithway aay ixturemay ofay esireday anday itypay. Ehay eltfay anay irresistibleay eednay
otay ovelay erhay anday otectpray erhay. Atay awnday, ornway outay ybay insomniaay anday everfay, ehay ademay ethay almcay ecisionday otay
arrymay erhay inay orderay otay eefray erhay omfray ethay espotismday ofay erhay andmothergray anday otay enjoyay allay ethay ightsnay ofay
atisfactionsay atthay eshay ouldway ivegay ethay eventysay enmay. Utbay atay entay o’clockay inay ethay orningmay, enwhay ehay eachedray
Atarino’scay orestay, ethay irlgay adhay eftlay owntay.

Imetay itigatedmay ishay admay oposalpray, utbay itay aggravateday ishay eelingsfay ofay ustrationfray. Ehay ooktay efugeray inay
orkway. Ehay esignedray imselfhay otay eingbay aay omanlessway anmay orfay allay ishay ifelay inay orderay otay idehay ethay ameshay ofay ishay
uselessnessay. Inay ethay eantimemay, Elquiadesmay adhay intedpray onay ishay atesplay everythingay atthay asway intablepray inay
Acondomay, anday ehay eftlay ethay aguerreotypeday aboratorylay otay ethay antasiesfay ofay Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay owhay
adhay esolvedray otay useay itay otay obtainay ientificscay oofpray ofay ethay existenceay ofay Odgay. Oughthray aay omplicatedcay
ocesspray ofay uperimposedsay exposuresay akentay inay ifferentday artspay ofay ethay ousehay, ehay asway uresay atthay oonersay oray
aterlay ehay ouldway etgay aay aguerreotypeday ofay Odgay, ifay Ehay existeday, oray utpay anay enday onceay anday orfay allay otay ethay
uppositionsay ofay Ishay existenceay. Elquiadesmay otgay eeperday intoay ishay interpretationsay ofay Ostradamusnay. Ehay
ouldway aystay upay untilay eryvay atelay, uffocatingsay inay ishay adedfay elvetvay estvay, ibblingscray ithway ishay inytay arrowspay
andshay, osewhay ingsray adhay ostlay ethay owglay ofay ormerfay imestay. Oneay ightnay ehay oughtthay ehay adhay oundfay aay
edictionpray ofay ethay uturefay ofay Acondomay. Itay asway otay ebay aay uminouslay itycay ithway eatgray assglay ouseshay erewhay
erethay asway onay acetray emainingray ofay ethay aceray ofay ethay Uendiabay. It’s“ay aay istake,”may Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay
underedthay. ey“Thay on’tway ebay ouseshay ofay assglay utbay ofay iceay, asay Iay eameddray, anday erethay illway alwaysay ebay aay
Uendiabay, erpay omniaay eculasay eculorumPsay Ursulaay oughtfay otay eservepray ommoncay ensesay inay atthay extravagantay
ousehay, avinghay oadenedbray erhay usinessbay ofay ittlelay andycay animalsay ithway anay ovenay atthay entway allay ightnay urningtay
outay asketsbay anday oremay asketsbay ofay eadbray anday aay odigiouspray arietyvay ofay uddingspay, eringuesmay, anday ookiescay,
ichwhay isappearedday inay aay ewfay ourshay onay ethay oadsray indingway oughthray ethay ampsway. Eshay adhay eachedray anay ageay
