erewhay eshay adhay aay ightray otay estray, utbay eshay asway onethelessnay oremay anday oremay activeay. Osay usybay asway eshay inay erhay
osperouspray enterprisesay atthay oneay afternoonay eshay ookedlay istractedlyday owardtay ethay ourtyardcay ilewhay ethay
Indianay omanway elpedhay erhay eetensway ethay oughday anday eshay awsay otway unknownay anday eautifulbay adolescentay
irlsgay oingday amefray embroideryay inay ethay ightlay ofay ethay unsetsay. Eythay ereway Ebecaray anday Amarantaay. Asay oonsay asay
eythay adhay akentay offay ethay ourningmay othesclay orfay eirthay andmothergray, ichwhay eythay oreway ithway inflexibleay
igorray orfay eethray yearsay, eirthay ightbray othesclay eemedsay otay avehay ivengay emthay aay ewnay aceplay inay ethay orldway.
Ebecaray, ontrarycay otay atwhay ightmay avehay eenbay expecteday, asway ethay oremay eautifulbay. Eshay adhay aay ightlay
omplexioncay, argelay anday eacefulpay eyesay, anday agicalmay andshay atthay eemedsay otay orkway outay ethay esignday ofay ethay
embroideryay ithway invisibleay eadsthray. Amarantaay, ethay youngeray, asway omewhatsay acelessgray, utbay eshay adhay ethay
aturalnay istinctionday, ethay inneray ightnesstay ofay erhay eadday andmothergray. Extnay otay emthay, althoughay ehay asway
alreadyay evealingray ethay ysicalphay ivedray ofay ishay atherfay, Arcadioay ookedlay ikelay aay ildchay. Ehay etsay aboutay earninglay
ethay artay ofay ilverworksay ithway Aurelianoay, owhay adhay alsoay aughttay imhay owhay otay eadray anday itewray. Ursulaay
uddenlysay ealizedray atthay ethay ousehay adhay ecomebay ullfay ofay eoplepay, atthay erhay ildrenchay ereway onay ethay ointpay ofay
arryingmay anday avinghay ildrenchay, anday atthay eythay ouldway ebay obligeday otay atterscay orfay acklay ofay acespay. Enthay eshay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


ooktay outay ethay oneymay eshay adhay accumulateday overay onglay yearsay ofay ardhay aborlay, ademay omesay arrangementsay
ithway erhay ustomerscay, anday undertookay ethay enlargementay ofay ethay ousehay. Eshay adhay aay ormalfay arlorpay orfay isitsvay
uiltbay, anotheray oneay atthay asway oremay omfortablecay anday oolcay orfay ailyday useay, aay iningday oomray ithway aay abletay ithway
elvetway acesplay erewhay ethay amilyfay ouldcay itsay ithway allay ofay eirthay uestsgay, inenay edroomsbay ithway indowsway onay ethay
ourtyardcay anday aay onglay orchpay otectedpray omfray ethay eathay ofay oonnay ybay aay oseray ardengay ithway aay ailingray onay
ichwhay otay aceplay otspay ofay ernsfay anday egoniasbay. Eshay adhay ethay itchenkay enlargeday otay oldhay otway ovensay. Ethay
anarygray erewhay Ilarpay Erneratay adhay eadray Osejay Arcadio’say uturefay asway omtay ownday anday anotheray icetway asay argelay
uiltbay osay atthay erethay ouldway evernay ebay aay acklay ofay oodfay inay ethay ousehay. Eshay adhay athsbay uiltbay isay ethay ourtyardcay inay
ethay adeshay ofay ethay estnutchay eetray, oneay orfay ethay omenway anday anotheray orfay ethay enmay, anday inay ethay earray aay argelay
ablestay, aay enced-infay ickenchay yarday, aay edshay orfay ethay ilkmay owscay, anday anay aviaryay openay otay ethay ourfay indsway osay
atthay anderingway irdsbay ouldcay oostray erethay atay eirthay easureplay. Ollowedfay ybay ozensday ofay asonsmay anday
arpenterscay, asay ifay eshay adhay ontractedcay erhay usband’shay allucinatinghay everfay, Ursulaay ixedfay ethay ositionpay ofay
ightlay anday eathay anday istributedday acespay ithoutway ethay eastlay ensesay ofay itsay imitationslay. Ethay imitivepray uildingbay
ofay ethay oundersfay ecamebay illedfay ithway oolstay anday aterialsmay, ofay orkmenway exhausteday ybay eatsway, owhay askeday
everybodyay easeplay otnay otay olestmay emthay, exasperateday ybay ethay acksay ofay onesbay atthay ollowedfay emthay
everywhereay ithway itsay ullday attleray. Inay atthay iscomfortday, eathingbray uicklimeqay anday artay, onay oneay ouldcay eesay eryvay
ellway owhay omfray ethay owelsbay ofay ethay earthay erethay asway isingray otnay onlyay ethay argestlay ousehay isay ethay owntay, utbay
ethay ostmay ospitablehay anday oolcay ousehay atthay adhay everay existeday inay ethay egionray ofay ethay ampsway. Osejay Uendiabay,
yingtray otay urprisesay Ivineday Ovidencepray inay ethay idstmay ofay ethay ataclysmcay, asway ethay oneay owhay eastlay
understooday itay. Ethay ewnay ousehay asway almostay inishedfay enwhay Ursulaay ewdray imhay outay ofay ishay imericalchay
orldway inay orderay otay informay imhay atthay eshay adhay anay orderay otay aintpay ethay ontfray ueblay anday otnay itewhay asay eythay adhay
antedway. Eshay owedshay imhay ethay officialay ocumentday. Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay, ithoutway understandingay atwhay
ishay ifeway asway alkingtay aboutay, ecipheredday ethay ignaturesay.

o“Whay isay isthay ellow?”fay ehay askeday:

e“Thay agistrate,”may Ursulaay answereday isconsolatelyday. Eythay aysay e’shay anay authorityay entsay ybay ethay
overnment.”gay

Onday Apolinaray Oscotemay, ethay agistratemay, adhay arriveday inay Acondomay eryvay uietlyqay. Ehay utpay upay atay ethay
Otelhay Acob—builtjay ybay oneay ofay ethay irstfay Arabsay owhay amecay otay apsway ickknacksknay orfay acaws—andmay onay
ethay ollowingfay ayday ehay entedray aay allsmay oomray ithway aay oorday onay ethay eetstray otway ocksblay awayay omfray ethay
Uendiabay ousehay. Ehay etsay upay aay abletay anday aay airchay atthay ehay adhay oughtbay omfray Acobjay, ailednay upay onay ethay allway
ethay ieldshay ofay ethay epublicray atthay ehay adhay oughtbray ithway imhay, anday onay ethay oorday ehay aintedpay ethay ignsay:
Agistratemay. Ishay irstfay orderay asway orfay allay ethay ouseshay otay ebay aintedpay ueblay inay elebrationcay ofay ethay anniversaryay
ofay ationalnay independenceay. Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay, ithway ethay opycay ofay ethay orderay inay ishay andhay, oundfay imhay
akingtay ishay apnay inay aay ammockhay ehay adhay etsay upay inay ethay arrownay officeay. id“Day youay itewray isthay aper?”pay ehay
askeday imhay. Onday Apolinaray Oscotemay, aay aturemay anmay, imidtay, ithway aay uddyray omplexioncay, aidsay yesay. y“Bay
atwhay ight?”ray Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay askeday againay. Onday Apolinaray Oscotemay ickedpay upay aay aperpay omfray ethay
awerdray ofay ethay abletay anday owedshay itay otay imhay. I“ay avehay eenbay amednay agistratemay ofay isthay own.”tay Osejay
Arcadioay Uendiabay idday otnay evenay ooklay atay ethay appointmentay.

In“ay isthay owntay eway oday otnay ivegay ordersay ithway iecespay ofay aper,”pay ehay aidsay ithoutway osinglay ishay almcay. And“ay
osay atthay youay owknay itay onceay anday orfay allay, eway on’tday eednay anyay udgejay erehay ecausebay ere’sthay othingnay atthay
eedsnay udging.”jay

Acingfay Onday Apolinaray Oscotemay, illstay ithoutway aisingray ishay oicevay, ehay avegay aay etailedday accountay ofay owhay
eythay adhay oundedfay ethay illagevay, ofay owhay eythay adhay istributedday ethay andlay, openeday ethay oadsray, anday
introduceday ethay improvementsay atthay ecessitynay equiredray ithoutway avinghay otheredbay ethay overnmentgay anday
ithoutway anyoneay avinghay otheredbay emthay. e“Way areay osay eacefulpay atthay onenay ofay usay ashay iedday evenay ofay aay
aturalnay eath,”day ehay aidsay. You“ay ancay eesay atthay eway illstay on’tday avehay anyay emetery.”cay Onay onceay asway upsetay atthay
ethay overnmentgay adhay otnay elpedhay emthay. Onay ethay ontrarycay, eythay ereway appyhay atthay upay untilay enthay itay adhay etlay
emthay owgray inay eacepay, anday ehay opedhay atthay itay ouldway ontinuecay eavinglay emthay atthay ayway, ecausebay eythay adhay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


otnay oundedfay aay owntay osay atthay ethay irstfay upstartay owhay amecay alongay ouldway elltay emthay atwhay otay oday. Onday
Apolinaray adhay utpay onay ishay enimday acketjay, itewhay ikelay ishay ouserstray, ithoutway osinglay atay anyay omentmay ethay
eleganceay ofay ishay esturesgay.

o“Say atthay ifay youay antway otay aystay erehay ikelay anyay otheray ordinaryay itizencay, you’reay uiteqay elcome,”way Osejay
Arcadioay Uendlabay oncludedcay. ut“Bay ifay you’veay omecay otay ausecay isorderday ybay akingmay ethay eoplepay aintpay eirthay
ouseshay ueblay, youay ancay ickpay upay youray unkjay anday ogay ackbay erewhay youay amecay omfray. Ecausebay ymay ousehay isay
oinggay otay ebay itewhay, itewhay, ikelay aay ove.”day

Onday Apolinaray Oscotemay urnedtay alepay. Ehay ooktay aay epstay ackwardbay anday ightenedtay ishay awsjay asay ehay aidsay
ithway aay ertaincay afflictionay:

I“ay ustmay arnway youay atthay I’may armed.”ay

Osejay Arcadioay Uendlabay idday otnay owknay exactlyay enwhay ishay andshay egainedray ethay usefulay engthstray ithway
ichwhay ehay useday otay ullpay ownday orseshay. Ehay abbedgray Onday Apolinaray Oscotemay ybay ethay apelslay anday iftedlay imhay
upay otay ethay evellay ofay ishay eyesay.

I’m“ay oingday is,”thay ehay aidsay, ecause“bay Iay ouldway atherray arrycay youay arounday aliveay anday otnay avehay otay eepkay
arryingcay youay arounday eadday orfay ethay estray ofay ymay ife.”lay

Inay atthay ayway ehay arriedcay imhay oughthray ethay iddlemay ofay ethay eetstray, uspendedsay ybay ethay apelslay, untilay ehay utpay
imhay ownday onay ishay otway eetfay onay ethay ampsway oadray. Aay eekway aterlay ehay asway ackbay ithway ixsay arefootbay anday
aggedray oldierssay, armeday ithway otgunsshay, anday anay oxcartay inay ichwhay ishay ifeway anday evensay aughtersday ereway
avelingtray. Otway otheray artscay arriveday aterlay ithway ethay urniturefay, ethay aggagebay, anday ethay ouseholdhay utensilsay.
Ehay ettledsay ishay amilyfay inay ethay Otelhay Acobjay, ilewhay ehay ookedlay orfay aay ousehay, anday ehay entway ackbay otay openay ishay
officeay underay ethay otectionpray ofay ethay oldierssay. Ethay oundersfay ofay Acondomay, esolvingray otay expelay ethay
invadersay, entway ithway eirthay olderay onssay otay utpay emselvesthay atay ethay isposalday ofay Osejay Arcadioay Uendlabay. Utbay
ehay asway againstay itay, asay ehay explaineday, ecausebay itay asway otnay anlymay otay akemay oubletray orfay omeonesay inay ontfray ofay
ishay amilyfay, anday Onday Apolinaray adhay eturnedray ithway ishay ifeway anday aughtersday. Osay ehay ecidedday otay esolveray ethay
ituationsay inay aay easantplay ayway.

Aurelianoay entway ithway imhay. Aboutay atthay imetay ehay adhay egunbay otay ultivatecay ethay ackblay ustachemay ithway
axedway ipstay anday ethay omewhatsay entorianstay oicevay atthay ouldway aracterizechay imhay inay ethay arway. Unarmeday,
ithoutway ayingpay anyay attentionay otay ethay uardsgay, eythay entway intoay ethay agistrate’smay officeay. Onday Apolinaray
Oscotemay idday otnay oselay ishay almcay. Ehay introduceday emthay otay otway ofay ishay aughtersday owhay appenedhay otay ebay
erethay: Amparoay, ixteensay, arkday ikelay erhay othermay, anday Emediosray, onlyay inenay, aay ettypray ittlelay irlgay ithway ilylay-
oloredcay inskay anday eengray eyesay. Eythay ereway aciousgray anday ell-manneredway. Asay oonsay asay ethay enmay amecay inay,
eforebay eingbay introduceday, eythay avegay emthay airschay otay itsay onay. Utbay eythay othbay emainedray andingstay.

ery“Vay ellway, ymay iend,”fray Osejay Arcadioay Uendlabay aidsay, you“ay aymay aystay erehay, otnay ecausebay youay avehay
osethay anditsbay ithway otgunsshay atay ethay oorday, utbay outay ofay onsiderationcay orfay youray ifeway anday aughters.”day

Onday Apolinaray Oscotemay asway upsetay, utbay Osejay Arcadioay Uendlabay idday otnay ivegay imhay imetay otay eplyray. e“Way
onlyay akemay otway onditions,”cay ehay entway onay. e“Thay irstfay: atthay everyoneay ancay aintpay ishay ousehay ethay olorcay ehay
eelsfay ikelay. Ethay econdsay: atthay ethay oldierssay eavelay atay onceay. Eway illway uaranteegay orderay orfay you.”ay Ethay
agistratemay aisedray ishay ightray andhay ithway allay ethay ingersfay extendeday.

Your“ay ordway ofay onor?”hay

e“Thay ordway ofay youray enemy,”ay Osejay Arcadioay Uendlabay aidsay. Anday ehay addeday inay aay itterbay onetay: ecause“Bay Iay
ustmay elltay youay oneay ingthay: youay anday Iay areay illstay enemies.”ay

Ethay oldierssay eftlay atthay amesay afternoonay. Aay ewfay aysday aterlay Osejay Arcadioay Uendlabay oundfay aay ousehay orfay
ethay agistrate’smay amilyfay. Everybodyay asway atay eacepay exceptay Aurelianoay. Ethay imageay ofay Emediosray, ethay
agistrate’smay youngeray aughterday, owhay, ecausebay ofay erhay ageay, ouldcay avehay eenbay ishay aughterday, eptkay ainingpay
imhay inay omesay artpay ofay ishay odybay. Itay asway aay ysicalphay ensationsay atthay almostay otheredbay imhay enwhay ehay alkedway,
ikelay aay ebblepay inay ishay oeshay.






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Apterchay 


EtHay EWnay OUSEhay, itewhay, ikelay aay oveday, asway inaugurateday ithway aay anceday. Ursulaay adhay otgay atthay ideaay omfray
ethay afternoonay enwhay eshay awsay Ebecaray anday Amarantaay angedchay intoay adolescentsay, anday itay ouldcay almostay
avehay eenbay aidsay atthay ethay ainmay easonray ehindbay ethay onstructioncay asway aay esireday otay avehay aay operpray aceplay orfay
ethay irlsgay otay eceiveray isitorsvay. Inay orderay atthay othingnay ouldway ebay ackinglay inay endorsplay eshay orkedway ikelay aay
alleygay aveslay asay ethay epairsray ereway underay ayway, osay atthay eforebay eythay ereway inishedfay eshay adhay ordereday ostlycay
ecessitiesnay orfay ethay ecorationsday, ethay abletay ervicesay, anday ethay arvelousmay inventionay atthay asway otay arouseay ethay
astonishmentay ofay ethay owntay anday ethay ubilationjay ofay ethay youngay eoplepay: ethay ianolapay. Eythay eliveredday itay
okenbray ownday, ackedpay inay everalsay oxesbay atthay ereway unloadeday alongay ithway ethay Iennesevay urniturefay, ethay
Ohemianbay ystalcray, ethay abletay ervicesay omfray ethay Indiesay Ompanycay, ethay ableclothstay omfray Ollandhay, anday aay
ichray arietyvay ofay ampslay anday andlestickscay, angingshay anday apesdray. Ethay importay ousehay entsay alongay atay itsay ownay
expenseay anay Italianay expertay, Ietropay Espicray, otay assembleay anday unetay ethay ianolapay, otay instructay ethay urchaserspay
inay itsay unctioningfay, anday otay eachtay emthay owhay otay anceday ethay atestlay usicmay intedpray onay itsay ixsay aperpay ollsray.

Ietropay Espicray asway youngay anday ondblay, ethay ostmay andsomehay anday ellway anneredmay anmay owhay adhay everay
eenbay eensay inay Acondomay, osay upulousscray inay ishay essdray atthay inay itespay ofay ethay uffocatingsay eathay ehay ouldway orkway
inay ishay ocadebray estvay anday eavyhay oatcay ofay arkday othclay. Oakedsay inay eatsway, eepingkay aay everentray istanceday omfray
ethay ownersay ofay ethay ousehay, ehay entspay everalsay eeksway utshay upay isay ethay arlorpay ithway aay edicationday uchmay ikelay
atthay ofay Aurelianoay inay ishay ilverworksay. Oneay orningmay, ithoutway openingay ethay oorday, ithoutway allingcay anyoneay
otay itnessway ethay iraclemay, ehay acedplay ethay irstfay ollray inay ethay ianolapay anday ethay ormentingtay ammeringhay anday ethay
onstantcay oisenay ofay oodenway athingslay easedcay inay aay ilencesay atthay asway artledstay atay ethay orderay anday eatnessnay ofay
ethay usicmay. Eythay allay anray otay ethay arlorpay. Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay asway asay ifay stmckay ybay ightninglay, otnay ecausebay
ofay ethay eautybay ofay ethay elodymay, utbay ecausebay ofay ethay automaticay orkingway ofay ethay eyskay ofay ethay ianolapay, anday ehay
etsay upay Elquiades’may ameracay ithway ethay opehay ofay ettinggay aay aguerreotypeday ofay ethay invisibleay ayerplay. Atthay ayday
ethay Italianay adhay unchlay ithway emthay. Ebecaray anday Amarantaay, ervingsay ethay abletay, ereway intimidateday ybay ethay
ayway inay ichwhay ethay angelicay anmay ithway alepay anday inglessray andshay anipulatedmay ethay utensilsay. Inay ethay ivinglay
oomray, extnay otay ethay arlorpay, Ietropay Espicray aughttay emthay owhay otay anceday. Ehay owedshay emthay ethay epsstay
ithoutway ouchingtay emthay, eepingkay imetay ithway aay etronomemay, underay ethay iendlyfray eyeay ofay Ursulaay, owhay idday
otnay eavelay ethay oomray orfay aay omentmay ilewhay erhay aughtersday adhay eirthay essonlay. Ietropay Espicray oreway ecialspay
antspay onay osethay aysday, eryvay elasticay anday ighttay, anday ancingday ippersslay, You“ay on’tday avehay otay orryway osay
uch,”may Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay oldtay erhay. e“Thay an’smay aay airy.”fay Utbay eshay idday otnay eavelay offay erhay igilancevay
untilay ethay apprenticeshipay asway overay anday ethay Italianay eftlay Acondomay. Enthay eythay eganbay otay organizeay ethay
artypay. Ursulaay ewdray upay aay ictstray uestgay istlay, inay ichwhay ethay onlyay onesay inviteday ereway ethay escendantsday ofay ethay
oundersfay, exceptay orfay ethay amilyfay ofay Ilarpay Erneratay, owhay ybay enthay adhay adhay otway oremay ildrenchay ybay
unknownay athersfay. Itay asway ulytray aay igh-classhay istlay, exceptay atthay itay asway eterminedday ybay eelingsfay ofay
iendshipfray, orfay osethay avoredfay ereway otnay onlyay ethay oldestay iendsfray ofay Osejay Arcadioay Uendia’sbay ousehay incesay
eforebay eythay undertookay ethay exodusay anday ethay oundingfay ofay Acondomay, utbay alsoay eirthay onssay anday andsonsgray,
owhay ereway ethay onstantcay ompanionscay ofay Aurelianoay anday Arcadioay incesay infancyay, anday eirthay aughtersday,
owhay ereway ethay onlyay onesay owhay isitedvay ethay ousehay otay embroideray ithway Ebecaray anday Amarantaay. Onday
Apolinaray Oscotemay, ethay enevolentbay ulerray osewhay activityay adhay eenbay educedray otay ethay aintenancemay omfray
ishay antyscay esourcesray ofay otway olicemenpay armeday ithway oodenway ubsclay, asway aay igureheadfay. Inay olderay otay
upportsay ethay ouseholdhay expensesay ishay aughtersday adhay openeday aay ewingsay opshay, erewhay eythay ademay eltfay
owersflay asay ellway asay uavagay elicaciesday, anday otewray ovelay otesnay otay orderay. Utbay inay itespay ofay eingbay odestmay anday
ard-workinghay, ethay ostmay eautifulbay irlsgay inay Iowaay, anday ethay ostmay illedskay atay ethay ewnay ancesday, eythay idday otnay
anagemay otay ebay onsideredcay orfay ethay artypay.






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Ilewhay Ursulaay anday ethay irlsgay unpackeday urniturefay, olishedpay ilverwaresay, anday unghay icturespay ofay aidensmay
inay oatsbay ullfay ofay osesray, ichwhay avegay aay eathbray ofay ewnay ifelay otay ethay akednay areasay atthay ethay asonsmay adhay uiltbay,
Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay oppedstay ishay ursuitpay ofay ethay imageay ofay Odgay, onvincedcay ofay Ishay onexistencenay, anday
ehay ooktay ethay ianolapay apartay inay orderay otay ecipherday itsay agicalmay ecretsay. Otway aysday eforebay ethay artypay,
ampedsway inay aay owershay ofay eftoverlay eyskay anday ammershay, unglingbay inay ethay idstmay ofay aay ix-upmay ofay ingsstray
atthay ouldway unrollay inay oneay irectionday anday ollray upay againay inay ethay otheray, ehay ucceededsay inay aay ashionfay inay uttingpay
ethay instmmentay ackbay ogethertay. Erethay adhay evernay eenbay asay anymay urprisessay anday asay uchmay ashingday aboutay asay
inay osethay aysday, utbay ethay ewnay itchpay ampslay ereway ightedlay onay ethay esignatedday ayday anday ourhay. Ethay ousehay asway
openeday, illstay ellingsmay ofay esinray anday ampday itewashwhay, anday ethay ildrenchay anday andchildrengray ofay ethay
oundersfay awsay ethay orchpay ithway ernsfay anday egoniasbay, ethay uietqay oomsray, ethay ardengay aturatedsay ithway ethay
agrancefray ofay ethay osesray, anday eythay atheredgay ogethertay inay ethay arlorpay, acingfay ethay unknownay inventionay atthay
adhay eenbay overedcay ithway aay itewhay eetshay. Osethay owhay ereway amiliarfay ithway ethay ianopay, opularpay inay otheray
ownstay inay ethay ampsway, eltfay aay ittlelay isheartenedday, utbay oremay itterbay asway Ursula’say isappointmentday enwhay eshay
utpay inay ethay irstfay ollray osay atthay Amarantaay anday Ebecaray ouldcay eginbay ethay ancingday anday ethay echanismmay idday
otnay orkway. Elquiadesmay, almostay indblay ybay enthay, umblingcray ithway ecrepitudeday, useday ethay artsay ofay ishay
imelesstay isdomway inay anay attemptay otay ixfay itay. Inallyfay Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay anagedmay, ybay istakemay, otay ovemay
aay eviceday atthay asway uckstay anday ethay usicmay amecay outay, irstfay inay aay urstbay anday enthay inay aay owflay ofay ixed-upmay
otesnay. Eatingbay againstay ethay ingsstray atthay adhay eenbay utpay inay ithoutway orderay oray oncertcay anday adhay eenbay unedtay
ithway emeritytay, ethay ammershay etlay ogay. Utbay ethay ubbornstay escendantsday ofay ethay enty-onetway intrepiday eoplepay
owhay owedplay oughthray ethay ountainsmay inay earchsay ofay ethay easay otay ethay estway avoideday ethay eefsray ofay ethay elodicmay
ix-upmay anday ethay ancingday entway onay untilay awnday.

Ietropay Espicray amecay ackbay otay epairray ethay ianolapay. Ebecaray anday Amarantaay elpedhay imhay utpay ethay ingsstray
inay orderay anday elpedhay imhay ithway eirthay aughterlay atay ethay ix-upmay ofay ethay elodiesmay. Itay asway extremelyay easantplay
anday osay astechay inay itsay ayway atthay Ursulaay easedcay erhay igilancevay. Onay ethay eveay ofay ishay epartureday aay arewellfay
anceday orfay imhay asway improviseday ithway ethay ianolapay anday ithway Ebecaray ehay utpay onay aay illfulskay emonstrationday
ofay odernmay anceday, Arcadioay anday Amarantaay atchedmay emthay inay acegray anday illskay. Utbay ethay exhibitionay asway
intermpteday ecausebay Ilarpay Erneratay, owhay asway atay ethay oorday ithway ethay onlookersay, adhay aay ightfay, itingbay anday
airhay ullingpay, ithway aay omanway owhay adhay aredday otay ommentcay atthay Arcadioay adhay aay oman’sway ehindbay. Owardtay
idnightmay Ietropay Espicray ooktay ishay eavelay ithway aay entimentalsay ittlelay eechspay, anday ehay omisedpray otay eturnray
eryvay oonsay. Ebecaray accompanieday imhay otay ethay oorday, anday avinghay osedclay upay ethay ousehay anday utpay outay ethay
ampslay, eshay entway otay erhay oomray otay eepway. Itay asway anay inconsolableay eepingway atthay astedlay orfay everalsay aysday,
ethay ausecay ofay ichwhay asway otnay ownknay evenay ybay Amarantaay. Erhay ermetismhay asway otnay odday. Althoughay eshay
eemedsay expansiveay anday ordialcay, eshay adhay aay olitarysay aracterchay anday anay impenetrableay earthay. Eshay asway aay
endidsplay adolescentay ithway onglay anday irmfay onesbay, utbay eshay illstay insisteday onay usingay ethay allsmay oodenway
ockingray airchay ithway ichwhay eshay adhay arriveday atay ethay ousehay, einforcedray anymay imestay anday ithway ethay armsay
onegay. Onay oneay adhay iscoveredday atthay evenay atay atthay ageay eshay illstay adhay ethay abithay ofay uckingsay erhay ingerfay. Atthay
asway ywhay eshay ouldway otnay oselay anay opportunityay otay ocklay erselfhay inay ethay athroombay anday adhay acquireday ethay
abithay ofay eepingslay ithway erhay acefay otay ethay allway. Onay ainyray afternoonsay, embroideringay ithway aay oupgray ofay
iendsfray onay ethay egoniabay orchpay, eshay ouldway oselay ethay eadthray ofay ethay onversationcay anday aay eartay ofay ostalgianay
ouldway altsay erhay alatepay enwhay eshay awsay ethay ipsstray ofay ampday earthay anday ethay ilespay ofay udmay atthay ethay
earthwormsay adhay ushedpay upay inay ethay ardengay. Osethay ecretsay astestay, efeatedday inay ethay astpay ybay orangesay anday
ubarbrhay, okebray outay intoay anay irrepressibleay urgeay enwhay eshay eganbay otay eepway. Eshay entway ackbay otay eatingay
earthay. Ethay irstfay imetay eshay idday itay almostay outay ofay uriositycay, uresay atthay ethay adbay astetay ouldway ebay ethay estbay urecay
orfay ethay emptationtay. Anday, inay actfay, eshay ouldcay otnay earbay ethay earthay inay erhay outhmay. Utbay eshay erseveredpay,
overcomeay ybay ethay owinggray anxietyay, anday ittlelay ybay ittlelay eshay asway ettinggay ackbay erhay ancestralay appetiteay, ethay
astetay ofay imarypray ineralsmay, ethay unbridleday atisfactionsay ofay atwhay asway ethay originalay oodfay. Eshay ouldway utpay
andfulshay ofay earthay inay erhay ocketspay, anday ateay emthay inay allsmay itsbay ithoutway eingbay eensay, ithway aay onfusedcay
eelingfay ofay easureplay anday ageray, asay eshay instmcteday erhay irlgay iendsfray inay ethay ostmay ifficultday eedlepointnay anday






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


okespay aboutay otheray enmay, owhay idday otnay eserveday ethay acrificesay ofay avinghay oneay eatay ethay itewashwhay onay ethay
allsway ecausebay ofay emthay. Ethay andfulshay ofay earthay ademay ethay onlyay anmay owhay eservedday atthay owshay ofay
egradationday esslay emoteray anday oremay ertaincay, asay ifay ethay oundgray atthay ehay alkedway onay ithway ishay inefay atentpay
eatherlay ootsbay inay anotheray artpay ofay ethay orldway ereway ansmittingtray otay erhay ethay eightway anday ethay emperaturetay
ofay ishay oodblay inay aay ineralmay avorsay atthay eftlay aay arshhay aftertasteay inay erhay outhmay anday aay edimentsay ofay eacepay inay
erhay earthay. Oneay afternoonay, orfay onay easonray, Amparoay Oscotemay askeday ermissionpay otay eesay ethay ousehay.
Amarantaay anday Ebecaray, isconcertedday ybay ethay unexpecteday isitvay, attendeday erhay ithway aay iffstay ormalityfay. Eythay
owedshay erhay ethay emodeledray ansionmay, eythay adhay erhay istenlay otay ethay ollsray onay ethay ianolapay, anday eythay offereday
erhay orangeay armalademay anday ackerscray. Amparoay avegay aay essonlay inay ignityday, ersonalpay armchay, anday oodgay
annersmay atthay impresseday Ursulaay inay ethay ewfay omentsmay atthay eshay asway esentpray uringday ethay isitvay. Afteray otway
ourshay, enwhay ethay onversationcay asway eginningbay otay aneway, Amparoay ooktay advantageay ofay Amaranta’say
istractionday anday avegay Ebecaray aay etterlay. Eshay asway ableay otay eesay ethay amenay ofay ethay Estimableay Enoritasay Ebecaray
Uendiabay, ittenwray inay ethay amesay ethodicalmay andhay, ithway ethay amesay eengray inkay, anday ethay amesay elicacyday ofay
ordsway ithway ichwhay ethay instructionsay orfay ethay operationay ofay ethay ianolapay ereway ittenwray, anday eshay oldedfay ethay
etterlay ithway ethay ipstay ofay erhay ingersfay anday idhay itay inay erhay osombay, ookinglay atay Amparoay Oscotemay ithway anay
expressionay ofay endlessay anday unconditionalay atitudegray anday aay ilentsay omisepray ofay omplicitycay untoay eathday.

Ethay uddensay iendshipfray etweenbay Amparoay Oscotemay anday Ebecaray Uendiabay awakeneday ethay opeshay ofay
Aurelianoay. Ethay emorymay ofay ittlelay Emediosray adhay otnay oppedstay ormentingtay imhay, utbay ehay adhay otnay oundfay aay
ancechay otay eesay erhay. Enwhay ehay ouldway ollstray oughthray owntay ithway ishay osestclay iendsfray, Agnificomay Isbalvay anday
Erineldogay Arquez—themay onssay ofay ethay oundersfay ofay ethay amesay ames—henay ouldway ooklay orfay erhay inay ethay
ewingsay opshay ithway anay anxiousay anceglay, utbay ehay awsay onlyay ethay olderay isterssay. Ethay esencepray ofay Amparoay
Oscotemay inay ethay ousehay asway ikelay aay emonitionpray. e“Shay ashay otay omecay ithway er,”hay Aurelianoay ouldway aysay otay
imselfhay inay aay owlay oicevay. e“Shay ashay otay ome.”cay Ehay epeatedray itay osay anymay imestay anday ithway uchsay onvictioncay
atthay oneay afternoonay enwhay ehay asway uttingpay ogethertay aay ittlelay oldgay ishfay inay ethay orkway opshay, ehay adhay ethay
ertaintycay atthay eshay adhay answereday ishay allcay. Indeeday, aay ortshay imetay aterlay ehay eardhay ethay ildishchay oicevay, anday
enwhay ehay ookedlay upay ishay earthay ozefray ithway errortay asay ehay awsay ethay irlgay atay ethay oorday, esseddray inay inkpay organdyay
anday earingway itewhay ootsbay.

You“ay an’tcay ogay inay erethay, Emediosray, Amparoay Oscotemay aidsay omfray ethay allhay. Ey’rethay orking.”way

Utbay Aurelianoay idday otnay ivegay erhay imetay otay espondray. Ehay ickedpay upay ethay ittlelay ishfay ybay ethay ainchay atthay
amecay oughthray itsay outhmay anday aidsay otay erhay.

ome“Cay in.”ay

Emediosray entway overay anday askeday omesay uestionsqay aboutay ethay ishfay atthay Aurelianoay ouldcay otnay answeray
ecausebay ehay asway eizedsay ithway aay uddensay attackay ofay asthmaay. Ehay antedway otay aystay esidebay atthay ilylay inskay
oreverfay, esidebay osethay emeralday eyesay, oseclay otay atthay oicevay atthay alledcay imhay ir”“say ithway everyay uestionqay,
owingshay ethay amesay espectray atthay eshay avegay erhay atherfay. Elquiadesmay asway inay ethay ornercay eatedsay atay ethay eskday
ibblingscray indecipherableay ignssay. Aurelianoay atedhay imhay. Allay ehay ouldcay oday asway elltay Emediosray atthay ehay asway
oinggay otay ivegay erhay ethay ittlelay ishfay anday ethay irlgay asway osay artledstay ybay ethay offeray atthay eshay eftlay ethay orkshopway asay
astfay asay eshay ouldcay. Atthay afternoonay Aurelianoay ostlay ethay iddenhay atiencepay ithway ichwhay ehay adhay aitedway orfay aay
ancechay otay eesay erhay. Ehay eglectednay ishay orkway. Inay everalsay esperateday effortsay ofay oncentrationcay ehay illedway erhay
otay appearay utbay Emediosray idday otnay espondray. Ehay ookedlay orfay erhay inay erhay isters’say opshay, ehindbay ethay indowway
adesshay inay erhay ousehay, inay erhay ather’sfay officeay, utbay ehay oundfay erhay onlyay inay ethay imageay atthay aturatedsay ishay
ivatepray anday erribletay olitudesay. Ehay ouldway endspay olewhay ourshay ithway Ebecaray inay ethay arlorpay isteninglay otay ethay
usicmay onay ethay ianolapay. Eshay asway isteninglay otay itay ecausebay itay asway ethay usicmay ithway ichwhay Ietropay Espicray adhay
aughttay emthay owhay otay anceday. Aurelianoay istenedlay otay itay implysay ecausebay everythingay, evenay usicmay, emindedray
imhay ofay Emediosray.

Ethay ousehay ecamebay ullfay ofay oveslay Aurelianoay expresseday itay inay oetrypay atthay adhay onay eginningbay oray enday.
Ehay ouldway itewray itay onay ethay arshhay iecespay ofay archmentpay atthay Elquiadesmay avegay imhay, onay ethay athroombay
allsway, onay ethay inskay ofay ishay armsay, anday inay allay ofay itay Emediosray ouldway appearay ansfiguredtray: Emediosray inay ethay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


oporificsay airay ofay otway inay ethay afternoonay, Emediosray inay ethay oftsay eathbray ofay ethay osesray, Emediosray inay ethay
ater-clockway ecretssay ofay ethay othsmay, Emediosray inay ethay eamingstay orningmay eadbray, Emediosray everywhereay
anday Emediosray oreverfay. Ebecaray aitedway orfay erhay ovelay atay ourfay inay ethay afternoonay, embroideringay ybay ethay
indowway. Eshay ewknay atthay ethay ailman’smay ulemay arriveday onlyay everyay otway eeksway, utbay eshay alwaysay aitedway orfay
imhay, onvincedcay atthay ehay asway oinggay otay arriveay onay omesay otheray ayday ybay istakemay. Itay appenedhay uiteqay ethay
oppositeay: onceay ethay ulemay idday otnay omecay onay ethay usualay ayday. Admay ithway esperationday, Ebecaray otgay upay inay ethay
iddlemay ofay ethay ightnay anday ateay andfulshay ofay earthay inay ethay ardengay ithway aay uicidalsay ivedray, eepingway ithway ainpay
anday uryfay, ewingchay endertay earthwormsay anday ippingchay erhay eethtay onay ailsnay ellsshay. Eshay omitedvay untilay awnday.
Eshay ellfay intoay aay atestay ofay everishfay ostrationpray, ostlay onsciousnesscay, anday erhay earthay entway intoay aay amelessshay
eliriumday. Ursulaay, andalizedscay, orcedfay ethay ocklay onay erhay unktray anday oundfay atay ethay ottombay, iedtay ogethertay
ithway inkpay ibbonsray, ethay ixteensay erfumedpay etterslay anday ethay eletonsskay ofay eaveslay anday etalspay eservedpray inay
olday ooksbay anday ethay ieddray utterfliesbay atthay urnedtay otay owderpay atay ethay ouchtay.

Aurelianoay asway ethay onlyay oneay apablecay ofay understandingay uchsay esolationday. Atthay afternoonay, ilewhay
Ursulaay asway yingtray otay escueray Ebecaray omfray ethay oughslay ofay eliriumday, ehay entway ithway Agnificomay Isbalvay anday
Erineldogay Arquezmay otay Atarino’scay orestay. Ethay establishmentay adhay eenbay expandeday ithway aay allerygay ofay
oodenway oomsray erewhay inglesay omenway owhay elledsmay ofay eadday owersflay ivedlay. Aay oupgray ademay upay ofay anay
accordionay anday dmmsay ayedplay ethay ongssay ofay Anciscofray ethay Anmay, owhay adhay otnay eenbay eensay inay Acondomay
orfay everalsay yearsay. Ethay eethray iendsfray ankdray ermentedfay anecay uicejay. Agnificomay anday Erineldogay,
ontemporariescay ofay Aurelianoay utbay oremay illedskay inay ethay aysway ofay ethay orldway, ankdray ethodicallymay ithway ethay
omenway eatedsay onay eirthay apslay. Oneay ofay ethay omenway, itheredway anday ithway oldworkgay onay erhay eethtay, avegay
Aurelianoay aay aresscay atthay ademay imhay uddershay. Ehay ejectedray erhay. Ehay adhay iscoveredday atthay ethay oremay ehay
ankdray ethay oremay ehay oughtthay aboutay Emediosray, utbay ehay ouldcay earbay ethay orturetay ofay ishay ecollectionsray etterbay.
Ehay idday otnay owknay exactlyay enwhay ehay eganbay otay oatflay. Ehay awsay ishay iendsfray anday ethay omenway ailingsay inay aay
adiantray owglay, ithoutway eightway oray assmay, ayingsay ordsway atthay idday otnay omecay outay ofay eirthay outhsmay anday
akingmay ysteriousmay ignalssay atthay idday otnay orrespondcay otay eirthay expressionsay. Atarinocay utpay aay andhay onay ishay
ouldershay anday aidsay otay imhay: It’s“ay oinggay onay eleven.”ay Aurelianoay urnedtay ishay eadhay, awsay ethay enormousay
isfiguredday acefay ithway aay eltfay owerflay ehindbay ethay earay, anday enthay ehay ostlay ishay emorymay, asay uringday ethay imestay ofay
orgetfulnessfay, anday ehay ecoveredray itay onay aay angestray awnday anday inay aay oomray atthay asway ompletelycay oreignfay,
erewhay Ilarpay Erneratay oodstay inay erhay ipslay, arefootbay, erhay airhay ownday, oldinghay aay amplay overay imhay, ardedstay
ithway isbeliefday.

Aureliano!”“ay

Aurelianoay eckedchay ishay eetfay anday aisedray ishay eadhay. Ehay idday otnay owknay owhay ehay adhay omecay erethay, utbay ehay
ewknay atwhay ishay aimay asway, ecausebay ehay adhay arriedcay itay iddenhay incesay infancyay inay anay inviolableay ackwaterbay ofay
ishay earthay.

I’ve“ay omecay otay eepslay ithway you,”ay ehay aidsay.

Ishay othesclay ereway earedsmay ithway udmay anday omitvay. Ilarpay Erneratay, owhay ivedlay aloneay atay atthay imetay ithway
erhay otway youngeray ildrenchay, idday otnay askay imhay anyay uesdonsqay. Eshay ooktay imhay otay ethay edbay. Eshay eanedclay ishay
acefay ithway aay ampday othclay, ooktay ofay ishay othesclay, anday enthay otgay ompletelycay undresseday anday oweredlay ethay
osquitomay ettingnay osay atthay erhay ildrenchay ouldway otnay eesay emthay ifay eythay okeway upay. Eshay adhay ecomebay eddray ofay
aitingway orfay ethay anmay owhay ouldway aystay, ofay ethay enmay owhay eftlay, ofay ethay ountlesscay enmay owhay issedmay ethay oadray
otay erhay ousehay, onfusedcay ybay ethay uncertaintyay ofay ethay ardscay. Uringday ethay aitway erhay inskay adhay ecomebay
inkledwray, erhay eastsbray adhay itheredway, ethay oalscay ofay erhay earthay adhay onegay outay. Eshay eltfay orfay Aurelianoay inay ethay
arknessday, utpay erhay andhay onay ishay omachstay anday issedkay imhay onay ethay ecknay ithway aay aternalmay endernesstay. y“May
oorpay ild,”chay eshay urmuredmay. Aurelianoay udderedshay. Ithway aay almcay illskay, ithoutway ethay ightestslay isstepmay, ehay
eftlay ishay accumulateday iefgray ehindbay anday oundfay Emediosray angedchay intoay aay ampsway ithoutway orizonshay,
ellingsmay ofay aay awray animalay anday ecendyray ironeday othesclay. Enwhay ehay amecay otay ethay urfacesay ehay asway eepingway.
Irstfay eythay ereway involuntaryay anday okenbray obssay. Enthay ehay emptieday imselfhay outay inay anay unleasheday owflay,
eelingfay atthay omethingsay ollensway anday ainfulpay adhay urstbay insideay ofay imhay. Eshay aitedway, atchingsnay ishay eadhay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


ithway ethay ipstay ofay erhay ingersfay, untilay ishay odybay otgay idray ofay ethay arkday aterialmay atthay ouldway otnay etlay imhay ivelay.
Eythay Ilarpay Erneratay askeday imhay: o“Whay isay it?”ay Anday Aurelianoay oldtay erhay. Eshay etlay outay aay aughlay atthay inay otheray
imestay ightenedfray ethay ovesday anday atthay ownay idday otnay evenay akeway upay ethay ildrenchay. You’ll“ay avehay otay aiseray erhay
irst,”fay eshay ockedmay, utbay underneathay ethay ockerymay Aurelianoay oundfay aay eservoirray ofay understandingay.
Enwhay ehay entway outay ofay ethay oomray, eavinglay ehindbay otnay onlyay ishay oubtsday aboutay ishay irilityvay utbay alsoay ethay
itterbay eightway atthay ishay earthay adhay ornebay orfay osay anymay onthsmay. Ilarpay Erneratay ademay imhay aay ontaneousspay
omisepray.

I’m“ay oinggay otay alktay otay ethay irl,”gay eshay oldtay imhay, and“ay you’llay eesay atwhay I’llay ervesay erhay onay ethay ay.”tray

Eshay eptkay erhay omisepray. Utbay itay asway aay adbay omentmay, ecausebay ethay ousehay adhay ostlay itsay eacepay ofay ormerfay
aysday. Enwhay eshay iscoveredday Ebeca’sray assionpay, ichwhay asway impossibleay otay eepkay ecretsay ecausebay ofay erhay
outsshay, Amarantaay ufferedsay anay attackay ofay everfay. Eshay alsoay ufferedsay omfray ethay arbbay ofay aay onelylay ovelay. Utshay
upay inay ethay athroombay, eshay ouldway eleaseray erselfhay omfray ethay ormenttay ofay aay opelesshay assionpay ybay itingwray
everishfay etterslay, ichwhay eshay inallyfay idhay inay ethay ottombay ofay erhay unktray. Ursulaay arelybay adhay ethay engthstray otay
aketay arecay ofay ethay otway icksay irlsgay. Eshay asway unableay, afteray olongedpray anday insidiousay interrogationsay, otay
ascertainay ethay ausescay ofay Amaranta’say ostrationpray. Inallyfay, inay anotheray omentmay ofay inspirationay, eshay orcedfay
ethay ocklay onay ethay unktray anday oundfay ethay etterslay iedtay ithway aay inkpay ibbonray, ollensway ithway eshfray ilieslay anday illstay
etway ithway earstay, addresseday anday evernay entsay otay Ietropay Espicray. Eepingway ithway ageray, eshay ursedcay ethay ayday atthay
itay adhay occurreday otay erhay otay uybay ethay ianolapay, anday eshay orbadefay ethay embroideryay essonslay anday ecreedday aay
indkay ofay ourningmay ithway onay oneay eadday ichwhay asway otay ebay olongedpray untilay ethay aughtersday otgay overay eirthay
opeshay. Uselessay asway ethay interventionay ofay Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay, owhay adhay odifiedmay ishay irstfay impressionay
ofay Ietropay Espicray anday admireday ishay abilityay inay ethay anipulationmay ofay usicalmay achinesmay. Osay atthay enwhay Ilarpay
Erneratay oldtay Aurelianoay atthay Emediosray adhay ecidedday onay arriagemay, ehay ouldcay eesay atthay ethay ewsnay ouldway
onlyay ivegay ishay arentspay oremay oubletray. Inviteday otay ethay arlorpay orfay aay ormalfay intervieway, Osejay Arcadioay
Uendiabay anday Ursulaay istenedlay onilystay otay eirthay on’ssay eclarationday. Enwhay ehay earnedlay ethay amenay ofay ethay
ianceefay, oweverhay, Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay ewgray edray ithway indignationay. ove“Lay isay aay isease,”day ehay
underedthay. ith“Way osay anymay ettypray anday ecentday irlsgay arounday, ethay onlyay ilingtay atthay occursay otay youay isay otay etgay
arriedmay otay ethay aughterday ofay ouray enemy.”ay Utbay Ursulaay agreeday ithway ethay oicechay. Eshay onfessedcay erhay
affectionay orfay ethay evensay Oscotemay isterssay, orfay eirthay eautybay, eirthay abilityay orfay orkway, eirthay odestymay, anday
eirthay oodgay annersmay, anday eshay elebratedcay erhay on’ssay udencepray. Onqueredcay ybay ishay ife’sway enthusiasmay,
Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay enthay aidlay ownday oneay onditioncay: Ebecaray, owhay asway ethay oneay ehay antedway, ouldway
arrymay Ietropay Espicray. Ursulaay ouldway aketay Amarantaay onay aay iptray otay ethay apitalcay ofay ethay ovincepray enwhay eshay
adhay imetay, osay atthay ontactcay ithway ifferentday eoplepay ouldway alleviateay erhay isappointmentday. Ebecaray otgay erhay
ealthhay ackbay ustjay asay oonsay asay eshay eardhay ofay ethay agreementay, anday eshay otewray erhay iancefay aay ubilantjay etterlay atthay
eshay ubmittedsay otay erhay arents’pay approvalay anday utpay intoay ethay ailmay ithoutway ethay useay ofay anyay intermediariesay.
Amarantaay etendedpray otay acceptay ethay ecisionday anday ittlelay ybay ittlelay eshay ecoveredray omfray erhay eversfay, utbay eshay
omisedpray erselfhay atthay Ebecaray ouldway arrymay onlyay overay erhay eadday odybay.

Ethay ollowingfay Aturdaysay Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay utpay onay ishay arkday uitsay, ishay elluloidcay ollarcay, anday ethay
eerskinday ootsbay atthay ehay adhay ornway orfay ethay irstfay imetay ethay ightnay ofay ethay artypay, anday entway otay askay orfay ethay
andhay ofay Emediosray Oscotemay. Ethay agistratemay anday ishay ifeway eceivedray imhay, easedplay anday orriedway atay ethay
amesay imetay, orfay eythay idday otnay owknay ethay easonray orfay ethay unexpecteday isitvay, anday enthay eythay oughtthay atthay ehay
asway onfusedcay aboutay ethay amenay ofay ethay intendeday idebray. Inay orderay otay emoveray ethay istakemay, ethay othermay
okeway Emediosray upay anday arriedcay erhay intoay ethay ivinglay oomray, illstay owsydray omfray eepslay. Eythay askeday erhay ifay itay
asway etmay atthay eshay adhay ecidedday otay etgay arriedmay, anday eshay answereday, imperingwhay, atthay eshay onlyay antedway
emthay otay etlay erhay eepslay. Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay, understandingay ethay istressday ofay ethay Oscotesmay, entway otay
earclay ingsthay upay ithway Aurelianoay. Enwhay ehay eturnedray, ethay Oscotesmay adhay utpay onay ormalfay othingclay, adhay
earrangedray ethay urniturefay anday utpay eshfray owersflay inay ethay asesvay, anday ereway aitingway inay ethay ompanycay ofay eirthay
olderay aughtersday. Overwhelmeday ybay ethay unpleasantnessay ofay ethay occasionay anday ethay othersomebay ardhay
ollarcay, Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay onfirmedcay ethay actfay atthay Emediosray, indeeday, asway ethay osenchay oneay. It“ay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


oesn’tday akemay ense,”say Onday Apolinaray Oscotemay aidsay ithway onsternationcay. e“Way avehay ixsay otheray aughtersday,
allay unmarrieday, anday atay anay ageay erewhay eythay eserveday itay, owhay ouldway ebay elightedday otay ebay ethay onorablehay ifeway
ofay aay entlemangay asay erioussay anday ard-workinghay asay youray onsay, anday Aurelitoay ayslay ishay eyesay eciselypray onay ethay
oneay owhay illstay etsway erhay ed.”bay Ishay ifeway, aay ell-preservedway omanway ithway afflicteday eyelidsay anday expressionay,
oldedscay ishay istakemay. Enwhay eythay inishedfay ethay uitfray unchpay, eythay illinglyway accepteday Aureliano’say
ecisionday. Exceptay atthay Enorasay Oscotemay eggedbay ethay avorfay ofay eakingspay otay Ursulaay aloneay. Intrigueday,
otestingpray atthay eythay ereway involvingay erhay inay en’smay affairsay, utbay eallyray eelingfay eepday emotionay, Ursulaay entway
otay isitvay erhay ethay extnay ayday. Aay alfhay ourhay aterlay eshay eturnedray ithway ethay ewsnay atthay Emediosray adhay otnay
eachedray ubertypay. Aurelianoay idday otnay onsidercay atthay aay erioussay arrierbay. Ehay adhay aitedway osay onglay atthay ehay
ouldcay aitway asay onglay asay asway ecessarynay untilay ishay idebray eachedray ethay ageay ofay onceptioncay.

Ethay ewfoundnay armonyhay asway interrupteday ybay ethay eathday ofay Elquiadesmay. Althoughay itay asway aay
oreseeablefay eventay, ethay ircumstancescay ereway otnay. Aay ewfay onthsmay afteray ishay eturnray, aay ocesspray ofay agingay adhay
akentay aceplay inay imhay atthay asway osay apidray anday iticalcray atthay oonsay ehay asway eatedtray asay oneay ofay osethay uselessay
eat-grandfathersgray owhay anderway aboutay ethay edroomsbay ikelay adesshay, aggingdray eirthay eetfay, ememberingray
etterbay imestay alouday, anday omwhay onay oneay othersbay aboutay oray emembersray eallyray untilay ethay orningmay eythay indfay
emthay eadday inay eirthay edbay. Atay irstfay Osejay Arcadioay Uendfabay elpedhay imhay inay ishay orkway, enthusiasticay overay ethay
oveltynay ofay ethay aguerreotypesday anday ethay edictionspray ofay Ostradamusnay. Utbay ittlelay ybay ittlelay ehay eganbay
abandoningay imhay otay ishay olitudesay, orfay ommunicationcay asway ecomingbay Increasinglyay ifficultday. Ehay asway
osinglay ishay ightsay anday ishay earinghay, ehay eemedsay otay onfusecay ethay eoplepay ehay asway eakingspay otay ithway othersay ehay
adhay ownknay inay emoteray epochsay ofay ankindmay, anday ehay ouldway answeray uestionsqay ithway aay omplexcay
odgepodgehay ofay anguageslay. Ehay ouldway alkway alongay opinggray inay ethay airay, althoughay ehay assedpay etweenbay
objectsay ithway anay inexplicableay uidityflay, asay ifay ebay ereway endoweday ithway omesay instinctay ofay irectionday asedbay onay
anay immediateay esciencepray. Oneay ayday ehay orgotfay otay utpay inay ishay alsefay eethtay, ichwhay atay ightnay ehay eftlay inay aay assglay
ofay aterway esidebay ishay edbay, anday ehay evernay utpay emthay inay againay. Enwhay Ursulaay undertookay ethay enlargementay ofay
ethay ousehay, eshay adhay emthay uildbay imhay aay ecialspay oomray extnay otay Aureliano’say orkshopway, arfay omfray ethay oisenay
anday ustlebay ofay ethay ousehay, ithway aay indowway oodedflay ithway ightlay anday aay ookcasebay erewhay eshay erselfhay utpay inay
orderay ethay ooksbay atthay ereway almostay estroyedday ybay ustday anday othsmay, ethay akyflay acksstay ofay aperpay overedcay
ithway indecipherableay ignssay, anday ethay assglay ithway ishay alsefay eethtay, erewhay omesay aquaticay antsplay ithway inytay
yelloway owersflay adhay akentay ootray. Ethay ewnay aceplay eemedsay otay easeplay Elquiadesmay, ecausebay ehay asway evernay
eensay anyay oremay, otnay evenay inay ethay iningday oomray, Ehay onlyay entway otay Aureliano’say orkshopway, erewhay ehay
ouldway endspay ourshay onay enday ibblingscray ishay enigmaticay iteraturelay onay ethay archmentspay atthay ehay adhay oughtbray
ithway imhay anday atthay eemedsay otay avehay eenbay ademay outay ofay omesay ydray aterialmay atthay umpledcray ikelay uffpay astepay.
Erethay ehay ateay ethay ealsmay atthay Isitacionvay oughtbray imhay icetway aay ayday, althoughay inay ethay astlay aysday ehay ostlay ishay
appetiteay anday edfay onlyay onay egetablesvay. Ehay oonsay acquireday ethay orlornfay ooklay atthay oneay eessay inay egetariansvay.
Ishay inskay ecamebay overedcay ithway aay inthay ossmay, imilarsay otay atthay ichwhay ourishedflay onay ethay antiqueay estvay atthay
ehay evernay ooktay offay, anday ishay eathbray exhaleday ethay odoray ofay aay eepingslay animalay. Aurelianoay endeday upay orget¬fay
ingtay aboutay imhay, absorbeday inay ethay ompositioncay ofay ishay oemspay, utbay onay oneay occasionay ehay oughtthay ehay
understooday omethingsay ofay atwhay Elquiadesmay asway ayingsay inay ishay opinggray onologuesmay, anday ehay aidpay
attentionay. Inay ealityray, ethay onlyay ilingtay atthay ouldcay ebay isolateday inay ethay ockyray aragraphspay asway ethay insistentay
ammeringhay onay ethay ordway equinoxay, equinoxay, equinoxay  anday ethay amenay ofay Alexanderay onvay Umboldthay.
Arcadioay otgay aay ittlelay oserclay otay imhay enwhay ehay eganbay otay elphay Aurelianoay inay ishay ilverworksay. Elquiadesmay
answereday atthay effortay atay ommunicationcay atay imestay ybay ivinggay orthfay ithway asesphray inay Anishspay atthay adhay eryvay
ittlelay otay oday ithway ealityray. Oneay afternoonay, oweverhay, ehay eemedsay otay ebay illuminateday ybay aay uddensay emotionay.
Yearsay aterlay, acingfay ethay iringfay uadsqay, Arcadioay ouldway ememberray ethay emblingtray ithway ichwhay Elquiadesmay
ademay imhay istenlay otay everalsay agespay ofay ishay impenetrableay itingwray, ichwhay ofay oursecay ehay idday otnay understanday,
utbay ichwhay enwhay eadray alouday ereway ikelay encyclicalsay eingbay antedchay. Enthay ehay iledsmay orfay ethay irstfay imetay inay aay
onglay ilewhay anday aidsay inay Anishspay: en“Whay Iay ieday, urnbay ercurymay inay ymay oomray orfay eethray ays.”day Arcadioay oldtay
atthay otay Osejay Arcadioay Uendfabay anday ethay atterlay iedtray otay etgay oremay explicitay informationay, utbay ehay eceivedray






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


onlyay oneay answeray: I“ay avehay oundfay immortality.”ay Enwhay Elquiades’may eathingbray eganbay otay ellsmay, Arcadioay
ooktay imhay otay athebay inay ethay iverray onay Ursdaythay orningsmay. Ehay eemedsay otay etgay etterbay. Ehay ouldway undressay
anday etgay intoay ethay aterway ithway ethay oysbay, anday ishay ysteriousmay ensesay ofay orientationay ouldway alloway imhay otay
avoiday ethay eepday anday angerousday otsspay. e“Way omecay omfray ethay ater,”way ehay aidsay onay aay ertaincay occasionay.
Uchmay imetay assedpay inay atthay ayway ithoutway anyone’say eeingsay imhay inay ethay ousehay exceptay onay ethay ightnay enwhay
ehay ademay aay atheticpay effortay otay ixfay ethay ianolapay, anday enwhay ehay ouldway ogay otay ethay iverray ithway Arcadioay,
arryingcay underay ishay armay aay ourdgay anday aay arbay ofay almpay oilay oapsay appedwray inay aay oweltay. Oneay Ursdaythay eforebay
eythay alledcay imhay otay ogay otay ethay iverray, Aurelianoay eardhay imhay aysay: I“ay avehay iedday ofay everfay onay ethay unesday ofay
Ingapore.”say Atthay ayday ehay entway intoay ethay aterway atay aay adbay otspay anday eythay idday otnay indfay imhay untilay ethay
ollowingfay ayday, aay ewfay ilesmay ownstreamday, ashedway upay onay aay ightbray endbay inay ethay iverray anday ithway aay olitarysay
ulturevay ittingsay onay ishay omachstay. Overay ethay andalizedscay otestspray ofay Ursulaay, owhay eptway ithway oremay iefgray
anthay eshay adhay adhay orfay erhay ownay atherfay, Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay asway opposeday otay eirthay uryingbay imhay. e“Hay
isay immortal,”ay ehay aidsay, and“ay ehay imselfhay evealedray ethay ormulafay ofay ishay esurrection.”ray Ehay oughtbray outay ethay
orgottenfay aterway ipepay anday utpay aay ettlekay ofay ercurymay otay oilbay extnay otay ethay odybay, ichwhay ittlelay ybay ittlelay asway
illingfay ithway ueblay ubblesbay. Onday Apolinaray Oscotemay enturedvay otay emindray imhay atthay anay unburieday owneddray
anmay asway aay angerday otay ublicpay ealthhay. one“Nay ofay atthay, ecausebay e’shay alive,”ay asway ethay answeray ofay Osejay
Arcadioay Uendiabay, owhay inishedfay ethay eventy-twosay ourshay ithway ethay ercurialmay incenseay asay ethay odybay asway
alreadyay eginningbay otay urstbay ithway aay ividlay uorescenceflay, ethay oftsay istleswhay ofay ichwhay impregnateday ethay
ousehay ithway aay estilentialpay aporvay. Onlyay enthay idday ehay ermitpay emthay otay urybay imhay, otnay inay anyay ordinaryay ayway,
utbay ithway ethay onorshay eservedray orfay Acondo’smay eatestgray enefactorbay. Itay asway ethay irstfay urialbay anday ethay estbay-
attendeday oneay atthay asway everay eensay inay ethay owntay, onlyay urpassedsay, aay enturycay aterlay, ybay Igbay Ama’smay uneralfay
arnivalcay. Eythay uriedbay imhay inay aay avegray ugday inay ethay entercay ofay ethay otplay estinedday orfay ethay emeterycay, ithway aay
onestay onay ichwhay eythay otewray ethay onlyay ingthay eythay ewknay aboutay imhay: ELQUIADESmay. Eythay avegay imhay ishay
inenay ightsnay ofay akeway. Inay ethay umulttay atthay atheredgay inay ethay ourtyardcay otay inkdray offeecay, elltay okesjay, anday ayplay
ardscay. Amarantaay oundfay aay ancechay otay onfesscay erhay ovelay otay Ietropay Espicray, owhay aay ewfay eeksway eforebay adhay
ormalizedfay ishay omisepray otay Ebecaray anday adhay etsay upay aay orestay orfay usicalmay instrumentsay anday echanicalmay
oystay inay ethay amesay ectionsay erewhay ethay Arabsay adhay ingeredlay inay otheray imestay appingsway ickknacksknay orfay
acawsmay, anday ichwhay ethay eoplepay alledcay ethay Eetstray ofay ethay Urkstay. Ethay Italianay, osewhay eadhay overedcay ithway
atentpay eatherlay urlscay arouseday inay omenway anay irrepressibleay eednay otay ighsay, ealtday ithway Amarantaay asay ithway aay
apriciouscay ittlelay irlgay owhay asway otnay orthway akingtay eriouslysay.

I“ay avehay aay youngeray other,”bray ehay oldtay erhay. e’s“Hay omingcay otay elphay emay inay ethay ore.”stay

Amarantaay eltfay umiliatedhay anday oldtay Ietropay Espicray ithway aay irulentvay angeray atthay eshay asway eparedpray otay
opstay erhay ister’ssay eddingway evenay ifay erhay ownay eadday odybay adhay otay ielay acrossay ethay oorday. Ethay Italianay asway osay
impresseday ybay ethay amaticsdray ofay ethay eatthray atthay ehay ouldcay otnay esistray ethay emptationtay otay entionmay itay otay
Ebecaray. Atthay asway owhay Amaranta’say iptray, alwaysay utpay offay ybay Ursula’say orkway, asway arrangeday inay esslay anthay aay
eekway. Amarantaay utpay upay onay esistanceray, utbay enwhay eshay issedkay Ebecaray ood-byegay eshay isperedwhay inay erhay
earay:

on’t“Day etgay youray opeshay upay. Evenay ifay eythay endsay emay otay ethay endsay ofay ethay earthay I’llay indfay omesay ayway ofay
oppingstay youay omfray ettinggay arriedmay, evenay ifay Iay avehay otay illkay you.”ay

Ithway ethay absenceay ofay Ursulaay, ithway ethay invisibleay esencepray ofay Elquiadesmay, owhay ontinuedcay ishay ealthystay
ufflingshay oughthray ethay oomsray, ethay ousehay eemedsay enormousay anday emptyay. Ebecaray ooktay argechay ofay
omesticday orderay, ilewhay ethay Indianay omanway ooktay arecay ofay ethay akerybay. Atay uskday, enwhay Ietropay Espicray ouldway
arriveay, ecededpray ybay aay oolcay eathbray ofay avenderlay anday alwaysay ingingbray aay oytay asay aay iftgay, ishay ianceefay ouldway
eceiveray ethay isitorvay inay ethay ainmay arlorpay ithway oorsday anday indowsway openay otay ebay afesay omfray anyay uspicionsay. Itay
asway anay unnecessaryay ecautionpray, orfay ethay Italianay adhay ownshay imselfhay otay ebay osay espectfulray atthay ehay idday otnay
evenay ouchtay ethay andhay ofay ethay omanway owhay asway oinggay otay ebay ishay ifeway ithinway ethay yearay. Osethay isitsvay ereway
illingfay ethay ousehay ithway emarkableray oystay. Echanicalmay allerinasbay, usicmay oxesbay, acrobaticay onkeysmay,
ottingtray orseshay, ownsclay owhay ayedplay ethay ambourinetay: ethay ichray anday artlingstay echanicalmay aunafay atthay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Ietropay Espicray oughtbray issipatedday Osejay Arcadioay Uendia’sbay afflictionay overay ethay eathday ofay Elquiadesmay anday
arriedcay imhay ackbay otay ishay olday aysday asay anay alchemistay. Ehay ivedlay atay atthay imetay inay aay aradisepay ofay isemboweledday
animalsay, ofay echanismsmay atthay adhay eenbay akentay apartay inay anay attemptay otay erfectpay emthay ithway aay ystemsay ofay
erpetualpay otionmay asedbay uponay ethay inciplespray ofay ethay endulumpay. Aurelianoay, orfay ishay artpay, adhay eglectednay
ethay orkshopway inay orderay otay eachtay ittlelay Emediosray otay eadray anday itewray. Atay irstfay ethay ildchay eferredpray erhay
ollsday otay ethay anmay owhay ouldway omecay everyay afternoonay anday owhay asway esponsibleray orfay erhay eingbay eparatedsay
omfray erhay oystay inay orderay otay ebay athedbay anday esseddray anday eatedsay inay ethay arlorpay otay eceiveray ethay isitorvay. Utbay
Aureliano’say atiencepay anday evotionday inallyfay onway erhay overay, upay otay ethay ointpay erewhay eshay ouldway endspay
anymay ourshay ithway imhay udyingstay ethay eaningmay ofay ethay etterslay anday etchingskay inay aay otebooknay ithway oloredcay
encilspay ittlelay ouseshay ithway owscay inay ethay orralcay anday oundray unssay ithway yelloway aysray atthay idhay ehindbay ethay illshay.

Onlyay Ebecaray asway unhappyay, ecausebay ofay Amaranta’say eatthray. Eshay ewknay erhay ister’ssay aracterchay, ethay
aughtinesshay ofay erhay iritspay, anday eshay asway ightenedfray ybay ethay irulencevay ofay erhay angeray. Eshay ouldway endspay
olewhay ourshay uckingsay erhay ingerfay inay ethay athroombay, oldinghay erselfhay ackbay ithway anay exhaustingay ironay illway osay
asay otnay otay eatay earthay. Inay earchsay ofay omesay eliefray orfay erhay uncertaintyay, eshay alledcay Ilarpay Erneratay otay eadray erhay
uturefay. Afteray aay ingstray ofay onventionalcay agariesvay, Ilarpay Erneratay edictedpray:

You“ay illway otnay ebay appyhay asay onglay asay youray arentspay emainray unburied.”ay

Ebecaray udderedshay. Asay inay ethay emorymay ofay aay eamdray eshay awsay erselfhay enteringay ethay ousehay asay aay eryvay
allsmay irlgay, ithway ethay unktray anday ethay ittlelay ockerray, anday aay agbay osewhay ontentscay eshay adhay evernay ownknay. Eshay
ememberedray aay aldbay entlemangay esseddray inay inenlay anday ithway ishay ollarcay osedclay ybay aay oldgay uttonbay, owhay adhay
othingnay otay oday ithway ethay ingkay ofay eartshay. Eshay ememberedray aay eryvay youngay anday eautifulbay omanway ithway
armway anday erfumedpay andshay, owhay adhay othingnay inay ommoncay ithway ethay ackjay ofay iamondsday anday Inisay
eumaticrhay andshay, anday owhay useday otay utpay owersflay inay erhay airhay anday aketay erhay outay alkingway inay ethay afternoonay
oughthray aay owntay ithway eengray eetsstray.

I“ay on’tday understand,”ay eshay aidsay.

Ilarpay Erneratay eemedsay isconcertedday:

I“ay on’tday eitheray, utbay at’sthay atwhay ethay ardscay ay.”say

Ebecaray asway osay eoccupiedpray ithway ethay enigmaay atthay eshay oldtay itay otay Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay, anday ehay
oldedscay erhay orfay elievingbay inay ethay edictionspray ofay ethay ardscay, utbay ehay undertookay ethay ilentsay asktay ofay
earchingsay osetsclay anday unkstray, ovingmay urniturefay anday urningtay overay edsbay anday oorboardsflay ookinglay orfay
ethay agbay ofay onesbay. Ehay ememberedray atthay ehay adhay otnay eensay itay incesay ethay imetay ofay ethay ebuildingray. Ehay
ecretlysay ummonedsay ethay asonsmay anday oneay ofay emthay evealedray atthay ehay adhay alledway upay ethay agbay inay omesay
edroombay ecausebay itay otheredbay imhay inay ishay orkway. Afteray everalsay aysday ofay isteninglay, ithway eirthay earsay againstay
ethay allsway, eythay erceivedpay ethay eepday oc-clocclay. Eythay enetratedpay ethay allway anday erethay ereway ethay onesbay inay ethay
intactay agbay. Eythay uriedbay itay ethay amesay ayday inay aay avegray ithoutway aay onestay extnay otay atthay ofay Elquiadesmay, anday
Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay eturnedray omehay eefray ofay aay urdenbay atthay orfay aay omentmay adhay eighedway onay ishay
onsciencecay asay uchmay asay ethay emorymay ofay Udenciopray Aguilaray. Enwhay ehay entway oughthray ethay itchenkay ehay
issedkay Ebecaray onay ethay oreheadfay.

et“Gay osethay adbay oughtsthay outay ofay youray ead,”hay ehay oldtay erhay. You’re“ay oinggay otay ebay appy.”hay

Ethay iendshipfray ithway Ebecaray openeday upay otay Ilarpay Erneratay ethay oorsday ofay ethay ousehay, osedclay ybay Ursulaay
incesay ethay irthbay ofay Arcadioay. Eshay ouldway arriveay atay anyay ourhay ofay ethay ayday, ikelay aay ockflay ofay oatsgay, anday ouldway
unleashay erhay everishfay energyay inay ethay ardesthay askstay. Ometimessay eshay ouldway ogay intoay ethay orkshopway anday
elphay Arcadioay ensitizesay ethay aguerreotypeday atesplay ithway anay efficiencyay anday aay endernesstay atthay endeday upay ybay
onfusingcay imhay. Atthay omanway otheredbay imhay. Ethay antay ofay erhay inskay, erhay ellsmay ofay okesmay, ethay isorderday ofay
erhay aughterlay inay ethay arkroomday istractedday ishay attentionay anday ademay imhay umpbay intoay ingsthay.

Onay aay ertaincay occasionay Aurelianoay asway erethay orkingway onay ishay ilversay, anday Ilarpay Erneratay eanedlay overay
ethay abletay otay admireay ishay aboriouslay atiencepay. Uddenlysay itay appenedhay. Aurelianoay ademay uresay atthay Arcadioay
asway inay ethay arkroomday eforebay aisingray ishay eyesay anday eetingmay osethay ofay Ilarpay Erneratay, osewhay oughtthay asway
erfectlypay isiblevay, asay ifay exposeday otay ethay ightlay ofay oonnay.






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


ell,”“Way Aurelianoay aidsay. ell“Tay emay atwhay itay is.”ay

Ilarpay Erneratay itbay erhay ipslay ithway aay adsay ilesmay.

at“Thay you’day ebay oodgay inay aay ar,”way eshay aidsay. ere“Whay youay utpay youray eyeay, youay utpay youray ullet.”bay

Aurelianoay elaxedray ithway ethay oofpray ofay ethay omenay. Ehay entway ackbay otay oncentratecay onay ishay orkway asay ifay
othingnay adhay appenedhay, anday ishay oicevay ooktay onay aay estfulray engthstray.

I“ay illway ecognizeray im,”hay ehay aidsay. e’ll“Hay earbay ymay ame.”nay

Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay inallyfay otgay atwhay ehay asway ookinglay orfay: ehay onnectedcay ethay echanismmay ofay ethay
ockclay otay aay echanicalmay allerinabay, anday ethay oytay ancedday uninterruptedlyay otay ethay ythmrhay ofay erhay ownay usicmay
orfay eethray aysday. Atthay iscoveryday exciteday imhay uchmay oremay anthay anyay ofay ishay otheray arebrainedhay
undertakingsay. Ehay oppedstay eatingay. Ehay oppedstay eepingslay. Onlyay ethay igilancevay anday arecay ofay Ebecaray eptkay
imhay omfray eingbay aggeddray offay ybay ishay imaginationay intoay aay atestay ofay erpetualpay eliriumday omfray ichwhay ehay
ouldway otnay ecoverray. Ehay ouldway endspay ethay ightsnay alkingway arounday ethay oomray inkingthay alouday, earchingsay
orfay aay ayway otay applyay ethay inciplespray ofay ethay endulumpay otay oxcartsay, otay arrowshay, otay everythingay atthay asway
usefulay enwhay utpay intoay otionmay. Ethay everfay ofay insomniaay atiguedfay imhay osay uchmay atthay oneay awnday ehay ouldcay
otnay ecognizeray ethay olday anmay ithway itewhay airhay anday uncertainay esturesgay owhay amecay intoay ishay edroombay. Itay
asway Udenciopray Aguilaray. Enwhay ehay inallyfay identifieday imhay, artledstay atthay ethay eadday alsoay ageday, Osejay Arcadioay
Uendiabay eltfay imselfhay akenshay ybay ostalgianay. udencio,”“Pray ehay exclaimeday. You’ve“ay omecay omfray aay onglay ayway
off!”ay Afteray anymay yearsay ofay eathday ethay yearningay orfay ethay ivinglay asway osay intenseay, ethay eednay orfay ompanycay osay
essingpray, osay errifyingtay ethay eatnessnay ofay atthay otheray eathday ichwhay existsay ithinway eathday, atthay Enciopmday
Aguilaray adhay endeday upay ovinglay ishay orstway enemyay. Ehay adhay entspay aay eatgray ealday ofay imetay ookinglay orfay imhay. Ehay
askeday ethay eadday omfray Iohacharay aboutay imhay, ethay eadday owhay amecay omfray ethay Uparay Alleyvay, osethay owhay
amecay omfray ethay ampsway, anday onay oneay ouldcay elltay imhay ecausebay Acondomay asway aay owntay atthay asway unknownay
otay ethay eadday untilay Elqufadesmay arriveday anday arkedmay itay ithway aay allsmay ackblay otday onay ethay otleymay apsmay ofay
eathday. Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay onversedcay ithway Udenciopray Aguilaray untilay awnday. Aay ewfay ourshay aterlay, ornway
outay ybay ethay igilvay, ehay entway intoay Aureliano’say orkshopway anday askeday imhay: at“Whay ayday isay oday?”tay Aurelianoay
oldtay imhay atthay itay asway Uesdaytay. I“ay asway inkingthay ethay amesay ing,”thay Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay aidsay, ut“bay
uddenlysay Iay ealizedray atthay it’say illstay Ondaymay, ikelay yesterdayay. Ooklay atay ethay yskay, ooklay atay ethay allsway, ooklay atay ethay
egoniasbay. Odaytay isay Ondaymay oo.”tay Useday otay ishay aniasmay, Aurelianoay aidpay onay attentionay otay imhay. Onay ethay
extnay ayday, Ednesdayway, Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay entway ackbay otay ethay orkshopway. is“Thay isay aay isaster,”day ehay aidsay.
ook“Lay atay ethay airay, istenlay otay ethay uzzingbay ofay ethay unsay, ethay amesay asay yesterdayay anday ethay ayday eforebay. Odaytay isay
Ondaymay oo.”tay Atthay ightnay Ietropay Espicray oundfay imhay onay ethay orchpay, eepingway orfay Udenciopray Aguilaray, orfay
Elqufadesmay, orfay Ebeca’sray arentspay, orfay ishay othermay anday atherfay, orfay allay ofay osethay ehay ouldcay ememberray anday
owhay ereway ownay aloneay inay eathday. Ehay avegay imhay aay echanicalmay earbay atthay alkedway onay itsay indhay egslay onay aay
ightropetay, utbay ehay ouldcay otnay istractday imhay omfray ishay obsessionay. Ehay askeday imhay atwhay adhay appenedhay otay
ethay ojectpray ehay adhay explaineday otay imhay aay ewfay aysday eforebay aboutay ethay ossibilitypay ofay uildingbay aay endulumpay
achinemay atthay ouldway elphay enmay otay yflay anday ehay answereday atthay itay asway impossibleay ecausebay aay endulumpay
ouldcay iftlay anythingay intoay ethay airay utbay itay ouldcay otnay iftlay itselfay. Onay Ursdaythay ehay appeareday inay ethay orkshopway
againay ithway ethay ainfulpay ooklay ofay owedplay oundgray. e“Thay imetay achinemay ashay oken,”bray ehay almostay obbedsay,
and“ay Ursulaay anday Amarantaay osay arfay away!”ay Aurelianoay oldedscay imhay ikelay aay ildchay anday ehay adopteday aay
ontritecay airay. Ehay entspay ixsay ourshay examiningay ingsthay, yingtray otay indfay aay ifferenceday omfray eirthay appearanceay
onay ethay eviouspray ayday inay ethay opehay ofay iscoveringday inay emthay omesay angechay atthay ouldway evealray ethay assagepay
ofay imetay. Ehay entspay ethay olewhay ightnay inay edbay ithway ishay eyesay openay, allingcay otay Udenciopray Aguilaray, otay
Elquiadesmay, otay allay ethay eadday, osay atthay eythay ouldway areshay ishay istressday. Utbay onay oneay amecay. Onay Idayfray,
eforebay anyoneay aroseay, ehay atchedway ethay appearanceay ofay aturenay againay untilay ehay idday otnay avehay ethay ightestslay
oubtday utbay atthay itay asway Ondaymay. Enthay ehay abbedgray ethay arbay omfray aay oorday anday ithway ethay avagesay iolencevay ofay
ishay uncommonay engthstray ehay ashedsmay otay ustday ethay equipmentay inay ethay alchemyay aboratorylay, ethay
aguerreotypeday oomray, ethay ilversay orkshopway, outingshay ikelay aay anmay ossessedpay inay omesay igh-soundinghay anday
uentflay utbay ompletelycay incomprehensibleay anguagelay. Ehay asway aboutay otay inishfay offay ethay estray ofay ethay ousehay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


enwhay Aurelianoay askeday ethay eighborsnay orfay elphay. Entay enmay ereway eedednay otay etgay imhay ownday, ourteenfay otay
ietay imhay upay, entytway otay agdray imhay otay ethay estnutchay eetray inay ethay ourtyardcay, erewhay eythay eftlay imhay iedtay upay,
arkingbay inay ethay angestray anguagelay anday ivinggay offay aay eengray othfray atay ethay outhmay. Enwhay Ursulaay anday
Amarantaay eturnedray ehay asway illstay iedtay otay ethay tmnkay ofay ethay estnutchay eetray ybay ishay andshay anday eetfay, oakedsay
ithway ainray anday inay aay atestay ofay otaltay innocenceay. Eythay okespay otay imhay anday ehay ookedlay atay emthay ithoutway
ecognizingray emthay, ayingsay ingsthay eythay idday otnay understanday. Ursulaay untieday ishay istswray anday anklesay, acer¬lay
ateday ybay ethay essurepray ofay ethay operay, anday eftlay imhay iedtay onlyay ybay ethay aistway. Aterlay onay eythay uiltbay imhay aay eltershay
ofay almpay andiesbray otay otectpray imhay omfray ethay unsay anday ethay ainray.






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Apterchay 


AURELIANOay UENDIAbay anday Emediosray Oscotemay ereway arriedmay oneay Undaysay inay Archmay eforebay ethay altaray
Atherfay Icanornay Eynaray adhay etsay upay inay ethay arlorpay. Itay asway ethay ulminationcay ofay ourfay eeksway ofay ocksshay inay ethay
Oscotemay ouseholdhay ecausebay ittlelay Emediosray adhay eachedray ubertypay eforebay ettinggay overay ethay abitshay ofay
ildhoodchay. Inay itespay ofay ethay actfay atthay erhay othermay adhay aughttay erhay aboutay ethay angeschay ofay adolescenceay, oneay
Ebruaryfay afternoonay eshay urstbay outingshay intoay ethay ivinglay oomray, erewhay erhay isterssay ereway attingchay ithway
Aurelianoay, anday owedshay emthay erhay antiespay, earedsmay ithway aay ocolate-coloredchay astepay. Aay onthmay orfay ethay
eddingway asway agreeday uponay. Erethay asway arelybay enoughay imetay otay eachtay erhay owhay otay ashway erselfhay, etgay
esseddray ybay erselfhay, anday understanday ethay undamentalfay usinessbay ofay aay omehay. Eythay ademay erhay urinateay overay
othay icksbray inay orderay otay urecay erhay ofay ethay abithay ofay ettingway erhay edbay. Itay ooktay aay oodgay ealday ofay orkway otay
onvincecay erhay ofay ethay inviolabilityay ofay ethay aritalmay ecretsay, orfay Emediosray asway osay onfusedcay anday atay ethay amesay
imetay osay amazeday atay ethay evelationray atthay eshay antedway otay alktay otay everybodyay aboutay ethay etailsday ofay ethay
eddingway ightnay. Itay asway aay atiguingfay effortay, utbay onay ethay ateday etsay orfay ethay eremonycay ethay ildchay asway asay adeptay
inay ethay aysway ofay ethay orldway asay anyay ofay erhay isterssay. Onday Apolinaray Oscotemay escorteday erhay ybay ethay armay ownday
ethay eetstray atthay asway ecoratedday ithway owersflay anday eathswray amidstay ethay explosionay ofay ocketsray anday ethay
usicmay ofay everalsay andsbay, anday eshay avedway ithway erhay andhay anday avegay erhay anksthay ithway aay ilesmay otay osethay owhay
ishedway erhay oodgay ucklay omfray ethay indowsway. Aurelianoay, esseddray inay ackblay, earingway ethay amesay atentpay
eatherlay ootsbay ithway etalmay astenersfay atthay ehay ouldway avehay onay aay ewfay yearsay aterlay asay ehay acedfay ethay iringfay
uadsqay, adhay anay intenseay alenesspay anday aay ardhay umplay inay ishay oatthray enwhay ehay etmay ethay idebray atay ethay oorday ofay
ethay ousehay anday edlay erhay otay ethay altaray. Eshay ehavedbay asay aturallynay, ithway uchsay iscretionday, atthay eshay idday otnay
oselay erhay omposurecay, otnay evenay enwhay Aurelianoay oppeddray ethay ingray asay ehay iedtray otay utpay itay onay erhay ingerfay. Inay
ethay idstmay ofay ethay. urmursmay anday onfusioncay ofay ethay uestsgay, eshay eptkay erhay armay ithway ethay ingerlessfay acelay
oveglay eldhay upay anday emainedray ikelay atthay ithway erhay ingray ingerfay eadyray untilay ethay idegroombray anagedmay otay
opstay ethay ingray ithway ishay ootfay eforebay itay olledray otay ethay oorday, anday amecay ackbay ushingblay otay ethay altaray. Erhay
othermay anday isterssay ufferedsay osay uchmay omfray ethay earfay atthay ethay ildchay ouldway oday omethingsay ongwray uringday
ethay eremonycay atthay inay ethay enday eythay ereway ethay onesay owhay ommittedcay ethay impertinenceay ofay ickingpay erhay upay
otay isskay erhay. Omfray atthay ayday onay ethay ensesay ofay esponsibilityray, ethay aturalnay acegray, ethay almcay ontrolcay atthay
Emediosray ouldway avehay inay ethay acefay ofay adverseay ircumstancescay asway evealedray. Itay asway eshay owhay, onay erhay
ownay initiativeay, utpay asideay ethay argestlay iecepay atthay eshay adhay utcay omfray ethay eddingway akecay anday ooktay itay onay aay
ateplay ithway aay orkfay otay Osejay Arcadioay Uendfabay. Iedtay otay ethay tmnkay ofay ethay estnutchay eetray, uddledhay onay aay
oodenway oolstay underneathay ethay almpay eltershay, ethay enormousay olday anmay, iscoloredday ybay ethay unsay anday ainray,
ademay aay aguevay ilesmay ofay atitudegray anday atay ethay iecepay ofay akecay ithway ishay ingersfay, umblingmay anay unintelligibleay
almpsay. Ethay onlyay unhappyay ersonpay inay atthay oisynay elebrationcay, ichwhay astedlay untilay awnday onay Ondaymay, asway
Ebecaray Uendfabay. Itay asway erhay ownay ustratedfray artypay. Ybay anay arrangementay ofay Ursula’say, erhay arriagemay asway otay
ebay elebratedcay onay ethay amesay ayday, utbay atthay Idayfray Ietropay Espicray eceivedray aay etterlay ithway ethay ewsnay ofay ishay
other’smay imminentay eathday. Ethay eddingway asway ostponedpay. Ietropay Espicray eftlay orfay ethay apitalcay ofay ethay
ovincepray anay ourhay afteray eceivingray ethay etterlay, anday onay ethay oadray ehay issedmay ishay othermay, owhay arriveday
unctuallypay Aturdaysay ightnay anday atay Aureliano’say eddingway angsay ethay adsay ariaay atthay eshay adhay eparedpray orfay ethay
eddingway ofay erhay onsay. Ietropay Espicray eturnedray onay Undaysay idnightmay otay eepsway upay ethay ashesay ofay ethay artypay,
afteray avinghay ornway outay ivefay orseshay onay ethay oadray inay anay attemptay otay ebay inay imetay orfay ishay eddingway. Itay asway
evernay iscoveredday owhay otewray ethay etterlay. Ormentedtay ybay Ursulaay, Amarantaay eptway ithway indignationay anday
oresway erhay innocenceay inay ontfray ofay ethay altaray, ichwhay ethay arpenterscay adhay otnay inishedfay ismantlingday.

Atherfay Icanornay Eyna—whomray Onday Apolinaray Oscotemay adhay oughtbray omfray ethay ampsway otay officiateay
atay ethay edding—wasway anay olday anmay ardenedhay ybay ethay ingratitudeay ofay ishay inistrymay. Ishay inskay asway adsay, ithway
ethay onesbay almostay exposeday, anday ehay adhay aay onouncedpray oundray omachstay anday ethay expressionay ofay anay olday






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


angelay, ichwhay amecay oremay omfray, implicitysay anthay omfray oodnessgay. Ehay adhay annedplay otay eturnray otay ishay
ariahpay afteray ethay eddingway, utbay ehay asway appalleday atay ethay ardnesshay ofay ethay inhabitantsay ofay Acondomay, owhay
ereway osperingpray inay ethay idstmay ofay andalscay, ubjectsay otay ethay aturalnay awlay, ithoutway aptizingbay eirthay ildrenchay
oray anctifyingsay eirthay estivalsfay. Inkingthay atthay onay andlay eedednay ethay eedsay ofay Odgay osay uchmay, ehay ecidedday otay
aystay onay orfay anotheray eekway otay Istianizechray othbay ircumcisedcay anday entilegay, egalizelay oncubinagecay, anday ivegay
ethay acramentssay otay ethay yingday. Utbay onay oneay aidpay anyay attentionay otay imhay. Eythay ouldway answeray imhay atthay eythay
adhay eenbay anymay yearsay ithoutway aay iestpray, arrangingay ethay usinessbay ofay eirthay oulssay irectlyday ithway Odgay, anday
atthay eythay adhay ostlay ethay evilay ofay originalay insay. Iredtay ofay eachingpray inay ethay openay, Atherfay Icanornay ecidedday otay
undertakeay ethay uildingbay ofay aay urchchay, ethay argestlay inay ethay orldway, ithway ife-sizelay aintssay anday ained-glassstay
indowsway onay ethay idessay, osay atthay eoplepay ouldway omecay omfray Omeray otay onorhay Odgay inay ethay entercay ofay
impietyay. Ehay entway everywhereay eggingbay almsay ithway aay oppercay ishday. Eythay avegay imhay aay argelay amountay, utbay
ehay antedway oremay, ecausebay ethay urchchay adhay otay avehay aay ellbay atthay ouldway aiseray ethay owneddray upay otay ethay
urfacesay ofay ethay aterway. Ehay eadedplay osay uchmay atthay ehay ostlay ishay oicevay. Ishay onesbay eganbay otay illfay ithway oundssay.
Oneay Aturdaysay, otnay evenay avinghay ollectedcay ethay icepray ofay ethay oorsday, ehay ellfay intoay aay esperateday onfusioncay.
Ehay improviseday anay altaray inay ethay uaresqay anday onay Undaysay ehay entway oughthray ethay owntay ithway aay allsmay ellbay, asay
inay ethay aysday ofay insomniaay, allingcay eoplepay otay anay open-airay assmay. Anymay entway outay ofay uriositycay. Othersay omfray
ostalgianay. Othersay osay atthay Odgay ouldway otnay aketay ethay isdainday orfay Ishay intermediaryay asay aay ersonalpay insultay.
Osay atthay atay eightay inay ethay orningmay alfhay ethay owntay asway inay ethay uaresqay, erewhay Atherfay Icanornay antedchay ethay
ospelsgay inay aay oicevay atthay adhay eenbay aceratedlay ybay ishay eadingplay. Atay ethay enday, enwhay ethay ongregationcay eganbay
otay eakbray upay, ehay aisedray ishay armsay ignalingsay orfay attentionay.

ust“Jay aay oment,”may ehay aidsay. ow“Nay eway allshay itnessway anay undeniableay oofpray ofay ethay infiniteay owerpay ofay
Od.”gay

Ethay oybay owhay adhay elpedhay imhay ithway ethay assmay oughtbray imhay aay upcay ofay ickthay anday eamingstay ocolatechay,
ichwhay ehay ankdray ithoutway ausingpay otay eathebray. Enthay ehay ipedway ishay ipslay ithway aay andkerchiefhay atthay ehay ewdray
omfray ishay eeveslay, extendeday ishay armsay, anday osedclay ishay eyesay. Ereuponthay Atherfay Icanornay oseray ixsay inchesay
aboveay ethay evellay ofay ethay oundgray. Itay asway aay onvincingcay easuremay. Ehay entway amongay ethay ouseshay orfay everalsay
aysday epeatingray ethay emonstrationday ofay evitationlay ybay eansmay ofay ocolatechay ilewhay ethay acolyteay ollectedcay osay
uchmay oneymay inay aay agbay atthay inay esslay anthay aay onthmay ehay eganbay ethay onstructioncay ofay ethay urchchay. Onay oneay
oubtedday ethay ivineday originay ofay ethay emonstrationday exceptay Osejay Arcadioay Uendfabay, owhay ithoutway angingchay
expressionay atchedway ethay ooptray ofay eoplepay owhay atheredgay arounday ethay estnutchay eetray oneay orningmay otay
itnessway ethay evelationray onceay oremay. Ehay erelymay etchedstray onay ishay oolstay aay ittlelay anday uggedshray ishay
ouldersshay enwhay Atherfay Icanornay eganbay otay iseray upay omfray ethay oundgray alongay ithway ethay airchay ehay asway ittingsay
onay.

oc“Hay estay implicissimussay.  Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay aidsay. omo“Hay isteay atumstay uartumqay ateriaemay invent.”ay

Atherfay Icanornay aisedray ishay andshay anday ethay ourfay egslay ofay ethay airchay allay andedlay onay ethay oundgray atay ethay
amesay imetay.  Egonay  ehay aidsay. actum“Fay ochay existentiamay Eiday ohatpray inesay ubio.”day

Usthay itay asway iscoveredday atthay Osejay Arcadioay Uendfa’sbay evilishday argonjay asway Atinlay. Atherfay Icanornay
ooktay advantageay ofay ethay ircumstancecay ofay ishay eingbay ethay onlyay ersonpay owhay adhay eenbay ableay otay ommunicatecay
ithway imhay otay ytray otay injectay ethay aithfay intoay ishay istedtway indmay. Everyay afternoonay ehay ouldway itsay ybay ethay
estnutchay eetray eachingpray inay Atinlay, utbay Osejay Arcadioay Uendfabay insisteday onay ejectingray etoricalrhay ickstray anday
ethay ansmutationtray ofay ocolatechay, anday ehay emandedday ethay aguerreotypeday ofay Odgay asay ethay onlyay oofpray.
Atherfay Icanornay enthay oughtbray imhay edalsmay anday icturespay anday evenay aay eproductionray ofay ethay Eronicavay, utbay
Osejay Arcadioay Uendfabay ejectedray emthay asay artisticay objectsay ithoutway anyay ientificscay asisbay. Ehay asway osay
