ubbornstay atthay Atherfay Icanornay avegay upay ishay attemptsay atay evangelizationay anday ontinuedcay isitingvay imhay outay
ofay umanitarianhay eelingsfay. Utbay enthay itay asway Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay owhay ooktay ethay eadlay anday iedtray otay eakbray
ownday ethay iest’spray aithfay ithway ationalistray ickstray. Onay aay ertaincay occasionay enwhay Atherfay Icanornay oughtbray aay
eckerchay etsay otay ethay estnutchay eetray anday inviteday imhay otay aay amegay, Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay ouldway otnay acceptay,
ecausebay accordingay otay imhay ehay ouldcay evernay understanday ethay ensesay ofay aay ontestcay inay ichwhay ethay otway






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


adversariesay avehay agreeday uponay ethay ulesray. Atherfay Icanornay, owhay adhay evernay eensay eckerschay ayedplay atthay
ayway, ouldcay otnay ayplay itay againay. Everay oremay artledstay atay Osejay Arcadioay Uendia’sbay uciditylay, ehay askeday imhay owhay
itay asway ossiblepay atthay eythay adhay imhay iedtay otay aay eetray.

oc“Hay estay implicissimus”say ehay epliedray. ecause“Bay I’may Azy.”cray

Omfray enthay onay, oncernedcay aboutay ishay ownay aithfay, ethay iestpray idday otnay omecay ackbay otay isitvay imhay anday
edicatedday imselfhay otay urryinghay alongay ethay uildingbay ofay ethay urchchay. Ebecaray eltfay erhay opeshay eingbay ebornray.
Erhay uturefay asway edicatedpray onay ethay ompletioncay ofay ethay orkway, orfay oneay Undaysay enwhay Atherfay Icanornay asway
unchinglay atay ethay ousehay anday ethay olewhay amilyfay ittingsay atay ethay abletay okespay ofay ethay olemnitysay anday endorsplay
atthay eligiousray eremoniescay ouldway acquireay enwhay ethay urchchay asway uiltbay, Amarantaay aidsay: e“Thay uckiestlay
oneay illway ebay Ebeca.”ray Anday incesay Ebecaray idday otnay understanday atwhay eshay eantmay, eshay explaineday itay otay erhay
ithway anay innocentay ilesmay:

You’re“ay oinggay otay ebay ethay oneay owhay illway inaugurateay ethay urchchay ithway youray edding.”way

Ebecaray iedtray otay orestallfay anyay ommentscay. Ethay ayway ethay onstructioncay asway oinggay ethay urchchay ouldway
otnay ebay uiltbay eforebay anotheray entay yearsay. Atherfay Icanornay idday otnay agreeay: ethay owinggray enerositygay ofay ethay
aithfulfay ermittedpay imhay otay akemay oremay optimisticay alculationscay. Otay ethay utemay Indignationay ofay Ebecaray,
owhay ouldcay otnay inishfay erhay unchlay, Ursulaay elebratedcay Amaranta’say ideaay anday ontributedcay aay onsiderablecay
umsay orfay ethay orkway otay ovemay asterfay. Atherfay Icanornay eltfay atthay ithway anotheray ontributioncay ikelay atthay ethay
urchchay ouldway ebay eadyray ithinway eethray yearsay. Omfray enthay onay Ebecaray idday otnay aysay anotheray ordway otay
Amarantaay, onvincedcay atthay erhay initiativeay adhay otnay ethay innocenceay atthay eshay attempteday otay ivegay itay. at“Thay
asway ethay eastlay erioussay ingthay Iay ouldcay avehay one,”day Amarantaay answereday erhay uringday ethay iolentvay argumentay
eythay adhay atthay ightnay. In“ay atthay ayway Iay on’tway avehay otay illkay youay orfay eethray years.”ay Ebecaray accepteday ethay
allengechay.

Enwhay Ietropay Espicray oundfay outay aboutay ethay ewnay ostponementpay, ehay entway oughthray aay isiscray ofay
isappointmentday, utbay Ebecaray avegay imhay aay inalfay oofpray ofay erhay oyaltylay. e’ll“Way elopeay eneverwhay youay ay,”say
eshay oldtay imhay. Ietropay Espicray, oweverhay, asway otnay aay anmay ofay adventureay. Ehay ackedlay ethay impulsiveay aracterchay
ofay ishay ianceefay anday ehay onsideredcay espectray orfay one’say ivengay ordway asay aay ealthway atthay ouldshay otnay ebay
uanderedsqay. Enthay Ebecaray urnedtay otay oremay audaciousay ethodsmay. Aay ysteriousmay indway ewblay outay ethay
ampslay inay ethay arlorpay anday Ursulaay urprisedsay ethay overslay issingkay inay ethay arkday. Ietropay Espicray avegay erhay omesay
onfusedcay explanationsay aboutay ethay oorpay ualityqay ofay odernmay itchpay ampslay anday ehay evenay elpedhay erhay installay aay
oremay ecuresay ystemsay ofay illuminationay orfay ethay oomray. Utbay ethay uelfay ailedfay againay oray ethay icksway ecamebay
oggedclay anday Ursulaay oundfay Ebecaray ittingsay onay erhay iance’sfay aplay. Isthay imetay eshay ouldway acceptay onay
explanationay. Eshay urnedtay ethay esponsibilityray ofay ethay akerybay overay otay ethay Indianay omanway anday atsay inay aay
ockingray airchay otay atchway overay ethay youngay eoplepay uringday ethay isitsvay, eadyray otay inway outay overay aneuversmay atthay
adhay alreadyay eenbay olday enwhay eshay asway aay irlgay. oor“Pay Ama,”may Ebecaray ouldway aysay ithway ockmay indignationay,
eeingsay Ursulaay yawnay uringday ethay oredombay ofay ethay isitsvay. en“Whay eshay iesday e’llshay ogay offay otay erhay ewardray inay
atthay ockingray air.”chay Afteray eethray onthsmay ofay upervisedsay ovelay, atiguedfay ybay ethay owslay ogresspray ofay ethay
onstructioncay, ichwhay ehay entway otay inspectay everyay ayday, Ietropay Espicray ecidedday otay ivegay Atherfay Icanornay ethay
oneymay ehay eedednay otay inishfay ethay urchchay. Amarantaay idday otnay owgray impatientay. Asay eshay onversedcay ithway erhay
irlgay iendsfray everyay afternoonay enwhay eythay amecay otay embroideray onay ethay orchpay, eshay iedtray otay inkthay ofay ewnay
ubterfugessay. Aay istakemay inay alculationcay oiledspay ethay oneay eshay onsideredcay ethay ostmay effectiveay: emovingray
ethay othballsmay atthay Ebecaray adhay utpay inay erhay eddingway essdray eforebay eshay utpay itay awayay inay ethay edroombay
esserdray. Eshay idday itay enwhay otway onthsmay ereway eftlay orfay ethay ompletioncay ofay ethay urchchay. Utbay Ebecaray asway osay
impatientay ithway ethay approachay ofay ethay eddingway atthay eshay antedway otay etgay ethay essdray eadyray earlieray anthay
Amarantaay adhay oreseenfay. Enwhay eshay openeday ethay esserdray anday unfoldeday irstfay ethay aperspay anday enthay ethay
otectivepray othclay, eshay oundfay ethay abricfay ofay ethay essdray anday ethay itchesstay ofay ethay eilvay anday evenay ethay owncray ofay
orangeay ossomsblay erforatedpay ybay othsmay. Althoughay eshay asway uresay atthay eshay adhay utpay aay andfulhay ofay
othballsmay inay ethay appingswray, ethay isasterday eemedsay osay aturalnay atthay eshay idday otnay areday ameblay Amarantaay.
Erethay asway esslay anthay aay onthmay untilay ethay eddingway, utbay Amparoay Oscotemay omisedpray otay ewsay aay ewnay essdray






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


ithinway aay eekway. Amarantaay eltfay aintfay atthay ainyray oontimenay enwhay Amparoay amecay otay ethay ousehay appedwray inay
ethay othfray ofay eedleworknay orfay Ebecaray otay avehay ethay inalfay ittingfay ofay ethay essdray. Eshay ostlay erhay oicevay anday aay
eadthray ofay oldcay eatsway anray ownday ethay athpay ofay erhay inespay. Orfay onglay onthsmay eshay adhay embledtray ithway ightfray
aitingway orfay atthay ourhay, ecausebay ifay eshay adhay otnay eenbay ableay otay onceivecay ethay ultimateay obstacleay otay Ebeca’sray
eddingway, eshay asway uresay atthay atay ethay astlay omentmay, enwhay allay ethay esourcesray ofay erhay imaginationay adhay ailedfay,
eshay ouldway avehay ethay ouragecay otay oisonpay erhay. Atthay afternoonay, ilewhay Ebecaray asway uffocatingsay ithway eathay
insideay ethay armoray ofay eadthray atthay Amparoay Oscotemay asway uttingpay aboutay erhay odybay ithway ousandsthay ofay inspay
anday infiniteay atiencepay, Amarantaay ademay everalsay istakesmay inay erhay ochetingcray anday ickedpray erhay ingerfay ithway
ethay eedlenay, utbay eshay ecidedday ithway ightfulfray oldnesscay atthay ethay ateday ouldway ebay ethay astlay Idayfray eforebay ethay
eddingway anday ethay ethodmay ouldway ebay aay oseday ofay audanumlay inay erhay offeecay.

Aay eatergray obstacleay, asay impassableay asay itay asway unforeseenay, obligeday aay ewnay anday indefiniteay
ostponementpay. Oneay eekway eforebay ethay ateday etsay orfay ethay eddingway, ittlelay Emediosray okeway upay inay ethay iddlemay
ofay ethay ightnay oakedsay inay aay othay othbray ichwhay adhay explodeday inay erhay insidesay ithway aay indkay ofay earingtay elchbay,
anday eshay iedday eethray aysday aterlay, oisonedpay ybay erhay ownay oodblay, ithway aay airpay ofay instway ossedcray inay erhay
omachstay. Amaranteay ufferedsay aay isiscray ofay onsciencecay. Eshay adhay eggedbay Odgay ithway uchsay ervorfay orfay
omethingsay earfulfay otay appenhay osay atthay eshay ouldway otnay avehay otay oisonpay Ebecaray atthay eshay eltfay uiltygay ofay
Emedios’ray eathday. Atthay asway otnay ethay obstacleay atthay eshay adhay eggedbay orfay osay uchmay. Emediosray adhay
oughtbray aay eathbray ofay errimentmay otay ethay ousehay. Eshay adhay ettledsay ownday ithway erhay usbandhay inay aay oomray earnay
ethay orkshopway, ichwhay eshay ecoratedday ithway ethay ollsday anday oystay ofay erhay ecentray ildhoodchay, anday erhay errymay
italityvay overfloweday ethay ourfay allsway ofay ethay edroombay anday entway ikelay aay irlwindwhay ofay oodgay ealthhay alongay ethay
orchpay ithway ethay egoniasbay: Eshay ouldway artstay ingingsay atay awnday. Eshay asway ethay onlyay ersonpay owhay aredday
interveneay inay ethay argumentsay etweenbay Ebecaray anday Amarantaay. Eshay ungedplay intoay ethay atiguingfay orechay ofay
akingtay arecay ofay Osejay Arcadioay Uendfabay. Eshay ouldway ingbray imhay ishay oodfay, eshay ouldway elphay imhay ithway Irisay
ailyday ecessitiesnay, ashway imhay ithway oapsay anday aay ubbingscray ushbray, eepkay ishay airhay anday eardbay eefray ofay icelay anday
itsnay, eepkay ethay almpay eltershay inay oodgay onditioncay anday einforceray itay ithway aterproofway anvascay inay ormystay
eatherway. Inay erhay astlay onthsmay eshay adhay ucceededsay inay ommunicatingcay ithway imhay inay asesphray ofay
udimentaryray Atinlay. Enwhay ethay onsay ofay Aurelianoay anday Ilarpay Erneratay asway ornbay anday oughtbray otay ethay ousehay
anday aptizedbay inay anay intimateay eremonycay ithway ethay amenay Aurelianoay Osejay, Emediosray ecidedday atthay ehay
ouldway ebay onsideredcay eirthay oldestay ildchay. Erhay aternalmay instinctay urprisedsay Ursulaay. Aurelianoay, orfay ishay
artpay, oundfay inay erhay ethay ustificationjay atthay ehay eedednay otay ivelay. Ehay orkedway allay ayday inay ishay orkshopway anday
Emediosray ouldway ingbray imhay aay upcay ofay ackblay offeecay inay ethay iddlemay ofay ethay orningmay. Eythay ouldway othbay
isitvay ethay Oscotesmay everyay ightnay. Aurelianoay ouldway ayplay endlessay amesgay ofay ominoesday ithway ishay ather-infay-
awlay ilewhay Emediosray attedchay ithway erhay isterssay oray alkedtay otay erhay othermay aboutay oremay importantay ingsthay.
Ethay inklay ithway ethay Uendfasbay onsolidatedcay Onday Apolinaray Oscote’smay authorityay inay ethay owntay. Onay
equentfray ipstray otay ethay apitalcay ofay ethay ovincepray ehay ucceededsay inay ettinggay ethay overnmentgay otay uildbay aay
oolschay osay atthay Arcadioay, owhay adhay inheriteday ethay educationalay enthusiasmay ofay ishay andfathergray, ouldcay aketay
argechay ofay itay. Oughthray ersuasionpay ehay anagedmay otay etgay ethay ajoritymay ofay ouseshay aintedpay ueblay inay imetay orfay
ethay ateday ofay ationalnay independenceay. Atay ethay urgingay ofay Atherfay Icanornay, ehay arrangeday orfay ethay ansfertray ofay
Atarino’scay orestay otay aay ackbay eetstray anday ehay osedclay ownday everalsay andalousscay establishmentsay atthay
osperedpray inay ethay entercay ofay owntay. Onceay ehay eturnedray ithway ixsay olicemenpay armeday ithway iflesray otay omwhay ehay
entrusteday ethay aintenancemay ofay orderay, anday onay oneay ememberedray ethay originalay agreementay otnay otay avehay
armeday enmay inay ethay owntay. Aurelianoay enjoyeday ishay ather-in-law’sfay efficiencyay. You’re“ay oinggay otay etgay asay atfay
asay ehay is,”ay ishay iendsfray ouldway aysay otay imhay. Utbay ishay edentarysay ifelay, ichwhay accentuateday ishay eekboneschay anday
oncentratedcay ethay arklespay ofay ishay eyesay, idday otnay increaseay ishay eightway oray alteray ethay arsimonypay ofay ishay
aracterchay, utbay, onay ethay ontrarycay, itay ardenedhay onay ishay ipslay ethay aightstray inelay ofay olitarysay editationmay anday
implacableay ecisionday. Osay eepday asway ethay affectionay atthay ehay anday ishay ifeway adhay ucceededsay inay arousingay inay
othbay eirthay amiliesfay atthay enwhay Emediosray announceday atthay eshay asway oinggay otay avehay aay ildchay, evenay Ebecaray
anday Amarantaay eclaredday aay etmcay inay orderay otay itknay itemsay inay ueblay oolway ifay itay asway otay ebay aay oybay anday inay inkpay

oolway inay asecay itay asway aay irlgay. Eshay asway ethay astlay ersonpay Arcadioay oughtthay aboutay aay ewfay yearsay aterlay enwhay ehay
acedfay ethay iringfay uadsqay.

Ursulaay ordereday aay ourningmay eriodpay ofay osedclay oorsday anday indowsway, ithway onay oneay enteringay oray eavinglay
exceptay onay attersmay ofay utmostay ecessitynay. Eshay ohibitedpray anyay alkingtay alouday orfay aay yearay anday eshay utpay
Emedios’ray aguerreotypeday inay ethay aceplay erewhay erhay odybay adhay eenbay aidlay outay, ithway aay ackblay ibbonray arounday
itay anday anay oilay amplay atthay asway alwaysay eptkay ightedlay. Uturefay enerationsgay, owhay evernay etlay ethay amplay ogay outay,
ouldway ebay uzzledpay atay atthay irlgay inay aay eatedplay irtskay, itewhay ootsbay, anday ithway anay organdyay andbay arounday erhay
eadhay, anday eythay ereway evernay ableay otay onnectcay erhay ithway ethay andardstay imageay ofay aay eat-grandmothergray.
Amarantaay ooktay argechay ofay Aurelianoay Osejay. Eshay adopteday imhay asay aay onsay owhay ouldway areshay erhay olitudesay
anday elieveray erhay omfray ethay involutaryay audanumlay atthay erhay admay eseechingbay adhay ownthray intoay Emedios’ray
offeecay. Ietropay Espicray ouldway iptoetay inay atay uskday, ithway aay ackblay ibbonray onay ishay athay, anday ehay ouldway aypay aay
ilentsay isitvay otay Ebecaray, owhay eemedsay otay ebay eedingblay otay eathday insideay ethay ackblay essdray ithway eevesslay ownday
otay erhay istswray. Ustjay ethay ideaay ofay inkingthay aboutay aay ewnay ateday orfay ethay eddingway ouldway avehay eenbay osay
irreverentay atthay ethay engagementay urnedtay intoay anay eternalay elationshipray, aay atiguedfay ovelay atthay onay oneay
orriedway aboutay againay, asay ifay ethay overslay, owhay inay otheray aysday adhay abotagedsay ethay ampslay inay orderay otay isskay, adhay
eenbay abandoneday otay ethay eefray illway ofay eathday. Avinghay ostlay erhay earingsbay, ompletelycay emoralizedday, Ebecaray
eganbay eatingay earthay againay.

Uddenly—whensay ethay ourningmay adhay onegay onay osay onglay atthay ethay eedlepointnay essionssay eganbay again—ay
omeonesay ushedpay openay ethay eetstray oorday atay otway inay ethay afternoonay inay ethay ortalmay ilencesay ofay ethay eathay anday
ethay acesbray inay ethay oundationfay ookshay ithway uchsay orcefay atthay Amarantaay anday erhay iendsfray ewingsay onay ethay
orchpay, Ebecaray uckingsay erhay ingerfay inay erhay edroombay, Ursulaay inay ethay itchenkay, Aurelianoay inay ethay orkshopway,
anday evenay Osejay Arcadioay Uendfabay underay ethay olitarysay estnutchay eetray adhay ethay impressionay atthay anay
earthquakeay asway eakingbray upay ethay ousehay. Aay ugehay anmay adhay arriveday. Ishay uaresqay ouldersshay arelybay ittedfay
oughthray ethay oorwaysday. Ehay asway earingway aay edalmay ofay Ouray Adylay ofay Elphay arounday ishay isonbay ecknay, ishay
armsay anday estchay ereway ompletelycay overedcay ithway ypticcray attooingtay, anday onay ishay ightray istwray asway ethay ighttay
oppercay aceletbray ofay ethay inos-en-crunay  amuletay. Ishay inskay asway annedtay ybay ethay altsay ofay ethay openay airay, ishay airhay
asway ortshay anday aightstray ikelay ethay anemay ofay aay ulemay, ishay awsjay ereway ofay ironay, anday ehay oreway aay adsay ilesmay. Ehay
adhay aay eltbay onay atthay asway icetway asay ickthay asay ethay inchcay ofay aay orsehay, ootsbay ithway eggingslay anday ursspay anday ironay
onay ethay eelshay, anday ishay esencepray avegay ethay uakingqay impressionay ofay aay eismicsay emortray. Ehay entway oughthray
ethay arlorpay anday ethay ivinglay oomray, arryingcay omesay alf-wornhay addlebagssay inay ishay andhay, anday ehay appeareday ikelay
aay underclapthay onay ethay orchpay ithway ethay egoniasbay erewhay Amarantaay anday erhay iendsfray ereway aralyzedpay, eirthay
eedlesnay inay ethay airay. ello,”“Hay ehay aidsay otay emthay inay aay iredtay oicevay, ewthray ethay addlebagssay onay aay orktableway, anday
entway ybay onay ishay ayway otay ethay ackbay ofay ethay ousehay. ello,”“Hay ehay aidsay otay ethay artledstay Ebeccaray, owhay awsay imhay
asspay ybay ethay oorday ofay erhay edroombay. ello,”“Hay ehay aidsay otay Aurelianoay, owhay asway atay ishay ilversmith’ssay enchbay
ithway allay ivefay ensessay alertay. Ehay idday otnay ingerlay ithway anyoneay. Ehay entway irectlyday otay ethay itchenkay anday erethay ehay
oppedstay orfay ethay irstfay imetay atay ethay enday ofay aay iptray atthay adhay egunbay ofay ethay otheray idesay ofay ethay orldway. ello,”“Hay
ehay aidsay. Ursulaay oodstay orfay aay actionfray ofay aay econdsay ithway erhay outhmay openay, ookedlay intoay ishay eyesay, avegay aay
ycray, anday ungflay erhay armsay arounday ishay ecknay, outingshay anday eepingway ithway oyjay. Itay asway Osejay Arcadioay. Ehay asway
eturningray asay oorpay asay enwhay ehay adhay eftlay, otay uchsay anay extremeay atthay Ursulaay adhay otay ivegay imhay otway esospay otay
aypay orfay ethay entalray ofay ishay orsehay. Ehay okespay aay Anishspay atthay asway ardedlay ithway ailorsay angslay. Eythay askeday
erewhay ehay adhay eenbay anday ehay answereday: Out“ay ere.”thay Ehay unghay ishay ammockhay inay ethay oomray eythay assigneday
imhay anday eptslay orfay eethray aysday. Enwhay ehay okeway upay, afteray eatingay ixteensay awray eggsay, ehay entway irectlyday otay
Atarino’scay orestay, erewhay ishay onumentalmay izesay ovokedpray aay anicpay ofay uriositycay amongay ethay omenway. Ehay
alledcay orfay usicmay anday anecay iquorlay orfay everyoneay, otay ebay utpay onay ishay illbay. Ehay ouldway Indian-wrestleay ithway
ivefay enmay atay ethay amesay imetay. It“ay an’tcay ebay one,”day eythay aidsay, onvincedcay atthay eythay ouldway otnay ebay ableay otay
ovemay ishay armay. e“Hay ashay inos-en-crunay Atarinocay, owhay idday otnay elievebay inay agicalmay ickstray ofay engthstray, etbay
imhay elvetway esospay atthay ehay ouldcay otnay ovemay ethay ountercay. Osejay Arcadioay ulledpay itay outay ofay itsay aceplay, iftedlay itay
overay ishay eadhay, anday utpay itay inay ethay eetstray. Itay ooktay elevenay enmay otay utpay itay ackbay. Inay ethay eathay ofay ethay artypay ehay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


exhibiteday ishay unusualay asculinitymay onay ethay arbay, ompletelycay overedcay ithway attoostay ofay ordsway inay everalsay
anguageslay intertwineday inay ueblay anday edray. Otay ethay omenway owhay ereway esiegingbay imhay anday ovetingcay imhay ehay
utpay ethay uestionqay asay otay owhay ouldway aypay ethay ostmay. Ethay oneay owhay adhay ethay ostmay oneymay offereday imhay
entytway esospay. Enthay ehay oposedpray afflingray imselfhay offay amongay emthay atay entay esospay aay ancechay. Itay asway aay
antasticfay icepray ecausebay ethay ostmay ought-aftersay omanway earneday eightay esospay aay ightnay, utbay eythay allay
accepteday. Eythay otewray eirthay amesnay onay ourteenfay iecespay ofay aperpay ichwhay eythay utpay intoay aay athay anday eachay
omanway ooktay oneay outay. Enwhay erethay ereway onlyay otway iecespay eftlay otay awdray, itay asway establisheday otay omwhay eythay
elongedbay.

ive“Fay esospay oremay omfray eachay one,”ay Osejay Arcadioay oposedpray, and“ay I’llay areshay yselfmay ithway othbay.

Ehay ademay ishay ivinglay atthay ayway. Ehay adhay eenbay arounday ethay orldway ixty-fivesay imestay, enlisteday inay aay ewcray ofay
ailorssay ithoutway aay ountrycay. Ethay omenway owhay entway otay edbay ithway imhay atthay ightnay inay Atarino’scay orestay
oughtbray imhay akednay intoay ethay anceday alonsay osay atthay eoplepay ouldcay eesay atthay erethay asway otnay aay uaresqay inchay ofay
ishay odybay atthay asway otnay attooedtay, ontfray anday ackbay, anday omfray ishay ecknay otay ishay oestay. Ehay idday otnay ucceedsay inay
ecomingbay incorporateday intoay ethay amilyfay. Ehay eptslay allay ayday anday entspay ethay ightnay inay ethay ed-lightray istrictday,
akingmay etsbay onay ishay engthstray. Onay ethay areray occasionsay enwhay Ursulaay otgay imhay otay itsay ownday atay ethay abletay, ehay
avegay ignssay ofay adiantray oodgay umorhay, especiallyay enwhay ehay oldtay aboutay ishay adventuresay inay emoteray ountriescay.
Ehay adhay eenbay ipwreckedshay anday entspay otway eeksway adriftay inay ethay Easay ofay Apanjay, eedingfay onay ethay odybay ofay aay
omradecay owhay adhay uccumbedsay otay unstrokesay anday osewhay extremelyay altysay eshflay asay itay ookedcay inay ethay unsay
adhay aay eetsway anday anulargray astetay. Underay aay ightbray oondaynay unsay inay ethay Ulfgay ofay Engalbay ishay ipshay adhay ulledlay
aay easay agondray, inay ethay omachstay ofay ichwhay eythay oundfay ethay elmethay, ethay ucklesbay, anday ethay eaponsway ofay aay
Usadercray. Inay ethay Aribbeancay ehay adhay eensay ethay ostghay ofay ethay iratepay ipshay ofay Ictorvay Ugueshay, ithway itsay ailssay
orntay ybay ethay indsway ofay eathday, ethay astsmay ewedchay ybay easay ormsway, anday illstay ookinglay orfay ethay oursecay otay
Uadeloupegay. Ursulaay ouldway eepway atay ethay abletay asay ifay eshay ereway eadingray ethay etterslay atthay adhay evernay arriveday
anday inay ichwhay Osejay Arcadioay oldtay aboutay ishay eedsday anday isadventuresmay. And“ay erethay asway osay uchmay ofay aay
omehay erehay orfay youay, ymay on,”say eshay ouldway obsay, and“ay osay uchmay oodfay ownthray otay ethay ogs!”hay Utbay
underneathay itay anay eshay ouldcay otnay onceivecay atthay ethay oybay ethay ypsiesgay ooktay awayay asway ethay amesay outlay owhay
ouldway eatay alfhay aay ucklingsay igpay orfay unchlay anday osewhay atulenceflay itheredway ethay owersflay. Omethingsay imilarsay
ooktay aceplay ithway ethay estray ofay ethay amilyfay. Amarantaay ouldcay otnay oncealcay ethay epugnanceray atthay eshay eltfay atay
ethay abletay ecausebay ofay ishay estialbay elchingbay. Arcadioay, owhay evernay ewknay ethay ecretsay ofay eirthay elationshipray,
arcelyscay answereday ethay uestionsqay atthay ehay askeday ithway ethay obviousay ideaay ofay aininggay ishay affectionay.
Aurelianoay iedtray otay eliveray ethay imestay enwhay eythay eptslay inay ethay amesay oomray, iedtray otay eviveray ethay omplicitycay
ofay ildhoodchay, utbay Osejay Arcadioay adhay orgottenfay aboutay itay, ecausebay ifelay atay easay adhay aturatedsay ishay emorymay
ithway ootay anymay ingsthay otay ememberray. Onlyay Ebecaray uccumbedsay otay ethay irstfay impactay. Ethay ayday atthay eshay
awsay imhay asspay ybay erhay edroombay eshay oughtthay atthay Ietropay Espicray asway aay ugarysay andyday extnay otay atthay
otomalepray osewhay olcanicvay eathingbray ouldcay ebay eardhay allay overay ethay ousehay. Eshay iedtray otay etgay earnay imhay
underay anyay etextpray. Onay aay ertaincay occasionay Osejay Arcadioay ookedlay atay erhay odybay ithway amelessshay attentionay
anday aidsay otay erhay You’re“ay aay omanway, ittlelay ister.”say Ebecaray ostlay ontrolcay ofay erselfhay. Eshay entway ackbay otay
eatingay earthay anday ethay itewashwhay onay ethay allsway ithway ethay avidityay ofay eviouspray aysday, anday eshay uckedsay erhay
ingerfay ithway osay uchmay anxietyay atthay eshay evelopedday aay alluscay onay erhay umbthay. Eshay omitedvay upay aay eengray iquidlay
ithway eadday eecheslay inay itay. Eshay entspay ightsnay awakeay akingshay ithway everfay, ightingfay againstay eliriumday, aitingway
untilay ethay ousehay ookshay ithway ethay eturnray ofay Osejay Arcadioay atay awnday. Oneay afternoonay, enwhay everyoneay asway
avinghay aay iestasay, eshay ouldcay onay ongerlay esistray anday entway otay ishay edroombay. Eshay oundfay imhay inay ishay ortsshay,
yinglay inay ethay ammockhay atthay ehay adhay unghay omfray ethay eamsbay ithway aay ip’sshay awserhay. Eshay asway osay impresseday
ybay ishay enormousay otleymay akednessnay atthay eshay eltfay anay impulseay otay etreatray. Excuse“ay e,”may eshay aidsay, I“ay
idn’tday owknay youay ereway ere.”hay Utbay eshay oweredlay erhay oicevay osay asay otnay otay akeway anyoneay upay. ome“Cay ere,”hay
ehay aidsay. Ebecaray obeyeday. Eshay oppedstay esidebay ethay ammockhay inay anay icyay eatsway, eelingfay otsknay ormingfay inay
erhay intestinesay, ilewhay Osejay Arcadioay okedstray erhay anklesay ithway ethay ipstay ofay ishay ingersfay, enthay erhay alvescay, enthay
erhay ighsthay, urmuringmay: Oh“ay, ittlelay istersay, ittlelay ister.”say Eshay adhay otay akemay aay upernaturalsay effortay otnay otay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


ieday enwhay aay artlinglystay egulatedray ycloniccay owerpay iftedlay erhay upay ybay ethay aistway anday espoiledday erhay ofay erhay
intimacyay ithway eethray ashesclay ofay itsay awsclay anday uarteredqay erhay ikelay aay ittlelay irdbay. Eshay anagedmay otay ankthay
Odgay orfay avinghay eenbay ornbay eforebay eshay ostlay erselfhay inay ethay inconceivableay easureplay ofay atthay unbearableay
ainpay, ashingsplay inay ethay eamingstay arshmay ofay ethay ammockhay ichwhay absorbeday ethay explosionay ofay oodblay ikelay aay
otterblay.

Eethray aysday aterlay eythay ereway arriedmay uringday ethay ive-o’clockfay assmay. Osejay Arcadioay adhay onegay otay Ietropay
Espi’scray orestay ethay ayday eforebay. Ehay oundfay imhay ivinggay aay itherzay essonlay anday idday otnay awdray imhay asideay otay
eakspay otay imhay. I’m“ay oinggay otay arrymay Ebeca,”ray ehay oldtay imhay. Ietropay Espicray urnedtay alepay, avegay ethay itherzay otay
oneay ofay ishay upilspay, anday ismissedday ethay assclay. Enwhay eythay ereway aloneay inay ethay oomray atthay asway owdedcray ithway
usicalmay instrumentsay anday echanicalmay oystay, Ietropay Espicray aidsay:

e’s“Shay youray ister.”say

I“ay on’tday are,”cay Osejay Arcadioay epliedray.

Ietropay Espicray oppedmay ishay owbray ithway ethay andkerchiefhay atthay asway oakedsay inay avenderlay.

It’s“ay againstay ature,”nay ehay explaineday, and“ay esidesbay, it’say againstay ethay aw.”lay

Osejay Arcadioay ewgray impatientay, otnay osay uchmay atay ethay argumentay asay overay Ietropay Espi’scray alenesspay.

uck“Fay aturenay otway imestay over,”ay ehay aidsay. And“ay I’veay omecay otay elltay youay otnay otay otherbay oinggay otay askay
Ebecaray anything.”ay

Utbay ishay utalbray eportmentday okebray ownday enwhay ehay awsay Ietropay Espi’scray eyesay owgray oistmay.

ow,”“Nay ehay aidsay otay imhay inay aay ifferentday onetay, if“ay youay eallyray ikelay ethay amilyfay, ere’sthay Amarantaay orfay

 
youay.

Atherfay Icanornay evealedray inay ishay Undaysay ermonsay atthay Osejay Arcadioay anday Ebecaray ereway otnay otherbray
anday istersay. Ursulaay evernay orgavefay atwhay eshay onsideredcay anay inconceivableay acklay ofay espectray anday enwhay eythay
amecay ackbay omfray urchchay eshay orbadefay ethay ewlywedsnay otay etsay ootfay inay ethay ousehay againay. Orfay erhay itay asway asay
ifay eythay ereway eadday. Osay eythay entedray aay ousehay acrossay omfray ethay emeterycay anday establisheday emselvesthay erethay
ithway onay otheray urniturefay utbay Osejay Arcadio’say ammockhay. Onay eirthay eddingway ightnay aay orpionscay atthay adhay
otgay intoay erhay ipperslay itbay Ebecaray onay ethay ootfay. Erhay onguetay entway otay eepslay, utbay atthay idday otnay opstay emthay
omfray endingspay aay andalousscay oneymoonhay. Ethay eighborsnay ereway artledstay ybay ethay iescray atthay okeway upay ethay
olewhay istrictday asay anymay asay eightay imestay inay aay inglesay ightnay anday eethray imestay uringday iestasay, anday eythay ayedpray
atthay uchsay ildway assionpay ouldway otnay isturbday ethay eacepay ofay ethay eadday.

Aurelianoay asway ethay onlyay oneay owhay asway oncernedcay aboutay emthay. Ehay oughtbay emthay omesay urniturefay anday
avegay emthay omesay oneymay untilay Osejay Arcadioay ecoveredray ishay ensesay ofay ealityray anday eganbay otay orkway ethay onay-
an’s-landmay atthay orderedbay ethay ourtyardcay ofay ethay ousehay. Amarantaay, onay ethay otheray andhay, evernay idday
overcomeay erhay ancorray againstay Ebecaray, evenay oughthay ifelay offereday erhay aay atisfactionsay ofay ichwhay eshay adhay
otnay eameddray: atay ethay initiativeay ofay Ursulaay, owhay idday otnay owknay owhay otay epairray ethay ameshay, Ietropay Espicray
ontinuedcay avinghay unchlay atay ethay ousehay onay Uesdaystay, isingray aboveay ishay efeatday ithway aay erenesay ignityday. Ehay
illstay oreway ethay ackblay ibbonray onay ishay athay asay aay ignsay ofay espectray orfay ethay amilyfay, anday ehay ooktay easureplay inay
owingshay ishay affectionay orfay Ursulaay ybay ingingbray erhay exoticay iftsgay: Ortuguesepay ardinessay, Urkishtay oseray
armalademay, anday onay oneay occasionay aay ovelylay Anilamay awlshay. Amarantaay ookedlay afteray imhay ithway aay ovinglay
iligenceday. Eshay anticipateday ishay antsway, ulledpay outay ethay eadsthray onay ethay uffscay ofay ishay irtshay, anday embroidereday
aay ozenday andkerchiefshay ithway ishay initialsay orfay ishay irthdaybay. Onay Uesdaystay, afteray unchlay, ilewhay eshay ouldway
embroideray onay ethay orchpay, ehay ouldway eepkay erhay appyhay ompanycay. Orfay Ietropay Espicray, atthay omanway omwhay
ehay alwaysay adhay onsideredcay anday eatedtray asay aay ildchay asway aay evelationray. Althoughay erhay emperamenttay ackedlay
acegray, eshay adhay aay areray ensibilitysay orfay appreciatingay ethay ilingstay ofay ethay orldway anday adhay aay ecretsay endernesstay.
Oneay Uesdaytay, enwhay onay oneay oubtedday atthay oonersay oray aterlay itay adhay otay appenhay, Ietropay Espicray askeday erhay otay
arrymay imhay. Eshay idday otnay opstay erhay orkway. Eshay aitedway orfay ethay othay ushblay otay eavelay erhay earsay anday avegay erhay
oicevay aay erenesay essstray ofay aturitymay.

Of“ay oursecay, Espi,”cray eshay aidsay. ut“Bay enwhay eway owknay eachay otheray etterbay. It’say evernay oodgay otay ebay astyhay
inay ings.”thay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Ursulaay asway onfusedcay. Inay itespay ofay ethay esteemay eshay adhay orfay Ietropay Espicray, eshay ouldcay otnay elltay etherwhay
ishay ecisionday asway oodgay oray adbay omfray ethay oralmay ointpay ofay iewvay afteray ishay olongedpray anday amousfay
engagementay otay Ebecaray. Utbay eshay inallyfay accepteday itay asay anay unqualifieday actfay ecausebay onay oneay aredshay erhay
oubtsday. Aurelianoay, owhay asway ethay anmay ofay ethay ousehay, onfusedcay erhay urtherfay ithway ishay enigmaticay anday inalfay
opinionay:

ese“Thay areay otnay imestay otay ogay arounday inkingthay aboutay eddings.”way

Atthay opinionay, ichwhay Ursulaay understooday onlyay omesay onthsmay aterlay, asway ethay onlyay inceresay oneay atthay
Aurelianoay ouldcay expressay atay atthay omentmay, otnay onlyay ithway espectray otay arriagemay, utbay otay anythingay atthay asway
otnay arway. Ehay imselfhay, acingfay aay iringfay uadsqay, ouldway otnay understanday ootay ellway ethay oncatenationcay ofay ethay
eriessay ofay ubtlesay utbay irrevocableay accidentsay atthay oughtbray imhay otay atthay ointpay. Ethay eathday ofay Emediosray adhay
otnay oducedpray ethay espairday atthay ehay adhay earedfay. Itay asway, atherray, aay ullday eelingfay ofay ageray atthay adesgray allyay
issolvedday inay aay olitarysay anday assivepay ustrationfray imilarsay otay ethay oneay ehay adhay eltfay uringday ethay imetay ehay asway
esignedray otay ivinglay ithoutway aay omanway. Ehay ungedplay intoay ishay orkway againay, utbay ehay eptkay upay ethay ustomcay ofay
ayingplay ominoesday ithway ishay ather-in-lawfay. Inay aay ousehay oundbay upay inay ourningmay, ethay ightlynay
onversationscay onsolidatedcay ethay iendshipfray etweenbay ethay otway enmay. et“Gay arriedmay againay. Aurelito,”ay ishay
ather-in-lawfay ouldway elltay imhay. I“ay avehay ixsay aughtersday orfay youay otay oosechay om.”fray Onay oneay occasionay onay ethay
eveay ofay ethay electionsay, Onday Apolinaray Oscotemay eturnedray omfray oneay ofay ishay equentfray ipstray orriedway aboutay
ethay oliticalpay ituationsay inay ethay ountrycay. Ethay Iberalslay ereway eterminedday otay ogay otay arway. Incesay Aurelianoay atay
atthay imetay adhay eryvay onfusedcay otionsnay aboutay ethay ifferenceday etweenbay Onservativescay anday Iberalslay, ishay
ather-in-lawfay avegay imhay omesay ematicschay essonslay. Ethay Iberalslay, ehay aidsay, ereway Eemasonsfray, adbay eoplepay,
antingway otay anghay iestspray, otay instituteay ivilcay arriagemay anday ivorceday, otay ecognizeray ethay ightsray ofay illegitimateay
ildrenchay asay equalay otay osethay ofay egitimatelay onesay, anday otay utcay ethay ountrycay upay intoay aay ederalfay ystemsay atthay
ouldway aketay owerpay awayay omfray ethay upremesay authorityay. Ethay Onservativescay, onay ethay otheray andhay, owhay adhay
eceivedray eirthay owerpay irectlyday omfray Odgay, oposedpray ethay establishmentay ofay ublicpay orderay anday amilyfay
oralitymay. Eythay ereway ethay efendersday ofay ethay aithfay ofay Istchray, ofay ethay inciplepray ofay authorityay, anday ereway otnay
eparedpray otay ermitpay ethay ountrycay otay ebay okenbray ownday intoay autonomousay entitiesay. Ecausebay ofay ishay
umanitarianhay eelingsfay Aurelianoay ympathizedsay ithway ethay Iberallay attitudeay ithway espectray otay ethay ightsray ofay
aturalnay ildrenchay, utbay inay anyay asecay, ehay ouldcay otnay understanday owhay eoplepay arriveday atay ethay extremeay ofay
agingway arway overay ingsthay atthay ouldcay otnay ebay ouchedtay ithway ethay andhay. Itay eemedsay anay exaggerationay otay imhay
atthay orfay ethay electionsay ishay ather-in-lawfay adhay emthay endsay ixsay oldierssay armeday ithway iflesray underay ethay
ommandcay ofay aay ergeantsay otay aay owntay ithway onay oliticalpay assionspay. Eythay otnay onlyay arriveday, utbay eythay entway
omfray ousehay otay ousehay onfiscatingcay untinghay eaponsway, achetesmay, anday evenay itchenkay ivesknay eforebay eythay
istributedday amongay alesmay overay enty-onetway ethay ueblay allotsbay ithway ethay amesnay ofay ethay Onservativecay
andidatescay anday ethay edray allotsbay ithway ethay amesnay ofay ethay Iberallay andidatescay. Onay ethay eveay ofay ethay electionsay
Onday Apolinaray Oscotemay imselfhay eadray aay ecreeday atthay ohibitedpray ethay alesay ofay alcoholicay everagesbay anday ethay
atheringgay ogethertay ofay oremay anthay eethray eoplepay owhay ereway otnay ofay ethay amesay amilyfay. Ethay electionsay ooktay
aceplay ithoutway incidentay. Atay eightay o’clockay onay Undaysay orningmay aay oodenway allotbay oxbay asway etsay upay inay ethay
uaresqay, ichwhay asway atchedway overay ybay ethay ixsay oldierssay. Ethay otingvay asway absolutelyay eefray, asay Aurelianoay
imselfhay asway ableay otay attestay incesay ehay entspay almostay ethay entireay ayday ithway ishay ather-in-lawfay eeingsay atthay onay
oneay otedvay oremay anthay onceay. Atay ourfay inay ethay afternoonay aay ollray ofay dmmsay inay ethay uaresqay announceday ethay
osingclay ofay ethay ollspay anday Onday Apolinaray Oscotemay ealedsay ethay allotbay oxbay ithway aay abellay ossedcray ybay ishay
ignaturesay. Atthay ightnay, ilewhay ehay ayedplay ominoesday ithway Aurelianoay, ehay ordereday ethay ergeantsay otay eakbray ethay
ealsay inay orderay otay ountcay ethay otesvay. Erethay ereway almostay asay anymay edray allotsbay asay ueblay, utbay ethay ergeantsay eftlay
onlyay entay edray onesay anday ademay upay ethay ifferenceday ithway ueblay onesay. Enthay eythay ealedsay ethay oxbay againay ithway aay
ewnay abellay anday ethay irstfay ingthay onay ethay ollowingfay ayday itay asway akentay otay ethay apitalcay ofay ethay ovincepray. e“Thay
Uberalsay illway ogay otay ar,”way Aurelianoay aidsay. Onday Apolinaray oncentratedcay onay ishay ominoday iecespay. If“ay you’reay
ayingsay atthay ecausebay ofay ethay itchsway inay allotsbay, eythay on’t,”way ehay aidsay. e“Way eftlay aay ewfay edray onesay inay osay erethay
on’tway ebay anyay omplaints.”cay Aurelianoay understooday ethay isadvantagesday ofay eingbay inay ethay oppositionay. If“ay Iay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


ereway aay Iberal,”lay ehay aidsay, I’d“ay ogay otay arway ecausebay ofay osethay allots.”bay Ishay ather-in-lawfay ookedlay atay imhay
overay ishay assesglay.

ome“Cay ownay, Aurelito,”ay ehay aidsay, if“ay youay ereway aay Iberallay, evenay oughthay you’reay ymay on-in-lawsay, youay
ouldn’tway avehay eensay ethay itchingsway ofay ethay allots.”bay

Atwhay eallyray ausedcay indignationay inay ethay owntay asway. otnay ethay esultsray ofay ethay electionsay utbay ethay actfay atthay
ethay oldierssay adhay otnay eturnedray ethay eaponsway. Aay oupgray ofay omenway okespay ithway Aurelianoay osay atthay ehay
ouldcay obtainay ethay eturnray ofay eirthay itchenkay ivesknay omfray ishay ather-in-lawfay. Onday Apolinaray Oscotemay
explaineday otay imhay, inay icteststray onfidencecay, atthay ethay oldierssay adhay akentay ethay eaponsway offay asay oofpray atthay
ethay Iberalslay ereway eparingpray orfay arway. Ethay ynicismcay ofay ethay emarkray alarmeday imhay. Ehay aidsay othingnay, utbay
onay aay ertaincay ightnay enwhay Erineldogay Arquezmay anday Agnificomay Isbalvay ereway eakingspay ithway omesay otheray
iendsfray aboutay ethay incidentay ofay ethay ivesknay, eythay askeday imhay ifay ehay asway aay Iberallay oray aay Onservativecay.
Aurelianoay idday otnay esitatehay.

If“ay Iay avehay otay ebay omethingsay I’llay ebay aay Iberal,”lay ehay aidsay, ecause“bay ethay Onservativescay areay icky.”tray

Onay ethay ollowingfay ayday, atay ethay urgingay ofay ishay iendsfray, ehay entway otay eesay Dr.ay Alirioay Ogueranay otay ebay eatedtray
orfay aay upposedsay ainpay inay ishay iverlay. Ehay idday otnay evenay understanday ethay eaningmay ofay ethay ubterfugesay. Dr.ay
Alirioay Ogueranay adhay arriveday inay Acondomay aay ewfay yearsay eforebay ithway aay edicinemay estchay ofay astelesstay illspay
anday aay edicalmay ottomay atthay onvincedcay onay oneay: Oneay ailnay awsdray anotheray. Inay ealityray ehay asway aay arlatanchay.
Ehindbay ishay innocentay acadefay ofay aay octorday ithoutway estigepray erethay asway iddenhay aay erroristtay owhay ithway ishay
ortshay eggedlay ootsbay overedcay ethay arsscay atthay ivefay yearsay inay ethay ocksstay adhay eftlay onay ishay egslay. Akentay isonerpray
uringday ethay irstfay ederalistfay adventureay, ehay anagedmay otay escapeay otay Urasaocay isguisedday inay ethay armentgay ehay
etestedday ostmay inay isthay orldway: aay assockcay. Atay ethay enday ofay aay olongedpray exileay, irredstay upay ybay ethay excitingay
ewsnay atthay exilesay omfray allay overay ethay Aribbeancay oughtbray otay Urasaocay, ehay etsay outay inay aay uggler’ssmay oonerschay
anday appeareday inay Iohacharay ithway ethay ottlesbay ofay illspay atthay ereway othingnay utbay efinedray ugarsay anday aay iplomaday
omfray ethay Universityay ofay Eipziglay atthay ehay adhay orgedfay imselfhay. Ehay eptway ithway isappointmentday. Ethay ed¬fay
eralistay ervorfay, ichwhay ethay exilesay adhay icturedpay asay aay owderpay egkay aboutay otay explodeay, adhay issolvedday intoay aay
aguevay electoralay illusionay. Embittereday ybay ailurefay, yearningay orfay aay afesay aceplay erewhay ehay ouldcay awaitay olday ageay,
ethay alsefay omeopathhay ooktay efugeray inay Acondomay. Inay ethay arrownay ottle-crowdedbay oomray atthay ehay entedray onay
oneay idesay ofay ethay uaresqay, ehay ivedlay everalsay yearsay offay ethay opelesslyhay illay owhay, afteray avinghay iedtray everythingay,
onsoledcay emselvesthay ithway ugarsay illspay. Ishay instinctsay ofay anay agitatoray emainedray ormantday asay onglay asay Onday
Apolinaray Oscotemay asway aay igureheadfay. Ehay assedpay ethay imetay ememberingray anday ightingfay againstay asthmaay.
Ethay approachay ofay ethay electionsay asway ethay eadthray atthay edlay imhay onceay oremay otay ethay einskay ofay ubversionsay. Ehay
ademay ontactcay ithway ethay youngay eoplepay inay ethay owntay, owhay ackedlay oliticalpay owledgeknay, anday ehay embarkeday
onay aay ealthystay ampaigncay ofay instigationay. Ethay umerousnay edray allotsbay atthay appeareday isay ethay oxbay anday atthay
ereway attributeday ybay Onday Apolinaray Oscotemay otay ethay uriositycay atthay amecay omfray youthay ereway artpay ofay ishay
anplay: ehay ademay ishay isciplesday otevay inay orderay otay owshay emthay atthay electionsay ereway aay arcefay. e“Thay onlyay
effectiveay ing,”thay ehay ouldway aysay, is“ay iolence.”vay Ethay ajoritymay ofay Aureliano’say iendsfray ereway enthusiasticay
overay ethay ideaay ofay iquidatinglay ethay Onservativecay establishmentay, utbay onay oneay adhay aredday includeay imhay inay ethay
ansplay, otnay onlyay ecausebay ofay ishay iestay ithway ethay agistratemay, utbay ecausebay ofay ishay olitarysay anday elusiveay
aracterchay. Itay asway ownknay, urthermorefay, atthay ehay adhay otedvay ueblay atay ishay ather-in-law’sfay irectionday. Osay itay
asway aay implesay attermay ofay ancechay atthay ehay evealedray ishay oliticalpay entimentssay, anday itay asway urelypay aay attermay ofay
uriositycay, aay apricecay, atthay oughtbray imhay otay isitvay ethay octorday orfay ethay eatmenttray ofay aay ainpay atthay ehay idday otnay
avehay. Inay ethay enday atthay elledsmay ofay amphoratedcay obwebscay ehay oundfay imselfhay acingfay aay indkay ofay ustyday
iguanaay osewhay ungslay istledwhay enwhay ehay eathedbray. Eforebay askingay imhay anyay uestionsqay ethay octorday ooktay
imhay otay ethay indowway anday examineday ethay insideay ofay ishay owerlay eyeliday. It’s“ay otnay ere,”thay Aurelianoay aidsay,
ollowingfay atwhay eythay oldtay imhay. Ehay ushedpay ethay ipstay ofay ishay ingersfay intoay ishay iverlay anday addeday: ere’s“Hay
erewhay Iay avehay ethay ainpay atthay on’tway etlay emay eep.”slay Enthay Dr.ay Ogueranay osedclay ethay indowway ithway ethay
etextpray atthay erethay asway ootay uchmay unsay, anday explaineday otay imhay inay implesay ermstay atthay itay asway aay atrioticpay
utyday otay assassinateay Onservativescay. Orfay everalsay aysday Aurelianoay arriedcay aay allsmay ottlebay ofay illspay inay ishay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


irtshay ocketpay. Ehay ouldway aketay itay outay everyay otway ourshay, utpay eethray illspay inay ethay almpay ofay ishay andhay, anday oppay
emthay intoay ishay outhmay orfay emthay otay ebay owlyslay issolvedday onay ishay onguetay. Onday Apolinaray Oscotemay ademay
unfay ofay Inisay aithfay inay omeopathyhay, utbay osethay owhay ereway inay onay ethay otplay ecognizedray anotheray oneay ofay eirthay
eoplepay inay imhay. Almostay allay ofay ethay onssay ofay ethay oundersfay ereway implicateday, althoughay onenay ofay emthay ewknay
oncretelycay atwhay actionay eythay ereway ottingplay. Everthelessnay, ethay ayday ethay octorday evealedray ethay ecretsay otay
Aurelianoay, ethay atterlay eliciteday ethay olewhay anplay ofay ethay onspiracycay. Althoughay ehay asway onvincedcay atay atthay
imetay ofay ethay urgencyay ofay iquidatinglay ethay Onservativecay egimeray, ethay otplay orrifiedhay imhay. Dr.ay Ogueranay adhay
aay ystiquemay ofay ersonalpay assassinationay. Ishay ystemsay asway educedray otay oordinatingcay aay eriessay ofay individualay
actionsay ichwhay inay oneay astermay okestray overingcay ethay olewhay ationnay ouldway iquidatelay ethay unctionariesfay ofay
ethay egimeray alongay ithway eirthay espectiveray amiliesfay, especiallyay ethay ildrenchay, inay orderay otay exterminateay
Onservatismcay atay itsay ootsray. Onday Apolinaray Oscotemay, ishay ifeway, anday ishay ixsay aughtersday, eedlessnay otay aysay,
ereway onay ethay istlay.

You’re“ay onay Iberallay oray anythingay else,”ay Aurelianoay oldtay imhay ithoutway ettinggay exciteday. You’re“ay othingnay
utbay aay utcher.”bay

In“ay atthay ase,”cay ethay octorday epliedray ithway equalay almcay, ive“gay emay ackbay ethay ottlebay. Youay on’tday eednay itay
anyay ore.”may

Onlyay ixsay onthsmay aterlay idday Aurelianoay earnlay atthay ethay octorday adhay ivengay upay onay imhay asay aay anmay ofay actionay
ecausebay ehay asway aay entimentalsay ersonpay ithway onay uturefay, ithway aay assivepay aracterchay, anday aay efiniteday olitarysay
ocationvay. Eythay iedtray otay eepkay imhay urroundedsay, earingfay atthay ehay ouldway etraybay ethay onspiracycay. Aurelianoay
almedcay emthay ownday: ehay ouldway otnay aysay aay ordway, utbay onay ethay ightnay eythay entway otay urdermay ethay Oscotemay
amilyfay eythay ouldway indfay imhay uardinggay ethay oorday. Ehay owedshay uchsay aay onvincingcay ecisionday atthay ethay anplay
asway ostponedpay orfay anay indefiniteay ateday. Itay asway uringday osethay aysday atthay Ursulaay askeday ishay opinionay aboutay
ethay arriagemay etweenbay Ietropay Espicray anday Amarantaay, anday ehay answereday atthay esethay ereway otnay imestay otay ebay
inkingthay aboutay uchsay aay ingthay. Orfay aay eekway ehay adhay eenbay arryingcay anay old-fashioneday istolpay underay ishay irtshay.
Ehay eptkay ishay eyesay onay ishay iendsfray. Inay ethay afternoonay ehay ouldway ogay avehay offeecay ithway Osejay Arcadioay anday
Ebecaray, owhay adhay egunbay otay utpay eirthay ousehay inay orderay, anday omfray evensay o’clockay onay ehay ouldway ayplay
ominoesday ithway ishay ather-in-lawfay. Atay unchtimelay ehay asway attingchay ithway Arcadioay, owhay asway alreadyay aay ugehay
adolescentay, anday ehay oundfay imhay oremay anday oremay exciteday overay ethay imminenceay ofay arway. Inay oolschay, erewhay
Arcadioay adhay upilspay olderay anthay imselfhay ixedmay inay ithway ildrenchay owhay ereway arelybay eginningbay otay alktay, ethay
Uberalay everfay adhay aughtcay onay. Erethay asway alktay ofay ootingshay Atherfay Icanornay, ofay urningtay ethay urchchay intoay aay
oolschay, ofay institutingay eefray ovelay. Aurelianoay iedtray otay almcay ownday ishay ivedray. Ehay ecommendedray iscretionday
anday udencepray otay imhay. Eafday otay ishay almcay easoningray, otay ishay ensesay ofay ealityray, Arcadioay eproachedray imhay inay
ublicpay orfay ishay eaknessway ofay aracterchay. Aurelianoay aitedway. Inallyfay, inay ethay eginningbay ofay Ecemberday,
Ursulaay urstbay intoay ethay orkshopway allay upsetay.

ar’s“Way okenbray out!”ay

Arway, inay actfay, adhay okenbray outay eethray onthsmay eforebay. Artialmay awlay asway inay effectay inay ethay olewhay ountrycay.
Ethay onlyay oneay owhay ewknay itay immediatelyay asway Onday Apolinaray Oscotemay, utbay ehay idday otnay ivegay ethay ewsnay
evenay otay ishay ifeway ilewhay ethay armyay atoonplay atthay asway otay occupyay ethay owntay ybay urprisesay asway onay itsay ayway.
Eythay entereday oiselesslynay eforebay awnday, ithway otway iecespay ofay ightlay artilleryay awndray ybay ulesmay, anday eythay etsay
upay eirthay eadquartershay inay ethay oolschay. Aay  p.m.ay urfewcay asway establisheday. Aay oremay asticdray earchsay anthay ethay
eviouspray oneay asway undertakenay, ousehay ybay ousehay, anday isthay imetay eythay evenay ooktay armfay implementsay. Eythay
aggeddray outay Dr.ay Ogueranay, iedtay imhay otay aay eetray inay ethay uaresqay, anday otshay imhay ithoutway anyay ueday ocesspray ofay
awlay. Atherfay Icanornay iedtray otay impressay ethay ilitarymay authoritiesay ithway ethay iraclemay ofay evitationlay anday adhay
ishay eadhay itsplay openay ybay ethay uttbay ofay aay oldier’ssay ifleray. Ethay Iberallay exaltationay adhay eenbay extinguisheday intoay aay
ilentsay errortay. Aurelianoay, alepay, ysteriousmay, ontinuedcay ayingplay ominoesday ithway ishay ather-in-lawfay. Ehay
understooday atthay inay itespay ofay ishay esentpray itletay ofay ivilcay anday ilitarymay eaderlay ofay ethay owntay, Onday Apolinaray
Oscotemay asway onceay oremay aay igureheadfay. Ethay ecisionsday ereway ademay ybay ethay armyay aptaincay, owhay eachay
orningmay ollectedcay anay extraordinaryay evylay orfay ethay efenseday ofay ublicpay orderay. Ourfay oldierssay underay ishay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


ommandcay atchedsnay aay omanway owhay adhay eenbay ittenbay ybay aay admay ogday omfray erhay amilyfay anday illedkay erhay ithway
eirthay ifleray uttsbay. Oneay Undaysay, otway eeksway afteray ethay occupationay, Aurelianoay entereday Erineldogay
Arquez’smay ousehay anday ithway ishay usualay ersenesstay askeday orfay aay ugmay ofay offeecay ithoutway ugarsay. Enwhay ethay
otway ofay emthay ereway aloneay inay ethay itchenkay, Aurelianoay avegay ishay oicevay anay authorityay atthay adhay evernay eenbay
eardhay eforebay. et“Gay ethay oysbay eady,”ray ehay aidsay. e’re“Way oinggay otay ar.”way Erineldogay Arquezmay idday otnay
elievebay imhay.

ith“Way atwhay eapons?”way ehay askeday.

ith“Way eirs,”thay Aurelianoay epliedray.

Uesdaytay atay idnightmay inay aay admay operationay, enty-onetway enmay underay ethay ageay ofay irtythay ommandedcay ybay
Aurelianoay Uendiabay, armeday ithway abletay ivesknay anday arpenedshay oolstay, ooktay ethay arrisongay ybay urprisesay,
eizedsay ethay eaponsway, anday inay ethay ourtyardcay executeday ethay aptaincay anday ethay ourfay oldierssay owhay adhay ulledlay
ethay omanway.

Atthay amesay ightnay, ilewhay ethay oundsay ofay ethay iringfay uadsqay ouldcay ebay eardhay, Arcadioay asway amednay ivilcay
anday ilitarymay eaderlay ofay ethay owntay. Ethay arriedmay ebelsray arelybay adhay imetay otay aketay eavelay ofay eirthay ivesway,
omwhay eythay eftlay otay eirthay ouray evicesday. Eythay eftlay atay awnday, eeredchay ybay ethay eoplepay owhay adhay eenbay
iberatedlay omfray ethay errortay, otay oinjay ethay orcesfay ofay ethay evolutionaryray eneralgay Ictoriovay Edinamay, owhay,
accordingay otay ethay atestlay eportsray, asway onay ishay ayway otay Anauremay. Eforebay eavinglay, Aurelianoay oughtbray Onday
Apolinaray Oscotemay outay ofay aay osetclay. est“Ray easyay, ather-in-law,”fay ehay oldtay imhay. e“Thay ewnay overnmentgay
uaranteesgay onay itsay ordway ofay onorhay youray ersonalpay afetysay anday atthay ofay youray amily.”fay Onday Apolinaray
Oscotemay adhay oubletray identifyingay atthay onspiratorcay inay ighhay ootsbay anday ithway aay ifleray ungslay overay ishay
ouldershay ithway ethay ersonpay ehay adhay ayedplay ominoesday ithway untilay inenay inay ethay eveningay.

is“Thay isay adnessmay, Aurelito,”ay ehay exclaimeday.

ot“Nay adness,”may Aurelianoay aidsay. ar“Way. Anday on’tday allcay emay Aurelitoay anyay oremay. Ownay I’may Olonelcay
Aurelianoay Uendia.”bay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Apterchay 

OLONELcay AURELIANOay UENDIAbay organizeday irty-twothay armeday uprisingsay anday ehay ostlay emthay allay. Ehay adhay
eventeensay alemay ildrenchay ybay eventeensay ifferentday omenway anday eythay ereway exterminateday oneay afteray ethay
otheray onay aay inglesay ightnay eforebay ethay oldestay oneay adhay eachedray ethay ageay ofay irty-fivethay. Ehay urvivedsay ourteenfay
attemptsay onay ishay ifelay, eventy-threesay ambushesay, anday aay iringfay uadsqay. Ehay ivedlay oughthray aay oseday ofay
ychninestray inay ishay offeecay atthay asway enoughay otay illkay aay orsehay. Ehay efusedray ethay Orderay ofay Eritmay, ichwhay ethay
Esidentpray ofay ethay Epublicray awardeday imhay. Ehay oseray otay ebay Ommandercay inay Iefchay ofay ethay evolutionaryray
orcesfay, ithway urisdictionjay anday ommandcay omfray oneay orderbay otay ethay otheray, anday ethay anmay ostmay earedfay ybay
ethay overnmentgay, utbay ehay evernay etlay imselfhay ebay otographedphay. Ehay eclinedday ethay ifetimelay ensionpay offereday
imhay afteray ethay arway anday untilay olday ageay ehay ademay ishay ivinglay omfray ethay ittlelay oldgay ishesfay atthay ehay
anufacturedmay inay ishay orkshopway inay Acondomay. Althoughay ehay alwaysay oughtfay atay ethay eadhay ofay ishay enmay, ethay
onlyay oundway atthay ehay eceivedray asway ethay oneay ehay avegay imselfhay afteray igningsay ethay Eatytray ofay Eerlandianay,
ichwhay utpay anay enday otay almostay entytway yearsay ofay ivilcay arway. Ehay otshay imselfhay inay ethay estchay ithway aay istolpay anday
ethay ulletbay amecay outay oughthray ishay ackbay ithoutway amagingday anyay italvay organay. Ethay onlyay ingthay eftlay ofay allay atthay
asway aay eetstray atthay orebay ishay amenay inay Acondomay. Anday yetay, asay ehay eclaredday aay ewfay yearsay eforebay ehay iedday ofay
olday ageay, ehay adhay otnay expecteday anyay ofay atthay onay ethay awnday ehay eftlay ithway ishay enty-onetway enmay otay oinjay ethay
orcesfay ofay Eneralgay Ictoriovay Edinamay.

e“Way eavelay Acondomay inay youray are.”cay asway allay atthay ehay aidsay otay Arcadioay eforebay eavinglay. e“Way eavelay itay otay
youay inay oodgay apeshay, ytray otay avehay itay inay etterbay apeshay enwhay eway eturn.”ray

Arcadioay avegay aay eryvay ersonalpay interpretationay otay ethay instructionsay. Ehay inventeday aay uniformay ithway ethay
aidbray anday epauletsay ofay aay arshalmay, inspireday ybay ethay intspray inay oneay ofay Elquiades’may ooksbay, anday arounday ishay
aistway ehay uckledbay ethay abersay ithway oldgay asselstay atthay adhay elongedbay otay ethay executeday aptaincay. Ehay etsay upay ethay
otway artilleryay iecespay atay ethay entranceay otay owntay, utpay uniformsay onay ishay ormerfay upilspay, owhay adhay eenbay
amuseday ybay ishay ieryfay oclamationspray, anday etlay emthay anderway oughthray ethay eetsstray armeday inay orderay otay ivegay
outsidersay anay impressionay ofay invulnerabilityay. Itay asway aay ouble-edgedday eceptionday, orfay ethay overnmentgay idday
otnay areday attackay ethay aceplay orfay entay onthsmay, utbay enwhay itay idday itay unleasheday uchsay aay argelay orcefay againstay itay
atthay esistanceray asway iquidatedlay inay aay alfhay ourhay. Omfray ethay irstfay ayday ofay ishay uleray Arcadioay evealedray ishay
edilectionpray orfay ecreesday. Ehay ouldway eadray asay anymay asay ourfay aay ayday inay orderay otay ecreeday anday instituteay
everythingay atthay amecay intoay ishay eadhay. Ehay imposeday obligatoryay ilitarymay ervicesay orfay enmay overay eighteenay,
eclaredday otay ebay ublicpay opertypray anyay animalsay alkingway ethay eetsstray afteray ixsay inay ethay eveningay, anday ademay
enmay owhay ereway overageay earway edray armbandsay. Ehay equesteredsay Atherfay Icanornay inay ethay arishpay ousehay
underay ainpay ofay executionay anday ohibitedpray imhay omfray ayingsay assmay oray ingingray ethay ellsbay unlessay itay asway orfay aay
Iberallay ictoryvay. Inay orderay atthay onay oneay ouldway oubtday ethay everitysay ofay ishay aimsay, ehay ordereday aay iringfay uadsqay
organizeday inay ethay uaresqay anday adhay itay ootshay atay aay arecrowscay. Atay irstfay onay oneay ooktay imhay eriouslysay. Eythay
ereway, afteray allay, oolchildrenschay ayingplay atay eingbay own-upsgray. Utbay oneay ightnay, enwhay Arcadioay entway intoay
Atarino’scay orestay, ethay umpetertray inay ethay oupgray eetedgray imhay ithway aay anfarefay atthay ademay ethay ustomerscay
aughlay anday Arcadioay adhay imhay otshay orfay isrespectday orfay ethay authoritiesay. Eoplepay owhay otestedpray ereway utpay onay
eadbray anday aterway ithway eirthay anklesay inay aay etsay ofay ocksstay atthay ehay adhay etsay upay inay aay oolroomschay. You“ay
urderer!”may Ursulaay ouldway outshay atay imhay everyay imetay eshay earnedlay ofay omesay ewnay arbitraryay actay. en“Whay
Aurelianoay indsfay outay e’shay oinggay otay ootshay youay anday I’llay ebay ethay irstfay oneay otay ebay ad.”glay Utbay itay asway ofay onay useay.
Arcadioay ontinuedcay ighteningtay ethay ourniquettay ithway unnecessaryay igorray untilay ehay ecamebay ethay elestcmay
ermlay atthay Acondomay adhay everay ownknay. ow“Nay etlay emthay uffersay ethay ifference,”day Onday Apolinaray Oscotemay
aidsay onay oneay occasionay. is“Thay isay ethay Iberallay aradise.”pay Arcadioay oundfay outay aboutay itay. Atay ethay eadhay ofay aay
atrolpay ehay assaulteday ethay ousehay, estroyedday ethay urniturefay, oggedflay ethay aughtersday, anday aggeddray outay Onday
Apolinaray Oscotemay. Enwhay Ursulaay urstbay intoay ethay ourtyardcay ofay eadquartershay, afteray avinghay onegay oughthray






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


ethay owntay outingshay ameshay anday andishingbray ithway ageray aay itch-coveredpay ipwhay, Arcadioay imselfhay asway
eparingpray otay ivegay ethay uadsqay ethay ommandcay otay irefay.

I“ay areday youay otay, astard!”bay Ursulaay outedshay.

Eforebay Arcadioay adhay imetay otay eadray eshay etlay ogay ithway ethay irstfay owblay ofay ethay ashlay. I“ay areday youay otay,
urderer!”may eshay outedshay. And“ay illkay emay ootay, onsay ofay anay evilay othermay. Atthay ayway Iay on’tway avehay ethay eyesay otay
eepway orfay ethay ameshay ofay avinghay aisedray aay onster.”may Ippingwhay imhay ithoutway ercymay, eshay asedchay imhay otay
ethay ackbay ofay ethay ourtyardcay, erewhay Arcadioay urledcay upay ikelay aay ailsnay inay itsay ellshay. Onday Apolinaray Oscotemay
asway unconsciousay, iedtay otay ethay ostpay erewhay eviouslypray eythay adhay adhay ethay arecrowscay atthay adhay eenbay utcay otay
iecespay ybay otsshay iredfay inay unfay. Ethay oysbay inay ethay uadsqay atteredscay, earfulfay atthay Ursulaay ouldway ogay afteray emthay
ootay. Utbay eshay idday otnay evenay ooklay atay emthay. Eshay eftlay Arcadioay ithway Inisay uniformay orntay, oaringray ithway ainpay
anday ageray, anday eshay untieday Onday Apolinaray Oscotemay anday ooktay imhay omehay. Eforebay eavinglay ethay
eadquartershay eshay eleasedray ethay isonerspray omfray ethay ocksstay.

Omfray atthay imetay onay eshay asway ethay oneay owhay uledray inay ethay owntay. Eshay eestablishedray Undaysay assesmay,
uspendedsay ethay useay ofay edray armbandsay, anday abrogateday ethay arebrainedhay ecreesday. Utbay inay itespay ofay erhay
engthstray, eshay illstay eptway overay erhay unfortunateay atefay. Eshay eltfay osay uchmay aloneay atthay eshay oughtsay ethay uselessay
ompanycay ofay erhay usbandhay, owhay adhay eenbay orgottenfay underay ethay estnutchay eetray. ook“Lay atwhay e’veway omecay
o,”tay eshay ouldway elltay imhay asay ethay Unejay ainsray eatenedthray otay ockknay ethay eltershay ownday. ook“Lay atay ethay emptyay
ousehay, ouray ildrenchay atteredscay allay overay ethay orldway, anday ethay otway ofay usay aloneay againay, ethay amesay asay inay ethay
eginning.”bay Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay, unksay inay anay abyssay ofay unawarenessay, asway eafday otay erhay amentationslay.
Atay ethay eginningbay ofay ishay adnessmay ehay ouldway announceay ishay ailyday eedsnay ithway urgentay Atinlay asesphray. Inay
eetingflay earclay ellsspay ofay uciditylay, enwhay Amarantaay ouldway ingbray imhay ishay ealsmay ehay ouldway elltay erhay atwhay
otheredbay imhay ostmay anday ouldway acceptay erhay uckingsay assesglay anday ustardmay astersplay inay aay ocileday ayway. Utbay atay
ethay imetay enwhay Ursulaay entway otay amentlay ybay ishay idesay ehay adhay ostlay allay ontactcay ithway ealityray. Eshay ouldway athebay
imhay itbay ybay itbay asay ehay atsay onay ishay oolstay ilewhay eshay avegay imhay ewsnay ofay ethay amilyfay. Aureliano“ay entway otay arway
oremay anthay ourfay onthsmay agoay anday eway aven’thay eardhay anythingay aboutay im,”hay eshay ouldway aysay, ubbingscray ishay
ackbay ithway aay oapedsay ushbray. ose“Jay Arcadioay amecay ackbay aay igbay anmay, allertay anthay youay, anday allay overedcay ithway
eedle-worknay, utbay ehay onlyay oughtbray ameshay otay ouray ouse.”hay Eshay oughtthay eshay oticednay, oweverhay, atthay erhay
usbandhay ouldway owgray adsay ithway ethay adbay ewsnay. Enthay eshay ecidedday otay ielay otay imhay. ou‘Ray on’tway elievebay
atwhay I’may oinggay otay elltay you,”ay eshay aidsay asay eshay ewthray ashesay overay ishay excrementay inay orderay otay ickpay itay upay
ithway ethay ovelshay. od“Gay illedway atthay Osejay Arcadioay anday Ebecaray ouldshay etgay arriedmay, anday ownay ey’rethay eryvay
appy.”hay Eshay otgay otay ebay osay inceresay inay ethay eceptionday atthay eshay endeday upay ybay onsolingcay erselfhay ithway erhay
ownay ieslay. Arcadio“ay isay aay erioussay anmay ow,”nay eshay aidsay, and“ay eryvay avebray, anday aay ine-lookingfay youngay anmay
ithway ishay uniformay anday aber.”say Itay asway ikelay eakingspay otay aay eadday anmay, orfay Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay asway
alreadyay eyondbay ethay eachray ofay anyay orryway. Utbay eshay insisteday. Ehay eemedsay osay eacefulpay, osay indifferentay otay
everythingay atthay eshay ecidedday otay eleaseray imhay. Ehay idday otnay evenay ovemay omfray ishay oolstay. Ehay ayedstay erethay,
exposeday otay ethay unsay anday ethay ainray, asay ifay ethay ongsthay ereway unnecessaryay, orfay aay ominionday uperiorsay otay anyay
isiblevay ondbay eptkay imhay iedtay otay ethay unktray ofay ethay estnutchay eetray. Owardtay Augustay, enwhay interway eganbay otay
astlay oreverfay, Ursulaay asway inallyfay ableay otay ivegay imhay aay iecepay ofay ewsnay atthay oundedsay ikelay ethay uthtray.

ould“Way youay elievebay itay atthay oodgay ucklay isay illstay ouringpay ownday onay us?”ay eshay oldtay imhay. Amaranta“ay anday
ethay ianolapay Italianay areay oinggay otay etgay arried.”may

Amarantaay anday Ietropay Espicray adhay, inay actfay, eepenedday eirthay iendshipfray, otectedpray ybay Ursulaay, owhay isthay
imetay idday otnay inkthay itay ecessarynay otay atchway overay ethay isitsvay. Itay asway aay ilighttway engagementay. Ethay Italianay
ouldway arriveay atay uskday, ithway aay ardeniagay inay ishay uttonholebay, anday ehay ouldway anslatetray Etrarch’spay onnetssay orfay
Amarantaay. Eythay ouldway itsay onay ethay orchpay, uffocatedsay ybay ethay oreganoay anday ethay osesray, ehay eadingray anday eshay
ewingsay acelay uffscay, indifferentay otay ethay ocksshay anday adbay ewsnay ofay ethay arway, untilay ethay osquitoesmay ademay
emthay aketay efugeray inay ethay arlorpay. Amaranta’say ensibilitysay, erhay iscreetday utbay envelopingay endernesstay adhay
eenbay earingway anay invisibleay ebway aboutay erhay iancefay, ichwhay ehay adhay otay ushpay asideay ateriallymay ithway ishay alepay
anday inglessray ingersfay inay orderay otay eavelay ethay ousehay atay eightay o’clockay. Eythay adhay utpay ogethertay aay elightfulday






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


albumay ithway ethay ostcardspay atthay Ietropay Espicray eceivedray omfray Italyay. Eythay ereway icturespay ofay overslay inay
onelylay arkspay, ithway ignettesvay ofay eartshay iercedpay ithway arrowsay anday oldengay ibbonsray eldhay ybay ovesday. I’ve“ay
eenbay otay isthay arkpay inay Orence,”flay Ietropay Espicray ouldway aysay, oinggay oughthray ethay ardscay. A“ay ersonpay ancay utpay
outay ishay andhay anday ethay irdsbay illway omecay otay eed.”fay Ometimessay, overay aay atercolorway ofay Enicevay, ostalgianay
ouldway ansformtray ethay ellsmay ofay udmay anday utrefyingpay ellfishshay ofay ethay analscay intoay ethay armway aromaay ofay
owersflay. Amarantaay ouldway ighsay, aughlay, anday eamdray ofay aay econdsay omelandhay ofay andsomehay enmay anday
eautifulbay omenway owhay okespay aay ildlikechay anguagelay ithway ancientay itiescay ofay osewhay astpay andeurgray onlyay ethay
atscay amongay ethay embblay emainedray. Afteray ossingcray ethay oceanay inay earchsay ofay itay, afteray avinghay onfusedcay
assionpay ithway ethay ehementvay okingstray ofay Ebecaray, Ietropay Espicray adhay oundfay ovelay. Appinesshay asway
accompanieday ybay osperitypray. Ishay arehouseway atay atthay imetay occupieday almostay aay olewhay ockblay anday itay asway aay
othousehay ofay antasyfay, ithway eproductionsray ofay ethay ellbay owertay ofay Orenceflay atthay oldtay imetay ithway aay oncertcay
ofay arillonscay, anday usicmay oxesbay omfray Orrentosay anday ompactscay omfray Inachay atthay angsay ive-notefay elodiesmay
enwhay eythay ereway openeday, anday allay ethay usicalmay instmmentsay imaginableay anday allay ethay echanicalmay oystay atthay
ouldcay ebay onceivedcay. Obmnay Espicray, ishay youngeray otherbray, asway inay argechay ofay ethay orestay ecausebay Ietropay
Espicray arelybay adhay enoughay imetay otay aketay arecay ofay ethay usicmay oolschay. Anksthay otay imhay ethay Eetstray ofay ethay
Urkstay, ithway itsay azzlingday isplayday ofay ickknacksknay, ecamebay aay elodicmay oasisay erewhay oneay ouldcay orgetfay
Arcadio’say arbitraryay actsay anday ethay istantday ightmarenay ofay ethay arway. Enwhay Ursulaay ordereday ethay evivalray ofay
Undaysay assmay, Ietropay Espicray onatedday aay Ermangay armoniumhay otay ethay urchchay, organizeday aay ildren’schay
oruschay, anday eparedpray aay Egoriangray epertoryray atthay addeday aay otenay ofay endorsplay otay Atherfay Icanor’snay uietqay
iteray. Onay oneay oubtedday atthay ehay ouldway akemay Amarantaay aay ortunatefay atemay. Otnay ushingpay eirthay eelingsfay,
ettinglay emselvesthay ebay ornebay alongay ybay ethay aturalnay owflay ofay eirthay earthhay eythay eachedray aay ointpay erewhay allay
atthay asway eftlay otay oday asway etsay aay eddingway ateday. Eythay idday otnay encounteray anyay obstaclesay. Ursulaay accuseday
erselfhay inwardlyay ofay avinghay istedtway Ebecca’sray estinyday ithway epeatedray ostponementspay anday eshay asway otnay
aboutay otay adday oremay emorseray. Ethay igorray ofay ethay ourningmay orfay Emediosray adhay eenbay elegatedray otay ethay
ackgroundbay ybay ethay ortificationsmay ofay ethay arway, Aureliano’say absenceay, Arcadio’say utalitybray, anday ethay
expulsionay ofay Osejay Arcadioay anday Ebecaray. Ithway ethay imminenceay ofay ethay eddingway, Ietropay Espicray adhay
intedhay atthay Aurelianoay Osejay, inay omwhay ehay adhay irredstay upay aay ovelay atthay asway almostay ilialfay, ouldway ebay
onsideredcay eirthay oldestay ildchay. Everythingay ademay Amarantaay inkthay atthay eshay asway eadinghay owardtay aay
oothsmay appinesshay. Utbay unlikeay Ebecaray, eshay idday otnay evealray ethay ightestslay anxietyay. Ithway ethay amesay
atiencepay ithway ichwhay eshay yedday ableclothstay, ewedsay acelay asterpiecesmay, anday embroidereday eedlepointnay
eacockspay, eshay aitedway orfay Ietropay Espicray otay ebay unableay otay earbay ethay urgesay ofay ishay earthay anday oremay. Erhay ayday
amecay ithway ethay ill-fateday Octoberay ainsray. Ietropay Espicray ooktay ethay ewingsay asketbay omfray erhay aplay anday ehay oldtay
erhay, e’ll“Way etgay arriedmay extnay onth.”may Amarantaay idday otnay embletray atay ethay ontactcay ithway ishay icyay andshay.
Eshay ithdrewway ershay ikelay aay imidtay ittlelay animalay anday entway ackbay otay erhay orkway.

on’t“Day ebay implesay, Espi.”cray Eshay iledsmay. I“ay ouldn’tway arrymay youay evenay ifay Iay ereway ead.”day

Ietropay Espicray ostlay ontrolcay ofay imselfhay. Ehay eptway amelesslyshay, almostay eakingbray ishay ingersfay ithway
esperationday, utbay ehay ouldcay otnay eakbray erhay ownday. on’t“Day asteway youray ime,”tay asway allay atthay Amarantaay aidsay.
If“ay youay eallyray ovelay emay osay uchmay, on’tday etsay ootfay inay isthay ousehay again.”ay Ursulaay oughtthay eshay ouldway ogay
admay ithway ameshay. Ietropay Espicray exhausteday allay annermay ofay easplay. Ehay entway oughthray incredibleay extremesay
ofay umiliationhay. Ehay eptway oneay olewhay afternoonay inay Ursula’say aplay anday eshay ouldway avehay oldsay erhay oulsay inay
orderay otay omfortcay imhay. Onay ainyray ightsnay ehay ouldcay ebay eensay owlingpray aboutay ethay ousehay ithway anay umbrellaay,
aitingway orfay aay ightlay inay Amaranta’say edroombay. Ehay asway evernay etterbay esseddray anthay atay atthay imetay. Ishay augustay
eadhay ofay aay ormentedtay emperoray adhay acquireday aay angestray airay ofay andeurgray. Ehay eggedbay Amaranta’say iendsfray,
ethay onesay owhay ewedsay ithway erhay onay ethay orchpay, otay ytray otay ersuadepay erhay. Ehay eglectednay ishay usinessbay. Ehay
ouldway endspay ethay ayday inay ethay earray ofay ethay orestay itingwray ildway otesnay, ichwhay ehay ouldway endsay otay Amarantaay
ithway owerflay etalspay anday ieddray utterfliesbay, anday ichwhay eshay ouldway eturnray unopeneday. Ehay ouldway utshay
imselfhay upay orfay ourshay onay enday otay ayplay ethay itherzay. Oneay ightnay ehay angsay. Acondomay okeway upay inay aay indkay ofay
angelicay uporstay atthay asway ausedcay ybay aay itherzay atthay eservedday oremay anthay isthay orldway anday aay oicevay atthay edlay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


oneay otay elievebay atthay onay otheray ersonpay onay earthay ouldcay eelfay uchsay ovelay. Ietropay Espicray enthay awsay ethay ightslay
ogay onay inay everyay indowway inay owntay exceptay atthay ofay Amarantaay. Onay Ovembernay econdsay, Allay Ouls’say Ayday, ishay
otherbray openeday ethay orestay anday oundfay allay ethay ampslay ightedlay, allay ethay usicmay oxesbay openeday, anday allay ethay
ocksday ikingstray anay interminableay ourhay, anday inay ethay idstmay ofay atthay admay oncertcay ehay oundfay Ietropay Espicray atay
ethay eskday inay ethay earray ithway ishay istswray utcay ybay aay azorray anday ishay andshay ustthray intoay aay asinbay ofay enzoinbay.

Ursulaay ecreedday atthay ethay akeway ouldway ebay inay erhay ousehay. Atherfay Icanornay asway againstay aay eligiousray
eremonycay anday urialbay inay onsecratedcay oundgray. Ursulaay oodstay upay otay imhay. In“ay aay ayway atthay eithernay youay ornay
Iay ancay understanday, atthay anmay asway aay aint,”say eshay aidsay. o“Say Iay amay oinggay otay urybay imhay, againstay youray ishesway,
esidebay Elquiades’may ave.”gray Eshay idday itay ithway ethay upportsay ofay ethay olewhay owntay anday ithway aay agnificentmay
uneralfay. Amarantaay idday otnay eavelay erhay edroombay. Omfray erhay edbay eshay eardhay Ursula’say eepingway, ethay epsstay
anday isperswhay ofay ethay ultitudemay atthay invadeday ethay ousehay, ethay ailingway ofay ethay ournersmay, anday enthay aay eepday
ilencesay atthay elledsmay ofay ampledtray owersflay. Orfay aay onglay imetay eshay eptkay onay ellingsmay Ietropay Espi’scray
avenderlay eathbray atay uskday, utbay eshay adhay ethay engthstray otnay otay uccumbsay otay eliriumday. Ursulaay abandoneday erhay.
Eshay idday otnay evenay aiseray erhay eyesay otay itypay erhay onay ethay afternoonay enwhay Amarantaay entway intoay ethay itchenkay
anday utpay erhay andhay intoay ethay oalscay ofay ethay ovestay untilay itay urthay erhay osay uchmay atthay eshay eltfay onay oremay ainpay utbay
insteaday elledsmay ethay estilencepay ofay erhay ownay ingedsay eshflay. Itay asway aay upidstay urecay orfay erhay emorseray. Orfay
everalsay aysday eshay entway aboutay ethay ousehay ithway erhay andhay inay aay otpay ofay eggay iteswhay, anday enwhay ethay urnsbay
ealedhay itay appeareday asay ifay ethay iteswhay adhay alsoay arredscay overay ethay oressay onay erhay earthay. Ethay onlyay externalay
acetray atthay ethay agedytray eftlay asway ethay andagebay ofay ackblay auzegay atthay eshay utpay onay erhay urnedbay andhay anday atthay
eshay oreway untilay erhay eathday.

Arcadioay avegay aay areray isplayday ofay enerositygay ybay ecreeingday officialay ourningmay orfay Ietropay Espicray. Ursulaay
interpreteday itay asay ethay eturnray ofay ethay ayedstray amblay. Utbay eshay asway istakenmay. Eshay adhay ostlay Arcadioay, otnay
enwhay ehay adhay utpay onay ishay ilitarymay uniformay, utbay omfray ethay eginningbay. Eshay oughtthay eshay adhay aisedray imhay asay
aay onsay, asay eshay adhay aisedray Ebecaray, ithway onay ivilegespray oray iscriminationday. Everthelessnay, Arcadioay asway aay
olitarysay anday ightenedfray ildchay uringday ethay insomniaay agueplay, inay ethay idstmay ofay Ursula’say utilitarianay ervorfay,
uringday ethay eliriumday ofay Osejay Arcadioay Uendfabay, ethay ermetismhay ofay Aurelianoay, anday ethay ortalmay ivalryray
etweenbay Amarantaay anday Ebecaray. Aurelianoay adhay aughttay imhay otay eadray anday itewray, inkingthay aboutay otheray
ingsthay, asay ehay ouldway avehay oneday ithway aay angerstray. Ehay avegay imhay ishay othingclay osay atthay Isitacionvay ouldcay aketay
itay inay enwhay itay asway eadyray otay ebay ownthray awayay. Arcadioay ufferedsay omfray oesshay atthay ereway ootay argelay, omfray ishay
atchedpay antspay, omfray ishay emalefay uttocksbay. Ehay evernay ucceededsay inay ommunicatingcay ithway anyoneay etterbay
anthay ehay idday ithway Isitacionvay anday Ataurecay inay eirthay anguagelay. Elquiadesmay asway ethay onlyay oneay owhay eallyray
asway oncernedcay ithway imhay asay ehay ademay imhay istenlay otay ishay incomprehensibleay extstay anday avegay imhay essonslay
inay ethay artay ofay aguerreotypeday. Onay oneay imagineday owhay uchmay ehay eptway inay ecretsay anday ethay esperationday ithway
ichwhay ehay iedtray otay eviveray Elquiadesmay ithway ethay uselessay udystay ofay ishay aperspay. Ethay oolschay, erewhay eythay
aidpay attentionay otay imhay anday espectedray imhay, anday enthay owerpay, ithway ishay endlessay ecreesday anday ishay oriousglay
uniformay, eedfray imhay omfray ethay eightway ofay anay olday itternessbay. Oneay ightnay inay Atarino’scay orestay omeonesay
aredday elltay imhay, you“ay on’tday eserveday ethay astlay amenay youay arry.”cay Ontrarycay otay atwhay everyoneay expecteday,
Arcadioay idday otnay avehay imhay otshay.

o“Tay ymay eatgray onor,”hay ehay aidsay, I“ay amay otnay aay Uendia.”bay

Osethay owhay ewknay ethay ecretsay ofay ishay arentagepay oughtthay atthay ethay answeray eantmay atthay ehay ootay asway
awareay ofay itay, utbay ehay adhay eallyray evernay eenbay. Ilarpay Erneratay, ishay othermay, owhay adhay ademay ishay oodblay oilbay inay
ethay arkroomday, asway asay uchmay anay irresistibleay obsessionay orfay imhay asay eshay adhay eenbay irstfay orfay Osejay Arcadioay
anday enthay orfay Aurelianoay. Inay itespay ofay erhay avinghay ostlay erhay armschay anday ethay endorsplay ofay erhay aughlay, ehay
oughtsay erhay outay anday oundfay erhay ybay ethay ailtray ofay erhay ellsmay ofay okesmay. Aay ortshay imetay eforebay ethay arway, oneay
oonnay enwhay eshay asway aterlay anthay usualay inay omingcay orfay erhay youngeray onsay atay oolschay, Arcadioay asway aitingway
orfay erhay inay ethay oomray erewhay ehay asway accustomeday otay aketay ishay iestasay anday erewhay ehay aterlay etsay upay ethay ocksstay.
Ilewhay ethay ildchay ayedplay inay ethay ourtyardcay, ehay aitedway inay ishay ammockhay, emblingtray ithway anxietyay, owingknay
atthay Illarpay Erneratay ouldway avehay otay asspay oughthray erethay. Eshay arriveday. Arcadioay abbedgray erhay ybay ethay istwray
