anday iedtray otay ullpay erhay intoay ethay ammockhay. I“ay an’tcay, Iay an’t,”cay Ilarpay Erneratay aidsay inay orrorhay. You“ay an’tcay
imagineay owhay uchmay Iay ouldway ikelay otay akemay youay appyhay, utbay asay Odgay isay ymay itnessway Iay an’t.”cay Arcadioay ooktay
erhay ybay ethay aistway ithway ishay emendoustray ereditaryhay engthstray anday ehay eltfay ethay orldway isappearday ithway ethay
ontactcay ofay erhay inskay. on’t“Day ayplay ethay aint,”say ehay aidsay. After“ay allay, everybodyay owsknay atthay you’reay aay
ore.”whay Ilarpay overcameay ethay isgustday atthay erhay iserablemay atefay inspireday inay erhay.

e“Thay ildrenchay illway indfay out,”ay eshay urmuredmay. It“ay illway ebay etterbay ifay youay eavelay ethay arbay offay ethay oorday
onight.”tay

Arcadioay aitedway orfay erhay atthay ightnay emblingtray ithway everfay inay ishay ammockhay. Ehay aitedway ithoutway
eepingslay, isteninglay otay ethay arouseday icketscray inay ethay endlessay ourshay ofay earlyay orningmay anday ethay implacableay
ellingtay ofay imetay ybay ethay urlewscay, oremay anday oremay onvincedcay atthay ehay adhay eenbay eceivedday. Uddenlysay, enwhay
anxietyay adhay okenbray ownday intoay ageray, ethay oorday openeday. Aay ewfay onthsmay aterlay, acingfay ethay iringfay uadsqay,
Arcadioay ouldway eliveray ethay anderingway epsstay inay ethay assroomclay, ethay umblingstay againstay enchesbay, anday
inallyfay ethay ulkbay ofay aay odybay inay ethay adowsshay ofay ethay oomray anday ethay eathingbray ofay airay atthay asway umpedpay ybay aay
earthay atthay asway otnay ishay. Ehay etchedstray outay ishay andhay anday oundfay anotheray andhay ithway otway ingsray onay ethay
amesay ingerfay aboutay otay ogay astrayay inay ethay arknessday. Ehay eltfay ethay ucturestray ofay ethay einsvay, ethay ulsepay ofay itsay
isfortunemay, anday eltfay ethay ampday almpay ithway aay ifelinelay utcay offay atay ethay asebay ofay ethay umbthay ybay ethay awsclay ofay
eathday. Enthay ehay ealizedray atthay isthay asway otnay ethay omanway ehay asway aitingway orfay, ecausebay eshay idday otnay ellsmay ofay
okesmay utbay ofay owerflay otionlay, anday eshay adhay inflateday, indblay eastsbray ithway ipplesnay ikelay, aay an’smay, aay exsay asay
onystay anday oundray asay aay utnay, anday ethay aoticchay endernesstay ofay exciteday inexperienceay. Eshay asway aay irginvay anday
eshay adhay ethay unlikelyay amenay ofay Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay. Ilarpay Erneratay adhay aidpay erhay iftyfay esospay, alfhay ofay
erhay ifelay avingssay, otay oday atwhay eshay asway oingday. Arcadioay, adhay eensay erhay anymay imestay orkingway inay erhay arents’pay
allsmay oodfay orestay utbay ehay adhay evernay akentay aay oodgay ooklay atay erhay ecausebay eshay adhay atthay areray irtuevay ofay evernay
existingay ompletelycay exceptay atay ethay opportuneay omentmay. Utbay omfray atthay ayday onay ehay uddledhay ikelay aay atcay inay
ethay armthway ofay erhay armpitay Eshay ouldway ogay otay ethay oolschay atay iestasay imetay ithway ethay onsentcay ofay erhay arentspay,
otay omwhay Ilarpay Erneratay idhay aidpay ethay otheray alfhay ofay erhay avingssay. Aterlay onay, enwhay ethay overnmentgay oopstray
islodgedday emthay omfray ethay aceplay erewhay eythay adhay ademay ovelay, eythay idday itay amongay ethay anscay ofay ardlay anday
ackssay ofay orncay inay ethay ackbay ofay ethay orestay. Aboutay ethay imetay atthay Arcadioay asway amednay ivilcay anday ilitarymay
eaderlay eythay adhay aay aughterday.

Ethay onlyay elativesray owhay ewknay aboutay itay ereway Osejay Arcadioay anday Ebecaray, ithway omwhay Arcadioay
aintainedmay oseclay elationsray atay atthay imetay, asedbay otnay osay uchmay onay inshipkay asay onay omplicitycay. Osejay Arcadioay
adhay utpay ishay ecknay intoay ethay aritalmay yokeay. Ebeca’sray irmfay aracterchay, ethay oracityvay ofay erhay omachstay, erhay
enacioustay ambitionay absorbeday ethay emendoustray energyay ofay erhay usbandhay, owhay adhay eenbay angedchay omfray aay
azylay, oman-chasingway anmay intoay anay enormousay orkway animalay. Eythay eptkay aay eanclay anday eatnay ousehay. Ebecaray
ouldway openay itay ideway atay awnday anday ethay indway omfray ethay aveyardgray ouldway omecay inay oughthray ethay indowsway
anday ogay outay oughthray ethay oorsday otay ethay yarday anday eavelay ethay itewashedwhay allsway anday urniturefay annedtay ybay
ethay altpetersay ofay ethay eadday. Erhay ungerhay orfay earthay, ethay oc-clocclay ofay erhay arents’pay onesbay, ethay impatienceay ofay
erhay oodblay asay itay acedfay Ietropay Espi’scray assivitypay ereway elegatedray otay ethay atticay ofay erhay emorymay. Allay ayday onglay
eshay ouldway embroideray esidebay ethay indowway, ithdrawnway omfray ethay uneasinessay ofay ethay arway, untilay ethay
eramiccay otspay ouldway eginbay otay ibratevay inay ethay upboardcay anday eshay ouldway etgay upay otay armway ethay ealmay, uchmay
eforebay ethay appearanceay, irstfay, ofay ethay angymay oundshay, anday enthay ofay ethay olossuscay inay eggingslay anday ursspay
ithway aay ouble-barreledday otgunshay, owhay ometimessay arriedcay aay eerday onay ishay ouldershay anday almostay alwaysay aay
ingstray ofay abbitsray oray ildway ucksday. Oneay afternoonay, atay ethay eginningbay ofay ishay uleray, Arcadioay aidpay emthay aay
urprisesay isitvay. Eythay adhay otnay eensay imhay incesay eythay adhay eftlay ethay ousehay, utbay ehay eemedsay osay iendlyfray anday
amiliarfay atthay eythay inviteday imhay otay areshay ethay ewstay.

Onlyay enwhay eythay ereway avinghay offeecay idday Arcadioay evealray ethay otivemay ehindbay ishay isitvay: ehay adhay
eceivedray aay omplaintcay againstay Osejay Arcadioay. Itay asway aidsay atthay ehay adhay egunbay ybay owingplay ishay ownay yarday
anday adhay onegay aightstray aheaday intoay eighboringnay andslay, ockingknay ownday encesfay anday uildingsbay ithway ishay
oxenay untilay ehay ooktay orciblefay ossessionpay ofay ethay estbay otsplay ofay andlay arounday. Onay ethay easantspay omwhay ehay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


adhay otnay espoiledday ecausebay ehay asway otnay interesteday inay eirthay andslay, ehay eviedlay aay ontributioncay ichwhay ehay
ollectedcay everyay Aturdaysay ithway ishay untinghay ogsday anday ishay ouble-barreledday otgunshay. Ehay idday otnay enyday itay.
Ehay asedbay ishay ightray onay ethay actfay atthay ethay usurpeday andslay adhay eenbay istributedday ybay Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay
atay ethay imetay ofay ethay oundingfay, anday ehay oughtthay itay ossiblepay otay ovepray atthay ishay atherfay adhay eenbay azycray everay
incesay atthay imetay, orfay ehay adhay isposedday ofay aay atrimonypay atthay eallyray elongedbay otay ethay amilyfay. Itay asway anay
unnecessaryay allegationay, ecausebay Arcadioay adhay otnay omecay otay oday usticejay. Ehay implysay offereday otay etsay upay aay
egistryray officeay osay atthay Osejay Arcadioay ouldcay egalizelay ishay itletay otay ethay usurpeday andlay, underay ethay onditioncay
atthay ehay elegateday otay ethay ocallay overnmentgay ethay ightray otay ollectcay ethay ontributionscay. Eythay ademay anay
agreementay. Yearsay aterlay, enwhay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay examineday ethay itlestay otay opertypray, ehay oundfay
egisteredray inay ishay other’sbray amenay allay ofay ethay andlay etweenbay ethay illhay erewhay ishay yarday asway onay upay otay ethay
orizonhay, includingay ethay emeterycay, anday iscoveredday atthay uringday ethay elevenay onthsmay ofay ishay uleray, Arcadioay
adhay ollectedcay otnay onlyay ethay oneymay ofay ethay ontributionscay, utbay adhay alsoay ollectedcay eesfay omfray eoplepay orfay
ethay ightray otay urybay eirthay eadday inay Osejay Arcadio’say andlay.

Itay ooktay Ursulaay everalsay onthsmay otay indfay outay atwhay asway alreadyay ublicpay owledgeknay ecausebay eoplepay idhay
itay omfray erhay osay asay otnay otay increaseay erhay ufferingsay. Atay irstfay eshay uspectedsay itay. Arcadio“ay isay uildingbay aay
ouse,”hay eshay onfidedcay ithway eignedfay idepray otay erhay usbandhay asay eshay iedtray otay utpay aay oonfulspay ofay alabashcay
yrupsay intoay ishay outhmay. Everthelessnay, eshay involuntarilyay ighedsay anday aidsay, I“ay on’tday owknay ywhay, utbay allay isthay
ashay aay adbay ellsmay otay e.”may Aterlay onay, enwhay eshay oundfay outay atthay Arcadioay adhay otnay onlyay uiltbay aay ousehay utbay
adhay ordereday omesay Iennesevay urniturefay, eshay onfirmedcay erhay uspicionsay atthay ehay asway usingay ublicpay undsfay.
You’re“ay ethay ameshay ofay ouray amilyfay ame,”nay eshay outedshay atay imhay oneay Undaysay afteray assmay enwhay eshay awsay
imhay inay ishay ewnay ousehay ayingplay ardscay ithway ishay officersay. Arcadioay aidpay onay attentionay otay erhay. Onlyay enthay idday
Ursulaay owknay atthay ehay adhay aay ix-month-oldsay aughterday anday atthay Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay, ithway omwhay ehay
asway ivinglay outsideay ofay arriagemay, asway egnantpray againay. Eshay ecidedday otay itewray otay Olonelcay Aurelianoay
Uendiabay, ereverwhay ehay asway, otay ingbray imhay upay otay ateday onay ethay ituationsay. Utbay ethay ast-movingfay eventsay ofay
osethay aysday otnay onlyay eventedpray erhay ansplay omfray eingbay arriedcay outay, eythay ademay erhay egretray avinghay
onceivedcay emthay. Ethay arway, ichwhay untilay enthay adhay eenbay onlyay aay ordway otay esignateday aay aguevay anday emoteray
ircumstancecay, ecamebay aay oncretecay anday amaticdray ealityray. Arounday ethay enday ofay Ebruaryfay anay olday omanway
ithway anay ashenay ooklay arriveday inay Acondomay idingray aay onkeyday oadedlay ownday ithway oomsbray. Eshay eemedsay osay
inoffensiveay atthay ethay entriessay etlay erhay asspay ithoutway anyay uestionsqay asay anotheray endorvay, oneay ofay ethay anymay
owhay oftenay arriveday omfray ethay ownstay inay ethay ampsway. Eshay entway irectlyday otay ethay arracksbay. Arcadioay eceivedray
erhay inay ethay aceplay erewhay ethay assroomclay useday otay ebay anday ichwhay atay atthay imetay adhay eenbay ansformedtray intoay aay
indkay ofay earguardray encampmentay, ithway oiledray ammockshay anginghay onay ookshay anday atsmay iledpay upay inay ethay
ornerscay, anday iflesray anday arbinescay anday evenay untinghay otgunsshay atteredscay onay ethay oorflay. Ethay olday omanway
iffenedstay intoay aay ilitarymay alutesay eforebay identifyingay erselfhay:

I“ay amay Olonelcay Egoriogray Evenson.”stay

Ehay oughtbray adbay ewsnay. Ethay astlay enterscay ofay Iberallay esistanceray, accordingay otay atwhay ehay aidsay, ereway
eingbay ipedway outay. Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay, omwhay ehay adhay eftlay ightingfay inay etreatray earnay Iohacharay,
adhay ivengay imhay aay essagemay orfay Arcadioay. Ehay ouldshay urrendersay ethay owntay ithoutway esistanceray onay ethay
onditioncay atthay ethay iveslay anday opertypray ofay Iberalslay ouldway ebay espectedray. Arcadioay examineday atthay angestray
essengermay owhay ouldcay avehay eenbay aay ugitivefay andmothergray ithway aay ooklay ofay itypay.

You“ay avehay oughtbray omethingsay inay itingwray, aturally,”nay ehay aidsay.

aturally,”“Nay ethay emissaryay answereday, I“ay avehay oughtbray othingnay ofay ethay ortsay. It’say easyay otay understanday
atthay underay ethay esentpray ircumstancescay aay ersonpay an’tcay arrycay anythingay atthay ouldway ompromisecay im.”hay

Asay ehay asway eakingspay ehay eachedray intoay ishay odicebay anday ooktay outay aay allsmay oldgay ishfay. I“ay inkthay atthay isthay
illway ebay ufficient,”say ehay aidsay. Arcadioay ouldcay eesay atthay indeeday itay asway oneay ofay ethay ittlelay ishesfay ademay ybay
Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay. Utbay anyoneay ouldcay avehay oughtbay itay eforebay ethay arway oray olenstay itay, anday itay adhay
onay eritmay asay aay afe-conductsay asspay. Ethay essengermay evenay entway otay ethay extremeay ofay iolatingvay aay ilitarymay
ecretsay osay atthay eythay ouldway elievebay ishay identityay. Ehay evealedray atthay ehay asway onay aay issionmay otay Urasaocay,






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


erewhay ehay opedhay otay ecruitray exilesay omfray allay overay ethay Aribbeancay anday acquireay armsay anday uppliessay
ufficientsay otay attemptay aay andinglay atay ethay enday ofay ethay yearay. Ithway aithfay inay atthay anplay. Olonelcay Aurelianoay
Uendiabay asway otnay inay avorfay ofay anyay uselessay acrificessay atay atthay imetay. Utbay Arcadioay asway inflexibleay. Ehay adhay
ethay isonerpray utpay intoay ethay ocksstay untilay ehay ouldcay ovepray ishay identityay anday ehay esolvedray otay efendday ethay owntay
otay ethay eathday.

Ehay idday otnay avehay onglay otay aitway. Ethay ewsnay ofay ethay Iberallay efeatday asway oremay anday oremay oncretecay.
Owardtay ethay enday ofay Archmay, eforebay aay awnday ofay ematurepray ainray, ethay ensetay almcay ofay ethay eviouspray eeksway
asway abruptlyay okenbray ybay ethay esperateday oundssay ofay aay ornetcay anday aay annoncay otshay atthay ockedknay ownday ethay
eeplestay ofay ethay urchchay. Actuallyay, Arcadio’say ecisionday otay esistray asway adnessmay. Ehay adhay onlyay iftyfay oorlypay
armeday enmay ithway aay ationray ofay entytway artridgescay apieceay. Utbay amongay emthay, ishay ormerfay upilspay, exciteday ybay
ethay igh-soundinghay oclamationspray, ethay eterminationday eignedray otay acrificesay eirthay insskay orfay aay ostlay ausecay.
Inay ethay idstmay ofay ethay ampingtray ofay ootsbay, ontradictorycay ommandscay, annoncay otsshay atthay ademay ethay earthay
embletray, ildway ootingshay, anday ethay enselesssay oundsay ofay ornetscay, ethay upposedsay Olonelcay Evensonstay
anagedmay otay eakspay otay Arcadioay. on’t“Day etlay emay undergoay ethay indignityay ofay yingday inay ethay ocksstay inay esethay
omen’sway othes,”clay ehay aidsay otay imhay. If“ay Iay avehay otay ieday, etlay emay ieday ighting.”fay Ehay ucceededsay inay onvincingcay
imhay. Arcadioay ordereday emthay otay ivegay imhay aay eaponway anday entytway artridgescay, anday ehay eftlay imhay ithway ivefay
enmay otay efendday eadquartershay ilewhay ehay entway offay ithway ishay affstay otay eadhay upay ethay esistanceray. Ehay idday otnay
etgay otay ethay oadray otay ethay ampsway. Ethay arricadesbay adhay eenbay okenbray anday ethay efendersday ereway openlyay
ightingfay inay ethay eetsstray, irstfay untilay eythay useday upay eirthay ationray ofay ifleray ulletsbay, enthay ithway istolspay againstay
iflesray, anday inallyfay andhay otay andhay. Ithway ethay imminenceay ofay efeatday, omesay omenway entway intoay ethay eetstray
armeday ithway icksstay anday itchenkay ivesknay. Inay atthay onfusioncay Arcadioay oundfay Amarantaay, owhay asway ookinglay
orfay imhay ikelay aay adwomanmay, inay erhay ightgownnay anday ithway otway olday istolspay atthay adhay elongedbay otay Osejay
Arcadioay Uendiabay. Ehay avegay ishay ifleray otay anay officeray owhay adhay eenbay isarmedday inay ethay ightfay anday escapeday
ithway Amarantaay oughthray aay earbynay eetstray otay aketay erhay omehay. Ursulaay asway, inay ethay oorwayday aitingway,
indifferentay otay ethay annoncay otsshay atthay adhay openeday upay aay olehay inay ethay ontfray ofay ethay ousehay extnay oorday. Ethay
ainray asway ettinglay upay, utbay ethay eetsstray ereway asay ipperyslay anday asay oothsmay asay eltedmay oapsay, anday oneay adhay otay
uessgay istancesday inay ethay arknessday. Arcadioay eftlay Amarantaay ithway Ursulaay anday ademay anay attemptay otay acefay otway
oldierssay owhay adhay openeday upay ithway eavyhay iringfay omfray ethay ornercay. Ethay olday istolspay atthay adhay eenbay eptkay
orfay anymay yearsay inay ethay ureaubay idday otnay orkway. Otectingpray Arcadioay ithway erhay odybay, Ursulaay iedtray otay agdray
imhay owardtay ethay ousehay.

ome“Cay alongay inay ethay amenay ofay Od,”gay eshay outedshay atay imhay. ere’s“Thay eenbay enoughay adness!”may

Ethay oldierssay aimeday atay emthay.

et“Lay ogay ofay atthay anmay, a’am,”may oneay ofay emthay outedshay, or“ay eway on’tway ebay esponsible!”ray

Arcadioay ushedpay Ursulaay owardtay ethay ousehay anday urrenderedsay. Aay ortshay imetay aterlay ethay ootingshay
oppedstay anday ethay ellsbay eganbay otay olltay. Ethay esistanceray adhay eenbay ipedway outay inay esslay anthay alfhay anay ourhay. Otnay
aay inglesay oneay ofay Arcadio’say enmay adhay urvivedsay ethay attackay, utbay eforebay yingday eythay adhay illedkay eethray
undredhay oldierssay. Ethay astlay ongholdstray asway ethay arracksbay. Eforebay eingbay attackeday, ethay upposedsay Olonelcay
Egoriogray Evensonstay adhay eedfray ethay isonerspray anday ordereday ishay enmay otay ogay outay anday ightfay inay ethay eetstray.
Ethay extraordinaryay obilitymay anday accurateay aimay ithway ichwhay ehay acedplay ishay entytway artridgescay avegay ethay
impressionay atthay ethay arracksbay asway ell-defendedway, anday ethay attackersay ewblay itay otay iecespay ithway annoncay irefay.
Ethay aptaincay owhay irectedday ethay operationay asway artledstay otay indfay ethay ubbleray esertedday anday aay inglesay eadday
anmay inay ishay undershortsay ithway anay emptyay ifleray illstay utchedclay inay anay armay atthay adhay eenbay ownblay ompletelycay
offay. Ehay adhay aay oman’sway ullfay eadhay ofay airhay eldhay atay ethay ecknay ithway aay ombcay anday onay ishay ecknay aay ainchay ithway aay
allsmay oldgay ishfay. Enwhay ehay urnedtay imhay overay ithway ethay iptay ofay ishay ootbay anday utpay ethay ightlay onay ishay acefay, ethay
aptaincay asway erplexedpay. esus“Jay Ist,”chray ehay exclaimeday. Otheray officersay amecay overay.

ook“Lay erewhay isthay ellowfay urnedtay up,”ay ethay aptaincay aidsay. It’s“ay Egoriogray Evenson.”stay

Atay awnday, afteray aay ummarysay ourtcay artialmay, Arcadioay asway otshay againstay ethay allway ofay ethay emeterycay. Inay ethay
astlay otway ourshay ofay ishay ifelay ehay idday otnay anagemay otay understanday ywhay ethay earfay atthay adhay ormentedtay imhay

incesay ildhoodchay adhay isappearedday. Impassiveay, ithoutway evenay orryingway aboutay akingmay aay owshay ofay ishay
ecentray averybray, ehay istenedlay otay ethay interminableay argeschay ofay ethay accusationay. Ehay oughtthay aboutay Ursulaay,
owhay atay atthay ourhay ustmay avehay eenbay underay ethay estnutchay eetray avinghay offeecay ithway Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay.
Ehay oughtthay aboutay ishay eight-month-olday aughterday, owhay illstay adhay onay amenay, anday aboutay ethay ildchay owhay
asway oinggay otay ebay ornbay inay Augustay. Ehay oughtthay aboutay Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay, omwhay ehay adhay eftlay ethay
ightnay eforebay altingsay ownday aay eerday orfay extnay ay’sday unchlay, anday ehay issedmay erhay airhay ouringpay overay erhay
ouldersshay anday erhay eyelashesay, ichwhay ookedlay asay ifay eythay ereway artificialay. Ehay oughtthay aboutay ishay eoplepay
ithoutway entimentalitysay, ithway aay ictstray osingday ofay ishay accountsay ithway ifelay, eginningbay otay understanday owhay
uchmay ehay eallyray ovedlay ethay eoplepay ehay atedhay ostmay. Ethay esidentpray ofay ethay ourt-martialcay eganbay ishay inalfay
eechspay enwhay Arcadioay ealizedray atthay otway ourshay adhay assedpay. Even“ay ifay ethay ovenpray argeschay idday otnay avehay
eritmay enough,”ay ethay esidentpray asway ayingsay, e“thay irresponsibleay anday iminalcray oldnessbay ithway ichwhay ethay
accuseday ovedray ishay ubordinatessay onay otay aay uselessay eathday ouldway ebay enoughay otay eserveday apitalcay
unishment.”pay Inay ethay atteredshay oolhouseschay erewhay orfay ethay irstfay imetay ehay adhay eltfay ethay ecuritysay ofay owerpay,
aay ewfay eetfay omfray ethay oomray erewhay ehay adhay omecay otay owknay ethay uncertaintyay ofay ovelay, Arcadioay oundfay ethay
ormalityfay ofay eathday idiculousray. Eathday eallyray idday otnay attermay otay imhay utbay ifelay idday, anday ereforethay ethay
ensationsay ehay eltfay enwhay eythay avegay eirthay ecisionday asway otnay aay eelingfay ofay earfay utbay ofay ostalgianay. Ehay idday otnay
eakspay untilay eythay askeday imhay orfay ishay astlay equestray.

ell“Tay ymay ife,”way ehay answereday inay aay ell-modulatedway oicevay, o“tay ivegay ethay irlgay ethay amenay ofay Ursula.”ay Ehay
ausedpay anday aidsay itay againay: Ursula“ay, ikelay erhay andmothergray. Anday elltay erhay alsoay atthay ifay ethay ildchay atthay isay otay ebay
ornbay isay aay oybay, eythay ouldshay amenay imhay Osejay Arcadioay, otnay orfay ishay uncleay, utbay orfay ishay andfather.”gray

Eforebay eythay ooktay imhay otay ethay executionay allway Atherfay Icanornay iedtray otay attenday imhay. I“ay avehay othingnay
otay epent,”ray Arcadioay aidsay, anday ehay utpay imselfhay underay ethay ordersay ofay ethay uadsqay afteray inkingdray aay upcay ofay
ackblay offeecay. Ethay eaderlay ofay ethay uadsqay, aay ecialistspay inay ummarysay executionsay, adhay aay amenay atthay adhay uchmay
oremay aboutay itay anthay ancechay: Aptaincay Oqueray Arnicerocay, ichwhay eantmay utcherbay. Onay ethay ayway otay ethay
emeterycay, underay ethay ersistentpay izzledray, Arcadioay awsay atthay aay adiantray Ednesdayway asway eakingbray outay onay
ethay orizonhay. Ishay ostalgianay isappearedday ithway ethay istmay anday eftlay anay immenseay uriositycay inay itsay aceplay. Onlyay
enwhay eythay ordereday imhay otay utpay ishay ackbay otay ethay allway idday Arcadioay eesay Ebecaray, ithway etway airhay anday aay inkpay
oweredflay essdray, openingay ideway ethay oorday. Ehay ademay anay effortay otay etgay erhay otay ecognizeray imhay. Anday Ebecaray
idday aketay aay asualcay ooklay owardtay ethay allway anday asway aralyzedpay ithway uporstay, arelybay ableay otay eactray anday aveway
ood-byegay otay Arcadioay. Arcadioay answereday erhay ethay amesay ayway. Atay atthay instantay ethay okingsmay outhsmay ofay
ethay iflesray ereway aimeday atay imhay anday etterlay ybay etterlay ehay eardhay ethay encyclicalsay atthay Elquiadesmay adhay antedchay
anday ehay eardhay ethay ostlay epsstay ofay Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay, aay irginvay, inay ethay assroomclay, anday inay ishay osenay ehay
eltfay ethay amesay icyay ardnesshay atthay adhay awndray ishay attentionay inay ethay ostrilsnay ofay ethay orpsecay ofay Emediosray.
Oh“ay, Odgay amnday it!”ay ehay anagedmay otay inkthay. I“ay orgotfay otay aysay atthay ifay itay asway aay irlgay eythay ouldshay amenay erhay
Emedios.”ray Enthay, allay accumulateday inay ethay ipray ofay aay awclay, ehay eltfay againay allay ethay errortay atthay adhay ormentedtay
imhay inay ishay ifelay. Ethay aptaincay avegay ethay orderay otay irefay. Arcadioay arelybay adhay imetay otay utpay outay ishay estchay anday
aiseray ishay eadhay, otnay understandingay erewhay ethay othay iquidlay atthay urnedbay ishay ighsthay asway ouringpay omfray.

astards!”“Bay ehay outedshay. ong“Lay ivelay ethay Iberallay Arty!”pay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Apterchay 


EtHay ARway asway overay inay Aymay. Otway eeksway eforebay ethay overnmentgay ademay ethay officialay announcementay inay aay
igh-soundinghay oclamationpray, ichwhay omisedpray ercilessmay unishmentpay orfay osethay owhay adhay artedstay ethay
ebellionray, Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay ellfay isonerpray ustjay asay ehay asway aboutay otay eachray ethay esternway ontierfray
isguisedday asay anay Indianay itchway octorday. Ofay ethay enty-onetway enmay owhay adhay ollowedfay imhay otay arway, ourteenfay
ellfay inay ombatcay, ixsay ereway oundedway, anday onlyay oneay accompanieday imhay atay ethay omentmay ofay inalfay efeatday:
Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay. Ethay ewsnay ofay ishay apturecay asway announceday inay Acondomay ithway aay ecialspay
oclamationpray. e’s“Hay alive,”ay Ursulaay oldtay erhay usbandhay. et’s“Lay aypray otay Odgay orfay ishay enemiesay otay owshay
imhay emency.”clay Afteray eethray aysday ofay eepingway, oneay afternoonay asay eshay asway irringstay omesay eetsway ilkmay
andycay inay ethay itchenkay eshay eardhay erhay on’ssay oicevay earlyclay inay erhay earay. It“ay asway Aurelianoay,  eshay outedshay,
ingmnnay owardtay ethay estnutchay eetray otay elltay erhay usbandhay ethay ewsnay. I“ay on’tday owknay owhay ethay iraclemay ooktay
aceplay, utbay e’shay aliveay anday e’reway oinggay otay eesay imhay eryvay oon.”say Eshay ooktay itay orfay antedgray. Eshay adhay ethay
oorsflay ofay ethay ousehay edscmbbay anday angedchay ethay ositionpay ofay ethay urniturefay. Oneay eekway aterlay aay umorray
omfray omewheresay atthay asway otnay upportedsay ybay anyay oclamationpray avegay amaticdray onfirmationcay otay ethay
edictionpray. Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay adhay eenbay ondemnedcay otay eathday anday ethay entencesay ouldway ebay
arriedcay outay inay Acondomay asay aay essonlay otay ethay opulationpay. Onay Ondaymay, atay en-thirtytay inay ethay orningmay,
Amarantaay asway essingdray Aurelianoay Osejay enwhay eshay eardhay ethay oundsay ofay aay istantday ooptray anday ethay astblay ofay
aay ornetcay oneay econdsay eforebay Ursulaay urstbay intoay ethay oomray ithway ethay outshay: ey’re“Thay ingingbray imhay ow!”nay
Ethay ooptray uggledstray otay ubduesay ethay overflowingay owdcray ithway eirthay ifleray uttsbay. Ursulaay anday Amarantaay
anray otay ethay ornercay, ushingpay eirthay ayway oughthray, anday enthay eythay awsay imhay. Ehay ookedlay ikelay aay eggarbay. Ishay
othingclay asway orntay, ishay airhay anday eardbay ereway angledtay, anday ehay asway arefootbay. Ehay asway alkingway ithoutway
eelingfay ethay urningbay ustday, ishay andshay iedtay ehindbay ishay ackbay ithway aay operay atthay aay ountedmay officeray adhay
attacheday otay ethay eadhay ofay ishay orsehay. Alongay ithway imhay, alsoay aggedray anday efeatedday, eythay ereway ingingbray
Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay. Eythay ereway otnay adsay. Eythay eemedsay oremay isturbedday ybay ethay owdcray atthay asway
outingshay allay andslay ofay insultsay atay ethay oopstray.

y“May on!”say Ursulaay outedshay inay ethay idstmay ofay ethay uproaray, anday eshay appedslay ethay oldiersay owhay iedtray otay
oldhay erhay ackbay. Ethay officer’say orsehay earedray. Enthay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay oppedstay, emuloustray,
avoideday ethay armsay ofay ishay othermay, anday ixedfay aay ernstay ooklay onay erhay eyesay.

o“Gay omehay, Ama,”may ehay aidsay. et“Gay ermissionpay omfray ethay authoritiesay otay omecay eesay emay inay ail.”jay

Ehay ookedlay atay Amarantaay, owhay oodstay indecisivelyay otway epsstay ehindbay Ursulaay, anday ehay iledsmay asay ehay
askeday erhay, at“Whay appenedhay otay youray and?”hay Amarantaay aisedray ethay andhay ithway ethay ackblay andagebay. A“ay
urn,”bay eshay aidsay, anday ooktay Ursulaay awayay osay atthay ethay orseshay ouldway otnay unray erhay ownday. Ethay ooptray ooktay
offay. Aay ecialspay uardgay urroundedsay ethay isonerspray anday ooktay emthay otay ethay ailjay atay aay ottray.

Atay uskday Ursulaay isitedvay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay inay ailjay. Eshay adhay iedtray otay etgay ermissionpay oughthray
Onday Apolinaray Oscotemay, utbay ehay adhay ostlay allay authorityay inay ethay acefay ofay ethay ilitarymay omnipotenceay. Atherfay
Icanornay asway inay edbay ithway epatichay everfay. Ethay arentspay ofay Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay, owhay adhay otnay
eenbay ondemnedcay otay eathday, adhay iedtray otay eesay imhay anday ereway ivendray offay ithway ifleray uttsbay. Acingfay ethay
impossibilityay ofay indingfay anyoneay otay interveneay, onvincedcay atthay erhay onsay ouldway ebay otshay atay awnday, Ursulaay
appedwray upay ethay ilingstay eshay antedway otay ingbray imhay anday entway otay ethay ailjay aloneay.

I“ay amay ethay othermay ofay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendia,”bay eshay announceday.

Ethay entriessay ockedblay erhay ayway. I’m“ay oinggay inay inay anyay ase,”cay Ursulaay arnedway emthay. o“Say ifay youay avehay
ordersay otay ootshay, artstay ightray in.”ay Eshay ushedpay oneay ofay emthay asideay anday entway intoay ethay ormerfay assroomclay,
erewhay aay oupgray ofay alf-dressedhay oldierssay ereway oilingay eirthay eaponsway. Anay officeray inay aay ieldfay uniformay,
uddy-facedray, ithway eryvay ickthay assesglay anday eremoniouscay annersmay, ignaledsay otay ethay entriessay otay ithdrawway.

I“ay amay ethay othermay ofay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendia,”bay Ursulaay epeatedray.






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


You“ay ustmay ean,”may ethay officeray orrectedcay ithway aay iendlyfray ilesmay, at“thay youay areay ethay othermay ofay Istermay
Aurelianoay Uendia.”bay Ursulaay ecognizedray inay ishay affecteday ayway ofay eakingspay ethay anguidlay adencecay ofay ethay
uck-upstay eoplepay omfray ethay ighlandshay.

As“ay youay aysay, ister•”may eshay accepteday, ust“jay asay onglay asay Iay ancay eesay im.”hay

Erethay ereway uperiorsay ordersay atthay ohibitedpray isitsvay otay isonerspray ondemnedcay otay eathday, utbay ethay
officeray assumeday ethay esponsibilityray ofay ettinglay erhay avehay aay ifteen-minutefay aystay. Ursulaay owedshay imhay atwhay
eshay adhay inay ethay undlebay: aay angechay ofay eanclay othingclay, ethay ortshay ootsbay atthay erhay onsay adhay ornway atay ishay
eddingway, anday ethay eetsway ilkmay andycay atthay eshay adhay eptkay orfay imhay incesay ethay ayday eshay adhay ensedsay ishay
eturnray. Eshay oundfay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay inay ethay oomray atthay asway useday asay aay ellcay, yinglay onay aay otcay ithway
ishay armsay eadspray outay ecausebay ishay armpitsay ereway avedpay ithway oressay. Eythay adhay alloweday imhay otay aveshay. Ethay
ickthay ustachemay ithway istedtway endsay accentuateday ethay arpshay anglesay ofay ishay eekboneschay. Ehay ookedlay alerpay
otay Ursulaay anthay enwhay ehay adhay eftlay, aay ittlelay allertay, anday oremay olitarysay anthay everay. Ehay ewknay allay aboutay ethay
etailsday ofay ethay ousehay: Ietropay Espi’scray uicidesay, Arcadio’say arbitraryay actsay anday executionay, ethay auntlessnessday
ofay Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay underneathay ethay estnutchay eetray. Ehay ewknay atthay Amarantaay adhay onsecratedcay erhay
irginalvay idowhoodway otay ethay earingray ofay Aurelianoay Osejay anday atthay ethay atterlay asway eginningbay otay owshay ignssay
ofay uiteqay oodgay udgmentjay anday atthay ehay adhay earnedlay otay eadray anday itewray atay ethay amesay imetay ehay adhay earnedlay otay
eakspay. Omfray ethay omentmay Inay ichwhay eshay entereday ethay oomray Ursulaay eltfay inhibiteday ybay ethay aturitymay ofay erhay
onsay, ybay ishay auraay ofay ommandcay, ybay ethay owglay ofay authorityay atthay adiatedray omfray ishay inskay. Eshay asway urprisedsay
atthay ehay asway osay ell-informedway. You“ay ewknay allay alongay atthay Iay asway aay izard,”way ehay okedjay. Anday ehay addeday inay aay
erioussay onetay, is“Thay orningmay, enwhay eythay oughtbray emay erehay, Iay adhay ethay impressionay atthay Iay adhay alreadyay
eenbay oughthray allay atthay efore.”bay Inay actfay, ilewhay ethay owdcray asway oaringray alongsideay imhay, ehay adhay eenbay
oncentratingcay ishay oughtsthay, artledstay atay owhay ethay owntay adhay ageday. Ethay eaveslay ofay ethay almonday eestray ereway
okenbray. Ethay ouseshay, aintedpay ueblay, enthay aintedpay edray, adhay endeday upay ithway anay indefinableay olorationcay.

at“Whay idday youay expect?”ay Ursulaay ighedsay. ime“Tay asses.”pay

at’s“Thay owhay itay oes,”gay Aurelianoay admitteday, ut“bay otnay osay uch.”may

Inay atthay ayway ethay ong-awaitedlay isitvay, orfay ichwhay othbay adhay eparedpray uestionsqay anday adhay evenay
anticipateday answersay, asway onceay oremay ethay usualay everydayay onversationcay. Enwhay ethay uardgay announceday
ethay enday ofay ethay isitvay, Aurelianoay ooktay outay aay ollray ofay eatysway aperspay omfray underay ethay otcay. Eythay ereway ishay
oetrypay, ethay oemspay inspireday ybay Emediosray, ichwhay ehay adhay akentay ithway imhay enwhay ehay eftlay, anday osethay ehay
adhay ittenwray aterlay onay uringday ancechay ausespay inay ethay arway. omise“Pray emay atthay onay oneay illway eadray em,”thay ehay
aidsay. ight“Lay ethay ovenay ithway emthay isthay eryvay ight.”nay Ursulaay omisedpray anday oodstay upay otay isskay imhay ood¬gay
yebay.

I“ay oughtbray youay aay evolver,”ray eshay urmuredmay.

Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay awsay atthay ethay entrysay ouldcay otnay eesay. It“ay on’tway oday emay anyay ood,”gay ehay aidsay
inay aay owlay oicevay, ut“bay ivegay itay otay emay inay asecay eythay earchsay youay onay ethay ayway out.”ay Ursulaay ooktay ethay evolverray
outay ofay erhay odicebay anday utpay itay underay ethay attressmay ofay ethay otcay. And“ay on’tday aysay ood-bye,”gay ehay oncludedcay
ithway emphaticay almnesscay. on’t“Day egbay oray owbay ownday otay anyoneay. Etendpray atthay eythay otshay emay aay onglay imetay
ago.”ay Ursulaay itbay erhay iplay osay asay otnay otay ycray.

ut“Pay omesay othay onesstay onay osethay ores,”say eshay aidsay.

Eshay urnedtay alfwayhay arounday anday eftlay ethay oomray. Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay emainedray andingstay,
oughtfulthay, untilay ethay oorday osedclay. Enthay ehay aylay ownday againay ithway ishay armsay openay. Incesay ethay eginningbay
ofay adolescenceay, enwhay ehay adhay egunbay otay ebay awareay ofay ishay emonitionspray, ehay oughtthay atthay eathday ouldway ebay
announceday ithway aay efiniteday, unequivocalay, irrevocableay ignalsay, utbay erethay ereway onlyay aay ewfay ourshay eftlay
eforebay ehay ouldway ieday anday ethay ignalsay adhay otnay omecay. Onay aay ertaincay occasionay aay eryvay eautifulbay omanway adhay
omecay intoay ishay ampcay inay Ucurincatay anday askeday ethay entries’say ermissionpay otay eesay imhay. Eythay etlay erhay oughthray
ecausebay eythay ereway awareay ofay ethay anaticismfay ofay othersmay, owhay entsay eirthay aughtersday otay ethay edroomsbay ofay
ethay ostmay amousfay arriorsway, accordingay otay atwhay eythay aidsay, otay improveay ethay eedbray. Atthay ightnay Olonelcay
Aurelianoay Uendiabay asway inishingfay ethay oempay aboutay ethay anmay owhay isay ostlay inay ethay ainray enwhay ethay irlgay amecay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


intoay ishay oomray. Ehay urnedtay ishay ackbay otay erhay otay utpay ethay eetshay ofay aperpay intoay ethay ockedlay awerdray erewhay ehay
eptkay ishay oetrypay. Anday enthay ehay ensedsay itay. Ehay aspedgray ethay istolpay inay ethay awerdray ithoutway urningtay ishay eadhay.

ease“Play on’tday oot,”shay ehay aidsay.

Enwhay ehay urnedtay arounday oldinghay ishay Istolpay, ethay irlgay adhay oweredlay ershay anday idday otnay owknay atwhay otay
oday. Inay atthay ayway ehay adhay avoideday ourfay outay ofay elevenay apstray. Onay ethay otheray andhay, omeonesay owhay asway
evernay aughtcay entereday ethay evolutionaryray eadquartershay oneay ightnay inay Anauremay anday abbedstay otay eathday ishay
oseclay iendfray Olonelcay Agnificomay Isbalvay, otay omwhay ehay adhay ivengay ishay otcay osay atthay ehay ouldcay eatsway outay aay
everfay. Aay ewfay yardsay awayay, eepingslay inay aay ammockhay inay ethay amesay oomray, ehay asway otnay awareay ofay anythingay.
Ishay effortsay otay ystematizesay ishay emonitionspray ereway uselessay. Eythay ouldway omecay uddenlysay inay aay aveway ofay
upernaturalsay uciditylay, ikelay anay absoluteay anday omentaneousmay onvictioncay, utbay eythay ouldcay otnay ebay aspedgray.
Onay occasionay eythay ereway osay aturalnay atthay ehay identifieday emthay asay emonitionspray onlyay afteray eythay adhay eenbay
ulfilledfay. Equentlyfray eythay ereway othingnay utbay ordinaryay itsbay ofay uperstitionsay. Utbay enwhay eythay ondemnedcay
imhay otay eathday anday askeday imhay otay atestay ishay astlay ishway, ehay idday otnay avehay ethay eastlay ifficultyday inay identifyingay
ethay emonitionpray atthay inspireday ishay answeray.

I“ay askay atthay ethay entencesay ebay arriedcay outay inay Acondo,”may ehay aidsay.

Ethay esidentpray ofay ethay ourt-martialcay asway annoyeday. on’t“Day ebay everclay, Uendia,”bay ehay oldtay imhay.
at’s“Thay ustjay aay icktray otay aingay oremay ime.”tay

If“ay youay on’tday ulfillfay itay, atthay illway ebay youray orry.”way ethay olonelcay aidsay, ut“bay at’sthay ymay astlay ish.”way

Incesay enthay ethay emonitionspray adhay abandoneday imhay. Ethay ayday enwhay Ursulaay isitedvay imhay inay ailjay, afteray aay
eatgray ealday ofay inkingthay ehay amecay otay ethay onclusioncay atthay erhapspay eathday ouldway otnay ebay announceday atthay
imetay ecausebay itay idday otnay ependday onay ancechay utbay onay ethay illway ofay ishay executionersay. Ehay entspay ethay ightnay
awakeay, ormentedtay ybay ethay ainpay ofay ishay oressay. Aay ittlelay eforebay awnday ehay eardhay epsstay inay ethay allwayhay.
ey’re“Thay oming,”cay ehay aidsay otay imselfhay, anday orfay onay easonray ehay oughtthay ofay Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay, owhay atay
atthay omentmay asway inkingthay aboutay imhay underay ethay earydray awnday ofay ethay estnutchay eetray. Ehay idday otnay eelfay
earfay oray ostalgianay, utbay anay intestinalay ageray atay ethay ideaay atthay isthay artificialay eathday ouldway otnay etlay imhay eesay ethay
enday ofay osay anymay ingsthay atthay ehay adhay eftlay unfinisheday. Ethay oorday openeday anday aay entrysay amecay inay ithway aay ugmay
ofay offeecay. Onay ethay ollowingfay ayday atay ethay amesay ourhay ehay ouldway illstay ebay oingday atwhay ehay asway enthay, agingray
ithway ethay ainpay inay ishay armpitsay, anday ethay amesay ingthay appenedhay. Onay Ursdaythay ehay aredshay ethay eetsway ilkmay
andycay ithway ethay uardsgay anday utpay onay ishay eanclay othesclay, ichwhay ereway ighttay orfay imhay, anday ethay atentpay eatherlay
ootsbay. Ybay Idayfray eythay adhay illstay otnay otshay imhay.

Actuallyay, eythay idday otnay areday arrycay outay ethay entencesay. Ethay ebelliousnessray ofay ethay owntay ademay ethay
ilitarymay enmay inkthay atthay ethay executionay ofay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay ightmay avehay erioussay oliticalpay
onsequencescay otnay onlyay inay Acondomay utbay oughoutthray ethay areaay ofay ethay ampsway, osay eythay onsultedcay ethay
authoritiesay inay ethay apitalcay ofay ethay ovincepray. Onay Aturdaysay ightnay, ilewhay eythay ereway aitingway orfay anay answeray
Aptaincay Oqueray Arnicerocay entway ithway omesay otheray officersay otay Atarino’scay aceplay. Onlyay oneay omanway,
acticallypray eatenedthray, aredday aketay imhay otay erhay oomray. ey“Thay on’tday antway otay ogay otay edbay ithway aay anmay eythay
owknay isay oinggay otay ie,”day eshay onfessedcay otay imhay. o“Nay oneay owsknay owhay itay illway omecay, utbay everybodyay isay
oinggay arounday ayingsay atthay ethay officeray owhay ootsshay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay anday allay ethay oldierssay inay
ethay uadsqay, oneay ybay oneay, illway ebay urderedmay, ithway onay escapeay, oonersay oray aterlay, evenay ifay eythay idehay atay ethay
endsay ofay ethay earth.”ay Aptaincay Oqueray Arnicerocay entionedmay itay otay ethay otheray officersay anday eythay oldtay eirthay
uperiorssay. Onay Undaysay, althoughay onay oneay adhay evealedray itay openlyay, althoughay onay actionay onay ethay artpay ofay ethay
ilitarymay adhay isturbedday ethay ensetay almcay ofay osethay aysday, ethay olewhay owntay ewknay atthay ethay officersay ereway
eadyray otay useay anyay annermay ofay etextpray otay avoiday esponsibilityray orfay ethay executionay. Ethay officialay orderay
arriveday inay ethay Ondaymay ailmay: ethay executionay asway otay ebay arriedcay outay ithinway enty-fourtway ourshay. Atthay ightnay
ethay officersay utpay evensay ipsslay ofay aperpay intoay aay apcay, anday Aptaincay Oqueray Arnicero’scay unpeacefulay atefay asway
oreseenfay ybay ishay amenay onay ethay izepray ipslay. ad“Bay ucklay oesn’tday avehay anyay inkschay inay it,”ay ehay aidsay ithway eepday
itternessbay. I“ay asway ornbay aay onsay ofay aay itchbay anday I’may oinggay otay ieday aay onsay ofay aay itch.”bay Atay ivefay inay ethay orningmay
