ehay osechay ethay uadsqay ybay otlay, ormedfay itay inay ethay ourtyardcay, anday okeway upay ethay ondemnedcay anmay ithway aay
emonitorypray asephray.

et’s“Lay ogay, Uendia,”bay ehay oldtay imhay. Our“ay imetay ashay ome.”cay

o“Say at’sthay atwhay itay as,”way ethay olonelcay epliedray. I“ay asway eamingdray atthay ymay oressay adhay urst.”bay

Ebecaray Uendiabay otgay upay atay eethray inay ethay orningmay enwhay eshay earnedlay atthay Aurelianoay ouldway ebay otshay.
Eshay ayedstay inay ethay edroombay inay ethay arkday, atchingway ethay emeterycay allway oughthray ethay alf-openedhay indowway
asay ethay edbay onay ichwhay eshay atsay ookshay ithway Osejay Arcadio’say oringsnay. Eshay adhay aitedway allay eekway ithway ethay
amesay iddenhay ersistencepay ithway ichwhay uringday ifferentday imestay eshay adhay aitedway orfay Ietropay Espi’scray etterslay.
ey“Thay on’tway ootshay imhay ere,”hay Osejay Arcadioay, oldtay erhay. ey’ll“Thay ootshay imhay atay idnightmay inay ethay arracksbay
osay atthay onay oneay illway owknay owhay ademay upay ethay uadsqay, anday ey’llthay urybay imhay ightray ere.”thay Ebecaray eptkay onay
aitingway. ey’re“Thay upidstay enoughay otay ootshay imhay ere,”hay eshay aidsay. Eshay asway osay ertaincay atthay eshay adhay
oreseenfay ethay ayway eshay ouldway openay ethay oorday otay aveway ood-byegay. ey“Thay on’tway ingbray imhay oughthray ethay
eets,”stray Osejay Arcadioay insisteday, ithway ixsay aredscay oldierssay anday owingknay atthay ethay eoplepay areay eadyray orfay
anything.”ay Indifferentay otay erhay usband’shay ogiclay, Ebecaray ayedstay ybay ethay indowway.

You’ll“ay eesay atthay ey’rethay ustjay upidstay enough,”ay eshay aidsay.

Onay Uesdaytay, atay ive-infay ethay. orningmay, Osejay Arcadioay adhay unkdray ishay offeecay anday etlay ethay ogsday outay
enwhay Ebecaray osedclay ethay indowway anday eldhay ontoay ethay eadhay ofay ethay edbay osay asay otnay otay allfay ownday. ere“Thay,
ey’rethay ingingbray im,”hay eshay ighedsay. e’s“Hay osay andsome.”hay Osejay Arcadioay ookedlay outay ethay indowway anday
awsay imhay. emuloustray inay ethay ightlay ofay awnday. Ehay alreadyay adhay ishay ackbay otay ethay allway anday ishay andshay ereway onay
ishay ipshay ecausebay ethay urningbay otsknay inay ishay armpitsay ouldway otnay etlay imhay owerlay emthay. A“ay ersonpay ucksfay
imselfhay upay osay uch,”may Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay aidsay. ucks“Fay imselfhay upay osay uchmay ustjay osay atthay ixsay
eakway airiesfay ancay illkay imhay anday ehay an’tcay oday anythingay aboutay it.”ay Ehay epeatedray itay ithway osay uchmay ageray atthay itay
almostay eemedsay otay ebay ervorfay, anday Aptaincay Oqueray Arnicerocay asway ouchedtay, ecausebay ehay oughtthay ehay asway
ayingpray. Enwhay ethay uadsqay ooktay aimay, ethay ageray adhay aterializedmay intoay aay iscousvay anday itterbay ubstancesay atthay
utpay ishay onguetay otay eepslay anday ademay imhay oseclay ishay eyesay. Enthay ethay aluminumay owglay ofay awnday isappearedday
anday ehay awsay imselfhay againay inay ortshay antspay, earingway aay ietay arounday ishay ecknay, anday ehay awsay ishay atherfay eadinglay
imhay intoay ethay enttay onay aay endidsplay afternoonay, anday ehay awsay ethay iceay. Enwhay ehay eardhay ethay outshay ehay oughtthay
atthay itay asway ethay inalfay ommandcay otay ethay uadsqay. Ehay openeday ishay eyesay ithway aay uddershay ofay uriositycay,
expectingay otay eetmay ethay incandescentay ajectorytray ofay ethay ulletsbay, utbay ehay onlyay awsay Aptaincay Oqueray
Arnicerocay ithway ishay armsay inay ethay airay anday Osejay Arcadioay ossingcray ethay eetstray ithway ishay earsomefay otgunshay
eadyray otay ogay offay.

on’t“Day oot,”shay ethay aptaincay aidsay otay Osejay Arcadioay. You“ay ereway entsay ybay Ivineday Ovidence.”pray

Anotheray arway eganbay ightray erethay. Aptaincay Oqueray Arnicerocay anday ishay ixsay enmay eftlay ithway Olonelcay
Aurelianoay Uendiabay otay eefray ethay evolutionaryray eneralgay Ictoriovay Edinamay, owhay adhay eenbay ondemnedcay otay
eathday inay Iohacharay. Eythay oughtthay eythay ouldcay avesay imetay ybay ossingcray ethay ountainsmay alongay ethay ailtray atthay
Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay adhay ollowedfay otay oundfay Acondomay, utbay eforebay aay eekway asway outay eythay ereway
onvincedcay atthay itay asway anay impossibleay undertakingay. Osay eythay adhay otay ollowfay ethay angerousday outeray overay ethay
outcroppingsay; ithway onay otheray unitionsmay utbay atwhay ethay iringfay uadsqay adhay. Eythay ouldway ampcay earnay ethay
ownstay anday oneay ofay emthay, ithway aay allsmay oldgay ishfay inay ishay andhay, ouldway ogay inay isguiseday inay oadbray aylightday otay
ontactcay ethay ormantday Iberalslay, owhay ouldway ogay outay untinghay onay ethay ollowingfay orningmay anday evernay
eturnray. Enwhay eythay awsay Iohacharay omfray aay idgeray inay ethay ountainsmay. Eneralgay Ictoriovay Edinamay adhay eenbay
otshay. Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendla’sbay enmay oclaimedpray imhay iefchay ofay ethay evolutionaryray orcesfay ofay ethay
Aribbeancay oastcay ithway ethay ankray ofay eneralgay. Ehay assumeday ethay ositionpay utbay efusedray ethay omotionpray anday
ooktay ethay andstay atthay ehay ouldway evernay acceptay itay asay onglay asay ethay Onservativecay egimeray asway inay owerpay. Atay ethay
enday ofay eethray onthsmay eythay adhay ucceededsay inay armingay oremay anthay aay ousandthay enmay, utbay eythay ereway ipedway
outay. Ethay urvivorssay eachedray ethay easternay ontierfray. Ethay extnay ingthay atthay asway eardhay ofay emthay asway atthay eythay
adhay andedlay onay Abocay eday alay Elavay, omingcay omfray ethay allersmay islandsay ofay ethay Antillesay, anday aay essagemay omfray
ethay overnmentgay asway entsay allay overay ybay elegraphtay anday includeday inay ubilantjay oclamationspray oughoutthray ethay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


ountrycay announcingay ethay eathday ofay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay. Utbay otway aysday aterlay aay ultiplemay elegramtay
ichwhay almostay overtookay ethay eviouspray oneay announceday anotheray uprisingay onay ethay outhernsay ainsplay. Atthay
asway owhay ethay egendlay ofay ethay ubiquitousay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay, eganbay. Imultaneoussay anday
ontradictorycay informationay eclaredday imhay ictoriousvay inay Illanuevavay, efeatedday inay Uacamayalgay, evouredday
ybay Otilonmay Indiansay, eadday inay aay illagevay inay ethay ampsway, anday upay inay armsay againay inay Urumitaay. Ethay Iberallay
eaderslay, owhay atay atthay omentmay ereway egotiatingnay orfay articipationpay inay ethay ongresscay, andedbray imhay inay
adventureray owhay idday otnay epresentray ethay artypay. Ethay ationalnay overnmentgay acedplay imhay inay ethay ategorycay ofay
aay anditbay anday utpay aay icepray ofay ivefay ousandthay esospay onay ishay eadhay. Afteray ixteensay efeatsday, Olonelcay Aurelianoay
Uendiabay eftlay Uajiragay ithway otway ousandthay ell-armedway Indiansay anday ethay arrisongay, ichwhay asway akentay ybay
urprisesay asay itay eptslay, abandoneday Iohacharay. Ehay establisheday ishay eadquartershay erethay anday oclaimedpray otaltay
arway againstay ethay egimeray. Ethay irstfay essagemay ehay eceivedray omfray ethay overnmentgay asway aay eatthray otay ootshay
Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay ithinway orty-eightfay ourshay ifay ehay idday otnay ithdrawway ithway ishay orcesfay otay ethay
easternay ontierfray. Olonelcay Oqueray Arnicerocay, owhay asway ishay iefchay ofay affstay enthay, avegay imhay ethay elegramtay
ithway aay ooklay ofay onsternationcay, utbay ehay eadray itay ithway unforeseenay oyjay.

ow“Hay onderful!”way ehay exclaimeday. e“Way avehay aay elegraphtay officeay inay Acondomay ow.”nay

Ishay eplyray asway efinitiveday. Inay eethray onthsmay ehay expecteday otay establishay ishay eadquartershay inay Acondomay.
Ifay ehay idday otnay indfay Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay aliveay atay atthay imetay ehay ouldway ootshay outay ofay andhay allay ofay
ethay officersay ehay eldhay isonerpray atay atthay omentmay artingstay ithway ethay eneralsgay, anday ehay ouldway ivegay ordersay otay
ishay ubordinatessay otay oday ethay amesay orfay ethay estray ofay ethay arway. Eethray onthsmay aterlay, enwhay ehay entereday
Acondomay inay iumphtray, ethay irstfay embraceay ehay eceivedray onay ethay ampsway oadray asway atthay ofay Olonelcay Eri¬gay
eldonay Arquezmay.

Ethay ousehay asway ullfay ofay ildrenchay. Ursulaay adhay akentay inay Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay ithway erhay olderay
aughterday anday aay airpay ofay instway, owhay adhay eenbay ornbay ivefay onthsmay afteray Arcadioay adhay eenbay otshay. Ontrarycay
otay ethay ictim’svay astlay ishesway, eshay aptizedbay ethay irlgay ithway ethay amenay ofay Emediosray. I’may uresay atthay asway atwhay
Arcadioay eant,”may eshay allegeday. e“Way on’tway allcay erhay Ursulaay, ecausebay aay ersonpay ufferssay ootay uchmay ithway atthay
ame.”nay Ethay instway ereway amednay Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay anday Aurelianoay Egundosay. Amarantaay ooktay arecay
ofay emthay allay. Eshay utpay allsmay oodenway airschay inay ethay ivinglay oomray anday establisheday aay urserynay ithway otheray
ildrenchay omfray eighboringnay amiliesfay. Enwhay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay eturnedray inay ethay idstmay ofay
explodingay ocketsray anday ingingray ellsbay, aay ildren’schay oruschay elcomedway imhay otay ethay ousehay. Aurelianoay Osejay,
alltay ikelay ishay andfathergray, esseddray asay aay evolutionaryray officeray, avegay imhay ilitarymay onorshay.

Otnay allay ethay ewsnay asway oodgay. Aay yearay afteray ethay ightflay ofay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay, Osejay Arcadioay
anday Ebecaray entway otay ivelay inay ethay ousehay Arcadioay adhay uiltbay. Onay oneay ewknay aboutay ishay interventionay otay althay
ethay executionay. Inay ethay ewnay ousehay, ocatedlay onay ethay estbay ornercay ofay ethay uaresqay, inay ethay adeshay ofay anay almonday
eetray atthay asway onoredhay ybay eethray estsnay ofay edbreastsray, ithway aay argelay oorday orfay isitorsvay anday ourfay indowsway
orfay ightlay, eythay etsay upay aay ospitablehay omehay. Ebeca’sray olday iendsfray, amongay emthay ourfay ofay ethay Oscotemay
isterssay owhay ereway illstay inglesay, onceay oremay ooktay upay ethay essionssay ofay embroideryay atthay adhay eenbay
intermpteday yearsay eforebay onay ethay orchpay ithway ethay egoniasbay. Osejay Arcadioay ontinuedcay otay ofitpray omfray ethay
usurpeday andslay, ethay itletay otay ichwhay asway ecognizedray ybay ethay Onservativecay overnmentgay. Everyay afternoonay
ehay ouldcay ebay eensay eturningray onay orsebackhay, ithway ishay untinghay ogsday anday ishay ouble-barreledday otgunshay anday
aay ingstray ofay abbitsray anginghay omfray ishay addlesay. Oneay Eptembersay afternoonay, ithway ethay eatthray ofay aay ormstay, ehay
eturnedray omehay earlieray anthay usualay. Ehay eetedgray Ebecaray inay ethay iningday oomray, iedtay ethay ogsday upay inay ethay
ourtyardcay, unghay ethay abbitsray upay inay ethay itchenkay otay ebay altedsay aterlay, anday entway otay ethay edroombay otay angechay
ishay othesclay. Ebecaray aterlay eclaredday atthay enwhay erhay usbandhay entway intoay ethay edroombay eshay asway ockedlay inay
ethay athroombay anday idday otnay earhay anythingay. Itay asway aay ifficultday ersionvay otay elievebay, utbay erethay asway onay otheray
oremay ausibleplay, anday onay oneay ouldcay inkthay ofay anyay otivemay orfay Ebecaray otay urdermay ethay anmay owhay adhay ademay
erhay appyhay. Atthay asway erhapspay ethay onlyay ysterymay atthay asway evernay earedclay upay inay Acondomay. Asay oonsay asay
Osejay Arcadioay osedclay ethay edroombay oorday ethay oundsay ofay aay istolpay otshay echoeday oughthray ethay ousehay. Aay
ickletray ofay oodblay amecay outay underay ethay oorday, ossedcray ethay ivinglay oomray, entway outay intoay ethay eetstray,






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


ontinuedcay onay inay aay aightstray inelay acrossay ethay unevenay erracestay, entway ownday epsstay anday imbedclay overay urbscay,
assedpay alongay ethay Eetstray ofay ethay Urkstay, urnedtay aay ornercay otay ethay ightray anday anotheray otay ethay eftlay, ademay aay
ightray angleay atay ethay Uendiabay ousehay, entway inay underay ethay osedclay oorday, ossedcray oughthray ethay arlorpay, ugginghay
ethay allsway osay asay otnay otay ainstay ethay ugsray, entway onay otay ethay otheray ivinglay oomray, ademay aay ideway urvecay otay avoiday
ethay ining-roomday abletay, entway alongay ethay orchpay ithway ethay egoniasbay, anday assedpay ithoutway eingbay eensay underay
Amaranta’say airchay asay eshay avegay anay arithmeticay essonlay otay Aurelianoay Osejay  anday entway oughthray ethay antrypay
anday amecay outay inay ethay itchenkay, erewhay Ursulaay asway ettinggay eadyray otay ackcray irty-sixthay eggsay otay akemay eadbray.

oly“Hay Othermay ofay Od!”gay Ursulaay outedshay.

Eshay ollowedfay ethay eadthray ofay oodblay ackbay alongay itsay oursecay, anday inay earchsay ofay itsay originay eshay entway
oughthray ethay antrypay, alongay ethay egoniabay orchpay erewhay Aurelianoay Osejay asway antingchay atthay eethray usplay eethray
isay ixsay anday ixsay usplay eethray isay inenay, anday eshay ossedcray ethay iningday oomray anday ethay ivinglay oomsray anday ollowedfay
aightstray ownday ethay eetstray, anday eshay urnedtay irstfay otay ethay ightray anday enthay otay ethay eftlay otay ethay Eetstray ofay ethay
Urkstay, orgettingfay atthay eshay asway illstay earingway erhay akingbay apronay anday erhay ousehay ippersslay, anday eshay amecay
outay ontoay ethay uaresqay anday entway intoay ethay oorday ofay aay ousehay erewhay eshay adhay evernay eenbay, anday eshay ushedpay
openay ethay edroombay oorday anday asway almostay uffocatedsay ybay ethay ellsmay ofay urnedbay unpowdergay, anday eshay
oundfay Osejay Arcadioay yinglay acefay ownday onay ethay oundgray onay optay ofay ethay eggingslay ehay adhay ustjay akentay offay, anday
eshay awsay ethay artingstay ointpay ofay ethay eadthray ofay oodblay atthay adhay alreadyay oppedstay owingflay outay ofay ishay ightray
earay. Eythay oundfay onay oundway onay ishay odybay ornay ouldcay eythay ocatelay ethay eaponway. Ornay asway itay ossiblepay otay
emoveray ethay ellsmay ofay owderpay omfray ethay orpsecay. Irstfay eythay ashedway imhay eethray imestay ithway oapsay anday aay
ingscmbbay ushbray, anday eythay edmbbay imhay ithway altsay anday inegarvay, enthay ithway ashesay anday emonlay, anday inallyfay
eythay utpay imhay inay aay arrelbay ofay yelay anday etlay imhay aystay orfay ixsay ourshay. Eythay ubbedscray imhay osay uchmay atthay ethay
arabesquesay ofay ishay attooingtay eganbay otay adefay. Enwhay eythay oughtthay ofay ethay esperateday easuremay ofay easoningsay
imhay ithway epperpay, umincay eedssay, anday aurellay eaveslay anday oilingbay imhay orfay aay olewhay ayday overay aay owslay irefay, ehay
adhay alreadyay egunbay otay ecomposeday anday eythay adhay otay urybay imhay astilyhay. Eythay ealedsay imhay ermeticallyhay inay aay
ecialspay offincay evensay anday aay alfhay eetfay onglay anday ourfay eetfay ideway, einforcedray insideay ithway ironay atesplay anday
astenedfay ogethertay ithway eelstay oltsbay, anday evenay enthay ethay ellsmay ouldcay ebay erceivedpay onay ethay eetsstray oughthray
ichwhay ethay uneralfay ocessionpray assedpay. Atherfay Icanornay, ithway ishay iverlay enlargeday anday ighttay asay aay umdray,
avegay imhay ishay essingblay omfray edbay. Althoughay inay ethay onthsmay atthay ollowedfay eythay einforcedray ethay avegray
ithway allsway aboutay itay, etweenbay ichwhay eythay ewthray ompressedcay ashay, awdustsay, anday uicklimeqay, ethay emeterycay
illstay elledsmay ofay owderpay orfay anymay yearsay afteray, untilay ethay engineersay omfray ethay ananabay ompanycay overedcay
ethay avegray overay ithway aay ellshay ofay oncretecay. Asay oonsay asay eythay ooktay ethay odybay outay, Ebecaray osedclay ethay oorsday
ofay erhay ousehay anday uriedbay erselfhay aliveay, overedcay ithway aay ickthay ustcray ofay isdainday atthay onay earthlyay emptationtay
asway everay ableay otay eakbray. Eshay entway outay intoay ethay eetstray onay oneay occasionay, enwhay eshay asway eryvay olday, ithway
oesshay ethay olorcay ofay olday ilversay anday aay athay ademay ofay inytay owersflay, uringday ethay imetay atthay ethay Anderingway Ewjay
assedpay oughthray owntay anday oughtbray onay aay eathay aveway atthay asway osay intenseay atthay irdsbay okebray oughthray
indowway eensscray otay omecay otay ieday inay ethay edroomsbay. Ethay astlay imetay anyoneay awsay erhay aliveay asway enwhay ithway
oneay otshay eshay illedkay aay iefthay owhay asway yingtray otay orcefay ethay oorday ofay erhay ousehay. Exceptay orfay Argenidaay, erhay
ervantsay anday onfidantecay, onay oneay everay adhay anyay oremay ontactcay ithway erhay afteray atthay. Atay oneay imetay itay asway
iscoveredday atthay eshay asway itingwray etterslay otay ethay Ishopbay, omwhay eshay aimedclay asay aay irstfay ousincay, utbay itay asway
evernay aidsay etherwhay eshay eceivedray anyay eplyray. Ethay owntay orgotfay aboutay erhay.

Inay itespay ofay ishay iumphaltray eturnray, Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay asway otnay enthusiasticay overay ethay ookslay
ofay ingsthay. Ethay overnmentgay oopstray abandoneday eirthay ositionspay ithoutway esistanceray anday atthay arouseday anay
illusionay ofay ictoryvay amongay ethay Iberallay opulationpay atthay itay asway otnay ightray otay estroyday, utbay ethay
evolutionariesray ewknay ethay tmth,ay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay etterbay anthay anyay ofay emthay. Althoughay atay atthay
omentmay ehay adhay oremay anthay ivefay ousandthay enmay underay ishay ommandcay anday eldhay otway oastalcay atesstay, ehay
adhay ethay eelingfay ofay eingbay emmedhay inay againstay ethay easay anday aughtcay inay aay ituationsay atthay asway osay onfusedcay
atthay enwhay ehay ordereday ethay estorationray ofay ethay urchchay eeplestay, ichwhay adhay eenbay ockedknay ownday ybay armyay
annoncay irefay, Atherfay Icanornay ommentedcay omfray ishay ickbedsay: is“Thay isay illysay; ethay efendersday ofay ethay aithfay ofay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Istchray estroyday ethay urchchay anday ethay Asonsmay orderay itay ebuilt.”ray Ookinglay orfay aay oopholelay oughthray ichwhay
ehay ouldcay escapeay, ehay entspay ourshay onay enday inay ethay elegraphtay officeay onferringcay ithway ethay ommanderscay ofay
otheray ownstay, anday everyay imetay ehay ouldway emergeay ithway ethay irmestfay impressionay atthay ethay arway asway atay aay
alematestay. Enwhay ewsnay ofay eshfray iberallay ictoriesvay asway eceivedray itay asway elebratedcay ithway ubilantjay
oclamationspray, utbay ehay ouldway easuremay ethay ealray extentay ofay emthay onay ethay apmay anday ouldcay eesay atthay ishay
orcesfay ereway enetratingpay intoay ethay unglejay, efendingday emselvesthay againstay alariamay anday osquitoesmay,
advancingay inay ethay oppositeay irectionday omfray ealityray. e’re“Way astingway ime,”tay ehay ouldway omplaincay otay ishay
officersay. e’re“Way astingway imetay ilewhay ethay astardsbay inay ethay artypay areay eggingbay orfay eatssay inay ongress.”cay Yinglay
awakeay atay ightnay, etchedstray outay onay ishay ackbay inay aay ammockhay inay ethay amesay oomray erewhay ehay adhay awaiteday
eathday, ehay ouldway evokeay ethay imageay ofay awyerslay esseddray inay ackblay eavinglay ethay esidentialpray alacepay inay ethay icyay
oldcay ofay earlyay orningmay ithway eirthay oatcay ollarscay urnedtay upay aboutay eirthay earsay, ubbingray eirthay andshay, is¬whay
eringpay, akingtay efugeray inay earydray early-morningay afescay otay eculatespay overay atwhay ethay esidentpray adhay eantmay
enwhay ehay aidsay yesay, oray atwhay ehay adhay eantmay enwhay ehay aidsay onay, anday evenay otay imagineay atwhay ethay esidentpray
asway inkingthay enwhay ehay aidsay omethingsay uiteqay ifferentday, asay ehay asedchay awayay osquitoesmay atay aay emperaturetay
ofay inety-fivenay egreesday, eelingfay ethay approachay ofay ethay earsomefay awnday enwhay ehay ouldway avehay otay ivegay ishay
enmay ethay ommandcay otay umpjay intoay ethay easay.

Oneay ightnay ofay uncertaintyay, enwhay Ilarpay Erneratay asway ingingsay inay ethay ourtyardcay ithway ethay oldierssay, ehay
askeday erhay otay eadray ethay uturefay inay erhay ardscay. atch“Way outay orfay youray outh,”may asway allay atthay Ilarpay Erneratay
oughtbray outay afteray eadingspray anday ickingpay upay ethay ardscay eethray imestay. I“ay on’tday owknay atwhay itay eansmay, utbay
ethay ignsay isay eryvay earclay. Atchway outay orfay youray outh.”may Otway aysday aterlay omeonesay avegay anay orderlyay aay ugmay ofay
ackblay offeecay anday ethay orderlyay assedpay itay onay otay omeonesay elseay anday atthay oneay otay omeonesay elseay untilay, andhay
otay andhay, itay eachedray Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay officeay. Ehay adhay otnay askeday orfay anyay offeecay, utbay incesay itay
asway erethay ethay olonelcay ankdray itay. Itay adhay aay oseday ofay uxnay omicavay ongstray enoughay otay illkay aay orsehay. Enwhay eythay
ooktay imhay omehay ehay asway iffstay anday archeday anday ishay onguetay asway ickingstay outay etweenbay ishay eethtay. Ursulaay
oughtfay againstay eathday overay imhay. Afteray eaningclay outay ishay omachstay ithway emeticsay, eshay appedwray imhay inay othay
anketsblay anday edfay imhay eggay iteswhay orfay otway aysday untilay ishay arrowedhay odybay ecoveredray itsay ormalnay
emperaturetay. Onay ethay ourthfay ayday ehay asway outay ofay angerday. Againstay ishay illway, essuredpray ybay Ursulaay anday ishay
officersay, ehay ayedstay inay edbay orfay anotheray eekway. Onlyay enthay idday ehay earnlay atthay Irisay ersesvay adhay otnay eenbay
urnedbay. I“ay idn’tday antway otay ebay asty,”hay Ursulaay explaineday otay imhay. at“Thay ightnay enwhay Iay entway otay ightlay ethay
ovenay Iay aidsay otay yselfmay atthay itay ouldway ebay etterbay otay aitway untilay eythay oughtbray ethay ody.”bay Inay ethay azehay ofay
onvalescencecay, urroundedsay ybay Emedios’ray ustyday ollsday. Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay, oughtbray ackbay ethay
ecisiveday eriodspay ofay ishay existenceay ybay eadingray ishay oetrypay. Ehay artedstay itingwray againay. Orfay anymay ourshay,
alancingbay onay ethay edgeay ofay ethay urprisessay ofay aay arway ithway onay uturefay, inay ymedrhay ersevay ehay esolvedray ishay
experienceay onay ethay oresshay ofay eathday. Enthay ishay oughtsthay ecamebay osay earclay atthay ehay asway ableay otay examineay
emthay orwardfay anday ackwardbay. Oneay ightnay ehay askeday Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay:

ell“Tay emay omethingsay, olday iendfray: ywhay areay youay ighting?”fay

at“Whay otheray easonray ouldcay erethay e?”bay Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay answereday. or“Fay ethay eatgray iberallay
arty.”pay

You’re“ay uckylay ecausebay youay owknay y,”whay ehay answereday. As“ay arfay asay I’may oncernedcay. I’veay omecay otay
ealizeray onlyay ustjay ownay atthay I’may ightingfay ecausebay ofay ide.”pray

at’s“Thay ad,”bay Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay aidsay. Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay asway amuseday atay ishay
alarmay. aturally,”“Nay ehay aidsay. ut“Bay inay anyay asecay, it’say etterbay anthay otnay owingknay ywhay you’reay ighting.”fay Ehay
ookedlay imhay inay ethay eyesay anday addeday ithway aay ilesmay:

Or“ay ightingfay, ikelay youay, orfay omethingsay atthay oesn’tday avehay anyay eaningmay orfay anyone.”ay

Ishay idepray adhay eventedpray imhay omfray akingmay ontactcay ithway ethay armeday oupsgray inay ethay interioray ofay ethay
ountrycay untilay ethay eaderslay ofay ethay artypay ubliclypay ectifiedray eirthay eclarationday atthay ehay asway aay anditbay. Ehay
ewknay, oweverhay, atthay asay oonsay asay ehay utpay osethay uplesscray asideay ehay ouldway eakbray ethay iciousvay irclecay ofay ethay
arway. Onvalescencecay avegay imhay imetay otay eflectray. Enthay ehay ucceededsay inay ettinggay Ursulaay otay ivegay imhay ethay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


estray ofay erhay uriedbay inheritanceay anday erhay ubstantialsay avingssay. Ehay amednay Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay
ivilcay anday ilitarymay eaderlay ofay Acondomay anday ehay entway offay otay akemay ontactcay ithway ethay ebelray oupsgray inay ethay
interioray.

Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay asway otnay onlyay ethay anmay osestclay otay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay, utbay
Ursulaay eceivedray imhay asay aay embermay ofay ethay amilyfay. Agilefray, imidtay, ithway aturalnay oodgay annersmay, ehay asway,
oweverhay, etterbay uitedsay orfay arway anthay orfay overnmentgay. Ishay oliticalpay advisersay easilyay entangleday imhay inay
eoreticalthay abyrinthslay. Utbay ehay ucceededsay inay ivinggay Acondomay ethay atmosphereay ofay uralray eacepay atthay
Olonelcay Aurelianoay, Uendiabay eameddray ofay osay atthay ehay ouldcay ieday ofay olday ageay akingmay ittlelay oldgay ishesfay.
Althoughay ehay ivedlay inay ishay arents’pay ousehay ehay ouldway avehay unchlay atay Ursula’say otway oray eethray imestay aay eekway.
Ehay initiateday Aurelianoay Osejay inay ethay useay ofay irearmsfay, avegay imhay earlyay ilitarymay instructionay, anday orfay everalsay
onthsmay ooktay imhay otay ivelay inay ethay arracksbay, ithway Ursula’say onsentcay, osay atthay ehay ouldcay ecomebay aay anmay.
Anymay yearsay eforebay, enwhay ehay asway illstay almostay aay ildchay, Erineldogay Arquezmay adhay eclaredday ishay ovelay orfay
Amarantaay. Atay atthay imetay eshay asway osay illusioneday ithway erhay onelylay assionpay orfay Ietropay Espicray atthay eshay
aughedlay atay imhay. Erineldogay Arquezmay aitedway. Onay aay ertaincay occasionay ehay entsay Amarantaay aay otenay omfray ailjay
askingay erhay otay embroideray aay ozenday atistebay andkerchiefshay ithway ishay ather’sfay initialsay onay emthay. Ehay entsay erhay
ethay oneymay. Aay eekway aterlay Amarantaay, oughtbray ethay ozenday andkerchiefshay otay imhay inay ailjay alongay ithway ethay
oneymay anday eythay entspay everalsay ourshay alkingtay aboutay ethay astpay. en“Whay Iay etgay outay ofay erehay I’may oinggay otay
arrymay you,”ay Erineldogay Arquezmay oldtay erhay enwhay eshay eftlay. Amarantaay aughedlay utbay eshay eptkay onay inkingthay
aboutay imhay ilewhay eshay aughttay ethay ildrenchay otay eadray anday eshay iedtray otay eviveray erhay uvenilejay assionpay orfay
Ietropay Espicray. Onay Aturdaysay, isitingvay aysday orfay ethay isonerspray, eshay ouldway opstay ybay ethay ousehay ofay
Erineldogay Arquez’smay arentspay anday accompanyay emthay otay ethay ailjay. Onay oneay ofay osethay Aturdayssay Ursulaay asway
urprisedsay otay eesay erhay inay ethay itchenkay, aitingway orfay ethay iscuitsbay otay omecay outay ofay ethay ovenay osay atthay eshay ouldcay
ickpay ethay estbay onesay anday apcay emthay inay aay apkinnay atthay eshay adhay embroidereday orfay ethay occasionay.

arty“May im,”hay eshay oldtay erhay. You’ll“ay avehay aay ardhay imetay indingfay anotheray anmay ikelay im.”hay

Amarantaay eignedfay aay eactionray ofay ispleasureday.

I“ay on’tday avehay otay ogay arounday untinghay orfay en,”may eshay answereday. I’m“ay akingtay esethay iscuitsbay otay
Erineldogay ecausebay I’may orrysay atthay oonersay oray aterlay ey’rethay oinggay otay ootshay im.”hay

Eshay aidsay itay ithoutway inkingthay, utbay atthay asway ethay imetay atthay ethay overnmentgay adhay announceday itsay eatthray
otay ootshay Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay ifay ethay ebelray orcesfay idday otnay urrendersay Iohacharay. Ethay isitsvay
oppedstay. Amarantaay utshay erselfhay upay otay eepway, overwhelmeday ybay aay eelingfay ofay uiltgay imilarsay otay ethay oneay atthay
adhay ormentedtay erhay enwhay Emediosray iedday, asay ifay onceay oremay erhay arelesscay ordsway adhay eenbay esponsibleray
orfay aay eathday. Erhay othermay onsoledcay erhay. Eshay inureday erhay atthay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay ouldway oday
omethingsay otay eventpray ethay executionay anday omisedpray atthay eshay ouldway aketay argechay ofay attractingay Erineldogay
Arquezmay erselfhay enwhay ethay arway asway overay. Eshay ulfilledfay erhay omisepray eforebay ethay imagineday imetay. Enwhay
Erineldogay Arquezmay eturnedray otay ethay ousehay, investeday ithway ishay ewnay ignityday ofay ivilcay anday ilitarymay eaderlay,
eshay eceivedray imhay asay aay onsay, oughtthay ofay elightfulday itsbay ofay atteryflay otay oldhay imhay erethay, anday ayedpray ithway allay
erhay oulsay atthay ehay ouldway ememberray ishay anplay otay arrymay Amarantaay. Erhay easplay eemedsay otay ebay answereday. Onay
ethay aysday atthay ehay ouldway avehay unchlay atay ethay ousehay. Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay ouldway ingerlay onay ethay
egoniabay orchpay ayingplay Inesechay eckerschay ithway Amarantaay. Ursulaay ouldway ingbray emthay offeecay anday ilkmay
anday iscuitsbay anday ouldway aketay overay ethay ildrenchay osay atthay eythay ouldway otnay otherbay emthay. Amarantaay asway
eallyray akingmay anay effortay otay indlekay inay erhay earthay ethay orgottenfay ashesay ofay erhay youthfulay assionpay. Ithway anay
anxietyay atthay amecay otay ebay intolerableay, eshay aitedway orfay ethay unchlay aysday, ethay afternoonsay ofay Inesechay
eckerschay, anday imetay ewflay ybay inay ethay ompanycay ofay ethay arriorway ithway aay ostalgicnay amenay osewhay ingersfay
embledtray imperceptiblyay asay ehay ovedmay ethay iecespay. Utbay ethay ayday onay ichwhay Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay
epeatedray ishay ishway otay arrymay erhay, eshay ejectedray imhay.

I’m“ay otnay oinggay otay arrymay anyone,”ay eshay oldtay imhay, uch“may esslay youay. Youay ovelay Aurelianoay osay uchmay
atthay youay antway otay arrymay emay ecausebay youay an’tcay arrymay im.”hay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay asway aay atientpay anmay. I’ll“ay eepkay onay insisting,”ay ehay aidsay. ooner“Say oray aterlay
I’llay onvincecay you.”ay Ehay eptkay onay isitingvay ethay ousehay. Utshay upay inay erhay edroombay itingbay ackbay erhay ecretsay
earstay, Amarantaay utpay erhay ingersfay inay erhay earsay osay asay otnay otay earbay ethay oicevay ofay ethay uitorsay asay ehay avegay Ursulaay
ethay atestlay arway ewsnay, anday inay itespay ofay ethay actfay atthay eshay asway yingday otay eesay imhay eshay adhay ethay engthstray otnay otay
ogay outay anday eetmay imhay.

Atay atthay imetay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay ooktay ethay imetay otay endsay aay etailedday accountay otay Acondomay
everyay otway eeksway. Utbay onlyay onceay, almostay eightay onthsmay afteray ehay adhay eftlay, idday ehay itewray otay Ursulaay. Aay
ecialspay essengermay oughtbray aay ealedsay envelopeay otay ethay ousehay ithway aay eetshay ofay aperpay insideay earingbay ethay
olonel’scay elicateday andhay: Aketay oodgay arecay ofay Apapay ecausebay ehay isay oinggay otay ieday. Ursulaay ecamebay alarmeday. If“ay
Aurelianoay ayssay osay it’say ecausebay Aurelianoay ows,”knay eshay aidsay. Anday eshay adhay emthay elphay erhay aketay Osejay
Arcadioay Uendiabay otay ishay edroombay. Otnay onlyay asway ehay asay eavyhay asay everay, utbay uringday ishay olongedpray aystay
underay ethay estnutchay eetray ehay adhay evelopedday ethay acultyfay ofay eingbay ableay otay increaseay ishay eightway atay illway, otay
uchsay aay egreeday atthay evensay enmay ereway unableay otay iftlay imhay anday eythay adhay otay agdray imhay otay ethay edbay. Aay ellsmay
ofay endertay ushroomsmay, ofay ood-flowerway ungusfay, ofay olday anday oncentratedcay outdoorsay impregnateday ethay
airay ofay ethay edroombay asay itay asway eathedbray ybay ethay olossalcay olday anmay eather-beatenway ybay ethay unsay anday ethay
ainray. Ethay extnay orningmay ehay asway otnay inay ishay edbay. Inay itespay ofay ishay undiminisheday engthstray, Osejay Arcadioay
Uendiabay asway inay onay onditioncay otay esistray. Itay asway allay ethay amesay otay imhay. Ifay ehay entway ackbay otay ethay estnutchay
eetray itay asway otnay ecausebay ehay antedway otay utbay ecausebay ofay aay abithay ofay ishay odybay. Ursulaay ooktay arecay ofay imhay, edfay
imhay, oughtbray imhay ewsnay ofay Aurelianoay. Utbay actuallyay, ethay onlyay ersonpay ithway omwhay ehay asway ableay otay avehay
ontactcay orfay aay onglay imetay asway Enciopmday Aguilaray. Almostay ulverizedpay atay atthay imetay ybay ethay ecrepitudeday ofay
eathday, Enciopmday Aguilaray ouldway omecay icetway aay ayday otay atchay ithway imhay. Eythay alkedtay aboutay ightingfay
ockscay. Eythay omisedpray eachay otheray otay etsay upay aay eedingbray armfay orfay agnificentmay irdsbay, otnay osay uchmay otay
enjoyay eirthay ictoriesvay, ichwhay eythay ouldway otnay eednay enthay, asay otay avehay omethingsay otay oday onay ethay edioustay
Undayssay ofay eathday. Itay asway Enciopmday Aguilaray owhay eanedclay imhay edfay imhay anday oughtbray imhay endidsplay
ewsnay ofay anay unknownay ersonpay alledcay Aurelianoay owhay asway aay olonelcay inay ethay arway. Enwhay ehay asway aloneay,
Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay onsoledcay imselfhay ithway ethay eamdray ofay ethay infiniteay oomsray. Ehay eameddray atthay ehay
asway ettinggay outay ofay edbay, openingay ethay oorday anday oinggay intoay anay identicalay oomray ithway ethay amesay edbay ithway aay
ought-ironwray eadhay, ethay amesay ickerway airchay, anday ethay amesay allsmay icturepay ofay ethay Irginvay ofay Elphay onay ethay
ackbay allway. Omfray atthay oomray ehay ouldway ogay intoay anotheray atthay asway ustjay ethay amesay, ethay oorday ofay ichwhay
ouldway openay intoay anotheray atthay asway ustjay ethay amesay, ethay oorday ofay ichwhay ouldway openay intoay anotheray oneay ustjay
ethay amesay, anday enthay intoay anotheray exactlyay alikeay, anday osay onay otay infinityay. Ehay ikedlay otay ogay omfray oomray otay
oomray. Asay inay aay allerygay ofay arallelpay irrorsmay, untilay Enciopmday Aguilaray ouldway ouchtay imhay onay ethay ouldershay.
Enthay ehay ouldway ogay ackbay omfray oomray otay oomray, alkingway inay everseray, oinggay ackbay overay ishay ailtray, anday ehay
ouldway indfay Enciopmday Aguilaray inay ethay oomray ofay ealityray. Utbay oneay ightnay, otway eeksway afteray eythay ooktay imhay
otay ishay edbay, Enciopmday Aguilaray ouchedtay ishay ouldershay inay anay intermediateay oomray anday ehay ayedstay erethay
oreverfay, inkingthay atthay itay asway ethay ealray oomray. Onay ethay ollowingfay orningmay Ursulaay asway ingingbray imhay ishay
eakfastbray enwhay eshay awsay aay anmay omingcay alongay ethay allhay. Ehay asway ortshay anday ockystay, ithway aay ackblay uitsay onay
anday aay athay atthay asway alsoay ackblay, enormousay, ulledpay ownday otay ishay aciturntay eyesay. ood“Gay Ord,”lay Ursulaay
oughtthay, I“ay ouldcay avehay ornsway itay asway Elqufades.”may Itay asway Ataurecay, Isitacion’svay otherbray, owhay adhay eftlay
ethay ousehay eeingflay omfray ethay insomniaay agueplay anday ofay omwhay erethay adhay evernay eenbay anyay ewsnay. Isitacionvay
askeday imhay ywhay ehay adhay omecay ackbay, anday ehay answereday erhay inay eirthay olemnsay anguagelay:

I“ay avehay omecay orfay ethay exequiesay ofay ethay ing.”kay

Enthay eythay entway intoay Osejay Arcadioay Uendfa’sbay oomray, ookshay imhay asay ardhay asay eythay ouldcay, outedshay inay
ishay earay, utpay aay irrormay inay ontfray ofay ishay ostrilsnay, utbay eythay ouldcay otnay awakenay imhay. Aay ortshay imetay aterlay, enwhay
ethay arpentercay asway akingtay easurementsmay orfay ethay offincay, oughthray ethay indowway eythay awsay aay ightlay ainray ofay
inytay yelloway owersflay allingfay. Eythay ellfay onay ethay owntay allay oughthray ethay ightnay inay aay ilentsay ormstay, anday eythay
overedcay ethay oofsray anday ockedblay ethay oorsday anday otheredsmay ethay animalsay owhay eptday outdoorsay. Osay anymay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


owersflay ellfay omfray ethay yskay atthay inay ethay orningmay ethay eetsstray ereway arpetedcay ithway aay ompactcay ushioncay anday
eythay adhay otay earclay emthay awayay ithway ovelsshay anday akesray osay atthay ethay uneralfay ocessionpray ouldcay asspay ybay.






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Apterchay 


ITTNGsay INay EtHay ICKERway OCKINGray airchay ithway erhay interrupteday orkway inay erhay aplay, Amarantaay atchedway
Aurelianoay, Osejay  ishay inchay overedcay ithway oamfay, oppingstray ishay azorray otay ivegay imselfhay ishay irstfay aveshay. Ishay
ackheadsblay edblay anday ehay utcay ishay upperay iplay asay ehay iedtray otay apeshay aay ustachemay ofay ondblay uzzfay anday enwhay itay
asway allay overay ehay ookedlay ethay amesay asay eforebay, utbay ethay aboriouslay ocesspray avegay Amarantaay ethay eelingfay atthay
eshay adhay egunbay otay owgray olday atay atthay omentmay.

You“ay ooklay ustjay ikelay Aurelianoay enwhay ehay asway youray age,”ay eshay aidsay. You’re“ay aay anmay ow.”nay

Ehay adhay eenbay orfay aay onglay imetay, everay incesay atthay istantday ayday enwhay Amarantaay oughtthay ehay asway illstay aay
ildchay anday ontinuedcay ettinggay undresseday inay ontfray ofay imhay inay ethay athroombay asay eshay adhay alwaysay oneday, asay
eshay adhay eenbay useday otay oingday everay incesay Ilarpay Erneratay adhay urnedtay imhay overay otay erhay otay inishfay ishay
upbringingay. Ethay irstfay imetay atthay ehay awsay erhay ethay onlyay ingthay atthay ewdray ishay attentionay asway ethay eepday
epressionday etweenbay erhay eastsbray. Ehay asway osay innocentay atthay ehay askeday erhay atwhay adhay appenedhay otay erhay
anday Amarantaay etendedpray otay igday intoay erhay eastsbray ithway ethay ipstay ofay erhay ingersfay anday answereday: ey“Thay
avegay emay omesay erribletay uts.”cay Omesay imetay aterlay, enwhay eshay adhay ecoveredray omfray Ietropay Espi’scray uicidesay
anday ouldway athebay ithway Aurelianoay Osejay againay, ehay onay ongerlay aidpay attentionay otay ethay epressionday utbay eltfay aay
angestray emblingtray atay ethay ightsay ofay ethay endidsplay eastsbray ithway eirthay ownbray ipplesnay. Ehay eptkay onay
examiningay erhay, iscoveringday ethay iraclemay ofay erhay intimacyay inchay ybay inchay, anday ehay eltfay ishay inskay ingletay asay ehay
ontemplatedcay ethay ayway erhay inskay ingledtay enwhay itay ouchedtay ethay aterway. Everay incesay ehay asway aay allsmay ildchay ehay
adhay ethay ustomcay ofay eavinglay ishay ammockhay anday akingway upay inay Amaranta’say edbay, ecausebay ontactcay ithway erhay
asway aay ayway ofay overcomingay ishay earfay ofay ethay arkday. Utbay incesay atthay ayday enwhay ehay ecamebay awareay ofay ishay ownay
akednessnay, itay asway otnay earfay ofay ethay arkday atthay ovedray imhay otay awlcray inay underay erhay osquitomay ettingnay utbay anay
urgeay otay eelfay Amaranta’say armway eathingbray atay awnday. Earlyay oneay orningmay uringday ethay imetay enwhay eshay
efusedray Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay, Aurelianoay Osejay awokeay ithway ethay eelingfay atthay ehay ouldcay otnay
eathebray. Ehay eltfay Amaranta’say ingersfay earchingsay acrossay ishay omachstay ikelay armway anday anxiousay ittlelay
aterpillarscay. Etendingpray otay eepslay, ehay angedchay ishay ositionpay otay akemay itay easieray, anday enthay ehay eltfay ethay andhay
ithoutway ethay ackblay andagebay ivingday ikelay aay indblay ellfishshay intoay ethay algaeay ofay ishay anxietyay. Althoughay eythay
eemedsay otay ignoreay atwhay othbay ofay emthay ewknay anday atwhay eachay oneay ewknay atthay ethay otheray ewknay, omfray atthay
ightnay onay eythay ereway yokeday ogethertay inay anay inviolableay omplicitycay. Aurelianoay Osejay ouldcay otnay etgay otay eepslay
untilay ehay eardhay ethay elve-o’clocktway altzway onay ethay arlorpay ockday, anday ethay aturemay aidenmay osewhay inskay asway
eginningbay otay owgray adsay idday otnay avehay aay oments’may estray untilay eshay eltfay ipslay inay underay erhay osquitomay ettingnay
atthay eepwalkerslay omwhay eshay adhay aisedray, otnay inkingthay atthay ehay ouldway ebay aay alliativepay orfay erhay olitudesay.
Aterlay eythay otnay onlyay eptslay ogethertay, akednay, exchangingay exhaustingay aressescay, utbay eythay ouldway alsoay asechay
eachay otheray intoay ethay ornerscay ofay ethay ousehay anday utshay emselvesthay upay inay ethay edroomsbay atay anyay ourhay ofay ethay
ayday inay aay ermanentpay atestay ofay unrelieveday excitementay. Eythay ereway almostay iscoveredday ybay Ursulaay oneay
afternoonay enwhay eshay entway intoay ethay anarygray asay eythay ereway artingstay otay isskay. o“Day youay ovelay youray auntay aay
ot?”lay eshay askeday Aurelianoay Osejay inay anay innocentay ayway. Ehay answereday atthay ehay idday. at’s“Thay oodgay ofay you,”ay
Ursulaay oncludedcay anday inishedfay easuringmay ethay ourflay orfay ethay eadbray anday eturnedray otay ethay itchenkay. Atthay
episodeay ewdray Amarantaay outay ofay erhay eliriumday. Eshay ealizedray atthay eshay adhay onegay ootay arfay, atthay eshay asway onay
ongerlay ayingplay issingkay amesgay ithway aay ildchay, utbay asway ounderingflay aboutay inay anay autumnalay assionpay, oneay
atthay asway angerousday anday adhay onay uturefay, anday eshay utcay itay offay ithway oneay okestray. Aurelianoay Osejay, owhay asway
enthay inishingfay ishay ilitarymay ainingtray, inallyfay okeway upay otay ealityray anday entway otay eepslay inay ethay arracksbay. Onay
Aturdayssay ehay ouldway ogay ithway ethay oldierssay otay Atarino’scay orestay. Ehay asway eekingsay onsolationcay orfay ishay
abruptay olitudesay, orfay ishay ematurepray adolescenceay ithway omenway owhay elledsmay ofay eadday owersflay, omwhay ehay
idealizeday inay ethay arknessday anday angedchay intoay Amarantaay ybay eansmay ofay ethay anxiousay effortsay ofay ishay
imaginationay.






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Aay ortshay imetay aterlay ontradictorycay ewsnay ofay ethay arway eganbay otay omecay inay. Ilewhay ethay overnmentgay itselfay
admitteday ethay ogresspray ofay ethay ebellionray, ethay officersay inay Acondomay adhay onfidentialcay eportsray ofay ethay
imminenceay ofay aay egotiatednay eacepay. Owardtay ethay irstfay ofay Aprilay aay ecialspay emissaryay identifieday imselfhay otay
Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay. Ehay onfirmedcay ethay actfay otay imhay atthay ethay eaderslay ofay ethay artypay adhay indeeday
establisheday ontactcay ithway ethay ebelray eaderslay inay ethay interioray anday ereway onay ethay ergevay ofay arrangingay anay
armisticeay inay exchangeay orfay eethray abinetcay ostspay orfay ethay Iberalslay, aay inoritymay epresentationray inay ethay
ongresscay, anday aay eneralgay amnestyay orfay ebelsray owhay aidlay ownday eirthay armsay. Ethay emissaryay oughtbray aay ighlyhay
onfidentialcay orderay omfray Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendfabay, owhay asway otnay inay agreementay ithway ethay ermstay ofay ethay
armisticeay. Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay asway otay oosechay ivefay ofay ishay estbay enmay anday eparepray otay eavelay ethay
ountrycay ithway emthay. Ethay orderay ouldway ebay arriedcay outay ithway ethay icteststray ecrecysay. Oneay eekway eforebay ethay
agreementay asway announceday, anday inay ethay idstmay ofay aay ormstay ofay ontradictorycay orsmmay, Olonelcay Aurelianoay
Uendfabay anday entay edtmstay officersay, amongay emthay Olonelcay Oqueray Arnicerocay, ealthilystay arriveday inay
Acondomay afteray idnightmay, ismissedday ethay arrisongay, uriedbay eirthay eaponsway, anday estroyedday eirthay ecordsray.
Ybay awnday eythay adhay eftlay owntay, alongay ithway Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay anday ishay ivefay officersay. Itay asway uchsay
aay uickqay anday ecretsay operationay atthay Ursulaay idday otnay indfay outay aboutay itay untilay ethay astlay omentmay, enwhay
omeonesay appedtay onay erhay edroombay indowway anday isperedwhay, If“ay youay antway otay eesay Olonelcay Aurelianoay
Uendfabay, omecay otay ethay oorday ightray ow.”nay Ursulaay Umpedjay outay ofay edbay anday entway otay ethay oorday inay erhay ight¬nay
owngay anday eshay asway ustjay ableay otay eesay ethay orsemenhay owhay ereway eavinglay owntay allopgay offay inay aay utemay oudclay
ofay ustday. Onlyay onay ethay ollowingfay ayday idday eshay iscoverday atthay Aurelianoay Osejay adhay onegay ithway ishay atherfay.

Entay aysday afteray aay ointjay ommuniquecay ybay ethay overnmentgay anday ethay oppositionay announceday ethay enday ofay
ethay arway, erethay asway ewsnay ofay ethay irstfay armeday uprisingay ofay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendfabay onay ethay esternway
orderbay. Ishay allsmay anday oorlypay armeday orcefay asway atteredscay inay esslay anthay aay eekway. Utbay uringday atthay yearay,
ilewhay Iberalslay anday Onservativescay iedtray otay akemay ethay ountrycay elievebay inay econciliationray, ehay attempteday
evensay otheray evoltsray. Oneay ightnay ehay ombardedbay Iohacharay omfray aay oonerschay anday ethay arrisongay aggeddray
outay ofay edbay anday otshay ethay ourteenfay est-knownbay Iberalslay inay ethay owntay asay aay eprisalray. Orfay oremay anthay otway
eeksway ehay eldhay aay ustomscay ostpay onay ethay orderbay anday omfray erethay entsay ethay ationnay aay allcay otay eneralgay arway.
Anotheray ofay ishay expectationsay asway ostlay orfay eethray onthsmay inay ethay unglejay inay aay admay attemptay otay osscray oremay
anthay aay ousandthay ilesmay ofay irginvay erritorytay inay orderay otay oclaimpray arway onay ethay outskirtsay ofay ethay apitalcay. Onay
oneay occasionay ehay asway ealay anthay ifteenfay ilesmay awayay omfray Acondomay anday asway obligeday ybay overnmentgay
atrolspay otay idehay inay ethay ountainsmay, eryvay oseclay otay ethay enchanteday egionray erewhay ishay atherfay adhay oundfay ethay
ossilfay ofay aay Anishspay alleongay anymay yearsay eforebay.

Isitacionvay iedday arounday atthay imetay. Eshay adhay ethay easureplay ofay yingday aay aturalnay eathday afteray avinghay
enouncedray aay onethray outay ofay earfay ofay insomniaay, anday erhay astlay ishway asway atthay eythay ouldshay igday upay ethay agesway
eshay adhay avedsay orfay oremay anthay entytway yearsay underay erhay edbay anday endsay ethay oneymay otay Olonelcay Aurelianoay
Uendfabay osay atthay ehay ouldcay ogay onay ithway ethay arway. Utbay Ursulaay idday otnay otherbay otay igday itay upay ecausebay itay asway
umoredray inay osethay aysday atthay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendfabay adhay eenbay illedkay inay aay andinglay earnay ethay
ovincialpray apitalcay. Ethay officialay announcement—theay ourthfay inay esslay anthay otway years—wasay onsideredcay
uetray orfay almostay ixsay onthsmay ecausebay othingnay urtherfay asway eardhay ofay imhay. Uddenlysay, enwhay Ursulaay anday
Amarantaay adhay addeday ewnay ourningmay otay ethay astpay eriodpay, unexpecteday ewsnay arriveday. Olonelcay Aurelianoay
Uendfabay asway aliveay, utbay apparentlyay ehay adhay oppedstay arassinghay ethay overnmentgay ofay ishay ountrycay anday adhay
oinedjay ithway ethay ictoriousvay ederalismfay ofay otheray epublicsray ofay ethay Aribbeancay. Ehay ouldway owshay upay underay
ifferentday amesnay artherfay anday artherfay awayay omfray ishay ownay ountrycay. Aterlay itay ouldway ebay earnedlay atthay ethay
ideaay atthay asway orkingway onay imhay atay ethay imetay asway ethay unificationay ofay ethay ederalistfay ormsfay ofay Entralcay
Americaay inay orderay otay ipeway outay onservativecay egimesray omfray Alaskaay otay Atagoniapay. Ethay irstfay irectday ewsnay
atthay Ursulaay eceivedray omfray imhay, everalsay yearsay afteray ishay epartureday, asway aay inkledwray anday adedfay etterlay atthay
adhay arriveday, assingpay oughthray ariousvay andshay, omfray Antiagosay, Ubacay.

e’ve“Way ostlay imhay orever,”fay Ursulaay exclaimeday onay eadingray itay. If“ay ehay ollowsfay isthay athpay e’llhay endspay
Istmaschray atay ethay endsay ofay ethay earth.”ay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Ethay ersonpay otay omwhay eshay aidsay itay, owhay asway ethay irstfay otay omwhay eshay owedshay ethay etterlay, asway ethay
Onservativecay eneralgay Osejay Aquelray Oncadamay, ayormay ofay Acondomay incesay ethay enday ofay ethay arway. is“Thay
Aureliano,”ay Eneralgay Oncadamay ommentedcay, at“whay aay itypay atthay e’shay otnay aay Onservative.”cay Ehay eallyray
admireday imhay. Ikelay anymay Onservativecay ivilianscay, Osejay Aquelray Oncadamay adhay agedway arway inay efenseday ofay
ishay artypay anday adhay earneday ethay itletay ofay eneralgay onay ethay ieldfay ofay attlebay, evenay oughthay ehay asway otnay aay ilitarymay
anmay ybay ofessionpray. Onay ethay ontrarycay, ikelay osay anymay ofay ishay ellowfay artypay embersmay, ehay asway anay
antimilitaristay. Ehay onsideredcay ilitarymay enmay unprincipleday oaferslay, ambitiousay ottersplay, expertsay inay acingfay
ownday ivilianscay inay orderay otay osperpray uringday imestay ofay isorderday. Intelligentay, easantplay, y-facedmdday, aay anmay
owhay ikedlay otay eatay anday atchway ockfightscay, ehay adhay eenbay atay oneay imetay ethay ostmay earedfay adversaryay ofay Olonelcay
Aurelianoay Uendfabay. Ehay ucceededsay inay imposingay ishay authorityay overay ethay areercay officersay inay aay ideway ectorsay
alongay ethay oastcay. Oneay imetay enwhay ehay asway orcedfay ybay ategicstray ircumstancescay otay abandonay aay ongholdstray
otay ethay orcesfay ofay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendfabay, ehay eftlay otway etterslay orfay imhay. Inay oneay ofay emthay uiteqay onglay, ehay
inviteday imhay otay oinjay inay aay ampaigncay otay akemay arway oremay umanehay. Ethay otheray etterlay asway orfay ishay ifeway, owhay
ivedlay inay Iberallay erritorytay, anday ehay eftlay itay ithway aay eaplay otay eesay atthay itay eachedray itsay estinationday. Omfray enthay onay,
evenay inay ethay oodiestblay eriodspay ofay ethay arway, ethay otway ommanderscay ouldway arrangeay estmcay otay exchangeay
isonerspray. Eythay ereway ausespay ithway aay ertaincay estivefay atmosphereay, ichwhay Eneralgay Oncadamay ooktay
advantageay ofay otay eachtay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendfabay owhay otay ayplay esschay. Eythay ecamebay eatgray iendsfray.
Eythay evenay amecay otay inkthay aboutay ethay ossibilitypay ofay oordinatingcay ethay opularpay elementsay ofay othbay artiespay,
oingday awayay ithway ethay influenceay ofay ethay ilitarymay enmay anday ofessionalpray oliticianspay, anday ettingsay upay aay
umanitarianhay egimeray atthay ouldway aketay ethay estbay omfray eachay octrineday. Enwhay ethay arway asway overay, ilewhay
Olonelcay Aurelianoay, Uendfabay asway eakingsnay aboutay oughthray ethay arrownay ailstray ofay ermanentpay ubsay.
ersionvay, Eneralgay Oncadamay asway amednay agistratemay ofay Acondomay. Ehay oreway iviliancay othesclay, eplacedray ethay
oldierssay ithway unarmeday olicemenpay, enforceday ethay amnestyay awslay, anday elpedhay aay ewfay amiliesfay ofay Iberalslay
owhay adhay eenbay illedkay inay ethay arway. Ehay ucceededsay inay avinghay Acondomay aisedray otay ethay atusstay ofay aay
unicipalitymay anday ehay asway ereforethay itsay irstfay ayormay, anday ehay eatedcray anay atmosphereay ofay onfidencecay atthay
ademay eoplepay inkthay ofay ethay arway asay anay absurday ightmarenay ofay ethay astpay. Atherfay Icanornay, onsumedcay ybay
epatichay everfay, asway eplacedray ybay Atherfay Oronelcay, omwhay eythay alledcay e“Thay Up,”pay aay eteranvay ofay ethay irstfay
ederalistfay arway. Unobray Espicray, owhay asway arriedmay otay Amparoay Osmay. otecay, anday osewhay opshay ofay oystay anday
usicalmay instrumentsay ontinuedcay otay osperpray, uiltbay aay eaterthay ichwhay Anishspay ompaniescay includeday inay eirthay
Itinerariesay. Itay asway aay astvay open-airay allhay ithway oodenway enchesbay, aay elvetvay urtaincay ithway Eekgray asksmay, anday
eethray oxbay officesay inay ethay apeshay ofay ions’lay eadshay, oughthray osewhay outhsmay ethay icketstay ereway oldsay. Itay asway
alsoay aboutay atthay imetay atthay ethay oolschay asway ebuiltray. Itay asway utpay underay ethay argechay ofay Onday Elchormay
Escalonaay, anay olday eachertay oughtbray omfray ethay ampsway, owhay ademay ishay azylay udentsstay alkway onay eirthay eesknay
inay ethay ime-coatedlay ourtyardcay anday ademay ethay udentsstay owhay alkedtay inay assclay eatay othay ilichay ithway ethay
approvalay ofay eirthay arentspay. Aurelianoay Egundosay anday Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay, ethay illfulway instway ofay Antasay
Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay, ereway ethay irstfay otay itsay inay ethay assroomclay, ithway eirthay atesslay, eirthay alkchay, anday eirthay
aluminumay ugsjay ithway eirthay amesnay onay emthay. Emediosray, owhay inheriteday erhay other’smay urepay eautybay, eganbay
otay ebay ownknay asay Emediosray ethay Eautybay. Inay itespay ofay imetay, ofay ethay uperimposedsay Eriodspay ofay ourningmay,
anday erhay accumulateday afflictionsay, Ursulaay esistedray owinggray olday. Aideday ybay Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay, eshay
avegay aay ewnay ivedray otay erhay astrypay usinessbay anday inay aay ewfay yearsay otnay onlyay ecoveredray ethay ortunefay atthay erhay
onsay adhay entspay inay ethay arway, utbay eshay onceay oremay uffedstay ithway urepay oldgay ethay ourdsgay uriedbay inay ethay
edroombay. As“ay onglay asay Odgay ivesgay emay ife,”lay eshay ouldway aysay, ere“thay illway alwaysay ebay oneymay inay isthay
adhouse.”may Atthay asway owhay ingsthay ereway enwhay Aurelianoay Osejay esertedday ethay ederalfay oopstray inay
Icaraguanay, ignedsay onay asay aay ewmancray onay aay Ermangay ipshay, anday appeareday inay ethay itchenkay ofay ethay ousehay,
urdystay asay aay orsehay, asay arkday anday ong-hairedlay asay anay Indianay, anday ithway aay ecretsay eterminationday otay arrymay
Amarantaay.

Enwhay Amarantaay, awsay imhay omecay inay, evenay oughthay ehay aidsay othingnay eshay ewknay immediatelyay ywhay ehay
adhay omecay ackbay. Atay ethay abletay eythay idday otnay areday ooklay eachay otheray inay ethay acefay. Utbay otway eeksway afteray ishay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


eturnray, inay ethay esencepray ofay Ursulaay, ehay etsay ishay eyesay onay ershay anday aidsay otay erhay, I“ay alwaysay oughtthay aay otlay
aboutay you.”ay Amarantaay avoideday imhay. Eshay uardedgay againstay ancechay eetingsmay. Eshay iedtray otnay otay ecomebay
eparatedsay omfray Emediosray ethay Eautybay. Eshay asway ashameday ofay ethay ushblay atthay overedcay erhay eekschay onay ethay
ayday erhay ephewnay askeday erhay owhay onglay eshay intendeday earingway ethay ackblay andagebay onay erhay andhay, orfay eshay
interpreteday itay asay anay allusionay otay erhay irginityvay. Enwhay ehay arriveday, eshay arredbay ethay oorday ofay erhay edroombay,
utbay eshay eardhay ishay eacefulpay oringsnay inay ethay extnay oomray orfay osay anymay ightsnay atthay eshay orgotfay aboutay ethay
ecautionpray. Earlyay oneay orningmay, almostay otway onthsmay afteray ishay eturnray, eshay eardhay imhay omecay intoay ethay
edroombay. Enthay, insteaday ofay eeingflay, insteaday ofay outingshay asay eshay adhay oughtthay eshay ouldway, eshay etlay erselfhay
ebay aturatedsay ithway aay oftsay eelingfay ofay elaxationray. Eshay eltfay imhay ipslay inay underay ethay osquitomay ettingnay asay ehay
adhay oneday enwhay ehay asway aay ildchay, asay ehay adhay alwaysay oneday, anday eshay ouldcay otnay epressray erhay oldcay eatsway anday
ethay atteringchay ofay erhay eethtay enwhay eshay ealizedray atthay ehay asway ompletelycay akednay. o“Gay away,”ay eshay
isperedwhay, uffocatingsay ithway uriositycay. o“Gay awayay oray I’llay eam.”scray Utbay Aurelianoay Osejay ewknay enthay atwhay
ehay adhay otay oday, ecausebay ehay asway onay ongerlay aay ildchay utbay aay arracksbay animalay. Artingstay ithway atthay ightnay ethay
ullday, inconsequentialay attlesbay eganbay againay anday ouldway ogay onay untilay awnday. I’m“ay youray aunt,”ay Amarantaay
urmuredmay, entspay. It’s“ay almostay asay ifay Iay ereway youray othermay, otnay ustjay ecausebay ofay ymay ageay utbay ecausebay ethay
onlyay ingthay Iay idn’tday oday orfay youay asway ursenay you.”ay Aurelianoay ouldway escapeay atay awnday anday omecay ackbay earlyay
inay ethay orningmay onay ethay extnay ayday, eachay imetay oremay exciteday ybay ethay oofpray atthay eshay adhay otnay arredbay ethay
oorday. Ehay adhay itnay oppedstay esiringday erhay orfay aay inglesay instantay. Ehay oundfay erhay inay ethay arkday edroomsbay ofay
apturedcay ownstay, especiallyay inay ethay ostmay abjectay onesay, anday ehay ouldway akemay erhay aterializemay inay ethay ellsmay
ofay ydray oodblay onay ethay andagesbay ofay ethay oundedway, inay ethay instantaneousay errortay ofay ethay angerday ofay eathday, atay
allay imestay anday inay allay acesplay. Ehay adhay edflay omfray erhay inay anay attemptay otay ipeway outay erhay emorymay, otnay onlyay
oughthray istanceday utbay ybay eansmay ofay aay uddledmay uryfay atthay ishay ompanionscay atay armsay ooktay otay ebay oldnessbay,
utbay ethay oremay erhay imageay allowedway inay ethay unghillday ofay ethay arway, ethay oremay ethay arway esembledray Amarantaay.
Atthay asway owhay ehay ufferedsay inay exileay, ookinglay orfay aay ayway ofay ullinglay erhay ithway, ishay ownay eathday, untilay ehay
eardhay omesay olday anmay elltay ethay aletay ofay ethay anmay owhay adhay arriedmay ishay auntay, owhay asway alsoay ishay ousincay, anday
osewhay onsay endeday upay eingbay ishay ownay andfathergray.

an“Cay aay ersonpay arrymay ishay ownay aunt?”ay ehay askeday, artledstay.

e“Hay otnay onlyay ancay oday atthay, aay oldiersay answereday imhay. ut“bay e’reway ightingfay isthay arway againstay ethay iestspray
osay atthay aay ersonpay ancay arrymay ishay ownay other.”may

Otway eeksway aterlay ehay esertedday. Ehay oundfay Amarantaay oremay itheredway anthay inay ishay emorymay, oremay
elancholymay anday yshay, anday ownay eallyray urningtay ethay astlay ornercay ofay aturitymay, utbay oremay everishfay anthay everay
inay ethay arknessday ofay erhay edroombay anday oremay allengingchay anthay everay inay ethay aggressivenessay ofay erhay
esistanceray. You’re“ay aay ute,”bray Amarantaay ouldway elltay imhay asay eshay asway arriedhay ybay ishay oundshay. You“ay an’tcay
oday atthay otay aay oorpay auntay unlessay youay avehay aay ecialspay ispensationday omfray ethay Ope.”pay Aurelianoay, Osejay
omisedpray otay ogay otay Omeray, ehay omisedpray otay ogay acrossay Europeay onay ishay eesknay otay isskay ethay andalssay ofay ethay
Ontiffpay ustjay osay atthay eshay ouldway owerlay erhay awbridgedray.

It’s“ay otnay ustjay at,”thay Amarantaay etortedray. Any“ay ildrenchay illway ebay ornbay ithway ethay ailtay ofay aay ig.”pay

Aurelianoay Osejay asway eafday otay allay argumentsay.

I“ay on’tday arecay ifay ey’rethay ornbay asay armadillos,”ay ehay eggedbay.

Earlyay oneay orningmay, anquishedvay ybay ethay unbearableay ainpay ofay epressedray irilityvay, ehay entway otay Atarino’scay.
Ehay oundfay aay omanway ithway accidflay eastsbray, affectionateay anday eapchay, owhay almedcay ishay omachstay orfay omesay
imetay. Ehay iedtray otay applyay ethay eatmenttray ofay isdainday otay Amarantaay. Ehay ouldway eesay erhay onay ethay orchpay
orkingway atay ethay ewingsay achinemay, ichwhay eshay adhay earnedlay otay operateay ithway admirableay illskay, anday ehay ouldway
otnay evenay eakspay otay erhay. Amarantaay eltfay eedfray ofay aay eefray, anday eshay erselfhay idday otnay understanday ywhay eshay
artedstay inkingthay againay atay atthay imetay aboutay Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay, ywhay eshay ememberedray ithway
uchsay ostalgianay ethay afternoonsay ofay Inesechay eckerschay, anday ywhay eshay evenay esiredday imhay asay ethay anmay inay erhay
edroombay. Aurelianoay, Osejay idday otnay ealizeray owhay uchmay oundgray ehay adhay ostlay onay, ethay ightnay ehay ouldcay onay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


ongerlay earbay ethay arcefay ofay indifferenceay anday entway ackbay otay Amaranta’say oomray. Eshay ejectedray imhay ithway anay
inflexibleay anday unmistakableay eterminationday, anday eshay arredbay ethay oorday ofay erhay edroombay oreverfay.

Aay ewfay onthsmay afteray ethay eturnray ofay Aurelianoay Osejay anay exuberantay omanway erfumedpay ithway asminejay
appeareday atay ethay ousehay ithway aay oybay ofay ivefay. Eshay atedstay atthay ehay asway ethay onsay ofay Olonelcay Aurelianoay
Uendiabay anday atthay eshay adhay oughtbray imhay otay Ursulaay otay ebay aptizedbay. Onay oneay oubtedday ethay originsay ofay atthay
amelessnay ildchay: ehay ookedlay exactlyay ikelay ethay olonelcay atay ethay imetay ehay asway akentay otay eesay iceay orfay ethay irstfay
imetay. Ethay omanway aidsay atthay ehay adhay eenbay ornbay ithway ishay eyesay openay, ookinglay atay eoplepay ithway ethay
udgmentjay ofay anay adultay, anday atthay eshay asway ightenedfray ybay ishay ayway ofay aringstay atay ingsthay ithoutway inkingblay.
e’s“Hay identical,”ay Ursulaay aidsay. e“Thay onlyay ingthay issingmay isay orfay imhay otay akemay airschay ockray ybay implysay
ookinglay atay em.”thay Eythay istenedchray imhay Aurelianoay anday ithway ishay other’smay astlay amenay, incesay ethay awlay idday
otnay ermitpay aay ersonpay otay earbay ishay ather’sfay amenay untilay ehay adhay ecognizedray imhay. Eneralgay Oncadamay asway
ethay odfathergay. Althoughay Amarantaay insisteday atthay ehay ebay eftlay osay atthay eshay ouldcay aketay overay ishay upbringingay,
ishay othermay asway againstay itay. Ursulaay atay atthay imetay idday otnay owknay aboutay ethay ustomcay ofay endingsay irginsvay otay
ethay edroomsbay ofay oldierssay inay ethay amesay ayway atthay enshay areay urnedtay ooselay ithway inefay oostersray, utbay inay ethay
oursecay ofay atthay yearay eshay oundfay outay: inenay oremay onssay ofay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay ereway oughtbray otay
ethay ousehay otay ebay aptizedbay. Ethay oldestay, aay angestray arkday oybay ithway eengray eyesay, owhay asway otnay atay allay ikelay ishay
ather’sfay amilyfay, asway overay entay yearsay olday. Eythay oughtbray ildrenchay ofay allay agesay, allay olorscay, utbay allay alesmay anday
allay ithway aay ooklay ofay olitudesay atthay eftlay onay oubtday asay otay ethay elationshipray. Onlyay otway oodstay outay inay ethay oupgray.
Oneay, argelay orfay ishay ageay, ademay ithereenssmay outay ofay ethay owerpotsflay anday inachay ecausebay ishay andshay eemedsay
otay avehay ethay opertypray ofay eakingbray everythingay eythay ouchedtay. Ethay otheray asway aay ondblay oybay ithway ethay amesay
ightlay eyesay asay ishay othermay, osewhay airhay adhay eenbay eftlay otay owgray onglay anday urlycay ikelay atthay ofay aay omanway. Ehay
entereday ethay ousehay ithway aay eatgray ealday ofay amiliarityfay, asay ifay ehay adhay eenbay aisedray erethay, anday ehay entway irectlyday
otay aay estchay inay Ursula’say edroombay anday emandedday, I“ay antway ethay echanicalmay allerina.”bay Ursulaay asway
artledstay. Eshay openeday ethay estchay, earchedsay amongay ethay ancientay anday ustyday articlesay eftlay omfray ethay aysday ofay
Elqufadesmay, anday appedwray inay aay airpay ofay ockingsstay eshay oundfay ethay echanicalmay allerinabay atthay Ietropay Espicray
adhay oughtbray otay ethay ousehay onceay anday atthay everyoneay adhay orgottenfay aboutay. Inay esslay anthay elvetway yearsay eythay
aptizedbay ithway ethay amenay Aurelianoay anday ethay astlay amenay ofay ethay othermay allay ethay onssay atthay ethay olonelcay adhay
implanteday upay anday ownday ishay eaterthay ofay arway: eventeensay. Atay irstfay Ursulaay ouldway illfay eirthay ocketspay ithway
oneymay anday Amarantaay iedtray otay avehay emthay aystay. Utbay eythay inallyfay imitedlay emselvesthay otay ivinggay emthay
esentspray anday ervingsay asay odmothersgay. e’ve“Way oneday ouray utyday ybay aptizingbay em,”thay Ursulaay ouldway aysay,
ottingjay ownday inay aay edgerlay ethay amenay anday addressay ofay ethay othermay anday ethay aceplay anday ateday ofay irthbay ofay ethay
ildchay. Aureliano“ay eedsnay ell-keptway accountsay osay atthay ehay ancay ecideday ingsthay enwhay ehay omescay ack.”bay
Uringday unchlay, ommentingcay ithway Eneralgay Oncadamay aboutay atthay isconcertingday oliferationpray, eshay
expresseday ethay esireday orfay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay otay omecay ackbay omedaysay anday athergay allay ofay ishay onssay
ogethertay inay ethay ousehay.

on’t“Day orryway, earday iend,”fray Eneralgay Oncadamay aidsay enigmaticallyay. e’ll“Hay omecay oonersay anthay youay
uspect.”say

Atwhay Eneralgay Oncadamay ewknay anday atwhay ehay idday otnay ishway otay evealray atay unchlay asway atthay Olonelcay
Aurelianoay Uendiabay asway alreadyay onay ishay ayway otay eadhay upay ethay ostmay olongedpray, adicalray, anday oodyblay
ebellionray ofay allay osethay ehay adhay artedstay upay illtay enthay.

Ethay ituationsay againay ecamebay asay ensetay asay itay adhay eenbay uringday ethay onthsmay atthay ecededpray ethay irstfay arway.
Ethay ockfightscay, instituteday ybay ethay ayormay imselfhay, ereway uspendedsay. Aptaincay Aquilesay Icardoray, ethay
ommandercay ofay ethay arrisongay, ooktay overay ethay exerciseay ofay unicipalmay owerpay. Ethay Iberalslay ookedlay uponay
imhay asay aay ovocateurpray. omething“Say erribletay isay oinggay otay appen,”hay Ursulaay ouldway aysay otay Aurelianoay Osejay.
on’t“Day ogay outay intoay ethay eetstray afteray ixsay o’clock.”ay Ethay entreatiesay ereway uselessay. Aurelianoay Osejay, ustjay ikelay
Arcadioay inay otheray imestay, adhay easedcay otay elongbay otay erhay. Itay asway asay ifay ishay eturnray omehay, ethay ossibilitypay ofay
existingay ithoutway oncerningcay imselfhay ithway everydayay ecessitiesnay, adhay awakeneday inay imhay ethay ewdlay anday
azylay eaningslay ofay ishay uncleay Osejay Arcadioay. Ishay assionpay orfay Amarantaay adhay eenbay extinguisheday ithoutway

eavinglay anyay arsscay. Ehay ouldway iftdray arounday, ayingplay oolpay, easingay ishay olitudesay ithway occasionalay omenway,
ackingsay ethay idinghay acesplay erewhay Ursulaay adhay orgottenfay erhay oneymay. Ehay endeday upay omingcay omehay onlyay otay
angechay ishay othesclay. ey’re“Thay allay alike,”ay Ursulaay amentedlay. At“ay irstfay eythay ehavebay eryvay ellway, ey’rethay
obedientay anday omptpray anday eythay on’tday eemsay apablecay ofay illingkay aay yflay, utbay asay oonsay asay eirthay eardsbay appearay
eythay ogay otay uin.”ray Unlikeay Arcadioay, owhay adhay evernay ownknay ishay ealray originsay, ehay oundfay outay atthay ehay asway
ethay onsay ofay Ilarpay Erneratay, owhay adhay unghay upay aay ammockhay osay atthay ehay ouldcay aketay ishay iestasay inay erhay ousehay.
Oremay anthay othermay anday onsay, eythay ereway accomplicesay inay olitudesay. Ilarpay Erneratay adhay ostlay ethay ailtray ofay allay
opehay. Erhay aughlay adhay akentay onay ethay onestay ofay anay organay, erhay eastsbray adhay uccumbedsay otay ethay ediumtay ofay
endlessay aressingcay, erhay omachstay anday erhay ighsthay adhay eenbay ethay ictimsvay ofay erhay irrevocableay atefay asay aay
aredshay omanway, utbay erhay earthay ewgray olday ithoutway itternessbay. Atfay, alkativetay, ithway ethay airsay ofay aay atronmay inay
isgraceday, eshay enouncedray ethay erilestay illusionsay ofay erhay ardscay anday oundfay eacepay anday onsolationcay inay otheray
eople’spay oveslay. Inay ethay ousehay erewhay Aurelianoay Osejay ooktay ishay iestasay, ethay irlsgay omfray ethay eighborhoodnay
ouldway eceiveray eirthay asualcay overslay. end“Lay emay youray oomray, Ilar,”pay eythay ouldway implysay aysay enwhay eythay
ereway alreadyay insideay. Of“ay ourse,”cay Ilarpay ouldway answeray. Anday ifay anyoneay asway esentpray eshay ouldway explainay:

I’m“ay appyhay owingknay atthay eoplepay areay appyhay inay ed.”bay

Eshay evernay argedchay orfay ethay ervicesay. Eshay evernay efusedray ethay avorfay, ustjay asay eshay evernay efusedray ethay
ountlesscay enmay owhay oughtsay erhay outay, evenay inay ethay ilighttway ofay erhay aturitymay, ithoutway ivinggay erhay oneymay oray
ovelay anday onlyay occasionallyay easureplay. Erhay ivefay aughtersday, owhay inheriteday aay urningbay eedsay, adhay eenbay ostlay
onay ethay ywaysbay ofay ifelay incesay adolescenceay. Ofay ethay otway onssay eshay anagedmay otay aiseray, oneay iedday ightingfay inay
ethay orcesfay ofay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay anday ethay otheray asway oundedway anday apturedcay atay ethay ageay ofay
ourteenfay enwhay ehay iedtray otay ealstay aay atecray ofay ickenschay inay aay owntay inay ethay ampsway. Inay aay ertaincay ayway,
Aurelianoay Osejay asway ethay alltay, arkday anmay owhay adhay eenbay omisedpray erhay orfay alfhay aay enturycay ybay ethay ingkay ofay
eartshay, anday ikelay allay enmay entsay ybay ethay ardscay ehay eachedray erhay earthay enwhay ehay asway alreadyay ampedstay ithway ethay
arkmay ofay eathday. Eshay awsay itay inay ethay ardscay.

on’t“Day ogay outay onight,”tay eshay oldtay imhay. ay“Stay anday eepslay erehay ecausebay Armelitacay Ontielmay isay ettinggay
iredtay ofay askingay emay otay utpay erhay inay youray oom.”ray

Aurelianoay Osejay idday otnay atchcay ethay eepday eelingfay ofay eggingbay atthay asway inay ethay offeray.

ell“Tay erhay otay aitway orfay emay atay idnight”may ehay aidsay. Ehay entway otay ethay eaterthay, erewhay aay Anishspay ompanycay
asway uttingpay onay Ethay Aggerday ofay ethay Oxfay, ichwhay asway eallyray Orzilla’szay ayplay ithway ethay itletay angedchay ybay orderay
ofay Aptaincay Aquilesay Icardoray, ecausebay ethay Iberalslay alledcay ethay Onservativescay Othsgay. Onlyay enwhay ehay
andedhay inay ishay ickettay atay ethay oorday idday Aurelianoay Osejay ealizeray atthay Aptaincay Aquilesay Icardoray anday otway
oldierssay armeday ithway iflesray ereway earchingsay ethay audienceay.

e“Bay arefulcay, aptain,”cay Aurelianoay Osejay arnedway imhay. e“Thay anmay asn’thay eenbay ornbay yetay owhay ancay aylay
andshay onay e.”may Ethay aptaincay iedtray otay earchsay imhay orciblyfay anday Aurelianoay Osejay, owhay asway unarmeday,
eganbay otay mn.ay Ethay oldierssay isobeyedday ethay orderay otay ootshay. e’s“Hay aay Uendia,”bay oneay ofay emthay explaineday.
Indblay ithway ageray, ethay aptaincay enthay atchedsnay awayay ethay ifleray, eppedstay intoay ethay entercay ofay ethay eetstray, anday
ooktay aim.”ay

owards!”“Cay ehay outedshay. I“ay onlyay ishway itay asway Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendia.”bay

Armelitacay Ontielmay, aay enty-year-oldtway irginvay, adhay ustjay athedbay inay orange-blossomay aterway anday asway
ewingstray osemaryray eaveslay onay Ilarpay Ernera’stay edbay enwhay ethay otshay angray outay. Aurelianoay Osejay adhay eenbay
estinedday otay indfay ithway erhay ethay appinesshay atthay Amarantaay adhay eniedday imhay, otay avehay evensay ildrenchay, anday
otay ieday inay erhay armsay ofay olday ageay, utbay ethay ulletbay atthay entereday ishay ackbay anday atteredshay ishay estchay adhay eenbay
irectedday ybay aay ongwray interpretationay ofay ethay ardscay. Aptaincay Aquilesay Icardoray, owhay asway eallyray ethay oneay
estinedday otay ieday atthay ightnay, idday indeeday ieday, ourfay ourshay eforebay Aurelianoay Osejay. Asay onway asay ethay otshay asway
eardhay ehay asway oughtbray ownday ybay otway imultaneoussay ulletsbay osewhay originay asway evernay establisheday anday aay
outshay ofay anymay oicesvay ookshay ethay ightnay.

ong“Lay ivelay ethay Iberallay artypay! Onglay ivelay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendia!”bay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Atay elvetway o’clockay, enwhay Aurelianoay, Osejay adhay edblay otay eathday anday Armelitacay Ontielmay oundfay atthay ethay
ardscay owingshay erhay uturefay ereway ankblay, oremay anthay ourfay undredhay enmay adhay iledfay astpay ethay eaterthay anday
ischargedday eirthay evolversray intoay ethay abandoneday odybay ofay Aptaincay Aquilesay Icardoray. Aay atrolpay adhay otay useay
aay eelbarrowwhay otay arrycay ethay odybay, ichwhay asway eavyhay ithway eadlay anday ellfay apartay ikelay aay ater-soakedway oaflay ofay
eadbray.

Annoyeday ybay ethay outragesay ofay ethay egularray armyay, Eneralgay Osejay Aquelray Oncadamay useday ishay oliticalpay
influenceay, utpay onay ishay uniformay againay, anday assumeday ethay ivilcay anday ilitarymay eadershiplay ofay Acondomay. Ehay
idday otnay expectay, oweverhay, atthay ishay onciliatorycay attitudeay ouldway ebay ableay otay eventpray ethay inevitableay. Ethay
ewsnay inay Eptembersay asway ontradictorycay. Ilewhay ethay overnmentgay announceday atthay itay asway aintainingmay
ontrolcay oughoutthray ethay ountrycay, ethay Iberalslay ereway eceivingray ecretsay ewsnay ofay armeday uprisingsay inay ethay
interioray. Ethay egimeray ouldway otnay admitay aay atestay ofay arway untilay itay asway oclaimedpray inay aay ecreeday atthay adhay
ollowedfay aay ourt-martialcay ichwhay adhay ondemnedcay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay otay eathday inay absentiaay. Ethay
irstfay unitay atthay apturedcay imhay asway ordereday otay arrycay ethay entencesay outay. is“Thay eansmay e’shay omecay ack,”bay
Ursulaay aidsay oyfullyjay otay Eneralgay Oncadamay. Utbay ehay imselfhay ewknay othingnay aboutay itay.

Actuallyay, Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay adhay eenbay inay ethay ountrycay orfay oremay anthay aay onthmay. Ehay asway
ecededpray ybay onflictingcay umorsray, upposedsay otay ebay inay ethay ostmay istantday acesplay atay ethay amesay imetay, anday
evenay Eneralgay Oncadamay idday otnay elievebay inay ishay eturnray untilay itay asway officiallyay announceday atthay ehay adhay
eizedsay otway atesstay onay ethay oastcay. ongratulations“Cay, earday iend,”fray ehay oldtay Ursulaay, owingshay erhay ethay
elegramtay. You’ll“ay oonsay avehay imhay ere.”hay Ursulaay asway orriedway enthay orfay ethay irstfay imetay. And“ay atwhay illway
youay o?”day eshay askeday. Eneralgay Oncadamay adhay askeday imselfhay atthay amesay uestionqay anymay imestay.

e“Thay amesay asay ehay, ymay iend,”fray ehay answereday. I’ll“ay oday ymay uty.”day

Atay awnday onay ethay irstfay ofay Octoberay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay attackeday Acondomay ithway aay ousandthay
ell-armedway enmay anday ethay arrisongay eceivedray ordersay otay esistray otay ethay enday. Atay oonnay, ilewhay Eneralgay
Oncadamay asway unchinglay ithway Ursulaay, aay ebelray annoncay otshay atthay echoeday inay ethay olewhay owntay ewblay ethay
ontfray ofay ethay unicipalmay easurytray otay ustday. ey’re“Thay asay ellway armeday asay eway are,”ay Eneralgay Oncadamay ighedsay,
ut“bay esidesbay atthay ey’rethay ightingfay ecausebay eythay antway o.”tay Atay otway o’clockay inay ethay afternoonay, ilewhay ethay
earthay embledtray ithway ethay artilleryay irefay omfray othbay idessay, ehay ooktay eavelay ofay Ursulaay ithway ethay ertaintycay atthay
ehay asway ightingfay aay osinglay attlebay.

I“ay aypray otay Odgay atthay youay on’tway avehay Aurelianoay inay ethay ousehay onight,”tay ehay aidsay. If“ay itay oesday appenhay
atthay ayway, ivegay imhay anay embraceay orfay emay, ecausebay Iay on’tday expectay everay otay eesay imhay again.”ay

Atthay ightnay ehay asway apturedcay enwhay ehay iedtray otay escapeay omfray Acondomay, afteray itingwray aay onglay etterlay otay
Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay inay ichwhay ehay emindedray imhay ofay eirthay ommoncay aimay otay umanizehay ethay arway
anday ehay ishedway imhay aay inalfay ictoryvay overay ethay orruptioncay ofay ethay ilitaristsmay anday ethay ambitionsay ofay ethay
oliticianspay inay othbay artiespay. Onay ethay ollowingfay ayday Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay adhay unchlay ithway imhay inay
Ursula’say ousehay, erewhay ehay asway eingbay eldhay untilay aay evolutionaryray ourt-martialcay ecidedday ishay atefay. Itay asway aay
iendlyfray atheringgay. Utbay ilewhay ethay adversariesay orgotfay ethay arway otay ememberray ingsthay ofay ethay astpay, Ursulaay
adhay ethay oomyglay eelingfay atthay erhay onsay asway anay intruderay. Eshay adhay eltfay itay everay incesay eshay awsay imhay omecay inay
otectedpray ybay aay oisynay ilitarymay etinueray, ichwhay urnedtay ethay edroomsbay insideay outay untilay eythay ereway
onvincedcay erethay asway onay angerday. Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay otnay onlyay accepteday itay utbay ehay avegay ictstray
ordersay atthay onay oneay ouldshay omecay oserclay anthay entay eetfay, otnay evenay Ursulaay, ilewhay ethay embersmay ofay ishay
escortay inishedfay acingplay uardsgay aboutay ethay ousehay. Ehay asway earingway anay ordinaryay enimday uniformay ithway onay
insigniaay ofay anyay indkay anday ighhay ootsbay ithway ursspay atthay ereway akedcay ithway udmay anday ieddray oodblay. Onay ishay
aistway ehay oreway aay olsterhay ithway ethay apflay openay anday ishay andhay, ichwhay asway alwaysay onay ethay uttbay ofay ethay istolpay,
evealedray ethay amesay atchfulway anday esoluteray ensiontay asay ishay ooklay. Ishay eadhay, ithway eepday ecessionsray inay ethay
airlinehay ownay, eemedsay otay avehay eenbay akedbay inay aay owslay ovenay. Ishay acefay, annedtay ybay ethay altsay ofay ethay
Aribbeancay, adhay acquireday aay etallicmay ardnesshay. Ehay asway eservedpray againstay imminentay olday ageay ybay aay italityvay
atthay adhay omethingsay otay oday ithway ethay oldnesscay ofay ishay insidesay. Ehay asway allertay anthay enwhay ehay adhay eftlay, alerpay
anday onierbay, anday ehay owedshay ethay irstfay ymptomssay ofay esistanceray otay ostalgianay. ood“Gay Ord,”lay Ursulaay aidsay
