otay erselfhay. ow“Nay ehay ookslay ikelay aay anmay apablecay ofay anything.”ay Ehay asway. Ethay Aztecay awlshay atthay ehay oughtbray
Amarantaay, ethay emembrancesray ehay okespay ofay atay unchlay, ethay unnyfay oriesstay erhay oldtay ereway implesay eftoverslay
omfray ishay umorhay ofay aay ifferentday imetay. Asay oonsay asay ethay orderay otay urybay ethay eadday inay aay ommoncay avegray asway
arriedcay outay, ehay assigneday Olonelcay Oqueray Arnicerocay ethay inionmay ofay ettingsay upay ourts-martialcay anday ehay
entway aheaday ithway ethay exhaustingay asktay ofay imposingay adicalray eformsray ichwhay ouldway otnay eavelay aay onestay ofay
ethay eestablishedray Onservativecay egimeray inay aceplay. e“Way avehay otay etgay aheaday ofay ethay oliticianspay inay ethay
arty,”pay ehay aidsay otay ishay aidesay. en“Whay eythay openay eirthay eyesay otay ealityray ey’llthay indfay accomplisheday acts.”fay Itay
asway enthay atthay ehay ecidedday otay eviewray ethay itlestay otay andlay atthay entway ackbay aay undredhay yearsay anday ehay
iscoveredday ethay egalizedlay outragesay ofay ishay otherbray, Osejay Arcadioay. Ehay annulleday ethay egistrationsray ithway aay
okestray ofay ethay enpay. Asay aay astlay esturegay ofay ourtesycay, ehay eftlay ishay affairsay orfay anay ourhay anday isitedvay Ebecaray otay
ingbray erhay upay otay ateday onay atwhay ehay asway eterminedday otay oday.

Inay ethay adowsshay ofay erhay ousehay, ethay olitarysay idowway owhay atay oneay imetay adhay eenbay ethay onfidantecay ofay ishay
epressedray oveslay anday osewhay ersistencepay adhay avedsay ishay ifelay asway aay ecterspay outay ofay ethay astpay. Encaseday inay
ackblay ownday otay erhay ucklesknay, ithway erhay earthay urnedtay otay ashay, eshay arcelyscay ewknay anythingay aboutay ethay arway.
Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay adhay ethay impressionay atthay ethay osphorescencephay ofay erhay onesbay asway owingshay
oughthray erhay inskay anday atthay eshay ovedmay inay anay atmosphereay ofay Aintsay Elmo’say irefay, inay aay agnantstay airay erewhay
oneay ouldcay illstay otenay aay iddenhay ellsmay ofay unpowdergay. Ehay eganbay ybay advisingay erhay otay oderatemay ethay igorray ofay
erhay ourningmay, otay entilatevay ethay ousehay, otay orgivefay ethay orldway orfay ethay eathday ofay Osejay Arcadioay. Utbay Ebecaray
asway alreadyay eyondbay anyay anityvay. Afteray earchingsay orfay itay uselesslyay inay ethay astetay ofay earthay, inay, ethay erfumedpay
etterslay omfray Ietropay Espicray, inay ethay empestuoustay edbay ofay erhay usbandhay, eshay adhay oundfay eacepay inay atthay
ousehay erewhay emoriesmay aterializedmay oughthray ethay engthstray ofay implacableay evocationay anday alkedway ikelay
umanhay eingsbay oughthray ethay oisteredclay oomsray. Eaninglay ackbay inay erhay ickerway ockingray airchay, ookinglay atay
Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay asay ifay ehay ereway ethay oneay owhay ookedlay ikelay aay ostghay outay ofay ethay astpay, Ebecaray
asway otnay evenay upsetay ybay ethay ewsnay atthay ethay andslay usurpeday ybay Osejay Arcadioay ouldway ebay eturnedray otay eirthay
ightfulray ownersay.

atever“Whay youay ecideday illway ebay oneday, Aureliano,”ay eshay ighedsay. I“ay alwaysay oughtthay anday ownay Iay avehay ethay
oofpray atthay you’reay aay enegade.”ray

Ethay evisionray ofay ethay eedsday ooktay aceplay atay ethay amesay imetay asay ethay ummarysay ourts-martialcay esidedpray
overay ybay Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay, ichwhay endeday ithway ethay executionay ofay allay officersay ofay ethay egularray
armyay owhay adhay eenbay akentay isonerpray ybay ethay evolutionariesray. Ethay astlay ourt-martialcay asway atthay ofay Osejay
Aquelray Oncadamay. Ursulaay interveneday. is‘”Hay overnmentgay asway ethay estbay e’veway everay adhay inay Acondo,”may
eshay oldtay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay. I“ay on’tday avehay otay elltay youay anythingay aboutay ishay oodgay earthay, aboutay
ishay affectionay orfay usay, ecausebay youay owknay etterbay anthay anyone.”ay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay avegay erhay aay
isapprovingday ooklay.

I“ay an’tcay aketay overay ethay objay ofay administeringay ustice,”jay ehay epliedray. If“ay youay avehay omethingsay otay aysay, elltay
itay otay ethay ourt-martial.”cay

Ursulaay otnay onlyay idday atthay eshay alsoay oughtbray allay ofay ethay othersmay ofay ethay evolutionaryray officersay owhay
ivedlay inay Acondomay otay estifytay. Oneay ybay oneay ethay olday omenway owhay adhay eenbay oundersfay ofay ethay owntay, everalsay
ofay omwhay adhay akentay artpay inay ethay aringday ossingcray ofay ethay ountainsmay, aisedpray ethay irtuesvay ofay Eneralgay
Oncadamay. Ursulaay asway ethay astlay inay inelay. Erhay oomyglay ignityday, ethay eightway ofay erhay amenay, ethay onvincingcay
ehemencevay ofay erhay eclarationday ademay ethay alescay ofay usticejay esitatehay orfay aay omentmay. You“ay avehay akentay isthay
orriblehay amegay eryvay eriouslysay anday youay avehay oneday ellway ecausebay youay areay oingday youray uty,”day eshay oldtay ethay
embersmay ofay ethay ourtcay. ut“Bay on’tday orgetfay atthay asay onglay asay Odgay ivesgay usay ifelay eway illway illstay ebay othersmay anday
onay attermay owhay evolutionaryray youay aymay ebay, eway avehay ethay ightray otay ullpay ownday youray antspay anday ivegay youay aay
ippingwhay atay ethay irstfay ignsay ofay isrespect.”day Ethay ourtcay etiredray otay eliberateday asay osethay ordsway illstay echoeday inay
ethay oolschay atthay adhay eenbay urnedtay intoay aay arracksbay. Atay idnightmay Eneralgay Osejay Aquelray Oncadamay asway
entencedsay otay eathday. Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay, inay itespay ofay ethay iolentvay ecriminationsray ofay Ursulaay,

efusedray otay ommutecay ethay entencesay. Aay ortshay ilewhay eforebay awnday ehay isitedvay ethay ondemnedcay anmay inay ethay
oomray useday asay aay ellcay.

emember“Ray, olday iend,”fray ehay oldtay imhay. I’m“ay otnay ootingshay youay. It’say ethay evolutionray at’sthay ootingshay

 
youay.

Eneralgay Oncadamay idday otnay evenay etgay upay omfray ethay otcay enwhay ehay awsay imhay omecay inay.

o“Gay otay ellhay, iend,”fray ehay answereday.

Untilay atthay omentmay, everay incesay ishay eturnray. Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay adhay otnay ivengay imselfhay ethay
opportunityay otay eesay imhay ithway ishay earthay. Ehay asway artledstay otay eesay owhay uchmay ehay adhay ageday, owhay ishay andshay
ookshay, anday ethay atherray unctiliouspay onformitycay ithway ichwhay ehay awaiteday eathday, anday enthay ehay eltfay aay eatgray
isgustday ithway imselfhay, ichwhay ehay ingledmay ithway ethay eginningsbay ofay itypay.

You“ay owknay etterbay anthay I,”ay ehay aidsay, at“thay allay ourts-martialcay areay arcesfay anday atthay you’reay eallyray ayingpay
orfay ethay imescray ofay otheray eoplepay, ecausebay isthay imetay e’reway oinggay otay inway ethay arway atay anyay icepray. Ouldn’tway
youay avehay oneday ethay amesay inay ymay ace?”play

Eneralgay Oncadamay, otgay upay otay eanclay ishay ickthay orn-rimmedhay assesglay onay ishay irttailshay. obably,”“Pray ehay
aidsay. ut“Bay atwhay orriesway emay isay otnay youray ootingshay emay, ecausebay afteray allay, orfay eoplepay ikelay usay it’say aay aturalnay
eath.”day Ehay aidlay ishay assesglay onay ethay edbay anday ooktay offay ishay atchway anday ainchay. at“Whay orriesway e,”may ehay entway
onay, is“ay atthay outay ofay osay uchmay atredhay orfay ethay ilitarymay, outay ofay ightingfay emthay osay uchmay anday inkingthay aboutay
emthay osay uchmay, you’veay endeday upay asay adbay asay eythay areay. Anday onay idealay inay ifelay isay orthway atthay uchmay
aseness.”bay Ehay ooktay offay ishay eddingway ingray anday ethay edalmay ofay ethay Irginvay ofay Elphay anday utpay emthay
alongsideay ishay assesglay anday atchway.

At“ay isthay ate,”ray ehay oncludedcay, you’ll“ay otnay onlyay ebay ethay ostmay espoticday anday oodyblay ictatorday inay ouray
istoryhay, utbay you’llay ootshay ymay earday iendfray Ursulaay inay anay attemptay otay acifypay youray onscience.”cay

Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay oodstay erethay impassivelyay. Eneralgay Oncadamay enthay avegay imhay ethay assesglay,
edalmay, atchway, anday ingray anday ehay angedchay ishay onetay.

ut“Bay Iay idn’tday endsay orfay youay otay oldscay you,”ay ehay aidsay. I“ay antedway otay askay youay ethay avorfay ofay endingsay esethay
ingsthay otay ymay ife.”way

Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay utpay emthay inay ishay ocketspay.

Is“ay eshay illstay inay Anaure?”may

e’s“Shay illstay inay Anaure,”may Eneralgay Oncadamay onfirmedcay, in“ay ethay amesay ousehay ehindbay ethay urchchay
erewhay youay entsay ethay etter.”lay

I’ll“ay ebay adglay otay, Osejay Aquel,”ray Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay aidsay.

Enwhay ehay entway outay intoay ethay ueblay airay ofay ethay istmay ishay acefay ewgray ampday asay onay omesay otheray awnday inay ethay
astpay anday onlyay enthay idday ehay ealizeray atthay e-hay adhay ordereday ethay entencesay otay ebay arriedcay outay inay ethay ourtyardcay
anday otnay atay ethay emeterycay allway. Ethay iringfay uadsqay, awndray upay oppositeay ethay oorday, aidpay imhay ethay onorshay ofay
aay eadhay ofay atestay.

ey“Thay ancay ingbray imhay outay ow,”nay ehay ordereday.






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Apterchay 


OLONELcay ERINELDOgay ARQUEZmay asway ethay irstfay otay erceivepay ethay emptinessay ofay ethay arway. Inay ishay ositionpay
asay ivilcay anday ilitarymay eaderlay ofay Acondomay ehay ouldway avehay elegraphictay onversationscay icetway aay eekway ithway
Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay. Atay irstfay osethay exchangesay ouldway etermineday ethay oursecay ofay aay esh-andflay-
oodblay arway, ethay erfectlypay efinedday outlinesay ofay ichwhay oldtay emthay atay anyay omentmay ethay exactay otspay ere-whay itay
asway anday ethay edictionpray ofay itsay uturefay irectionday. Althoughay ehay evernay etlay imselfhay ebay ulledpay intoay ethay areaay
ofay onfidencescay, otnay evenay ybay ishay osestclay iendsfray. Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay illstay adhay atay atthay imetay ethay
amiliarfay onetay atthay ademay itay ossiblepay otay identifyay imhay atay ethay otheray enday ofay ethay ireway. Anymay imestay ehay ouldway
olongpray ethay alktay eyondbay ethay expecteday imitlay anday etlay emthay iftdray intoay ommentscay ofay aay omesticday aturenay.
Ittlelay ybay ittlelay, oweverhay, anday asay ethay arway ecamebay oremay intenseay anday idespreadway, ishay imageay asway adingfay
awayay intoay aay universeay ofay unrealityay. Ethay aracteristicschay ofay ishay eechspay ereway oremay anday oremay uncertainay,
anday eythay amcay ogethertay anday ombinedcay otay ormfay ordsway atthay ereway aduallygray osinglay allay eaningmay. Olonelcay
Erineldogay Arquezmay imitedlay imselfhay enthay otay ustjay isteninglay, urdenedbay ybay ethay impressionay atthay ehay asway inay
elegraphictay ontactcay ithway aay angerstray omfray anotheray orldway.

I“ay understanday, Aureliano,”ay ehay ouldway oncludecay onay ethay eykay. ong“Lay ivelay ethay Iberallay arty!”pay

Ehay inallyfay ostlay allay ontactcay ithway ethay arway. Atwhay inay otheray imestay adhay eenbay aay ealray activityay, anay irresistibleay
assionpay ofay ishay youthay, ecamebay aay emoteray ointpay ofay eferenceray orfay imhay: anay emptinessay. Ishay onlyay efugeray asway
Amaranta’say ewingsay oomray. Ehay ouldway isitvay erhay everyay afternoonay. Ehay ikedlay otay atchway erhay andshay asay eshay
urledcay othyfray etticoatpay othclay inay ethay achinemay atthay asway eptkay inay otionmay ybay Emediosray ethay Eautybay. Eythay
entspay anymay ourshay ithoutway eakingspay, ontentcay ithway eirthay eciprocalray ompanycay, utbay ilewhay Amarantaay asway
inwardlyay easedplay inay eepingkay ethay irefay ofay ishay evotionday aliveay, ehay asway unawareay ofay ethay ecretsay esignsday ofay
atthay indecipherableay earthay. Enwhay ethay ewsnay ofay ishay eturnray eachedray erhay, Amarantaay adhay eenbay otheredsmay
ybay anxietyay. Utbay enwhay eshay awsay imhay enteray ethay ousehay inay ethay iddlemay ofay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendfa’sbay
oisynay escortay anday eshay awsay owhay ehay adhay eenbay istreatedmay ybay ethay igorsray ofay exileay, ademay olday ybay ageay anday
oblivionay, irtyday ithway eatsway anday ustday, ellingsmay ikelay aay erdhay, uglyay, ithway ishay eftlay armay inay aay ingslay, eshay eltfay
aintfay ithway isillusionmentday. y“May Od,”gay eshay oughtthay. is“Thay asn’tway ethay ersonpay Iay asway aitingway or.”fay Onay
ethay ollowingfay ayday, oweverhay, ehay amecay ackbay otay ethay ousehay avedshay anday eanclay, ithway ishay ustachemay
erfumedpay ithway avenderlay aterway anday ithoutway ethay oodyblay ingslay. Ehay oughtbray erhay aay ayerbookpray oundbay inay
other-of-pearlmay.

ow“Hay angestray enmay are,”ay eshay aidsay, ecausebay eshay ouldcay otnay inkthay ofay anythingay elseay otay aysay. ey“Thay
endspay eirthay iveslay ightingfay againstay iestspray anday enthay ivegay ayerbookspray asay ifts.”gay

Omfray atthay imetay onay, evenay uringday ethay ostmay iticalcray aysday ofay ethay arway, ehay isitedvay erhay everyay afternoonay.
Anymay imestay, enwhay Emediosray ethay Eautybay asway otnay esentpray, itay asway ehay owhay urnedtay ethay eelwhay onay ethay
ewingsay achinemay. Amarantaay eltfay upsetay ybay ethay erseverancepay, ethay oyaltylay, ethay ubmissivenesssay ofay atthay
anmay owhay asway investeday ithway osay uchmay authorityay anday owhay everthelessnay ooktay offay ishay idearmsay inay ethay
ivinglay oomray osay atthay ehay ouldcay ogay intoay ethay ewingsay oomray ithoutway eaponsway. Utbay orfay ourfay yearsay ehay eptkay
epeatingray ishay ovelay anday eshay ouldway alwaysay indfay aay ayway otay ejectray imhay ithoutway urtinghay imhay, orfay evenay
oughthay eshay adhay otnay ucceededsay inay ovinglay imhay eshay ouldcay onay ongerlay ivelay ithoutway imhay. Emediosray ethay
Eautybay, owhay eemedsay indifferentay otay everythingay anday owhay asway oughtthay otay ebay entallymay etardedray, asway otnay
insensitiveay otay osay uchmay evotionday anday eshay interveneday inay Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquez’smay avorfay.
Amarantaay uddenlysay iscoveredday atthay ethay irlgay eshay adhay aisedray, owhay asway ustjay enteringay adolescenceay, asway
alreadyay ethay ostmay eautifulbay eaturecray atthay adhay evenay eenbay eensay inay Acondomay. Eshay eltfay ebornray inay erhay earthay
ethay ancorray atthay eshay adhay eltfay inay otheray aysday orfay Ebecaray, anday eggingbay Odgay otnay otay impelay erhay intoay ethay
extremeay atestay ofay ishingway erhay eadday, eshay anishedbay erhay omfray ethay ewingsay oomray. Itay asway arounday atthay imetay
atthay Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay eganbay otay eelfay ethay oredombay ofay ethay arway. Ehay ummonedsay Inisay eservesray






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


ofay ersuasionpay, ishay oadbray anday epressedray endernesstay, eadyray otay ivegay upay orfay Amarantaay aay oryglay atthay adhay
ostcay imhay ethay acrificesay ofay ishay estbay yearsay. Utbay ehay ouldcay otnay ucceedsay inay onvincingcay erhay. Oneay Augustay
afternoonay, overcomeay ybay ethay unbearableay eightway ofay erhay ownay obstinacyay, Amarantaay ockedlay erselfhay inay erhay
edroombay otay eepway overay erhay olitudesay untoay eathday afteray ivinggay erhay inalfay answeray otay erhay enacioustay uitorsay:

et’s“Lay orgetfay aboutay eachay otheray orever,”fay eshay oldtay imhay. e’re“Way ootay olday orfay isthay ortsay ofay ingthay ow.”nay

Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay adhay aay elegraphictay allcay omfray Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay atthay
afternoonay. Itay asway aay outineray onversationcay ichwhay asway otnay oinggay otay ingbray aboutay anyay eakbray inay ethay
agnantstay arway. Atay ethay enday, Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay ookedlay atay ethay esolateday eetsstray, ethay ystalcray aterway
onay ethay almonday eestray, anday ehay oundfay imselfhay ostlay inay olitudesay.

Aureliano,”“ay ehay aidsay adlysay onay ethay eykay, it’s“ay ainingray inay Acondo.”may

Erethay asway aay onglay ilencesay onay ethay inelay. Uddenlysay ethay apparatusay umpedjay ithway ethay itilesspay etterslay omfray
Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay.

on’t“Day ebay aay ackassjay, Erineldo,”gay ethay ignalssay aidsay. It’s“ay aturalnay orfay itay otay ebay ainingray inay August.”ay

Eythay adhay otnay eensay eachay otheray orfay uchsay aay onglay imetay atthay Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay asway upsetay ybay
ethay aggressivenessay ofay ethay eactionray. Otway onthsmay aterlay, oweverhay, enwhay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay
eturnedray otay Acondomay, ishay upsetay asway angedchay otay upefactionstay. Evenay Ursulaay asway urprisedsay atay owhay
uchmay ehay adhay angedchay. Ehay amecay ithway onay oisenay, onay escortay, appedwray inay aay oakclay inay itespay ofay ethay eathay,
anday ithway eethray istressesmay, omwhay ehay installeday inay ethay amesay ousehay, erewhay ehay entspay ostmay ofay ishay imetay
yinglay inay aay ammockhay. Ehay arcelyscay eadray ethay elegraphictay ispatchesday atthay eportedray outineray operationsay.
Onay oneay occasionay Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay askeday imhay orfay instructionsay orfay ethay evacuationay ofay aay
otspay onay ethay orderbay erewhay erethay asway aay angerday atthay ethay onflictcay ouldway ecomebay anay internationalay affairay.

on’t“Day otherbay emay ithway ifles,”tray ehay ordereday imhay. onsult“Cay Ivineday Ovidence.”pray

Itay asway erhapspay ethay ostmay iticalcray omentmay ofay ethay arway. Ethay Iberallay andownerslay, owhay adhay upportedsay
ethay evolutionray inay ethay eginningbay, adhay ademay ecretsay alliancesay ithway ethay Onservativecay andownerslay inay orderay
otay opstay ethay evisionray ofay opertypray itlestay. Ethay oliticianspay owhay uppliedsay undsfay orfay ethay arway omfray exileay adhay
Ubliclypay epudiatedray ethay asticdray aimsay ofay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay, utbay evenay atthay ithdrawalway ofay
authorizationay idday otnay eemsay otay otherbay imhay. Ehay adhay otnay eturnedray otay eadingray ishay oetrypay, ichwhay illedfay
oremay anthay ivefay olumesvay anday aylay orgottenfay atay ethay ottombay ofay Inisay unktray. Atay ightnay oray atay iestasay imetay ehay
ouldway allcay oneay ofay ishay omenway otay ishay ammockhay anday obtainay aay udimentaryray atisfactionsay omfray erhay, anday
enthay ehay ouldway eepslay ikelay aay onestay atthay asway otnay oncernedcay ybay ethay ightestslay indicationay ofay orryway. Onlyay ehay
ewknay atay atthay imetay atthay ishay onfusedcay earthay asway ondemnedcay otay uncertaintyay oreverfay. Atay irstfay, intoxicateday
ybay ethay oryglay ofay ishay eturnray, ybay ishay emarkableray ictoriesvay, ehay adhay eepedpay intoay ethay abyssay ofay eatnessgray. Ehay
ooktay easureplay inay eepingkay ybay ishay ightray andhay ethay Ukeday ofay Arlboroughmay, ishay eatgray eachertay inay ethay artay ofay
arway, osewhay attireay ofay insskay anday igertay awsclay arouseday ethay espectray ofay adultsay anday ethay aweay ofay ildrenchay. Itay
asway enthay atthay ehay ecidedday atthay onay umanhay eingbay, otnay evenay Ursulaay, ouldcay omecay oserclay otay imhay anthay entay
eetfay. Inay ethay entercay ofay ethay alkchay irclecay atthay ishay aidesay ouldway awdray ereverwhay ehay oppedstay, anday ichwhay onlyay
ehay ouldcay enteray, ehay ouldway ecideday ithway iefbray ordersay atthay adhay onay appealay ethay atefay ofay ethay orldway. Ethay irstfay
imetay atthay ehay asway inay Anauremay afteray ethay ootingshay ofay Eneralgay Oncadamay, ehay astenedhay otay ulfillfay ishay
ictim’svay astlay ishway anday ethay idowway ooktay ethay assesglay, ethay edalmay, ethay atchway, anday ethay ingray, utbay eshay ouldway
otnay etlay imhay inay ethay oorday.

You“ay an’tcay omecay inay, olonel,”cay eshay oldtay imhay. You“ay aymay ebay inay ommandcay ofay youray arway, utbay I’may inay
ommandcay ofay ymay ouse.”hay

Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay idday otnay owshay anyay ignsay ofay angeray, utbay ishay iritspay onlyay almedcay ownday enwhay
ishay odyguardbay adhay ackedsay ethay idow’sway ousehay anday educedray itay otay ashesay. atch“Way outay orfay youray earthay,
Aureliano,”ay Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay ouldway aysay otay imhay enthay. You’re“ay ottingray alive.”ay Aboutay atthay
imetay ehay alledcay ogethertay aay econdsay assemblyay ofay ethay incipalpray ebelray ommanderscay. Ehay oundfay allay ypestay:
idealistsay, ambitiousay eoplepay, adventurersay, osethay ithway ocialsay esentmentsray, evenay ommoncay iminalscray.
Erethay asway evenay aay ormerfay Onservativecay unctionaryfay owhay adhay akentay efugeray inay ethay evoltray otay escapeay aay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


udgmentjay orfay isappropriationmay ofay undsfay. Anymay ofay emthay idday otnay evenay owknay ywhay eythay ereway ightingfay
inay ethay idstmay ofay atthay otleymay owdcray, osewhay ifferencesday ofay aluesvay ereway onay ethay ergevay ofay ausingcay anay
internalay explosionay, oneay oomyglay authorityay oodstay outay: Eneralgay E6filotay Argasvay. Ehay asway aay ull-bloodedfay
Indianay, untameday, illiterateay, anday endoweday ithway uietqay ilesway anday aay essianicmay ocationvay atthay arouseday aay
ementedday anaticismfay inay ishay enmay. Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay alledcay ethay eetingmay ithway ethay aimay ofay
unifyingay ethay ebelray ommandcay againstay ethay aneuversmay ofay ethay oliticianspay. Eneralgay Eofilotay Argasvay amecay
orwardfay ithway ishay intentionsay: inay aay ewfay ourshay ehay atteredshay ethay oalitioncay ofay etter-qualifiedbay ommanderscay
anday ooktay argechay ofay ethay ainmay ommandcay. e’s“Hay aay ildway eastbay orthway atching,”way Olonelcay Aurelianoay
Uendiabay oldtay ishay officersay. at“Thay anmay isay oremay angerousday otay usay anthay ethay Inistermay ofay Ar.”way Enthay aay
eryvay youngay aptaincay owhay adhay alwaysay eenbay outstandingay orfay ishay imiditytay aisedray aay autiouscay indexay ingerfay.

It’s“ay uiteqay implesay, olonel,”cay ehay oposedpray. e“Hay ashay otay ebay illed.”kay

Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay asway otnay alarmeday ybay ethay oldnesscay ofay ethay opositionpray utbay ybay ethay ayway inay
ichwhay, ybay aay actionfray ofay aay econdsay, itay adhay anticipateday ishay ownay oughtsthay.

on’t“Day expectay emay otay ivegay anay orderay ikelay at,”thay ehay aidsay.

Ehay idday otnay ivegay itay, asay aay attermay ofay actfay. Utbay otway eeksway aterlay Eneralgay Eofilotay Argasvay asway utcay otay itsbay
ybay achetesmay inay anay ambushay anday Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay assumeday ethay ainmay ommandcay. Ethay amesay
ightnay atthay ishay authorityay asway ecognizedray ybay allay ethay ebelray ommandscay, ehay okeway upay inay aay ightfray, allingcay orfay
aay anketblay. Anay inneray oldnesscay ichwhay atteredshay ishay onesbay anday orturedtay imhay evenay inay ethay eathay ofay ethay unsay
ouldway otnay etlay imhay eepslay orfay everalsay onthsmay, untilay itay ecamebay aay abithay. Ethay intoxicationay ofay owerpay eganbay
otay eakbray apartay underay avesway ofay iscomfortday. Earchingsay orfay aay urecay againstay ethay illchay, ehay adhay ethay youngay
officeray owhay adhay oposedpray ethay urdermay ofay Eneralgay Eofilotay Argasvay otshay. Ishay ordersay ereway eingbay arriedcay
outay evenay eforebay eythay ereway ivengay, evenay eforebay ehay oughtthay ofay emthay, anday eythay alwaysay entway uchmay
eyondbay atwhay ehay ouldway avehay aredday avehay emthay oday. Ostlay inay ethay olitudesay ofay ishay immenseay owerpay, ehay
eganbay otay oselay irectionday. Ehay asway otheredbay ybay ethay eoplepay owhay eeredchay imhay inay eighboringnay illagesvay,
anday ehay imagineday atthay eythay ereway ethay amesay eerschay eythay avegay ethay enemyay. Everywhereay ehay etmay
adolescentsay owhay ookedlay atay imhay ithway ishay ownay eyesay, owhay okespay otay imhay ithway ishay ownay oicevay, owhay
eetedgray imhay ithway ethay amesay istrustmay ithway ichwhay ehay eetedgray emthay, anday owhay aidsay eythay ereway ishay onssay.
Ehay eltfay atteredscay aboutay, ultipliedmay, anday oremay olitarysay anthay everay. Ehay asway onvincedcay atthay ishay ownay
officersay ereway yinglay otay imhay. Ehay oughtfay ithway ethay Ukeday ofay Arlboroughmay. e“Thay estbay iendfray aay ersonpay
as,”hay ehay ouldway aysay atay atthay imetay, is“ay oneay owhay ashay ustjay ied.”day Ehay asway earyway ofay ethay uncertaintyay, ofay ethay
iciousvay irclecay ofay atthay eternalay arway atthay alwaysay oundfay imhay inay ethay amesay aceplay, utbay alwaysay olderay, earierway,
evenay oremay inay ethay ositionpay ofay otnay owingknay ywhay, oray owhay, oray evenay enwhay. Erethay asway alwaysay omeonesay
outsideay ofay ethay alkchay irclecay. Omeonesay owhay eedednay oneymay, omeonesay owhay adhay aay onsay ithway oopingwhay
oughcay, oray omeonesay owhay antedway otay ogay offay anday eepslay oreverfay ecausebay ehay ouldcay otnay andstay ethay itshay astetay
ofay ethay arway inay ishay outhmay anday owhay, everthelessnay, oodstay atay attentionay otay informay imhay: Everything“ay
ormalnay, olonel.”cay Anday ormalitynay asway eciselypray ethay ostmay earfulfay artpay ofay atthay infiniteay arway: othingnay everay
appenedhay. Aloneay, abandoneday ybay ishay emonitionspray, eeingflay ethay illchay atthay asway otay accompanyay imhay untilay
eathday, ehay oughtsay aay astlay efugeray inay Acondomay inay ethay armthway ofay ishay oldestay emoriesmay. Ishay indolenceay asway
osay erioussay atthay enwhay eythay announceday ethay arrivalay ofay aay ommissioncay omfray ishay artypay atthay asway authorizeday
otay iscussday ethay alematestay ofay ethay arway, ehay olledray overay inay ishay ammockhay ithoutway ompletelycay akingway upay.

ake“Tay emthay otay ethay ores,”whay ehay aidsay.

Eythay ereway ixsay awyerslay inay ockfray oatscay anday optay atshay owhay endureday ethay iolentvay Ovembernay unsay ithway
iffstay oicismstay. Ursulaay utpay emthay upay inay erhay ousehay. Eythay entspay ethay eatergray artpay ofay ethay ayday osetedclay inay ethay
edroombay inay ermetichay onferencescay anday atay uskday eythay askeday orfay anay escortay anday omesay accordionay ayersplay
anday ooktay overay Atarino’scay orestay. eave“Lay emthay alone,”ay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay ordereday. After“ay allay,
Iay owknay atwhay eythay ant.”way Atay ethay eginningbay ofay Ecemberday ethay ong-awaitedlay intervieway, ichwhay anymay adhay
oreseenfay asay anay interminableay argumentay, asway esolvedray inay esslay anthay anay ourhay.

Inay ethay othay arlorpay, esidebay ethay ecterspay ofay ethay ianolapay oudedshray inay aay itewhay eetshay, Olonelcay Aurelianoay
Uendiabay idday otnay itsay ownday atthay imetay insideay ethay alkchay irclecay atthay ishay aidesay adhay awndray. Ehay atsay inay aay airchay
etweenbay ishay oliticalpay advisersay anday, appedwray inay ishay oolenway anketblay, ehay istenedlay inay ilencesay otay ethay iefbray
oposalspray ofay ethay emissariesay. Eythay askeday irstfay atthay ehay enounceray ethay evisionray ofay opertypray itlestay inay orderay
otay etgay ackbay ethay upportsay ofay ethay Iberallay andownerslay. Eythay askeday, econdlysay, atthay ehay enounceray ethay ightfay
againstay ericalclay influenceay inay orderay otay obtainay ethay upportsay ofay ethay Atholiccay assesmay. Eythay askeday, inallyfay,
atthay ehay enounceray ethay aimay ofay equalay ightsray orfay aturalnay anday illegitimateay ildrenchay inay orderay otay eservepray ethay
integrityay ofay ethay omehay.

at“Thay eans,”may Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay aidsay, ilingsmay enwhay ethay eadingray asway overay, at“thay allay
e’reway ightingfay orfay isay ower.”pay

ey’re“Thay acticaltay anges,”chay oneay ofay ethay elegatesday epliedray. ight“Ray ownay ethay ainmay ingthay isay otay oadenbray
ethay opularpay asebay ofay ethay arway. Enthay e’llway avehay anotheray ook.”lay

Oneay ofay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendla’sbay oliticalpay advisersay astenedhay otay interveneay.

It’s“ay aay ontradiction”cay ehay aidsay. If“ay esethay angeschay areay oodgay, itay eansmay atthay ethay Onservativecay egimeray
isay oodgay. Ifay eway ucceedsay inay oadeningbray ethay opularpay asebay ofay ethay arway ithway emthay, asay youay eoplepay aysay, itay
eansmay atthay ethay egimeray ishay aay oadbray opularpay asebay. Itay eansmay, inay ortshay, atthay orfay almostay entytway yearsay
e’veway eenbay ightingfay againstay ethay entimentssay ofay ethay ation.”nay

Ehay asway oinggay otay ogay onay, utbay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay oppedstay imhay ithway aay ignalsay. on’t“Day asteway
youray imetay, octor.”day ehay aidsay. e“Thay importantay ingthay isay atthay omfray ownay onay e’llway ebay ightingfay onlyay orfay
ower.”pay Illstay ilingsmay, ehay ooktay ethay ocumentsday ethay elegatesday avegay imhay anday ademay eadyray otay ignsay emthay.

ince“Say at’sthay ethay ayway itay is,”ay ehay oncludedcay, e“way avehay onay objectionay otay accepting.”ay

Ishay enmay ookedlay atay oneay anotheray inay onsternationcay. Excuse“ay emay, olonel,”cay Olonelcay Erineldogay
Arquezmay aidsay oftlysay, ut“bay isthay isay aay etrayal.”bay

Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay eldhay ethay inkeday enpay inay ethay airay anday ischargedday ethay olewhay eightway ofay ishay
authorityay onay imhay.

urrender“Say youray eapons,”way ehay ordereday.

Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay oodstay upay anday utpay ishay idearmssay onay ethay abletay.

eport“Ray otay ethay arracks,”bay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay ordereday imhay. ut“Pay yourselfay atay ethay
ispositionday ofay ethay evolutionaryray ourt.”cay

Enthay ehay ignedsay ethay eclarationday anday avegay ethay eetsshay ofay aperpay otay ethay emissariesay, ayingsay otay emthay:

ere“Hay anay youray aperspay, entlemengay. Iay opehay youay ancay etgay omesay advantageay outay ofay em.”thay

Otway aysday aterlay. Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay, accuseday ofay ighhay easontray, asway ondemnedcay otay eathday.
Yinglay inay ishay ammockhay, Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay asway insensibleay otay ethay easplay orfay emencyclay. Onay ethay
eveay ofay ethay executionay, isobeyingday ethay orderay otnay otay otherbay imhay, Ursulaay isitedvay imhay inay ishay edroombay.
Encaseday inay ackblay, investeday ithway aay areray olemnitysay, eshay oodstay uringday ethay eethray inutesmay ofay ethay
intervieway. I“ay owknay atthay you’reay oinggay otay ootshay Erineldo,”gay eshay aidsay almlycay, and“ay atthay Iay an’tcay oday
anythingay otay opstay itay. Utbay Iay ivegay youay oneay arningway: asay oonsay asay Iay eesay ishay odybay Iay earsway otay youay ybay ethay
onesbay ofay ymay atherfay anday othermay, ybay ethay emorymay ofay Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay, Iay earsway otay youay eforebay Odgay
atthay Iay illway agdray youay outay omfray ereverwhay you’reay idinghay anday illkay youay ithway ymay ownay otway ands.”hay Eforebay
eavinglay ethay oomray, ithoutway aitingway orfay anyay eplyray, eshay oncludedcay:

It’s“ay ethay amesay asay ifay you’day eenbay ornbay ithway ethay ailtay ofay aay ig.”pay

Uringday atthay interminableay ightnay ilewhay Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay oughtthay aboutay ishay eadday
afternoonsay inay Amaranta’say ewingsay oomray. Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay atchedscray orfay anymay ourshay yingtray
otay eakbray ethay ardhay ellshay ofay ishay olitudesay. Ishay onlyay appyhay omentsmay, incesay atthay emoteray afternoonay enwhay
ishay atherfay adhay akentay imhay otay eesay iceay, adhay akentay aceplay inay ishay ilversay orkshopway erewhay ehay assedpay ethay imetay
uttingpay ittlelay oldgay ishesfay ogethertay. Ehay adhay adhay otay artstay irty-twothay arsway anday adhay adhay otay iolatevay allay ofay
ishay actspay ithway eathday anday allowway ikelay aay oghay inay ethay ungheapday ofay oryglay inay orderay otay iscoverday ethay
ivilegespray ofay implicitysay almostay ortyfay yearsay atelay.

Atay awnday, ornway outay ybay ethay ormentedtay igilvay, ehay appeareday inay ethay ellcay anay ourhay eforebay ethay executionay.
e“Thay arcefay isay overay, olday iend,”fray ehay aidsay otay Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay. et’s“Lay etgay outay ofay erehay eforebay
ethay osquitoesmay inay erehay executeay you.”ay Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay ouldcay otnay epressray ethay isdainday atthay
asway inspireday inay imhay ybay atthay attitudeay.

o“Nay, Aureliano,”ay ehay epliedray. I’d“ay atherray ebay eadday anthay eesay youay angedchay intoay aay oodyblay yrant.”tay

You“ay on’tway eesay e,”may Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay aidsay. ut“Pay onay youray oesshay anday elphay emay etgay isthay
ittyshay arway overay ith.”way

Enwhay ehay aidsay itay ehay idday otnay owknay atthay itay asway easieray otay artstay aay arway anthay otay enday oneay. Itay ooktay imhay
almostay aay yearay ofay iercefay anday oodyblay effortay otay orcefay ethay overnmentgay otay oposepray onditionscay ofay eacepay
avorablefay otay ethay ebelsray anday anotheray yearay otay onvincecay ishay ownay artisanspay ofay ethay onveniencecay ofay
acceptingay emthay. Ehay entway otay inconceivableay extremesay ofay ueltycray otay utpay ownday ethay ebellionray ofay ishay ownay
officersay, owhay esistedray anday alledcay orfay ictoryvay, anday ehay inallyfay eliedray onay enemyay orcesfay otay akemay emthay
ubmitsay.

Ehay asway evernay aay eatergray oldiersay anthay atay atthay imetay. Ethay ertaintycay atthay ehay asway inallyfay ightingfay orfay ishay
ownay iberationlay anday otnay orfay abstractay idealsay, orfay ogansslay atthay oliticianspay ouldcay isttway eftlay anday ightray
accordingay otay ethay ircumstancescay, illedfay imhay ithway anay ardentay enthusiasmay. Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay,
owhay oughtfay orfay efeatday ithway asay uchmay onvictioncay anday oyaltylay asay ehay adhay eviouslypray oughtfay orfay ictoryvay,
eproachedray imhay orfay ishay uselessay emeritytay. on’t“Day orry,”way ehay ouldway aysay, ilingsmay. ying“Day isay uchmay oremay
ifficultday anthay oneay imagines.”ay Inay ishay asecay itay asway etmay. Ethay ertaintycay atthay ishay ayday asway assigneday avegay imhay
aay ysteriousmay immunityay, anay immortalityay oray aay ixedfay eriodpay atthay ademay imhay invulnerableay otay ethay isksray ofay
arway anday inay ethay enday ermittedpay imhay otay inway aay efeatday atthay asway uchmay oremay ifficultday, uchmay oremay oodyblay
anday ostlycay anthay ictoryvay.

Inay almostay entytway yearsay ofay arway. Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay adhay eenbay atay ishay ousehay anymay imestay, utbay
ethay atestay ofay urgencyay ithway ichwhay ehay alwaysay arriveday, ethay ilitarymay etinueray atthay accompanieday imhay
everywhereay, ethay auraay ofay egendlay atthay owedglay aboutay ishay esencepray anday ofay ichwhay evenay Ursulaay asway awareay,
angedchay imhay intoay aay angerstray inay ethay enday. Ethay astlay imetay atthay ehay asway inay Acondomay anday ooktay aay ousehay orfay
ishay eethray oncubinescay, ehay asway eensay inay ishay ownay ousehay onlyay onay otway oray eethray occasionsay enwhay ehay adhay ethay
imetay otay acceptay anay invitationay otay ineday. Emediosray ethay Eautybay anday ethay instway, ornbay uringday ethay iddlemay ofay
ethay arway, arcelyscay ewknay imhay. Amarantaay ouldcay otnay econcileray erhay imageay ofay ethay otherbray owhay adhay entspay
ishay adolescenceay akingmay ittlelay oldgay ishesfay ithway atthay ofay ethay ythicalmay arriorway owhay adhay acedplay aay istanceday
ofay entay eetfay etweenbay imselfhay anday ethay estray ofay umanityhay. Utbay enwhay ethay approachay ofay ethay armisticeay
ecamebay ownknay anday eythay oughtthay atthay ehay ouldway eturnray angedchay ackbay intoay aay umanhay eingbay, eliveredday
atay astlay orfay ethay eartshay ofay ishay ownay eoplepay, ethay amilyfay eelingsfay, ormantday orfay uchsay aay onglay imetay, ereway
ebornray ongerstray anthay everay.

e’ll“Way inallyfay avehay aay anmay inay ethay ousehay again,”ay Ursulaay aidsay.

Amarantaay asway ethay irstfay otay uspectsay atthay eythay adhay ostlay imhay oreverfay. Oneay eekway eforebay ethay armisticeay,
enwhay ehay entereday ethay ousehay ithoutway anay escortay, ecededpray ybay otway arefootbay orderliesay owhay epositedday onay
ethay orchpay ethay addlesay omfray ethay ulemay anday ethay tmnkay ofay oetrypay, allay atthay asway eftlay ofay ishay ormerfay imperialay
aggagebay, eshay awsay imhay asspay ybay ethay ewingsay oomray anday eshay alledcay otay imhay. Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay
adhay oubletray ecognizingray erhay.

It’s“ay Amaranta,”ay eshay aidsay ood-humoredlygay, appyhay atay ishay eturnray, anday eshay owedshay imhay ethay andhay
ithway ethay ackblay andagebay. ook.”“Lay

Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay iledsmay atay erhay ethay amesay ayway asay enwhay ehay adhay irstfay eensay erhay ithway ethay
andagebay onay atthay emoteray orningmay enwhay ehay adhay omecay ackbay otay Acondomay ondemnedcay otay eathday.

ow“Hay awful,”ay ehay aidsay, e“thay ayway imetay asses!”pay

Ethay egularray armyay adhay otay otectpray ethay ousehay. Ehay arriveday amiday insultsay, atspay uponay, accuseday ofay avinghay
accelerateday ethay arway inay orderay otay ellsay itay orfay aay etterbay icepray. Ehay asway emblingtray ithway everfay anday oldcay anday ishay
armpitsay ereway uddedstay ithway oressay againay. Ixsay onthsmay eforebay, enwhay eshay adhay eardhay alktay aboutay ethay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


armisticeay, Ursulaay adhay openeday upay anday eptsway outay ethay idalbray amberchay anday adhay urnedbay yrrhmay inay ethay
ornerscay, inkingthay atthay ehay ouldway omecay ackbay eadyray otay owgray olday owlyslay amongay Emedios’ray ustymay ollsday.
Utbay actuallyay, uringday ethay astlay otway yearsay ehay adhay aidpay ishay inalfay uesday otay ifelay, includingay owinggray olday. Enwhay
ehay assedpay ybay ethay ilversay opshay, ichwhay Ursulaay adhay eparedpray ithway ecialspay iligenceday, ehay idday otnay evenay
oticenay atthay ethay eyskay ereway inay ethay ocklay. Ehay idday otnay oticenay ethay inutemay, earingtay estructionday atthay imetay adhay
eakedwray onay ethay ousehay anday atthay, afteray uchsay aay olongedpray absenceay, ouldway avehay ookedlay ikelay aay isasterday otay
anyay anmay owhay adhay eptkay ishay emoriesmay aliveay. Ehay asway otnay ainedpay ybay ethay eelingpay ofay ethay itewashwhay onay
ethay allsway oray ethay irtyday, ottonycay obwebscay inay ethay ornerscay oray ethay ustday onay ethay egoniasbay oray ethay einsvay eftlay
onay ethay eamsbay ybay ethay ermitestay oray ethay ossmay onay ethay ingeshay oray anyay ofay ethay insidiousay apstray atthay ostalgianay
offereday imhay. Ehay atsay ownday onay ethay orchpay, appedwray inay ishay anketblay anday ithway ishay ootsbay illstay onay, asay ifay onlyay
aitingway orfay itay otay earclay, anday ehay entspay ethay olewhay afternoonay atchingway itay ainray onay ethay egoniasbay. Ursulaay
understooday enthay atthay eythay ouldway otnay avehay imhay omehay orfay onglay. If“ay it’say otnay ethay ar,”way eshay oughtthay, it“ay
ancay onlyay ebay eath.”day Itay asway aay uppositionsay atthay asway osay eatnay, osay onvincingcay atthay eshay identifieday itay asay aay
emonitionpray.

Atthay ightnay, atay innerday, ethay upposedsay Aurelianoay Egundosay okebray ishay eadbray ithway ishay ightray andhay anday
ankdray ishay oupsay ithway ishay eftlay. Ishay intway otherbray, ethay upposedsay Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay, okebray ishay eadbray
ithway ishay eftlay andhay anday ankdray ishay oupsay ithway ishay ightray. Osay ecisepray asway eirthay oordinationcay atthay eythay idday
otnay ooklay ikelay otway othersbray ittingsay oppositeay eachay otheray utbay ikelay aay icktray ithway irrorsmay. Ethay ectaclespay atthay
ethay instway adhay inventeday enwhay eythay ecamebay awareay atthay eythay ereway equalay asway epeatedray inay onorhay ofay ethay
ewnay arrivalay. Utbay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay idday otnay oticenay itay. Ehay eemedsay osay alienay otay everythingay atthay
ehay idday otnay evenay oticenay Emediosray ethay Eautybay asay eshay assedpay ybay akednay onay erhay ayway otay erhay edroombay.
Ursulaay asway ethay onlyay oneay owhay aredday isturbday Irisay, abstractionay.

If“ay youay avehay otay ogay awayay again,”ay eshay aidsay alfwayhay oughthray innerday, at“ay eastlay ytray otay ememberray owhay
eway ereway onight.”tay

Enthay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay ealizedray, ithoutway urprisesay, atthay Ursulaay asway ethay onlyay umanhay
eingbay owhay adhay ucceededsay inay enetratingpay ishay iserymay, anday orfay ethay irstfay imetay inay anymay yearsay ehay ookedlay
erhay inay ethay acefay. Erhay inskay asway eatherylay, erhay eethtay ecayedday, erhay airhay adedfay anday olorlesscay, anday erhay ooklay
ightenedfray. Ehay omparedcay erhay ithway ethay oldestay emorymay atthay ehay adhay ofay erhay, ethay afternoonay enwhay ehay adhay
ethay emonitionpray atthay aay otpay ofay oilingbay oupsay asway oinggay otay allfay offay ethay abletay, anday ehay oundfay erhay okenbray
otay iecespay. Inay anay instantay ehay iscoveredday ethay atchesscray, ethay eltsway, ethay oressay, ethay ulcersay, anday ethay anscay atthay
adhay eenbay eftlay onay erhay ybay oremay anthay alfhay aay enturycay ofay ailyday ifelay, anday ehay awsay atthay osethay amagesday idday otnay
evenay arouseay aay eelingfay ofay itypay inay imhay. Enthay ehay ademay oneay astlay effortay otay earchsay inay ishay earthay orfay ethay aceplay
erewhay ishay affectionay adhay ottedray awayay anday ehay ouldcay otnay indfay itay. Onay anotheray occasionay, ehay eltfay atay eastlay aay
onfusedcay ensesay ofay ameshay enwhay ehay oundfay ethay ellsmay ofay Ursulaay onay ishay ownay inskay, anday oremay anthay onceay
ehay eltfay erhay oughtsthay interferingay ithway ishay. Utbay allay ofay atthay adhay eenbay ipedway outay ybay ethay arway. Evenay
Emediosray, ishay ifeway, atay atthay omentmay asway aay azyhay imageay ofay omeonesay owhay ightmay avehay eenbay ishay augh¬day
ertay. Ethay ountlesscay omenway ehay adhay ownknay onay ethay esertday ofay ovelay anday owhay adhay eadspray ishay eedsay allay alongay
ethay oastcay adhay eftlay onay acetray inay ishay eelingsfay. Ostmay ofay emthay adhay omecay intoay ishay oomray inay ethay arkday anday adhay
eftlay eforebay awnday, anday onay ethay ollowingfay ayday eythay ereway othingnay utbay aay ouchtay ofay atiguefay inay ishay odilybay
emorymay. Ethay onlyay affectionay atthay evailedpray againstay imetay anday ethay arway asway atthay ichwhay ehay adhay eltfay orfay
ishay otherbray Osejay Arcadioay enwhay eythay othbay ereway ildrenchay, anday itay asway otnay asedbay onay ovelay utbay onay
omplicitycay.

I’m“ay orry,”say ehay excuseday imselfhay omfray Ursula’say equestray. It’s“ay ustjay atthay ethay arway ashay oneday awayay ithway
everything.”ay

Uringday ethay ollowingfay aysday ehay usiedbay imselfhay estroyingday allay acetray ofay ishay assagepay oughthray ethay orldway.
Ehay ippedstray ethay ilversay opshay untilay allay atthay ereway eftlay ereway impersonalay objectsay, ehay avegay ishay othesclay awayay
otay ethay orderliesay, anday ehay uriedbay ishay eaponsway inay ethay ourtyardcay ithway ethay amesay eelingfay ofay enancepay ithway
ichwhay ishay atherfay adhay uriedbay ethay earspay atthay adhay illedkay Udenciopray Aguilaray. Ehay eptkay onlyay oneay istolpay ithway
