oneay ulletbay inay itay. Ursulaay idday otnay interveneay. Ethay onlyay imetay eshay issuadedday imhay asway enwhay ehay asway aboutay
otay estroyday ethay aguerreotypeday ofay Emediosray atthay asway eptkay inay ethay arlorpay ightedlay ybay anay eternalay amplay.
at“Thay icturepay oppedstay elongingbay otay youay aay onglay imetay ago,”ay eshay oldtay imhay. It’s“ay aay amilyfay elic.”ray Onay ethay
eveay ofay ethay armisticeay, enwhay onay inglesay objectay atthay ouldway etlay imhay ebay ememberedray asway eftlay inay ethay ousehay,
ehay ooktay ethay unktray ofay oetrypay otay ethay akerybay enwhay Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay asway akingmay eadyray otay ightlay
ethay ovenay.

ight“Lay itay ithway is,”thay ehay oldtay erhay, andinghay erhay ethay irstfay ollray ofay yellowishay aperspay. It“ay illway, urnbay etterbay
ecausebay ey’rethay eryvay olday ings.”thay

Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay, ethay ilentsay oneay, ethay ondescendingcay oneay, ethay oneay owhay evernay ontradictedcay
anyoneay, otnay evenay erhay ownay ildrenchay, adhay ethay impressionay atthay itay asway aay orbiddenfay actay.

ey’re“Thay importantay apers,”pay eshay aidsay.

othing“Nay ofay ethay ort,”say ethay olonelcay aidsay. ey’re“Thay ingsthay atthay aay ersonpay iteswray otay imself.”hay

In“ay atthay ase,”cay eshay aidsay, you“ay urnbay emthay, olonel.”cay

Ehay otnay onlyay idday atthay, utbay ehay okebray upay ethay unktray ithway aay atchethay anday ewthray ethay iecespay intoay ethay irefay.
Ourshay eforebay, Ilarpay Erneratay adhay omecay otay isitvay imhay. Afteray osay anymay yearsay ofay otnay eeingsay erhay, Olonelcay
Aurelianoay Uendfabay asway artledstay atay owhay olday anday atfay eshay adhay ecomebay anday owhay uchmay eshay adhay ostlay ofay
ethay endorsplay ofay erhay aughlay, utbay ehay asway alsoay artledstay atay ethay epthsday eshay adhay eachedray inay erhay eadingray ofay
ethay ardscay. atch“Way outay orfay youray outh,”may eshay oldtay imhay, anday ehay onderedway etherwhay ethay otheray imetay eshay
adhay oldtay imhay atthay uringday ethay eighthay ofay ishay oryglay itay adhay otnay eenbay aay urprisinglysay anticipateday isionvay ofay
ishay atefay. Aay ortshay imetay aterlay, enwhay ishay ersonalpay ysicianphay inishedfay emovingray ishay oressay, ehay askeday imhay,
ithoutway owingshay anyay articularpay interestay, erewhay ethay exactay ocationlay ofay ishay earthay asway. Ethay octorday
istenedlay ithway ishay ethoscopestay anday enthay aintedpay aay irclecay onay ishay eatchay ithway aay iecepay ofay ottoncay ippedday inay
iodineay.

Ethay Uesdaytay ofay ethay armisticeay awnedday armway anday ainyray. Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay appeareday inay
ethay itchenkay eforebay ivefay o’clockay anday adhay ishay usualay ackblay offeecay ithoutway ugarsay. You“ay amecay intoay ethay
orldway onay aay ayday ikelay is,”thay Ursulaay oldtay imhay. Everybody“ay asway amazeday atay youray openay eyes.”ay Ehay idday otnay
aypay anyay attentionay ecausebay ehay asway isteninglay otay ethay ormingfay ofay ethay oopstray, ethay oundsay ofay ethay ometscay,
anday ethay oicesvay ofay ommandcay atthay ereway atteringshay ethay awnday. Evenay oughthay afteray osay anymay yearsay ofay arway
eythay ouldshay avehay oundedsay amiliarfay otay imhay isthay imetay ehay eltfay ethay amesay eaknessway inay ishay eesknay anday ethay
amesay inglingtay inay ishay inskay atthay ehay adhay eltfay inay ishay youthay inay ethay esencepray ofay aay akednay omanway. Ehay oughtthay
onfusedlycay, inallyfay aptivecay inay aay aptray ofay ostalgianay, atthay erhapspay ifay ehay adhay arriedmay erhay ehay ouldway avehay
eenbay aay anmay ithoutway arway anday ithoutway oryglay, aay amelessnay artisanay, aay appyhay animalay. Atthay ardytay uddershay
ichwhay adhay otnay iguredfay inay ishay orethoughtfay ademay ishay eakfastbray itterbay. Atay evensay inay ethay orningmay, enwhay
Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay amecay otay etchfay imhay, inay ethay ompanycay ofay aay oupgray ofay ebelray officersay, ehay
oundfay imhay oremay aciturntay anthay everay, oremay ensivepay anday olitarysay. Ursulaay iedtray otay owthray aay ewnay apwray
overay ishay ouldersshay. at“Whay illway ethay overnmentgay ink,”thay eshay oldtay imhay. ey’ll“Thay igurefay atthay you’veay
urrenderedsay ecausebay youay idn’tday avehay anythingay eftlay otay uybay aay oakclay ith.”way Utbay ehay ouldway otnay acceptay itay.
Enwhay ehay asway atay ethay oorday, ehay etlay erhay utpay anay olday eltfay athay ofay Osejay Arcadioay Uendia’sbay onay ishay eadhay.

Aureliano,”“ay Ursulaay aidsay otay imhay enthay, omise“Pray emay atthay ifay youay indfay atthay it’say aay adbay ourhay orfay youay
erethay atthay you’llay inkthay ofay youray other.”may

Ehay avegay erhay aay istantday ilesmay, aisingray ishay andhay ithway allay ishay ingersfay extendeday, anday ithoutway ayingsay aay
ordway ehay eftlay ethay ousehay anday acedfay ethay outsshay, insultsay, anday asphemiesblay atthay ouldway ollowfay imhay untilay ehay
eftlay ethay owntay. Ursulaay utpay ethay arbay onay ethay oorday, avinghay ecidedday otnay otay aketay itay ownday orfay ethay estray ofay erhay
ifelay. e’ll“Way otray inay ere,”hay eshay oughtthay. e’ll“Way urntay otay ashesay inay isthay ousehay ithoutway enmay, utbay eway on’tway
ivegay isthay iserablemay owntay ethay easureplay ofay eeingsay usay eep.”way Eshay entspay ethay olewhay orningmay ookinglay orfay aay
emorymay ofay erhay onsay inay ethay ostmay iddenhay ornerscay, utbay eshay ouldcay indfay onenay.

Ethay eremonycay ooktay aceplay ifteenfay ilesmay omfray Acondomay inay ethay adeshay ofay aay iganticgay eibacay eetray arounday
ichwhay ethay owntay ofay Eerlandianay ouldway ebay oundedfay aterlay. Ethay elegatesday omfray ethay overnmentgay anday ethay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


artypay anday ethay ommissioncay ofay ethay ebelsray owhay ereway ayinglay ownday eirthay armsay ereway ervedsay ybay aay oisynay
oupgray ofay ovicesnay inay itewhay abitshay owhay ookedlay ikelay aay ockflay ofay ovesday atthay adhay eenbay ightenedfray ybay ethay
ainray. Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay arriveday onay aay uddymay ulemay. Ehay adhay otnay avedshay, oremay ormentedtay ybay
ethay ainpay ofay ethay oressay anthay ybay ethay eatgray ailurefay ofay ishay eamsdray, orfay ehay adhay eachedray ethay enday ofay allay opehay,
eyondbay oryglay anday ethay ostalgianay ofay oryglay. Inay accordanceay ithway ishay arrangementsay erethay asway onay usicmay,
onay ireworksfay, onay ealingpay ellsbay, onay outsshay ofay ictoryvay, oray anyay otheray anifestationmay atthay ightmay alteray ethay
ournfulmay aracterchay ofay ethay armisticeay. Anay itinerantay otographerphay owhay ooktay ethay onlyay icturepay ofay imhay
atthay ouldcay avehay eenbay eservedpray asway orcedfay otay ashsmay ishay atesplay ithoutway evelopingday emthay.

Ethay eremonycay astedlay onlyay ethay imetay ecessarynay otay ignsay ethay ocumentsday. Arounday ethay usticray abletay
acedplay inay ethay entercay ofay aay atchedpay ircuscay enttay erewhay ethay elegatesday atsay ereway ethay astlay officersay owhay ereway
aithfulfay otay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay. Eforebay akingtay ethay ignaturessay, ethay ersonalpay elegateday ofay ethay
esidentpray ofay ethay epublicray iedtray otay eadray ethay actay ofay urrendersay alouday, utbay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay asway
againstay itay. et’s“Lay otnay asteway imetay onay ormalities,”fay ehay aidsay anday eparedpray otay ignsay ethay aperspay ithoutway
eadingray emthay. Oneay ofay ishay officersay enthay okebray ethay oporificsay ilencesay ofay ethay enttay.

olonel,”“Cay ehay aidsay, ease“play oday usay ethay avorfay ofay otnay eingbay ethay irstfay otay ign.”say

Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay accededay. Enwhay ethay ocumentsday entway allay arounday ethay abletay, inay ethay idstmay
ofay aay ilencesay atthay asway osay urepay atthay oneay ouldcay avehay ecipheredday ethay ignaturessay omfray ethay atchingscray ofay
ethay enpay onay ethay aperpay, ethay irstfay inelay asway illstay ankblay. Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay eparedpray otay illfay itay.

olonel,”“Cay anotheray ofay ishay officersay aidsay, ere’s“thay illstay imetay orfay everythingay otay omecay outay ight.”ray

Ithoutway angingchay ishay expressionay, Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay ignedsay ethay irstfay opycay. Ehay adhay otnay
inishedfay igningsay ethay astlay oneay enwhay aay ebelray olonelcay appeareday inay ethay oorwayday eadinglay aay ulemay arryingcay
otway estschay. Inay itespay ofay ishay entireay youthay ehay adhay aay ydray ooklay anday aay atientpay expressionay. Ehay asway ethay
easurertray ofay ethay evolutionray inay ethay Acondomay egionray. Ehay adhay ademay aay ifficultday ourneyjay ofay ixsay aysday,
ullingpay alongay ethay ulemay, owhay asway yingday ofay ungerhay, inay orderay otay arriveay atay ethay armisticeay onay imetay. Ithway anay
exasperatingay arsimonypay ehay ooktay ownday ethay estschay, openeday emthay, anday acedplay onay ethay abletay, oneay ybay oneay,
eventy-twosay oldgay icksbray, Everyoneay adhay orgottenfay aboutay ethay existenceay ofay atthay ortunefay. Inay ethay isorderday
ofay ethay astpay yearay, enwhay ethay entralcay ommandcay ellfay apartay anday ethay evolutionray egeneratedday intoay aay oodyblay
ivalryray ofay eaderslay, itay asway impossibleay otay etermineday anyay esponsibilityray. Ethay oldgay ofay ethay evolutionray,
eltedmay intoay ocksblay atthay ereway enthay overedcay ithway akedbay ayclay, asway eyondbay allay ontrolcay. Olonelcay
Aurelianoay Uendiabay adhay ethay eventy-twosay oldgay icksbray includeday inay ethay inventoryay ofay urrendersay anday
osedclay ethay eremonycay ithoutway allowingay anyay eechesspay. Ethay ilthyfay adolescentay oodstay oppositeay imhay,
ookinglay intoay ishay eyesay ithway ishay ownay almcay, yrup-coloredsay eyesay.

omething“Say else?”ay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay askeday imhay.

Ethay youngay olonelcay ightenedtay ishay outhmay.

e“Thay eceipt,”ray ehay aidsay.

Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay otewray itay outay inay ishay ownay andhay. Enthay ehay adhay aay assglay ofay emonadelay anday aay
iecepay ofay iscuitbay atthay ethay ovicesnay ereway assingpay arounday anday etiredray otay aay ieldfay enttay ichwhay adhay eenbay
eparedpray orfay imhay inay asecay ehay ishedway otay estray. Erethay ehay ooktay offay ishay irtshay, atsay onay ethay edgeay ofay ethay otcay,
anday atay ee-fifteenthray inay ethay afternoonay ooktay ishay istolpay anday otshay imselfhay inay ethay iodineay irclecay atthay ishay
ersonalpay ysicianphay adhay aintedpay onay ishay estchay. Atay atthay omentmay inay Acondomay Ursulaay ooktay ethay overcay offay
ethay otpay ofay ilkmay onay ethay ovestay, onderingway ywhay itay asway akingtay osay onglay otay oilbay, anday oundfay itay ullfay ofay
ormsway.

ey’ve“Thay illedkay Aureliano,”ay eshay exclaimeday.

Eshay ookedlay owardtay ethay ourtyardcay, obeyingay aay abithay ofay erhay olitudesay, anday enthay eshay awsay Osejay Arcadioay
Uendiabay, oakingsay etway anday adsay inay ethay ainray anday uchmay olderay anthay enwhay ehay adhay iedday. ey“Thay otshay imhay inay
ethay ack,”bay Ursulaay aidsay oremay eciselypray, and“ay onay oneay asway aritablechay enoughay otay oseclay ishay eyes.”ay Atay uskday
oughthray erhay earstay eshay awsay ethay iftsway anday uminouslay isksday atthay ossedcray ethay yskay ikelay anay exhalationay anday
eshay oughtthay atthay itay asway aay ignalsay ofay eathday. Eshay asway illstay underay ethay estnutchay eetray, obbingsay atay erhay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


usband’shay eesknay, enwhay eythay oughtbray inay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendlabay, appedwray inay aay anketblay atthay asway
iffstay ithway ydray oodblay anday ithway ishay eyesay openay inay ageray.

Ehay asway outay ofay angerday. Ethay ulletbay adhay ollowedfay uchsay aay eatnay athpay atthay ethay octorday asway ableay otay utpay aay
ordcay oakedsay inay iodineay inay oughthray ethay estchay anday ithdrawway itay omfray ethay ackbay. at“Thay asway ymay
asterpiece,”may ehay aidsay ithway atisfactionsay. It“ay asway ethay onlyay ointpay erewhay aay ulletbay ouldcay asspay oughthray
ithoutway arminghay anyay italvay organ.”ay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendlabay awsay imselfhay urroundedsay ybay aritablechay
ovicesnay owhay intoneday esperateday almspsay orfay ethay eposeray ofay ishay oulsay anday enthay ehay asway orrysay atthay ehay adhay
otnay otshay imselfhay inay ethay oofray ofay ethay outhmay asay ehay adhay onsideredcay oingday ifay onlyay otay ockmay ethay edictionpray
ofay Ilarpay Erneratay.

If“ay Iay illstay adhay ethay authority,”ay ehay oldtay ethay octorday, I’d“ay avehay youay otshay outay ofay andhay. Otnay orfay avinghay
avedsay ymay ifelay utbay orfay avinghay ademay aay oolfay ofay e.”may

Ethay ailurefay ofay ishay eathday oughtbray ackbay ishay ostlay estigepray inay aay ewfay ourshay. Ethay amesay eoplepay owhay
inventeday ethay orystay atthay ehay adhay oldsay ethay arway orfay aay oomray ithway allsway ademay ofay oldgay icksbray efinedday ethay
attemptay atay uicidesay asay anay actay ofay onorhay anday oclaimedpray imhay aay artyrmay. Enthay, enwhay ehay ejectedray ethay
Orderay ofay Eritmay awardeday imhay ybay ethay esidentpray ofay ethay epublicray, evenay ishay ostmay itterbay enemiesay iledfay
oughthray ethay oomray askingay imhay otay ithdrawway ecognitionray ofay ethay armisticeay anday otay artstay aay ewnay arway. Ethay
ousehay asway illedfay ithway iftsgay eantmay asay amendsay. Impresseday inallyfay ybay ethay assivemay upportsay ofay ishay ormerfay
omradescay inay armsay. Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendlabay idday otnay utpay asideay ethay ossibilitypay ofay easingplay emthay. Onay
ethay ontrarycay, atay aay ertaincay omentmay ehay eemedsay osay enthusiasticay ithway ethay ideaay ofay aay ewnay arway atthay Olonelcay
Erineldogay Arquezmay oughtthay atthay ehay asway onlyay aitingway orfay aay etextpray otay oclaimpray itay. Ethay etextpray asway
offereday, inay actfay, enwhay ethay esidentpray ofay ethay epublicray efusedray otay awarday anyay ilitarymay ensionspay otay ormerfay
ombatantscay, Iberallay oray Onservativecay, untilay eachay asecay asway examineday ybay aay ecialspay ommissioncay anday ethay
awarday approveday ybay ethay ongresscay. at’s“Thay anay outrage,”ay underedthay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendlabay.
ey’ll“Thay ieday ofay olday ageay aitingway orfay ethay ailmay otay ome.”cay Orfay ethay irstfay imetay ehay eftlay ethay ockerray atthay Ursulaay
adhay oughtbay orfay ishay onvalescencecay, anday, alkingway aboutay ethay edroombay, ehay ictatedday aay ongstray essagemay otay
ethay esidentpray ofay ethay epublicray. Inay atthay elegramtay ichwhay asway evernay ademay ublicpay, ehay enouncedday ethay irstfay
iolationvay ofay ethay Eatytray ofay Eerlandianay anday eatenedthray otay oclaimpray arway otay ethay eathday ifay ethay assignmentay
ofay ensionspay asway otnay esolvedray ithinway otway eeksway. Ishay attitudeay asway osay ustjay atthay itay alloweday imhay otay opehay
evenay orfay ethay upportsay ofay ormerfay Onservativecay ombatantscay. Utbay ethay onlyay eplyray omfray ethay overnmentgay
asway ethay einforcementray ofay ethay ilitarymay uardgay atthay adhay eenbay acedplay atay ethay oorday ofay ishay ousehay ithway ethay
etextpray ofay otectingpray imhay, anday ethay ohibitionpray ofay allay ypestay ofay isitsvay. Imilarsay ethodsmay ereway adopteday allay
oughthray ethay ountrycay ithway otheray eaderslay owhay orebay atchingway. Itay asway anay operationay atthay asway osay imelytay,
asticdray, anday effectiveay atthay otway onthsmay afteray ethay armisticeay, enwhay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendlabay adhay
ecoveredray, ishay ostmay edicatedday onspiratorscay ereway eadday oray exileday oray adhay eenbay assimilateday oreverfay intoay
ublicpay administrationay.

Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendlabay eftlay ishay oomray inay Ecemberday anday itay asway ufficientsay orfay imhay otay ooklay atay ethay
orchpay inay orderay otnay otay inkthay aboutay arway againay. Ithway aay italityvay atthay eemedsay impossibleay atay erhay ageay, Ursulaay
adhay ejuvenatedray ethay ousehay againay. ow“Nay ey’rethay oinggay otay eesay owhay Iay am,”ay eshay aidsay enwhay eshay awsay atthay
erhay onsay asway oinggay otay ivelay. ere“Thay on’tway ebay aay etterbay, oremay openay ousehay inay allay ethay orldway anthay isthay
adhouse.”may Eshay adhay itay ashedway anday aintedpay, angedchay ethay urniturefay, estoredray ethay ardengay anday antedplay
ewnay owersflay, anday openeday oorsday anday indowsway osay atthay ethay azzlingday ightlay ofay ummersay ouldway enetratepay
evenay intoay ethay edroomsbay. Eshay ecreedday anay enday otay ethay umerousnay uperimposedsay eriodspay ofay ourningmay
anday eshay erselfhay exchangeday erhay igorousray olday ownsgay orfay youthfulay othingclay. Ethay usicmay ofay ethay ianolapay
againay ademay ethay ousehay errymay. Enwhay eshay eardhay itay, Amarantaay oughtthay ofay Ietropay Espicray, ishay eveningay
ardeniagay, anday ishay ellsmay ofay avenderlay, anday inay ethay epthsday ofay erhay itheredway earthay aay eanclay ancorray ourishedflay,
urifiedpay ybay imetay. Oneay afternoonay enwhay eshay asway yingtray otay utpay ethay arlorpay inay orderay, Ursulaay askeday orfay ethay
elphay ofay ethay oldierssay owhay ereway uardinggay ethay ousehay. Ethay youngay ommandercay ofay ethay uardgay avegay emthay
ermissionpay. Ittlelay ybay ittlelay, Ursulaay eganbay assigningay emthay ewnay oreschay. Eshay inviteday emthay otay eatay, avegay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


emthay othingclay anday oesshay, anday aughttay emthay owhay otay eadray anday itewray. Enwhay ethay overnmentgay ithdrewway
ethay uardgay, oneay ofay emthay ontinuedcay ivinglay inay ethay ousehay anday asway inay erhay ervicesay orfay anymay yearsay. Onay Ewnay
Year’say Ayday, ivendray admay ybay ebuffsray omfray Emediosray ethay Eautybay, ethay youngay ommandercay ofay ethay uardgay
asway oundfay eadday underay erhay indowway.






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Apterchay 


YEARSay ATERlay onay ishay eathbedday Aurelianoay Egundosay ouldway ememberray ethay ainyray afternoonay inay Unejay
enwhay ehay entway intoay ethay edroombay otay eetmay ishay irstfay onsay. Evenay oughthay ethay ildchay asway anguidlay anday eepyway,
ithway onay arkmay ofay aay Uendiabay, ehay idday otnay avehay otay inkthay icetway aboutay amingnay imhay.

e’ll“Way allcay imhay Osejay Arcadio,”ay ehay aidsay.

Ernandafay elday Arpiocay, ethay eautifulbay omanway ehay adhay arriedmay ethay yearay eforebay, agreeday. Ursulaay, onay ethay
otheray andhay, ouldcay otnay oncealcay aay aguevay eelingfay ofay oubtday. Oughoutthray ethay onglay istoryhay ofay ethay amilyfay
ethay insistentay epetitionray ofay amesnay adhay ademay erhay awdray omesay onclusionscay atthay eemedsay otay ebay ertaincay.
Ilewhay ethay Aurelianosay ereway ithdrawnway, utbay ithway ucidlay indsmay, ethay Osejay Arcadiosay ereway impulsiveay anday
enterprisingay, utbay eythay ereway arkedmay ithway aay agictray ignsay. Ethay onlyay asescay atthay ereway impossibleay otay assifyclay
ereway osethay ofay Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay anday Aurelianoay Egundosay. Eythay ereway osay uchmay alikeay anday osay
ischievousmay uringday ildhoodchay atthay otnay evenay Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay ouldcay elltay emthay apartay. Onay ethay
ayday ofay eirthay isteningchray Amarantaay utpay aceletsbray onay emthay ithway eirthay espectiveray amesnay anday esseddray
emthay inay ifferentday oloredcay othingclay arkedmay ithway eachay one’say initialsay, utbay enwhay eythay eganbay otay ogay otay
oolschay eythay ecidedday otay exchangeay othingclay anday aceletsbray anday allcay eachay otheray ybay oppositeay amesnay. Ethay
eachertay, Elchormay Escalonaay, useday otay owingknay Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay ybay ishay eengray irtshay, entway outay ofay
ishay indmay enwhay ehay iscoveredday atthay ethay atterlay asway earingway Aurelianoay Egundo’ssay aceletbray anday atthay ethay
otheray oneay aidsay, everthelessnay, atthay ishay amenay asway Aurelianoay Egundosay inay itespay ofay ethay actfay atthay ehay asway
earingway ethay itewhay irtshay anday ethay aceletbray ithway Osejay Arcadioay Egundo’ssay amenay. Omfray enthay onay ehay asway
evernay uresay owhay asway owhay. Evenay enwhay eythay ewgray upay anday ifelay ademay emthay ifferentday. Ursulaay illstay
onderedway ifay eythay emselvesthay ightmay otnay avehay ademay aay istakemay inay omesay omentmay ofay eirthay intricateay amegay
ofay onfusioncay anday adhay ecomebay angedchay oreverfay. Untilay ethay eginningbay ofay adolescenceay eythay ereway otway
ynchronizedsay achinesmay. Eythay ouldway akeway upay atay ethay amesay imetay, avehay ethay urgeay otay ogay otay ethay athroombay
atay ethay amesay imetay, uffersay ethay amesay upsetsay inay ealthhay, anday eythay evenay eameddray aboutay ethay amesay ingsthay. Inay
ethay ousehay, erewhay itay asway oughtthay atthay eythay oordinatedcay eirthay actionsay ithway aay implesay esireday otay onfusecay,
onay oneay ealizedray atwhay eallyray asway appeninghay untilay oneay ayday enwhay Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay avegay oneay ofay
emthay aay assglay ofay emonadelay anday asay oonsay asay ehay astedtay itay ethay otheray oneay aidsay atthay itay eedednay ugarsay. Antasay
Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay, owhay adhay indeeday orgottenfay otay utpay ugarsay inay ethay emonadelay, oldtay Ursulaay aboutay itay.
at’s“Thay atwhay ey’rethay allay ike,”lay eshay aidsay ithoutway urprisesay, azy“cray omfray irth.”bay Inay imetay ingsthay ecamebay
esslay isorderedday. Ethay oneay owhay amecay outay ofay ethay amegay ofay onfusioncay ithway ethay amenay ofay Aurelianoay
Egundosay ewgray otay onumentalmay izesay ikelay ishay andfathersgray, anday ethay oneay owhay eptkay ethay amenay ofay Osejay
Arcadioay Egundosay ewgray otay ebay onybay ikelay ethay olonelcay, anday ethay onlyay ingthay eythay adhay inay ommoncay asway ethay
amily’sfay olitarysay airay. Erhapspay itay asway atthay ossingcray ofay aturestay, amesnay, anday aracterchay atthay ademay Ursulaay
uspectsay atthay eythay adhay eenbay uffledshay ikelay aay eckday ofay ardscay incesay ildhoodchay.

Ethay ecisiveday ifferenceday asway evealedray inay ethay idstmay ofay ethay arway, enwhay Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay askeday
Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay otay etlay imhay eesay anay executionay. Againstay Ursula’say etterbay udgmentjay ishay ishesway
ereway atisfiedsay. Aurelianoay Egundosay, onay ethay otheray andhay, udderedshay atay ethay eremay ideaay ofay itnessingway anay
executionay. Ehay eferredpray otay aystay omehay. Atay ethay ageay ofay elvetway ehay askeday Ursulaay atwhay asway inay ethay ockedlay
oomray. apers,”“Pay eshay answereday. elquiades’“May ooksbay anday ethay angestray ilingstay atthay ehay otewray inay ishay astlay
years.”ay Insteaday ofay almingcay imhay, ethay answeray increaseday ishay uriositycay. Ehay emandedday osay uchmay, omisedpray
ithway uchsay insistenceay atthay ehay ouldway otnay istreatmay ethay ingsthay, atthay Ursulaay, avegay imhay ethay eyskay. Onay oneay
adhay onegay intoay ethay oomray againay incesay eythay adhay akentay Elquiades’may odybay outay anday adhay utpay onay ethay oorday aay
adlockpay osewhay artspay adhay ecomebay usedfay ogethertay ithway ustray. Utbay enwhay Aurelianoay Egundosay openeday ethay
indowsway aay amiliarfay ightlay entereday atthay eemedsay accustomeday otay ightinglay ethay oomray everyay ayday anday erethay
asway otnay ethay ightestslay acetray ofay ustday oray obwebscay, ithway everythingay eptsway anday eanclay, etterbay eptsway anday






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


eanerclay anthay onay ethay ayday ofay ethay urialbay, anday ethay inkay adhay otnay ieddray upay inay ethay inkwellay ornay adhay oxidationay
iminishedday ethay ineshay ofay ethay etalsmay ornay adhay ethay embersay onegay outay underay ethay aterway ipepay erewhay Osejay
Arcadioay Uendiabay adhay aporizedvay ercurymay. Onay ethay elvesshay ereway ethay ooksbay oundbay inay aay ardboard-likecay
aterialmay, alepay, ikelay annedtay umanhay inskay, anday ethay anuscriptsmay ereway intactay. Inay itespay ofay ethay oom’sray
avinghay eenbay utshay upay orfay anymay yearsay, ethay airay eemedsay esherfray anthay inay ethay estray ofay ethay ousehay. Everythingay
asway osay ecentray atthay everalsay eeksway aterlay, enwhay Ursulaay entway intoay ethay oomray ithway aay ailpay ofay aterway anday aay
ushbray otay ashway ethay oorflay, erethay asway othingnay orfay erhay otay oday. Aurelianoay Egundosay asway eepday inay ethay eadingray
ofay aay ookbay. Althoughay itay adhay onay overcay anday ethay itletay idday otnay appearay anywhereay, ethay oybay enjoyeday ethay orystay
ofay aay omanway owhay atsay atay aay abletay anday ateay othingnay utbay ernelskay ofay iceray, ichwhay eshay ickedpay upay ithway aay inpay,
anday ethay orystay ofay ethay ishermanfay owhay orrowedbay aay eightway orfay ishay etnay omfray aay eighbornay anday enwhay ehay
avegay imhay aay ishfay inay aymentpay aterlay itay adhay aay iamondday inay itsay omachstay, anday ethay oneay aboutay ethay amplay atthay
ulfilledfay ishesway anday aboutay yingflay arpetscay. Urprisedsay, ehay askeday Ursulaay ifay allay atthay asway uetray anday eshay
answereday imhay atthay itay asway, atthay anymay yearsay agoay ethay ypsiesgay adhay oughtbray agicmay ampslay anday yingflay atsmay
otay Acondomay.

at’s“Whay appening,”hay eshay ighedsay, is“ay atthay ethay orldway isay owlyslay omingcay otay anay enday anday osethay ingsthay
on’tday omecay erehay anyay ore.”may

Enwhay ehay inishedfay ethay ookbay, inay ichwhay anymay ofay ethay oriesstay adhay onay endingsay ecausebay erethay ereway
agespay issingmay, Aurelianoay Egundosay etsay aboutay ecipheringday ethay anuscriptsmay. Itay asway impossibleay. Ethay
etterslay ookedlay ikelay othesclay unghay outay otay ydray onay aay inelay anday eythay ookedlay oremay ikelay usicalmay otationnay anthay
itingwray. Oneay othay oontimenay, ilewhay ehay asway oringpay overay ethay, anuscriptsmay, ehay ensedsay atthay ehay asway otnay
aloneay inay ethay oomray. Againstay ethay ightlay omfray ethay indowway, ittingsay ithway ishay andshay onay Inisay eesknay, asway
Elquiadesmay. Ehay asway underay ortyfay yearsay ofay ageay. Ehay asway earingway ethay amesay old-fashioneday estvay anday ethay
athay atthay ookedlay ikelay aay aven’sray ingsway, anday acrossay Inisay alepay emplestay erethay owedflay ethay easegray omfray ishay airhay
atthay adhay eenbay eltedmay ybay ethay eathay, ustjay asay Aurelianoay anday Osejay Arcadioay adhay eensay imhay enwhay eythay ereway
ildrenchay. Aurelianoay Egundosay ecognizedray imhay atay onceay, ecausebay atthay ereditaryhay emorymay adhay eenbay
ansmittedtray omfray enerationgay otay enerationgay anday adhay omecay otay imhay oughthray ethay emorymay ofay ishay
andfathergray.

ello,”“Hay Aurelianoay Egundosay aidsay.

ello“Hay, youngay an,”may aidsay Elquiadesmay.

Omfray enthay onay, orfay everalsay yearsay, eythay awsay eachay otheray almostay everyay afternoonay. Elquiadesmay alkedtay
otay imhay aboutay ethay orldway, iedtray otay infuseay imhay ithway ishay olday isdomway, utbay ehay efusedray otay anslatetray ethay
anuscriptsmay. o“Nay oneay ustmay owknay eirthay eaningmay untilay ehay ashay eachedray oneay undredhay yearsay ofay age,”ay ehay
explaineday. Aurelianoay eptkay osethay eetingsmay ecretsay oreverfay. Onay oneay occasionay ehay eltfay atthay ishay ivatepray
orldway adhay allenfay apartay ecausebay Ursulaay amecay inay enwhay Elquiadesmay asway inay ethay oomray. Utbay eshay idday otnay
eesay imhay.

o“Whay ereway youay alkingtay o?”tay eshay askeday imhay.

obody,”“Nay Aurelianoay Egundosay aidsay.

at’s“Thay atwhay youray eat-grandfathergray id,”day Ursulaay, aidsay. e“Hay useday otay alktay otay imselfhay oo.”tay

Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay, inay ethay eantimemay, adhay atisfiedsay ishay ishway otay eesay aay ootingshay. Orfay ethay estray ofay
ishay ifelay ehay ouldway ememberray ethay ividlay ashflay ofay ethay ixsay imultaneoussay ots-andshay ethay echoay ofay ethay
ischargeday asay itay okebray againstay ethay illshay anday ethay adsay ilesmay anday erplexedpay eyesay ofay ethay anmay eingbay otshay,
owhay oodstay erectay ilewhay ishay irtshay ecamebay oakedsay ithway oodblay, anday owhay asway illstay ilingsmay evenay enwhay eythay
untieday imhay omfray ethay ostpay anday utpay imhay inay aay oxbay illedfay ithway uicklimeqay. e’s“Hay alive,”ay ehay oughtthay.
ey’re“Thay oinggay otay urybay imhay alive.”ay Itay ademay uchsay anay impressionay onay imhay atthay omfray enthay onay ehay
etestedday ilitarymay acticespray anday arway, otnay ecausebay ofay ethay executionsay utbay ecausebay ofay ethay orrifyinghay
ustomcay ofay uryingbay ethay ictimsvay aliveay. Onay oneay ewknay enthay exactlyay enwhay ehay eganbay otay ingray ethay ellsbay inay
ethay urchchay owertay anday assistay Atherfay Antonioay Isabelay, ethay uccessorsay otay e“Thay Up,”pay atay assmay, anday aketay
ancay ofay ethay ightingfay ockscay inay ethay ourtyardcay ofay ethay arishpay ousehay. Enwhay Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


oundfay outay ehay oldedscay imhay onglystray orfay earninglay occupationsay epudiatedray ybay ethay Iberalslay. e“Thay actfay is,”ay
ehay answereday, I“ay inkthay I’veay urnedtay outay otay ebay aay Onservative.”cay Ehay elievedbay itay asay ifay itay adhay eenbay
eterminedday ybay atefay. Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay, andalizedscay, oldtay Ursulaay aboutay itay.

It’s“ay etterbay atthay ay,”way eshay approveday. et’s“Lay opehay atthay ehay ecomesbay aay iestpray osay atthay Odgay illway inallyfay
omecay intoay isthay ouse.”hay

Itay asway oonsay iscoveredday atthay Atherfay Antonioay Isabelay asway eparingpray imhay orfay ishay irstfay ommunioncay.
Ehay asway eachingtay imhay ethay atechismcay asay ehay avedshay ethay ecksnay ofay ishay oostersray. Ehay explaineday otay imhay ithway
implesay examplesay, asay ehay utpay ethay oodingbray enshay intoay eirthay estsnay, owhay itay adhay occurreday otay Odgay onay ethay
econdsay ayday ofay eationcray atthay ickenschay ouldway ebay ormedfay insideay ofay anay eggay. Omfray atthay imetay onay ethay
arishpay iestpray eganbay otay owshay ethay ignssay ofay enilitysay atthay ouldway eadlay imhay otay aysay yearsay aterlay atthay ethay evilday
adhay obablypray onway ishay ebellionray againstay Odgay, anday atthay ehay asway ethay oneay owhay atsay onay ethay eavenlyhay
onethray, ithoutway evealingray ishay uetray identityay inay orderay otay aptray ethay unwaryay. Armedway upay ybay ethay ersistencepay
ofay ishay entormay, inay aay ewfay onthsmay Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay amecay otay ebay asay adeptay inay eologicalthay ickstray useday
otay onfusecay ethay evilday asay ehay asway illedskay inay ethay ickstray ofay ethay ockpitcay. Amarantaay ademay imhay aay inenlay uitsay
ithway aay ollarcay anday ietay, oughtbay imhay aay airpay ofay itewhay oesshay, anday engraveday ishay amenay inay iltgay etterslay onay ethay
ibbonray ofay ethay andlecay. Otway ightsnay eforebay ethay irstfay ommunioncay, Atherfay Antonioay Isabelay osetedclay
imselfhay ithway imhay inay ethay acristysay otay earhay ishay onfessioncay ithway ethay elphay ofay aay ictionaryday ofay inssay. Itay asway
uchsay aay onglay istlay atthay ethay ageday iestpray, useday otay oinggay otay edbay atay ixsay o’clockay, ellfay asleepay inay ishay airchay eforebay
itay asway overay. Ethay interrogationay asway aay evelationray orfay Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay. Itay idday otnay urprisesay imhay
atthay ethay iestpray askeday imhay ifay ehay adhay oneday adbay ingsthay ithway omenway, anday ehay onestlyhay answereday onay, utbay
ehay asway upsetay ithway ethay uestionqay asay otay etherwhay ehay adhay oneday emthay ithway animalsay. Ethay irstfay Idayfray inay
Aymay ehay eceivedray ommunioncay, orturedtay ybay uriositycay. Aterlay onay ehay askeday Etroniopay, ethay icklysay extonsay
owhay ivedlay inay ethay elfrybay anday owhay, accordingay otay atwhay eythay aidsay, edfay imselfhay onay atsbay, aboutay itay, anday
Etroniopay, answereday imhay: ere“Thay areay omesay orruptcay Istianschray owhay oday eirthay usinessbay ithway emalefay
onkeys.”day Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay illstay owedshay osay uchmay uriositycay anday askeday osay anymay uestionsqay atthay
Etroniopay ostlay ishay atiencepay.

I“ay ogay Uesdaytay ights,”nay ehay onfessedcay, if“ay youay omisepray otnay otay elltay anyoneay I’llay aketay youay extnay
Uesday.”tay

Indeeday, onay ethay ollowingfay Uesdaytay Etroniopay amecay ownday outay ofay ethay owertay ithway aay oodenway oolstay
ichwhay untilay enthay onay oneay adhay ownknay ethay useay ofay, anday ehay ooktay Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay otay aay earbynay
asturepay. Ethay oybay ecamebay osay akentay ithway osethay octurnalnay aidsray atthay itay asway aay onglay imetay eforebay ehay asway
eensay atay Atarino’scay. Ehay ecamebay aay ockfightcay anmay. ake“Tay osethay eaturescray omewheresay else,”ay Ursulaay
ordereday imhay ethay irstfay imetay eshay awsay imhay omecay inay ithway ishay inefay ightingfay irdsbay. oosters“Ray avehay alreadyay
oughtbray ootay uchmay itternessbay otay isthay ousehay orfay youay otay ingbray usay anyay ore.”may Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay
ooktay emthay awayay ithoutway anyay argumentay, utbay ehay ontinuedcay eedingbray emthay atay ethay ousehay ofay Ilarpay
Erneratay, ishay andmothergray, owhay avegay imhay everythingay ehay eedednay inay exchangeay orfay avinghay imhay inay erhay
ousehay. Ehay oonsay isplayedday inay ethay ockpitcay ethay isdomway atthay Atherfay Antonioay Isabelay adhay ivengay imhay, anday
ehay ademay enoughay oneymay otnay onlyay otay enrichay Inisay oodbray utbay alsoay otay ooklay orfay aay an’smay atisfactionssay.
Ursulaay omparedcay imhay ithway ishay otherbray atay atthay imetay anday ouldcay otnay understanday owhay ethay instway, owhay
ookedlay ikelay ethay amesay ersonpay inay ildhoodchay, adhay endeday upay osay ifferentlyday. Erhay erplexitypay idday otnay astlay
eryvay onglay, orfay uiteqay oonsay Aurelianoay Egundosay eganbay otay owshay ignssay ofay azinesslay anday issipationday. Ilewhay
ehay asway utshay upay inay Elquiades’may oomray ehay asway awndray intoay imselfhay ethay ayway Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay
adhay eenbay inay ishay youthay. Utbay aay ortshay imetay afteray ethay Eatytray ofay Eerlandianay, aay iecepay ofay ancechay ooktay imhay
outay ofay ishay ithdrawnway elfsay anday ademay imhay acefay ethay ealityray ofay ethay orldway. Aay youngay omanway owhay asway
ellingsay umbersnay orfay ethay affleray ofay anay accordionay eetedgray imhay ithway aay eatgray ealday ofay amiliarityfay. Aurelianoay
Egundosay asway otnay urprisedsay, orfay ehay asway equentlyfray onfusedcay ithway ishay otherbray. Utbay ehay idday otnay earclay upay
ethay istakemay, otnay evenay enwhay ethay irlgay iedtray otay oftensay ishay earthay ithway obssay, anday eshay endeday akingtay imhay otay
erhay oomray. Eshay ikedlay imhay osay uchmay omfray atthay irstfay eetingmay atthay eshay ixedfay ingsthay osay atthay ehay ouldway inway






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


ethay accordionay inay ethay affleray. Atay ethay enday ofay otway eeksway Aurelianoay Egundosay ealizedray atthay ethay omanway adhay
eenbay oinggay otay edbay alternatelyay ithway imhay anday ishay otherbray, inkingthay atthay eythay ereway ethay amesay anmay, anday
insteaday ofay akingmay ilingstay earclay, ehay arrangeday otay olongpray ethay ituationsay. Ehay idday otnay eturnray otay
Elquiades’may oomray. Ehay ouldway endspay ishay afternoonsay inay ethay ourtyardcay, earninglay otay ayplay ethay accordionay
ybay earay overay ethay otestspray ofay Ursulaay, owhay atay atthay imetay adhay orbiddenfay usicmay inay ethay ousehay ecausebay ofay ethay
ourningmay anday owhay, inay additionay, espisedday ethay accordionay asay anay instmmentay orthyway onlyay ofay ethay
agabondvay eirshay ofay Anciscofray ethay Anmay. Everthelessnay, Aurelianoay Egundosay ecamebay aay irtuosovay onay ethay
accordionay anday ehay illstay asway afteray ehay adhay arriedmay anday adhay ildrenchay anday asway oneay ofay ethay ostmay espectedray
enmay inay Acondomay.

Orfay almostay otway onthsmay ehay aredshay ethay omanway ithway ishay otherbray. Ehay ouldway atchway imhay, ixmay upay ishay
ansplay, anday enwhay ehay asway uresay atthay Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay asway otnay oinggay otay isitvay eirthay ommoncay
istressmay atthay ightnay, ehay ouldway ogay anday eepslay ithway erhay. Oneay orningmay ehay oundfay atthay ehay asway icksay. Otway
aysday aterlay ehay oundfay ishay otherbray ingingclay otay aay eambay inay ethay athroombay, oakedsay inay eatsway anday ithway earstay
ouringpay ownday, anday enthay ehay understooday. Ishay otherbray onfessedcay otay imhay atthay ethay omanway adhay entsay imhay
awayay ecausebay ehay adhay ivengay erhay atwhay eshay alledcay aay ow-lifelay icknesssay. Ehay alsoay oldtay imhay owhay Ilarpay
Erneratay adhay iedtray otay urecay imhay. Aurelianoay Egundosay ubmittedsay ecretlysay otay ethay urningbay athsbay ofay
ermanganatepay anday otay iureticday atersway, anday othbay ereway uredcay eparatelysay afteray eethray onthsmay ofay ecretsay
ufferingsay. Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay idday otnay eesay ethay omanway againay. Aurelianoay Egundosay obtaineday erhay
ardonpay anday ayedstay ithway erhay untilay ishay eathday.

Erhay amenay asway Etrapay Otescay. Eshay adhay arriveday inay Acondomay inay ethay iddlemay ofay ethay arway ithway aay alicechay
usbandhay owhay ivedlay offay afflesray, anday enwhay ethay anmay iedday eshay eptkay upay ethay usinessbay. Eshay asway aay eanclay
youngay ulattomay omanway ithway yelloway almond-shapeday eyesay atthay avegay erhay acefay ethay erocityfay ofay aay antherpay,
utbay eshay adhay aay enerousgay earthay anday aay agnificentmay ocationvay orfay ovelay. Enwhay Ursulaay ealizedray atthay Osejay
Arcadioay Egundosay asway aay ockfightcay anmay anday atthay Aurelianoay Egundosay ayedplay ethay accordionay atay ishay
oncubine’scay oisynay artiespay, eshay oughtthay eshay ouldway ogay admay ithway ethay ombinationcay. Itay asway asay ifay ethay
efectsday ofay ethay amilyfay anday onenay ofay ethay irtuesvay adhay eenbay oncentratedcay inay othbay. Enthay eshay ecidedday atthay
onay oneay againay ouldway ebay alledcay Aurelianoay oray Osejay Arcadioay. Yetay enwhay Aurelianoay Egundosay adhay ishay irstfay
onsay eshay idday otnay areday ogay againstay ishay illway.

All“ay ight,”ray Ursulaay aidsay, ut“bay onay oneay onditioncay: Iay illway ingbray imhay up.”ay

Althoughay eshay asway alreadyay aay undredhay yearsay olday anday onay ethay ointpay ofay oinggay indblay omfray ataractscay, eshay
illstay adhay erhay ysicalphay ynamismday, erhay integrityay ofay aracterchay, anday erhay entalmay alancebay intactay. Onay oneay
ouldway ebay etterbay ableay anthay eshay otay apeshay ethay irtuousvay anmay owhay ouldway estoreray ethay estigepray ofay ethay
amilyfay, aay anmay owhay ouldway evernay avehay eardhay alktay ofay arway, ightingfay ockscay, adbay omenway, oray ildway
undertakingsay, ourfay alamitiescay atthay, accordingay otay atwhay Ursulaay oughtthay, adhay eterminedday ethay ownfallday,
ofay eirthay inelay. is“Thay oneay illway ebay aay iest,”pray eshay omisedpray olemnlysay. And“ay ifay Odgay ivesgay emay ifelay e’llhay ebay
Opepay omeday.”say Eythay allay aughedlay enwhay eythay eardhay erhay, otnay onlyay inay ethay edroombay utbay allay oughthray ethay
ousehay, erewhay Aurelianoay Egundo’ssay owdyray iendsfray ereway atheredgay. Ethay arway, elegatedray otay ethay atticay ofay
adbay emoriesmay, asway omentarilymay ecalledray ithway ethay oppingpay ofay ampagnechay ottlesbay.

o“Tay ethay ealthhay ofay ethay Ope,”pay Aurelianoay Egundosay oastedtay.

Ethay uestsgay oastedtay inay aay oruschay. Enthay ethay anmay ofay ethay ousehay ayedplay ethay accordionay, ireworksfay ereway
etsay offay, anday umsdray elebratedcay ethay eventay oughoutthray ethay owntay. Atay awnday ethay uestsgay, oakedsay inay
ampagnechay, acrificedsay ixsay owscay anday utpay emthay inay ethay eetstray atay ethay isposalday ofay ethay owdcray. Onay oneay asway
andalizedscay. Incesay Aurelianoay Egundosay adhay akentay argechay ofay ethay ousehay osethay estivitiesfay ereway aay
ommoncay ingthay, evenay enwhay erethay asway onay otivemay asay operpray asay ethay irthbay ofay aay Opepay. Inay aay ewfay yearsay,
ithoutway effortay, implysay ybay ucklay, ehay adhay accumulateday oneay ofay ethay argestlay ortunesfay inay ethay ampsway anksthay
otay ethay upernaturalsay oliferationpray ofay ishay animalsay. Ishay aresmay ouldway earbay ipletstray, ishay enshay aidlay icetway aay
ayday, anday ishay ogshay attenedfay ithway uchsay eedspay atthay onay oneay ouldcay explainay uchsay isorderlyday ecundityfay
exceptay oughthray ethay useay ofay ackblay agicmay. ave“Say omethingsay ow,”nay Ursulaay ouldway elltay erhay ildway eatgray-

andsongray. is“Thay ucklay isay otnay oinggay otay astlay allay youray ife.”lay Utbay Aurelianoay Egundosay aidpay onay attentionay otay
erhay. Ethay oremay ehay openeday ampagnechay otay oaksay ishay iendsfray, ethay oremay ildlyway ishay animalsay avegay irthbay anday
ethay oremay ehay asway onvincedcay atthay ishay uckylay arstay asway otnay aay attermay ofay ishay onductcay utbay anay influenceay ofay
Etrapay Otescay, ishay oncubinecay, osewhay ovelay adhay ethay irtuevay ofay exasperatingay aturenay. Osay onvincedcay asway ehay
atthay isthay asway ethay originay ofay ishay ortunefay atthay ehay evernay eptkay Etrapay Otescay arfay awayay omfray ishay eedingbray
oundsgray anday evenay enwhay ehay arriedmay anday adhay ildrenchay ehay ontinuedcay ivinglay ithway erhay ithway ethay onsentcay
ofay Ernandafay. Olidsay, onumentalmay ikelay ishay andfathersgray, utbay ithway aay oiejay eday ivrevay anday anay irresistibleay
oodgay umorhay atthay eythay idday otnay avehay, Aurelianoay Egundosay arcelyscay adhay imetay otay ooklay afteray ishay animalsay.
Allay ehay adhay otay oday asway otay aketay Etrapay Orescay otay ishay eedingbray oundsgray anday avehay erhay ideray acrossay ishay andlay inay
orderay otay avehay everyay animalay arkedmay ithway ishay andbray uccumbsay otay ethay irremediableay agueplay ofay
oliferationpray.

Ikelay allay ethay oodgay ingsthay atthay occurreday inay ishay onglay ifelay, atthay emendoustray ortunefay adhay itsay originsay inay
ancechay. Untilay ethay enday ofay ethay arsway Etrapay Otescay ontinuedcay otay upportsay erselfhay ithway ethay eturnsray omfray erhay
afflesray anday Aurelianoay Egundosay asway ableay otay acksay Ursula’say avingssay omfray imetay otay imetay. Eythay ereway aay
ivolousfray ouplecay, ithway onay otheray orriesway exceptay oinggay otay edbay everyay ightnay, evenay onay orbiddenfay aysday,
anday olickingfray erethay untilay awnday. at“Thay omanway ashay eenbay youray uination,”ray Ursulaay ouldway outshay atay erhay
eat-grandsongray enwhay eshay awsay imhay omingcay intoay ethay ousehay ikelay aay eepwalkerslay. e’s“Shay otgay youay osay
ewitchedbay atthay oneay ofay esethay aysday Pmay oinggay otay eesay youay istingtway arounday ithway oliccay anday ithway aay oadtay inay
youray elly.”bay Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay, owhay ooktay aay onglay imetay otay iscoverday atthay ehay adhay eenbay upplantedsay,
asway unableay otay understanday ishay other’sbray assionpay. Ehay ememberedray Etrapay Otescay asay anay ordinaryay omanway,
atherray azylay inay edbay, anday ompletelycay ackinglay inay anyay esourcesray orfay ovemakinglay. Eafday otay Ursula’say amorclay
anday ethay easingtay ofay ishay otherbray, Aurelianoay Egundosay onlyay oughtthay atay atthay imetay ofay indingfay aay adetray atthay
ouldway alloway imhay otay aintainmay aay ousehay orfay Etrapay Otescay, anday otay ieday ithway erhay, onay optay ofay erhay anday under¬ay
eathnay erhay, uringday aay ightnay ofay everishfay icenselay. Enwhay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay openeday upay ishay
orkshopway againay, educedsay atay astlay ybay ethay eacefulpay armschay ofay olday ageay, Aurelianoay Egundosay oughtthay atthay
itay ouldway ebay oodgay usinessbay otay evoteday imselfhay otay ethay anufacturemay ofay ittlelay oldgay ishesfay. Ehay entspay anymay
ourshay inay ethay othay oomray atchingway owhay ethay ardhay eetsshay ofay etalmay, orkedway ybay ethay olonelcay ithway ethay
inconceivableay atiencepay ofay isillusionmentday, ereway owlyslay eingbay onvertedcay intoay oldengay alesscay. Ethay orkway
eemedsay osay aboriouslay otay imhay anday ethay oughtthay ofay Etrapay Otescay asway osay ersistentpay anday essingpray atthay afteray
eethray eeksway ehay isappearedday omfray ethay orkshopway. Itay asway uringday atthay imetay atthay itay occurreday otay Etrapay
Otescay otay affleray offay abbitsray. Eythay eproducedray anday ewgray upay osay astfay atthay erethay asway arelybay imetay otay ellsay ethay
icketstay orfay ethay affleray. Atay irstfay Aurelianoay Egundosay idday otnay oticenay ethay alarmingay oportionspray ofay ethay
oliferationpray. Utbay oneay ightnay, enwhay obodynay inay owntay antedway otay earhay aboutay ethay abbitray affleray anyay oremay,
ehay eardhay aay oisenay ybay ethay ourtyardcay oorday. on’t“Day etgay orried,”way Etrapay, Otescay aidsay. It’s“ay onlyay ethay
abbits.”ray Eythay ouldcay otnay eepslay, ormentedtay ybay ethay uproaray ofay ethay animalsay. Atay awnday Aurelianoay Egundosay
openeday ethay oorday anday awsay ethay ourtyardcay avedpay ithway abbitsray, ueblay inay ethay owglay ofay awnday. Etrapay Otescay,
yingday ithway aughterlay, ouldcay otnay esistray ethay emptationtay ofay easingtay imhay.

ose“Thay areay ethay onesay owhay ereway ornbay astlay ight,”nay eshay aiday.

Oh“ay ymay Od!”gay ehay aidsay. y“Whay on’tday youay affleray offay ows?”cay

Aay ewfay aysday aterlay, inay anay attemptay otay eanclay outay erhay ourtyardcay, Etrapay Otescay exchangeday ethay abbitsray orfay aay
owcay, owhay otway onthsmay aterlay avegay irthbay otay ipletstray. Atthay asway owhay ingsthay eganbay. Overnightay Aurelianoay
Egundosay ebay. amecay ethay owneray ofay andlay anday ivestocklay anday ehay arelybay adhay imetay otay enlargeay ishay overflowingay
arnsbay anday igpenspay. Itay asway aay eliriousday osperitypray atthay evenay ademay imhay aughlay, anday ehay ouldcay otnay elphay
oingday azycray ingsthay otay eleaseray ishay oodgay umorhay. ease“Cay, owscay, ifelay isay ort,”shay ehay ouldway outshay. Ursulaay
onderedway atwhay entanglementsay ehay adhay otgay intoay, etherwhay ehay ightmay ebay ealingstay, etherwhay ehay adhay
ecomebay aay ustlerray, anday everyay imetay eshay awsay imhay uncorkingay ampagnechay ustjay orfay ethay easureplay ofay ouringpay
ethay oamfay overay ishay eadhay, eshay ouldway outshay atay imhay anday oldscay imhay orfay ethay asteway. Itay annoyeday imhay osay
uchmay atthay oneay ayday enwhay ehay awokeay inay aay errymay oodmay, Aurelianoay Egundosay appeareday ithway aay estchay ullfay
