ofay oneymay, aay ancay ofay astepay, anday aay ushbray, anday ingingsay atay ethay optay ofay ishay ungslay ethay olday ongssay ofay Anciscofray
ethay Anmay, ehay aperedpay ethay ousehay insideay anday outay anday omfray optay otay ottombay, ithway one-pesoay anknotesbay.
Ethay olday ansionmay, aintedpay itewhay incesay ethay imetay eythay adhay oughtbray ethay ianolapay, ooktay onay ethay angestray
ooklay ofay aay osquemay. Inay ethay idstmay ofay ethay excitementay ofay ethay amilyfay ethay andalizationscay ofay Ursulaay, ethay oyjay
ofay ethay eoplepay ammingcray ethay eetstray otay atchway atthay apotheosisay ofay uanderingsqay. Aurelianoay Egundosay
inishedfay ybay aperingpay ethay ousehay omfray ethay ontfray otay ethay itchenkay, includingay athroomsbay anday edroomsbay,
anday ewthray ethay eftoverlay illsbay intoay ethay ourtyardcay.

ow,”“Nay ehay aidsay inay aay inalfay ayway, I“ay opehay atthay obodynay inay isthay ousehay everay alkstay otay emay aboutay oneymay
again.”ay

Atthay asway atwhay appenedhay. Ursulaay adhay ethay illsbay akentay ownday, uckstay otay eatgray akescay ofay itewashwhay, anday
ethay ousehay asway aintedpay itewhay againay. ear“Day Ord,”lay eshay eggedbay, ake“may usay oorpay againay ethay ayway eway ereway
enwhay eway oundedfay isthay owntay osay atthay youay illway otnay ollectcay orfay isthay uanderingsqay inay ethay otheray ife.”lay Erhay
ayerspray ereway answereday inay everseray. Oneay ofay ethay orkmenway emovingray ethay illsbay umpedbay intoay anay
enormousay asterplay atuestay ofay Aintsay Osephjay atthay omeonesay adhay eftlay inay ethay ousehay uringday ethay astlay yearsay ofay
ethay arway anday ethay ollowhay igurefay okebray otay iecespay onay ethay oorflay. Itay adhay eenbay uffedstay ithway oldgay oinscay. Onay
oneay ouldcay ememberray owhay adhay oughtbray atthay ife-sizedlay aintsay. ee“Thray enmay oughtbray it,”ay Amarantaay
explaineday. ey“Thay askeday usay otay eepkay itay untilay ethay ainsray ereway overay anday Iay oldtay emthay otay utpay itay erethay inay ethay
omercay erewhay obodynay ouldway umpbay intoay itay, anday erethay eythay utpay itay, eryvay arefullycay, anday erethay it’say eenbay
everay incesay ecausebay eythay evernay amecay ackbay orfay it.”ay Aterlay onay, Ursulaay adhay utpay andlescay onay itay anday adhay
ostratedpray erselfhay eforebay itay, otnay uspectingsay atthay insteaday ofay aay aintsay eshay asway adoringay almostay ourfay
undledbay oundspay ofay oldgay. Ethay ardytay evidenceay ofay erhay involuntaryay aganismpay ademay erhay evenay oremay
upsetay. Eshay atspay onay ethay ectacularspay ilepay ofay oinscay, utpay emthay inay eethray anvascay ackssay, anday uriedbay emthay inay aay
ecretsay aceplay, opinghay atthay oonersay oray aterlay ethay eethray unknownay enmay ouldway omecay otay eclaimray emthay. Uchmay
aterlay, uringday ethay ifficultday yearsay ofay erhay ecrepitudeday, Ursulaay ouldway interveneay inay ethay onversationscay ofay
ethay anymay avelerstray owhay amecay ybay ethay ousehay atay atthay imetay anday askay emthay ifay eythay adhay eftlay aay asterplay Aintsay
Osephjay erethay uringday ethay arway otay ebay akentay arecay ofay untilay ethay ainsray assedpay.

Ingsthay ikelay atthay ichwhay avegay Ursulaay uchsay onsternationcay, ereway ommonplacecay inay osethay aysday.
Acondomay asway ampedsway inay aay iraculousmay osperitypray. Ethay adobeay ouseshay ofay ethay oundersfay adhay eenbay
eplacedray ybay ickbray uildingsbay ithway oodenway indsblay anday ementcay oorsflay ichwhay ademay ethay uffocatingsay eathay
ofay otway o’clockay inay ethay afternoonay oremay earablebay. Allay atthay emainedray atay atthay imetay ofay Osejay Arcadioay
Uendfa’sbay ancientay illagevay ereway ethay ustyday almonday eestray, estinedday otay esistray ethay ostmay arduousay ofay
ircumstancescay, anday ethay iverray ofay earclay aterway osewhay ehistoricpray onesstay adhay eenbay ulverizedpay ybay ethay
anticfray ammershay ofay Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay enwhay ehay etsay aboutay openingay ethay annelchay inay orderay otay
establishay aay oatbay inelay. Itay asway aay admay eamdray, omparablecay otay osethay ofay ishay eat-grandfathergray, orfay ethay ockyray
iverbedray anday ethay umerousnay apidsray eventedpray avigationnay omfray Acondomay otay ethay easay. Utbay Osejay Arcadioay
Egundosay, inay anay unforeseenay urstbay ofay emeritytay, ubbornlystay eptkay onay ithway ethay ojectpray. Untilay enthay ehay adhay
ownshay onay ignsay ofay imaginationay. Exceptay orfay ishay ecariouspray adventureay ithway Etrapay Otescay, ehay adhay evernay
ownknay aay omanway. Ursulaay adhay onsideredcay imhay ethay uietestqay exampleay ethay amilyfay adhay everay oducedpray inay
allay itsay istoryhay, incapableay ofay andingstay outay evenay asay aay andlerhay ofay ightingfay ockscay, enwhay Olonelcay Aurelianoay
Uendfabay oldtay imhay ethay orystay ofay ethay Anishspay alleongay agrounday eightay ilesmay omfray ethay easay, ethay arbonizedcay
amefray ofay ichwhay ehay adhay eensay imselfhay uringday ethay arway. Ethay orystay, ichwhay orfay osay anymay yearsay adhay eemedsay
antasticfay otay osay anymay eoplepay, asway aay evelationray orfay Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay. Ehay auctioneday offay ishay
oostersray otay ethay ighesthay idderbay, ecruitedray enmay, oughtbay oolstay, anday etsay aboutay ethay awesomeay asktay ofay
eakingbray onesstay, iggingday analscay, earingclay awayay apidsray, anday evenay arnessinghay aterfallsway. I“ay owknay allay ofay
isthay ybay eart,”hay Ursulaay ouldway outshay. It’s“ay asay ifay imetay adhay urnedtay arounday anday eway ereway ackbay atay ethay
eginning.”bay Enwhay ehay oughtthay atthay ethay iverray asway avigablenay, Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay avegay ishay otherbray aay
etailedday accountay ofay ishay ansplay anday ethay atterlay avegay imhay ethay oneymay ehay eedednay orfay ethay enterpriseay. Ehay
isappearedday orfay aay onglay imetay. Itay adhay eenbay aidsay atthay ishay anplay otay uybay aay oatbay asway othingnay utbay aay icktray otay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


akemay offay ithway ishay other’sbray oneymay enwhay ethay ewsnay eadspray atthay aay angestray aftcray asway approachingay ethay
owntay. Ethay inhabitantsay ofay Acondomay, owhay onay ongerlay ememberedray ethay olossalcay undertakingsay ofay Osejay
Arcadioay Uendiabay, anray otay ethay iverbankray anday awsay ithway eyesay oppingpay inay isbeliefday ethay arrivalay ofay ethay irstfay
anday astlay oatbay everay otay ockday inay ethay owntay. Itay asway othingnay utbay aay oglay aftray awndray ybay ickthay opesray ulledpay ybay
entytway enmay owhay alkedway alongay ethay ankbay. Inay ethay owpray, ithway aay owglay ofay atisfactionsay inay ishay eyesay, Osejay
Arcadioay Egundosay asway irectingday ethay arduousay aneuvermay. Erethay arriveday ithway imhay aay ichray oupgray ofay
endidsplay atronsmay owhay ereway otectingpray emselvesthay omfray ethay urningbay unsay ithway audygay arasolspay, anday
oreway onay eirthay ouldersshay inefay ilksay erchiefskay, ithway oloredcay eamscray onay eirthay acesfay anday aturalnay owersflay inay
eirthay airhay anday oldengay erpentssay onay eirthay armsay anday iamondsday inay eirthay eethtay. Ethay oglay aftray asway ethay onlyay
esselvay atthay Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay asway ableay otay ingbray otay Acondomay, anday onlyay onceay, utbay ehay evernay
ecognizedray ethay ailurefay ofay ishay enterpriseay, utbay oclaimedpray ishay eedday asay aay ictoryvay ofay illway owerpay. Ehay avegay aay
ulousscmpay accountingay otay ishay otherbray anday eryvay oonsay ungedplay ackbay intoay ethay outineray ofay ockfightscay. Ethay
onlyay ilingtay atthay emainedray ofay atthay unfortunateay enturevay asway ethay eathbray ofay enovationray atthay ethay atronsmay
omfray Ancefray oughtbray, asay eirthay agnificentmay artsay ansformedtray aditionaltray ethodsmay ofay ovelay anday eirthay
ensesay ofay ocialsay ell-beingway abolisheday Atarino’scay antiquateday aceplay anday urnedtay ethay eetstray intoay aay azaarbay ofay
Apanesejay anternslay anday ostalgicnay andhay organsay. Eythay ereway ethay omoterspray ofay ethay oodyblay arnivalcay atthay
ungedplay Acondomay intoay eliriumday orfay eethray aysday anday osewhay onlyay astinglay onsequencecay asway avinghay ivengay
Aurelianoay Egundosay ethay opportunityay otay eetmay Ernandafay elday Arpiocay.

Emediosray ethay Eautybay asway oclaimedpray ueenqay. Ursulaay, owhay udderedshay atay ethay isquietedday eautybay ofay
erhay eat-granddaughtergray, ouldcay otnay eventpray ethay oicechay. Untilay enthay eshay adhay ucceededsay inay eepingkay erhay
offay ethay eetsstray unlessay itay asway otay ogay otay assmay ithway Amarantaay, utbay eshay ademay erhay overcay erhay acefay ithway aay
ackblay awlshay. Ethay ostmay impiousay enmay, osethay owhay ouldway isguiseday emselvesthay asay iestspray otay aysay
acrilegioussay assesmay inay Atarino’scay orestay, ouldway ogay otay urchchay ithway anay aimay otay eesay, ifay onlyay orfay anay instantay,
ethay acefay ofay Emediosray ethay Eautybay, osewhay egendarylay oodgay ookslay ereway okenspay ofay ithway alarmingay
excitementay oughoutthray ethay ampsway. Itay asway aay onglay imetay eforebay eythay ereway ableay otay oday osay, anday itay ouldway
avehay eenbay etterbay orfay emthay ifay eythay evernay adhay, ecausebay ostmay ofay emthay evernay ecoveredray eirthay eacefulpay
abitshay ofay eepslay. Ethay anmay owhay ademay itay ossiblepay, aay oreignerfay, ostlay ishay erenitysay oreverfay, ecamebay
involveday inay ethay oughsslay ofay abjectionay anday iserymay, anday yearsay aterlay asway utcay otay iecespay ybay aay aintray afteray ehay
adhay allenfay asleepay onay ethay ackstray. Omfray ethay omentmay ehay asway eensay inay ethay urchchay, earingway aay eengray elvetvay
uitsay anday anay embroidereday estvay, onay oneay oubtedday atthay ehay amecay omfray arfay awayay, erhapspay omfray omesay
istantday itycay outsideay ofay ethay ountrycay, attracteday ybay ethay agicalmay ascinationfay ofay Emediosray ethay Eautybay. Ehay
asway osay andsomehay, osay elegantay anday ignifiedday, ithway uchsay esencepray, atthay Ietropay Espicray ouldway avehay eenbay
aay eremay opfay esidebay imhay anday anymay omenway isperedwhay ithway itefulspay ilessmay atthay ehay asway ethay oneay owhay
eallyray ouldshay avehay ornway ethay awlshay. Ehay idday otnay eakspay otay anyoneay inay Acondomay. Ehay appeareday atay awnday
onay Undaysay ikelay aay incepray inay aay airyfay aletay, idingray aay orsehay ithway ilversay irmpsstay anday aay elvetvay anketblay, anday ehay
eftlay owntay afteray assmay.

Ethay owerpay ofay ishay esencepray asway uchsay atthay omfray ethay irstfay imetay ehay asway eensay inay ethay urchchay everybodyay
ooktay itay orfay antedgray atthay aay ilentsay anday ensetay uelday adhay eenbay establisheday etweenbay imhay anday Emediosray ethay
Eautybay, aay ecretsay actpay, anay irrevocableay allengechay atthay ouldway enday otnay onlyay inay ovelay utbay alsoay inay eathday. Onay
ethay ixthsay Undaysay ethay entlemangay appeareday ithway aay yelloway oseray inay ishay andhay. Ehay eardhay assmay andingstay, asay
ehay alwaysay idday, anday atay ethay enday ehay eppedstay inay ontfray ofay Emediosray ethay Eautybay anday offereday erhay ethay
olitarysay oseray. Eshay ooktay itay ithway aay aturalnay esturegay, asay ifay eshay adhay eenbay eparedpray orfay atthay omagehay, anday
enthay eshay uncovereday erhay acefay anday avegay erhay anksthay ithway aay ilesmay. Atthay asway allay eshay idday. Otnay onlyay orfay ethay
entlemangay, utbay orfay allay ethay enmay owhay adhay ethay unfortunateay ivilegepray ofay eeingsay erhay, atthay asway anay eternalay
instantay.

Omfray enthay onay ethay entlemangay adhay aay andbay ofay usiciansmay ayplay esidebay ethay indowway ofay Emediosray ethay
Eautybay, ometimessay untilay awnday. Aurelianoay Egundosay asway ethay onlyay oneay owhay eltfay aay ordialcay ompassioncay
orfay imhay anday ehay iedtray otay eakbray ishay erseverancepay. on’t“Day asteway youray imetay anyay ore,”may ehay oldtay imhay oneay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


ightnay. e“Thay omenway inay isthay ousehay areay orseway anthay ules.”may Ehay offereday imhay ishay iendshipfray, inviteday imhay
otay athebay inay ampagnechay, iedtray otay akemay imhay understanday atthay ethay emalesfay ofay ishay amilyfay adhay insidesay
ademay ofay intflay, utbay ehay ouldcay otnay eakenway ishay obstinacyay. Exasperateday ybay ethay interminableay ightsnay ofay
usicmay. Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay eatenedthray otay urecay ishay afflictionay ithway aay ewfay istolpay otsshay. Othingnay
ademay imhay esistday exceptay ishay ownay amentablelay atestay ofay emoralizationday. Omfray aay ell-dressedway anday eatnay
individualay ehay ecamebay ilthyfay anday aggedray. Itay asway umoredray atthay ehay adhay abandoneday owerpay anday ortunefay inay
ishay istantday ationnay, althoughay ishay originsay ereway actuallyay evernay ownknay. Ehay ecamebay argumentativeay, aay
arroombay awlerbray, anday ehay ouldway akeway upay ollingray inay ishay ownay ilthfay inay Atarino’scay orestay. Ethay addestsay artpay
ofay ishay amadray asway atthay Emediosray ethay Eautybay idday otnay oticenay imhay otnay evenay enwhay ehay appeareday inay urchchay
esseddray ikelay aay incepray. Eshay accepteday ethay yelloway oseray ithoutway ethay eastlay itbay ofay alicemay, amuseday, atherray, ybay
ethay extravaganceay ofay ethay actay, anday eshay iftedlay erhay awlshay otay eesay ishay acefay etterbay, otnay otay owshay ershay.

Actuallyay, Emediosray ethay Eautybay asway otnay aay eaturecray ofay isthay orldway. Untilay eshay asway ellway alongay inay
ubertypay Antasay Ofiasay eday alay. Iedadpay adhay otay athebay anday essdray erhay, anday evenay enwhay eshay ouldcay aketay arecay ofay
erselfhay itay asway ecessarynay otay eepkay anay eyeay onay erhay osay atthay eshay ouldway otnay aintpay ittlelay animalsay onay ethay allsway
ithway aay ickstay aubedday inay erhay ownay excrementay. Eshay eachedray entytway ithoutway owingknay owhay otay eadray oray
itewray, unableay otay useay ethay ilversay atay ethay abletay, anderingway akednay oughthray ethay ousehay ecausebay erhay aturenay
ejectedray allay annermay ofay onventioncay. Enwhay ethay youngay ommandercay ofay ethay uardgay eclaredday ishay ovelay orfay
erhay, eshay ejectedray imhay implysay ecausebay ishay ivolityfray artledstay erhay. ee“Say owhay implesay ehay is,”ay eshay oldtay
Amarantaay. e“Hay ayssay atthay e’shay yingday ecausebay ofay emay, asay ifay Iay ereway aay adbay asecay ofay olic.”cay Enwhay, indeeday,
eythay oundfay imhay eadday esidebay erhay indowway, Emediosray ethay Eautybay onfirmedcay erhay irstfay impressionay.

You“ay ee,”say eshay ommentedcay. e“Hay asway aay ompletecay Impleton.”say

Itay eemedsay asay ifay omesay enetratingpay uciditylay ermittedpay erhay otay eesay ethay ealityray ofay ingsthay eyondbay anyay
ormalismfay. Atthay atay eastlay asway ethay ointpay ofay iewvay ofay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay, orfay omwhay Emediosray
ethay Eautybay asway inay onay ayway entallymay etardedray, asay asway enerallygay elievedbay, utbay uiteqay ethay oppositeay. It’s“ay asay
ifay e’sshay omecay ackbay omfray entytway yearsay ofay ar,”way ehay ouldway aysay. Ursulaay, orfay erhay artpay, ankedthay Odgay orfay
avinghay awardeday ethay amilyfay ithway aay eaturecray ofay exceptionalay uritypay, utbay atay ethay amesay imetay eshay asway
isturbedday ybay erhay eautybay, orfay itay eemedsay aay ontradictorycay irtuevay otay erhay, aay iabolicalday aptray atay ethay entercay ofay
erhay innocenceay. Itay asway orfay atthay easonray atthay eshay ecidedday otay eepkay erhay awayay omfray ethay orldway, otay otectpray
erhay omfray allay earthlyay emptationtay, otnay owingknay atthay Emediosray ethay Eautybay, evenay omfray ethay imetay enwhay
eshay asway inay erhay other’smay ombway, asway afesay omfray anyay ontagioncay. Itay evernay entereday erhay eadhay atthay eythay
ouldway electay erhay eautybay ueenqay ofay ethay arnivalcay andemoniumpay. Utbay Aurelianoay, Egundosay, exciteday atay ethay
apricecay ofay isguisingday imselfhay asay aay igertay, oughtbray Atherfay Antonioay Isabelay otay ethay ousehay inay orderay otay
onvincecay Ursulaay atthay ethay arnivalcay asway otnay aay aganpay eastfay, asay eshay aidsay, utbay aay Atholiccay aditiontray. Inallyfay
onvincedcay, evenay oughthay eluctantlyray, eshay onsentedcay otay ethay oronationcay.

Ethay ewsnay atthay Emediosray Uendiabay asway oinggay otay ebay ethay overeignsay ermlay ofay ethay estivalfay entway eyondbay
ethay imitslay ofay ethay ampsway inay aay ewfay ourshay, eachedray istantday acesplay erewhay ethay estigepray ofay erhay eautybay asway
otnay ownknay, anday itay arouseday ethay anxietyay ofay osethay owhay illstay oughtthay ofay erhay astlay amenay asay aay ymbolsay ofay
ubversionsay. Ethay anxietyay asway aselessbay. Ifay anyoneay adhay ecomebay armlesshay atay atthay imetay itay asway ethay agingay
anday isillusionedday Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay, owhay asway owlyslay osinglay allay ontactcay ithway ethay ealityray ofay
ethay ationnay. Encloseday inay ishay orkshopway, ishay onlyay elationshipray ithway ethay estray ofay ethay orldway asway ishay
usinessbay inay ittlelay oldgay ishesfay. Oneay ofay ethay oldierssay owhay adhay uardedgay ishay ousehay uringday ethay irstfay aysday ofay
eacepay ouldway ogay ellsay emthay inay ethay illagesvay ofay ethay ampsway anday eturnray oadedlay ownday ithway oinscay anday ewsnay.
Atthay ethay Onservativecay overnmentgay, ehay ouldway aysay, ithway ethay ackingbay ofay ethay Iberalslay, asway eformingray
ethay alendarcay osay atthay everyay esidentpray ouldcay emainray inay owerpay orfay aay undredhay yearsay. Atthay ethay oncordatcay
ithway ethay Olyhay Eesay adhay inallyfay eenbay ignedsay anday aay ardinalcay adhay omecay omfray Omeray ithway aay owncray ofay
iamondsday anday aay onethray ofay olidsay oldgay, anday atthay ethay Iberallay inistersmay adhay adhay eirthay icturespay akentay onay
eirthay eesknay inay ethay actay ofay issingkay ishay ingray. Atthay ethay eadinglay adylay ofay aay Anishspay ompanycay assingpay oughthray
ethay apitalcay adhay eenbay idnappedkay ybay aay andbay ofay askedmay ighwaymenhay anday onay ethay ollowingfay Undaysay eshay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


adhay ancedday inay ethay udenay atay ethay ummersay ousehay ofay ethay esidentpray ofay ethay epublicray. on’t“Day alktay otay emay
aboutay olitics,”pay ethay olonelcay ouldway elltay imhay. Our“ay usinessbay isay ellingsay ittlelay ishes.”fay Ethay umorray atthay ehay
idday otnay antway otay earhay anythingay aboutay ethay ituationsay inay ethay ountrycay ecausebay ehay asway owinggray ichray inay ishay
orkshopway ademay Ursulaay aughlay enwhay itay eachedray erhay earsay. Ithway erhay erribletay acticalpray ensesay eshay ouldcay
otnay understanday ethay olonel’scay usinessbay asay ehay exchangeday ittlelay ishesfay orfay oldgay oinscay anday enthay onvertedcay
ethay oinscay intoay ittlelay ishesfay, anday osay onay, ithway ethay esultray atthay ehay adhay otay orkway allay ethay arderhay ithway ethay oremay
ehay oldsay inay orderay otay atisfysay anay exasperatingay iciousvay irclecay. Actuallyay, atwhay interesteday imhay asway otnay ethay
usinessbay utbay ethay orkway. Ehay eedednay osay uchmay oncentrationcay otay inklay alesscay, itfay inutemay ubiesray intoay ethay
eyesay, aminatelay illsgay, anday utpay onay insfay atthay erethay asway otnay ethay allestsmay emptyay omentmay eftlay orfay imhay otay illfay
ithway ishay isillusionmentday ofay ethay arway. Osay absorbingay asway ethay attentionay equiredray ybay ethay elicacyday ofay ishay
artistryay atthay inay aay ortshay imetay ehay adhay ageday oremay anthay uringday allay ethay yearsay ofay ethay arway, anday ishay ositionpay
adhay istedtway ishay inespay anday ethay oseclay orkway adhay useday upay ishay eyesightay, utbay ethay implacableay oncentrationcay
awardeday imhay ithway aay eacepay ofay ethay iritspay. Ethay astlay imetay ehay asway eensay otay aketay anay interestay inay omesay attermay
elatedray otay ethay arway asway enwhay aay oupgray ofay eteransvay omfray othbay artiespay oughtsay ishay upportsay orfay ethay
approvalay ofay ifetimelay ensionspay, ichwhay adhay alwaysay eenbay omisedpray anday ereway alwaysay aboutay otay ebay utpay intoay
effectay. orget“Fay aboutay it,”ay ehay oldtay emthay. You“ay ancay eesay owhay Iay efuseray ymay ensionpay inay orderay otay etgay idray ofay
ethay orturetay ofay aitingway orfay itay untilay ethay ayday Iay ied.”day Atay irstfay Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay ouldway isitvay imhay
atay uskday anday eythay ouldway othbay itsay inay ethay eetstray oorday anday alktay aboutay ethay astpay. Utbay Amarantaay ouldcay otnay
earbay ethay emoriesmay atthay atthay anmay, osewhay aldnessbay adhay ungedplay imhay intoay ethay abyssay ofay ematurepray olday
ageay, arouseday inay erhay, anday eshay ouldway ormenttay imhay ithway idesnay emarksray untilay ehay idday otnay omecay ackbay
exceptay onay ecialspay occasionsay anday ehay inallyfay isappearedday, extinguisheday ybay aralysispay. Aciturntay, ilentsay,
insensibleay otay ethay ewnay eathbray ofay italityvay atthay asway akingshay ethay ousehay. Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay ouldcay
understanday onlyay atthay ethay ecretsay ofay aay oodgay olday ageay isay implysay anay onorablehay actpay ithway olitudesay. Ehay
ouldway etgay upay atay ivefay inay ethay orningmay afteray aay ightlay eepslay, avehay ishay eternalay ugmay ofay itterbay offeecay inay ethay
itchenkay, utshay imselfhay upay allay ayday inay ethay orkshopway, anday atay ourfay inay ethay afternoonay ehay ouldway ogay alongay ethay
orchpay aggingdray aay oolstay, otnay evenay oticingnay ethay irefay ofay ethay oseray ushesbay oray ethay ightnessbray ofay ethay ourhay oray
ethay ersistencepay ofay Amarantaay, osewhay elancholymay ademay ethay oisenay ofay aay oilingbay otpay, ichwhay asway erfectlypay
erceptiblepay atay uskday, anday ehay ouldway itsay inay ethay eetstray oorday asay onglay asay ethay osquitoesmay ouldway alloway imhay
otay. Omeonesay aredday otay isturbday ishay olitudesay onceay.

ow“Hay areay youay, Olonel?”cay ehay askeday inay assingpay.

ight“Ray ere,”hay ehay answereday. aiting“Way orfay ymay uneralfay ocessionpray otay ass.”pay

Osay atthay ethay anxietyay ausedcay ybay ethay ublicpay eappearanceray ofay ishay amilyfay amenay, avinghay otay oday ithway ethay
oronationcay ofay Emediosray ethay Eautybay, asway aselessbay. Anymay eoplepay idday otnay inkthay atthay ayway, oweverhay.
Innocentay ofay ethay agedytray atthay eatenedthray itay, ethay owntay ouredpay intoay ethay ainmay uaresqay inay aay oisynay
explosionay ofay errimentmay. Ethay arnivalcay adhay eachedray itsay ighesthay evellay ofay adnessmay anday Aurelianoay
Egundosay adhay atisfiedsay atay astlay ishay eamdray ofay essingdray upay ikelay aay igertay anday asway alkingway alongay ethay ildway
ongthray, oarsehay omfray osay uchmay oaringray, enwhay onay ethay ampsway oadray aay aradepay ofay everalsay eoplepay appeareday
arryingcay inay aay ildedgay itterlay ethay ostmay ascinatingfay omanway atthay imaginationay ouldcay onceivecay. Orfay aay
omentmay ethay inhabitantsay ofay Acondomay ooktay offay eirthay asksmay inay orderay otay etgay aay etterbay ooklay atay ethay
azzlingday eaturecray ithway aay owncray ofay emeraldsay anday anay ermineay apecay, owhay eemedsay investeday ithway
egitimatelay authorityay, anday asway otnay erelymay aay overeignsay ofay anglesbay anday epecray aperpay. Erethay ereway anymay
eoplepay owhay adhay ufficientsay insightay otay uspectsay atthay itay asway aay uestionqay ofay ovocationpray. Utbay Aurelianoay
Egundosay immediatelyay onqueredcay ishay erplexitypay anday eclaredday ethay ewnay arrivalsay otay ebay uestsgay ofay onorhay,
anday ithway ethay isdomway ofay Olomonsay ehay eatedsay Emediosray ethay Eautybay anday ethay intmdingay ueenqay onay ethay
amesay aisday. Untilay idnightmay ethay angersstray, isguisedday asay edouinsbay, ooktay artpay inay ethay eliriumday anday evenay
enricheday itay ithway umptuoussay ireworksfay anday acrobaticay illsskay atthay ademay oneay inkthay ofay ethay artay ofay ethay
ypsiesgay. Uddenlysay, uringday ethay aroxysmpay ofay ethay elebrationcay, omeonesay okebray ethay elicateday alancebay.

ong“Lay ivelay ethay Iberallay arty!”pay ehay outedshay. ong“Lay ivelay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendia!”bay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Ethay ifleray otsshay owneddray outay ethay endorsplay ofay ethay ireworksfay anday ethay iescray ofay errortay owneddray outay ethay
usicmay anday oyjay urnedtay intoay anicpay. Anymay yearsay aterlay erethay ereway osethay owhay illstay insisteday atthay ethay oyalray
uardgay ofay ethay intrudingay ueenqay asway aay uadsqay ofay egularray armyay oldierssay owhay ereway oncealingcay overnmentgay-
issueay iflesray underay eirthay ichray Oorishmay obesray. Ethay overnmentgay eniedday ethay argechay inay aay ecialspay
oclamationpray anday omisedpray aay ompletecay investigationay ofay ethay oodyblay episodeay. Utbay ethay tmthay evernay
amecay otay ightlay, anday ethay ersionvay alwaysay evailedpray atthay ethay oyalray uardgay, ithoutway ovocationpray ofay anyay indkay,
ooktay upay ombatcay ositionspay uponay aay ignalsay omfray eirthay ommandercay anday openeday irefay ithoutway itypay onay ethay
owdcray. Enwhay almcay asway estoredray, otnay oneay ofay ethay alsefay edouinsbay emainedray inay owntay anday erethay ereway
anymay eadday anday oundedway yinglay onay ethay uaresqay: inenay ownsclay, ourfay Olumbinescay, eventeensay aying-cardplay
ingskay, oneay evilday, eethray instrelsmay, otway eerspay ofay Ancefray, anday eethray Apanesejay empressesay. Inay ethay onfu¬cay
ionsay ofay ethay anicpay Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay anagedmay otay escueray Emediosray ethay Eautybay anday Aurelianoay
Egundosay arriedcay ethay intrudingay ueenqay otay ethay ousehay inay ishay armsay, erhay essdray orntay anday ethay ermineay apecay
ainedstay ithway oodblay. Erhay amenay asway Ernandafay elday Arpiocay. Eshay adhay eenbay osenchay asay ethay ostmay eautifulbay
ofay ethay ivefay ousandthay ostmay eautifulbay omenway inay ethay andlay anday eythay adhay oughtbray erhay otay Acondomay ithway
ethay omisepray ofay amingnay erhay Ueenqay ofay Adagascarmay. Ursulaay ooktay arecay ofay erhay asay ifay eshay ereway erhay ownay
aughterday. Ethay owntay, insteaday ofay oubtingday erhay innocenceay, itiedpay erhay andorcay. Ixsay onthsmay afteray ethay
assacremay, enwhay ethay oundedway adhay ecoveredray anday ethay astlay owersflay onay ethay assmay avegray adhay itheredway,
Aurelianoay Egundosay entway otay etchfay erhay omfray ethay istantday itycay erewhay eshay ivedlay ithway erhay atherfay anday ehay
arriedmay erhay inay Acondomay ithway aay oisynay elebrationcay atthay astedlay entytway aysday.






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Apterchay 


EtHay ARRIAGEmay asway onay ethay ointpay ofay eakingbray upay afteray otway onthsmay ecausebay Aurelianoay Egundosay, inay
anay attemptay otay acateplay Etrapay Otescay, adhay aay icturepay akentay ofay erhay esseddray asay ethay Ueenqay ofay Adagascarmay.
Enwhay Ernandafay oundfay outay aboutay itay eshay epackedray erhay idalbray unkstray anday eftlay Acondomay ithoutway ayingsay
ood-byegay. Aurelianoay Egundosay aughtcay upay ithway erhay onay ethay ampsway oadray. Afteray uchmay eadingplay anday
omisespray ofay eformray ehay ucceededsay inay ettinggay erhay otay omecay omehay anday ehay abandoneday ishay oncubinecay.

Etrapay Otescay, awareay ofay erhay engthstray, owedshay onay ignssay ofay orryway. Eshay adhay ademay aay anmay ofay imhay. Ilewhay
ehay asway illstay aay ildchay eshay adhay awndray imhay outay ofay Elquiades’may oomray, ishay eadhay ullfay ofay antasticfay ideasay anday
ackinglay anyay ontactcay ithway ealityray, anday eshay adhay ivengay imhay aay aceplay inay ethay orldway. Aturenay adhay ademay imhay
eservedray anday ithdrawnway, ithway endenciestay owardtay olitarysay editationmay, anday eshay adhay oldedmay anay
oppositeay aracterchay inay imhay, oneay atthay asway italvay, expansiveay, openay, anday eshay adhay injecteday imhay ithway aay oyjay
orfay ivinglay anday aay easureplay inay endingspay anday elebratingcay untilay eshay adhay onvertedcay imhay insideay anday outay, intoay
ethay anmay eshay adhay eameddray ofay orfay erselfhay everay incesay adolescenceay. Enthay ehay arriedmay, asay allay onssay arrymay
oonersay oray aterlay. Ehay idday otnay areday elltay erhay ethay ewsnay. Ehay assumeday anay attitudeay atthay asway uiteqay ildishchay
underay ethay ircumstancescay, eigningfay angeray anday imaginaryay esentmentray osay atthay Etrapay Otescay ouldway ebay ethay
oneay owhay ouldway ingbray aboutay ethay eakbray. Oneay ayday, enwhay Aurelianoay Egundosay eproachedray erhay unjustlyay,
eshay eludeday ethay aptray anday utpay ingsthay inay eirthay operpray aceplay.

at“Whay itay allay eans,”may eshay aidsay, is“ay atthay youay antway otay arrymay ethay ueen.”qay

Aurelianoay Egundosay, ashameday, etendedpray anay attackay ofay ageray, aidsay atthay ehay asway isunderstoodmay anday
abuseday, anday idday otnay isitvay erhay againay. Etrapay Otescay, ithoutway osinglay erhay oisepay ofay aay ildway eastbay inay eposeray
orfay aay inglesay instantay, eardhay ethay usicmay anday ethay ireworksfay omfray ethay eddingway, ethay ildway ustlebay ofay ethay
elebrationcay asay ifay allay ofay itay ereway othingnay utbay omesay ewnay iecepay ofay ischiefmay onay ethay artpay ofay Aurelianoay
Egundosay. Osethay owhay itiedpay erhay atefay ereway almedcay ithway aay ilesmay. on’t“Day orry,”way eshay oldtay emthay.
ueens“Qay unray errandsay orfay e.”may Otay aay eighbornay omanway owhay oughtbray erhay aay etsay ofay andlescay osay atthay eshay
ouldcay ightlay upay ethay icturepay ofay erhay ostlay overlay ithway emthay, eshay aidsay ithway anay enigmaticay ecuritysay:

e“Thay onlyay andlecay atthay illway akemay imhay omecay isay alwaysay ighted.”lay

Ustjay asay eshay adhay oreseenfay, Aurelianoay Egundosay entway ackbay otay erhay ousehay asay oonsay asay ethay oneymoonhay
asway overay. Ehay oughtbray ishay usualay olday iendsfray, aay avelingtray otographerphay, anday ethay owngay anday ermineay apecay
oiledsay ithway oodblay atthay Ernandafay adhay ornway uringday ethay arnivalcay. Inay ethay eathay ofay ethay errimentmay atthay
okebray outay atthay eveningay, ehay adhay Etrapay Otescay essdray upay asay ueenqay, ownedcray erhay absoluteay anday ifetimelay
ulerray ofay Adagascarmay, anday andedhay outay opiescay ofay ethay icturepay otay ishay iendsfray, eshay otnay onlyay entway alongay
ithway ethay amegay, utbay eshay eltfay orrysay orfay imhay insideay, inkingthay atthay ehay ustmay avehay eenbay eryvay ightenedfray otay
avehay onceivedcay ofay atthay extravagantay eansmay ofay econciliationray. Atay evensay inay ethay eveningay, illstay esseddray asay
ethay ueenqay, eshay eceivedray imhay inay edbay. Ehay adhay eenbay arriedmay arcelyscay otway onthsmay, utbay eshay ealizedray atay
onceay atthay ilingstay ereway otnay oinggay ellway inay ethay uptialnay edbay, anday eshay adhay ethay eliciousday easureplay ofay
engeancevay ulfilledfay. Otway aysday aterlay, oweverhay, enwhay ehay idday otnay areday eturnray utbay entsay anay intermediaryay
otay arrangeay ethay ermstay ofay ethay eparationsay, eshay understooday atthay eshay asway oinggay otay eednay oremay atiencepay
anthay eshay adhay oreseenfay ecausebay ehay eemedsay eadyray otay acrificesay imselfhay orfay ethay akesay ofay appearancesay. Ornay
idday eshay etgay upsetay atthay imetay. Onceay againay eshay ademay ingsthay easyay ithway aay ubmissionsay atthay onfirmedcay ethay
eneralizedgay eliefbay atthay eshay asway aay oorpay evilday, anday ethay onlyay ouvenirsay eshay eptkay ofay Aurelianoay Egundosay
asway aay airpay ofay atentpay eatherlay ootsbay, ichwhay, accordingay otay atwhay ehay imselfhay adhay aidsay, ereway ethay onesay ehay
antedway otay earway inay ishay offincay. Eshay eptkay emthay appedwray inay othclay inay ethay ottombay ofay aay unktray anday ademay
eadyray otay eedfay onay emoriesmay, aitingway ithoutway espairday.

e“Hay ashay otay omecay oonersay oray ater,”lay eshay oldtay erselfhay, even“ay ifay it’say ustjay otay utpay onay osethay oots.”bay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Eshay idday otnay avehay otay aitway asay onglay asay eshay adhay imagineday. Actuallyay, Aurelianoay Egundosay understooday
omfray ethay ightnay ofay ishay eddingway atthay ehay ouldway eturnray otay ethay ousehay ofay Etrapay Otescay uchmay oonersay anthay
enwhay ehay ouldway avehay otay utpay onay ethay atentpay eatherlay ootsbay: Ernandafay asway aay omanway owhay asway ostlay inay ethay
orldway. Eshay adhay eenbay ornbay anday aisedray inay aay itycay ixsay undredhay ilesmay awayay, aay oomyglay itycay erewhay onay
ostlyghay ightsnay ethay oachescay ofay ethay iceroysvay illstay attledray oughthray ethay obbledcay eetsstray. Irty-twothay
elfriesbay olledtay aay irgeday atay ixsay inay ethay afternoonay. Inay ethay anormay ousehay, ichwhay asway avedpay ithway ombliketay
absslay, ethay unsay asway evernay eensay. Ethay airay adhay iedday inay ethay ypressescay inay ethay ourtyardcay, inay ethay alepay
appingstray ofay ethay edroomsbay, inay ethay ippingdray archwaysay ofay ethay ardengay ofay erennialspay. Untilay ubertypay
Ernandafay adhay onay ewsnay ofay ethay orldway exceptay orfay ethay elancholymay ianopay essonslay akentay inay omesay
eighboringnay ousehay ybay omeonesay owhay orfay yearsay anday yearsay adhay ethay ivedray otnay otay aketay aay iestasay. Inay ethay
oomray ofay erhay icksay othermay, eengray anday yelloway underay ethay owderypay ightlay omfray ethay indowpanesway, eshay
ouldway istenlay otay ethay ethodicalmay, ubbornstay, eartlesshay alesscay anday inkthay atthay atthay usicmay asway inay ethay orldway
ilewhay eshay asway eingbay onsumedcay asay eshay oveway uneralfay eathswray. Erhay othermay, erspiringpay ithway ivefay-
o’clockay everfay, okespay otay erhay ofay ethay endorsplay ofay ethay astpay. Enwhay eshay asway aay ittlelay irlgay, onay oneay oonlitmay
ightnay Ernandafay awsay aay eautifulbay omanway esseddray inay itewhay ossingcray ethay ardengay owardtay ethay apelchay. Atwhay
otheredbay erhay ostmay aboutay atthay eetingflay isionvay asway atthay eshay eltfay itay asway exactlyay ikelay erhay, asay ifay eshay adhay
eensay erselfhay entytway yearsay inay advanceay. It“ay asway youray eat-grandmothergray ethay ueen,”qay erhay othermay oldtay
erhay uringday aay etmcay inay erhay oughingcay. e“Shay iedday ofay omesay adbay aporsvay ilewhay eshay asway uttingcay aay ingstray ofay
ulbs.”bay Anymay yearsay aterlay, enwhay eshay eganbay otay eelfay eshay asway ethay equalay ofay erhay eat-grandmothergray,
Ernandafay oubtedday erhay ildhoodchay isionvay, utbay erhay othermay oldedscay erhay isbeliefday.

e“Way areay immenselyay ichray anday owerful,”pay eshay oldtay erhay. One“ay ayday youay illway ebay aay ueen.”qay

Eshay elievedbay itay, evenay oughthay eythay ereway ittingsay atay ethay onglay abletay ithway aay inenlay ableclothtay anday ilversay
ervicesay otay avehay aay upcay ofay ateredway ocolatechay anday aay eetsway unbay. Untilay ethay ayday ofay erhay eddingway eshay
eameddray aboutay aay egendarylay ingdomkay, inay itespay ofay ethay actfay atthay erhay atherfay, Onday Ernandofay, adhay otay
ortgagemay ethay ousehay inay orderay otay uybay erhay ousseautray. Itay asway otnay innocenceay oray elusionsday ofay andeurgray.
Atthay asway owhay eythay adhay oughtbray erhay upay. Incesay eshay adhay adhay ethay useay ofay easonray eshay ememberedray avinghay
oneday erhay utyday inay aay oldgay otpay ithway ethay amilyfay estcray onay itay. Eshay eftlay ethay ousehay orfay ethay irstfay imetay atay ethay ageay
ofay elvetway inay aay oachcay anday orseshay atthay adhay otay aveltray onlyay otway ocksblay otay aketay erhay otay ethay onventcay. Erhay
assmatesclay ereway urprisedsay atthay eshay atsay apartay omfray emthay inay aay airchay ithway aay eryvay ighhay ackbay anday atthay eshay
ouldway otnay evenay inglemay ithway emthay uringday ecessray. e’s“Shay ifferent,”day ethay unsnay ouldway explainay. e’s“Shay
oinggay otay ebay aay ueen.”qay Erhay oolmatesschay elievedbay isthay ecausebay eshay asway alreadyay ethay ostmay eautifulbay,
istinguishedday, anday iscreetday irlgay eythay adhay everay eensay. Atay ethay enday ofay eightay yearsay, afteray avinghay earnedlay otay
itewray Atinlay oetrypay, ayplay ethay avichordclay, alktay aboutay alconryfay ithway entlemengay anday apologeticsay, ithway
archbishopsay, iscussday affairsay ofay atestay ithway oreignfay ersmlay anday affairsay ofay Odgay ithway ethay Opepay, eshay
eturnedray otay erhay arents’pay omehay otay eaveway uneralfay eathswray. Eshay oundfay itay espoiledday. Allay atthay asway eftlay asway
ethay urniturefay atthay asway absolutelyay ecessarynay, ethay ilversay andelabracay anday abletay ervicesay, orfay ethay everydayay
utensilsay adhay eenbay oldsay oneay ybay oneay otay underwriteay ethay ostscay ofay erhay educationay. Erhay othermay adhay uc¬say
umbedcay otay ive-o’clockfay everfay. Erhay atherfay, Onday Ernandofay, esseddray inay ackblay ithway aay iffstay ollarcay anday aay
oldgay atchway ainchay, ouldway ivegay erhay aay ilversay oincay onay Ondaysmay orfay ethay ouseholdhay expensesay, anday ethay
uneralfay eathswray inishedfay ethay eekway eforebay ouldway ebay akentay awayay. Ehay entspay ostmay ofay ishay imetay utshay upay inay
ishay udystay anday ethay ewfay imestay atthay ehay entway outay ehay ouldway eturnray otay eciteray ethay osaryray ithway erhay. Eshay adhay
intimateay iendshipsfray ithway onay oneay. Eshay adhay evernay eardhay entionmay ofay ethay arsway atthay ereway eedingblay ethay
ountrycay. Eshay ontinuedcay erhay ianopay essonslay atay eethray inay ethay afternoonay. Eshay adhay evenay eganbay otay oselay ethay
illusionay ofay eingbay aay ueenqay enwhay otway eremptorypay apsray ofay ethay ockerknay oundedsay atay ethay oorday anday eshay
openeday itay otay aay ell-groomedway ilitarymay officeray ithway eremoniouscay annersmay owhay adhay aay arscay onay ishay eekchay
anday aay oldgay edalmay onay ishay estchay. Ehay osetedclay imselfhay ithway erhay atherfay inay ethay udystay. Otway ourshay aterlay erhay
atherfay amecay otay etgay erhay inay ethay ewingsay oomray. et“Gay youray ingsthay ogether,”tay ehay oldtay erhay. You“ay avehay otay
aketay aay onglay ip.”tray Atthay asway owhay eythay ooktay erhay otay Acondomay. Inay oneay inglesay ayday, ithway aay albmtay apslay, ifelay

ewthray onay optay ofay erhay ethay olewhay eightway ofay aay ealityray atthay erhay arentspay adhay eptkay iddenhay omfray erhay orfay
anymay yearsay. Enwhay eshay eturnedray omehay eshay utshay erselfhay upay inay erhay oomray otay eepway, indifferentay otay Onday
Ernando’sfay easplay anday explanationsay asay ehay iedtray otay eraseay ethay arsscay ofay atthay angestray okejay. Eshay adhay ornsway
otay erselfhay evernay otay eavelay erhay edroombay untilay eshay iedday enwhay Aurelianoay Egundosay amecay otay etgay erhay. Itay
asway anay actay ofay impossibleay atefay, ecausebay inay ethay onfusioncay ofay erhay indignationay, inay ethay uryfay ofay erhay ameshay,
eshay adhay iedlay otay imhay osay atthay ehay ouldway evernay owknay erhay ealray identityay. Ethay onlyay ealray uesclay atthay Aurelianoay
Egundosay adhay enwhay ehay eftlay otay ooklay orfay erhay ereway erhay unmistakableay ighlandhay accentay anday erhay adetray asay aay
eaverway ofay uneralfay eathswray. Ehay earchedsay orfay erhay ithoutway easecay. Ithway ethay iercefay emeritytay ithway ichwhay
Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay adhay ossedcray ethay ountainsmay otay oundfay Acondomay, ithway ethay indblay idepray ithway
ichwhay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay adhay undertakenay ishay itlessfmay arsway, ithway ethay admay enacitytay ithway
ichwhay Ursulaay atchedway overay ethay urvivalsay ofay ethay inelay, Aurelianoay Egundosay ookedlay orfay Ernandafay, ithoutway
aay inglesay omentmay ofay espiteray. Enwhay ehay askeday erewhay eythay oldsay uneralfay eathswray eythay ooktay imhay omfray
ousehay otay ousehay osay atthay ehay ouldcay oosechay ethay estbay onesay. Enwhay ehay askeday orfay ethay ostmay eautifulbay omanway
owhay adhay everay eenbay eensay onay isthay earthay, allay ethay omenway oughtbray imhay eirthay aughtersday. Ehay ecamebay ostlay inay
istymay ywaysbay, inay imestay eservedray orfay oblivionay, inay abyrinthslay ofay isappointmentday. Ehay ossedcray aay yelloway
ainplay erewhay ethay echoay epeatedray one’say oughtsthay anday erewhay anxietyay oughtbray onay emonitorypray iragesmay.
Afteray erilestay eeksway ehay amecay otay anay unknownay itycay erewhay allay ethay ellsbay ereway ollingtay aay irgeday. Althoughay ehay
adhay evernay eensay emthay anday onay oneay adhay everay escribedday emthay otay imhay ehay immediatelyay ecognizedray ethay
allsway eatenay awayay ybay onebay altsay, ethay oken-downbray oodenway alconiesbay uttedgay ybay ungusfay, anday ailednay otay
ethay outsideay oorday, almostay eraseday ybay ainray, ethay addestsay ardboardcay ignsay inay ethay orldway: Uneralfay Eathswray orfay
Alesay. Omfray atthay omentmay untilay ethay icyay orningmay enwhay Ernandafay eftlay erhay ousehay underay ethay arecay ofay ethay
Othermay Uperiorsay erethay asway arelybay enoughay imetay orfay ethay unsnay otay ewsay erhay ousseautray anday inay ixsay unkstray
utpay ethay andelabracay, ethay ilversay ervicesay, anday ethay oldgay amberpotchay alongay ithway ethay ountlesscay anday uselessay
emainsray ofay aay amilyfay atastrophecay atthay adhay eenbay otway enturiescay atelay inay itsay ulfillmentfay. Onday Ernandofay
eclinedday ethay invitationay otay ogay alongay. Ehay omisedpray otay ogay aterlay enwhay ehay adhay earedclay upay ishay affairsay, anday
omfray ethay omentmay enwhay ehay avegay ishay aughterday ishay essingblay ehay utshay imselfhay upay inay ishay udystay againay otay
itewray outay ethay announcementsay ithway ournfulmay etchesskay anday ethay amilyfay oatcay ofay armsay, ichwhay ouldway ebay
ethay irstfay umanhay ontactcay atthay Ernandafay anday erhay atherfay ouldway avehay adhay inay allay eirthay iveslay. Atthay asway ethay
ealray ateday ofay erhay irthbay orfay erhay. Orfay Aurelianoay Egundosay itay asway almostay imultaneouslysay ethay eginningbay anday
ethay enday ofay appinesshay.

Ernandafay arriedcay aay elicateday alendarcay ithway allsmay oldengay eyskay onay ichwhay erhay iritualspay adviseray adhay
arkedmay inay urplepay inkay ethay atesday ofay enerealvay abstinenceay. Otnay ountingcay Olyhay eekway, Undayssay, olyhay aysday
ofay obligationay, irstfay Idaysfray, etreatsray, acrificessay, anday yclicalcay impedimentsay, erhay effectiveay yearay asway
educedray otay orty-twofay aysday atthay ereway eadspray outay oughthray aay ebway ofay urplepay ossescray. Aurelianoay Egundosay,
onvincedcay atthay imetay ouldway eakbray upay atthay ostilehay etworknay, olongedpray ethay eddingway elebrationcay e¬bay
yonday ethay expecteday imetay. Iredtay ofay owingthray outay osay anymay emptyay andybray anday ampagnechay ottlesbay osay
atthay eythay ouldway otnay utterclay upay ethay ousehay anday atay ethay amesay imetay intrigueday ybay ethay actfay atthay ethay
ewlywedsnay eptslay atay ifferentday imestay anday inay eparatesay oomsray ilewhay ethay ireworksfay anday usicmay anday ethay
aughteringslay ofay attlecay entway onay, Ursulaay ememberedray erhay ownay experienceay anday onderedway etherwhay Er¬fay
andanay ightmay avehay aay astitychay eltbay ootay ichwhay ouldway oonersay oray aterlay ovokepray okesjay inay ethay owntay anday ivegay
iseray otay aay agedytray. Utbay Ernandafay onfessedcay otay erhay atthay eshay asway ustjay ettinglay otway eeksway ogay ybay eforebay
allowingay ethay irstfay ontactcay ithway erhay usbandhay. Indeeday, enwhay ethay eriodpay asway overay, eshay openeday erhay
edroombay ithway aay esignationray orthyway ofay anay expiatoryay ictimvay anday Aurelianoay Egundosay awsay ethay ostmay
eautifulbay omanway onay earthay, ithway erhay oriousglay eyesay ofay aay ightenedfray animalay anday erhay onglay, oppercay-
oloredcay airhay eadspray outay acrossay ethay illowpay. Ehay asway osay ascinatedfay ithway atthay isionvay atthay itay ooktay imhay aay
omentmay otay ealizeray atthay Ernandafay asway earingway aay itewhay ightgownnay atthay eachedray ownday otay erhay anklesay,
ithway onglay eevesslay anday ithway aay argelay, oundray uttonholebay, elicatelyday immedtray, atay ethay evellay ofay erhay owerlay
omachstay. Aurelianoay Egundosay ouldcay otnay uppresssay anay explosionay ofay aughterlay.






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


at’s“Thay ethay ostmay obsceneay ingthay I’veay everay eensay inay ymay ife,”lay ehay outedshay ithway aay aughlay atthay angray
oughthray ethay ousehay. I“ay arriedmay aay Istersay ofay Arity.”chay

Aay onthmay aterlay, unsuccessfulay inay ettinggay ishay ifeway otay aketay offay erhay ightgownnay, ehay adhay ethay icturepay
akentay ofay Etrapay Otescay esseddray asay aay ueenqay. Aterlay onay, enwhay ehay ucceededsay inay ettinggay Ernandafay otay omecay
ackbay omehay, eshay avegay inay otay ishay urgesay inay ethay everfay ofay econciliationray, utbay eshay ouldcay otnay ivegay imhay ethay
eposeray ehay adhay eameddray aboutay enwhay ehay entway otay etchfay erhay inay ethay itycay ithway ethay irty-twothay elfriesbay.
Aurelianoay Egundosay oundfay onlyay aay eepday eelingfay ofay esolationday inay erhay. Oneay ightnay, aay ortshay imetay eforebay
eirthay irstfay ildchay asway ornbay, Ernandafay ealizedray atthay erhay usbandhay adhay eturnedray inay ecretsay otay ethay edbay ofay
Etrapay Otescay.

at’s“Thay atwhay appened,”hay ehay admitteday. Anday ehay explaineday inay aay onetay ofay ostratedpray esignationray: I“ay
adhay otay oday itay osay atthay ethay animalsay ouldway eepkay onay eeding.”bray

Ehay eedednay aay ittlelay imetay otay onvincecay erhay aboutay uchsay aay angestray expedientay, utbay enwhay ehay inallyfay idday osay
ybay eansmay ofay oofspray atthay eemedsay irrefutableay, ethay onlyay omisepray atthay Ernandafay emandedday omfray imhay
asway atthay ehay ouldshay otnay ebay urprisedsay ybay eathday inay ishay oncubine’scay edbay. Inay atthay ayway ethay eethray ofay emthay
ontinuedcay ivinglay ithoutway otheringbay eachay otheray. Aurelianoay Egundosay, unctualpay anday ovinglay ithway othbay ofay
emthay. Etrapay Otescay, uttingstray ecausebay ofay ethay econciliationray, anday Ernandafay, etendingpray atthay eshay idday otnay
owknay ethay uthtray.

Ethay actpay idday otnay ucceedsay, oweverhay, inay incorporatingay Ernandafay intoay ethay amilyfay. Ursulaay insisteday inay
ainvay atthay eshay aketay offay ethay oolenway uffray ichwhay eshay ouldway avehay onay enwhay eshay otgay upay omfray akingmay ovelay
anday ichwhay ademay ethay eighborsnay isperwhay. Eshay ouldcay otnay onvincecay erhay otay useay ethay athroombay oray ethay
ightnay avatorylay anday ellsay ethay oldgay amberpotchay otay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay osay atthay ehay ouldcay onvertcay
itay intoay ittlelay ishesfay. Amarantaay eltfay osay uncomfortableay ithway erhay efectiveday ictionday anday erhay abithay ofay usingay
euphemismsay otay esignateday everythingay atthay eshay ouldway alwaysay eakspay ibberishgay inay ontfray ofay erhay.

ifisif.”“Thay eshay ouldway aysay, ifisif“ay onefosay ofosifay ofosifthay osufuwhay antantantcay atantandstay efesefthay
ufumellusmay ofosifay erisirthay owfisownay ifisifit.”shay

Oneay ayday, irritateday ybay ethay ockerymay, Ernandafay antedway otay owknay atwhay Amarantaay asway ayingsay, anday eshay
idday otnay useay euphemismsay inay answeringay erhay.

I“ay asway aying,”say eshay oldtay erhay, at“thay you’reay oneay ofay osethay eoplepay owhay ixmay upay eirthay assay anday eirthay
ashes.”ay

Omfray atthay imetay onay eythay idday otnay eakspay otay eachay otheray againay. Enwhay ircumstancescay emandedday itay eythay
ouldway endsay otesnay. Inay itespay ofay ethay isiblevay ostilityhay ofay ethay amilyfay, Ernandafay idday otnay ivegay upay erhay ivedray otay
imposeay ethay ustomscay ofay erhay ancestorsay. Eshay utpay anay enday otay ethay ustomcay ofay eatingay inay ethay itchenkay anday
eneverwhay anyoneay asway ungryhay, anday eshay imposeday ethay obligationay ofay oingday itay atay egularray ourshay atay ethay
argelay abletay inay ethay iningday oomray, overedcay ithway aay inenlay othclay anday ithway ilversay andlestickscay anday abletay
ervicesay. Ethay olemnitysay ofay anay actay ichwhay Ursulaay adhay onsideredcay ethay ostmay implesay oneay ofay ailyday ifelay
eatedcray aay ensetay atmosphereay againstay ichwhay ethay ilentsay Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay ebelledray eforebay anyoneay
elseay. Utbay ethay ustomcay asway imposeday, ethay amesay asay atthay ofay ecitingray ethay osaryray eforebay innerday, anday itay ewdray
ethay attentionay ofay ethay eighborsnay, owhay oonsay eadspray ethay umorray atthay ethay Uendiasbay idday otnay itsay ownday otay ethay
abletay ikelay otheray ortalsmay utbay adhay angedchay ethay actay ofay eatingay intoay aay indkay ofay ighhay assmay. Evenay Ursula’say
uperstitionssay, ithway originsay atthay amecay oremay omfray anay inspirationay ofay ethay omentmay anthay omfray aditiontray,
amecay intoay onflictcay ithway osethay ofay Ernandafay, owhay adhay inheriteday emthay omfray erhay arentspay anday eptkay emthay
efinedday anday ataloguedcay orfay everyay occasionay. Asay onglay asay Ursulaay adhay ullfay useay ofay erhay acultiesfay omesay ofay
ethay olday ustomscay urvivedsay anday ethay ifelay ofay ethay amilyfay eptkay omesay ualityqay ofay erhay impulsivenessay, utbay enwhay
eshay ostlay erhay ightsay anday ethay eightway ofay erhay yearsay elegatedray erhay otay aay ornercay, ethay irclecay ofay igidityray egunbay ybay
Ernandafay omfray ethay omentmay eshay arriveday inallyfay osedclay ompletelycay anday onay oneay utbay eshay eterminedday ethay
estinyday ofay ethay amilyfay. Ethay usinessbay inay astriespay anday allsmay andycay animalsay atthay Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay
adhay eptkay upay ecausebay ofay Ursula’say ishesway asway onsideredcay anay unworthyay activityay ybay Ernandafay anday eshay
ostlay onay imetay inay uttingpay aay opstay otay itay. Ethay oorsday ofay ethay ousehay, ideway openay omfray awnday untilay edtimebay.






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


ereway osedclay uringday iestasay imetay underay ethay etextpray atthay ethay unsay eatedhay upay ethay edroomsbay anday inay ethay enday
eythay ereway osedclay orfay oodgay. Ethay aloeay anchbray anday oaflay ofay eadbray atthay adhay eenbay anginghay overay ethay oorday
incesay ethay aysday ofay ethay oundingfay ereway eplacedray ybay aay ichenay ithway ethay Acredsay Earthay ofay Esusjay. Olonelcay
Aurelianoay, Uendiabay ecamebay awareay omehowsay ofay osethay angeschay anday oresawfay eirthay onsequencescay.
e’re“Way ecomingbay eoplepay ofay uality,”qay ehay otestedpray. At“ay isthay ateray e’llway enday upay ightingfay againstay ethay
Onservativecay egimeray againay, utbay isthay imetay otay installay aay ingkay inay itsay ace.”play Ernandafay eryvay actfullytay iedtray
otnay otay osscray Irisay athpay. Ithinway erselfhay eshay asway otheredbay ybay ishay independentay iritspay ishay esistanceray otay allay
indskay ofay ocialsay igidityray. Eshay asway exasperateday ybay ishay ugsmay ofay offeecay atay ivefay inay ethay orningmay, ethay
isorderday ofay ishay orkshopway, ishay ayedfray anketblay, anday ishay ustomcay ofay ittingsay inay ethay eetstray oorday atay uskday. Utbay
eshay adhay otay oleratetay atthay oneay ooselay iecepay inay ethay amilyfay achinerymay ecausebay eshay asway uresay atthay ethay olday
olonelcay asway anay animalay owhay adhay eenbay amedtay ybay ethay yearsay anday ybay isappointmentday anday owhay, inay aay urstbay
ofay enilesay ebellionray, asway uiteqay apablecay ofay uprootingay ethay oundationsfay ofay ethay ousehay. Enwhay erhay usbandhay
ecidedday otay ivegay eirthay irstfay onsay ethay amenay ofay Irisay eat-grandfathergray, eshay idday otnay areday opposeay imhay
ecausebay eshay adhay eenbay erethay onlyay aay yearay. Utbay enwhay ethay irstfay aughterday asway ombay eshay expresseday erhay
unreserveday eterminationday otay amenay erhay Enataray afteray erhay othermay. Ursulaay adhay ecidedday otay allcay erhay
Emediosray. Afteray aay ensetay argumentay, inay ichwhay Aurelianoay Egundosay acteday asay ethay aughinglay o-betweengay,
eythay aptizedbay erhay ithway ethay amenay Enataray Emediosray, utbay Ernandafay entway onay allingcay erhay ustjay Enataray
ilewhay erhay usband’shay amilyfay anday everyoneay inay owntay alledcay erhay Ememay, aay iminutiveday ofay Emediosray.

Atay irstfay Ernandafay idday otnay alktay aboutay erhay amilyfay, utbay inay imetay eshay eganbay otay idealizeay erhay atherfay. Eshay
okespay ofay imhay atay ethay abletay asay anay exceptionalay eingbay owhay adhay enouncedray allay ormsfay ofay anityvay anday asway onay
ishay ayway otay ecomingbay aay aintsay. Aurelianoay Egundosay, artledstay atay atthay unbridleday orificationglay ofay ishay atherfay-
in-laway, ouldcay otnay esistray ethay emptationtay otay akemay allsmay okesjay ehindbay ishay ife’sway ackbay. Ethay estray ofay ethay
amilyfay ollowedfay ishay exampleay. Evenay Ursulaay, owhay asway extremelyay arefulcay otay eservepray amilyfay armonyhay
anday owhay ufferedsay inay ecretsay omfray ethay omesticday ictionfray, onceay alloweday erselfhay ethay ibertylay ofay ayingsay atthay
erhay ittlelay eat-great-grandsongray adhay ishay ontificalpay uturefay assureday ecausebay ehay asway e“thay andsongray ofay aay
aintsay anday ethay onsay ofay aay ueenqay anday aay ustler.”ray Inay itespay ofay atthay onspiracycay ofay ilessmay, ethay ildrenchay ecamebay
accustomeday otay inkthay ofay eirthay andfathergray asay aay egendarylay eingbay owhay otewray emthay iouspay ersesvay inay ishay
etterslay anday everyay Istmaschray entsay emthay aay oxbay ofay iftsgay atthay arelybay ittedfay oughthray ethay outsideay oorday.
Actuallyay eythay ereway ethay astlay emainsray ofay ishay ordlylay inheritanceay. Eythay useday emthay otay uildbay anay altaray ofay ifelay-
izesay aintssay inay ethay ildren’schay edroombay, aintssay ithway assglay eyesay atthay avegay emthay aay isquietinglyday ifelikelay
ooklay, osewhay artisticallyay embroidereday othingclay asway etterbay anthay atthay ornway ybay anyay inhabitantay ofay Aconmay-
oday. Ittlelay ybay ittlelay ethay unerealfay endorsplay ofay ethay ancientay anday icyay ansionmay asway eingbay ansformedtray intoay
ethay endorsplay ofay ethay Ousehay ofay Uendiabay. ey’ve“Thay alreadyay entsay usay ethay olewhay amilyfay emetery,”cay
Aurelianoay Egundosay ommentedcay oneay ayday. All“ay eway eednay ownay areay ethay eepingway illowsway anday ethay
ombstones.”tay Althoughay othingnay everay arriveday inay ethay oxesbay atthay ethay ildrenchay ouldcay ayplay ithway, eythay
ouldway endspay allay yearay aitingway orfay Ecemberday ecausebay, afteray allay, ethay antiqueay anday alwaysay unpredictableay
iftsgay ereway omethingsay, ewnay inay ethay ousehay. Onay ethay enthtay Istmaschray, enwhay ittlelay Osejay Arcadioay asway
ettinggay eadyray otay ogay otay ethay eminarysay, ethay enormousay oxbay omfray eirthay andfathergray arriveday earlieray anthay
usualay, ailednay ighttay anday otectedpray ithway itchpay, anday addresseday inay ethay usualay Othicgay etterslay otay ethay Eryvay
Istinguishedday Adylay Onaday Ernandafay elday Arpiocay eday Uendiabay. Ilewhay eshay eadray ethay etterlay inay erhay oomray ethay
ildrenchay astenedhay otay openay ethay oxbay. Aideday asay asway ustomarycay ybay Aurelianoay Egundosay, eythay okebray ethay
ealssay, openeday ethay overcay, ooktay outay ethay otectivepray awdustsay, anday oundfay insideay aay onglay eadlay estchay osedclay
ybay oppercay oltsbay. Aurelianoay Egundosay ooktay outay ethay eightay oltsbay asay ethay ildrenchay atchedway impatientlyay,
anday ehay arelybay adhay imetay otay ivegay aay ycray anday ushpay ethay ildrenchay asideay enwhay ebay aisedray ethay eadlay overcay anday
awsay Onday Ernandofay, esseddray inay ackblay anday ithway aay ucifixcray onay ishay estchay, Irisay inskay okenbray outay inay
estilentialpay oressay anday ookingcay owlyslay inay aay othyfray ewstay ithway ubblesbay ikelay ivelay earlspay.

Aay ortshay imetay afteray ethay irthbay ofay eirthay aughterday, ethay unexpecteday ubileejay orfay Olonelcay Aurelianoay,
Uendiabay, ordereday ybay ethay overnmentgay otay elebratecay anotheray anniversaryay ofay ethay Eatytray ofay Eerlandianay,

asway announceday. Itay asway aay ecisionday osay outay ofay inelay ithway officialay olicypay atthay ethay olonelcay okespay outay
iolentlyvay againstay itay anday ejectedray ethay omagehay. It’s“ay ethay irstfay imetay I’veay everay eardhay ofay ethay ordway ubilee,’‘jay
 ehay aidsay. ut“Bay ateverwhay itay eansmay, itay ashay otay ebay aay ick.”tray Ethay allsmay oldsmithgay opshay asway illedfay ithway
emissariesay. Uchmay olderay anday oremay olemnsay, ethay awyerslay inay arkday uitssay owhay inay otheray aysday adhay appedflay
aboutay ethay olonelcay ikelay owscray adhay eturnedray. Enwhay ehay awsay emthay appearay ethay amesay asay ethay otheray imetay,
enwhay eythay amecay otay utpay aay opstay otay ethay arway, ehay ouldcay otnay earbay ethay ynicismcay ofay eirthay aisepray. Ehay ordereday
emthay otay eavelay imhay inay eacepay, insistingay atthay ehay asway otnay aay erohay ofay ethay ationnay asay eythay aidsay utbay anay artisanay
ithoutway emoriesmay osewhay onlyay eamdray asway otay ieday ofay atiguefay inay ethay oblivionay anday iserymay ofay ishay ittlelay
oldgay ishesfay. Atwhay ademay imhay ostmay indignantay asway ethay ordway atthay ethay esidentpray ofay ethay epublicray imselfhay
annedplay otay ebay esentpray atay ethay eremoniescay inay Acondomay inay orderay otay ecorateday imhay ithway ethay Orderay ofay
Eritmay. Olonelcay Aurelianoay, Uendfabay adhay imhay oldtay, ordway orfay ordway, atthay ehay asway eagerlyay awaitingay atthay
ardytay utbay eservedday occasionay inay orderay otay aketay aay otshay atay imhay, otnay asay aymentpay orfay ethay arbitraryay actsay anday
anachronismsay ofay ishay egimeray, utbay orfay ishay acklay ofay espectray orfay anay olday anmay owhay adhay otnay oneday anyoneay anyay
armhay. Uchsay asway ethay ehemencevay ithway ichwhay ehay ademay ethay eatthray atthay ethay esidentpray ofay ethay epublicray
anceledcay ishay iptray atay ethay astlay omentmay anday entsay ethay ecorationday ithway aay ersonalpay epresentativeray. Olonelcay
Erineldogay Arquezmay, esiegedbay ybay essurespray ofay allay indskay, eftlay ishay edbay ofay aay aralyticpay inay orderay otay ersuadepay
ishay ormerfay ompanioncay inay armsay. Enwhay ethay atterlay awsay ethay ockingray airchay arriedcay ybay ourfay enmay appearay
anday awsay ethay iendfray owhay adhay aredshay ishay ictoriesvay anday efeatsday incesay youthay ittingsay inay itay amongay omesay
argelay illowspay, ehay idday otnay avehay aay inglesay oubtday utbay atthay ehay asway akingmay atthay effortay inay orderay otay expressay
ishay olidaritysay. Utbay enwhay ehay iscoveredday ethay ealray otivemay orfay ishay isitvay ehay adhay emthay aketay imhay outay ofay ethay
orkshopway.

ow“Nay I’may onvincedcay ootay ate,”lay ehay oldtay imhay, at“thay Iay ouldway avehay oneday youay aay eatgray avorfay ifay I’day etlay
emthay ootshay you.”ay

Osay ethay ubileejay asway elebratedcay ithoutway ethay attendanceay ofay anyay embersmay ofay ethay amilyfay. Ancechay adhay itay
atthay itay alsoay oincidedcay ithway arnivalcay eekway, utbay onay oneay ouldcay etgay ethay ubbornstay ideaay outay ofay Olonelcay
Aurelianoay Uendia’sbay eadhay atthay ethay oincidencecay adhay eenbay oreseenfay ybay ethay overnmentgay inay orderay otay
eightenhay ethay eltycmay ofay ethay ockerymay. Omfray ishay onelylay orkshopway ehay ouldcay earhay ethay artialmay usicmay, ethay
artilleryay alutessay, ethay ollingtay ofay ethay Etay Eumday, anday aay ewfay asesphray ofay ethay eechesspay eliveredday inay ontfray ofay
ethay ousehay asay eythay amednay ethay eetstray afteray imhay. Ishay eyesay ewgray oistmay ithway indignationay, ithway angryay
impotenceay, anday orfay ethay irstfay imetay incesay ishay efeatday itay ainedpay imhay otnay otay avehay ethay engthstray ofay youthay osay
atthay ehay ouldcay eginbay aay oodyblay arway atthay ouldway ipeway outay ethay astlay estigesvay ofay ethay Onservativecay egimeray.
Ethay echoesay ofay ethay omagehay adhay otnay iedday ownday enwhay Ursulaay ockedknay atay ethay orkshopway oorday.

on’t“Day otherbay e,”may ehay aidsay. I’m“ay usy.”bay

Open“ay up,”ay Ursulaay insisteday inay aay ormalnay oicevay. is“Thay ashay othingnay otay oday ithway ethay elebration.”cay

Enthay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay ooktay ownday ethay arbay anday awsay atay ethay oorday eventeensay enmay ofay ethay
ostmay ariedvay appearanceay, ofay allay ypestay anday olorscay, utbay allay ithway aay olitarysay airay atthay ouldway avehay eenbay
enoughay otay identifyay emthay anywhereay onay earthay. Eythay ereway ishay onssay. Ithoutway anyay eviouspray agreementay,
ithoutway owingknay eachay otheray, eythay adhay arriveday omfray ethay ostmay istantday ornerscay ofay ethay oastcay, aptivatedcay
ybay ethay alktay ofay ethay ubileejay. Eythay allay orebay ithway idepray ethay amenay Aurelianoay anday ethay astlay amenay ofay eirthay
othersmay. Ethay eethray aysday atthay eythay ayedstay inay ethay ousehay, otay ethay atisfactionsay ofay Ursulaay anday ethay andalscay
ofay Ernandafay, ereway ikelay aay atestay arway. Amarantaay earchedsay amongay olday aperspay orfay ethay edgerlay erewhay Ursulaay
adhay ittenwray ownday ethay amesnay anday irthbay anday aptismbay atesday ofay allay ofay emthay, anday esidebay ethay acespay orfay
eachay oneay eshay addeday ishay esentpray addressay. Atthay istlay ouldcay ellway avehay ervedsay asay aay ecapitulationray ofay entytway
yearsay ofay arway. Omfray itay ethay octurnalnay itineraryay ofay ethay olonelcay omfray ethay awnday ehay eftlay Acondomay atay ethay
eadhay ofay enty-onetway enmay onay ishay ayway otay aay ancifulfay ebellionray untilay ehay eturnedray orfay ethay astlay imetay
appedwray inay aay anketblay iffstay ithway oodblay ouldcay avehay eenbay econstructedray. Aurelianoay Egundosay idday otnay etlay
ethay ancechay ogay ybay otay egaleray ishay ousinscay ithway aay underousthay ampagnechay anday accordionay artypay atthay asway
interpreteday asay aay ardytay adjustmentay ofay accountsay ithway ethay arnivalcay, ichwhay entway awryay ecausebay ofay ethay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


ubileejay. Eythay ashedsmay alfhay ofay ethay ishesday, eythay estroyedday ethay oseray ushesbay asay eythay asedchay aay ullbay eythay
ereway yingtray otay og-tiehay, eythay illedkay ethay enshay ybay ootingshay emthay, eythay ademay Amarantaay anceday ethay adsay
altzesway ofay Ietropay Espicray, eythay otgay Emediosray ethay Eautybay otay utpay onay aay airpay ofay en’smay antspay anday imbclay aay
easedgray olepay, anday inay ethay iningday oomray eythay urnedtay ooselay aay igpay aubedday ithway ardlay, ichwhay ostratedpray
Ernandafay, utbay onay oneay egrettedray ethay estructionday ecausebay ethay ousehay ookshay ithway aay ealthyhay earthquakeay.
Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay owhay atay irstfay eceivedray emthay ithway istrustmay anday evenay oubtedday ethay arentagepay
ofay omesay, asway amuseday ybay eirthay ildnessway, anday eforebay eythay eftlay ehay avegay eachay oneay aay ittlelay oldgay ishfay. Evenay
ethay ithdrawnway Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay offereday emthay anay afternoonay ofay ockfightscay, ichwhay asway atay ethay
ointpay ofay endingay inay agedytray ecausebay everalsay ofay ethay Aurelianosay ereway osay expertay inay attersmay ofay ethay ockpitcay
atthay eythay ottedspay Atherfay Antonioay Isabel’say ickstray atay onceay. Aurelianoay Egundosay, owhay awsay ethay imitlesslay
ospectpray ofay ildway imestay offereday ybay osethay admay elativesray, ecidedday atthay eythay ouldshay allay aystay anday orkway orfay
imhay. Ethay onlyay oneay owhay accepteday asway Aurelianoay Istetray, aay igbay ulattomay ithway ethay ivedray anday explorer’say
iritspay ofay ishay andfathergray. Iefay adhay alreadyay estedtay ishay ortunefay inay alfhay ethay orldway anday itay idday otnay attermay otay
imhay erewhay ehay ayedstay. Ethay othersay, evenay oughthay eythay ereway unmarrieday, onsideredcay eirthay estiniesday
establisheday. Eythay ereway allay illfulskay aftsmencray, ethay enmay ofay eirthay ouseshay, eace-lovingpay eoplepay. Ethay Ashay
Ednesdayway eforebay eythay entway ackbay otay atterscay outay alongay ethay oastcay, Amarantaay otgay emthay otay utpay onay
Undaysay othesclay anday accompanyay erhay otay urchchay. Oremay amuseday anthay evoutday, eythay etlay emselvesthay ebay edlay
otay ethay altaray ailray erewhay Atherfay Antonioay Isabelay ademay ethay ignsay ofay ethay osscray inay ashesay onay emthay. Ackbay atay
ethay ousehay, enwhay ethay youngestay iedtray otay eanclay ishay oreheadfay, ehay iscoveredday atthay ethay arkmay asway indelibleay
anday osay ereway osethay ofay ishay othersbray. Eythay iedtray oapsay anday aterway, earthay anday aay ubbingscray ushbray, anday astlylay
aay umicepay onestay anday yelay, utbay eythay ouldcay otnay emoveray ethay ossescray. Onay ethay otheray andhay, Amarantaay anday
ethay othersay owhay adhay onegay otay assmay ooktay itay offay ithoutway anyay oubletray. It’s“ay etterbay atthay ay,”way Ursulaay
atedstay asay eshay aidsay oodbyegay otay emthay. om“Fray ownay onay everyoneay illway owknay owhay youay are.”ay Eythay entway offay
inay aay ooptray, ecededpray ybay aay andbay ofay usiciansmay anday ootingshay offay ireworksfay, anday eythay eftlay ehindbay inay ethay
owntay anay impressionay atthay ethay Uendiabay inelay adhay enoughay eedsay orfay anymay enturiescay. Aurelianoay Istetray,
ithway ethay osscray ofay ashesay onay ishay oreheadfay, etsay upay onay ethay edgeay ofay owntay ethay iceay actoryfay atthay Osejay Arcadioay
Uendiabay adhay eameddray ofay inay ishay inventiveay eliriumday.

Omesay onthsmay afteray ishay arrivalay, enwhay ehay asway alreadyay ell-knownway anday ell-likedway, Aurelianoay Istetray
entway aboutay ookinglay orfay aay ousehay osay atthay ehay ouldcay endsay orfay ishay othermay anday anay unmarrieday istersay o(whay
asway otnay ethay olonel’scay aughter)day, anday ehay ecamebay interesteday inay ethay un-downray igbay ousehay atthay ookedlay
abandoneday onay aay ornercay ofay ethay uaresqay. Iefay askeday owhay owneday itay. Omeonesay oldtay imhay atthay itay idday otnay
elongbay otay anyoneay, atthay inay ormerfay imestay aay olitarysay idowway owhay edfay onay earthay anday itewashwhay omfray ethay
allsway adhay ivedlay erethay, anday atthay inay erhay astlay yearsay eshay asway eensay onlyay icetway onay ethay eetstray ithway aay athay ofay
inytay artificialay owersflay anday oesshay ethay olorcay ofay olday ilversay enwhay eshay ossedcray ethay uaresqay otay ethay ostpay officeay
otay ailmay aay etterlay otay ethay Ishopbay. Eythay oldtay imhay atthay erhay onlyay ompanioncay asway aay itilesspay ervantsay omanway
owhay illedkay ogsday anday atscay anday anyay animalay atthay otgay intoay ethay ousehay anday ewthray eirthay orpsescay intoay ethay
iddlemay ofay ethay eetstray inay orderay otay annoyay eoplepay ithway ethay ottenray enchstay. Osay uchmay imetay adhay assedpay incesay
ethay unsay adhay ummifiedmay ethay emptyay inskay ofay ethay astlay animalay atthay everybodyay ooktay itay orfay antedgray atthay ethay
adylay ofay ethay ousehay anday ethay aidmay adhay iedday onglay eforebay ethay arsway ereway overay, anday atthay ifay ethay ousehay asway
illstay andingstay itay asway ecausebay inay ecentray yearsay erethay adhay otnay eenbay aay oughray interway oray estructiveday indway.
Ethay ingeshay adhay edcmmblay ithway mst,ay ethay oorsday ereway eldhay upay onlyay ybay oudsclay ofay obwebscay, ethay indowsway
ereway olderedsay utshay ybay ampnessday, anday ethay oorflay asway okenbray ybay assgray anday ildflowersway anday inay ethay
ackscray izardslay anday allay annermay ofay erminvay adhay eirthay estsnay, allay ofay ichwhay eemedsay otay onfirmcay ethay otionnay
atthay erethay adhay otnay eenbay aay umanhay eingbay erethay orfay atay eastlay alfhay aay enturycay. Ethay impulsiveay Aurelianoay
Istetray idday otnay eednay uchsay oofpray otay oceedpray. Iefay ushedpay onay ethay ainmay oorday ithway ishay ouldershay anday ethay
orm-eatenway oodenway amefray ellfay ownday oiselesslynay amiday aay ullday ataclysmcay ofay ustday anday ermitetay estsnay.
Aurelianoay Istetray oodstay onay ethay esholdthray aitingway orfay ethay ustday otay earclay anday enthay ehay awsay inay ethay entercay ofay
ethay oomray ethay ualidsqay omanway, illstay esseddray inay othingclay ofay ethay astpay enturycay, ithway aay ewfay yelloway eadsthray






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


onay erhay aldbay eadhay, anday ithway otway argelay eyesay, illstay eautifulbay, inay ichwhay ethay astlay arsstay ofay opehay adhay onegay
outay, anday ethay inskay ofay erhay acefay asway inkledwray ybay ethay aridityay ofay olitudesay. Akenshay ybay atthay isionvay omfray
anotheray orldway, Aurelianoay Istetray arelybay oticednay atthay ethay omanway asway aimingay anay antiquateday istolpay atay
imhay.

I“ay egbay youray ardon,”pay ehay urmuredmay.

Eshay emainedray otionlessmay inay ethay entercay ofay ethay oomray illedfay ithway ickknacksknay, examiningay inchay ybay
inchay ethay iantgay ithway uaresqay ouldersshay anday ithway aay attootay ofay ashesay onay ishay oreheadfay, anday oughthray ethay
azehay ofay ustday eshay awsay imhay inay ethay azehay ofay otheray imestay ithway aay ouble-barreledday otgunshay onay ishay ouldershay
anday aay ingstray ofay abbitsray inay ishay andhay.

or“Fay ethay ovelay ofay Od,”gay eshay aidsay inay aay owlay oicevay, it’say otnay ightray orfay emthay otay omecay otay emay ithway atthay
emorymay ow.”nay

I“ay antway otay entray ethay ouse,”hay Aurelianoay Istetray aidsay.

Ethay omanway enthay aisedray ethay istolpay, aimingay ithway aay irmfay istwray atay ethay osscray ofay ashesay, anday eshay eldhay ethay
iggertray ithway aay eterminationday againstay ichwhay erethay asway onay appealay.

et“Gay out,”ay eshay ordereday.

Atthay ightnay atay innerday Aurelianoay Istetray oldtay ethay amilyfay aboutay ethay episodeay anday Ursulaay eptway ithway
onsternationcay. oly“Hay Od!”gay eshay exclaimeday, utchingclay erhay eadhay ithway erhay andshay. e’s“Shay illstay alive!”ay
Imetay, arsway, ethay ountlesscay everydayay isastersday adhay ademay erhay orgetfay aboutay Ebecaray. Ethay onlyay oneay owhay
adhay otnay ostlay orfay aay inglesay inutemay ethay awarenessay atthay eshay asway aliveay anday ottingray inay erhay ormholeway asway
ethay implacableay anday agingay Amarantaay. Eshay oughtthay ofay erhay atay awnday, enwhay ethay iceay ofay erhay earthay awakeneday
erhay inay erhay olitarysay edbay, anday eshay oughtthay ofay erhay enwhay eshay oapedsay erhay itheredway eastsbray anday erhay eanlay
omachstay, anday enwhay eshay utpay onay ethay itewhay iff-starchedstay etticoatspay anday orsetscay ofay olday ageay, anday enwhay
eshay angedchay ethay ackblay andagebay ofay erribletay expiationay onay erhay andhay. Alwaysay, atay everyay omentmay, asleepay
anday awakeay, uringday ethay ostmay ublimesay anday ostmay abjectay omentsmay, Amarantaay oughtthay aboutay Ebecaray,
ecausebay olitudesay adhay ademay aay electionsay inay erhay emorymay anday adhay urnedbay ethay immingday ilespay ofay ostalgicnay
asteway atthay ifelay adhay accumulateday inay erhay earthay, anday adhay urifiedpay, agnifiedmay anday eternalizeday ethay othersay,
ethay ostmay itterbay onesay. Emediosray ethay Eautybay ewknay aboutay Ebeca’sray existenceay omfray erhay. Everyay imetay eythay
assedpay ethay un-downray ousehay eshay ouldway elltay erhay aboutay anay unpleasantay incidentay, aay aletay ofay atehay, yingtray inay
atthay ayway otay akemay erhay extendeday ancorray ebay aredshay ybay erhay iecenay anday onsequentlycay olongedpray eyondbay
eathday, utbay erhay anplay idday otnay orkway ecausebay Emediosray asway immuneay otay anyay indkay ofay assionatepay eelingsfay
anday uchmay esslay otay osethay ofay othersay. Ursulaay, onay ethay otheray andhay, owhay adhay ufferedsay oughthray aay ocesspray
oppositeay otay Amaranta’say, ecalledray Ebecaray ithway aay emorymay eefray ofay impuritiesay, orfay ethay imageay ofay ethay
itifulpay ildchay oughtbray otay ethay ousehay ithway ethay agbay ontainingcay erhay arents’pay onesbay evailedpray overay ethay
offenseay atthay adhay ademay erhay unworthyay otay ebay onnectedcay otay ethay amilyfay eetray anyay ongerlay. Aurelianoay
Egundosay ecidedday atthay eythay ouldway avehay otay ingbray erhay otay ethay ousehay anday aketay arecay ofay erhay, utbay ishay oodgay
intentionsay ereway ustratedfray ybay ethay irmfay intransigenceay ofay Ebecaray, owhay adhay eedednay anymay yearsay ofay
ufferingsay anday iserymay inay orderay otay attainay ethay ivilegespray ofay olitudesay anday owhay asway otnay isposedday otay
enounceray emthay inay exchangeay orfay anay olday ageay isturbedday ybay ethay alsefay attractionsay ofay aritychay.

Inay Ebruaryfay, enwhay ethay ixteensay onssay ofay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendfabay eturnedray, illstay arkedmay ithway ethay
osscray ofay ashesay, Aurelianoay Istetray okespay otay emthay aboutay Ebecaray inay ethay umulttay ofay ethay elebrationcay anday inay
alfhay aay ayday eythay estoredray ethay appearanceay ofay ethay ousehay, angingchay oorsday anday indowsway, aintingpay ethay
ontfray ithway aygay olorscay, acingbray allsway anday ouringpay eshfray ementcay onay ethay oorflay, utbay eythay ouldcay otnay etgay
anyay authorizationay otay ontinuecay ethay orkway insideay. Ebecaray idday otnay evenay omecay otay ethay oorday. Eshay etlay emthay
inishfay ethay admay estorationray, enthay alculatedcay atwhay itay adhay ostcay anday entsay Argenidaay, erhay olday ervantsay owhay
asway illstay ithway erhay, otay emthay ithway aay andfulhay ofay oinscay atthay adhay eenbay ithdrawnway omfray irculationcay afteray
ethay astlay arway anday atthay Ebecaray oughtthay ereway illstay orthway omethingsay itay asway enthay atthay eythay awsay otay atwhay aay
antasticfay ointpay erhay eparationsay omfray ethay orldway adhay arriveday anday eythay understooday atthay itay ouldway ebay
impossibleay otay escueray erhay omfray erhay ubbornstay enclosureay ilewhay eshay illstay adhay aay eathbray ofay ifelay inay erhay.
