Onay ethay econdsay isitvay ybay ethay onssay ofay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay otay Acondomay, anotheray ofay emthay,
Aurelianoay Entenocay, ayedstay onay otay orkway ithway Aurelianoay Istetray. Ehay asway oneay ofay ethay irstfay owhay adhay eenbay
oughtbray otay ethay ousehay orfay aptismbay anday Ursulaay anday Amarantaay ememberedray imhay eryvay ellway ecausebay inay aay
ewfay ourshay ehay adhay estroyedday everyay eakablebray objectay atthay assedpay oughthray ishay andshay. Imetay adhay
oderatedmay ishay earlyay impulseay orfay owthgray anday ehay asway aay anmay ofay averageay eighthay arkedmay ybay allpoxsmay
arsscay, utbay ishay amazingay owerpay orfay anualmay estructionday emainedray intactay. Ehay okebray osay anymay atesplay, evenay
ithoutway ouchingtay emthay, atthay Ernandafay ecidedday otay uybay imhay aay etsay ofay ewterwarepay eforebay ehay idday awayay
ithway ethay astlay iecespay ofay erhay expensiveay inachay, anday evenay ethay esistantray etalmay atesplay ereway oonsay entedday anday
istedtway. Utbay otay akemay upay orfay atthay irremediableay owerpay, ichwhay asway exasperatingay evenay orfay imhay, ehay adhay aay
ordialitycay atthay onway ethay immediateay onfidencecay ofay othersay anday aay upendousstay apacitycay orfay orkway. Inay aay
ortshay imetay ehay adhay increaseday ethay oductionpray ofay iceay otay uchsay aay egreeday atthay itay asway ootay uchmay orfay ethay ocallay
arketmay anday Aurelianoay Istetray adhay otay inkthay aboutay ethay ossibilitypay ofay expandingay ethay usinessbay otay otheray
ownstay inay ethay ampsway. Itay asway enthay atthay ehay oughtthay ofay ethay ecisiveday epstay, otnay onlyay orfay ethay odernizationmay
ofay ishay usinessbay utbay otay inklay ethay owntay ithway ethay estray ofay ethay orldway.

e“Way avehay otay ingbray inay ethay ailroad,”ray ehay aidsay.

Atthay asway ethay irstfay imetay atthay ethay ordway adhay everay eenbay eardhay inay Acondomay. Ookinglay atay ethay etchskay
atthay Aurelianoay Istetray ewdray onay ethay abletay anday atthay asway aay irectday escendentday ofay ethay ansplay ithway ichwhay
Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay adhay illustrateday ishay ojectpray orfay olarsay arfareway, Ursulaay onfirmedcay erhay impressionay
atthay imetay asway oinggay inay aay irclecay. Utbay unlikeay ishay orebearfay, Aurelianoay Istetray idday otnay oselay anyay eepslay oray
appetiteay ornay idday ehay ormenttay anyoneay ithway isescray ofay illay umorhay, utbay ehay onsideredcay ethay ostmay arebrainedhay
ofay ojectspray asay immediateay ossibilitiespay, ademay ationalray alculationscay aboutay ostscay anday atesday, anday oughtbray
emthay offay ithoutway anyay intermediateay exasperationay. Ifay Aurelianoay Egundosay adhay omethingsay ofay ishay eat¬gray
andfathergray inay imhay anday ackedlay omethingsay ofay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay, itay asway anay absoluteay
indifferenceay otay ockerymay, anday ehay avegay ethay oneymay otay ingbray ethay ailroadray ithway ethay amesay ightheartedlay airay
ithway ichwhay ehay adhay ivengay itay orfay ishay other’sbray absurday avigationnay ojectpray. Aurelianoay Istetray onsultedcay
ethay alendarcay anday eftlay ethay ollowingfay Ednesdayway, anningplay otay eturnray afteray ethay ainsray adhay assedpay. Erethay
asway onay oremay ewsnay ofay imhay. Aurelianoay Entenocay, overwhelmeday ybay ethay abundanceay ofay ethay actoryfay, adhay
alreadyay egunbay otay experimentay ithway ethay oductionpray ofay iceay ithway aay asebay ofay uitfray uicesjay insteaday ofay aterway,
anday ithoutway owingknay itay oray inkingthay aboutay itay, ehay onceivedcay ethay essentialay undamentalsfay orfay ethay
inventionay ofay erbetshay. Inay atthay ayway ehay annedplay otay iversifyday ethay oductionpray ofay anay enterpriseay ehay
onsideredcay ishay ownay, ecausebay ishay otherbray owedshay onay ignssay ofay eturningray afteray ethay ainsray adhay assedpay anday
aay olewhay ummersay adhay onegay ybay ithway onay ewsnay ofay imhay. Atay ethay artstay ofay anotheray interway, oweverhay, aay
omanway owhay asway ashingway othesclay inay ethay iverray uringday ethay ottesthay imetay ofay ethay ayday anray eamingscray ownday
ethay ainmay eetstray inay anay alarmingay atestay ofay ommotioncay.

It’s“ay oming,”cay eshay inallyfay explaineday. omething“Say ightfulfray, ikelay aay itchenkay aggingdray aay illagevay ehindbay
it.”ay

Atay atthay omentmay ethay owntay asway akenshay ybay aay istlewhay ithway aay earfulfay echoay anday aay oudlay, antingpay
espirationray. Uringday ethay eviouspray eeksway eythay adhay eensay ethay angsgay owhay ereway ayinglay iestay anday ackstray anday
onay oneay aidpay attentionay otay emthay ecausebay eythay oughtthay itay asway omesay ewnay icktray ofay ethay ypsiesgay, omingcay
ackbay ithway istleswhay anday ambourinestay anday eirthay age-olday anday iscreditedday ongsay anday anceday aboutay ethay
ualitiesqay ofay omesay oncoctioncay utpay ogethertay ybay ourneymanjay eniusesgay ofay Erusalemjay. Utbay enwhay eythay
ecoveredray omfray ethay oisenay ofay ethay istleswhay anday ethay ortingsnay, allay ethay inhabitantsay anray outay intoay ethay eetstray
anday awsay Aurelianoay Istetray avingway omfray ethay ocomotivelay, anday inay aay ancetray eythay awsay ethay ower-bedeckedflay
aintray ichwhay asway arrivingay orfay ethay irstfay imetay eightay onthsmay atelay. Ethay innocentay yelloway aintray atthay asway otay
ingbray osay anymay ambiguitiesay anday ertaintiescay, osay anymay easantplay anday unpleasantay omentsmay, osay anymay
angeschay, alamitiescay, anday eelingsfay ofay ostalgianay otay Acondomay.


Illay

Apterchay 


AZZLEDday Ybay Osay ANYmay anday uchsay arvelousmay inventionsay, ethay eoplepay ofay Acondomay idday otnay owknay erewhay
eirthay amazementay eganbay. Eythay ayedstay upay allay ightnay ookinglay atay ethay alepay electricay ulbsbay edfay ybay ethay antplay
atthay Aurelianoay Istetray adhay oughtbray ackbay enwhay ethay aintray ademay itsay econdsay iptray, anday itay ooktay imetay anday
effortay orfay emthay otay owgray accustomeday otay itsay obsessiveay oom-toomtay. Eythay ebay. amecay indignantay overay ethay
ivinglay imagesay atthay ethay osperouspray erchantmay Obmnay Espicray ojectedpray inay ethay eaterthay ithway ethay ion-headlay
ickettay indowsway, orfay ethay aracterchay owhay adhay iedday anday asway uriedbay inay oneay ilmfay anday orfay osewhay
isfortunemay earstay ofay afflictionay adhay eenbay edshay ouldway eappearray aliveay anday ansformedtray intoay anay Arabay inay
ethay extnay oneay. Ethay audienceay, owhay aidpay otway entscay apieceay otay areshay ethay ifficultiesday ofay ethay actorsay, ouldway
otnay oleratetay atthay outlandishay audfray anday eythay okebray upay ethay eatssay. Ethay ayormay, atay ethay urgingay ofay Unobray
Espicray, explaineday inay aay oclamationpray atthay ethay inemacay asway aay achinemay ofay illusionsay atthay idday otnay eritmay ethay
emotionalay outburstsay ofay ethay audienceay. Ithway atthay iscouragingday explanationay anymay eltfay atthay eythay adhay
eenbay ethay ictimsvay ofay omesay ewnay anday owyshay ypsygay usinessbay anday eythay ecidedday otnay otay eturnray otay ethay
oviesmay, onsideringcay atthay eythay alreadyay adhay ootay anymay oublestray ofay eirthay ownay otay eepway overay ethay acted-outay
isfortunesmay ofay imaginaryay eingsbay. Omethingsay imilarsay appenedhay ithway ethay ylindercay onographsphay atthay
ethay errymay atronsmay omfray Ancefray oughtbray ithway emthay asay aay ubstitutesay orfay ethay antiquateday andhay organsay
anday atthay orfay aay imetay adhay erioussay effectsay onay ethay ivelihoodlay ofay ethay andbay ofay usiciansmay. Atay irstfay uriositycay
increaseday ethay ienteleclay onay ethay orbiddenfay eetstray anday erethay asway evenay ordway ofay espectableray adieslay owhay
isguisedday emselvesthay asay orkersway inay orderay otay observeay ethay oveltynay ofay ethay onographphay omfray irstfay andhay,
utbay omfray osay uchmay anday uchsay oseclay observationay eythay oonsay eachedray ethay onclusioncay atthay itay asway otnay anay
enchanteday illmay asay everyoneay adhay oughtthay anday asay ethay atronsmay adhay aidsay, utbay aay echanicalmay icktray atthay
ouldcay otnay ebay omparedcay ithway omethingsay osay ovingmay, osay umanhay, anday osay ullfay ofay everydayay uthtray asay aay
andbay ofay usiciansmay. Itay asway uchsay aay erioussay isappointmentday atthay enwhay onographsphay ecamebay osay opularpay
atthay erethay asway oneay inay everyay ousehay eythay ereway otnay onsideredcay objectsay orfay amusementay orfay adultsay utbay asay
omethingsay oodgay orfay ildrenchay otay aketay apartay. Onay ethay otheray andhay, enwhay omeonesay omfray ethay owntay adhay
ethay opportunityay otay esttay ethay udecray ealityray ofay ethay elephonetay installeday inay ethay ailroadray ationstay, ichwhay asway
oughtthay otay ebay aay imentarymday ersionvay ofay ethay onographphay ecausebay ofay itsay ankcray, evenay ethay ostmay
incredulousay ereway upsetay. Itay asway asay ifay Odgay adhay ecidedday otay utpay otay ethay esttay everyay apacitycay orfay urprisesay
anday asway eepingkay ethay inhabitantsay ofay Acondomay inay aay ermanentpay alternationay etweenbay excitementay anday
isappointmentday, oubtday anday evelationray, otay uchsay anay extremeay atthay onay oneay ewknay orfay ertaincay erewhay ethay
imitslay ofay ealityray aylay. Itay asway anay intricateay ewstay ofay uthstray anday iragesmay atthay onvulsedcay ethay ostghay ofay Osejay
Arcadioay Uendiabay underay ethay estnutchay eetray ithway impatienceay anday ademay imhay anderway allay oughthray ethay
ousehay evenay inay oadbray aylightday. Everay incesay ethay ailroadray adhay eenbay officiallyay inaugurateday anday adhay egunbay
otay arriveay ithway egularityray onay Ednesdaysway atay elevenay o’clockay anday ethay imitivepray oodenway ationstay ithway aay
eskday, aay elephonetay, anday aay ickettay indowway adhay eenbay uiltbay, onay ethay eetsstray ofay Acondomay enmay anday omenway
ereway eensay owhay adhay adopteday everydayay anday ormalnay ustomscay anday annersmay utbay owhay eallyray ookedlay ikelay
eoplepay outay ofay aay ircuscay. Inay aay owntay atthay adhay afedchay underay ethay ickstray ofay ethay ypsiesgay erethay asway onay uturefay
orfay osethay ambulatoryay acrobatsay ofay ommercecay owhay ithway equalay effronteryay offereday aay istlingwhay ettlekay anday
aay ailyday egimeray atthay ouldway assureay ethay alvationsay ofay ethay oulsay onay ethay eventhsay ayday; utbay omfray osethay owhay etlay
emselvesthay ebay onvincedcay outay ofay atiguefay anday ethay onesay owhay ereway alwaysay unwaryay, eythay eapedray
upendousstay enefitsbay. Amongay osethay eatricalthay eaturescray, earingway idingray eechesbray anday eggingslay, aay ithpay
elmethay anday eel-rimmedstay assesglay, ithway opaztay eyesay anday ethay inskay ofay aay inthay oosterray, erethay arriveday inay
Acondomay onay oneay ofay osay anymay Ednesdaysway ethay ubbychay anday ilingsmay Mr.ay Erberthay, owhay ateay atay ethay
ousehay.






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Onay oneay adhay oticednay imhay atay ethay abletay untilay ethay irstfay unchbay ofay ananasbay adhay eenbay eatenay. Aurelianoay
Egundosay adhay omecay acrossay imhay ybay ancechay asay ehay otestedpray Inay okenbray Anishspay ecausebay erethay ereway onay
oomsray atay ethay Otelhay Acobjay, anday asay ehay equentlyfray idday ithway angersstray, ehay ooktay imhay omehay. Ehay asway inay ethay
aptive-ballooncay usinessbay, ichwhay adhay akentay imhay alfwayhay arounday ethay orldway ithway excellentay ofitspray, utbay
ehay adhay otnay ucceededsay inay akingtay anyoneay upay inay Acondomay ecausebay eythay onsideredcay atthay inventionay
ackwardbay afteray avinghay eensay anday iedtray ethay ypsies’gay yingflay arpetscay. Ehay asway eavinglay, ereforethay, onay ethay
extnay aintray. Enwhay eythay oughtbray otay ethay abletay ethay iger-stripedtay unchbay ofay ananasbay atthay eythay ereway
accustomeday otay anghay inay ethay iningday oomray uringday unchlay, ehay ickedpay ethay irstfay iecepay ofay uitfray ithoutway eatgray
enthusiasmay. Utbay ehay eptkay onay eatingay asay ehay okespay, astingtay, ewingchay, oremay ithway ethay istractionday ofay aay iseway
anmay anthay ithway ethay elightday ofay aay oodgay eateray, anday enwhay ehay inishedfay ethay irstfay unchbay ehay askeday emthay otay
ingbray imhay anotheray. Enthay ehay ooktay aay allsmay asecay ithway opticalay instrumentsay outay ofay ethay oolboxtay atthay ehay
alwaysay arriedcay ithway imhay. Ithway ethay auspiciousay attentionay ofay aay iamondday erchantmay ehay examineday ethay
ananabay eticulouslymay, issectingday itay ithway aay ecialspay alpelscay, eighingway ethay iecespay onay aay armacist’sphay alescay,
anday alculatingcay itsay eadthbray ithway aay unsmith’sgay aliperscay. Enthay ehay ooktay aay eriessay ofay instrumentsay outay ofay
ethay estchay ithway ichwhay ehay easuredmay ethay emperaturetay, ethay evellay ofay umidityhay inay ethay atmosphereay, anday ethay
intensityay ofay ethay ightlay. Itay asway uchsay anay intriguingay eremonycay atthay onay oneay ouldcay eatay inay eacepay asay everybodyay
aitedway orfay Mr.ay Erberthay otay asspay aay inalfay anday evealingray udgmentjay, utbay ehay idday otnay aysay anythingay atthay
alloweday anyoneay otay uessgay ishay intentionsay.

Onay ethay aysday atthay ollowedfay ehay asway eensay ithway aay etnay anday aay allsmay asketbay untinghay utterfliesbay onay ethay
outskirtsay ofay owntay. Onay Ednesdayway aay oupgray ofay engineersay, agronomistsay, ydrologistshay, opographerstay,
anday urveyorssay arriveday owhay orfay everalsay eeksway exploreday ethay acesplay erewhay Mr.ay Erberthay adhay untedhay ishay
utterfliesbay. Aterlay onay Mr.ay Ackjay Ownbray arriveday inay anay extraay oachcay atthay adhay eenbay oupledcay ontoay ethay yelloway
aintray anday atthay asway ilver-platedsay allay overay, ithway eatssay ofay episcopalay elvetvay, anday aay oofray ofay ueblay assglay. Alsoay
arrivingay onay ethay ecialspay arcay, utteringflay arounday Mr.ay Ownbray, ereway ethay olemnsay awyerslay esseddray inay ackblay
owhay inay ifferentday imestay adhay ollowedfay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay everywhereay, anday atthay edlay ethay eoplepay
otay inkthay atthay ethay agronomistsay, ydrologistshay, opographerstay, anday urveyorssay, ikelay Mr.ay Erberthay ithway ishay
aptivecay alloonsbay anday ishay oloredcay utterfliesbay anday Mr.ay Ownbray ithway ishay ausoleummay onay eelswhay anday ishay
erociousfay Ermangay epherdshay ogsday, adhay omethingsay otay oday ithway ethay arway. Erethay asway otnay uchmay imetay otay
inkthay aboutay itay, oweverhay, ecausebay ethay uspicioussay inhabitantsay ofay Acondomay arelybay eganbay otay onderway
atwhay ethay evilday asway oinggay onay enwhay ethay owntay adhay alreadyay ecomebay ansformedtray intoay anay encampmentay
ofay oodenway ouseshay ithway inczay oofsray inhabiteday ybay oreignersfay owhay arriveday onay ethay aintray omfray alfwayhay
arounday ethay orldway, idingray otnay onlyay onay ethay eatssay anday atformsplay utbay evenay onay ethay oofray ofay ethay oachescay.
Ethay ingosgray, owhay aterlay onay oughtbray eirthay anguidlay ivesway inay uslinmay essesdray anday argelay eiledvay atshay, uiltbay aay
eparatesay owntay acrossay ethay ailroadray ackstray ithway eetsstray inedlay ithway almpay eestray, ouseshay ithway eenedscray in¬way
owsday, allsmay itewhay ablestay onay ethay erracestay, anday ansfay ountedmay onay ethay eilingscay, anday extensiveay ueblay awnslay
ithway eacockspay anday uailsqay. Ethay ectionsay asway urroundedsay ybay aay etalmay encefay oppedtay ithway aay andbay ofay
electrifieday ickenchay ireway ichwhay uringday ethay oolcay ummersay orningsmay ouldway ebay ackblay ithway oastedray
allowssway. Onay oneay ewknay yetay atwhay eythay ereway afteray, oray etherwhay eythay ereway actuallyay othingnay utbay
ilanthropistsphay, anday eythay adhay alreadyay ausedcay aay olossalcay isturbanceday, uchmay oremay anthay atthay ofay ethay olday
ypsiesgay, utbay esslay ansitorytray anday understandableay. Endoweday ithway eansmay atthay adhay eenbay eservedray orfay
Ivineday Ovidencepray inay ormerfay imestay, eythay angedchay ethay atternpay ofay ethay amsray, accelerateday ethay yclecay ofay
arvesthay, anday ovedmay ethay iverray omfray erewhay itay adhay alwaysay eenbay anday utpay itay ithway itsay itewhay onesstay anday icyay
urrentscay onay ethay otheray idesay ofay ethay owntay, ehindbay ethay emeterycay. Itay asway atay atthay imetay atthay eythay uiltbay aay
ortressfay ofay einforcedray oncretecay overay ethay adedfay ombtay ofay Osejay Arcadioay, osay atthay ethay orpsescay ellsmay ofay
owderpay ouldway otnay ontaminatecay ethay atersway. Orfay ethay oreignersfay owhay arriveday ithoutway ovelay eythay
onvertedcay ethay eetstray ofay ethay ovinglay atronsmay omfray Ancefray intoay aay oremay extensiveay illagevay anthay itay adhay
eenbay, anday onay oneay oriousglay Ednesdayway eythay oughtbray inay aay ainloadtray ofay angestray oreswhay, Abylonishbay
omenway illedskay inay age-olday ethodsmay anday inay ossessionpay ofay allay annermay ofay unguentsay anday evicesday otay

imulatestay ethay unarouseday, otay ivegay ouragecay otay ethay imidtay, otay atiatesay ethay oraciousvay, otay exaltay ethay odestmay
anmay, otay eachtay aay essonlay otay epeatersray, anday otay orrectcay olitarysay eoplepay. Ethay Eetstray ofay ethay Urkstay, enricheday
ybay ell-litway oresstay ithway oductspray omfray abroaday, isplacingday ethay olday azaarsbay ithway eirthay ightbray olorscay,
overfloweday onay Aturdaysay ightsnay ithway ethay owdscray ofay adventurersay owhay umpedbay intoay eachay otheray amongay
amblinggay ablestay, ootingshay alleriesgay, ethay alleyay erewhay ethay uturefay asway uessedgay anday eamsdray interpreteday,
anday ablestay ofay iedfray oodfay anday inksdray, anday onay Undaysay orningsmay erethay ereway atteredscay onay ethay oundgray
odiesbay atthay ereway ometimessay osethay ofay appyhay ardsdmnkay anday oremay oftenay osethay ofay onlookersay elledfay ybay
otsshay, istsfay, ivesknay, anday ottlesbay uringday ethay awlsbray. Itay asway uchsay aay umultuoustay anday intemperateay invasionay
atthay uringday ethay irstfay aysday itay asway impossibleay otay alkway oughthray ethay eetsstray ecausebay ofay ethay urniturefay anday
unkstray, anday ethay oisenay ofay ethay arpentrycay ofay osethay owhay ereway uildingbay eirthay ouseshay inay anyay acantvay otlay
ithoutway askingay anyone’say ermissionpay, anday ethay andalousscay ehaviorbay ofay ouplescay owhay unghay eirthay
ammockshay etweenbay ethay almonday eestray anday ademay ovelay underay ethay ettingnay inay oadbray aylightday anday inay iewvay
ofay everyoneay. Ethay onlyay erenesay ornercay adhay eenbay establisheday ybay eacefulpay Estway Indianay Egroesnay, owhay
uiltbay aay arginalmay eetstray ithway oodenway ouseshay onay ilespay erewhay eythay ouldway itsay inay ethay oorsday atay uskday
ingingsay elancholymay ymnshay inay eirthay isorderedday abblegay. Osay anymay angeschay ooktay aceplay inay uchsay aay ortshay
imetay atthay eightay onthsmay afteray Mr.ay Erbert’shay isitvay ethay olday inhabitantsay adhay aay ardhay imetay ecognizingray eirthay
ownay owntay.

ook“Lay atay ethay essmay e’veway otgay ourselvesay into,”ay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay aidsay atay atthay imetay, ust“jay
ecausebay eway inviteday aay ingogray otay eatay omesay ananas.”bay

Aurelianoay Egundosay, onay ethay otheray andhay, ouldcay otnay ontaincay ishay appinesshay overay ethay avalancheay ofay
oreignersfay. Ethay ousehay asway uddenlysay illedfay ithway unknownay uestsgay, ithway invincibleay anday orldlyway
arouserscay, anday itay ecamebay ecessarynay otay adday edroomsbay offay ethay ourtyardcay, idenway ethay iningday oomray, anday
exchangeay ethay olday abletay orfay oneay atthay eldhay ixteensay eoplepay, ithway ewnay inachay anday ilversay, anday evenay enthay
eythay adhay otay eatay unchlay inay iftsshay. Ernandafay adhay otay allowsway erhay esscmplay anday eirthay uestsgay ofay ethay orstway
ortsay ikelay ingskay asay eythay uddiedmay ethay orchpay ithway eirthay ootsbay, urinateday inay ethay ardengay, aidlay eirthay atsmay
ownday anywhereay otay aketay eirthay iestasay, anday okespay ithoutway egardray orfay ethay ensitivitiessay ofay adieslay oray ethay
operpray ehaviorbay ofay entlemengay. Amarantaay, asway osay andalizedscay ithway ethay ebeianplay invasionay atthay eshay
entway ackbay otay eatingay inay ethay itchenkay asay inay oldenay aysday. Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay, onvincedcay atthay ethay
ajoritymay ofay osethay owhay amecay intoay Inisay orkshopway otay eetgray imhay ereway otnay oingday itay ecausebay ofay ympathysay
oray egardray utbay outay ofay ethay uriositycay otay eetmay aay istoricalhay elicray, aay useummay ossilfay, ecidedday otay utshay imselfhay
inay ybay arringbay ethay oorday anday ehay asway otnay eensay anyay oremay exceptay onay eryvay areray occasionsay enwhay ehay ouldway
itsay atay ethay eetstray oorday. Ursulaay, onay ethay otheray andhay, evenay uringday ethay aysday enwhay eshay asway alreadyay aggingdray
erhay eetfay anday alkingway aboutay opinggray alongay ethay allsway, eltfay aay uvenilejay excitementay asay ethay imetay orfay ethay
arrivalay ofay ethay aintray approacheday. e“Way avehay otay eparepray omesay eatmay anday ish,”fay eshay ouldway orderay ethay ourfay
ookscay, owhay astenedhay otay avehay everythingay eadyray underay ethay imperturbableay irectionday ofay Antasay Ofiasay eday alay
Iedadpay. e“Way avehay otay eparepray everything,”ay eshay insisteday, ecause“bay eway evernay owknay atwhay esethay angersstray
ikelay otay eat.”ay Ethay aintray arriveday uringday ethay ottesthay imetay ofay ayday. Atay unchtimelay ethay ousehay ookshay ithway ethay
ustlebay ofay aay arketplacemay, anday ethay erspiringpay uests—whogay idday otnay evenay owknay owhay eirthay ostshay ere—way
oopedtray inay otay occupyay ethay estbay acesplay atay ethay abletay, ilewhay ethay ookscay umpedbay intoay eachay otheray ithway
enormousay ettleskay ofay oupsay, otspay ofay eatmay, argelay ourdsgay illedfay ithway egetablesvay, anday oughstray ofay iceray, anday
assedpay arounday ethay ontentscay ofay arrelsbay ofay emonadelay ithway inexhaustibleay adleslay. Ethay isorderday asway uchsay
atthay Ernandafay asway oubledtray ybay ethay ideaay atthay anymay ereway eatingay icetway anday onay oremay anthay oneay occasionay
eshay asway aboutay otay urstbay outay ithway aay egetablevay awker’shay insultsay ecausebay omeonesay atay ethay abletay inay
onfusioncay askeday erhay orfay ethay eckchay. Oremay anthay aay yearay adhay onegay ybay incesay Mr.ay Erbert’shay isitvay anday ethay
onlyay ingthay atthay asway ownknay asway atthay ethay ingosgray ereway anningplay otay antplay ananabay eestray inay ethay enchanteday
egionray atthay Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay anday ishay enmay adhay ossedcray inay earchsay ofay ethay outeray otay ethay eatgray
inventionsay. Otway otheray onssay ofay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay, ithway ethay osscray ofay ashesay onay eirthay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


oreheadsfay, arriveday, awndray ybay atthay eatgray olcanicvay elchbay, anday eythay ustifiedjay eirthay eterminationday ithway aay
asephray atthay aymay avehay explaineday everybody’say easonsray.

e“Way ame,”cay eythay aidsay, ecause“bay everyoneay isay oming.”cay

Emediosray ethay Eautybay asway ethay onlyay oneay owhay asway immuneay otay ethay ananabay agueplay. Eshay asway ecalmedbay
inay aay agnificentmay adolescenceay, oremay anday oremay impenetrableay otay ormalityfay, oremay anday oremay indifferentay
otay alicemay anday uspicionsay, appyhay inay erhay ownay orldway ofay implesay ealitiesray. Eshay idday otnay understanday ywhay
omenway omplicatedcay eirthay iveslay ithway orsetscay anday etticoatspay, osay eshay ewedsay erselfhay aay oarsecay assockcay atthay
eshay implysay utpay overay erhay anday ithoutway urtherfay ifficultiesday esolvedray ethay oblempray ofay essdray, ithoutway
akingtay awayay ethay eelingfay ofay eingbay akednay, ichwhay accordingay otay erhay ightslay asway ethay onlyay ecentday ayway otay ebay
enwhay atay omehay. Eythay otheredbay erhay osay uchmay otay utcay ethay ainray ofay airhay atthay alreadyay eachedray otay erhay ighsthay
anday otay akemay ollsray ithway ombscay anday aidsbray ithway edray ibbonsray atthay eshay implysay avedshay erhay eadhay anday useday
ethay airhay otay akemay igsway orfay ethay aintssay. Ethay artlingstay ingthay aboutay erhay implifyingsay instinctay asway atthay ethay
oremay eshay idday awayay ithway ashionfay inay aay earchsay orfay omfortcay anday ethay oremay eshay assedpay overay onventionscay
asay eshay obeyeday ontaneityspay, ethay oremay isturbingday erhay incredibleay eautybay ecamebay anday ethay oremay
ovocativepray eshay ecamebay otay enmay. Enwhay ethay onssay ofay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendfabay ereway inay Acondomay orfay
ethay irstfay imetay, Ursulaay ememberedray atthay inay eirthay einsvay eythay orebay ethay amesay oodblay asay erhay eatgray-
anddaughtergray anday eshay udderedshay ithway aay orgottenfay ightfray. eep“Kay youray eyesay ideway open,”ay eshay arnedway
erhay. ith“Way anyay ofay emthay youray ildrenchay illway omecay outay ithway ethay ailtay ofay aay ig.”pay Ethay irlgay aidpay uchsay ittlelay
attentionay otay ethay arningway atthay eshay esseddray upay asay aay anmay anday olledray arounday inay ethay andsay inay orderay otay
imbclay ethay easedgray olepay, anday eshay asway atay ethay ointpay ofay ingingbray onay aay agedytray amongay ethay eventeensay
ousinscay, owhay ereway ivendray admay ybay ethay unbearableay ectaclespay. Atthay asway ywhay onenay ofay emthay eptslay atay ethay
ousehay enwhay eythay isitedvay ethay owntay anday ethay ourfay owhay adhay ayedstay ivedlay inay entedray oomsray atay Ursula’say
insistenceay. Emediosray ethay Eautybay, oweverhay, ouldway avehay iedday aughinglay ifay eshay adhay ownknay aboutay atthay
ecautionpray. Untilay erhay astlay omentmay onay earthay eshay asway unawareay atthay erhay irreparableay atefay asay aay isturbingday
omanway asway aay ailyday isasterday. Everyay imetay eshay appeareday inay ethay iningday oomray, againstay Ursula’say ordersay, eshay
ausedcay aay anicpay ofay exasperationay amongay ethay outsidersay. Itay asway allay ootay evidentay atthay eshay asway ompletelycay
akednay underneathay erhay udecray ightshirtnay anday onay oneay ouldcay understanday atthay erhay avedshay anday erfectpay
ullskay asway otnay omesay indkay ofay allengechay, anday atthay ethay oldnessbay ithway ichwhay eshay uncovereday erhay ighsthay otay
oolcay offay asway otnay aay iminalcray ovocationpray, ornay asway erhay easureplay enwhay eshay uckedsay erhay ingersfay afteray,
eatingay. Atwhay onay embermay ofay ethay amilyfay everay ewknay asway atthay ethay angersstray idday otnay aketay onglay otay ealizeray
atthay Emediosray ethay Eautybay avegay offay aay eathbray ofay erturbationpay, aay ormentingtay eezebray atthay asway illstay
erceptiblepay everalsay ourshay afteray eshay adhay assedpay ybay. Enmay expertay inay ethay isturbancesday ofay ovelay,
experienceday allay overay ethay orldway, atedstay atthay eythay adhay evernay ufferedsay anay anxietyay imilarsay otay ethay oneay
oducedpray ybay ethay aturalnay ellsmay ofay Emediosray ethay Eautybay. Onay ethay orchpay ithway ethay egoniasbay, inay ethay
arlorpay, inay anyay aceplay inay ethay ousehay, itay asway ossiblepay otay ointpay outay ethay exactay aceplay erewhay eshay adhay eenbay anday
ethay imetay atthay adhay assedpay incesay eshay adhay eftlay itay. Itay asway aay efiniteday, unmistakableay acetray atthay onay oneay inay ethay
amilyfay ouldcay istinguishday ecausebay itay adhay eenbay incorporateday intoay ethay ailyday odorsay orfay aay onglay imetay, utbay itay
asway oneay atthay ethay outsidersay identifieday immediatelyay. Eythay ereway ethay onlyay onesay, ereforethay, owhay
understooday owhay ethay youngay ommandercay ofay ethay uardgay adhay iedday ofay ovelay anday owhay aay entlemangay omfray aay
arawayfay andlay adhay eenbay ungedplay intoay esperationday. Unawareay ofay ethay estlessray irclecay inay ichwhay eshay ovedmay,
ofay ethay unbearableay atestay ofay intimateay alamitycay atthay eshay ovokedpray asay eshay assedpay ybay, Emediosray ethay
Eautybay eatedtray ethay enmay ithoutway ethay eastlay itbay ofay alicemay anday inay ethay enday upsetay emthay ithway erhay innocentay
omplaisancecay. Enwhay Ursulaay ucceededsay inay imposingay ethay ommandcay atthay eshay eatay ithway Amarantaay inay ethay
itchenkay osay atthay ethay outsidersay ouldway otnay eesay erhay, eshay eltfay oremay omfortablecay, ecausebay, afteray allay, eshay asway
eyondbay allay isciplineday. Inay ealityray, itay ademay onay ifferenceday otay erhay erewhay eshay ateay, anday otnay atay egularray ourshay
utbay accordingay otay ethay imswhay ofay erhay appetiteay. Ometimessay eshay ouldway etgay upay otay avehay unchlay atay eethray inay
ethay orningmay, eepslay allay ayday onglay, anday eshay entspay everalsay onthsmay ithway erhay imetabletay allay inay isarrayday untilay
omesay asualcay incidentay ouldway ingbray erhay ackbay intoay ethay orderay ofay ilingstay. Enwhay ingsthay ereway oinggay etterbay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


eshay ouldway etgay upay atay elevenay o’clockay inay ethay orningmay anday utshay erselfhay upay untilay otway o’clockay, ompletelycay
udenay, inay ethay athroombay, illingkay orpionsscay asay eshay amecay outay ofay erhay enseday anday olongedpray eepslay. Enthay
eshay ouldway owthray aterway omfray ethay isterncay overay erselfhay ithway aay ourdgay. Itay asway anay actay osay olongedpray, osay
eticulousmay, osay ichray inay eremonialcay aspectsay atthay oneay owhay idday otnay owknay erhay ellway ouldway avehay oughtthay
atthay eshay asway ivengay overay otay ethay eservedday adorationay ofay erhay ownay odybay. Orfay erhay, oweverhay, atthay olitarysay
iteray ackedlay allay ensualitysay anday asway implysay aay ayway ofay assingpay ethay imetay untilay eshay asway ungryhay. Oneay ayday, asay
eshay eganbay otay athebay erselfhay, aay angerstray iftedlay aay iletay omfray ethay oofray anday asway eathlessbray atay ethay emendoustray
ectaclespay ofay erhay uditynay. Eshay awsay ishay esolateday eyesay oughthray ethay okenbray ilestay anday adhay onay eactionray ofay
ameshay utbay atherray oneay ofay alarmay.

e“Bay areful,”cay eshay exclaimeday. You’ll“ay all.”fay

I“ay ustjay antedway otay eesay you,”ay ethay oreignerfay urmuredmay.

Oh“ay, allay ight,”ray eshay aidsay. ut“Bay ebay arefulcay, osethay ilestay areay otten.”ray

Ethay anger’sstray acefay adhay aay ainedpay expressionay ofay uporstay anday ehay eemedsay otay ebay attlingbay ilentlysay
againstay ishay imarypray instinctsay osay asay otnay otay eakbray upay ethay iragemay. Emediosray ethay Eautybay oughtthay atthay ehay
asway ufferingsay omfray ethay earfay atthay ethay ilestay ouldway eakbray anday eshay athedbay erselfhay oremay uicklyqay anthay usualay
osay atthay ethay anmay ouldway otnay ebay inay angerday. Ilewhay eshay asway ouringpay aterway omfray ethay, isterncay eshay oldtay imhay
atthay ethay oofray asway inay atthay atestay ecausebay eshay oughtthay atthay ethay edbay ofay eaveslay adhay eenbay ottedray ybay ethay ainray
anday atthay asway atwhay asway illingfay ethay athroombay ithway orpionsscay. Ethay angerstray oughtthay atthay erhay allsmay alktay
asway aay ayway ofay overingcay erhay omplaisancecay, osay atthay enwhay eshay eganbay otay oapsay erselfhay ehay avegay intoay
emptationtay anday entway aay epstay urtherfay.

et“Lay emay oapsay you,”ay ehay urmuredmay.

ank“Thay youay orfay youray oodgay intentions,”ay eshay aidsay, ut“bay ymay otway andshay areay uiteqay enough.”ay

Even“ay ifay it’say ustjay youray ack,”bay ethay oreignerfay eggedbay.

at“Thay ouldway ebay illy,”say eshay aidsay. eople“Pay evernay oapsay eirthay acks.”bay

Enthay, ilewhay eshay asway yingdray erselfhay, ethay angerstray eggedbay erhay, ithway ishay eyesay ullfay ofay earstay, otay arrymay
imhay. Eshay answereday imhay incerelysay atthay eshay ouldway evernay arrymay aay anmay owhay asway osay implesay atthay ehay adhay
astedway almostay anay ourhay anday evenay entway ithoutway unchlay ustjay otay eesay aay omanway akingtay aay athbay. Inallyfay, enwhay
eshay utpay onay erhay assockcay, ethay anmay ouldcay otnay earbay ethay oofpray atthay, indeeday, eshay asway otnay earingway anythingay
underneathay, asay everyoneay adhay uspectedsay, anday ehay eltfay imselfhay arkedmay oreverfay ithway ethay ite-hotwhay ironay
ofay atthay ecretsay. Enthay ehay ooktay otway oremay ilestay offay inay orderay otay opdray ownday intoay ethay athroombay.

It’s“ay eryvay igh,”hay eshay arnedway imhay inay ightfray. You’ll“ay illkay yourself!”ay

Ethay ottenray ilestay okebray ithway aay oisenay ofay isasterday anday ethay anmay arelybay adhay imetay otay etlay outay aay ycray ofay
errortay asay ehay ackedcray ishay ullskay anday asway illedkay outrightay onay ethay ementcay oorflay. Ethay oreignersfay owhay eardhay
ethay oisenay inay ethay iningday oomray anday astenedhay otay emoveray ethay odybay oticednay ethay uffocatingsay odoray ofay
Emediosray ethay Eautybay onay ishay inskay. Itay asway osay eepday inay ishay odybay atthay ethay ackscray inay ishay ullskay idday otnay ivegay
offay oodblay utbay anay amber-coloreday oilay atthay asway impregnateday ithway atthay ecretsay erfumepay, anday enthay eythay
understooday atthay ethay ellsmay ofay Emediosray ethay Eautybay eptkay onay orturingtay enmay eyondbay eathday, ightray ownday
otay ethay ustday ofay eirthay onesbay. Everthelessnay, eythay idday otnay elateray atthay orriblehay accidentay otay ethay otheray otway
enmay owhay adhay iedday ecausebay ofay Emediosray ethay Eautybay. Aay ictimvay asway illstay eedednay eforebay ethay outsidersay
anday anymay ofay ethay olday inhabitantsay ofay Acondomay ouldway editcray ethay egendlay atthay Emediosray Uendiabay idday otnay
ivegay offay aay eathbray ofay ovelay utbay aay atalfay emanationay. Ethay occasionay orfay ethay oofpray ofay itay amecay omesay onthsmay
aterlay onay oneay afternoonay enwhay Emediosray ethay Eautybay entway ithway aay oupgray ofay irlgay iendsfray otay ooklay atay ethay
ewnay antingsplay. Orfay ethay irlsgay ofay Acondomay atthay ovelnay amegay asway easonray orfay aughterlay anday urprisessay,
ightsfray anday okesjay, anday atay ightnay eythay ouldway alktay aboutay eirthay alkway asay ifay itay adhay eenbay anay experienceay inay aay
eamdray. Uchsay asway ethay estigepray ofay atthay ilencesay atthay Ursulaay idday otnay avehay ethay earthay otay aketay ethay unfay awayay
omfray Emediosray ethay Eautybay, anday eshay etlay erhay ogay oneay afternoonay, ovidingpray atthay eshay oreway aay athay anday aay
ecentday essdray. Asay oonsay asay ethay oupgray ofay iendsfray entway intoay ethay antingsplay ethay airay ecamebay impregnateday
ithway aay atalfay agrancefray. Ethay enmay owhay ereway orkingway alongay ethay owsray eltfay ossessedpay ybay aay angestray






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


ascinationfay, enacedmay ybay omesay invisibleay angerday, anday anymay uccumbedsay otay aay erribletay esireday otay eepway.
Emediosray ethay Eautybay anday erhay artledstay iendsfray anagedmay otay aketay efugeray inay aay earbynay ousehay ustjay asay eythay
ereway aboutay otay ebay assaulteday ybay aay ackpay ofay erociousfay alesmay. Aay ortshay imetay aterlay eythay ereway escuedray ybay ethay
ourflay Aurelianosay, osewhay ossescray ofay ashay inspireday aay acredsay espectray, asay ifay eythay ereway astecay arksmay, ampsstay
ofay invulnerabilityay. Emediosray ethay Eautybay idday otnay elltay anyoneay atthay oneay ofay ethay enmay, akingtay advantageay ofay
ethay umulttay, adhay anagedmay otay attackay erhay omachstay ithway aay andhay atthay asway oremay ikelay ethay awclay ofay anay eagleay
ingingclay otay ethay edgeay ofay aay ecipicepray. Eshay acedfay ethay attackeray inay aay indkay ofay instantaneousay ashflay anday awsay
ethay isconsolateday eyesay, ichwhay emainedray ampedstay onay erhay earthay ikelay ethay othay oalscay ofay itypay. Atthay ightnay ethay
anmay oastedbay ofay ishay audacityay anday aggeredsway overay ishay oodgay ucklay onay ethay Eetstray ofay ethay Urkstay aay ewfay
inutesmay eforebay ethay ickkay ofay aay orsehay edcmshay ishay estchay anday aay owdcray ofay outsidersay awsay imhay ieday inay ethay
iddlemay ofay ethay eetstray, owneddray inay ishay ownay oodyblay omitingvay.

Ethay uppositionsay atthay Emediosray ethay Eautybay Ossessedpay owerspay ofay eathday asway enthay ornebay outay ybay
ourfay irrefutableay eventsay. Althoughay omesay enmay owhay ereway easyay ithway eirthay ordsway aidsay atthay itay asway orthway
acrificingsay one’say ifelay orfay aay ightnay ofay ovelay ithway uchsay anay arousingay omanway, ethay tmthay asway atthay onay oneay
ademay anyay effortay otay oday osay. Erhapspay, otnay onlyay otay attainay erhay utbay alsoay otay onjurecay awayay erhay angersday, allay
atthay asway eedednay asway aay eelingfay asay imitivepray anday asay implesay asay atthay ofay ovelay, utbay atthay asway ethay onlyay ingthay
atthay idday otnay occuray otay anyoneay. Ursulaay idday otnay orryway aboutay erhay anyay oremay. Onay anotheray occasionay, enwhay
eshay adhay otnay yetay ivengay upay ethay ideaay ofay avingsay erhay orfay ethay orldway, eshay adhay iedtray otay etgay erhay interesteday inay
asicbay omesticday affairsay. en“May emandday uchmay oremay anthay youay ink,”thay eshay ouldway elltay erhay enigmaticallyay.
ere’s“Thay aay otlay ofay ookingcay, aay otlay ofay eepingsway, aay otlay ofay ufferingsay overay ittlelay ingsthay eyondbay atwhay youay
ink.”thay Eshay asway eceivingday erselfhay ithinway, yingtray otay aintray erhay orfay omesticday appinesshay ecausebay eshay asway
onvincedcay atthay onceay ishay assionpay asway atisfiedsay emthay ouldway otnay ebay aay anmay onay ethay acefay ofay ethay earthay
apablecay ofay oleratingtay evenay orfay aay ayday aay egligencenay atthay asway eyondbay allay understandingay. Ethay irthbay ofay ethay
atestlay Osejay Arcadioay anday erhay unshakableay illway otay ingbray imhay upay otay ebay Opepay inallyfay ausedcay erhay otay easecay
orryingway aboutay erhay eat-granddaughtergray. Eshay abandoneday erhay otay erhay atefay, ustingtray atthay oonersay oray aterlay
aay iraclemay ouldway aketay aceplay anday atthay inay isthay orldway ofay everythingay erethay ouldway alsoay ebay aay anmay ithway
enoughay othslay otay utpay upay ithway erhay. Orfay aay onglay imetay alreadyay Amarantaay adhay ivengay upay yingtray otay akemay erhay
intoay aay usefulay omanway. Incesay osethay orgottenfay afternoonsay enwhay erhay iecenay arelybay adhay enoughay interestay otay
urntay ethay ankcray onay ethay ewingsay achinemay, eshay adhay eachedray ethay onclusioncay atthay eshay asway implemindedsay.
ere“Way oinggay otay avehay otay affleray youay off,”ay eshay ouldway elltay erhay, erplexedpay atay ethay actfay atthay en’smay ordsway
ouldway otnay enetratepay erhay. Aterlay onay, enwhay Ursulaay insisteday atthay Emediosray ethay Eautybay ogay otay assmay ithway
erhay acefay overedcay ithway aay awlshay, Amarantaay oughtthay atthay aay ysteriousmay ecourseray ikelay atthay ouldway urntay outay
otay ebay osay ovokingpray atthay oonsay aay anmay ouldway omecay owhay ouldway ebay intrigueday enoughay otay earchsay outay
atientlypay orfay ethay eakway ointpay ofay erhay earthay. Utbay enwhay eshay awsay ethay upidstay ayway inay ichwhay eshay ejectedray aay
etenderpray owhay orfay anymay easonsray asway oremay esirableday anthay aay incepray, eshay avegay upay allay opehay. Ernandafay
idday otnay evenay akemay anyay attemptay otay understanday erhay. Enwhay eshay awsay Emediosray ethay Eautybay esseddray asay aay
ueenqay atay ethay oodyblay arnivalcay eshay oughtthay atthay eshay asway anay extraordinaryay eaturecray. Utbay enwhay eshay awsay
erhay eatingay ithway erhay andshay, incapableay ofay ivinggay anay answeray atthay asway otnay aay iraclemay ofay implemind¬say
ednessay, ethay onlyay ingthay atthay eshay amentedlay asway ethay actfay atthay ethay idiotsay inay ethay amilyfay ivedlay osay onglay. Inay
itespay ofay ethay actfay atthay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay eptkay onay elievingbay anday epeatingray atthay Emediosray ethay
Eautybay asway inay ealityray ethay ostmay ucidlay eingbay atthay ehay adhay everay ownknay anday atthay eshay owedshay itay atay everyay
omentmay ithway erhay artlingstay abilityay otay utpay ingsthay overay onay everyoneay, eythay etlay erhay ogay erhay ownay ayway.
Emediosray ethay Eautybay ayedstay erethay anderingway oughthray ethay esertday ofay olitudesay, earingbay onay osscray onay erhay
ackbay, aturingmay inay erhay eamsdray ithoutway ightmaresnay, erhay interminableay athsbay, erhay unscheduleday ealsmay,
erhay eepday anday olongedpray ilencessay atthay adhay onay emorymay untilay oneay afternoonay inay Archmay, enwhay Ernandafay
antedway otay oldfay erhay abantbray eetsshay inay ethay ardengay anday askeday ethay omenway inay ethay ousehay orfay elphay. Eshay adhay
ustjay egunbay enwhay Amarantaay oticednay atthay Emediosray ethay Eautybay asway overedcay allay overay ybay anay intenseay
alenesspay.






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


on’t“Day youay eelfay ell?”way eshay askeday erhay.

Emediosray ethay Eautybay, owhay asway utchingclay ethay eetshay ybay ethay otheray enday, avegay aay ityingpay ilesmay.

uite“Qay ethay opposite,”ay eshay aidsay, I“ay evernay eltfay etter.”bay

Eshay adhay ustjay inishedfay ayingsay itay enwhay Ernandafay eltfay aay elicateday indway ofay ightlay ullpay ethay eetsshay outay ofay
erhay andshay anday openay emthay upay ideway. Amarantaay eltfay aay ysteriousmay emblingtray inay ethay acelay onay erhay
etticoatspay anday eshay iedtray otay aspgray ethay eetshay osay atthay eshay ouldway otnay allfay ownday atay ethay instantay inay ichwhay
Emediosray ethay Eautybay eganbay otay iseray. Ursulaay, almostay indblay atay ethay imetay, asway ethay onlyay ersonpay owhay asway
ufficientlysay almcay otay identifyay ethay aturenay ofay atthay eterminedday indway anday eshay eftlay ethay eetsshay otay ethay ercymay
ofay ethay ightlay asay eshay atchedway Emediosray ethay Eautybay avingway ood-byegay inay ethay idstmay ofay ethay appingflay
eetsshay atthay oseray upay ithway erhay, abandoningay ithway erhay ethay environmentay ofay eetlesbay anday ahliasday anday
assingpay oughthray ethay airay ithway erhay asay ourfay o’clockay inay ethay afternoonay amecay otay anay enday, anday eythay ereway ostlay
oreverfay ithway erhay inay ethay upperay atmosphereay erewhay otnay evenay ethay ighest-flyinghay irdsbay ofay emorymay ouldcay
eachray erhay.

Ethay outsidersay, ofay oursecay, oughtthay atthay Emediosray ethay Eautybay adhay inallyfay uccumbedsay otay erhay
irrevocableay atefay ofay aay ueenqay eebay anday atthay erhay amilyfay asway yingtray otay avesay erhay onorhay ithway atthay aletay ofay
evitationlay. Ernandafay, urningbay ithway envyay, inallyfay accepteday ethay iraclemay, anday orfay aay onglay imetay eshay eptkay onay
ayingpray otay Odgay otay endsay erhay ackbay erhay eetsshay. Ostmay eoplepay elievedbay inay ethay iraclemay anday eythay evenay
ightedlay andlescay anday elebratedcay ovenasnay. Erhapspay erethay ightmay avehay eenbay alktay ofay othingnay elseay orfay aay
onglay imetay ifay ethay arbarousbay exterminationay ofay ethay Aurelianosay adhay otnay eplacedray amazementay ithway onorhay.
Althoughay ehay adhay evernay oughtthay ofay itay asay anay omenay, Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay adhay oreseenfay ethay agictray
enday ofay ishay onssay inay aay ertaincay ayway. Enwhay Aurelianoay Erradorsay anday Aurelianoay Arcayaay, ethay otway owhay
arriveday uringday ethay umulttay, expresseday aay ishway otay aystay inay Acondomay, eirthay atherfay iedtray otay issuadeday emthay.
Iefay ouldcay otnay understanday atwhay eythay ereway oinggay otay oday inay aay owntay atthay adhay eenbay ansformedtray intoay aay
angerousday aceplay overnightay. Utbay Aurelianoay Entenocay anday Aurelianoay Istetray, ackedbay ybay Aurelianoay
Egundosay. avegay emthay orkway inay eirthay usinessesbay. Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay adhay easonsray atthay ereway illstay
eryvay onfusedcay anday ereway againstay atthay eterminationday. Enwhay ehay awsay Mr.ay Ownbray inay ethay irstfay automobileay
otay eachray Acondo—anmay orangeay onvertiblecay ithway aay ornhay atthay ightenedfray ogsday ithway itsay ark—thebay olday
oldiersay ewgray indignantay ithway ethay ervilesay excitementay ofay ethay eoplepay anday ehay ealizedray atthay omethingsay adhay
angedchay inay ethay akeupmay ofay ethay enmay incesay ethay aysday enwhay eythay ouldway eavelay eirthay ivesway anday ildrenchay
anday osstay aay otgunshay onay eirthay ouldersshay otay ogay offay otay arway. Ethay ocallay authoritiesay, afteray ethay armisticeay ofay
Eerlandianay, ereway ayorsmay ithoutway initiativeay, ecorativeday udgesjay ickedpay omfray amongay ethay eacefulpay anday
iredtay Onservativescay ofay Acondomay. is“Thay isay aay egimeray ofay etches,”wray Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay ouldway
ommentcay enwhay ehay awsay ethay arefootbay olicemenpay armeday ithway oodenway ubsclay asspay. e“Way oughtfay allay osethay
arsway anday allay ofay itay ustjay osay atthay eway idn’tday avehay otay aintpay ouray ouseshay ue.”blay Enwhay ethay ananabay ompanycay
arriveday, oweverhay, ethay ocallay unctionariesfay ereway eplacedray ybay ictatorialday oreignersfay omwhay Mr.ay Ownbray
oughtbray otay ivelay inay ethay electrifieday ickenchay yarday osay atthay eythay ouldcay enjoyay, asay ehay explaineday itay, ethay ignityday
atthay eirthay atusstay arrantedway anday osay atthay eythay ouldway otnay uffersay omfray ethay eathay anday ethay osquitoesmay anday
ethay ountlesscay iscomfortsday anday ivationspray ofay ethay owntay. Ethay olday olicemenpay ereway eplacedray ybay iredhay
assassinsay ithway achetesmay. Utshay upay inay ishay orkshopway, Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay oughtthay aboutay osethay
angeschay anday orfay ethay irstfay imetay inay ishay uietqay yearsay ofay olitudesay ehay asway ormentedtay ybay ethay efiniteday ertaintycay
atthay itay adhay eenbay aay istakemay otnay otay avehay ontinuedcay ethay arway otay itsay inalfay onclusioncay. Uringday atthay imetay aay
otherbray ofay ethay orgottenfay Olonelcay Agnlficomay Isbalvay asway akingtay ishay even-year-oldsay andsongray otay etgay aay
oftsay inkdray atay oneay ofay ethay ushcartspay onay ethay uaresqay anday ecausebay ethay ildchay accidentallyay umpedbay intoay aay
orporalcay ofay olicepay anday illedspay ethay inkdray onay ishay uniformay, ethay arbarianbay utcay imhay otay iecespay ithway ishay
achetemay, anday ithway oneay okestray ehay utcay offay ethay eadhay ofay ethay andfathergray asay ehay iedtray otay opstay imhay. Ethay
olewhay owntay awsay ethay ecapitatedday anmay asspay ybay asay aay oupgray ofay enmay arriedcay imhay otay ishay ousehay, ithway aay
omanway aggingdray ethay eadhay alongay ybay itsay airhay, anday ethay oodyblay acksay ithway ethay iecespay ofay ethay ildchay.






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Orfay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay itay eantmay ethay imitslay ofay atonementay. Ehay uddenlysay oundfay imselfhay
ufferingsay omfray ethay amesay indignationay atthay ehay adhay eltfay inay ishay youthay overay ethay odybay ofay ethay omanway owhay
adhay eenbay eatenbay otay eathday ecausebay eshay adhay eenbay ittenbay ybay aay abidray ogday. Ehay ookedlay atay ethay oupsgray ofay
ystandersbay inay ontfray ofay ethay ousehay anday ithway ishay olday entorianstay oicevay, estoredray ybay aay eepday isgustday ithway
imselfhay, ehay unloadeday uponay emthay ethay urdenbay ofay atehay atthay ehay ouldcay onay ongerlay earbay inay ishay earthay.

One“ay ofay esethay ays,”day ehay outedshay, I’may oinggay otay armay ymay oysbay osay eway ancay etgay idray ofay esethay ittyshay
ingos!”gray

Uringday ethay oursecay ofay atthay eekway, atay ifferentday acesplay alongay ethay oastcay, ishay eventeensay onssay ereway
untedhay ownday ikelay abbitsray ybay invisibleay iminalscray owhay aimeday atay ethay entercay ofay eirthay ossescray ofay ashay.
Aurelianoay Istetray asway eavinglay ethay ousehay ithway ishay othermay atay evensay inay ethay eveningay enwhay aay ifleray otshay
amecay outay ofay ethay arknessday anday erforatedpay ishay oreheadfay. Aurelianoay Entenocay asway oundfay inay ethay
ammockhay atthay ehay asway accustomeday otay anghay upay inay ethay actoryfay ithway anay icepickay etweenbay ishay eyebrowsay
ivendray inay upay otay ethay andlehay. Aurelianoay Erradorsay adhay eftlay ishay irlgay iendfray atay erhay arents’pay ousehay afteray
avinghay akentay erhay otay ethay oviesmay anday asway eturningray oughthray ethay ell-lightedway Eetstray ofay ethay Urkstay enwhay
omeonesay inay ethay owdcray owhay asway evernay identifieday iredfay aay evolverray otshay ichwhay ockedknay imhay overay intoay aay
aldroncay ofay oilingbay ardlay. Aay ewfay inutesmay aterlay omeonesay ockedknay atay ethay oorday ofay ethay oomray erewhay
Aurelianoay Arcayaay asway utshay upay ithway aay omanway anday outedshay otay imhay: urry“Hay upay, ey’rethay illingkay youray
others.”bray Ethay omanway owhay asway ithway imhay aidsay aterlay atthay Aurelianoay Arcayaay umpedjay outay ofay edbay anday
openeday ethay oorday anday asway eetedgray ithway ethay ischargeday ofay aay Ausermay atthay itsplay ishay eadhay openay. Onay atthay
ightnay ofay eathday, ilewhay ethay ousehay asway eparingpray otay oldhay aay akeway orfay ethay ourfay orpsescay, Ernandafay anray
oughthray ethay owntay ikelay aay adwomanmay ookinglay orfay Aurelianoay Egundosay, omwhay Etrapay Otescay adhay ockedlay
upay inay aay osetclay, inkingthay atthay ethay orderay ofay exterminationay includeday allay owhay orebay ethay olonel’scay amenay.
Eshay ouldway otnay etlay imhay outay untilay ethay ourthfay ayday, enwhay ethay elegramstay eceivedray omfray ifferentday acesplay
alongay ethay oastcay ademay itay earclay atthay ethay uryfay ofay ethay invisibleay enemyay asway irectedday onlyay atay ethay othersbray
arkedmay ithway ethay ossescray ofay ashay. Amarantaay etchedfay ethay edgerlay erewhay eshay adhay ittenwray ownday ethay actsfay
aboutay erhay ephewsnay anday asay ethay elegramstay arriveday eshay ewdray ineslay oughthray ethay amesnay untilay onlyay atthay ofay
ethay eldestay emainedray. Eythay ememberedray imhay eryvay ellway ecausebay ofay ethay ontrastcay etweenbay ishay arkday inskay
anday ishay eengray eyesay. Ishay amenay asway Aurelianoay Amadoray anday ehay asway aay arpentercay, ivinglay inay aay illagevay
iddenhay inay ethay oothillsfay. Afteray aitingway otway eeksway orfay ethay elegramtay ellingtay ofay ishay eathday, Aurelianoay
Egundosay entsay aay essengermay otay imhay inay orderay otay arnway imhay, inkingthay atthay ehay ightmay otnay owknay aboutay ethay
eatthray atthay unghay overay imhay. Ethay emissaryay eturnedray ithway ethay ewsnay atthay Aurelianoay Amadoray asway afesay.
Ethay ightnay ofay ethay exterminationay otway enmay adhay onegay otay etgay imhay atay ishay ousehay anday adhay otshay atay imhay ithway
eirthay evolversray utbay eythay adhay issedmay ethay osscray ofay ashesay. Aurelianoay Amadoray adhay eenbay ableay otay eaplay overay
ethay allway ofay ethay ourtyardcay anday asway ostlay inay ethay abyrinthlay ofay ethay ountainsmay, ichwhay ehay ewknay ikelay ethay ackbay
ofay ishay andhay anksthay otay ethay iendshipfray ehay aintainedmay ithway ethay Indiansay, omfray omwhay ehay oughtbay oodway.
Othingnay oremay asway eardhay ofay imhay.

Osethay ereway arkday aysday orfay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay. Ethay esidentpray ofay ethay epublicray entsay imhay aay
elegramtay ofay ondolencecay inay ichwhay ehay omisedpray anay exhaustiveay investigationay anday aidpay omagehay otay ethay
eadday enmay. Atay ishay ommandcay, ethay ayormay appeareday atay ethay ervicessay ithway ourfay uneralfay eathswray, ichwhay ehay
iedtray otay aceplay onay ethay offinscay, utbay ethay olonelcay ordereday imhay intoay ethay eetstray. Afteray ethay urialbay ehay ewdray upay
anday ersonallypay ubmittedsay otay ethay esidentpray ofay ethay epublicray aay iolentvay elegramtay, ichwhay ethay elegraphertay
efusedray otay endsay. Enthay ehay enricheday itay ithway ermstay ofay ingularsay aggressivenessay, utpay itay inay anay envelopeay, anday
ailedmay itay. Asay adhay appenedhay ithway ethay eathday ofay ishay ifeway, asay adhay appenedhay otay imhay osay anymay imestay uringday
ethay arway ithway ethay eathsday ofay ishay estbay iendsfray, ehay idday otnay avehay aay eelingfay ofay orrowsay utbay aay indblay anday
irectionlessday ageray, aay oadbray eelingfay ofay impotenceay. Ehay evenay accuseday Atherfay Antonioay Isabelay ofay
omplicitycay orfay avinghay arkedmay ishay onssay ithway indelibleay ashesay osay atthay ey-couldthay ebay identifieday ybay eirthay
enemiesay. Ethay ecrepitday iestpray, owhay ouldcay onay ongerlay ingstray ideasay ogethertay anday owhay asway eginningbay otay
artlestay ishay arishionerspay ithway ethay ildway interpretationsay ehay avegay omfray ethay ulpitpay, appeareday oneay afternoonay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


atay ethay ousehay ithway ethay obletgay inay ichwhay ehay adhay eparedpray ethay ashesay atthay Ednesdayway anday ehay iedtray otay
anointay ethay olewhay amilyfay ithway emthay otay owshay atthay eythay ouldcay ebay ashedway offay ithway aterway. Utbay ethay orrorhay
ofay ethay isfortunemay adhay enetratedpay osay eeplyday atthay otnay evenay Ernandafay ouldway etlay imhay experimentay onay erhay
anday evernay againay asway aay Uendiabay eensay otay eelknay atay ethay altaray ailray onay Ashay Ednesdayway.

Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay idday otnay ecoverray ishay almcay orfay aay onglay imetay. Ehay abandoneday ethay
anufacturemay ofay ittlelay ishesfay, ateay ithway eatgray ifficultyday, anday anderedway allay oughthray ethay ousehay asay ifay
alkingway inay ishay eepslay, aggingdray ishay anketblay anday ewingchay onay ishay uietqay ageray. Atay ethay enday ofay eethray onthsmay
ishay airhay asway ashenay, ishay olday axedway ustachemay ouredpay ownday esidebay ishay olorlesscay ipslay, utbay, onay ethay otheray
andhay, ishay eyesay ereway onceay oremay ethay urningbay oalscay atthay adhay artledstay osethay owhay adhay eensay imhay ornbay anday
atthay inay otheray aysday adhay ademay airschay ockray ithway aay implesay anceglay. Inay ethay uryfay ofay ishay ormenttay ehay iedtray
utilelyfay otay ouseray ethay omensay atthay adhay uidedgay ishay youthay alongay angerousday athspay intoay ethay esolateday
astelandway ofay oryglay. Ehay asway ostlay, astrayay inay aay angestray ousehay erewhay othingnay anday onay oneay ownay irredstay inay
imhay ethay ightestslay estigevay ofay affectionay. Onceay ehay openeday Elquiades’may oomray, ookinglay orfay ethay acestray ofay aay
astpay omfray eforebay ethay arway, anday ehay oundfay onlyay embblay, ashtray, ilespay ofay asteway accumulateday overay allay ethay
yearsay ofay abandonmentay. Etweenbay ethay overscay ofay ethay ooksbay atthay onay oneay adhay everay eadray againay, inay ethay olday
archmentspay amagedday ybay ampnessday, aay ividlay owerflay adhay osperedpray, anday inay ethay airay atthay adhay eenbay ethay
urestpay anday ightestbray inay ethay ousehay anay unbearableay ellsmay ofay ottenray emoriesmay oatedflay. Oneay orningmay ehay
oundfay Ursulaay eepingway underay ethay estnutchay eetray atay ethay eesknay ofay erhay eadday usbandhay. Olonelcay Aurelianoay
Uendiabay asway ethay onlyay inhabitantay ofay ethay ousehay owhay illstay idday otnay eesay ethay owerfulpay olday anmay owhay adhay
eenbay eatenbay ownday ybay alfhay aay enturycay inay ethay openay airay. ay“Say ellohay otay youray ather,”fay Ursulaay oldtay imhay. Ehay
oppedstay orfay anay instantay inay ontfray ofay ethay estnutchay eetray anday onceay againay ehay awsay atthay ethay emptyay acespay
eforebay imhay idday otnay arouseay anay affectionay eitheray.

at“Whay oesday ehay ay?”say ehay askeday.

e’s“Hay eryvay ad,”say Ursulaay answereday, ecause“bay ehay inksthay atthay you’reay oinggay otay ie.”day

ell“Tay im,”hay ethay olonelcay aidsay, ilingsmay, at“thay aay ersonpay oesn’tday ieday enwhay ehay ouldshay utbay enwhay ehay
an.”cay

Ethay omenay ofay ethay, eadday atherfay irredstay upay ethay astlay emnantray ofay idepray atthay asway eftlay inay ishay earthay, utbay ehay
onfusedcay itay ithway aay uddensay ustgay ofay engthstray. Itay asway orfay atthay easonray atthay ehay oundedhay Ursulaay otay elltay imhay
erewhay inay ethay ourtyardcay ethay oldgay oinscay atthay eythay adhay oundfay insideay ethay asterplay Aintsay Osephjay ereway
uriedbay. You’ll“ay evernay ow,”knay eshay oldtay imhay ithway aay irmnessfay inspireday ybay anay olday essonlay. One“ay ay,”day eshay
addeday, e“thay owneray ofay atthay ortunefay illway appearay anday onlyay ehay ancay igday itay up.”ay Onay oneay ewknay ywhay aay anmay
owhay adhay alwaysay eenbay osay enerousgay adhay egunbay otay ovetcay oneymay ithway uchsay anxietyay, anday otnay ethay odestmay
amountsay atthay ouldway avehay eenbay enoughay otay esolveray anay emergencyay, utbay aay ortunefay ofay uchsay admay izesay atthay
ethay eremay entionmay ofay itay eftlay Aurelianoay Egundosay awashay inay amazementay. Ishay olday ellowfay artypay embersmay,
otay omwhay ehay entway askingay orfay elphay, idhay osay asay otnay otay eceiveray imhay. Itay asway arounday atthay imetay atthay ehay asway
eardhay otay aysay. e“Thay onlyay ifferenceday odaytay etweenbay Iberalslay anday Onservativescay isay atthay ethay Iberalslay ogay
otay assmay atay ivefay o’clockay anday ethay Onservativescay atay eight.”ay Everthelessnay ehay insisteday ithway uchsay
erseverancepay, eggedbay inay uchsay aay ayway, okebray ishay odecay ofay ignityday otay uchsay aay egreeday, atthay ithway aay ittlelay elphay
omfray erehay anday aay ittlelay oremay omfray erethay, eakingsnay aboutay everywhereay, ithway aay ipperyslay iligenceday anday aay
itilesspay erseverancepay, ehay anagedmay otay utpay ogethertay inay eightay onthsmay oremay oneymay anthay Ursulaay adhay
uriedbay. Enthay ehay isitedvay ethay ailingay Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay osay atthay ehay ouldway elphay imhay artstay ethay
otaltay arway.

Atay aay ertaincay imetay Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay asway eallyray ethay onlyay oneay owhay ouldcay avehay ulledpay,
evenay omfray ishay aralyticspay airchay, ethay ustymay ingsstray ofay ebellionray. Afteray ethay armisticeay ofay Eerlandianay, ilewhay
Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay ooktay efugeray ithway ishay ittlelay oldgay ishesfay, ehay eptkay inay ouchtay ithway ethay ebelray
officersay owhay adhay eenbay aithfulfay otay imhay untilay ethay efeatday. Ithway emthay ehay agedway ethay adsay arway ofay ailyday
umiliationhay, ofay entreatiesay anday etitionspay, ofay ome-back-tomorrowcay, ofay any-time-noway, ofay e’reway-
udying-your-case-with-the-proper-attentionstay; ethay arway opelesslyhay ostlay againstay ethay anymay yours-mostay-






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


ulystray owhay ouldshay avehay ignedsay anday ouldway evernay ignsay ethay ifetimelay ensionspay. Ethay otheray arway, ethay
oodyblay oneay ofay entytway yearsay, idday otnay ausecay emthay asay uchmay amageday asay ethay orrosivecay arway ofay eternalay
ostponementspay. Evenay Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay, owhay escapeday eethray attemptsay onay ishay ifelay, urvivedsay
ivefay oundsway, anday emergeday unscatheday omfray innumerableay attlesbay, uccumbedsay otay atthay atrociousay iegesay ofay
aitingway anday anksay intoay ethay iserablemay efeatday ofay olday ageay, inkingthay ofay Amarantaay amongay ethay iamond¬day
apedshay atchespay ofay ightlay inay aay orrowedbay ousehay. Ethay astlay eteransvay ofay omwhay ehay adhay ordway adhay appeareday
otographedphay inay aay ewspapernay ithway eirthay acesfay amelesslyshay aisedray esidebay anay anonymousay esidentpray ofay
ethay epublicray owhay avegay emthay uttonsbay ithway Inisay ikenesslay onay emthay otay earway inay eirthay apelslay anday eturnedray otay
emthay aay agflay oiledsay ithway oodblay anday unpowdergay osay atthay eythay ouldcay aceplay itay onay eirthay offinscay. Ethay othersay,
oremay onorablehay, ereway illstay aitingway orfay aay etterlay inay ethay adowshay ofay ublicpay aritychay, yingday ofay ungerhay, ivinglay
oughthray ageray, attingray ofay olday ageay amiday ethay exquisiteay itshay ofay oryglay. Osay atthay enwhay Olonelcay Aurelianoay
Uendiabay inviteday imhay otay artstay aay ortalmay onflagrationcay atthay ouldway ipeway outay allay estigesvay ofay aay egimeray ofay
orruptioncay anday andalscay ackedbay ybay ethay oreignfay invaderay, Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay ouldcay otnay oldhay
ackbay aay uddershay ofay ompassioncay.

Oh“ay, Aureliano,”ay ehay ighedsay. I“ay alreadyay ewknay atthay youay ereway olday, utbay ownay Iay ealizeray atthay you’reay aay otlay
olderay anthay youay ook.”lay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Apterchay 


INay EtHay EWILDERMENTbay ofay erhay astlay yearsay, Ursulaay adhay adhay eryvay ittlelay eefray imetay otay attenday otay ethay apalpay
educationay ofay Osejay Arcadioay, anday ethay imetay amecay orfay imhay otay etgay eadyray otay eavelay orfay ethay eminarysay ightray
awayay. Ememay, ishay istersay, ividingday erhay imetay etweenbay Ernanda’sfay igidityray anday Amaranta’say itternessbay, atay
almostay ethay amesay omentmay eachedray ethay ageay etsay orfay erhay otay ebay entsay otay ethay uns’nay oolschay, erewhay eythay
ouldway akemay aay irtuosovay onay ethay avichordclay ofay erhay. Ursulaay eltfay ormentedtay ybay avegray oubtsday oncerningcay
ethay effectivenessay ofay ethay ethodsmay ithway ichwhay eshay adhay oldedmay ethay iritspay ofay ethay anguidlay apprenticeay
Upremesay Ontiffpay, utbay eshay idday otnay utpay ethay ameblay onay erhay aggeringstay olday ageay oray ethay arkday oudsclay atthay
arelybay ermittedpay erhay otay akemay outay ethay apeshay ofay ingsthay, utbay onay omethingsay atthay eshay erselfhay ouldcay otnay
eallyray efineday anday atthay eshay onceivedcay onfusedlycay asay aay ogressivepray eakdownbray ofay imetay. e“Thay yearsay
owadaysnay on’tday asspay ethay ayway ethay olday onesay useday o,”tay eshay ouldway aysay, eelingfay atthay everydayay ealityray asway
ippingslay oughthray erhay andshay. Inay ethay astpay, eshay oughtthay, ildrenchay ooktay aay onglay imetay otay owgray upay. Allay oneay
adhay otay oday asway ememberray allay ethay imetay eedednay orfay Osejay Arcadioay, ethay elderay, otay ogay awayay ithway ethay ypsiesgay
anday allay atthay appenedhay eforebay ehay amecay ackbay aintedpay ikelay aay akesnay anday alkingtay ikelay anay astronomeray, anday
ethay ingsthay atthay appenedhay inay ethay ousehay eforebay Amarantaay anday Arcadioay orgotfay ethay anguagelay ofay ethay
Indiansay anday earnedlay Anishspay. Oneay adhay otay eesay onlyay ethay aysday ofay unsay anday ewday atthay oorpay Osejay Arcadioay
Uendiabay entway oughthray underay ethay estnutchay eetray anday allay ethay imetay eededway otay ournmay ishay eathday eforebay
eythay oughtbray inay aay yingday Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay, owhay afteray osay uchmay arway anday osay uchmay ufferingsay
omfray itay asway illstay otnay iftyfay yearsay ofay ageay. Inay otheray imestay, afteray endingspay ethay olewhay ayday akingmay andycay
animalsay, eshay adhay oremay anthay enoughay imetay orfay ethay ildrenchay, otay eesay omfray ethay iteswhay ofay eirthay eyesay atthay
eythay eedednay aay oseday ofay astorcay oilay. Ownay, oweverhay, enwhay eshay adhay othingnay otay oday anday ouldway ogay aboutay
ithway Osejay Arcadioay idingray onay erhay iphay omfray awnday otay uskday, isthay adbay indkay ofay imetay ompelledcay erhay otay eavelay
ingsthay alfhay oneday. Ethay uthtray asway atthay Ursulaay esistedray owinggray olday evenay enwhay eshay adhay alreadyay ostlay
ountcay ofay erhay ageay anday eshay asway aay otherbay onay allay idessay asay eshay iedtray otay eddlemay inay everythingay anday asay eshay
annoyeday angersstray ithway erhay uestionsqay asay otay etherwhay eythay adhay eftlay aay asterplay Aintsay Osephjay otay ebay eptkay
untilay ethay ainsray ereway overay uringday ethay aysday ofay ethay arway. Onay oneay ewknay exactlyay enwhay eshay adhay egunbay otay
oselay erhay ightsay. Evenay inay erhay aterlay yearsay, enwhay eshay ouldcay onay ongerlay etgay outay ofay edbay, itay eemedsay atthay eshay
asway implysay efeatedday ybay ecrepitudeday, utbay onay oneay iscoveredday atthay eshay asway indblay. Eshay adhay oticednay itay
eforebay ethay irthbay ofay Osejay Arcadioay. Atay irstfay eshay oughtthay itay asway aay attermay ofay aay assingpay ebilityday anday eshay
ecretlysay ooktay arrowmay yrupsay anday utpay oneyhay onay erhay eyesay, utbay uiteqay oonsay eshay eganbay otay ealizeray atthay eshay
asway irrevocablyay inkingsay intoay ethay arknessday, otay aay ointpay erewhay eshay evernay adhay aay earclay otionnay ofay ethay
inventionay ofay ethay electricay ightlay, orfay enwhay eythay utpay inay ethay irstfay ulbsbay eshay asway onlyay ableay otay erceivepay ethay
owglay. Eshay idday otnay elltay anyoneay aboutay itay ecausebay itay ouldway avehay eenbay aay ublicpay ecognitionray ofay erhay
uselessnessay. Eshay oncentratedcay onay aay ilentsay oolingschay inay ethay istancesday ofay ilingstay anday eoplespay oicesvay, osay
atthay eshay ouldway illstay ebay ableay otay eesay ithway erhay emorymay atwhay ethay adowsshay ofay erhay ataractscay onay ongerlay
alloweday erhay otay. Aterlay onay eshay asway otay iscoverday ethay unforeseenay elphay ofay odorsay, ichwhay ereway efinedday inay
ethay adowsshay ithway aay engthstray atthay asway uchmay oremay onvincingcay anthay atthay ofay ulkbay anday olorcay, anday ichwhay
avedsay erhay inallyfay omfray ethay ameshay ofay admittingay efeatday. Inay ethay arknessday ofay ethay oomray eshay asway ableay otay
eadthray aay eedlenay anday ewsay aay uttonholebay anday eshay ewknay enwhay ethay ilkmay asway aboutay otay oilbay. Eshay ewknay ithway
osay uchmay ertaintycay ethay ocationlay ofay everythingay atthay eshay erselfhay orgotfay atthay eshay asway indblay atay imestay. Onay
oneay occasionay Ernandafay adhay ethay olewhay ousehay upsetay ecausebay eshay adhay ostlay erhay eddingway ingray, anday
Ursulaay oundfay itay onay aay elfshay inay ethay ildren’schay edroombay. Uiteqay implysay, ilewhay ethay othersay ereway oinggay
arelesslycay allay aboutay, eshay atchedway emthay ithway erhay ourfay ensessay osay atthay eythay evernay ooktay erhay ybay urprisesay,
anday afteray omesay imetay eshay iscoveredday atthay everyay embermay ofay ethay amilyfay, ithoutway ealizingray itay, epeatedray
ethay amesay athpay everyay ayday, ethay amesay actionsay, anday almostay epeatedray ethay amesay ordsway atay ethay amesay ourhay.

Onlyay enwhay eythay eviatedday omfray eticulousmay outineray idday eythay unray ethay iskray ofay osinglay omethingsay. Osay
enwhay eshay eardhay Ernandafay allay upsetay ebay ausecay eshay adhay ostlay erhay ingray, Ursulaay ememberedray atthay ethay onlyay
ingthay ifferentday atthay eshay adhay oneday atthay ayday asway otay utpay ethay attressesmay outay inay ethay unsay ecausebay Ememay
adhay oundfay aay edbugbay ethay ightmay eforebay. Incesay ethay ildrenchay adhay eenbay esentpray atay ethay umigationfay, Ursulaay
iguredfay atthay Ernandafay adhay utpay ethay ingray inay ethay onlyay aceplay erewhay eythay ouldcay otnay eachray itay: ethay elfshay.
Ernandafay, onay ethay otheray andhay, ookedlay orfay itay inay ainvay alongay ethay athspay ofay erhay everydayay itineraryay ithoutway
owingknay atthay ethay earchsay orfay ostlay ilingstay isay inderedhay ybay outineray abitshay anday atthay isay ywhay itay isay osay ifficultday
otay indfay emthay.

Ethay earingray ofay Osejay Arcadioay elpedhay Ursulaay inay ethay exhaustingay asktay ofay eepingkay erselfhay upay otay ateday onay
ethay allestsmay angeschay inay ethay ousehay. Enwhay eshay ealizedray atthay Amarantaay asway essingdray ethay aintssay inay ethay
edroombay eshay etendedpray otay owshay ethay oybay ethay ifferencesday inay ethay olorscay.

et’s“Lay ee,”say eshay ouldway elltay imhay. ell“Tay emay atwhay olorcay ethay Archangelay Aphaelray isay earing.”way

Inay atthay ayway ethay ildchay avegay erhay ethay informationay atthay asway eniedday erhay ybay erhay eyesay, anday onglay eforebay
ehay entway awayay otay ethay eminarysay Ursulaay ouldcay alreadyay istinguishday ethay ifferentday olorscay ofay ethay aints’say
othingclay ybay ethay exturetay. Ometimessay unforeseenay accidentsay ouldway appenhay. Oneay afternoonay enwhay
Amarantaay asway embroidering‘ay onay ethay orchpay ithway ethay egoniasbay Ursulaay umpedbay intoay erhay.

or“Fay eaven’shay ake,”say Amarantaay otestedpray, atch“way erewhay you’reay oing.”gay

It’s“ay youray ault,”fay Ursulaay aidsay. You’re“ay otnay ittingsay erewhay you’reay upposedsay o.”tay

Eshay asway uresay ofay itay. Utbay atthay ayday eshay eganbay otay ealizeray omethingsay atthay onay oneay adhay oticednay anday itay asway
atthay ithway ethay assagepay ofay ethay yearay ethay unsay imperceptiblyay angedchay ositionpay anday osethay owhay atsay onay ethay
orchpay adhay otay angechay eirthay ositionpay ittlelay ybay ittlelay ithoutway eingbay awareay ofay itay. Omfray enthay onay Ursulaay adhay
onlyay otay ememberray ethay ateday inay orderay otay owknay exactlyay erewhay Amarantaay asway ittingsay. Evenay oughthay ethay
emblingtray ofay erhay andshay asway oremay anday oremay oticeablenay anday ethay eightway ofay erhay eetfay asway ootay uchmay orfay
erhay, erhay allsmay igurefay asway evernay eensay inay osay anymay acesplay atay ethay amesay imetay. Eshay asway almostay asay iligentday asay
enwhay eshay adhay ethay olewhay eightway ofay ethay ousehay onay erhay ouldersshay. Everthelessnay, inay ethay impenetrableay
olitudesay ofay ecrepitudeday eshay adhay uchsay airvoyanceclay asay eshay examineday ethay ostmay insignificantay appeningshay
inay ethay amilyfay atthay orfay ethay irstfay imetay eshay awsay earlyclay ethay uthstray atthay erhay usybay ifelay inay ormerfay imestay adhay
eventedpray erhay omfray eeingsay. Arounday ethay imetay eythay ereway eparingpray Osejay Arcadioay orfay ethay eminarysay eshay
adhay alreadyay ademay aay etailedday ecapitulationray ofay ifelay inay ethay ousehay incesay ethay oundingfay ofay Acondomay anday
adhay ompletelycay angedchay ethay opinionay atthay eshay adhay alwaysay eldhay ofay erhay escendantsday. Eshay ealizedray atthay
Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay adhay otnay ostlay ishay ovelay orfay ethay amilyfay ecausebay ehay adhay eenbay ardenedhay ybay ethay
arway, asay eshay adhay oughtthay eforebay, utbay atthay ehay adhay evernay ovedlay anyoneay, otnay evenay ishay ifeway Emediosray oray
ethay ountlesscay one-nightay omenway owhay adhay assedpay oughthray ishay ifelay, anday uchmay esslay ishay onssay. Eshay ensedsay
atthay ehay adhay oughtfay osay anymay arsway otnay outay ofay idealismay, asay everyoneay adhay oughtthay, ornay adhay ehay
enouncedray aay ertaincay ictoryvay ecausebay ofay atiguefay, asay everyoneay adhay oughtthay, utbay atthay ehay adhay onway anday
ostlay orfay ethay amesay easonray, urepay anday infulsay idepray. Eshay eachedray ethay onclusioncay atthay ethay onsay orfay omwhay
eshay ouldway avehay ivengay erhay ifelay asway implysay aay anmay incapableay ofay ovelay. Oneay ightnay enwhay eshay asway arryingcay
imhay inay erhay ellybay eshay eardhay imhay eepingway. Itay asway uchsay aay efiniteday amentlay atthay Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay
okeway upay esidebay erhay anday asway appyhay ithway ethay ideaay atthay ishay onsay asway oinggay otay ebay aay entriloquistvay. Otheray
eoplepay edictedpray atthay ehay ouldway ebay aay ophetpray. Eshay, onay ethay otheray andhay, udderedshay omfray ethay ertaintycay
atthay ethay eepday oanmay asway aay irstfay indicationay ofay ethay earfulfay igpay ailtay anday eshay eggedbay Odgay otay etlay ethay ildchay
ieday inay erhay ombway. Utbay ethay uciditylay ofay erhay olday ageay alloweday erhay otay eesay, anday eshay aidsay osay anymay imestay, atthay
ethay iescray ofay ildrenchay inay eirthay others’may ombsway areay otnay announcementsay ofay entriloquismvay oray aay acultyfay
orfay ophecypray utbay anay unmistakableay ignsay ofay anay incapacityay orfay ovelay. Ethay oweringlay ofay ethay imageay ofay erhay
onsay oughtbray outay inay erhay allay atay onceay allay ethay ompassioncay atthay eshay oweday imhay. Amarantaay, oweverhay, osewhay
ardnesshay ofay earthay ightenedfray erhay, osewhay oncentratedcay itternessbay ademay erhay itterbay, uddenlysay ecamebay
earclay otay erhay inay ethay inalfay analysisay asay ethay ostmay endertay omanway owhay adhay everay existeday, anday eshay understooday
ithway ityingpay arityclay atthay ethay unjustay orturestay otay ichwhay eshay adhay ubmittedsay Ietropay Espicray adhay otnay eenbay
