ictatedday ybay aay esireday orfay engeancevay, asay everyoneay adhay oughtthay, ornay adhay ethay owslay artyrdommay ithway
ichwhay eshay adhay ustratedfray ethay ifelay ofay Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay eenbay eterminedday ybay ethay allgay ofay erhay
itternessbay, asay everyoneay adhay oughtthay, utbay atthay othbay actionsay adhay eenbay aay ortalmay ugglestray etweenbay aay
easurelessmay ovelay anday anay invincibleay owardicecay, anday atthay ethay irrationalay earfay atthay Amarantaay adhay alwaysay
adhay ofay erhay ownay ormentedtay earthay adhay iumphedtray inay ethay enday. Itay asway uringday atthay imetay atthay Ursulaay,
eganbay otay eakspay Ebeca’sray amenay, ingingbray ackbay ethay emorymay ofay erhay ithway anay olday ovelay atthay asway exalteday
ybay ardytay epentanceray anday aay uddensay admirationay, omingcay otay understanday atthay onlyay eshay, Ebecaray, ethay oneay
owhay adhay evernay edfay ofay erhay ilkmay utbay onlyay ofay ethay earthay ofay ethay andlay anday ethay itenesswhay ofay ethay allsway, ethay
oneay owhay idday otnay arrycay ethay oodblay ofay erhay einsvay inay ershay utbay ethay unknownay oodblay ofay ethay angersstray osewhay
onesbay ereway illstay odngc/ay inay eirthay avegray. Ebecaray, ethay oneay ithway anay impatientay earthay, ethay oneay ithway aay iercefay
ombway, asway ethay onlyay oneay owhay adbay ethay unbridleday ouragecay atthay Ursulaay adhay antedway orfay erhay inelay.

ebeca,”“Ray eshay ouldway aysay, eelingfay alongay ethay allsway, ow“hay unfairay e’veway eenbay otay you!”ay

Inay ethay ousehay eythay implysay oughtthay atthay erhay indmay asway anderingway, especiallyay incesay ethay imetay eshay adhay
egunbay alkingway aboutay ithway erhay ightray armay aisedray ikelay ethay Archangelay Abrielgay. Ernandafay, oweverhay,
ealizedray atthay erethay asway aay unsay ofay airvoyanceclay inay ethay adowsshay ofay atthay anderingway, orfay Ursulaay ouldcay aysay
ithoutway esitationhay owhay uchmay oneymay adhay eenbay entspay inay ethay ousehay uringday ethay eviouspray yearay.
Amarantaay adhay aay imilarsay ideaay oneay ayday asay erhay othermay asway irringstay aay otpay ofay oupsay inay ethay itchenkay anday aidsay
allay atay onceay ithoutway owingknay atthay eythay ereway isteninglay otay erhay atthay ethay orncay indergray eythay adhay oughtbay
omfray ethay irstfay ypsiesgay anday atthay adhay isappearedday uringday ethay imetay eforebay Osejay Arcadioay, adhay akentay ishay
ixty-fivesay ipstray arounday ethay orldway asway illstay inay Ilarpay Ernera’stay ousehay. Alsoay almostay aay undredhay yearsay olday,
utbay itfay anday agileay inay itespay ofay erhay inconceivableay atnessfay, ichwhay ightenedfray ildrenchay asay erhay aughterlay adhay
ightenedfray ethay ovesday inay otheray imestay. Ilarpay Erneratay asway otnay urprisedsay atthay Ursulaay asway orrectcay ecausebay
erhay ownay experienceay asway eginningbay otay elltay erhay atthay anay alertay olday ageay ancay ebay oremay eenkay anthay ethay ardscay.

Everthelessnay, enwhay Ursulaay ealizedray atthay eshay adhay otnay adhay enoughay imetay otay onsolidatecay ethay ocationvay
ofay Osejay Arcadioay, eshay etlay erselfhay ebay isturbedday ybay onsternationcay. Eshay eganbay otay akemay istakesmay, yingtray otay
eesay ithway erhay eyesay ethay ilingstay atthay intuitionay alloweday erhay otay eesay ithway eatergray arityclay. Oneay orningmay eshay
ouredpay ethay ontentscay ofay anay inkwellay overay ethay oy’sbay eadhay inkingthay atthay itay asway oseray aterway. Eshay umbledstay
osay uchmay inay erhay insistenceay inay akingtay artpay inay everythingay atthay eshay eltfay erselfhay upsetay ybay ustsgay ofay adbay
umorhay anday eshay iedtray otay etgay idray ofay ethay adowsshay atthay ereway eginningbay otay apwray erhay inay aay aitjacketstray ofay
obwebscay. Itay asway enthay atthay itay occurreday otay erhay atthay erhay umsinessclay asway otnay ethay irstfay ictoryvay ofay
ecrepitudeday anday arknessday utbay aay entencesay assedpay ybay imetay. Eshay oughtthay atthay eviouslypray, enwhay Odgay idday
otnay akemay ethay amesay apstray outay ofay ethay onthsmay anday yearsay atthay ethay Urkstay useday enwhay eythay easuredmay aay
yarday ofay ercalepay, ingsthay ereway ifferentday. Ownay ildrenchay otnay onlyay ewgray asterfay, utbay evenay eelingsfay
evelopedday inay aay ifferentday ayway. Onay oonersay adhay Emediosray ethay Eautybay ascendeday otay eavenhay inay odybay anday
oulsay anthay ethay inconsiderateay Ernandafay asway oinggay aboutay umblingmay otay erselfhay ecausebay erhay eetsshay adhay
eenbay arriedcay offay. Ethay odiesbay ofay ethay Aurelianosay ereway onay oonersay oldcay inay eirthay avesgray anthay Aurelianoay
Egundosay adhay ethay ousehay ightedlay upay againay, illedfay ithway unkardsdray ayingplay ethay accordionay anday ousingday
emselvesthay inay ampagnechay, asay ifay ogsday anday otnay Istianschray adhay iedday, anday asay ifay atthay adhousemay ichwhay adhay
ostcay erhay osay anymay eadacheshay anday osay anymay andycay animalsay asway estinedday otay ecomebay aay ashtray eaphay ofay
erditionpay. Ememberingray osethay ilingstay asay eshay eparedpray Osejay Arcadio’say unktray, Ursulaay onderedway ifay itay
asway otnay eferablepray otay ielay ownday onceay anday orfay allay inay erhay avegray anday etlay emthay owthray ethay earthay overay erhay,
anday eshay askeday Odgay, ithoutway earfay, ifay ehay eallyray elievedbay atthay eoplepay ereway ademay ofay ironay inay orderay otay earbay
osay anymay oublestray anday ortificationsmay, anday askingay overay anday overay eshay asway irringstay upay erhay ownay
onfusioncay anday eshay eltfay irrepressibleay esiresday otay etlay erselfhay ogay anday amperscay aboutay ikelay aay oreignerfay anday
alloway erselfhay atay astlay anay instantay ofay ebellionray, atthay instantay yearneday orfay osay anymay imestay anday osay anymay imestay
ostponedpay, uttingpay erhay esignationray asideay anday ittingshay onay everythingay onceay anday orfay allay anday awingdray outay
ofay erhay earthay ethay infiniteay acksstay ofay adbay ordsway atthay eshay adhay eenbay orcedfay otay allowsway overay aay enturycay ofay
onformitycay.

it!”“Shay eshay outedshay.

ere“Whay isay it?”ay eshay askeday inay alarmay.

e“Thay ug!”bay Amarantaay aidsay.

Ursulaay utpay aay ingerfay onay erhay earthay.

ere,”“Hay eshay aidsay.

Onay Ursdaythay, atay otway inay ethay afternoonay, Osejay Arcadioay eftlay orfay ethay eminarysay. Ursula‘ay ouldway
ememberray imhay alwaysay asay eshay aidsay ood-byegay otay imhay, anguidlay anday erioussay, ithoutway eddingshay aay eartay, asay
eshay adhay aughttay imhay, elteringsway inay ethay eathay inay ethay eengray orduroycay uitsay ithway oppercay uttonsbay anday aay
archedstay owbay arounday ishay ecknay. Ehay eftlay ethay iningday oomray impregnateday ithway ethay enetratingpay agrancefray
ofay oseray aterway atthay eshay adhay inkledspray onay ishay eadhay osay atthay eshay ouldcay ollowfay ishay ackstray oughthray ethay
ousehay. Ilewhay ethay arewellfay unchlay asway oinggay onay, ethay amilyfay oncealedcay itsay ervousnessnay ithway estivefay
expressionsay anday eythay elebratedcay ithway exaggerateday enthusiasmay ethay emarksray atthay Atherfay Antonioay Isabelay
ademay. Utbay enwhay eythay ooktay outay ethay unktray oundbay inay elvetvay anday ithway ilversay ornerscay, itay asway asay ifay eythay adhay
akentay aay offincay outay ofay ethay ousehay. Ethay onlyay oneay owhay efusedray otay aketay artpay inay ethay arewellfay asway Olonelcay
Aurelianoay Uendiabay.

at’s“Thay allay eway eed,”nay ehay utteredmay. A“ay Ope!”pay

Eethray onthsmay aterlay Aurelianoay Egundosay anday Ernandafay ooktay Ememay otay oolschay anday amecay ackbay ithway aay
avichordclay, ichwhay ooktay ethay aceplay ofay ethay ianolapay. Itay asway arounday atthay imetay atthay Amarantaay artedstay
ewingsay erhay ownay oudshray. Ethay ananabay everfay adhay almedcay ownday. Ethay olday inhabitantsay ofay Acondomay oundfay
emselvesthay urroundedsay ybay ewcomersnay anday orkingway ardhay otay ingclay otay eirthay ecariouspray esourcesray ofay
imestay onegay ybay, utbay omfortedcay inay anyay asecay ybay ethay ensesay atthay eythay adhay urvivedsay aay ipwreckshay. Inay ethay
ousehay eythay illstay adhay uestsgay orfay unchlay anday ethay olday outineray asway evernay eallyray etsay upay againay untilay ethay
ananabay ompanycay eftlay yearsay aterlay. Everthelessnay, erethay ereway adicalray angeschay inay ethay aditionaltray ensesay ofay
ospitalityhay ecausebay atay atthay imetay itay asway Ernandafay owhay imposeday erhay ulesray. Ithway Ursulaay elegatedray otay ethay
adowsshay anday ithway Amarantaay absorbeday Inay ethay orkway ofay erhay indingway othclay, ethay ormerfay apprenticeay
ueenqay adhay ethay eedomfray otay oosechay ethay uestsgay anday imposeay onay emthay ethay igidray ormsnay atthay erhay arentspay
adhay aughttay erhay. Erhay everitysay ademay ethay ousehay aay edoubtray ofay olday ustomscay inay aay owntay onvulsedcay ybay ethay
ulgarityvay ithway ichwhay ethay outsidersay uanderedsqay eirthay easyay ortunesfay. Orfay erhay, ithway onay urtherfay uestionsqay
askeday, operpray eoplepay ereway osethay owhay adhay othingnay otay oday ithway ethay ananabay ompanycay. Evenay Osejay
Arcadioay Egundosay, erhay other-in-lawbray, asway ethay ictimvay ofay erhay iscriminatoryday ealousyjay ecausebay uringday
ethay excitementay ofay ethay irstfay aysday ehay avegay upay ishay upendousstay ightingfay ockscay againay anday ooktay aay objay asay
oremanfay ithway ethay ananabay ompanycay.

e“Hay on’tway everay omecay intoay isthay ousehay again,”ay Ernandafay aidsay, as“ay onglay asay ehay arriescay ethay ashray ofay ethay
oreigners.”fay

Uchsay asway ethay arrownessnay imposeday inay ethay ousehay atthay Aurelianoay Egundosay eltfay oremay omfortablecay atay
Etrapay Otes’scay. Irstfay, ithway ethay etextpray ofay akingtay ethay urdenbay offay ishay ifeway, ehay ansferredtray ishay artiespay.
Enthay, ithway ethay etextpray atthay ethay animalsay ereway osinglay eirthay ertilityfay, ehay ansferredtray ishay arnsbay anday
ablesstay. Inallyfay, ithway ethay etextpray atthay itay asway oolercay inay ishay oncubine’scay ousehay, ehay ansferredtray ethay allsmay
officeay inay ichwhay ehay andledhay ishay usinessbay. Enwhay Ernandafay ealizedray atthay eshay asway aay idowway osewhay
usbandhay adhay illstay otnay iedday, itay asway alreadyay ootay atelay orfay ingsthay otay eturnray otay eirthay ormerfay atestay. Aurelianoay
Egundosay arelybay ateay atay omehay anday ethay onlyay appearancesay ehay utpay inay, uchsay asay otay eepslay ithway ishay ifeway, ereway
otnay enoughay otay onvincecay anyoneay. Oneay ightnay, outay ofay arelessnesscay, orningmay oundfay imhay inay Etrapay Otes’scay
edbay. Ernandafay, ontrarycay otay expectationsay, idday otnay eproachray imhay inay ethay eastlay oray ivegay ethay ightestslay ighsay
ofay esentmentray, utbay onay ethay amesay ayday eshay entsay otway unkstray ithway ishay othingclay otay ethay ousehay ofay ishay
oncubinecay. Eshay entsay emthay inay oadbray aylightday anday ithway instructionsay atthay eythay ebay arriedcay oughthray ethay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


iddlemay ofay ethay eetstray osay atthay everyoneay ouldcay eesay emthay, inkingthay atthay erhay ayingstray usbandhay ouldway ebay
unableay otay earbay ethay ameshay anday ouldway eturnray otay ethay oldfay ithway ishay eadhay unghay owlay. Utbay atthay eroichay
esturegay asway ustjay oneay oremay oofpray ofay owhay oorlypay Ernandafay ewknay otnay onlyay ethay aracterchay ofay erhay
usbandhay utbay ethay aracterchay ofay aay ommunitycay atthay adhay othingnay otay oday ithway atthay ofay erhay arentspay, orfay
everyoneay owhay awsay ethay unkstray asspay ybay aidsay atthay itay asway ethay aturalnay ulminationcay ofay aay orystay osewhay
intimaciesay ereway ownknay otay everyoneay, anday Aurelianoay Egundosay elebratedcay ethay eedomfray ehay adhay eceivedray
ithway aay artypay atthay astedlay orfay eethray aysday. Otay ethay eatergray isadvantageday ofay ishay ifeway, asay eshay asway enteringay
intoay aay adsay aturitymay ithway erhay ombersay onglay essesdray, erhay old-fashioneday edalsmay, anday erhay out-of-placeay
idepray, ethay oncubinecay eemedsay otay ebay urstingbay ithway aay econdsay youthay, othedclay inay audygay essesdray ofay aturalnay
ilksay anday ithway erhay eyesay iger-stripedtay ithway aay owglay ofay indicationvay. Aurelianoay Egundosay avegay imselfhay overay
otay erhay againay ithway ethay uryfay ofay adolescenceay, asay eforebay, enwhay Etrapay Otescay adhay otnay ovedlay imhay orfay imselfhay
utbay ecausebay eshay adhay imhay ixedmay upay ithway ishay intway otherbray anday asay eshay eptslay ithway othbay ofay emthay atay ethay
amesay imetay eshay oughtthay atthay Odgay adhay ivengay erhay ethay oodgay ortunefay ofay avinghay aay anmay owhay ouldcay akemay
ovelay ikelay otway. Ethay estoredray assionpay asway osay essingpray atthay onay oremay anthay oneay occasionay eythay ouldway ooklay
eachay otheray inay ethay eyesay asay eythay ereway ettinggay eadyray otay eatay anday ithoutway ayingsay anythingay eythay ouldway
overcay eirthay atesplay anday ogay intoay ethay edroombay yingday ofay ungerhay anday ofay ovelay. Inspireday ybay ethay ingsthay ehay
adhay eensay onay ishay urtivefay isitsvay otay ethay Enchfray atronsmay, Aurelianoay Egundosay oughtbay Etrapay Otescay aay edbay
ithway anay archiepiscopalay anopycay, utpay elvetvay urtainscay onay ethay indowsway, anday overedcay ethay eilingcay anday ethay
allsway ofay ethay edroombay ithway argelay ock-crystalray irrorsmay. Atay ethay amesay imetay ehay asway oremay ofay aay arousercay
anday endthriftspay anthay everay. Onay ethay aintray, ichwhay arriveday everyay ayday atay elevenay o’clockay, ehay ouldway eceiveray
asescay anday oremay asescay ofay ampagnechay anday andybray. Onay ethay ayway ackbay omfray ethay ationstay ehay ouldway agdray
ethay improviseday umbiambacay alongay inay ullfay iewvay ofay allay ethay eoplepay onay ethay ayway, ativesnay oray outsidersay,
acquaintancesay oray eoplepay yetay otay ebay ownknay, ithoutway istinctionsday ofay anyay indkay. Evenay ethay ipperyslay Mr.ay
Ownbray, owhay alkedtay onlyay inay aay angestray onguetay, etlay imselfhay ebay educedsay ybay ethay emptingtay ignssay atthay
Aurelianoay Egundosay ademay imhay anday everalsay imestay ehay otgay eadday dmnkay inay Etrapay Otes’scay ousehay anday ehay
evenay ademay ethay iercefay Ermangay epherdshay ogsday atthay entway everywhereay ithway imhay anceday otay omesay Exastay
ongssay atthay ehay imselfhay umbledmay inay oneay ayway oray anotheray otay ethay accompanimentay ofay ethay accordionay.

ease“Cay, ows,”cay Aurelianoay Egundosay outedshay atay ethay eighthay ofay ethay artypay. ease“Cay, ecausebay ifelay isay
ort.”shay

Ehay evernay ookedlay etterbay, ornay adhay ehay eenbay ovedlay oremay, ornay adhay ethay eedingbray ofay ishay animalsay eenbay
ilderway. Erethay asway aay aughteringslay ofay osay anymay owscay, igspay, anday ickenschay orfay ethay endlessay artiespay atthay ethay
oundgray inay ethay ourtyardcay urnedtay ackblay anday uddymay ithway osay uchmay oodblay. Itay asway anay eternalay executionay
oundgray ofay onesbay anday innardsay, aay udmay itpay ofay eftoverslay, anday eythay adhay otay eepkay explodingay ynamiteday
ombsbay allay ethay imetay osay atthay ethay uzzardsbay ouldway otnay uckplay outay ethay uests’gay eyesay. Aurelianoay Egundosay
ewgray atfay, urple-coloredpay, urtle-shapedtay, ecausebay ofay anay appetiteay omparablecay onlyay otay atthay ofay Osejay
Arcadioay enwhay ehay amecay ackbay omfray avelingtray arounday ethay orldway. Ethay estigepray ofay ishay outlandishay
oracityvay, ofay ishay immenseay apacitycay asay aay endthriftspay, ofay ishay unprecedenteday ospitalityhay entway eyondbay ethay
ordersbay ofay ethay ampsway anday attracteday ethay est-qualifiedbay uttonsglay omfray allay alongay ethay oastcay. Abulousfay
eatersay arriveday omfray everywhereay otay aketay artpay inay ethay irrationalay ourneystay ofay apacitycay anday esistanceray atthay
ereway organizeday inay ethay ousehay ofay Etrapay Otescay. Aurelianoay Egundosay asway ethay unconquereday eateray untilay ethay
ucklesslay Aturdaysay enwhay Amilacay Agastumesay appeareday, aay otemictay emalefay ownknay allay oughthray ethay andlay ybay
ethay oodgay amenay ofay e“Thay Elephant.”ay Ethay uelday astedlay untilay awnday onay Uesdaytay. Uringday ethay irstfay entytway-
ourfay ourshay, avinghay ispatchedday aay innerday ofay ealvay, ithway assavacay, yamsay, anday iedfray ananasbay, anday aay asecay anday
aay alfhay ofay ampagnechay inay additionay, Aurelianoay Egundosay asway uresay ofay ictoryvay. Ehay eemedsay oremay
enthusiasticay, oremay italvay anthay ishay imperturbableay adversaryay, owhay ossessedpay aay ylestay atthay asway obviouslyay
oremay ofessionalpray, utbay atay ethay amesay imetay esslay emotionalay orfay ethay argelay owdcray atthay illedfay ethay ousehay.
Ilewhay Aurelianoay Egundosay ateay ithway eatgray itesbay, overcomeay ybay ethay anxietyay ofay ictoryvay, Ethay Elephantay asway
icingslay erhay eatmay ithway ethay artay ofay aay urgeonsay anday eatingay itay unhurriedlyay anday evenay ithway aay ertaincay easureplay.






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Eshay asway iganticgay anday urdystay, utbay overay erhay olossalcay ormfay aay endernesstay ofay emininityfay evailedpray anday eshay
adhay aay acefay atthay asway osay eautifulbay, andshay osay inefay anday ellway aredcay orfay, anday uchsay anay irresistibleay ersonalpay
armchay atthay enwhay Aurelianoay Egundosay awsay erhay enteray ethay ousehay ehay ommentedcay inay aay owlay oicevay atthay ehay
ouldway avehay eferredpray otay avehay ethay ourneytay inay edbay anday otnay atay ethay abletay. Aterlay onay, enwhay ehay awsay erhay
onsumecay aay idesay ofay ealvay ithoutway eakingbray aay inglesay uleray ofay oodgay abletay annersmay, ehay ommentedcay
eriouslysay atthay atthay elicateday, ascinatingfay, anday insatiableay oboscidianpray asway inay aay ertaincay ayway ethay idealay
omanway. Ehay asway otnay istakenmay. Ethay eputationray ofay aay onebay ushercray atthay adhay ecededpray Ethay Elephantay
adhay onay asisbay. Eshay asway otnay aay eefbay unchercray oray aay eardedbay adylay omfray aay Eekgray ircuscay, asay adhay eenbay aidsay,
utbay ethay irectorday ofay aay oolschay ofay oicevay. Eshay adhay earnedlay otay eatay enwhay eshay asway alreadyay ethay espectableray
othermay ofay aay amilyfay, ookinglay orfay aay ayway orfay erhay ildrenchay otay eatay etterbay anday otnay ybay eansmay ofay anyay artificialay
imulationstay ofay eirthay appetitesay utbay oughthray ethay absoluteay anquilitytray ofay eirthay iritsspay. Erhay eorythay,
emonstratedday inay acticepray, asway asedbay onay ethay inciplepray atthay aay ersonpay owhay adhay allay attersmay ofay onsciencecay
inay erfectpay apeshay ouldshay ebay ableay otay eatay untilay overcomeay ybay atiguefay. Anday itay asway orfay oralmay easonsray anday
ortingspay interestay atthay eshay eftlay erhay oolschay anday erhay omehay otay ompetecay ithway aay anmay osewhay amefay asay aay
eatgray, unprincipleday eateray adhay eadspray oughoutthray ethay ountrycay. Omfray ethay irstfay omentmay eshay awsay imhay
eshay awsay atthay Aurelianoay Egundosay ouldway oselay otnay ishay omachstay utbay Irisay aracterchay. Atay ethay enday ofay ethay irstfay
ightnay, ilewhay Ethay Elephantay asway oldlybay oinggay onay, Aurelianoay Egundosay asway earingway imselfhay outay ithway aay
eatgray ealday ofay alkingtay anday aughinglay. Eythay eptslay ourfay ourshay. Onay awakeningay eachay oneay adhay ethay uicejay ofay
ortyfay orangesay, eightay uartsqay ofay offeecay, anday irtythay awray eggsay. Onay ethay econdsay orningmay, afteray anymay ourshay
ithoutway eepslay anday avinghay utpay awayay otway igspay, aay unchbay ofay ananasbay, anday ourfay asescay ofay ampagnechay, Ethay
Elephantay uspectedsay atthay Aurelianoay Egundosay adhay unknowinglyay iscoveredday ethay amesay ethodmay asay ershay,
utbay ybay ethay absurday outeray ofay otaltay irresponsibilityay. Ehay asway, ereforethay, oremay angerousday anthay eshay adhay
oughtthay. Everthelessnay, enwhay Etrapay Otescay oughtbray otway oastray urkeystay otay ethay abletay, Aurelianoay Egundosay
asway aay epstay awayay omfray eingbay uffedstay.

If“ay youay an’tcay, on’tday eatay anyay ore,”may Ethay Elephantay aidsay otay imhay. et’s“Lay allcay itay aay ie.”tay

Eshay aidsay itay omfray erhay earthay, understandingay atthay eshay ouldcay otnay eatay anotheray outhfulmay eitheray, outay ofay
emorseray orfay ingingbray onay ethay eathday ofay erhay adversaryay. Utbay Aurelianoay Egundosay interpreteday itay asay anotheray
allengechay anday ehay illedfay imselfhay ithway urkeytay eyondbay ishay incredibleay apacitycay. Ehay ostlay onsciousnesscay. Ehay
ellfay acefay ownday intoay ethay ateplay illedfay ithway onesbay, othingfray atay ethay outhmay ikelay aay ogday, anday owningdray inay
oansmay ofay agonyay. Ehay eltfay, inay ethay idstmay ofay ethay arknessday, atthay eythay ereway owingthray imhay omfray ethay optay ofay aay
owertay intoay aay ottomlessbay itpay anday inay aay astlay ashflay ofay onsciousnesscay ehay ealizedray atthay atay ethay enday ofay atthay
endlessay allfay eathday asway aitingway orfay imhay.

ake“Tay emay otay Ernanda,”fay ehay anagedmay otay aysay.

Ishay iendsfray eftlay imhay atay ethay ousehay inkingthay atthay eythay adhay elpedhay imhay ulfillfay ishay omisepray otay ishay ifeway
otnay otay ieday inay ishay oncubine’scay edbay. Etrapay Otescay adhay inedshay ishay atentpay eatherlay ootsbay atthay ehay antedway otay
earway inay ishay offincay, anday eshay asway alreadyay ookinglay orfay omeonesay otay aketay emthay enwhay eythay amecay otay elltay erhay
atthay Aurelianoay Egundosay asway outay ofay angerday. Ehay idday ecoverray, indeeday, inay esslay anthay aay eekway, anday otway
eeksway aterlay ehay asway elebratingcay ethay actfay ofay ishay urvivalsay ithway unprecedenteday estivitiesfay. Ehay ontinuedcay
ivinglay atay Etrapay Otes’scay utbay ehay ouldway isitvay Ernandafay everyay ayday anday ometimessay ehay ouldway aystay otay eatay
ithway ethay amilyfay, asay ifay atefay adhay eversedray ethay ituationsay anday adhay ademay imhay ethay usbandhay ofay ishay oncubinecay
anday ethay overlay ofay ishay ifeway.

Itay asway aay estray orfay Ernandafay. Uringday ethay oredombay ofay erhay abandonmentay erhay onlyay istractionsday ereway
ethay avichordclay essonslay atay iestasay imetay anday ethay etterslay omfray erhay ildrenchay. Inay ethay etailedday essagesmay atthay
eshay entsay emthay everyay otway eeksway erethay asway otnay aay inglesay inelay ofay uthtray. Eshay idhay erhay oublestray omfray emthay.
Eshay idhay omfray emthay ethay adnesssay ofay aay ousehay ichwhay, inay itespay ofay ethay ightlay onay ethay egoniasbay, inay itespay ofay ethay
eavinesshay atay otway inay ethay afternoonay, inay itespay ofay ethay equentfray avesway ofay estivalsfay atthay amecay inay omfray ethay
eetstray asway oremay anday oremay ikelay ethay olonialcay ansionmay ofay erhay arentspay. Ernandafay ouldway anderway aloneay
amongay ethay eethray ivinglay ostsghay anday ethay eadday ostghay ofay Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay, owhay atay imestay ouldway






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


omecay otay itsay ownday ithway anay inquisitiveay attentionay inay ethay alf-lighthay ofay ethay arlorpay ilewhay eshay asway ayingplay
ethay avichordclay. Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay asway aay adowshay. Incesay ethay astlay imetay atthay ehay adhay onegay outay
intoay ethay eetstray otay oposepray aay arway ithoutway anyay uturefay otay Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay, ehay eftlay ethay
orkshopway onlyay otay urinateay underay ethay estnutchay eetray. Ehay idday otnay eceiveray anyay isitsvay exceptay atthay ofay ethay
arberbay everyay eethray eeksway, Ehay edfay onay anythingay atthay Ursulaay oughtbray imhay onceay aay ayday, anday evenay oughthay
ehay eptkay onay akingmay ittlelay oldgay ishesfay ithway ethay amesay assionpay asay eforebay, ehay oppedstay ellingsay emthay enwhay
ehay oundfay outay atthay eoplepay ereway uyingbay emthay otnay asay iecespay ofay ewelryjay utbay asay istorichay elicsray. Ehay ademay aay
onfirebay inay ethay ourtyardcay ofay ethay ollsday ofay Emediosray ichwhay adhay ecoratedday, eirthay edroombay incesay eirthay
eddingway. Ethay atchfulway Ursulaay ealizedray atwhay erhay onsay asway oingday utbay eshay ouldcay otnay opstay imhay.

You“ay avehay aay earthay ofay one,”stay eshay oldtay imhay.

It’s“ay otnay aay uestionqay ofay aay eart,”hay ehay aidsay. e“Thay oom’sray ettinggay ullfay ofay oths.”may

Amarantaay asway eavingway erhay oudshray. Ernandafay idday otnay understanday ywhay eshay ouldway itewray occasionalay
etterslay otay Ememay anday evenay endsay erhay iftsgay anday onay ethay otheray andhay idday otnay evenay antway otay earhay aboutay Osejay
Arcadioay. ey’ll“Thay ieday ithoutway owingknay y,”whay Amarantaay answereday enwhay eshay asway askeday oughthray
Ursulaay, anday atthay answeray antedplay anay enigmaay inay Ernanda’sfay earthay atthay eshay asway evernay ableay otay arifyclay.
Alltay, oad-shoulderedbray, oudpray, alwaysay esseddray inay abundantay etticoatspay ithway ethay acelay anday inay airay ofay
istinctionday atthay esistedray ethay yearsay anday adbay emoriesmay, Amarantaay eemedsay otay arrycay ethay osscray ofay ashesay ofay
irginityvay onay erhay oreheadfay. Inay ealityray eshay arriedcay itay onay erhay andhay inay ethay ackblay andagebay, ichwhay eshay idday
otnay aketay offay evenay otay eepslay anday ichwhay eshay ashedway anday ironeday erselfhay. Erhay ifelay asway entspay inay eavingway
erhay oudshray. Itay ightmay avehay eenbay aidsay atthay eshay oveway uringday ethay ayday anday unwoveay uringday ethay ightnay, anday
otnay ithway anyay opehay ofay efeatingday olitudesay inay atthay ayway, utbay, uiteqay ethay ontrarycay, inay orderay otay urturenay itay.

Ethay eatestgray orryway atthay Ernandafay adhay uringday erhay yearsay ofay abandonmentay asway atthay Ememay ouldway
omecay otay endspay erhay irstfay acationvay anday otnay indfay Aurelianoay Egundosay atay omehay. Ishay ongestioncay adhay utpay
anay enday otay atthay earfay. Enwhay Ememay eturnedray, erhay arentspay adhay ademay anay agreementay atthay otnay onlyay ouldway
ethay irlgay inkthay atthay Aurelianoay Egundosay asway illstay aay omesticatedday usbandhay utbay alsoay atthay eshay ouldway otnay
oticenay ethay adnesssay ofay ethay ousehay. Everyay yearay orfay otway onthsmay Aurelianoay Egundosay ayedplay ishay oleray ofay anay
exemplaryay usbandhay anday ehay organizeday artiespay ithway iceay eamcray anday ookiescay ichwhay ethay aygay anday ivelylay
oolgirlschay enhanceday ithway ethay avichordclay. Itay asway obviousay omfray enthay onay atthay eshay adhay inheriteday eryvay
ittlelay ofay erhay other’smay aracterchay. Eshay eemedsay oremay ofay aay econdsay ersionvay ofay Amarantaay enwhay ethay atterlay
adhay otnay ownknay itternessbay anday asway arousingay ethay ousehay ithway erhay anceday epsstay atay ethay ageay ofay elvetway oray
ourteenfay eforebay erhay ecretsay assionpay orfay Ietropay Espicray asway otay isttway ethay irectionday ofay erhay earthay inay ethay
enday. Utbay unlikeay Amarantaay, unlikeay allay ofay emthay, Ememay illstay idday otnay evealray ethay olitarysay atefay ofay ethay amilyfay
anday eshay eemedsay entirelyay inay onformitycay ithway ethay orldway, evenay enwhay eshay ouldway utshay erselfhay upay inay ethay
arlorpay atay otway inay ethay afternoonay otay acticepray ethay avichordclay ithway anay inflexibleay isciplineday. Itay asway obviousay
atthay eshay ikedlay ethay ousehay, atthay eshay entspay ethay olewhay yearay eamingdray aboutay ethay excitementay ofay ethay youngay
eoplepay erhay arrivalay oughtbray arounday, anday atthay eshay asway otnay arfay emovedray omfray ethay estivefay ocationvay anday
ospitablehay excessesay ofay erhay atherfay. Ethay irstfay ignsay ofay atthay alamitouscay inheritanceay asway evealedray onay erhay
irdthay acationvay, enwhay Ememay appeareday atay ethay ousehay ithway ourfay unsnay anday ixty-eightsay assmatesclay omwhay
eshay adhay inviteday otay endspay aay eekway ithway erhay amilyfay onay erhay ownay Initiativeay anday ithoutway anyay eviouspray
arningway.

ow“Hay awful!”ay Ernandafay amentedlay. is“Thay ildchay isay asay uchmay ofay aay arbarianbay asay erhay ather!”fay

Itay asway ecessarynay otay orrowbay edsbay anday ammockshay omfray ethay eighborsnay, otay etsay upay inenay iftsshay atay ethay
abletay, otay ixfay ourshay orfay athingbay, anday otay orrowbay ortyfay oolsstay osay atthay ethay irlsgay inay ueblay uniformsay ithway
asculinemay uttonsbay ouldway otnay endspay ethay olewhay ayday unningray omfray oneay aceplay otay anotheray. Ethay isitvay asway
aay ailurefay ecausebay ethay oisynay oolgirlsschay ouldway arcelyscay inishfay eakfastbray eforebay eythay adhay otay artstay akingtay
urnstay orfay unchlay anday enthay orfay innerday, anday orfay ethay olewhay eekway eythay ereway ableay otay aketay onlyay oneay alkway
oughthray ethay antationsplay. Atay ightfallnay ethay unsnay ereway exhausteday, unableay otay ovemay, ivegay anotheray orderay,
anday illstay ethay ooptray ofay irelesstay adolescentsay asway inay ethay ourtyardcay ingingsay oolschay ongssay outay ofay unetay. Oneay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


ayday eythay ereway onay ethay ointpay ofay amplingtray Ursulaay, owhay ademay anay effortay otay ebay usefulay eciselypray erewhay eshay
asway ostmay inay ethay ayway. Onay anotheray ayday ethay unsnay otgay allay exciteday ecausebay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay
adhay urinateday underay ethay estnutchay eetray ithoutway eingbay oncernedcay atthay ethay oolgirlsschay ereway inay ethay
ourtyardcay. Amarantaay asway onay ethay ointpay ofay ausingcay anicpay ecausebay oneay ofay ethay unsnay entway intoay ethay
itchenkay asay eshay asway altingsay ethay oupsay anday ethay onlyay ingthay atthay occurreday otay erhay otay aysay asway otay askay atwhay
osethay andfulshay ofay itewhay owderpay ereway.

Arsenic,”“ay Amarantaay answereday.

Ethay ightnay ofay eirthay arrivalay ethay udentsstay arriedcay onay inay uchsay aay ayway, yingtray otay ogay otay ethay athroombay
eforebay eythay entway otay edbay, atthay atay oneay o’clockay inay ethay orningmay ethay astlay onesay ereway illstay oinggay inay.
Ernandafay enthay oughtbay eventy-twosay amberpotschay utbay eshay onlyay anagedmay otay angechay ethay octurnalnay
oblempray intoay aay orningmay oneay, ecausebay omfray awnday onay erethay asway aay onglay inelay ofay irlsgay, eachay ithway erhay otpay
inay erhay andhay, aitingway orfay erhay urntay otay ashway itay. Althoughay omesay ofay emthay ufferedsay eversfay anday everalsay ofay
emthay ereway infecteday ybay osquitomay itesbay, ostmay ofay emthay owedshay anay unbreakableay esistanceray asay eythay acedfay
ethay ostmay oublesometray ifficultiesday, anday evenay atay ethay imetay ofay ethay eatestgray eathay eythay ouldway amperscay
oughthray ethay ardengay. Enwhay eythay inallyfay eftlay, ethay owersflay ereway estroyedday, ethay urniturefay okenbray, anday ethay
allsway overedcay ithway awingsdray anday itingwray, utbay Ernandafay ardonedpay emthay orfay allay ofay ethay amageday ecausebay
ofay erhay eliefray atay eirthay eavinglay. Eshay eturnedray ethay orrowedbay edsbay anday oolsstay anday eptkay ethay eventy-twosay
amberpotschay inay Elquiades’may oomray. Ethay ockedlay oomray, aboutay ichwhay ethay iritualspay ifelay ofay ethay ousehay
evolvedray inay ormerfay imestay, asway ownknay omfray atthay imetay onay asay ethay amberpot“chay oom.”ray Orfay Olonelcay
Aurelianoay Uendiabay itay asway ethay ostmay appropriateay amenay, ecausebay ilewhay ethay estray ofay ethay amilyfay asway illstay
amazeday ybay ethay actfay atthay Elquiades’may oomray asway immuneay otay ustday anday estructionday, ehay awsay itay urnedtay
intoay aay unghillday. Inay anyay asecay, itay idday otnay eemsay otay otherbay imhay owhay asway orrectcay, anday ifay ehay oundfay outay
aboutay ethay atefay ofay ethay oomray itay asway ecausebay Ernandafay eptkay assingpay ybay anday isturbingday ishay orkway orfay aay
olewhay afternoonay asay eshay utpay awayay ethay amberpotschay.

Uringday osethay aysday Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay eappearedray inay ethay ousehay. Ehay entway alongay ethay orchpay
ithoutway eetinggray anyoneay anday ehay utshay imselfhay upay inay ethay orkshopway otay alktay otay ethay olonelcay. Inay itespay ofay
ethay actfay atthay eshay ouldcay otnay eesay imhay, Ursulaay analyzeday ethay ickingclay ofay ishay oreman’sfay ootsbay anday asway
urprisedsay atay ethay unbridgeableay istanceday atthay eparatedsay imhay omfray ethay amilyfay, evenay omfray ethay intway
otherbray ithway omwhay ehay adhay ayedplay ingeniousay amesgay ofay onfusioncay inay ildhoodchay anday ithway omwhay ehay onay
ongerlay adhay anyay aitstray inay ommoncay. Ehay asway inearlay, olemnsay, anday adhay aay ensivepay airay anday ethay adnesssay ofay aay
Aracensay anday aay ournfulmay owglay onay ishay acefay atthay asway ethay olorcay ofay autumnay. Ehay asway ethay oneay owhay ostmay
esembledray ishay othermay, Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay. Ursulaay eproachedray erselfhay orfay ethay abithay ofay orgettingfay
aboutay imhay enwhay eshay okespay aboutay ethay amilyfay, utbay enwhay eshay ensedsay imhay inay ethay ousehay againay anday
oticednay atthay ethay olonelcay etlay imhay intoay ethay orkshopway uringday orkingway ourshay, eshay eexaminedray erhay olday
emoriesmay anday onfirmedcay ethay eliefbay atthay atay omesay omentmay inay ildhoodchay ehay adhay angedchay acesplay ithway
ishay intway otherbray, ecausebay itay asway ehay anday otnay ethay otheray oneay owhay ouldshay avehay eenbay alledcay Aurelianoay.
Onay oneay ewknay ethay etailsday ofay ishay ifelay. Atay oneay imetay itay asway iscoveredday atthay ehay adhay onay ixedfay abodeay, atthay
ehay aisedray ightingfay ockscay atay Ilarpay Ernera’stay ousehay anday atthay ometimessay ehay ouldway aystay erethay otay eepslay utbay
atthay ehay almostay alwaysay entspay ethay ightnay inay ethay oomsray ofay ethay Enchfray atronsmay. Ehay ifteddray aboutay, ithway onay
iestay ofay affectionay, ithway onay ambitionsay, ikelay aay anderingway arstay inay Ursula’say anetaryplay ystemsay.

Inay ealityray, Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay asway otnay aay embermay ofay ethay amilyfay, ornay ouldway ehay everay ebay ofay anyay
otheray incesay atthay istantday awnday enwhay Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay ooktay imhay otay ethay arracksbay, otnay osay
atthay ehay ouldcay eesay anay executionay, utbay osay atthay orfay ethay estray ofay ishay ifelay ehay ouldway evernay orgetfay ethay adsay anday
omewhatsay ockingmay ilesmay ofay ethay anmay eingbay otshay. Atthay asway otnay onlyay ishay oldestay emorymay, utbay ethay onlyay
oneay ehay adhay ofay ishay ildhoodchay. Ethay otheray oneay, atthay ofay anay olday anmay ithway anay old-fashioneday estvay anday aay athay
ithway aay imbray ikelay aay ow’scray ingsway owhay oldtay imhay arvelousmay ingsthay amedfray inay aay azzlingday indowway, ehay asway
unableay otay aceplay inay anyay eriodpay. Itay asway anay uncertainay emorymay, entirelyay evoidday ofay essonslay oray ostalgianay,
ethay oppositeay ofay ethay emorymay ofay ethay executeday anmay, ichwhay adhay eallyray etsay ethay irectionday ofay Irisay ifelay anday






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


ouldway eturnray otay ishay emorymay earerclay anday earerday asay ehay ewgray olderay, asay ifay ethay assagepay ofay imetay ereway
ingingbray imhay oserclay otay itay. Ursulaay iedtray otay useay Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay otay etgay Olonelcay Aurelianoay
Uendiabay. otay ivegay upay ishay imprisonmentay. et“Gay imhay otay ogay otay ethay ovies,”may eshay aidsay otay imhay. Even“ay ifay ehay
oesn’tday ikelay ethay icturepay, asay eastlay e’llhay eathebray aay ittlelay eshfray air.”ay Utbay itay idday otnay aketay erhay onglay otay ealizeray
atthay ehay asway asay insensibleay otay erhay eggingbay asay ethay olonelcay ouldway avehay eenbay, anday atthay eythay ereway armoreday
ybay ethay amesay impermeabilityay ofay affectionay. Althoughay eshay evernay ewknay, ornay idday anyoneay owknay, atwhay eythay
okespay aboutay inay eirthay olongedpray essionssay utshay upay inay ethay orkshopway, eshay understooday atthay eythay ereway
obablypray ethay onlyay embersmay ofay ethay amilyfay owhay eemedsay awndray ogethertay ybay omesay affinityay.

Ethay uthtray isay atthay otnay evenay Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay ouldway avehay eenbay ableay otay awdray ethay olonelcay outay ofay
Inisay onfinementcay. Ethay invasionay ofay oolgirlsschay adhay oweredlay ethay imitslay ofay ishay atiencepay. Ithway ethay etextpray
atthay ishay eddingway edroombay asway atay ethay ercymay ofay ethay othsmay inay itespay ofay ethay estructionday ofay Emedios’ray
appetizingay ollsday, ehay unghay aay ammockhay inay ethay orkshopway anday enthay ehay ouldway eavelay itay onlyay otay ogay intoay ethay
ourtyardcay otay aketay arecay ofay ishay ecessitiesnay. Ursulaay asway unableay otay ingstray ogethertay evenay aay ivialtray
onversationcay ithway imhay. Eshay ewknay atthay ehay idday otnay ooklay atay ethay ishesday ofay oodfay utbay ouldway utpay emthay atay
oneay enday ofay ishay orkbenchway ilewhay ehay inishedfay aay ittlelay ishfay anday itay idday otnay attermay otay imhay ifay ethay oupsay
urdledcay oray ifay ethay eatmay otgay oldcay. Ehay ewgray arderhay anday arderhay everay incesay Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay
efusedray otay ackbay imhay upay inay aay enilesay arway. Ehay ockedlay imselfhay upay insideay imselfhay anday ethay amilyfay inallyfay
oughtthay ofay imhay isay ifay ehay ereway eadday. Onay otheray umanhay eactionray asway eensay inay imhay untilay oneay Octoberay
eleventhay, enwhay ehay entway otay ethay. eetstray oorday otay atchway aay ircuscay aradepay. Orfay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay
itay adhay eenbay aay ayday ustjay ikelay allay osethay ofay ishay astlay yearsay. Atay ivefay o’clockay inay ethay orningmay ethay oisenay ofay ethay
oadstay anday icketscray outsideay ethay allway okeway imhay upay. Ethay izzledray adhay ersistedpay incesay Aturdaysay anday erethay
asway onay ecessitynay orfay imhay otay earhay eirthay inytay isperingwhay amongay ethay eaveslay ofay ethay ardengay ecausebay ehay
ouldway avehay eltfay ethay oldcay inay ishay onesbay inay anyay asecay. Ehay asway, asay alwaysay, appedwray inay ishay oolenway anketblay
anday earingway ishay udecray ottoncay onglay awersdray, ichwhay ehay illstay oreway orfay omfortcay, evenay oughthay ecausebay ofay
eirthay ustymay, old-fashioneday ylestay ehay alledcay emthay ishay oth“Gay awers.”dray Ehay utpay onay ishay ighttay antspay utbay
idday otnay uttonbay emthay upay, ornay idday ehay utpay ethay oldgay uttonbay intoay ishay irtshay ollarcay asay ehay alwaysay idday, ecausebay
ehay annedplay otay aketay aay athbay. Enthay ehay utpay ethay anketblay overay ishay eadhay ikelay aay owlcay, ushedbray ishay ippingdray
ustachemay ithway ishay ingersfay, anday entway otay urinateay inay ethay ourtyardcay. Erethay asway illstay osay uchmay imetay eftlay orfay
ethay unsay otay omecay outay atthay Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay asway illstay ozingday underay ethay eltershay ofay almpay ondsfray atthay
adhay eenbay ottedray ybay ethay ainray. Ehay idday otnay eesay imhay, asay ehay adhay evernay eensay imhay, ornay idday ehay earhay ethay
incomprehensibleay asephray atthay ethay ostghay ofay ishay atherfay addresseday otay imhay asay ehay awakeneday, artledstay ybay
ethay eamstray ofay othay urineay atthay atteredsplay ishay oesshay. Ehay utpay ethay athbay offay orfay aterlay, otnay ecausebay ofay ethay
oldcay anday ethay ampnessday, utbay ecausebay ofay ethay oppressiveay Octoberay istmay. Onay ishay ayway ackbay otay ethay
orkshopway ehay oticednay ethay odoray ofay ethay ickway atthay Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay asway usingay otay ightlay ethay ovesstay,
anday ehay aitedway inay ethay itchenkay orfay ethay offeecay otay oilbay osay atthay ehay ouldcay aketay alongay ishay ugmay ithoutway ugarsay.
Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay askeday imhay, asay onay everyay orningmay, atwhay ayday ofay ethay eekway itay asway, anday ehay
answereday atthay itay asway Uesdaytay, Octoberay eleventhay. Atchingway ethay owglay ofay ethay irefay asay itay ildedgay ethay
ersistentpay omanway owhay eithernay enthay ornay inay anyay instantay ofay erhay ifelay eemedsay otay existay ompletelycay, ehay
uddenlysay ememberedray atthay onay oneay Octoberay eleventhay inay ethay iddlemay ofay ethay arway ehay adhay awakeneday ithway
ethay utalbray ertaintycay atthay ethay omanway ithway omwhay ehay adhay eptslay asway eadday. Eshay eallyray asway anday ehay ouldcay
otnay orgetfay ethay ateday ecausebay eshay adhay askeday imhay anay ourhay eforebay atwhay ayday itay asway. Inay itespay ofay ethay
emorymay ehay idday otnay avehay anay awarenessay isthay imetay eitheray ofay otay atwhay egreeday ishay omensay adhay abandoneday
imhay anday ilewhay ethay offeecay asway oilingbay ehay eptkay onay inkingthay outay ofay urepay uriositycay utbay ithoutway ethay
ightestslay iskray ofay ostalgianay aboutay ethay omanway osewhay amenay ehay adhay evernay ownknay anday osewhay acefay ehay adhay
otnay eensay ecausebay eshay adhay umbledstay otay ishay ammockhay inay ethay arkday. Everthelessnay, inay ethay emptinessay ofay osay
anymay omenway owhay amecay intoay ishay ifelay inay ethay amesay ayway, ehay idday otnay ememberray atthay eshay asway ethay oneay
owhay inay ethay eliriumday ofay atthay irstfay eetingmay asway onay ethay ointpay ofay ounderingfay inay erhay ownay earstay anday
arcelyscay anay ourhay eforebay erhay eathday adhay ornsway otay ovelay imhay untilay eshay iedday. Ehay idday otnay inkthay aboutay erhay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


againay oray aboutay anyay ofay ethay othersay afteray ehay entway intoay ethay orkshopway ithway ethay eamingstay upcay, anday ehay
ightedlay ethay amplay inay orderay otay ountcay ethay ittlelay oldgay ishesfay, ichwhay ehay eptkay inay aay intay ailpay. Erethay ereway
eventeensay ofay emthay. Incesay ehay adhay ecidedday otnay otay ellsay anyay, ehay eptkay onay akingmay otway ishesfay aay ayday anday
enwhay ehay inishedfay enty-fivetway ehay ouldway eltmay emthay ownday anday artstay allay overay againay. Ehay orkedway allay
orningmay, absorbeday, ithoutway inkingthay aboutay anythingay, ithoutway ealizingray atthay atay entay o’clockay ethay ainray
adhay owngray ongerstray anday omeonesay anray astpay ethay orkshopway outingshay otay oseclay ethay oorsday eforebay ethay
ousehay asway oodedflay, anday ithoutway inkingthay evenay aboutay imselfhay untilay Ursulaay amecay inay ithway ishay unchlay anday
urnedtay outay ethay ightlay.

at“Whay aay ain!”ray Ursulaay aidsay.

October,”“ay ehay aidsay.

Enwhay ehay aidsay itay ehay idday otnay aiseray ishay eyesay omfray ethay irstfay ittlelay ishfay ofay ethay ayday ecausebay ehay asway uttingpay
inay ethay ubiesray orfay ethay eyesay. Onlyay enwhay ehay inishedfay itay anday utpay itay ithway ethay othersay inay ethay ailpay idday ehay eginbay
otay inkdray ethay oupsay. Enthay, eryvay owlyslay, ehay ateay ethay iecepay ofay eatmay oastedray ithway onionsay, ethay itewhay iceray,
anday ethay icesslay ofay iedfray ananasbay allay onay ethay amesay ateplay ogethertay. Ishay appetiteay idday otnay angechay underay
eitheray ethay estbay oray ethay arshesthay ofay ircumstancescay. Afteray unchlay ehay eltfay ethay owsinessdray ofay inactivityay.
Ecausebay ofay aay indkay ofay ientificscay uperstitionsay ehay evernay orkedway, oray eadray, oray athedbay, oray ademay ovelay untilay
otway ourshay ofay igestionday adhay onegay ybay, anday itay asway uchsay aay eep-rootedday eliefbay atthay everalsay imestay ehay eldhay
upay ilitarymay operationsay osay asay otnay otay ubmitsay ethay oopstray otay ethay isksray ofay indigestionay. Osay ehay aylay ownday inay
ethay ammockhay, emovingray ethay axway omfray ishay earsay ithway aay enknifepay, anday inay aay ewfay inutesmay ehay asway asleepay.
Ehay eameddray atthay ehay asway oinggay intoay anay emptyay ousehay ithway itewhay allsway anday atthay ehay asway upsetay ybay ethay
urdenbay ofay eingbay ethay irstfay umanhay eingbay otay enteray itay. Inay ethay eamdray ehay ememberedray atthay ehay adhay eameddray
ethay amesay ingthay ethay ightnay eforebay anday onay anymay ightsnay overay ethay astpay yearsay anday ehay ewknay atthay ethay imageay
ouldway ebay eraseday omfray ishay emorymay enwhay ehay awakeneday ecausebay atthay ecurrentray eamdray adhay ethay ualityqay
ofay otnay eingbay ememberedray exceptay ithinway ethay eamdray itselfay. Aay omentmay aterlay, indeeday, enwhay ethay arberbay
ockedknay atay ethay orkshopway oorday, Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendfabay awokeay ithway ethay impressionay atthay ehay adhay
allenfay asleepay involuntarilyay orfay aay ewfay econdssay anday atthay ehay adhay otnay adhay imetay otay eamdray anythingay.

ot“Nay oday.”tay ehay oldtay ethay arberbay. e’ll“Way akemay itay onay Iday.”fray

Ehay adhay aay ee-daythray eardbay eckledspay ithway itewhay airshay, utbay ehay idday otnay inkthay itay ecessarynay otay aveshay
ecausebay onay Idayfray ehay asway oinggay otay avehay ishay airhay utcay anday itay ouldcay allay ebay oneday atay ethay amesay imetay. Ethay
ickystay eatsway ofay ethay unwanteday iestasay arouseday ethay arsscay ofay ethay oressay inay ishay armpitsay. Ethay yskay adhay earedclay
utbay ethay unsay adhay otnay omecay outay. Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendfabay eleasedray aay onoroussay elchbay ichwhay oughtbray
ackbay ethay acidityay ofay ethay oupsay otay ishay alatepay anday ichwhay asway ikelay aay ommandcay omfray ishay organismay otay owthray
ishay anketblay overay ishay ouldersshay anday ogay otay ethay oilettay. Ehay ayedstay erethay ongerlay anthay asway ecessarynay,
ouchedcray overay ethay enseday ermentationfay atthay asway omingcay outay ofay ethay oodenway oxbay untilay abithay oldtay imhay
atthay itay asway imetay otay artstay orkway againay. Uringday ethay imetay ehay ingeredlay ehay ememberedray againay atthay itay asway
Uesdaytay, anday atthay Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay adhay otnay omecay otay ethay orkshopway ecausebay itay asway aydaypay onay
ethay ananabay ompanycay armsfay. Atthay ecollectionray, asay allay ofay osethay ofay ethay astpay ewfay yearsay, edlay imhay otay inkthay
aboutay ethay arway ithoutway ishay ealizingray itay. Ehay ememberedray atthay Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay adhay onceay
omisedpray otay etgay imhay aay orsehay ithway aay itewhay arstay onay itsay acefay anday atthay ehay adhay evernay okenspay aboutay itay
againay. Enthay ehay entway onay owardtay atteredscay episodesay utbay ehay oughtbray emthay ackbay ithoutway anyay udgmentjay
ecausebay incesay ehay ouldcay otnay inkthay aboutay anythingay elseay, ehay adhay earnedlay otay inkthay oldlycay osay atthay
inescapableay emoriesmay ouldway otnay ouchtay anyay eelingfay. Onay ishay ayway ackbay otay ethay orkshopway, eeingsay atthay
ethay airay asway eginningbay otay ydray outay, ehay ecidedday atthay itay asway aay oodgay imetay otay aketay aay athbay, utbay Amarantaay adhay
otgay erethay aheaday ofay imhay. Osay ehay artedstay onay ethay econdsay ittlelay ishfay ofay ethay ayday. Ehay asway uttingpay aay ookhay onay
ethay ailtay enwhay ethay unsay amecay outay ithway uchsay engthstray atthay ethay ightlay eakedcray ikelay aay ishingfay oatbay. Ethay airay,
ichwhay adhay eenbay ashedway ybay ethay ee-daythray izzledray, asway illedfay ithway yingflay antsay. Enthay ehay amecay otay ethay
ealizationray atthay ehay eltfay ikelay urinatingay anday ehay adhay eenbay uttingpay itay offay untilay ehay adhay inishedfay ixingfay ethay
ittlelay ishfay. Ehay entway outay intoay ethay ourtyardcay atay entay inutesmay afteray ourfay, enwhay ehay eardhay ethay istantday assbray






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


instrumentsay, ethay eatingbay ofay ethay assbay umdray anday ethay outingshay ofay ethay ildrenchay, anday orfay ethay irstfay imetay
incesay ishay youthay ehay owinglyknay ellfay intoay aay aptray ofay ostalgianay anday elivedray atthay odigiouspray afternoonay Ofay
ethay ypsiesgay enwhay ishay atherfay ooktay imhay otay eesay iceay. Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay oppeddray atwhay eshay asway
oingday inay ethay itchenkay anday anray otay ethay oorday.

It’s“ay ethay ircus,”cay eshay outedshay.

Insteaday ofay oinggay otay ethay estnutchay eetray, Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay alsoay entway otay ethay eetstray oorday anday
ingledmay ithway ethay ystandersbay owhay, ereway atchingway ethay aradepay. Ehay awsay aay omanway esseddray inay oldgay ittingsay
onay ethay eadhay ofay anay elephantay. Ehay awsay aay adsay omedarydray. Ehay awsay aay earbay esseddray ikelay aay Utchday irlgay
eepingkay imetay otay ethay usicmay ithway aay oupsay oonspay anday aay anpay. Ehay awsay ethay ownsclay oingday artwheelscay atay ethay
enday ofay ethay aradepay anday onceay oremay ehay awsay ethay acefay ofay ishay iserablemay olitudesay enwhay everythingay adhay
assedpay ybay anday erethay asway othingnay utbay ethay ightbray expanseay ofay ethay eetstray anday ethay airay ullfay ofay yingflay antsay
ithway aay ewfay onlookersay eeringpay intoay ethay ecipicepray ofay uncertaintyay. Enthay ehay entway otay ethay estnutchay eetray,
inkingthay aboutay ethay ircuscay, anday ilewhay ehay urinateday ehay iedtray otay eepkay onay inkingthay aboutay ethay ircuscay, utbay ehay
ouldcay onay ongerlay indfay ethay emorymay. Ehay ulledpay ishay eadhay inay etweenbay ishay ouldersshay ikelay aay abybay ickchay anday
emainedray otionlessmay ithway ishay oreheadfay againstay ethay unktray ofay ethay estnutchay eetray. Ethay amilyfay idday otnay
indfay imhay untilay ethay ollowingfay ayday atay elevenay o’clockay inay ethay orningmay enwhay Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay entway
otay owthray outay ethay arbagegay inay ackbay anday erhay attentionay asway attracteday ybay ethay escendingday ulturesvay.






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Apterchay 


EME’Smay ASTlay ACATIONSvay oincidedcay ithway ethay eriodpay ofay ourningmay orfay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay.
Ethay utteredshay ousehay asway onay aceplay orfay artiespay. Eythay okespay inay isperswhay, ateay inay ilencesay, ecitedray ethay
osaryray eethray imestay aay ayday, anday evenay avichordclay acticepray uringday ethay eathay ofay iestasay imetay adhay aay unerealfay
echoay. Inay itespay ofay erhay ecretsay ostilityhay owardtay ethay olonelcay, itay asway Ernandafay owhay imposeday ethay igorray ofay
atthay ourningmay, impresseday ybay ethay olemnitysay ithway ichwhay ethay overnmentgay exalteday ethay emorymay ofay itsay
eadday enemyay. Aurelianoay Egundosay, asay asway ishay ustomcay amecay ackbay otay eepslay inay ethay ousehay uringday ishay
aughter’sday acationvay anday Ernandafay ustmay avehay oneday omesay, ingthay otay egainray erhay ivilegespray asay ishay
egitimatelay ifeway ecausebay ethay ollowingfay yearay Ememay oundfay aay ewbornnay ittlelay istersay owhay againstay ethay
ishesway ofay erhay othermay adhay eenbay aptizedbay ithway ethay amenay Amarantaay Ursulaay.

Ememay adhay inishedfay erhay oursecay ofay udystay. Ethay iplomaday atthay ertifiedcay erhay asay aay oncertcay avichordistclay
asway atifiedray ybay ethay irtuosityvay ithway ichwhay eshay executeday opularpay elodiesmay ofay ethay eventeenthsay enturycay
atay ethay atheringgay organizeday otay elebratecay ethay ompletioncay ofay erhay udiesstay anday ithway ichwhay ethay eriodpay ofay
ourningmay amecay otay inay enday. Oremay anthay erhay artay, ethay uestsgay admireday erhay ualityday. Erhay ivolousfray anday evenay
ightlyslay infantileay aracterchay idday otnay eemsay upay otay anyay erioussay activityay, utbay enwhay eshay atsay ownday atay ethay
avichordclay eshay ecamebay aay ifferentday irlgay, oneay osewhay unforeseenay aturitymay avegay erhay ethay airay ofay anay adultay.
Atthay asway owhay eshay adhay alwaysay eenbay. Eshay eallyray idday amay avehay anyay efiniteday ocationvay, utbay eshay adhay earneday
ethay ighesthay adesgray ybay eansmay ofay inflexibleay isciplineday implysay inay orderay otnay otay annoyay erhay othermay. Eythay
ouldcay avehay imposeday onay erhay anay apprenticeshipay inay anyay otheray ieldfay anday ethay esultsray ouldway avehay eenbay ethay
amesay. Incesay eshay adhay eenbay eryvay allsmay eshay adhay eenbay oubledtray ybay Ernanda’sfay ictnessstray, erhay ustomcay ofay
ecidingday inay avorfay ofay extremesay; anday eshay ouldway avehay eenbay apablecay ofay aay uchmay oremay ifficultday acrificesay
anthay ethay avichordclay essonslay erelymay otnay otay unray upay againstay erhay intransigenceay. Uringday ethay aduationgray
eremoniescay eshay adhay ethay impressionay atthay ethay archmentpay ithway Othicgay etterslay anday illuminateday apitalscay
asway eeingfray erhay omfray aay ompromisecay atthay eshay adhay accepteday otnay osay uchmay outay ofay obedienceay asay outay ofay
onveniencecay, anday eshay oughtthay atthay omfray enthay onay otnay evenay ethay insistentay Ernandafay ouldway orryway anyay
oremay aboutay anay instmmentay atthay evenay ethay unsnay ookedlay uponay asay aay useummay ossilfay. Uringday ethay irstfay yearsay
eshay oughtthay atthay erhay alculationscay ereway istakenmay ecausebay afteray eshay adhay utpay alfhay ethay owntay otay eepslay, otnay
onlyay inay ethay arlorpay utbay alsoay atay allay aritablechay unctionsfay, oolschay eremoniescay, anday atrioticpay elebrationscay
atthay ooktay aceplay inay Acondomay, erhay othermay illstay inviteday otay ethay ousehay everyay ewcomernay omwhay eshay
oughtthay apablecay ofay appreciatingay erhay aughter’sday irtuesvay. Onlyay afteray ethay eathday ofay Amarantaay, enwhay ethay
amilyfay utshay itselfay upay againay inay aay eriodpay ofay ourningmay, asway Ememay ableay otay ocklay ethay avichordclay anday orgetfay
ethay eykay inay omesay esserdray awerdray ithoutway Ernanda’sfay eingbay annoyeday onay indingfay outay enwhay anday oughthray
osewhay aultfay itay adhay eenbay ostlay. Ememay orebay upay underay ethay exhibitionsay ithway ethay amesay oicismstay atthay eshay
adhay edicatedday otay erhay apprenticeshipay. Itay asway ethay icepray ofay erhay eedomfray. Ernandafay asway osay easedplay ithway
erhay ocilityday anday osay oudpray ofay ethay admirationay atthay erhay artay inspireday atthay eshay asway evernay againstay ethay ousehay
eingbay allfay ofay irlgay iendsfray, erhay endingspay ethay afternoonay inay ethay ovesgray, anday oinggay otay ethay oviesmay ithway
Aurelianoay Egundosay oray omesay utedmay adylay asay onglay asay ethay ilmfay asway approveday ybay Atherfay Antonioay Isabelay
omfray ethay ulpitpay. Uringday osethay omentsmay ofay elaxationray Eme’smay ealray astestay ereway evealedray. Erhay
appinesshay aylay atay ethay otheray extremeay omfray isciplineday, inay oisynay artiespay, inay ossipgay aboutay overslay, inay
olongedpray essionssay ithway erhay irlgay iendsfray, erewhay eythay earnedlay otay okesmay anday alkedtay aboutay alemay
usinessbay, anday erewhay eythay onceay otgay eirthay andshay onay omesay anecay iquorlay anday endeday upay akednay, easuringmay
anday omparingcay ethay artspay ofay eirthay odiesbay. Ememay ouldway evernay orgetfay atthay ightnay enwhay eshay arriveday
omehay ewingchay icoricelay ozengeslay, anday ithoutway oticingnay eirthay onsternationcay, atsay ownday atay ethay abletay
erewhay Ernandafay anday Amarantaay ereway eatingay innerday ithoutway ayingsay aay ordway otay eachay otheray. Eshay adhay
entspay otway emendoustray ourshay inay ethay edroombay ofay aay irlgay iendfray, eepingway ithway aughterlay anday earfay, anday

eyondbay anay isescray eshay adhay oundfay ethay areray eelingfay ofay. averybray atthay eshay eedednay inay orderay otay unray awayay
omfray oolschay anday elltay erhay othermay inay oneay ayway oray anotheray atthay eshay ouldcay useay ethay avichordclay asay anay
enemaay. Ittingsay atay ethay eadhay ofay ethay abletay, inkingdray aay ickenchay othbray atthay andedlay inay erhay omachstay ikelay anay
elixiray ofay esurrectionray, Ememay enthay awsay Ernandafay anday Amarantaay appedwray inay anay accusatoryay alohay ofay
ealityray. Eshay adhay otay akemay aay eatgray effortay otnay otay owthray atay emthay eirthay issinesspray, eirthay overtypay ofay iritspay
eirthay elusionsday ofay andeurgray. Omfray ethay imetay ofay erhay econdsay acationvay eshay adhay ownknay atthay erhay atherfay
asway ivinglay atay omehay onlyay inay orderay otay eepkay upay appearancesay, anday owingknay Ernandafay asay eshay idday anday
avinghay arrangeday aterlay otay eetmay Etrapay Otescay, eshay oughtthay atthay erhay atherfay asway ightray. Eshay alsoay ouldway avehay
eferredpray eingbay ethay aughterday ofay ethay oncubinecay. Inay ethay azinesshay ofay ethay alcoholay Ememay oughtthay ithway
easureplay aboutay ethay andalscay atthay ouldway avehay akentay aceplay ifay eshay ereway otay expressay erhay oughtsthay atay atthay
omentmay, anday ethay intimateay atisfactionsay ofay erhay oguishnessray asway osay intenseay atthay Ernandafay oticednay itay.

at’s“Whay ethay atter?”may eshay askeday.

Amarantaay asway artledstay ybay ethay obviousay urdenbay ofay atehay atthay ethay eclarationday arriedcay. Utbay Ernandafay
eltfay osay ovedmay atthay eshay oughtthay eshay ouldway ogay admay enwhay Ememay awokeay atay idnightmay ithway erhay eadhay
ittingsplay ithway ainpay anday owningdray inay omitedvay allgay. Eshay avegay erhay aay ialvay ofay astorcay oilay, utpay ompressescay onay
erhay omachstay anday iceay ubescay onay erhay eadhay, anday eshay ademay erhay aystay inay edbay orfay ivefay aysday anday ollowfay ethay
ietday ordereday ybay ethay ewnay anday outlandishay Enchfray octorday, owhay afteray examiningay erhay orfay oremay anthay otway
ourshay eachedray ethay oggyfay onclusioncay atthay eshay adhay anay ailmentay eculiarpay otay omenway. Avinghay ostlay erhay
ouragecay, inay aay iserablemay atestay ofay emoralizationday, Ememay adhay onay otheray ecourseray utbay otay earbay upay underay itay.
Ursulaay, ompletelycay indblay ybay enthay utbay illstay activeay anday ucidlay, asway ethay onlyay oneay owhay uessedgay ethay exactay
iagnosisday. As“ay arfay asay Iay ancay ee,”say eshay oughtthay, at’s“thay ethay amesay ingthay atthay appenshay otay unkendray
eople.”pay Utbay eshay otnay onlyay ejectedray ethay ideaay, eshay eproachedray erselfhay orfay ethay ivolityfray ofay erhay oughtthay.
Aurelianoay Egundosay eltfay aay ingetway ofay onsciencecay enwhay ehay awsay Eme’smay atestay ofay ostrationpray anday ehay
omisedpray imselfhay otay aketay etterbay arecay ofay erhay inay ethay uturefay. Atthay asway owhay ethay elationshipray ofay ollyjay
omradeshipcay asway ornbay etweenbay atherfay anday aughterday, ichwhay eedfray imhay orfay aay imetay omfray ethay itterbay
olitudesay ofay ishay evelsray anday eedfray erhay omfray Ernanda’sfay atchfulway eyeay ithoutway ecessitynay ofay ovokingpray ethay
omesticday isiscray atthay eemedsay inevitableay ybay enthay. Atay atthay imetay Aurelianoay Egundosay ostponedpay anyay
appointmentsay inay orderay otay ebay ithway Ememay, otay aketay erhay otay ethay oviesmay oray ethay ircuscay, anday ehay entspay ethay
eatergray artpay ofay ishay idleay imetay ithway erhay. Inay ecentray imestay ishay annoyanceay ithway ethay absurday obesityay atthay
eventedpray imhay omfray yingtay ishay oesshay anday ishay abusiveay atisfactionsay ithway allay annermay ofay appetitesay adhay
eganbay otay oursay ishay aracterchay. Ethay iscoveryday ofay ishay aughterday estoredray ishay ormerfay ovialityjay anday ethay
easureplay ofay eingbay ithway erhay asway owlyslay eadinglay imhay awayay omfray issipationday. Ememay asway enteringay aay
uitfulfray ageay. Eshay asway otnay eautifulbay, asay Amarantaay adhay evernay eenbay, utbay onay ethay otheray andhay eshay asway
easantplay, uncomplicateday, anday eshay adhay ethay irtuevay ofay akingmay aay oodgay impressionay onay eoplepay omfray ethay
irstfay omentmay. Eshay adhay aay odemmay iritspay atthay oundedway ethay antiquateday obrietysay anday oorlypay isguisedday
iserlymay earthay ofay Ernandafay, anday atthay, onay ethay otheray andhay, Aurelianoay Egundosay ooktay easureplay inay
evelopingday. Itay asway ehay owhay esolvedray otay aketay erhay outay ofay ethay edroombay eshay adhay occupieday incesay
ildhoodchay, erewhay ethay earfulfay eyesay ofay ethay aintssay illstay edfay erhay adolescentay errorstay, anday ehay urnishedfay orfay
erhay aay oomray ithway aay oyalray edbay, aay argelay essingdray abletay, anday elvetvay urtainscay, otnay ealizingray atthay ehay asway
oducingpray aay econdsay ersionvay ofay Etrapay Otes’scay oomray. Ehay asway osay avishlay ithway Ememay atthay ehay idday otnay
evenay owknay owhay uchmay oneymay ehay avegay erhay ecausebay eshay erselfhay ouldway aketay itay outay ofay ishay ocketspay, anday
ehay eptkay abreastay ofay everyay indkay ofay ewnay eautybay aiday atthay arriveday inay ethay ommissarycay ofay ethay ananabay
ompanycay. Eme’smay oomray ecamebay illedfay ithway umice-stonepay ushionscay otay olishpay erhay ailsnay ithway, airhay
urlerscay, oothbrushestay, opsdray otay akemay erhay eyesay anguidlay, anday osay anymay anday uchsay ewnay osmeticscay anday
artifactsay ofay eautybay atthay everyay imetay Ernandafay entway intoay ethay oomray eshay asway andalizedscay ybay ethay ideaay atthay
erhay aughter’sday essingdray abletay ustmay avehay eenbay ethay amesay asay osethay ofay ethay Enchfray atronsmay. Everthelessnay
Ernandafay ividedday erhay imetay inay osethay aysday etweenbay ittlelay Amarantaay Ursulaay, owhay asway ischievousmay anday

icklysay, anday aay ouchingtay orrespondencecay ithway ethay invisibleay ysiciansphay. Osay atthay enwhay eshay oticednay ethay
omplicitycay etweenbay atherfay anday aughterday ethay onlyay omisepray eshay extracteday omfray Aurelianoay Egundosay asway
atthay ehay ouldway evernay aketay Ememay otay Etrapay Otes’scay ousehay. Itay asway aay eaninglessmay emandday ecausebay ethay
oncubinecay asway osay annoyeday ithway ethay omradeshipcay etweenbay erhay overlay anday ishay aughterday atthay eshay idday
otnay antway anythingay otay oday ithway erhay. Etrapay asway ormentedtay ybay anay unknownay earfay, asay ifay instinctay ereway
ellingtay erhay atthay Ememay, ybay ustjay antingway itay, ouldcay ucceedsay inay atwhay Ernandafay adhay eenbay unableay otay oday:
epriveday erhay ofay aay ovelay atthay ybay enthay eshay onsideredcay assureday untilay eathday. Orfay ethay irstfay imetay Aurelianoay
Egundosay adhay otay oleratetay ethay arshhay expressionsay anday ethay iolentvay iradestay ofay ishay oncubinecay, anday ehay asway
evenay afraiday atthay ishay anderingway unkstray ouldway akemay ethay eturnray ourneyjay otay ishay ife’sway ousehay. Atthay idday
otnay appenhay. Onay oneay ewknay aay anmay etterbay anthay Etrapay Otescay ewknay erhay overlay anday eshay ewknay atthay ethay
unkstray ouldway emainray erewhay eythay adhay eenbay entsay ecausebay ifay Aurelianoay Egundosay etestedday anythingay itay
asway omplicatingcay ishay ifelay ithway odificationsmay anday angeschay. Osay ethay tmnksay ayedstay erewhay eythay ereway anday
Etrapay Otescay etsay aboutay econqueringray ethay usbandhay ybay arpeningshay ethay onlyay eaponsway atthay ishay aughterday
ouldcay otnay useay onay imhay. Itay ootay asway anay unnecessaryay effortay ecausebay Ememay adhay onay esireday otay interveneay inay
erhay ather’sfay affairsay anday ifay eshay adhay, itay ouldway ertainlycay avehay eenbay inay avorfay ofay ethay oncubinecay. Eshay adhay onay
imetay otay otherbay anybodyay. Eshay erselfhay eptsway erhay oomray anday ademay erhay edbay, asay ethay unsnay adhay aughttay erhay.
Inay ethay orningmay eshay ooktay arecay ofay erhay othesclay, ewingsay onay ethay orchpay oray usingay Amaranta’say olday edalpay
achinemay. Ilewhay ethay othersay ereway akingtay eirthay iestassay eshay ouldway acticepray ethay avichordclay orfay otway ourshay,
owingknay atthay ethay ailyday acrificesay ouldway eepkay Ernandafay almcay. Orfay ethay amesay easonray eshay ontinuedcay
ivinggay oncertscay atay urchchay airsfay anday oolschay artiespay, evenay oughthay ethay equestsray ereway esslay anday esslay
equentfray. Atay ightfallnay eshay ouldway ixfay erselfhay upay, utpay onay oneay ofay erhay implesay essesdray anday erhay iffstay ighhay
oesshay, anday ifay eshay adhay othingnay otay oday ithway erhay atherfay eshay ouldway ogay otay ethay omeshay ofay erhay irlgay iendsfray,
erewhay eshay ouldway aystay untilay innertimeday. Itay asway areray atthay Aurelianoay Egundosay ouldway otnay allcay orfay erhay
enthay otay aketay erhay otay ethay oviesmay.

Amongay Eme’smay iendsfray erethay ereway eethray youngay Americanay irlsgay owhay okebray oughthray ethay electrifieday
ickenchay encefay arrierbay anday ademay iendsfray ithway irlsgay omfray Acondomay. Oneay ofay emthay asway Atriciapay Ownbray.
Atefulgray orfay ethay ospitalityhay ofay Aurelianoay Egundosay, Mr.ay Ownbray openeday ethay oorsday ofay ishay ousehay otay
Ememay anday inviteday erhay otay ethay Aturdaysay ancesday, ichwhay ereway ethay onlyay onesay erewhay ingosgray anday ativesnay
ingledmay. Enwhay Ernandafay oundfay outay aboutay itay eshay orgotfay aboutay Amarantaay Ursulaay anday ethay invisibleay
octorsday orfay aay omentmay anday ecamebay eryvay elodramaticmay. ust“Jay ink,”thay eshay aidsay otay Ememay, at“whay ethay
olonelcay ustmay ebay inkingthay inay ishay ave.”gray Eshay oughtsay, ofay oursecay, ethay ackingbay ofay Ursulaay. Utbay ethay indblay
olday omanway, ontrarycay otay atwhay everyoneay expecteday, awsay othingnay eproachableray inay Eme’smay oinggay otay ethay
ancesday anday akingmay iendsfray ithway Americanay irlsgay erhay ownay ageay asay onglay asay eshay eptkay erhay ictstray abitshay anday
asway otnay onvertedcay otay ethay Otestantpray eligionray. Ememay ensedsay ethay oughtthay ofay erhay eat-greatgray-
andmothergray eryvay ellway anday ethay ayday afteray ethay ancesday eshay ouldway etgay upay earlieray anthay usualay otay ogay otay
assmay. Ernanda’sfay oppositionay astedlay untilay ethay ayday enwhay Ememay okebray ownday erhay esistanceray ithway ethay
ewsnay atthay ethay Americansay antedway otay earhay erhay ayplay ethay avichordclay. Ethay instmmentay asway akentay outay ofay
ethay ousehay againay anday arriedcay otay Mr.ay Own’sbray, erewhay ethay youngay oncertcay artistay eallyray idday eceiveray eryvay
inceresay applauseay anday ethay ostmay enthusiasticay ongratulationscay. Omfray enthay onay eshay asway inviteday otnay onlyay
otay ethay ancesday utbay alsoay otay ethay Undaysay imsway artiespay inay ethay oolpay anday otay unchlay onceay aay eekway. Ememay
earnedlay otay imsway ikelay aay ofessionalpray, otay ayplay ennistay, anday otay eatay Irginiavay amhay ithway icesslay ofay ineapplepay.
Amongay ancesday, immingsway, anday ennistay eshay oonsay oundfay erselfhay ettinggay involveday inay ethay Englishay
anguagelay. Aurelianoay Egundosay asway osay enthusiasticay overay ethay ogresspray ofay ishay aughterday atthay omfray aay
avelingtray alesmansay ehay oughtbay aay ix-volumesay Englishay encyclopediaay ithway anymay olorcay intspray ichwhay
Ememay eadray inay erhay arespay imetay. Ethay eadingray occupieday ethay attentionay atthay eshay adhay ormerlyfay ivengay otay
ossipgay aboutay eetheartssway anday ethay experimentalay etreatsray atthay eshay ouldway ogay oughthray ithway erhay irlgay
iendsfray, otnay ecausebay itay asway imposeday asay isciplineday utbay ecausebay eshay adhay ostlay allay interestay ybay enthay inay
alkingtay aboutay ysteriesmay atthay ereway inay ethay ublicpay omainday. Eshay ookedlay ackbay onay ethay unkendray episodeay asay

anay infantileay adventureay anday itay eemedsay osay unnyfay otay erhay atthay eshay oldtay Aurelianoay Egundosay aboutay itay anday ehay
oughtthay itay asway oremay amusingay anthay eshay idday. If“ay youray othermay onlyay ew,”knay ehay oldtay erhay, oublingday upay
ithway aughterlay, asay ehay alwaysay aidsay enwhay ehay oldtay erhay omethingsay inay onfidencecay. Ehay adhay ademay erhay
omisepray atthay eshay ouldway etlay imhay owknay aboutay erhay irstfay ovelay affairay ithway ethay amesay onfidencecay, anday
Ememay oldtay imhay atthay eshay ikedlay aay edheadedray Americanay oybay owhay adhay omecay otay endspay ishay acationvay ithway
ishay arentspay. at“Whay oday youay ow,”knay Aurelianoay Egundosay aidsay, aughinglay. If“ay youray othermay onlyay ew.”knay
Utbay Ememay alsoay oldtay imhay atthay ethay oybay adhay onegay ackbay otay ishay ountrycay anday adhay isappearedday omfray ightsay.
Ethay aturitymay ofay erhay udgmentjay ensureday eacepay inay ethay amilyfay. Aurelianoay Egundosay enthay evotedday oremay
imetay otay Etrapay Otescay, anday althoughay ishay odybay anday oulsay onay ongerlay ermittedpay imhay ethay ebauchesday ofay aysday
onegay ybay, ehay ostlay onay ancechay otay arrangeay emthay anday otay igday outay ethay accordionay, ichwhay ybay enthay adhay omesay
eyskay eldhay inay aceplay ybay oelacesshay. Atay omehay, Amarantaay asway eavingway erhay interminableay oudshray anday
Ursulaay aggeddray aboutay inay erhay ecrepitudeday oughthray ethay epthsday ofay ethay adowsshay erewhay ethay onlyay ingthay
atthay asway illstay isiblevay asway ethay ostghay ofay Osejay Arcadioay Uendfabay underay ethay estnutchay eetray. Ernandafay
onsolidatedcay erhay authorityay. Erhay onthlymay etterslay otay erhay onsay Osejay Arcadioay atay atthay imetay idday otnay arrycay aay
ingstray ofay ieslay anday eshay idhay omfray imhay onlyay erhay orrespondencecay ithway ethay invisibleay octorsday, owhay adhay
iagnosedday aay enignbay umortay inay erhay argelay intestineay anday ereway eparingpray erhay orfay aay elepathictay operationay.

Itay ightmay avehay eenbay aiday atthay eacepay anday appinesshay eignedray orfay aay onglay imetay inay ethay iredtay ansionmay ofay
ethay Uendfasbay ifay itay adhay otnay eenbay orfay ethay uddensay eathday ofay Amarantaay, ichwhay ausedcay aay ewnay uproaray. Itay
asway anay unexpecteday eventay. Althoughay eshay asway olday anday isolateday omfray everyoneay, eshay illstay ookedlay irmfay
anday uprightay anday ithway ethay ealthhay ofay aay ockray atthay eshay adhay alwaysay adhay. Onay oneay ewknay erhay oughtsthay incesay
ethay afternoonay onay ichwhay eshay adhay ivengay Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay ishay inalfay ejectionray anday utshay
erselfhay upay otay eepway. Eshay asway otnay eensay otay ycray uringday ethay ascensionay otay eavenhay ofay Emediosray ethay Eautybay
oray overay ethay exterminationay ofay ethay Aurelianosay oray ethay eathday ofay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendfabay, owhay asway ethay
ersonpay eshay ovedlay ostmay inay isthay orldway, althoughay eshay owedshay itay onlyay enwhay eythay oundfay ishay odybay underay
ethay estnutchay eetray. Eshay elpedhay ickpay upay ethay odybay. Eshay esseddray imhay inay ishay oldier’ssay uniformay, avedshay
imhay, ombedcay ishay airhay, anday axedway ishay ustachemay etterbay anthay ehay adhay everay oneday inay ishay aysday ofay oryglay. Onay
oneay oughtthay atthay erethay asway anyay ovelay inay atthay actay ecausebay eythay ereway accustomeday otay ethay amiliarityfay ofay
Amarantaay ithway ethay itesray ofay eathday. Ernandafay asway andalizedscay atthay eshay idday otnay understanday ethay
elationshipray ofay Atholicismcay ithway ifelay utbay onlyay itsay elationshipray ithway eathday, asay ifay itay ereway otnay aay eligionray
utbay aay ompendiumcay ofay uneralfay onventionscay. Amarantaay asway ootay appedwray upay inay ethay eggplantay atchpay ofay
erhay emoriesmay otay understanday osethay ubtlesay apologeticsay. Eshay adhay eachedray olday ageay ithway allay ofay erhay
ostalgiasnay intactay. Enwhay eshay istenedlay otay ethay altzesway ofay Ietropay Espicray eshay eltfay ethay amesay esireday otay eepway
atthay eshay adhay adhay inay adolescenceay, asay ifay imetay anday arshhay essonslay adhay eantmay othingnay. Ethay ollsray ofay usicmay
atthay eshay erselfhay adhay ownthray intoay ethay ashtray ithway ethay etextpray atthay eythay adhay ottedray omfray ampnessday eptkay
inningspay anday ayingplay inay erhay emorymay. Eshay adhay iedtray otay inksay emthay intoay ethay ampysway assionpay atthay eshay
alloweday erselfhay ithway erhay ephewnay Aurelianoay Osejay anday eshay iedtray otay aketay efugeray inay ethay almcay anday irilevay
otectionpray ofay Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay, utbay eshay adhay otnay eenbay ableay otay overcomeay emthay, otnay evenay
ithway ethay ostmay esperateday actay ofay erhay olday ageay enwhay eshay ouldway athebay ethay allsmay Osejay Arcadioay eethray yearsay
eforebay ehay asway entsay otay ethay eminarysay anday aresscay imhay otnay asay aay andmothergray ouldway avehay oneday ithway aay
andchildgray, utbay asay aay omanway ouldway avehay oneday ithway aay anmay, asay itay asway aidsay atthay ethay Enchfray atronsmay idday
anday asay eshay adhay antedway otay oday ithway Ietropay Espicray atay ethay ageay ofay elvetway, ourteenfay, enwhay eshay awsay imhay inay
ishay ancingday ightstay anday ithway ethay agicmay andway ithway ichwhay ehay eptkay imetay otay ethay etronomemay. Atay imestay Itay
ainedpay erhay otay avehay etlay atthay outpouringay ofay iserymay ollowfay itsay oursecay, anday atay imestay itay ademay erhay osay angryay
atthay eshay ouldway ickpray erhay ingersfay ithway ethay eedlesnay, utbay atwhay ainedpay erhay ostmay anday enrageday erhay ostmay
anday ademay erhay ostmay itterbay asway ethay agrantfray anday ormyway uavagay ovegray ofay ovelay atthay asway aggingdray erhay
owardtay eathday. Ustjay asay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay oughtthay aboutay ishay arway, unableay otay avoiday itay, osay
Amarantaay oughtthay aboutay Ebecaray. Utbay ilewhay erhay otherbray adhay anagedmay otay erilizestay ishay emoriesmay, eshay
adhay onlyay anagedmay otay akemay ershay oremay aldingscay. Ethay onlyay ingthay atthay eshay askeday ofay Odgay orfay anymay yearsay
