asway atthay ehay ouldway otnay isitvay onay erhay ethay unishmentpay ofay yingday eforebay Ebecaray. Everyay imetay eshay assedpay ybay
erhay ousehay anday otednay ethay ogresspray ofay estructionday eshay ooktay omfortcay inay ethay ideaay atthay Odgay asway isteninglay
otay erhay. Oneay afternoonay, enwhay eshay asway ewingsay onay ethay orchpay, eshay asway assaileday ybay ethay ertaintycay atthay eshay
ouldway ebay ittingsay inay atthay aceplay, inay ethay amesay ositionpay, anday underay ethay amesay ightlay enwhay eythay oughtbray erhay
ethay ewsnay ofay Ebeca’sray eathday. Eshay atsay ownday otay aitway orfay itay, asay oneay aitsway orfay aay etterlay, anday ethay actfay asway
atthay atay oneay imetay eshay ouldway ullpay offay uttonsbay otay ewsay emthay onay againay osay atthay inactivityay ouldway otnay akemay
ethay aitway ongerlay anday oremay anxiousay. Onay oneay inay ethay ousehay ealizedray atthay atay atthay imetay Amarantaay asway
ewingsay aay inefay oudshray orfay Ebecaray. Aterlay onay, enwhay Aurelianoay Istetray oldtay owhay ehay adhay eensay erhay angedchay
intoay anay apparitionay ithway eatherylay inskay anday aay ewfay oldengay eadsthray onay erhay ullskay, Amarantaay asway otnay
urprisedsay ecausebay ethay ecterspay escribedday asway exactlyay atwhay eshay adhay eenbay imaginingay orfay omesay imetay. Eshay
adhay ecidedday otay estoreray Ebeca’sray orpsecay, otay isguiseday ithway araffinpay ethay amageday otay erhay acefay anday akemay aay
igway orfay erhay omfray ethay airhay ofay ethay aintssay. Eshay ouldway anufacturemay aay eautifulbay orpsecay, ithway ethay inenlay
oudshray anday aay ush-linedplay offincay ithway urplepay imtray, anday eshay ouldway utpay itay atay ethay ispositionday ofay ethay
ormsway ithway endidsplay uneralfay eremoniescay. Eshay orkedway outay ethay anplay ithway uchsay atredhay atthay itay ademay erhay
embletray otay inkthay aboutay ethay emeschay, ichwhay eshay ouldway avehay arriedcay outay inay exactlyay ethay amesay ayway ifay itay
adhay eenbay oneday outay ofay ovelay, utbay eshay ouldway otnay alloway erselfhay otay ecomebay upsetay ybay ethay onfusioncay anday
entway onay erfectingpay ethay etailsday osay inutelymay atthay eshay amecay otay ebay oremay anthay aay ecialistspay anday asway aay
irtuosovay inay ethay itesray ofay eathday. Ethay onlyay ingthay atthay eshay idday otnay eepkay Inay indmay inay erhay earsomefay anplay asway
atthay inay itespay ofay erhay easplay otay Odgay eshay ightmay ieday eforebay Ebecaray. Atthay asway, inay actfay, atwhay appenedhay. Atay
ethay inalfay omentmay, oweverhay, Amarantaay idday otnay eelfay ustratedfray, utbay onay ethay ontrarycay, eefray ofay allay
itternessbay ecausebay eathday adhay awardeday erhay ethay ivilegepray ofay announcingay itselfay everalsay yearsay aheaday ofay
imetay. Eshay awsay itay onay oneay urningbay afternoonay ewingsay ithway erhay onay ethay orchpay aay ortshay imetay afteray Ememay
adhay eftlay orfay oolschay. Eshay awsay itay ecausebay itay asway aay omanway esseddray inay ueblay ithway onglay airhay, ithway aay ortsay ofay
antiquateday ooklay, anday ithway aay ertaincay esemblanceray otay Ilarpay Erneratay uringday ethay imetay enwhay eshay adhay
elpedhay ithway ethay oreschay inay ethay itchenkay. Ernandafay asway esentpray everalsay imestay anday idday otnay eesay erhay, inay
itespay ofay ethay actfay atthay eshay asway osay ealray, osay umanhay, anday onay oneay occasionay askeday ofay Amarantaay ethay avorfay ofay
eadingthray aay eedlenay. Eathday idday otnay elltay erhay enwhay eshay asway oinggay otay ieday oray etherwhay erhay ourhay asway
assigneday eforebay atthay ofay Ebecaray, utbay ordereday erhay otay eginbay ewingsay erhay ownay oudshray onay ethay extnay ixthsay ofay
Aprilay. Eshay asway authorizeday otay akemay itay asay omplicatedcay anday asay inefay asay eshay antedway, utbay ustjay asay onestlyhay
executeday asay Ebeca’sray, anday eshay asway oldtay atthay eshay ouldway ieday ithoutway ainpay, earfay, oray itternessbay atay uskday onay
ethay ayday atthay eshay inishedfay itay. Yingtray otay asteway ethay ostmay imetay ossiblepay, Amarantaay ordereday omesay oughray
axflay anday unspay ethay eadthray erselfhay. Eshay idday itay osay arefullycay atthay ethay orkway aloneay ooktay ourfay yearsay. Enthay eshay
artedstay ethay ewingsay. Asay eshay otgay oserclay otay ethay unavoidableay enday eshay eganbay otay understanday atthay onlyay aay
iraclemay ouldway alloway erhay otay olongpray ethay orkway astpay Ebeca’sray eathday, utbay ethay eryvay oncentrationcay avegay
erhay ethay almnesscay atthay eshay eedednay otay acceptay ethay ideaay ofay ustrationfray. Itay asway enthay atthay eshay understooday
ethay iciousvay irclecay ofay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendfa’sbay ittlelay oldgay ishesfay. Ethay orldway asway educedray otay ethay
urfacesay ofay erhay inskay anday erhay inneray elfsay asway afesay omfray allay itternessbay. Itay ainedpay erhay otnay otay avehay adhay atthay
evelationray anymay yearsay eforebay enwhay itay adhay illstay eenbay ossiblepay otay urifypay emoriesmay anday econstmctray ethay
universeay underay aay ewnay ightlay anday evokeay ithoutway emblingtray Ietropay Espi’scray ellsmay ofay avenderlay atay uskday
anday escueray Ebecaray omfray erhay oughslay ofay iserymay, otnay outay ofay atredhay oray outay ofay ovelay utbay ecausebay ofay ethay
easurelessmay understandingay ofay olitudesay. Ethay atredhay atthay eshay oticednay oneay ightnay inay Emesmay ordsway idday
otnay upsetay erhay ecausebay itay asway irectedday atay erhay, utbay eshay eltfay ethay epetitionray ofay anotheray adolescenceay atthay
eemedsay asay eanclay asay ershay ustmay avehay eemedsay anday atthay, oweverhay, asway alreadyay aintedtay ithway ancorray. Utbay
ybay enthay erhay acceptanceay ofay erhay atefay asway osay eepday atthay eshay asway otnay evenay upsetay ybay ethay ertaintycay atthay allay
ossibilitiespay ofay ectificationray ereway osedclay otay erhay. Erhay onlyay objectiveay asway otay inishfay ethay oudshray. Insteaday
ofay owingslay itay ownday ithway uselessay etailday asay eshay adhay oneday inay ethay eginningbay, eshay eededspay upay ethay orkway.
Oneay eekway eforebay eshay alculatedcay atthay eshay ouldway aketay ethay astlay itchstay onay ethay ightnay ofay Ebruaryfay  anday
ithoutway evealingray ethay otivesmay, eshay uggestedsay otay Ememay atthay eshay ovemay upay aay avichordclay oncertcay atthay

eshay adhay arrangeday orfay ethay ayday afteray, utbay ethay irlgay aidpay onay attentionay otay erhay. Amarantaay enthay ookedlay orfay aay
ayway otay elayday orfay orty-eightfay ourshay, anday eshay evenay oughtthay atthay eathday asway ivinggay erhay erhay ayway ecausebay
onay ethay ightnay ofay Ebruaryfay ourthfay aay ormstay ausedcay aay eakdownbray atay ethay owerpay antplay. Utbay onay ethay
ollowingfay ayday, atay eightay inay ethay orningmay, eshay ooktay ethay astlay itchstay inay ethay ostmay eautifulbay iecepay ofay orkway
atthay anyay omanway adhay everay inishedfay, anday eshay announceday ithoutway ethay eastlay itbay ofay amaticsdray atthay eshay
asway oinggay otay ieday atay uskday. Eshay otnay onlyay oldtay ethay amilyfay utbay ethay olewhay owntay, ecausebay Amarantaay adhay
onceivedcay ofay ethay ideaay atthay eshay ouldcay akemay upay orfay aay ifelay ofay eannessmay ithway oneay astlay avorfay otay ethay orldway,
anday eshay oughtthay atthay onay oneay asway inay aay etterbay ositionpay otay aketay etterslay otay ethay eadday.

Ethay ewsnay atthay Amarantaay Uendiabay asway ailingsay atay uskday arryingcay ethay ailmay ofay eathday eadspray
oughoutthray Acondomay eforebay oonnay, anday atay eethray inay ethay afternoonay erethay asway aay olewhay artoncay ullfay ofay
etterslay inay ethay arlorpay. Osethay owhay idday otnay antway otay itewray avegay Amarantaay erbalvay essagesmay, ichwhay eshay
otewray ownday inay aay otebooknay ithway ethay amenay anday ateday ofay eathday ofay ethay ecipientray. on’t“Day orry,”way eshay oldtay
ethay enderssay. e“Thay irstfay ingthay I’llay oday enwhay Iay etgay erethay isay otay askay orfay imhay anday ivegay imhay youray essage.”may Itay
asway arcicalfay. Amarantaay idday otnay owshay anyay upsetay oray ethay ightestslay ignsay ofay iefgray, anday eshay evenay ookedlay aay
itbay ejuvenatedray ybay aay utyday accomplisheday. Eshay asway asay aightstray anday asay inthay asay everay. Ifay itay adhay otnay eenbay orfay
erhay ardenedhay eekboneschay anday aay ewfay issingmay eethtay, eshay ouldway avehay ookedlay uchmay youngeray anthay eshay
eallyray asway. Eshay erselfhay arrangeday orfay emthay otay utpay ethay etterslay inay aay oxbay ealedsay ithway itchpay anday oldtay emthay
otay aceplay itay inay erhay avegray inay aay ayway estbay otay otectpray itay omfray ethay ampnessday. Inay ethay orningmay eshay adhay aay
arpentercay alledcay owhay ooktay erhay easurementsmay orfay ethay offincay asay eshay oodstay inay ethay arlorpay, asay ifay itay ereway
orfay aay ewnay essdray. Eshay owedshay uchsay igorvay inay erhay astlay ourshay atthay Ernandafay oughtthay eshay asway akingmay unfay
ofay everyoneay. Ursulaay, ithway ethay experienceay atthay Uendiasbay iedday ithoutway anyay illnessay, idday otnay oubtday atay allay
atthay Amarantaay adhay eceivedray anay omenay ofay eathday, utbay inay anyay asecay eshay asway ormentedtay ybay ethay earfay atthay
ithway ethay usinessbay ofay ethay etterslay anday ethay anxietyay ofay ethay enderssay orfay emthay otay arriveay uicklyqay eythay ouldway
urybay erhay aliveay inay eirthay onfusioncay. Osay eshay etsay aboutay earingclay outay ethay ousehay, arguingay ithway ethay intmdersay
asay eshay outedshay atay emthay, anday ybay ourfay inay ethay afternoonay eshay asway uccessfulsay. Atay atthay imetay Amarantaay adhay
inishedfay ividingday erhay ingsthay amongay ethay oorpay anday adhay eftlay onay ethay everesay offincay ofay unfinisheday oardsbay
onlyay ethay angechay ofay othingclay anday ethay implesay othclay ippersslay atthay eshay ouldway earway inay eathday. Eshay idday otnay
eglectnay atthay ecautionpray ecausebay eshay ememberedray atthay enwhay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay iedday eythay
adhay otay uybay aay airpay ofay ewnay oesshay orfay imhay ecausebay allay ehay adhay eftlay ereway ethay edroombay ippersslay atthay ehay
oreway inay ethay orkshopway. Aay ittlelay eforebay ivefay Aurelianoay Egundosay amecay otay etchfay Ememay orfay ethay oncertcay
anday asway urprisedsay atthay ethay ousehay asway eparedpray orfay ethay uneralfay, ifay anyoneay eemedsay aliveay atay ethay omentmay
itay asway ethay erenesay Amarantaay, owhay adhay evenay adhay enoughay imetay otay utcay erhay ornscay. Aurelianoay Egundosay
anday Ememay ooktay eavelay ofay erhay ithway ockingmay arewellsfay anday omisedpray erhay atthay onay ethay ollowingfay
Aturdaysay eythay ouldway avehay aay igbay esurrectionray artypay. Awndray ybay ethay ublicpay alktay atthay Amarantaay Uendiabay
asway eceivingray etterslay orfay ethay eadday. Atherfay Antonioay Isabelay arriveday atay ivefay o’clockay orfay ethay astlay itesray anday
ehay adhay otay aitway orfay oremay anthay ifteenfay inutesmay orfay ethay ecipientray otay omecay outay ofay erhay athbay. Enwhay ehay awsay
erhay appearay inay aay adapollammay ightshirtnay anday ithway erhay airhay ooselay overay erhay ouldersshay, ethay ecrepitday arishpay
iestpray oughtthay atthay itay asway aay icktray anday entsay ethay altaray oybay awayay. Ehay oughtthay oweverhay, atthay ehay ouldway
aketay advantageay ofay ethay occasionay otay avehay Amarantaay onfesscay afteray entytway yearsay ofay eticenceray. Amarantaay
answereday implysay atthay eshay idday otnay eednay iritualspay elphay ofay anyay indkay ecausebay erhay onsciencecay asway eanclay.
Ernandafay asway andalizedscay. Ithoutway aringcay atthay eoplepay ouldcay earhay erhay eshay askeday erselfhay alouday atwhay
orriblehay insay Amarantaay adhay ommittedcay otay akemay erhay eferpray anay impiousay eathday otay ethay ameshay ofay
onfessioncay. Ereuponthay Amarantaay aylay ownday anday ademay Ursulaay ivegay ublicpay estimonytay asay otay erhay
irginityvay.

et“Lay onay oneay avehay anyay illusions,”ay eshay outedshay osay atthay Ernandafay ouldway earhay erhay. Amaranta“ay
Uendiabay isay eavinglay isthay orldway ustjay asay eshay amecay intoay itay.

Eshay idday otnay etgay upay againay. Yinglay onay ushionscay, asay ifay eshay eallyray ereway illay, eshay aidedbray erhay onglay airhay anday
olledray itay aboutay erhay earsay asay eathday adhay oldtay erhay itay ouldshay ebay onay erhay ierbay. Enthay eshay askeday Ursulaay orfay aay

irrormay anday orfay ethay irstfay imetay inay oremay anthay ortyfay yearsay eshay awsay erhay acefay, evastatedday ybay ageay anday
artyrdommay, anday eshay asway urprisedsay atay owhay uchmay eshay esembledray ethay entalmay imageay atthay eshay adhay ofay
erselfhay. Ursulaay understooday ybay ethay ilencesay inay ethay edroombay atthay itay adhay egunbay otay owgray arkday.

ay“Say ood-byegay otay Ernanda,”fay eshay eggedbay erhay. Oneay inutemay ofay econciliationray isay orthway oremay anthay aay
olewhay ifelay ofay iendship.”fray

It’s“ay ofay onay useay ow,”nay Amarantaay epliedray.

Ememay ouldcay otnay elphay inkingthay aboutay erhay enwhay eythay urnedtay onay ethay ightslay onay ethay improviseday agestay
anday eshay eganbay ethay econdsay artpay ofay ethay ogrampray. Inay ethay iddlemay ofay ethay iecepay omeonesay isperedwhay ethay
ewsnay inay erhay earay anday ethay essionsay oppedstay. Enwhay ehay arriveday omehay, Aurelianoay Egundosay adhay otay ushpay ishay
ayway oughthray ethay owdcray otay eesay ethay orpsecay ofay ethay ageday irginvay, uglyay anday iscoloredday, ithway ethay ackblay
andagebay onay erhay andhay anday appedwray inay ethay agnificentmay oudshray. Eshay asway aidlay outay inay ethay arlorpay esidebay
ethay oxbay ofay etterslay.

Ursulaay idday otnay etgay upay againay afteray ethay inenay ightsnay ofay ourningmay orfay Amarantaay, Antasay Ofiasay eday alay
Iedadpay ooktay arecay ofay erhay. Eshay ooktay erhay ealsmay otay erhay edroombay anday annattoay aterway orfay erhay otay ashway inay
anday eshay eptkay erhay upay otay ateday onay everythingay atthay appenedhay inay Acondomay. Aurelianoay Egundosay isitedvay erhay
equentlyfray anday ehay oughtbray erhay othingclay ichwhay eshay ouldway aceplay esidebay ethay edbay alongay ithway ethay ingsthay
ostmay indispensableay orfay ailyday ifelay, osay atthay inay aay ortshay imetay eshay adhay uiltbay upay aay orldway ithinway eachray ofay erhay
andhay. Eshay anagedmay otay arouseay aay eatgray ovelay inay ittlelay Amarantaay Ursulaay, owhay asway ustjay ikelay erhay, anday omwhay
eshay aughttay owhay otay eadray. Erhay uciditylay, ethay abilityay otay ebay ufficientsay unay erselfhay ademay oneay inkthay atthay eshay
asway aturallynay onqueredcay ybay ethay eightway ofay erhay undredhay yearsay, utbay evenay oughthay itay asway obviousay atthay eshay
asway avinghay oubletray eeingsay, onay oneay uspectedsay atthay eshay asway otallytay indblay. Eshay adhay osay uchmay imetay atay erhay
isposalday enthay anday osay uchmay interioray ilencesay otay atchway overay ethay ifelay ofay ethay ousehay atthay eshay asway ethay irstfay
otay oticenay Eme’smay ilentsay ibulationtray.

ome“Cay ere,”hay eshay oldtay erhay. ow“Nay atthay ereway aloneay, onfesscay otay isthay oorpay olday omanway at’swhay
otheringbay you.”ay

Ememay avoideday ethay onversationcay ithway aay ortshay aughlay. Ursulaay idday otnay insistay, utbay eshay endeday upay
onfirmingcay erhay uspicionssay enwhay Ememay idday otnay omecay ackbay otay isitvay erhay. Eshay ewknay atthay eshay asway ettinggay
upay earlieray anthay usualay, atthay eshay idday otnay avehay aay oment’smay estray asay eshay aitedway orfay ethay imetay orfay erhay otay ogay
outay, atthay eshay entspay olewhay ightsnay alkingway ackbay anday orthfay inay ethay adjoiningay edroombay, anday atthay ethay
utteringflay ofay aay utterflybay ouldway otherbay erhay. Onay oneay occasionay eshay aidsay atthay eshay asway oinggay otay eesay Aureli¬ay
anoay Egundosay anday Ursulaay asway urprisedsay atthay Ernanda’sfay imaginationay asway osay imitedlay enwhay erhay
usbandhay amecay otay ethay ousehay ookinglay orfay ishay aughterday. Itay asway ootay obviousay atthay Ememay asway involveday inay
ecretsay attersmay, inay essingpray attersmay, inay epressedray anxietiesay onglay eforebay ethay ightnay atthay Ernandafay upsetay
ethay ousehay ecausebay eshay aughtcay erhay issingkay aay anmay inay ethay oviesmay.

Ememay asway osay appedwray upay inay erselfhay atay atthay imetay atthay eshay accuseday Ursulaay ofay avinghay oldtay onay erhay.
Actuallyay, eshay oldtay onay erselfhay. Orfay aay onglay imetay eshay adhay eenbay eavinglay aay ailtray atthay ouldway avehay awakeneday
ethay ostmay owsydray ersonpay anday itay ooktay Ernandafay osay onglay otay iscoverday itay ecausebay eshay ootay asway efoggedbay,
ybay erhay elationshipray ithway ethay invisibleay octorsday. Evenay osay eshay inallyfay oticednay ethay eepday ilencessay, ethay
uddensay outburstsay, ethay angeschay inay oodmay, anday ethay ontradictionscay ofay erhay aughterday. Eshay etsay aboutay onay aay
isguisedday utbay implacableay igilancevay. Eshay etlay erhay ogay outay ithway erhay irlgay iendsfray asay alwaysay, eshay elpedhay erhay
etgay esseddray orfay ethay Aturdaysay artiespay, anday eshay evernay askeday anay embarrassingay uestionqay atthay ightmay arouseay
erhay. Eshay alreadyay adhay aay eatgray ealday ofay oofpray atthay Ememay asway oingday ifferentday ingsthay omfray atwhay eshay aidsay,
anday yetay eshay ouldway ivegay onay indicationay ofay erhay uspicionssay, opinghay orfay ethay ightray omentmay. Oneay ightnay
Ememay aidsay atthay eshay asway oinggay otay ethay oviesmay ithway erhay atherfay. Aay ortshay imetay aterlay Ernandafay eardhay ethay
ireworksfay ofay ethay ebauchday anday ethay unmistakableay accordionay ofay Aurelianoay Egundosay omfray ethay irectionday
ofay Etrapay Otes’scay aceplay. Enthay eshay otgay esseddray, entway otay ethay oviemay eaterthay, anday inay ethay arknessday ofay ethay
eatssay eshay ecognizedray erhay aughterday. Ethay upsettingay eelingfay ofay ertaintycay oppedstay erhay omfray eeingsay ethay
anmay eshay asway issingkay, utbay eshay anagedmay otay earhay ishay emuloustray oicevay inay ethay idstmay ofay ethay eafeningday






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


outsshay anday aughterlay ofay ethay audienceay. I’m“ay orrysay, ove,”lay eshay eardhay imhay aysay, anday eshay ooktay Ememay outay ofay
ethay aceplay ithoutway ayingsay aay ordway otay erhay, utpay erhay oughthray ethay ameshay ofay aradingpay erhay alongay ethay oisynay
Eetstray ofay ethay Urkstay, anday ockedlay erhay upay inay erhay edroombay.

Onay ethay ollowingfay ayday atay ixsay inay ethay afternoonay, Ernandafay ecognizedray ethay oicevay ofay ethay anmay owhay
amecay otay allcay onay erhay. Ehay asway youngay, allowsay, ithway arkday anday elancholymay eyesay ichwhay ouldway otnay avehay
artledstay erhay osay uchmay ifay eshay adhay ownknay ethay ypsiesgay, anday aay eamydray airay atthay otay anyay omanway ithway aay earthay
esslay igidray ouldway avehay eenbay enoughay otay akemay erhay understanday erhay aughter’sday otivesmay. Ehay asway earingway
aay abbyshay inenlay uitsay ithway oesshay atthay owedshay ethay esperateday efenseday ofay uperimposedsay atchespay ofay itewhay
inczay, anday inay ishay andhay ehay asway arryingcay aay awstray athay ehay adhay oughtbay ethay Aturdaysay eforebay. Inay allay ofay ishay ifelay
ehay ouldcay evernay avehay eenbay asay ightenedfray asay atay atthay omentmay, utbay ehay adhay aay ignityday anday esencepray atthay
aredspay imhay omfray umiliationhay anday aay enuinegay eleganceay atthay asway efeatedday onlyay ybay arnishedtay andshay anday
ailsnay atthay adhay eenbay atteredshay ybay oughray orkway. Ernandafay, oweverhay, eedednay onlyay oneay ooklay otay uessgay ishay
atusstay ofay echanicmay. Eshay awsay atthay ehay asway earingway ishay oneay Undaysay uitsay anday atthay underneathay ishay irtshay ehay
orebay ethay ashray ofay ethay ananabay ompanycay. Eshay ouldway otnay etlay imhay eakspay. Eshay ouldway otnay evenay etlay imhay
omecay oughthray ethay oorday, ichwhay aay omentmay aterlay eshay adhay otay oseclay ecausebay ethay ousehay asway illedfay ithway
yelloway utterfliesbay.

o“Gay away,”ay eshay oldtay imhay. You’ve“ay otgay onay easonray otay omecay allingcay onay anyay ecentday erson.”pay

Ishay amenay asway Auriciomay Abiloniabay. Ehay adhay eenbay ornbay anday aisedray inay Acondomay, anday ehay asway anay
apprenticeay echanicmay inay ethay ananabay ompanycay aragegay. Ememay adhay etmay imhay ybay ancechay oneay afternoonay
enwhay eshay entway ithway Atriciapay Ownbray otay etgay aay arcay otay aketay aay ivedray oughthray ethay ovesgray. Incesay ethay
auffeurchay asway icksay eythay assigneday imhay otay aketay emthay anday Ememay asway inallyfay ableay otay atisfysay erhay esireday otay
itsay extnay otay ethay iverdray anday eesay atwhay ehay idday. Unlikeay ethay egularray auffeurchay, Auriciomay Abiloniabay avegay erhay
aay acticalpray essonlay. Atthay asway uringday ethay imetay atthay Ememay asway eginningbay otay equentfray Mr.ay Own’sbray
ousehay anday itay asway illstay onsideredcay improperay orfay aay adylay otay ivedray aay arcay. Osay eshay asway atisfiedsay ithway ethay
echnicaltay informationay anday eshay idday otnay eesay Auriciomay Abiloniabay againay orfay everalsay onthsmay. Aterlay onay eshay
ouldway ememberray atthay uringday ethay ivedray erhay attentionay adhay eenbay alledcay otay ishay asculinemay eautybay, exceptay
orfay ethay oarsenesscay ofay ishay andshay, utbay atthay afterwarday eshay adhay entionedmay otay Atriciapay Ownbray atthay eshay
adhay eenbay otheredbay ybay ishay atherray oudpray ensesay ofay ecuritysay. Ethay irstfay Aturdaysay atthay eshay entway otay ethay
oviesmay ithway erhay atherfay eshay awsay Auriciomay Abiloniabay againay, ithway ishay inenlay uitsay, ittingsay aay ewfay eatssay awayay
omfray emthay, anday eshay oticednay atthay ehay asway otnay ayingpay uchmay attentionay otay ethay ilmfay inay orderay otay urntay
arounday anday ooklay atay erhay. Ememay asway otheredbay ybay ethay ulgarityvay ofay atthay. Afterwarday Auriciomay Abiloniabay
amecay overay otay aysay ellohay otay Aurelianoay Egundosay anday onlyay enthay idday Ememay indfay outay atthay eythay ewknay eachay
otheray ecausebay ehay adhay orkedway inay Aurelianoay Iste’stray earlyay owerpay antplay anday ehay eatedtray erhay atherfay ithway
ethay airay ofay anay employeeay. Atthay actfay elievedray ethay islikeday atthay ishay idepray adhay ausedcay inay erhay. Eythay adhay evernay
eenbay aloneay ogethertay ornay adhay eythay okenspay exceptay inay ayway ofay eetinggray, ethay ightnay enwhay eshay eameddray atthay
ehay asway avingsay erhay omfray aay ipwreckshay anday eshay idday otnay eelfay atitudegray utbay ageray. Itay asway asay ifay eshay adhay ivengay
imhay ethay opportunityay ehay asway aitingway orfay, incesay Ememay yearneday orfay ustjay ethay oppositeay, otnay onlyay ithway
Auriciomay Abiloniabay utbay ithway anyay otheray anmay owhay asway interesteday inay erhay. Ereforethay eshay asway osay
indignantay afteray ethay eamdray atthay insteaday ofay atinghay imhay, eshay eltfay anay irresistibleay urgeay otay eesay imhay. Ethay
anxietyay ecamebay oremay intenseay uringday ethay oursecay ofay ethay eekway anday onay Aturdaysay itay asway osay essingpray atthay
eshay adhay otay akemay aay eatgray effortay orfay Auriciomay Abiloniabay otnay otay oticenay atthay enwhay ehay eetedgray erhay inay ethay
oviesmay erhay earthay asway inay erhay outhmay. Azedday ybay aay onfusedcay eelingfay ofay easureplay anday ageray, eshay avegay imhay
erhay andhay orfay ethay irstfay imetay anday onlyay enthay idday Auriciomay Abiloniabay etlay imselfhay akeshay ershay. Ememay
anagedmay otay epentray erhay impulseay inay aay actionfray ofay aay econdsay utbay ethay epentanceray angedchay immediatelyay
intoay aay uelcray atisfactionsay onay eeingsay atthay ishay andhay ootay asway eatysway anday oldcay. Atthay ightnay eshay ealizedray atthay
eshay ouldway otnay avehay aay omentmay ofay estray untilay eshay owedshay Auriciomay Abiloniabay ethay uselessnessay ofay ishay
aspirationay anday eshay entspay ethay eekway urningtay atthay anxietyay aboutay inay erhay indmay. Eshay esortedray otay allay indskay ofay
uselessay ickstray osay atthay Atriciapay Ownbray ouldway ogay etgay ethay arcay ithway erhay. Inallyfay eshay ademay useay ofay ethay

Americanay edheadray owhay asway endingspay ishay acationvay inay Acondomay atay atthay imetay anday ithway ethay etextpray ofay
earninglay aboutay ewnay odelsmay ofay arscay eshay adhay imhay aketay erhay otay ethay aragegay. Omfray ethay omentmay eshay awsay
imhay Ememay etlay erselfhay ebay eceivedday ybay erselfhay anday elievedbay atthay atwhay asway eallyray oinggay onay asway atthay eshay
ouldcay otnay earbay ethay esireday otay ebay aloneay ithway Auriciomay Abiloniabay, anday eshay asway ademay indignantay ybay ethay
ertaintycay atthay ehay understooday atthay enwhay ehay awsay erhay arriveay.

I“ay amecay otay eesay ethay ewnay odels,”may Ememay aidsay.

at’s“Thay aay inefay excuse,”ay ehay aidsay.

Ememay ealizedray atthay ehay asway urningbay inay ethay eathay ofay ishay idepray, anday eshay esperatelyday ookedlay orfay aay ayway
otay umiliatehay imhay. Utbay ehay ouldway otnay ivegay erhay anyay imetay. on’t“Day etgay upset,”ay ehay aidsay otay erhay inay aay owlay
oicevay. It’s“ay otnay ethay irstfay imetay atthay aay omanway ashay onegay azycray overay aay an.”may Eshay eltfay osay efeatedday atthay eshay
eftlay ethay aragegay ithoutway eeingsay ethay ewnay odelsmay anday eshay entspay ethay ightnay urningtay overay inay edbay anday
eepingway ithway indignationay. Ethay Americanay edheadray, owhay asway eallyray eginningbay otay interestay erhay, ookedlay
ikelay aay abybay inay iapersday. Itay asway enthay atthay eshay ealizedray atthay ethay yelloway utterfliesbay ecededpray ethay
appearancesay ofay Auriciomay Abiloniabay. Eshay adhay eensay emthay eforebay, especiallyay overay ethay aragegay, anday eshay
adhay oughtthay atthay eythay ereway awndray ybay ethay ellsmay ofay aintpay. Onceay eshay adhay eensay emthay utteringflay aboutay
erhay eadhay eforebay eshay entway intoay ethay oviesmay. Utbay enwhay Auriciomay Abiloniabay eganbay otay ursuepay erhay ikelay aay
ostghay atthay onlyay eshay ouldcay identifyay inay ethay owdcray, eshay understooday atthay ethay utterfliesbay adhay omethingsay otay
oday ithway imhay. Auriciomay Abiloniabay asway alwaysay inay ethay audienceay atay ethay oncertscay, atay ethay oviesmay, atay ighhay
assmay, anday eshay idday otnay avehay otay eesay imhay otay owknay atthay ehay asway erethay, ecausebay ethay utterfliesbay ereway alwaysay
erethay. Onceay Aurelianoay Egundosay ecamebay osay impatientay ithway ethay uffocatingsay utteringflay atthay eshay eltfay ethay
impulseay otay onfidecay erhay ecretsay otay imhay asay eshay adhay omisedpray, utbay instinctay oldtay erhay atthay ehay ouldway aughlay
asay usualay anday aysay: at“Whay ouldway youray othermay aysay ifay eshay oundfay out?”ay Oneay orningmay, ilewhay eshay asway
uningpray ethay osesray, Ernandafay etlay outay aay ycray ofay ightfray anday adhay Ememay akentay awayay omfray ethay otspay erewhay
eshay asway, ichwhay asway ethay amesay aceplay inay ethay ardengay erewhay Emediosray ethay Eautybay adhay onegay upay otay
eavenhay. Eshay adhay oughtthay orfay anay instantay atthay ethay iraclemay asway oinggay otay ebay epeatedray ithway erhay aughterday,
ecausebay eshay adhay eenbay otheredbay ybay aay uddensay appingflay ofay ingsway. Itay asway ethay utterfliesbay. Ememay awsay
emthay asay ifay eythay adhay uddenlysay eenbay ornbay outay ofay ethay ightlay anday erhay earthay avegay aay urntay. Atay atthay omentmay
Auriciomay Abiloniabay amecay inay ithway aay ackagepay atthay accordingay otay atwhay ehay aidsay, asway aay esentpray omfray
Atriciapay Ownbray. Ememay allowedsway erhay ushblay, absorbeday erhay ibulationtray, anday evenay anagedmay aay aturalnay
ilesmay asay eshay askeday imhay ethay avorfay ofay eavinglay itay onay ethay ailingray ecausebay erhay andshay ereway irtyday omfray ethay
ardengay. Ethay onlyay ilingtay atthay Ernandafay otednay inay ethay anmay omwhay aay ewfay onthsmay aterlay eshay asway otay expelay
omfray ethay ousehay ithoutway ememberingray erewhay eshay adhay eensay imhay asway ethay iliousbay exturetay ofay ishay inskay.

e’s“Hay aay eryvay angestray an,”may Ernandafay aidsay. You“ay ancay eesay inay ishay acefay atthay e’shay oinggay otay ie.”day

Ememay oughtthay atthay erhay othermay adhay eenbay impresseday ybay ethay utterfliesbay Enwhay eythay inishedfay
uningpray ethay owray ushesbay eshay ashedway erhay andshay anday ooktay ethay ackagepay otay erhay edroombay otay openay itay. Itay
asway aay indkay ofay Inesechay oytay, ademay upay ofay ivefay oncentriccay oxesbay, anday inay ethay astlay oneay erethay asway aay ardcay
aboriouslylay inscribeday ybay omeonesay owhay ouldcay arelybay itewray: E’llway etgay ogethertay Aturdaysay atay ethay oviesmay. Ememay
eltfay ithway anay aftershockay atthay ethay oxbay adhay eenbay onay ethay ailingray orfay aay onglay imetay ithinway eachray ofay
Ernanda’sfay uriositycay, anday althoughay eshay asway atteredflay ybay ethay audacityay anday ingenuityay ofay Auriciomay
Abiloniabay, eshay asway ovedmay ybay ishay Innocenceay inay expectingay atthay eshay ouldway eepkay ethay ateday. Ememay ewknay
atay atthay imetay atthay Aurelianoay Egundosay adhay anay appointmentay onay Aturdaysay ightnay. Everthelessnay, ethay irefay ofay
anxietyay urnedbay erhay osay uchmay uringday ethay oursecay ofay ethay eekway atthay onay Aturdaysay eshay onvincedcay erhay atherfay
otay eavelay erhay aloneay inay ethay eaterthay anday omecay ackbay orfay erhay afteray ethay owshay. Aay octurnalnay utterflybay
utteredflay aboutay erhay eadhay ilewhay ethay ightslay ereway onay. Anday enthay itay appenedhay. Enwhay ethay ightslay entway outay,
Auriciomay Abiloniabay atsay ownday esidebay erhay. Ememay eltfay erselfhay ashingsplay inay aay ogbay ofay esitationhay omfray
ichwhay eshay ouldcay onlyay ebay escuedray, asay adhay occurreday inay erhay eamsdray, ybay atthay anmay ellingsmay ofay easegray
omwhay eshay ouldcay arelybay eesay inay ethay adowsshay.

If“ay youay adn’thay ome,”cay ehay aidsay, You“ay evernay ouldway avehay eensay emay again.”ay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Ememay eltfay ethay eightway ofay ishay andhay onay erhay eeknay anday eshay ewknay atthay eythay ereway othbay arrivingay atay ethay
otheray idesay ofay abandonmentay atay atthay instantay.

at“Whay ocksshay emay aboutay you,”ay eshay aidsay, ilingsmay, is“ay atthay youay alwaysay aysay exactlyay atwhay youay
ouldn’tshay ebay aying.”say

Eshay ostlay erhay indmay overay imhay. Eshay ouldcay otnay eepslay anday eshay ostlay erhay appetiteay anday anksay osay eeplyday intoay
olitudesay atthay evenay erhay atherfay ecamebay anay annoyanceay. Eshay orkedway outay anay intricateay ebway ofay alsefay atesday otay
owthray Ernandafay offay ethay acktray, ostlay ightsay ofay erhay irlgay iendsfray, eapedlay overay onventionscay otay ebay ithway
Auriciomay Abiloniabay atay anyay imetay anday atay anyay aceplay. Atay irstfay ishay udenesscray otheredbay erhay. Ethay irstfay imetay
atthay eythay ereway aloneay onay ethay esertedday ieldsfay ehindbay ethay aragegay ehay ulledpay erhay ercilesslymay intoay anay animalay
atestay atthay eftlay erhay exhausteday. Itay ooktay erhay imetay otay ealizeray atthay itay asway alsoay aay ormfay ofay endernesstay anday itay
asway enthay atthay eshay ostlay erhay almcay anday ivedlay onlyay orfay imhay, upsetay ybay ethay esireday otay inksay intoay ishay upefyingstay
odoray ofay easegray ashedway offay ybay yelay. Aay ortshay imetay eforebay ethay eathday ofay Amarantaay eshay uddenlysay umbledstay
intoay inay openay acespay ofay uciditylay ithinway ethay adnessmay anday eshay embledtray eforebay ethay uncertaintyay ofay ethay
uturefay. Enthay eshay eardhay aboutay aay omanway owhay ademay edictionspray omfray ardscay anday entway otay eesay erhay inay
ecretsay. Itay asway Ilarpay Erneratay. Asay oonsay asay Ilarpay awsay erhay omecay inay eshay asway awareay ofay Eme’smay iddenhay
otivesmay. it“Say own,”day eshay oldtay erhay. I“ay on’tday eednay ardscay otay elltay ethay uturefay ofay aay Uendia,”bay Ememay idday otnay
owknay anday evernay ouldway atthay ethay entenariancay itchway asway erhay eat-grandmothergray. Ornay ouldway eshay avehay
elievedbay itay afteray ethay aggressiveay ealismray ithway ichwhay eshay evealedray otay erhay atthay ethay anxietyay ofay allingfay inay
ovelay ouldcay otnay indfay eposeray exceptay inay edbay. Itay asway ethay amesay ointpay ofay iewvay asay Auriciomay Abilonia’sbay, utbay
Ememay esistedray elievingbay itay ecausebay underneathay itay allay eshay imagineday atthay itay adhay eenbay inspireday ybay ethay
oorpay udgmentjay ofay aay echanicmay. Eshay oughtthay enthay atthay ovelay onay oneay idesay asway efeatingday ovelay onay ethay
otheray, ecausebay itay asway aracteristicchay ofay enmay otay enyday ungerhay onceay eirthay appetitesay ereway atisfiedsay. Ilarpay
Erneratay otnay onlyay earedclay upay atthay istakemay, eshay alsoay offereday ethay olday anopiedcay edbay erewhay eshay adhay
onceivedcay Arcadioay, Eme’smay andfathergray, anday erewhay afterwarday eshay onceivedcay Aurelianoay Osejay. Eshay
alsoay aughttay erhay owhay otay avoiday anay unwanteday onceptioncay ybay eansmay ofay ethay evaporationay ofay ustardmay
astersplay anday avegay erhay ecipesray orfay otionspay atthay inay asescay ofay oubletray ouldcay expelay even“ay ethay emorseray ofay
onscience.”cay Atthay intervieway instilleday Inay Ememay ethay amesay eelingfay ofay averybray atthay eshay adhay eltfay onay ethay
endmnkay eveningay. Amaranta’say eathday, oweverhay, obligeday erhay otay ostponepay ethay ecisionday. Ilewhay ethay inenay
ightsnay astedlay eshay idday otnay onceay eavelay ethay idesay ofay Auriciomay Abiloniabay, owhay ingledmay ithway ethay owdcray atthay
invadeday ethay ousehay. Enthay amecay ethay onglay eriodpay ofay ourningmay anday ethay obligatoryay ithdrawalway anday eythay
eparatedsay orfay aay imetay. Osethay ereway aysday ofay uchsay inneray agitationay, uchsay irrepressibleay anxietyay, anday osay
anymay epressedray urgesay atthay onay ethay irstfay eveningay atthay Ememay asway ableay otay etgay outay eshay entway aightstray otay
Ilarpay Ernera’stay. Eshay urrenderedsay otay Auriciomay Abiloniabay, ithoutway esistanceray, ithoutway ynessshay, ithoutway
ormalitiesfay, anday ithway aay ocationvay atthay asway osay uidflay anday anay intuitionay atthay asway osay iseway atthay aay oremay
uspicioussay anmay anthay ershay ouldway avehay onfusedcay emthay ithway obviousay experienceay. Eythay ademay ovelay
icetway aay eekway orfay oremay anthay eethray onthsmay, otectedpray ybay ethay innocentay omplicitycay ofay Aurelianoay
Egundosay, owhay elievedbay ithoutway uspicionsay inay ishay aughter’sday alibisay implysay inay orderay otay etsay erhay eefray omfray
erhay other’smay igidityray.

Onay ethay ightnay atthay Ernandafay urprisedsay emthay inay ethay oviesmay Aurelianoay Egundosay eltfay eightedway ownday
ybay ethay urdenbay ofay ishay onsciencecay anday ehay isitedvay Ememay inay ethay edroombay erewhay Ernandafay eptkay erhay
ockedlay upay, ustingtray atthay eshay ouldway evealray otay imhay ethay onfidencescay atthay eshay oweday imhay. Utbay Ememay
eniedday everythingay. Eshay asway osay uresay ofay erselfhay, osay anchoreday inay erhay olitudesay atthay Aurelianoay Egundosay
adhay ethay impressionay atthay onay inklay existeday etweenbay emthay anymoreay, atthay ethay omradeshipcay anday ethay
omplicitycay ereway othingnay utbay anay illusionay ofay ethay astpay. Ehay oughtthay ofay eakingspay otay Auriciomay Abiloniabay,
inkingthay atthay ishay authorityay asay ishay ormerfay ossbay ouldway akemay imhay esistday omfray ishay ansplay, utbay Etrapay Otescay
onvincedcay imhay atthay itay asway aay oman’sway usinessbay, osay ehay asway eftlay oatingflay inay aay imbolay ofay indecisionay, arelybay
ustainedsay ybay ethay opehay atthay ethay onfinementcay ouldway utpay anay enday otay ishay aughter’sday oublestray.






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Ememay owedshay onay ignssay ofay afflictionay. Onay ethay ontrarycay, omfray ethay extnay oomray Ursulaay erceivedpay ethay
eacefulpay ythmrhay ofay erhay eepslay, ethay erenitysay ofay erhay askstay, ethay orderay ofay erhay ealsmay, anday ethay oodgay ealthhay
ofay erhay igestionday. Ethay onlyay ingthay atthay intrigueday Ursulaay afteray almostay otway onthsmay ofay unishmentpay asway
atthay Ememay idday otnay aketay aay athbay inay ethay orningmay ikelay everyoneay elseay, utbay atay evensay inay ethay eveningay. Onceay
eshay oughtthay ofay arningway erhay aboutay ethay orpionsscay, utbay Ememay asway osay istantday, onvincedcay atthay eshay adhay
ivengay erhay awayay, atthay eshay eferredpray otnay otay isturbday erhay ithway ethay impertinencesay, ofay aay eat-greatgray-
andmothergray. Ethay yelloway utterfliesbay ouldway invadeay ethay ousehay atay uskday. Everyay ightnay onay erhay ayway ackbay
omfray erhay athbay Ememay ouldway indfay aay esperateday Ernandafay illingkay utterfliesbay ithway anay insecticideay ombbay.
is“Thay isay errible,”tay eshay ouldway aysay, All“ay ymay ifelay eythay oldtay emay atthay utterfliesbay atay ightnay ingbray adbay uck.”lay
Oneay ightnay ilewhay Ememay asway inay ethay athroombay, Ernandafay entway intoay erhay edroombay ybay ancechay anday erethay
ereway osay anymay utterfliesbay atthay eshay ouldcay arcelyscay eathebray. Eshay abbedgray orfay ethay earestnay iecepay ofay othclay
otay ooshay emthay awayay anday erhay earthay ozefray ithway errortay asay eshay onnectedcay erhay aughter’sday eveningay athsbay
ithway ethay ustardmay astersplay atthay olledray ontoay ethay oorflay. Eshay idday otnay aitway orfay anay opportuneay omentmay asay
eshay adhay ethay irstfay imetay. Onay ethay ollowingfay ayday eshay inviteday ethay ewnay ayormay otay unchlay. Ikelay erhay, ehay adhay
omecay ownday omfray ethay ighlandshay, anday eshay askeday imhay otay ationstay aay uardgay inay ethay ackyardbay ecausebay eshay
adhay ethay impressionay atthay enshay ereway eingbay olenstay. Atthay ightnay ethay uardgay oughtbray ownday Auriciomay
Abiloniabay asay ehay asway iftinglay upay ethay ilestay otay etgay intoay ethay athroombay erewhay Ememay asway aitingway orfay imhay,
akednay anday emblingtray ithway ovelay amongay ethay orpionsscay anday utterfliesbay asay eshay adhay oneday almostay everyay
ightnay orfay ethay astpay ewfay onthsmay. Aay ulletbay odgedlay inay ishay inalspay olumncay educedray imhay otay ishay edbay orfay ethay
estray ofay ishay ifelay. Iefay iedday ofay olday ageay inay olitudesay, ithoutway aay oanmay, ithoutway aay otestpray, ithoutway aay inglesay
omentmay ofay etrayalbay, ormentedtay ybay emoriesmay anday ybay ethay yelloway utterfliesbay, owhay idday otnay ivegay imhay aay
oment’smay eacepay, anday ostracizeday asay aay ickenchay iefthay.






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Apterchay 


EtHay EVENTSay atthay ouldway ealday Acondomay itsay atalfay owblay ereway ustjay owingshay emselvesthay enwhay eythay
oughtbray Ememay Uendia’sbay onsay omehay. Ethay ublicpay ituationsay asway osay uncertainay enthay atthay onay oneay adhay
ufficientsay iritspay otay ecomebay involveday ithway ivatepray andalsscay, osay atthay Ernandafay asway ableay otay ountcay onay anay
atmosphereay atthay enableday erhay otay eepkay ethay ildchay iddenhay asay ifay ehay adhay evernay existeday. Eshay adhay otay aketay imhay
inay ecausebay ethay ircumstancescay underay ichwhay eythay oughtbray imhay ademay ejectionray impossibleay. Eshay adhay otay
oleratetay imhay againstay erhay illway orfay ethay estray ofay erhay ifelay ecausebay atay ethay omentmay ofay uthtray eshay ackedlay ethay
ouragecay otay ogay oughthray ithway erhay inneray eterminationday otay owndray imhay inay ethay athroombay isterncay. Eshay
ockedlay imhay upay inay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendia’sbay olday orkshopway. Eshay ucceededsay inay onvincingcay Antasay
Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay atthay eshay adhay oundfay imhay oatingflay inay aay asketbay. Ursulaay ouldway ieday ithoutway everay
owingknay ishay originay. Ittlelay Amarantaay Ursulaay, owhay entway intoay ethay orkshopway onceay enwhay Ernandafay asway
eedingfay ethay ildchay, alsoay elievedbay ethay ersionvay ofay ethay oatingflay asketbay. Aurelianoay Egundosay, avinghay okenbray
inallyfay ithway ishay ifeway ecausebay ofay ethay irrationalay ayway inay ichwhay eshay andledhay Eme’smay agedytray, idday otnay
owknay ofay ethay existenceay ofay ishay andsongray untilay eethray yearsay afteray eythay oughtbray imhay omehay, enwhay ethay ildchay
escapeday omfray aptivitycay oughthray anay oversightay onay Ernanda’sfay artpay anday appeareday onay ethay orchpay orfay aay
actionfray ofay aay econdsay, akednay, ithway attedmay airhay, anday ithway anay impressiveay exsay organay atthay asway ikelay aay
urkey’stay attlesway, asay ifay ehay ereway otnay aay umanhay ildchay utbay ethay encyclopediaay efinitionday ofay aay annibalcay.

Ernandafay adhay otnay ountedcay onay atthay astynay icktray ofay erhay incorrigibleay atefay. Ethay ildchay asway ikelay ethay
eturnray ofay aay ameshay atthay eshay adhay oughtthay exileday ybay erhay omfray ethay ousehay oreverfay. Asay oonsay asay eythay arriedcay
offay Auriciomay Abiloniabay ithway ishay atteredshay inalspay olumncay, Ernandafay adhay orkedway outay ethay ostmay inutemay
etailsday ofay aay anplay estinedday otay ipeway outay allay acestray ofay ethay urdenbay. Ithoutway onsultingcay erhay usbandhay, eshay
ackedpay erhay agsbay, utpay ethay eethray angeschay ofay othingclay atthay erhay aughterday ouldway eednay intoay aay allsmay
uitcasesay, anday entway otay etgay erhay inay erhay edroombay aay alfhay ourhay eforebay ethay aintray arriveday.

et’s“Lay ogay, Enata,”ray eshay oldtay erhay.

Eshay avegay onay explanationay. Ememay, orfay erhay artpay, idday otnay expectay oray antway anyay. Eshay otnay onlyay idday otnay
owknay erewhay eythay ereway oinggay, utbay itay ouldway avehay eenbay ethay amesay otay erhay ifay eythay adhay eenbay akingtay erhay otay
ethay aughterhouseslay. Eshay adhay otnay okenspay againay ornay ouldway eshay oday osay orfay ethay estray ofay erhay ifelay omfray ethay
imetay atthay eshay eardhay ethay otshay inay ethay ackyardbay anday ethay imultaneoussay ycray ofay ainpay omfray Auriciomay
Abiloniabay. Enwhay erhay othermay ordereday erhay outay ofay ethay edroombay eshay idday otnay ombcay erhay airhay oray ashway erhay
acefay anday eshay otgay intoay ethay aintray asay ifay eshay ereway alkingway inay erhay eepslay, otnay evenay oticingnay ethay yelloway
utterfliesbay atthay ereway illstay accompanyingay erhay. Ernandafay evernay oundfay outay ornay idday eshay aketay ethay oubletray
otay, etherwhay atthay onystay ilencesay asway aay eterminationday ofay erhay illway oray etherwhay eshay adhay ecomebay utemay
ecausebay ofay ethay impactay ofay ethay agedytray. Ememay arelybay ooktay oticenay ofay ethay ourneyjay oughthray ethay ormerlyfay
enchanteday egionray. Eshay idday otnay eesay ethay adyshay, endlessay ananabay ovesgray onay othbay idessay ofay ethay ackstray. Eshay
idday otnay eesay ethay itewhay ouseshay ofay ethay ingosgray oray eirthay ardensgay, ieddray outay ybay ustday anday eathay, oray ethay
omenway inay ortsshay anday ue-stripedblay irtsshay ayingplay ardscay onay ethay erracestay. Eshay idday otnay eesay ethay oxcartsay onay
ethay ustyday oadsray oadedlay ownday ithway unchesbay ofay ananasbay. Eshay idday otnay eesay ethay irlsgay ivingday intoay ethay
ansparenttray iversray ikelay arponstay, eavinglay ethay assengerspay onay ethay aintray ithway ethay itternessbay ofay eirthay
endidsplay eastsbray, oray ethay iserablemay utshay ofay ethay orkersway allay uddledhay ogethertay erewhay Auriciomay Abilobay-
ia’snay yelloway utterfliesbay utteredflay aboutay anday inay ethay oorwaysday ofay ichwhay erethay ereway eengray anday ualidsqay
ildrenchay ittingsay onay eirthay otspay, anday egnantpray omenway owhay outedshay insultsay atay ethay aintray. Atthay eetingflay
isionvay, ichwhay adhay eenbay aay elebrationcay orfay erhay enwhay eshay amecay omehay omfray oolschay, assedpay oughthray
Eme’smay earthay ithoutway aay uiverqay. Eshay idday otnay ooklay outay ofay ethay indowway, otnay evenay enwhay ethay urningbay
ampnessday ofay ethay ovesgray endeday anday ethay aintray entway oughthray aay oppy-ladenpay ainplay erewhay ethay arbonizedcay

eletonskay ofay ethay Anishspay alleongay illstay atsay anday enthay amecay outay intoay ethay earday airay alongsideay ethay othyfray, irtyday
easay erewhay almostay aay enturycay eforebay Osejay Arcadioay Uendia’sbay illusionsay adhay etmay efeatday.

Atay ivefay o’clockay inay ethay afternoonay, enwhay eythay adhay omecay otay ethay astlay ationstay inay ethay ampsway, eshay otgay
outay ofay ethay aintray ecausebay Ernandafay ademay erhay. Eythay otgay intoay aay allsmay arriagecay atthay ookedlay ikelay anay
enormousay atbay, awndray ybay anay asthmaticay orsehay, anday eythay entway oughthray ethay esolateday itycay inay ethay endlessay
eetsstray ofay ichwhay, itsplay ybay altinesssay, erethay asway ethay oundsay ofay aay ianopay essonlay ustjay ikelay ethay oneay atthay
Ernandafay eardhay uringday ethay iestassay ofay erhay adolescenceay. Eythay entway onay oardbay aay iverboatray, ethay oodenway
eelwhay ofay ichwhay adhay aay oundsay ofay onflagrationcay, anday osewhay edmstay etalmay atesplay everberatedray ikelay ethay
outhmay ofay anay ovenay. Ememay utshay erselfhay upay inay erhay abincay. Icetway aay ayday Ernandafay eftlay aay ateplay ofay oodfay ybay
erhay edbay anday icetway aay ayday eshay ooktay itay awayay intactay, otnay ecausebay Ememay adhay esolvedray otay ieday ofay ungerhay,
utbay ecausebay evenay ethay ellsmay ofay oodfay asway epugnantray otay erhay anday erhay omachstay ejectedray evenay aterway. Otnay
evenay eshay erselfhay ewknay atthay erhay ertilityfay adhay outwitteday ethay ustardmay aporsvay, ustjay asay Ernandafay idday otnay
owknay untilay almostay aay yearay aterlay, enwhay eythay oughtbray ethay ildchay. Inay ethay uffocatingsay abincay, addenedmay ybay
ethay ibrationvay ofay ethay etalmay atesplay anday ethay unbearableay enchstay ofay ethay udmay irredstay upay ybay ethay addlepay
eelwhay, Ememay ostlay acktray ofay ethay aysday. Uchmay imetay adhay assedpay enwhay eshay awsay ethay astlay yelloway utterflybay
estroyedday inay ethay adesblay ofay ethay anfay anday eshay admitteday asay anay irremediableay tmthay atthay Auriciomay Abiloniabay
adhay iedday. Eshay idday otnay etlay erselfhay ebay efeatedday ybay esignationray, oweverhay. Eshay eptkay onay inkingthay aboutay
imhay uringday ethay arduousay ulebackmay ossingcray ofay ethay allucinatinghay ateauplay erewhay Aurelianoay Egundosay
adhay ecomebay ostlay enwhay ehay asway ookinglay orfay ethay ostmay eautifulbay omanway owhay adhay everay appeareday onay ethay
acefay ofay ethay earthay, anday enwhay eythay entway overay ethay ountainsmay alongay Indianay ailstray anday entereday ethay oomyglay
itycay inay osewhay onestay alleysay ethay unerealfay onzebray ellsbay ofay irty-twothay urcheschay olledtay. Atthay ightnay eythay
eptslay inay ethay abandoneday olonialcay ansionmay onay oardsbay atthay Ernandafay aidlay onay ethay oorflay ofay aay oomray
invadeday ybay eedsway, appedwray inay ethay edsshray ofay urtainscay atthay eythay ulledpay offay ethay indowsway anday atthay ellfay otay
iecespay ithway everyay urntay ofay ethay odybay. Ememay ewknay erewhay eythay ereway ecausebay inay ethay ightflay ofay erhay
insomniaay eshay awsay asspay ybay ethay entlemangay esseddray inay ackblay omwhay eythay eliveredday otay ethay ousehay insideay aay
eadlay oxbay onay oneay istantday Istmaschray Eveay. Onay ethay ollowingfay ayday, afteray assmay, Ernandafay ooktay erhay otay aay
ombersay uildingbay atthay Ememay ecognizedray immediatelyay omfray erhay other’smay oriesstay ofay ethay onventcay erewhay
eythay adhay aisedray erhay otay ebay aay ueenqay, anday enthay eshay understooday atthay eythay adhay omecay otay ethay enday ofay ethay
ourneyjay. Ilewhay Ernandafay asway eakingspay otay omeonesay inay ethay officeay extnay oorday, Ememay emainedray inay aay
arlorpay eckeredchay ithway argelay oilay aintingspay ofay olonialcay archbishopsay, illstay earingway anay etamineay essdray ithway
allsmay ackblay owersflay anday iffstay ighhay oesshay ichwhay ereway ollensway ybay ethay oldcay ofay ethay uplandsay. Eshay asway
andingstay inay ethay entercay ofay ethay arlorpay inkingthay aboutay Auriciomay Abiloniabay underay ethay yelloway eamstray ofay
ightlay omfray ethay ainedstay assglay indowsway enwhay aay eryvay eautifulbay ovicenay amecay outay ofay ethay officeay arryingcay
erhay uitcasesay ithway ethay eethray angeschay ofay othingclay. Asay eshay assedpay Ememay eshay ooktay erhay andhay ithoutway
oppingstay.

ome“Cay, Enata,”ray eshay aidsay otay erhay.

Ememay ooktay erhay andhay anday etlay erselfhay ebay edlay. Ethay astlay imetay atthay Ernandafay awsay erhay, yingtray otay eepkay
upay ithway ethay ovicenay, ethay ironay atinggray ofay ethay oisterclay adhay ustjay osedclay ehindbay erhay. Eshay asway illstay inkingthay
aboutay Auriciomay Abiloniabay, ishay ellsmay ofay easegray, anday ishay alohay ofay utterfliesbay, anday eshay ouldway eepkay onay
inkingthay aboutay imhay orfay allay ethay aysday ofay erhay ifelay untilay ethay emoteray autumnay orningmay enwhay eshay iedday ofay olday
ageay, ithway erhay amenay angedchay anday erhay eadhay avedshay anday ithoutway everay avinghay okenspay aay ordway, inay aay
oomyglay ospitalhay inay Acowcray.

Ernandafay eturnedray otay Acondomay onay aay aintray otectedpray ybay armeday olicepay. Uringday ethay iptray eshay oticednay
ethay ensiontay ofay ethay assengerspay, ethay ilitarymay eparationspray inay ethay ownstay alongay ethay inelay, anday anay
atmosphereay arifiedray ybay ethay ertaintycay atthay omethingsay erioussay asway oinggay otay appenhay, utbay eshay adhay onay
informationay untilay eshay eachedray Acondomay anday eythay oldtay erhay atthay Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay asway incitingay
ethay orkersway ofay ethay ananabay ompanycay otay ikestray. at’s“Thay allay eway eed,”nay Ernandafay aidsay otay erselfhay. An“ay
anarchistay inay ethay amily.”fay Ethay ikestray okebray outay otway eeksway aterlay anday itay idday otnay avehay ethay amaticdray

onsequencescay atthay adhay eenbay earedfay. Ethay orkersway emandedday atthay eythay otnay ebay obligeday otay utcay anday oadlay
ananasbay onay Undayssay, anday ethay ositionpay eemedsay osay ustjay atthay evenay Atherfay Antonioay Isabelay intercededay inay
itsay avorfay ecausebay ehay oundfay itay inay accordanceay ithway ethay awslay ofay Odgay. Atthay ictoryvay, alongay ithway otheray
actionsay atthay ereway initiateday uringday ethay ollowingfay onthsmay, ewdray ethay olorlesscay Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay
outay ofay ishay anonymityay, orfay eoplepay adhay eenbay accustomeday otay aysay atthay ehay asway onlyay oodgay orfay illingfay upay ethay
owntay ithway Enchfray oreswhay. Ithway ethay amesay impulsiveay ecisionday ithway ichwhay ehay adhay auctioneday offay ishay
ightingfay ockscay inay orderay otay organizeay aay arebrainedhay oatbay usinessbay, ehay avegay upay ishay ositionpay asay oremanfay
inay ethay ananabay ompanycay anday ooktay ethay idesay ofay ethay orkersway. Uiteqay oonsay ehay asway ointedpay outay asay ethay
agentay ofay anay internationalay onspiracycay againstay ublicpay orderay. Oneay ightnay, uringday ethay oursecay ofay aay eekway
arkenedday ybay ombersay orsmmay, ehay iraculouslymay escapeday ourfay evolverray otsshay akentay atay imhay ybay anay
unknownay artypay asay ehay asway eavinglay aay ecretsay eetingmay. Ethay atmosphereay ofay ethay ollowingfay onthsmay asway osay
ensetay atthay evenay Ursulaay erceivedpay itay inay erhay arkday ornercay, anday eshay adhay ethay impressionay atthay onceay oremay
eshay asway ivinglay oughthray ethay angerousday imestay enwhay erhay onsay Aurelianoay arriedcay ethay omeopathichay illspay ofay
ubversionsay inay ishay ocketpay. Eshay iedtray otay eakspay otay Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay, otay etlay imhay owknay aboutay atthay
ecedentpray, utbay Aurelianoay Egundosay oldtay erhay atthay incesay ethay ightnay ofay ethay attemptay onay ishay ifelay onay oneay
ewknay ishay ereaboutswhay.

ust“Jay ikelay Aureliano,”ay Ursulaay exclaimeday. It’s“ay asay ifay ethay orldway ereway epeatingray itself.”ay

Ernandafay, asway immuneay otay ethay uncertaintyay ofay osethay aysday. Eshay adhay onay ontactcay ithway ethay outsideay
orldway incesay ethay iolentvay altercationay eshay adhay adhay ithway erhay usbandhay overay erhay avinghay ecidedday Emesmay
atefay ithoutway ishay onsentcay. Aurelianoay Egundosay asway eparedpray otay escueray ishay aughterday ithway ethay elphay ofay
ethay olicepay ifay ecessarynay, utbay Ernandafay owedshay imhay omesay aperspay atthay ereway oofpray atthay eshay adhay entereday
ethay onventcay ofay erhay ownay eefray illway. Ememay adhay indeeday ignedsay onceay eshay asway alreadyay ehindbay ethay ironay
atinggray anday eshay idday itay ithway ethay amesay indifferenceay ithway ichwhay eshay adhay alloweday erselfhay otay ebay edlay awayay.
Underneathay itay allay, Aurelianoay Egundosay idday otnay elievebay inay ethay egitimacylay ofay ethay oofpray. Ustjay asay ehay evernay
elievedbay atthay Auriciomay Abiloniabay adhay onegay intoay ethay yarday otay ealstay ickenschay, utbay othbay expedientsay
ervedsay otay easeay ishay onsciencecay, anday usthay ehay ouldcay ogay ackbay ithoutway emorseray underay ethay adowshay ofay Etrapay
Otescay, erewhay ehay evivedray ishay oisynay evelryray anday unlimiteday ourmandizinggay. Oreignfay otay ethay estlessnessray
ofay ethay owntay, eafday otay Ursula’say uietqay edictionspray. Ernandafay avegay ethay astlay arntay otay ethay ewscray ofay erhay
econceivedpray anplay. Eshay otewray aay onglay etterlay otay erhay onsay Osejay Arcadioay, owhay asway enthay aboutay otay aketay ishay
irstfay ordersay, anday inay itay eshay oldtay imhay atthay ishay istersay Enataray adhay expireday inay ethay eacepay ofay ethay Ordlay anday asay aay
onsequencecay ofay ethay ackblay omitvay. Enthay eshay utpay Amarantaay Ursulaay underay ethay arecay ofay Antasay Ofiasay eday alay
Iedadpay anday edicatedday erselfhay otay organizingay erhay orrespondencecay ithway ethay invisibleay octorsday, ichwhay adhay
eenbay upsetay ybay Eme’smay oubletray. Ethay irstfay ingthay atthay eshay idday asway otay etsay aay efiniteday ateday orfay ethay
ostponedpay elepathictay operationay. Utbay ethay invisibleay octorsday answereday erhay atthay itay asway otnay iseway osay onglay
asay ethay atestay ofay ocialsay agitationay ontinuedcay inay Acondomay. Eshay asway osay urgentay anday osay oorlypay Informeday
atthay eshay explaineday otay emthay Inay anotheray etterlay atthay erethay asway onay uchsay atestay ofay agitationay anday atthay
everythingay asway ethay esultray ofay ethay unacylay ofay aay other-in-lawbray ofay ershay owhay asway iddlingfay arounday atay atthay
imetay inay atthay aborlay unionay onsensenay ustjay asay ehay adhay eenbay involveday ithway ockfightingcay anday iverboatsray
eforebay. Eythay ereway illstay otnay inay agreementay onay ethay othay Ednesdayway enwhay anay ageday unnay ockedknay atay ethay
oorday earingbay aay allsmay asketbay onay erhay armay. Enwhay eshay openeday ethay oorday Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay oughtthay
atthay itay asway aay iftgay anday iedtray otay aketay ethay allsmay asketbay atthay asway overedcay ithway aay ovelylay acelay apwray. Utbay ethay
unnay oppedstay erhay ecausebay eshay adhay instmctionsay otay ivegay itay ersonallypay anday ithway ethay icteststray ecrecysay otay
Onaday Ernandafay elday Arpiocay eday Uendiabay. Itay asway Eme’smay onsay. Ernanda’sfay ormerfay iritualspay irectorday
explaineday otay erhay inay aay etterlay atthay ehay adhay eenbay ornbay otway onthsmay eforebay anday atthay eythay adhay akentay ethay
ivilegepray ofay aptizingbay imhay Aurelianoay, orfay ishay andfathergray, ecausebay ishay othermay ouldway otnay openay erhay
ipslay otay elltay emthay erhay ishesway. Ernandafay oseray upay insideay againstay atthay icktray ofay atefay, utbay eshay adhay ufficientsay
engthstray otay idehay itay inay ontfray ofay ethay unnay.

e’ll“Way elltay emthay atthay eway oundfay imhay oatingflay inay ethay asket,”bay eshay aidsay ilingsmay.
