o“Nay oneay illway elievebay it,”ay ethay unnay aidsay.

If“ay eythay elievebay itay inay ethay Ible,”bay Ernandafay epliedray, I“ay on’tday eesay ywhay eythay ouldn’tshay elievebay itay omfray
e.”may

Ethay unnay unchedlay atay ethay ousehay ilewhay eshay aitedway orfay ethay aintray ackbay, anday inay accordanceay ithway ethay
iscretionday eythay askeday ofay erhay, eshay idday otnay entionmay ethay ildchay againay, utbay Ernandafay iewedvay erhay asay anay
undesirableay itnessway ofay erhay ameshay anday amentedlay ethay actfay atthay eythay adhay abandoneday ethay edievalmay
ustomcay ofay anginghay aay essengermay owhay orebay adbay ewsnay. Itay asway enthay atthay eshay ecidedday otay owndray ethay ildchay
inay ethay isterncay asay oonsay asay ethay unnay eftlay, utbay erhay earthay asway otnay ongstray enoughay anday eshay eferredpray otay aitway
atiendypay untilay ethay infiniteay oodnessgay ofay Odgay ouldway eefray erhay omfray ethay annoyanceay.

Ethay ewnay Aurelianoay asway aay yearay olday enwhay ethay ensiontay ofay ethay eoplepay okebray ithway onay orewarningfay.
Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay anday otheray unionay eaderslay owhay adhay emainedray undergrounday untilay enthay uddenlysay
appeareday oneay eekendway anday organizeday emonstrationsday inay ownstay oughoutthray ethay ananabay egionray. Ethay
olicepay erelymay aintainedmay ublicpay orderay. Utbay onay Ondaymay ightnay ethay eaderslay ereway akentay omfray eirthay
omeshay anday entsay otay ailjay inay ethay apitalcay ofay ethay ovincepray ithway o-poundtway ironsay onay eirthay egslay. Akentay
amongay emthay ereway Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay anday Orenzolay Avilangay, aay olonelcay inay ethay Exicanmay evolutionray,
exileday inay Acondomay, owhay aidsay atthay ehay adhay eenbay itnessway otay ethay eroismhay ofay ishay omradecay Artemioay Uzcray.
Eythay ereway etsay eefray, oweverhay, ithinway eethray onthsmay ecausebay ofay ethay actfay atthay ethay overnmentgay anday ethay
ananabay ompanycay ouldcay otnay eachray anay agreementay asay otay owhay ouldshay eedfay emthay inay ailjay. Ethay otestspray ofay
ethay orkersway isthay imetay ereway asedbay onay ethay acklay ofay anitarysay acilitiesfay inay eirthay ivinglay uartersqay, ethay
onexistencenay ofay edicalmay ervicessay, anday erribletay orkingway onditionscay. Eythay atedstay, urthermorefay, atthay
eythay ereway otnay eingbay aidpay inay ealray oneymay utbay inay ipscray, ichwhay asway oodgay onlyay otay uybay Irginiavay amhay inay ethay
ompanycay ommissariescay. Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay asway utpay inay ailjay ecausebay ehay evealedray atthay ethay ipscray
ystemsay asway aay ayway orfay ethay ompanycay otay inancefay itsay uitfray ipsshay; ichwhay ithoutway ethay ommissarycay
erchandisemay ouldway avehay otay eturnray emptyay omfray Ewnay Orleansay otay ethay ananabay ortspay. Ethay otheray
omplaintscay ereway ommoncay owledgeknay. Ethay ompanycay ysiciansphay idday otnay examineay ethay icksay utbay adhay
emthay inelay upay ehindbay oneay anotheray inay ethay ispensariesday anday aay ursenay ouldway utpay aay illpay ethay olorcay ofay oppercay
ulfatesay onay eirthay onguestay, etherwhay eythay adhay alariamay, onorrheagay, oray onstipationcay. Itay asway aay urecay atthay asway
osay ommoncay atthay ildrenchay ouldway andstay inay inelay everalsay imestay anday insteaday ofay allowingsway ethay illspay ouldway
aketay emthay omehay otay useay asay ingobay arkersmay. Ethay ompanycay orkersway ereway owdedcray ogethertay inay iserablemay
arracksbay. Ethay engineersay, insteaday ofay uttingpay inay oiletstay, adhay aay ortablepay atrinelay orfay everyay iftyfay eoplepay
oughtbray otay ethay ampscay atay Istmaschray imetay anday eythay eldhay ublicpay emonstrationsday ofay owhay otay useay emthay osay
atthay eythay ouldway astlay ongerlay. Ethay ecrepitday awyerslay esseddray inay ackblay owhay uringday otheray imestay adhay
esiegedbay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay anday owhay ownay ereway ontrolledcay ybay ethay ananabay ompanycay
ismissedday osethay emandsday ithway ecisionsday atthay eemedsay ikelay actsay ofay agicmay. Enwhay ethay orkersway ewdray upay
aay istlay ofay unanimousay etitionspay, aay onglay imetay assedpay eforebay eythay ereway ableay otay otifynay ethay ananabay ompanycay
officiallyay. Asay oonsay asay ehay oundfay outay aboutay ethay agreementay Mr.ay Ownbray itchedhay ishay uxuriouslay assed-inglay
oachcay otay ethay aintray anday isappearedday omfray Acondomay alongay ithway ethay oremay ominentpray epresentativesray ofay
ishay ompanycay. Onethelessnay omesay orkersway oundfay oneay ofay emthay ethay ollowingfay Aturdaysay inay aay othelbray anday
eythay ademay imhay ignsay aay opycay ofay ethay eetshay ithway ethay emandsday ilewhay ehay asway akednay ithway ethay omenway owhay
adhay elpedhay otay entrapay imhay. Ethay ournfulmay awyerslay owedshay inay ourtcay atthay atthay anmay adhay othingnay otay oday
ithway ethay ompanycay anday inay orderay atthay onay oneay oubtday eirthay argumentsay eythay adhay imhay ailedjay asay anay
impostoray. Aterlay onay, Mr.ay Ownbray asway urprisedsay avelingtray incognitoay, inay aay ird-classthay oachcay anday eythay
ademay imhay ignsay anotheray opycay ofay ethay emandsday. Onay ethay ollowingfay ayday ehay appeareday eforebay ethay udgesjay
ithway ishay airhay yedday ackblay anday eakingspay awlessflay Anishspay. Ethay awyerslay owedshay atthay ethay anmay asway otnay
Mr.ay Ackjay Ownbray, ethay uperintendentsay ofay ethay ananabay ompanycay, ornbay inay Attvillepray Alabamaay, utbay aay
armlesshay endorvay ofay edicinalmay antsplay, ornbay inay Acondomay anday aptizedbay erethay ithway ethay amenay ofay
Agobertoday Onsecafay. Aay ilewhay aterlay, acedfay ithway aay ewnay attemptay ybay ethay orkersway ethay awyerslay ubliclypay
exhibiteday Mr.ay Own’sbray eathday ertificatecay, attesteday otay ybay onsulscay anday oreignfay inistersmay ichwhay orebay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


itnessway atthay onay Unejay inthnay astlay ehay adhay eenbay unray overay ybay aay irefay engineay inay Icagochay. Iredtay ofay atthay
ermeneuticalhay eliriumday, ethay orkersway urnedtay awayay omfray ethay authoritiesay inay Acondomay anday oughtbray eirthay
omplaintscay upay otay ethay igherhay ourtscay. Itay asway erethay atthay ethay eight-of-handslay awyerslay ovedpray atthay ethay
emandsday ackedlay allay alidityvay orfay ethay implesay easonray atthay ethay ananabay ompanycay idday otnay avehay, evernay adhay
adhay, anday evernay ouldway avehay anyay orkersway inay itsay ervicesay ecausebay eythay ereway allay iredhay onay aay emporarytay anday
occasionalay asisbay. Osay atthay ethay ablefay ofay ethay Irginiavay amhay asway onsensenay, ethay amesay asay atthay ofay ethay
iraculousmay illspay anday ethay Yuletideay oiletstay, anday ybay aay ecisionday ofay ethay ourtcay itay asway establisheday anday etsay
ownday inay olemnsay ecreesday atthay ethay orkersway idday otnay existay.

Ethay eatgray ikestray okebray outay. Ultivationcay oppedstay alfwayhay, ethay uitfray ottedray onay ethay eestray anday ethay
undred-twenty-carhay ainstray emainedray onay ethay idingssay. Ethay idleay orkersway overfloweday ethay ownstay. Ethay
Eetstray ofay ethay Urkstay echoeday ithway aay Aturdaysay atthay astedlay orfay everalsay aysday anday inay ethay oolroompay atay ethay
Otelhay Acobjay eythay adhay otay arrangeay enty-four-hourtway iftsshay. Atthay asway erewhay Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay asway
onay ethay ayday itay asway announceday atthay ethay armyay adhay eenbay assigneday otay eestablishray ublicpay orderay. Althoughay
ehay asway otnay aay anmay ivengay otay omensay, ethay ewsnay asway ikelay anay announcementay ofay eathday atthay ehay adhay eenbay
aitingway orfay everay incesay atthay istantday orningmay enwhay Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay adhay etlay imhay eesay anay
executionay. Ethay adbay omenay idday otnay angechay ishay olemnitysay, oweverhay. Ehay ooktay ethay otshay ehay adhay annedplay
anday itay asway oodgay. Aay ortshay imetay aterlay ethay eatsdmmbay, ethay illshray ofay ethay uglebay, ethay outingshay anday unningray
ofay ethay eoplepay oldtay imhay atthay otnay onlyay adhay ethay amegay ofay oolpay omecay otay anay enday, utbay alsoay ethay ilentsay anday
olitarysay amegay atthay ehay adhay eenbay ayingplay ithway imselfhay everay incesay atthay awnday executionay. Enthay ehay entway
outay intoay ethay eetstray anday awsay emthay. Erethay ereway eethray egimentsray, osewhay archmay inay imetay otay aay alleygay dmmay
ademay ethay earthay embletray. Eirthay ortingsnay ofay aay any-headedmay agondray illedfay ethay owglay ofay oonnay ithway aay
estilentialpay aporvay. Eythay ereway ortshay, ockystay, anday utelikebray. Eythay erspiredpay ithway ethay eatsway ofay aay orsehay
anday adhay aay ellsmay ofay untannedsay idehay anday ethay aciturntay anday impenetrableay erseverancepay ofay enmay omfray ethay
uplandsay. Althoughay itay ooktay emthay overay anay ourhay otay asspay ybay, oneay ightmay avehay oughtthay atthay eythay ereway onlyay
aay ewfay uadssqay archingmay inay aay irclecay, ecausebay eythay ereway allay identicalay, onssay ofay ethay amesay itchbay, anday ithway
ethay amesay oliditystay eythay allay orebay ethay eightway ofay eirthay ackspay anday anteenscay, ethay ameshay ofay eirthay iflesray ithway
ixedfay ayonetsbay, anday ethay ancrechay ofay indblay obedienceay anday aay ensesay ofay onorhay. Ursulaay eardhay emthay asspay
omfray erhay edbay inay ethay adowsshay anday eshay ademay aay owcray ithway erhay ingersfay. Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay existeday
orfay anay instantay, eaninglay overay ethay embroidereday ableclothtay atthay eshay adhay ustjay ironeday, anday eshay oughtthay ofay
erhay onsay, Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay, owhay ithoutway angingchay expressionay atchedway ethay astlay oldierssay asspay ybay
ethay oorday ofay ethay Otelhay Acobjay.

Artialmay awlay enableday ethay armyay otay assumeay ethay unctionsfay ofay arbitratoray inay ethay ontroversycay, utbay onay
effortay atay onciliationcay asway ademay. Asay oonsay asay eythay appeareday inay Acondomay, ethay oldierssay utpay asideay eirthay
iflesray anday utcay anday oadedlay ethay ananasbay anday artedstay ethay ainstray ingmnnay. Ethay orkersway, owhay adhay eenbay
ontentcay otay aitway untilay enthay, entway intoay ethay oodsway ithway onay otheray eaponsway utbay eirthay orkingway achetesmay
anday eythay eganbay otay abotagesay ethay abotagesay. Eythay urnedbay antationsplay anday ommissariescay, oretay upay ackstray
otay impedeay ethay assagepay ofay ethay ainstray atthay eganbay otay openay eirthay athpay ithway achine-gunmay irefay, anday eythay utcay
elegraphtay anday elephonetay iresway. Ethay irrigationay itchesday ereway ainedstay ithway oodblay. Mr.ay Ownbray, owhay asway
aliveay inay ethay electrifieday ickenchay oopcay, asway akentay outay ofay Acondomay ithway ishay amilyfay anday osethay ofay ishay
ellowfay ountrymencay anday oughtbray otay aay afesay aceplay underay ethay otectionpray ofay ethay armyay. Ethay ituationsay asway
eateningthray otay eadlay otay aay oodyblay anday unequalay ivilcay arway enwhay ethay authoritiesay alledcay uponay ethay orkersway
otay athergay inay Acondomay. Ethay ummonssay announceday atthay ethay ivilcay anday ilitarymay eaderlay ofay ethay ovincepray
ouldway arriveay onay ethay ollowingfay Idayfray eadyray otay intercedeay inay ethay onflictcay.

Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay asway inay ethay owdcray atthay adhay atheredgay atay ethay ationstay onay Idayfray incesay earlyay inay
ethay orningmay. Ehay adhay akentay artpay inay aay eetingmay ofay unionay eaderslay anday adhay eenbay ommissionedcay, alongay
ithway Olonelcay Avilangay, otay inglemay inay ethay owdcray anday orientay itay accordingay otay owhay ingsthay entway. Ehay idday otnay
eelfay ellway anday aay altysay astepay asway eginningbay otay ollectcay onay ishay alatepay enwhay ehay oticednay atthay ethay armyay adhay
etsay upay achine-gunmay emplacementsay arounday ethay allsmay uaresqay anday atthay ethay iredway itycay ofay ethay ananabay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


ompanycay asway otectedpray ybay artilleryay iecespay. Arounday elvetway o’clockay, aitingway orfay aay aintray atthay asway otnay
arrivingay, oremay anthay eethray ousandthay eoplepay, orkersway, omenway, anday ildrenchay, adhay illedspay outay ofay ethay
openay acespay inay ontfray ofay ethay ationstay anday ereway essingpray intoay ethay eighboringnay eetsstray, ichwhay ethay armyay
adhay osedclay offay ithway owsray ofay achinemay unsgay. Atay atthay imetay itay allay eemedsay oremay ikelay aay ubilantjay airfay anthay aay
aitingway owdcray. Eythay adhay oughtbray overay ethay itterfray anday inkdray andsstay omfray ethay Eetstray ofay ethay Urkstay anday
ethay eoplepay ereway inay oodgay iritsspay asay eythay orebay ethay ediumtay ofay aitingway anday ethay orchingscay unsay. Aay ortshay
imetay eforebay eethray o’clockay ethay ormmay eadspray atthay ethay officialay aintray ouldway otnay arriveay untilay ethay ollowingfay
ayday. Ethay owdcray etlay outay aay ighsay ofay isappointmentday. Anay armyay ieutenantlay enthay imbedclay upay ontoay ethay oofray
ofay ethay ationstay erewhay erethay ereway ourfay achine-gunmay emplacementsay aimingay atay ethay owdcray anday alledcay orfay
ilencesay. Extnay otay Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay erethay asway aay arefootedbay omanway, eryvay atfay, ithway otway ildrenchay
etweenbay ethay agesay ofay ourfay anday evensay. Eshay asway arryingcay ethay allersmay oneay anday eshay askeday Osejay Arcadioay
Egundosay, ithoutway owingknay imhay, ifay ehay ouldway iftlay upay ethay otheray oneay osay atthay ehay ouldcay earhay etterbay. Osejay
Arcadioay Egundosay utpay ethay ildchay onay ishay ouldersshay. Anymay yearsay aterlay atthay ildchay ouldway illstay elltay, otay ethay
isbeliefday ofay allay, atthay ehay adhay eensay ethay ieutenantlay eadingray Ecreeday Onay.  ofay ethay ivilcay anday ilitarymay eaderlay
ofay ethay ovincepray oughthray anay olday onographphay ornhay. Itay adhay eenbay ignedsay ybay Eneralgay Arloscay Ortescay
Argasvay anday ishay ecretarysay. Ajormay Enriqueay Arciagay Isazaay, anday inay eethray articlesay ofay eightyay ordsway ehay
eclaredday ethay ikersstray otay ebay aay unch“bay ofay oodlums”hay anday ehay authorizeday ethay armyay otay ootshay otay illkay.

Afteray ethay ecreeday asway eadray, inay ethay idstmay ofay aay eafeningday oothay ofay otestpray, aay aptaincay ooktay ethay aceplay ofay
ethay ieutenantlay onay ethay oofray ofay ethay ationstay anday ithway ethay ornhay ehay ignaledsay atthay ehay antedway otay eakspay. Ethay
owdcray asway uietqay againay.

adies“Lay anday entlemen,”gay ethay aptaincay aidsay inay aay owlay oicevay atthay asway owslay anday aay ittlelay iredtay, you“ay avehay
ivefay inutesmay otay ithdraw.”way

Ethay edoubledray ootinghay anday outingshay owneddray outay ethay uglebay allcay atthay announceday ethay artstay ofay ethay
ountcay. Onay oneay ovedmay.

Ivefay inutesmay avehay assed,”pay ethay aptaincay aidsay inay ethay amesay onetay. One“ay oremay inutemay anday e’llway openay
ire.”fay

Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay, eatingsway iceay, oweredlay ethay ildchay anday avegay imhay otay ethay omanway. ose“Thay
astardsbay ightmay ustjay oot,”shay eshay urmuredmay. Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay idday otnay avehay imetay otay eakspay
ecausebay atay atthay instantay ehay ecognizedray ethay oarsehay oicevay ofay Olonelcay Avilangay echoingay ethay ordsway ofay ethay
omanway ithway aay outshay. Intoxicateday ybay ethay ensiontay, ybay ethay iraculousmay epthday ofay ethay ilencesay, anday
urthermorefay onvincedcay atthay othingnay ouldcay ovemay atthay owdcray eldhay ighttay inay aay ascinationfay ithway eathday,
Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay aisedray imselfhay upay overay ethay eadshay inay ontfray ofay imhay anday orfay ethay irstfay imetay inay ishay
ifelay ehay aisedray ishay oicevay.

You“ay astards!”bay ehay outedshay. ake“Tay ethay extraay inutemay anday ickstay itay upay youray ass!”ay

Afteray ishay outshay omethingsay appenedhay atthay idday otnay ingbray onay ightfray utbay aay indkay ofay allucinationhay. Ethay
aptaincay avegay ethay orderay otay irefay anday ourteenfay achinemay unsgay answereday atay onceay. Utbay itay allay eemedsay ikelay aay
arcefay. Itay asway asay ifay ethay achinemay unsgay adhay eenbay oadedlay ithway apscay, ecausebay eirthay antingpay attleray ouldcay ebay
eardhay anday eirthay incandescentay ittingspay ouldcay ebay eensay, utbay otnay ethay ightestslay eactionray asway erceivedpay, otnay
aay ycray, otnay evenay aay ighsay amongay ethay ompactcay owdcray atthay eemedsay etrifiedpay ybay anay instantaneousay
invulnerabilityay. Uddenlysay, onay oneay ide-ofsay ethay ationstay, aay ycray ofay eathday oretay openay ethay enchantmentay:
Aaaagh“ay, Other.”may Aay eismicsay oicevay, aay olcanicvay eathbray, ethay oarray ofay aay ataclysmcay okebray outay inay ethay entercay
ofay ethay owdcray ithway aay eatgray otentialpay ofay expansionay. Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay arelybay adhay imetay otay ickpay upay
ethay ildchay ilewhay ethay othermay ithway ethay otheray oneay asway allowedsway upay ybay ethay owdcray atthay irledsway aboutay inay
anicpay.

Anymay yearsay aterlay atthay ildchay ouldway illstay elltay, inay itespay ofay eoplepay inkingthay atthay ehay asway aay azycray olday anmay,
owhay Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay adhay iftedlay imhay overay ishay eadhay anday auledhay imhay, almostay inay ethay airay, asay ifay
oatingflay onay ethay errortay ofay ethay owdcray, owardtay aay earbynay eetstray. Ethay ild’schay ivilegedpray ositionpay alloweday






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


imhay otay eesay atay atthay omentmay atthay ethay ildway assmay asway artingstay otay etgay otay ethay omercay anday ethay owray ofay
achinemay unsgay openeday irefay. Everalsay oicesvay outedshay atay ethay amesay imetay:

et“Gay ownday! Etgay own!”day

Ethay eoplepay inay ontfray adhay alreadyay oneday osay, eptsway ownday ybay ethay aveway ofay ulletsbay. Ethay urvivorssay,
insteaday ofay ettinggay ownday, iedtray otay ogay ackbay otay ethay allsmay uaresqay, anday ethay anicpay ecamebay aay agon’sdray ailtay asay
oneay ompactcay aveway anray againstay anotheray ichwhay asway ovingmay inay ethay oppositeay irectionday, owardtay ethay
otheray agon’sdray ailtay Inay ethay eetstray acrossay ethay ayway, erewhay ethay achinemay unsgay ereway alsoay iringfay ithoutway
easecay. Eythay ereway Ennedpay inay. irlingsway aboutay inay aay iganticgay irlwindwhay atthay ittlelay ybay ittlelay asway eingbay
educedray otay itsay epicenteray asay ethay edgesay ereway ystematicallysay eingbay utcay offay allay arounday ikelay anay onionay eingbay
eeledpay ybay ethay insatiableay anday ethodicalmay earsshay ofay ethay achinemay unsgay. Ethay ildchay awsay aay omanway
eelingknay ithway erhay armsay inay ethay apeshay ofay aay osscray inay anay openay acespay, ysteriouslymay eefray ofay ethay ampedestay.
Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay utpay imhay upay erethay atay ethay omentmay ehay ellfay ithway ishay acefay athedbay inay oodblay, eforebay
ethay olossalcay ooptray ipedway outay ethay emptyay acespay, ethay eelingknay omanway, ethay ightlay ofay ethay ighhay, oughtdray-
ickenstray yskay, anday ethay orishwhay orldway erewhay Ursulaay Iguaranay adhay oldsay osay anymay ittlelay andycay animalsay.

Enwhay Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay amecay otay ehay asway yinglay acefay upay inay ethay arknessday. Ehay ealizedray atthay ehay
asway idingray onay anay endlessay anday ilentsay aintray anday atthay ishay eadhay asway akedcay ithway ydray oodblay anday atthay allay ishay
onesbay acheday. Ehay eltfay anay intolerableay esireday otay eepslay. Eparedpray otay eepslay orfay anymay ourshay, afesay omfray ethay
errortay anday ethay orrorhay, ehay ademay imselfhay omfortablecay onay ethay idesay atthay ainedpay imhay esslay, anday onlyay enthay
idday ehay iscoverday atthay ehay asway yinglay againstay eadday eoplepay. Erethay asway onay eefray acespay inay ethay arcay exceptay orfay
anay aisleay inay ethay iddlemay. Everalsay ourshay ustmay avehay assedpay incesay ethay assacremay ecausebay ethay orpsescay adhay
ethay amesay emperaturetay asay aay asterplay inay autumnay anday ethay amesay onsistencycay ofay etrifiedpay oamfay atthay itay adhay,
anday osethay owhay adhay utpay emthay inay ethay arcay adhay adhay imetay otay ilepay emthay upay inay ethay amesay ayway inay ichwhay eythay
ansportedtray unchesbay ofay ananasbay. Yingtray otay eeflay omfray ethay ightmarenay, Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay aggeddray
imselfhay omfray oneay arcay otay anay otheray inay ethay irectionday inay ichwhay ethay aintray asway eadinghay, anday inay ethay ashesflay
ofay ightlay atthay okebray oughthray ethay oodenway atsslay asay eythay entway oughthray eepingslay ownstay ehay awsay ethay anmay
orpsescay, omanway orpsescay, ildchay orpsescay owhay ouldway ebay ownthray intoay ethay easay ikelay ejectedray ananasbay. Ehay
ecognizedray onlyay aay omanway owhay oldsay inksdray inay ethay uaresqay anday Olonelcay Avilangay, owhay illstay eldhay
appedwray inay ishay andhay ethay eltbay ithway aay ucklebay ofay Oreliamay ilversay ithway ichwhay ehay adhay iedtray otay openay ishay ayway
oughthray ethay anicpay. Enwhay ehay otgay otay ethay irstfay arcay ehay umpedjay intoay ethay arknessday anday aylay esidebay ethay ackstray
untilay ethay aintray adhay assedpay. Itay asway ethay ongestlay oneay ehay adhay everay eensay, ithway almostay otway undredhay eightfray
arscay anday aay ocomotivelay atay eitheray enday anday aay irdthay oneay inay ethay iddlemay. Itay adhay onay ightslay, otnay evenay ethay edray
anday eengray unningray ightslay, anday itay ippedslay offay ithway aay octurnalnay anday ealthystay elocityvay. Onay optay ofay ethay arscay
erethay ouldcay ebay eensay ethay arkday apesshay ofay ethay oldierssay ithway eirthay emplaceday achinemay unsgay.

Afteray idnightmay aay orrentialtay oudburstclay amecay upay. Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay idday otnay owknay erewhay itay asway
atthay ehay adhay umpedjay offay, utbay ehay ewknay atthay ybay oinggay inay ethay oppositeay irectionday otay atthay ofay ethay aintray ehay
ouldway eachray Acondomay. Afteray alkingway orfay oremay anthay eethray ourshay, oakedsay otay ethay inskay, ithway aay erribletay
eadachehay, ehay asway ableay otay akemay outay ethay irstfay ouseshay inay ethay ightlay ofay awnday. Attracteday ybay ethay ellsmay ofay
offeecay, ehay entway intoay aay itchenkay erewhay aay omanway ithway aay ildchay inay erhay armsay asway eaninglay overay ethay ovestay.

ello,”“Hay ehay aidsay, exhausteday. I’m“ay Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay Uendia.”bay

Ehay onouncedpray ishay olewhay amenay, etterlay ybay etterlay, inay orderay otay onvincecay erhay atthay ehay asway aliveay. Ehay
asway iseway inay oingday osay, ecausebay ethay omanway adhay oughtthay atthay ehay asway anay apparitionay asay eshay awsay ethay irtyday,
adowyshay igurefay ithway ishay eadhay anday othingclay irtyday ithway oodblay anday ouchedtay ithway ethay olemnitysay ofay eathday
omecay oughthray ethay oorday. Eshay ecognizedray imhay. Eshay oughtbray imhay aay anketblay osay atthay ehay ouldcay apwray
imselfhay upay ilewhay ishay othesclay ieddray ybay ethay irefay, eshay armedway omesay aterway otay ashway ishay oundway, ichwhay asway
onlyay aay eshflay oundway, anday eshay avegay imhay aay eanclay iaperday otay andagebay ishay eadhay. Enthay eshay avegay imhay aay ugmay
ofay offeecay ithoutway ugarsay asay eshay adhay eenbay oldtay ethay Uendiasbay ankdray itay, anday eshay eadspray ishay othingclay outay
earnay ethay irefay.

Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay idday otnay eakspay untilay ehay adhay inishedfay inkingdray ishay offeecay.

ere“Thay ustmay avehay eenbay eethray ousandthay ofay em”thay ehay urmuredmay.

at?”“Whay

e“Thay ead,”day ehay arifiedclay. It“ay ustmay avehay eenbay anay ofay ethay eoplepay owhay ereway atay ethay ation.”stay

Ethay omanway easuredmay imhay ithway aay ityingpay ooklay. ere“Thay aven’thay eenbay anyay eadday ere,”hay eshay aidsay.
ince“Say ethay imetay ofay youray uncleay, ethay olonelcay, othingnay ashay appenedhay inay Acondo.”may Inay ethay eethray itchenskay
erewhay Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay oppedstay eforebay eachingray omehay eythay oldtay imhay ethay amesay ingthay. ere“Thay
eren’tway anyay eadday. Ehay entway oughthray ethay allsmay uaresqay ybay ethay ationstay anday ehay awsay ethay itterfray andsstay iledpay
oneay onay optay ofay ethay otheray anday ehay ouldcay indfay onay acetray ofay ethay assacremay. Ethay eetsstray ereway esertedday underay
ethay ersistentpay ainray anday ethay ouseshay ockedlay upay ithway onay acetray ofay ifelay insideay. Ethay onlyay umanhay otenay asway
ethay irstfay ollingtay ofay ethay ellsbay orfay assmay. Ehay ockedknay atay ethay oorday atay Olonelcay Avilan’sgay ousehay. Aay egnantpray
omanway omwhay ehay adhay eensay everalsay imestay osedclay ethay oorday inay ishay acefay. e“Hay eft,”lay eshay aidsay, ightenedfray.
e“Hay entway ackbay otay ishay ownay ountry.”cay Ethay ainmay entranceay otay ethay ireway ickenchay oopcay asway uardedgay asay
alwaysay ybay otway ocallay olicemenpay owhay ookedlay asay ifay eythay ereway ademay ofay onestay underay ethay ainray, ithway
aincoatsray anday ermbbay ootsbay. Onay eirthay arginalmay eetstray ethay Estway Indianay Egroesnay ereway ingingsay Aturdaysay
almspsay. Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay umpedjay overay ethay ourtyardcay allway anday entereday ethay ousehay oughthray ethay
itchenkay. Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay arelybay aisedray erhay oicevay. on’t“Day etlay Ernandafay eesay you,”ay eshay aidsay.
e’s“Shay ustjay ettinggay up.”ay Asay ifay eshay ereway ulfillingfay anay implicitay actpay, eshay ooktay erhay onsay otay ethay
amberpot“chay oom.”ray arrangeday Elquiades’may oken-downbray otcay orfay imhay anday atay otway inay ethay afternoonay,
ilewhay Ernandafay asway akingtay erhay iestasay, eshay assedpay aay ateplay ofay oodfay inay otay imhay oughthray ethay indowway.

Aurelianoay Egundosay adhay eptslay atay omehay ecausebay ethay ainray adhay aughtcay imhay imetay anday atay eethray inay ethay
afternoonay ehay asway illstay aitingway orfay itay otay earclay. Informeday inay ecretsay ybay Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay, ehay
isitedvay ishay otherbray inay Elquiades’may oomray atay atthay imetay. Ehay idday otnay elievebay ethay ersionvay ofay ethay assacremay
oray ethay ightmarenay iptray ofay ethay aintray oadedlay ithway orpsescay avelingtray owardtay ethay easay eitheray. Ethay ightnay
eforebay ehay adhay eadray anay extraordinaryay oclamationpray otay ethay ationnay ichwhay aidsay atthay ethay orkersway adhay eftlay
ethay ationstay anday adhay eturnedray omehay inay eacefulpay oupsgray. Ethay oclamationpray alsoay atedstay atthay ethay unionay
eaderslay, ithway eatgray atrioticpay iritspay, adhay educedray eirthay emandsday otay otway ointspay: aay eformray ofay edicalmay
ervicessay anday ethay uildingbay ofay atrineslay inay ethay ivinglay uartersqay. Itay asway atedstay aterlay atthay enwhay ethay ilitarymay
authoritiesay obtaineday ethay agreementay ithway ethay orkersway, eythay astenedhay otay elltay Mr.ay Ownbray anday ehay otnay
onlyay accepteday ethay ewnay onditionscay utbay offereday otay aypay orfay eethray aysday ofay ublicpay estivitiesfay otay elebratecay
ethay enday ofay ethay onflictcay. Exceptay atthay enwhay ethay ilitarymay askeday imhay onay atwhay ateday eythay ouldcay announceay
ethay igningsay ofay ethay agreementay, ehay ookedlay outay ethay indowway atay ethay yskay ossedcray ithway ightninglay ashesflay anday
ademay aay ofoundpray esturegay ofay oubtday.

en“Whay ethay ainray ops,”stay ehay aidsay. As“ay onglay asay ethay ainray astslay e’reway uspendingsay allay activities.”ay

Itay adhay otnay ainedray orfay eethray onthsmay anday erethay adhay eenbay aay oughtdray. Utbay enwhay Mr.ay Ownbray
announceday ishay ecisionday aay orrentialtay ownpourday eadspray overay ethay olewhay ananabay egionray. Itay asway ethay oneay
atthay aughtcay Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay onay ishay ayway otay Acondomay. Aay eekway aterlay itay asway illstay ainingray. Ethay
officialay ersionvay, epeatedray aay ousandthay imestay anday angledmay outay allay overay ethay ountrycay ybay everyay eansmay ofay
ommunicationcay ethay overnmentgay oundfay atay andhay, asway inallyfay accepteday: erethay ereway onay eadday, ethay
atisfiedsay orkersway adhay onegay ackbay otay eirthay amiliesfay, anday ethay ananabay ompanycay asway uspendingsay allay
activityay untilay ethay ainsray oppedstay. Artialmay awlay ontinuedcay ithway anay eyeay otay ethay ecessitynay ofay akingtay
emergencyay easuresmay orfay ethay ublicpay isasterday ofay ethay endlessay ownpourday, utbay ethay oopstray ereway onfinedcay
otay uartersqay. Uringday ethay ayday ethay oldierssay alkedway oughthray ethay orrentstay inay ethay eetsstray ithway eirthay antpay
egslay olledray upay, ayingplay ithway oatsbay ithway ethay ildrenchay. Atay ightnay afteray apstay, eythay ockedknay oorsday ownday
ithway eirthay ifleray uttsbay, auledhay uspectssay outay ofay eirthay edsbay, anday ooktay emthay offay onay ipstray omfray ichwhay erethay
asway onay eturnray. Ethay earchsay orfay anday exterminationay ofay ethay oodlumshay, urderersmay, arsonistsay, anday ebelsray
ofay Ecreeday Onay.  asway illstay oinggay onay, utbay ethay ilitarymay eniedday itay evenay otay ethay elativesray ofay ethay ictimsvay owhay
owdedcray ethay ommandant’scay officesay inay earchsay ofay ewsnay. You“ay ustmay avehay eenbay eaming,”dray ethay officersay

insisteday. othing“Nay ashay appenedhay inay Acondomay, othingnay ashay everay appenedhay, anday othingnay everay illway
appenhay. is“Thay isay aay appyhay own.”tay Inay atthay ayway eythay ereway inallyfay ableay otay ipeway outay ethay unionay eaderslay.

Ethay onlyay urvivorsay asway Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay. Oneay Ebruaryfay ightnay ethay unmistakableay owsblay ofay ifleray
uttsbay ereway eardhay atay ethay oorday. Aurelianoay Egundosay, owhay asway illstay aitingway orfay itay otay earclay, openeday ethay
oorday otay ixsay oldierssay underay ethay ommandcay ofay anay officeray. Oakingsay omfray ethay ainray, ithoutway ayingsay aay ordway,
eythay earchedsay ethay ousehay oomray ybay oomray, osetclay ybay osetclay, omfray arlorpay otay antrypay. Ursulaay okeway upay
enwhay eythay urnedtay onay ethay ightlay inay erhay oomray anday eshay idday otnay eathebray ilewhay ethay archmay entway onay utbay
eldhay erhay ingersfay inay ethay apeshay ofay aay osscray, ointingpay emthay otay erewhay ethay oldierssay ereway ovingmay aboutay.
Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay anagedmay otay arnway Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay, owhay asway eepingslay inay Elquiades’may
oomray, utbay ehay ouldcay eesay atthay itay asway ootay atelay otay ytray otay escapeay. Osay Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay ockedlay ethay
oorday againay anday ehay utpay onay ishay irtshay anday ishay oesshay anday atsay ownday onay ethay otcay otay aitway orfay emthay. Atay atthay
omentmay eythay ereway earchingsay ethay oldgay orkshopway. Ethay officeray ademay emthay openay ethay adlockpay anday ithway
aay uickqay eepsway ofay ishay anternlay ehay awsay ethay orkbenchway anday ethay assglay upboardcay ithway ottlesbay ofay aciday anday
instrumentsay atthay ereway illstay erewhay eirthay owneray adhay eftlay emthay anday ehay eemedsay otay understanday atthay onay
oneay ivedlay inay atthay oomray. Ehay iselyway askeday Aurelianoay Egundosay ifay ehay asway aay ilversmithsay, oweverhay, anday ethay
atterlay explaineday otay imhay atthay itay adhay eenbay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendia’sbay orkshopway. Oho,”“ay ethay officeray
aidsay, urnedtay onay ethay ightslay, anday ordereday uchsay aay inutemay earchsay atthay eythay idday otnay issmay ethay eighteenay ittlelay
oldgay ishesfay atthay adhay otnay eenbay eltedmay ownday anday atthay ereway iddenhay ehindbay ethay ottlesbay Isay eirthay intay ancay.
Ethay officeray examineday emthay oneay ybay oneay onay ethay orkbenchway anday enthay ehay urnedtay umanhay. I’d“ay ikelay otay
aketay oneay, ifay Iay ay,”may ehay aidsay. At“ay oneay imetay eythay ereway aay arkmay ofay ubversionsay, utbay ownay ey’rethay elics.”ray 
Ehay asway youngay, almostay anay adolescentay, ithway onay ignsay ofay imiditytay anday ithway aay aturalnay easantplay annermay
atthay adhay otnay ownshay itselfay untilay enthay. Aurelianoay Egundosay avegay imhay ethay ittlelay ishfay. Ethay officeray utpay itay inay
ishay irtshay ocketpay ithway aay ildlikechay owglay inay ishay eyesay anday ehay utpay ethay othersay ackbay inay ethay ancay anday etsay itay ackbay
erewhay itay adhay eenbay.

It’s“ay aay onderfulway emento,”may ehay aidsay. olonel“Cay Aurelianoay Uendfabay asway oneay ofay ouray eatestgray en.”may

Everthelessnay, atthay urgesay ofay umanityhay idday otnay alteray ishay ofessionalpray onductcay. Atay Elquiades’may oomray,
ichwhay asway ockedlay upay againay ithway ethay adlockpay, Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay iedtray oneay astlay opehay. o“Nay oneay
ashay ivedlay inay atthay oomray orfay aay entury,”cay eshay aidsay. Ethay officeray adhay itay openeday anday ashedflay ethay eambay ofay
ethay anternlay overay itay, anday Aurelianoay Egundosay anday Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay awsay ethay Arabay eyesay ofay Osejay
Arcadioay Egundosay atay ethay omentmay enwhay ethay ayray ofay ightlay assedpay overay ishay acefay anday eythay understooday atthay
itay asway ethay enday ofay oneay anxietyay anday ethay eginningbay ofay anotheray ichwhay ouldway indfay eliefray onlyay inay
esignationray. Utbay ethay officeray ontinuedcay examiningay ethay oomray ithway ethay anternlay anday owedshay onay ignsay ofay
interestay untilay ehay iscoveredday ethay eventy-twosay amberpotschay iledpay upay inay ethay upboardscay. Enthay ehay urnedtay
onay ethay ightlay. Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay asway ittingsay onay ethay edgeay ofay ethay otcay, eadyray otay ogay, oremay olemnsay anday
ensivepay anthay everay. Inay ethay ackgroundbay ereway ethay elvesshay ithway ethay eddedshray ooksbay, ethay ollsray ofay
archmentpay, anday ethay eanclay anday orderlyay orktableway ithway ethay inkay illstay eshfray inay ethay inkwellsay. Erethay asway ethay
amesay urenesspay inay ethay airay, ethay amesay arityclay, ethay amesay espiteray omfray ustday anday estructionday atthay Aurelianoay
Egundosay adhay ownknay inay ildhoodchay anday atthay onlyay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay ouldcay otnay erceivepay. Utbay
ethay officeray asway onlyay interesteday inay ethay amberpotschay.

ow“Hay anymay eoplepay ivelay inay isthay ouse?’hay ehay askeday.

ive.”“Fay

Ethay officeray obviouslyay idday otnay understanday. Ehay ausedpay ithway ishay anceglay onay ethay acespay erewhay
Aurelianoay Egundosay anday Antasay Oftsay eday alay Iedadpay ereway illstay eeingsay Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay anday ethay atterlay
alsoay ealizedray atthay ethay oldiersay asway ookinglay atay imhay ithoutway eeingsay imhay. Enthay ehay urnedtay outay ethay ightlay
anday osedclay ethay oorday. Enwhay ehay okespay otay ethay oldierssay, Aurelianoay, Egundosay understooday atthay ethay youngay
officeray adhay eensay ethay oomray ithway ethay amesay eyesay asay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay.

It’s“ay obviousay atthay onay oneay ashay eenbay inay atthay oomray orfay atay eastlay aay undredhay years.”ay ethay officeray aidsay otay
ethay oldierssay. ere“Thay ustmay evenay ebay akessnay inay ere.”thay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Enwhay ethay oorday osedclay, Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay asway uresay atthay ethay arway asway overay. Yearsay eforebay
Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendlabay adhay okenspay otay imhay aboutay ethay ascinationfay ofay arway anday adhay iedtray otay owshay itay
otay imhay ithway ountlesscay examplesay awndray omfray ishay ownay experienceay. Ehay adhay elievedbay imhay. Utbay ethay ightnay
enwhay ethay oldierssay ookedlay atay imhay ithoutway eeingsay imhay ilewhay ehay oughtthay aboutay ethay ensiontay ofay ethay astpay
ewfay onthsmay, ethay iserymay ofay ailjay, ethay anicpay atay ethay ationstay, anday ethay aintray oadedlay ithway eadday eoplepay, Osejay
Arcadioay Egundosay eachedray ethay onclusioncay atthay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay asway othingnay utbay aay akerfay oray
anay imbecileay. Ehay ouldcay otnay understanday ywhay ehay adhay eedednay osay anymay ordsway otay explainay atwhay ehay eltfay inay
arway ecausebay oneay asway enoughay: earfay. Inay Elquiades’may oomray, onay ethay otheray andhay, otectedpray ybay ethay
upernaturalsay ightlay, ybay ethay oundsay ofay ethay ainray, ybay ethay eelingfay ofay eingbay invisibleay, ehay oundfay ethay eposeray
atthay ehay adhay otnay adhay orfay oneay inglesay instantay uringday ishay eviouspray ifelay, anday ethay onlyay earfay atthay emainedray
asway atthay eythay ouldway urybay imhay aliveay. Ehay oldtay Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay aboutay itay enwhay eshay oughtbray imhay
ishay ailyday ealsmay anday eshay omisedpray otay ugglestray otay aystay aliveay evenay eyondbay erhay aturalnay orcesfay inay orderay otay
akemay uresay atthay eythay ouldway urybay imhay eadday. Eefray omfray allay earfay, Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay edicatedday
imselfhay enthay otay emsepay ethay anuscriptsmay ofay Elquiadesmay anymay imestay, anday ithway osay uchmay oremay easureplay
enwhay ehay ouldcay otnay understanday emthay. Ehay ecamebay accustomeday otay ethay oundsay ofay ethay ainray, ichwhay afteray
otway onthsmay adhay ecomebay anotheray ormfay ofay ilencesay, anday ethay onlyay ingthay atthay isturbedday ishay olitudesay asway
ethay omingcay anday oinggay ofay Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay. Ehay askeday erhay, ereforethay, otay eavelay ethay ealsmay onay ethay
indowsillway anday adlockpay ethay oorday. Ethay estray ofay ethay amilyfay orgotfay aboutay imhay includingay Ernandafay, owhay
idday otnay indmay eavinglay imhay erethay enwhay eshay oundfay atthay ethay oldierssay adhay eensay imhay ithoutway ecognizingray
imhay. Afteray ixsay onthsmay ofay enclosureay, incesay ethay oldierssay adhay eftlay Acondomay Aurelianoay Egundosay
emovedray ethay adlockpay, ookinglay orfay omeonesay ehay ouldcay alktay otay untilay ethay ainray oppedstay. Asay oonsay asay ehay
openeday ethay oorday ehay eltfay ethay estilentialpay attackay ofay ethay amberpotschay, ichwhay ereway acedplay onay ethay oorflay
anday allay ofay ichwhay adhay eenbay useday everalsay imestay. Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay, evouredday ybay aldnessbay,
indifferentay otay ethay airay atthay adhay eenbay arpenedshay ybay ethay auseatingnay aporsvay, asway illstay eadingray anday
ereadingray ethay unintelligibleay archmentspay. Ehay asway illuminateday ybay aay eraphicsay owglay. Ehay arcelyscay aisedray
ishay eyesay enwhay ehay eardhay ethay oorday openay, utbay atthay ooklay asway enoughay orfay ishay otherbray otay eesay epeatedray inay itay
ethay irreparableay atefay ofay ishay eat-grandfathergray.

ere“Thay ereway oremay anthay eethray ousandthay ofay em,”thay asway allay atthay Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay aidsay. I’m“ay
uresay ownay atthay eythay ereway everybodyay owhay adhay eenbay atay ethay ation.”stay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Apterchay 


ITay AINEDray ORfay ourfay yearsay, elevenay onthsmay, anday otway aysday. Erethay ereway eriodspay ofay izzledray uringday ichwhay
everyoneay utpay onay ishay ullfay essdray anday aay onvalescentcay ooklay otay elebratecay ethay earingclay, utbay ethay eoplepay oonsay
ewgray accustomeday otay interpretay ethay ausespay asay aay ignsay ofay edoubledray ainray. Ethay yskay edcmmblay intoay aay etsay ofay
estructiveday ormsstay anday outay ofay ethay orthnay amecay urricaneshay atthay atteredscay oofsray aboutay anday ockedknay
ownday allsway anday uprooteday everyay astlay antplay ofay ethay ananabay ovesgray. Ustjay asay uringday ethay insomniaay agueplay,
asay Ursulaay amecay otay ememberray uringday osethay aysday, ethay alamitycay itselfay inspireday efensesday againstay
oredombay. Aurelianoay Egundosay asway oneay ofay osethay owhay orkedway ardesthay otnay otay ebay onqueredcay ybay
idlenessay. Ehay adhay onegay omehay orfay omesay inormay attermay onay ethay ightnay atthay Mr.ay Ownbray unleasheday ethay
ormstay, anday Ernandafay iedtray otay elphay imhay ithway aay alf-blown-outhay umbrellaay atthay eshay oundfay inay aay osetclay. I“ay
on’tday eednay it,”ay ehay aidsay. I’ll“ay aystay untilay itay ears.”clay Atthay asway otnay, ofay oursecay, anay ironcladay omisepray, utbay ehay
ouldway accomplishay itay iterallylay. Incesay ishay othesclay ereway atay Etrapay Otes’scay, everyay eethray aysday ehay ouldway aketay
offay atwhay ehay adhay onay anday aitway inay ishay ortsshay untilay eythay ashedway. Inay orderay otnay otay ecomebay oredbay, ehay
edicatedday imselfhay otay ethay asktay ofay epairingray ethay anymay ingsthay atthay eedednay ixingfay inay ethay ousehay. Ehay
adjusteday ingeshay, oileday ockslay, ewedscray ockersknay ighttay, anday anedplay oorjambsday. Orfay everalsay onthsmay ehay
asway eensay anderingway aboutay ithway aay oolboxtay atthay ethay ypsiesgay ustmay avehay eftlay ehindbay inay Osejay Arcadioay
Uendia’sbay aysday, anday onay oneay ewknay etherwhay ecausebay ofay ethay involuntaryay exerciseay, ethay interway ediumtay oray
ethay imposeday abstinenceay, utbay ishay ellybay asway eflatingday ittlelay ybay ittlelay ikelay aay ineskinway anday ishay acefay ofay aay
eatificbay ortoisetay asway ecomingbay esslay oodshotblay anday ishay oubleday inchay esslay ominentpray untilay ehay ecamebay
esslay achydermicpay allay overay anday asway ableay otay ietay Irisay ownay oesshay againay. Atchingway imhay uttingpay inay atcheslay
anday epairingray ocksclay, Ernandafay onderedway etherwhay oray otnay ehay ootay ightmay ebay allingfay intoay ethay icevay ofay
uildingbay osay atthay ehay ouldcay aketay apartay ikelay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay anday ishay ittlelay oldgay ishesfay,
Amarantaay anday erhay oudshray anday erhay uttonsbay, Osejay Arcadioay anday ethay archmentspay, anday Ursulaay anday erhay
emoriesmay. Utbay atthay asway otnay ethay asecay. Ethay orstway artpay asway atthay ethay ainray asway affectingay everythingay anday
ethay iestdray ofay achinesmay ouldway avehay owersflay oppingpay outay amongay eirthay earsgay ifay eythay ereway otnay oileday
everyay eethray aysday, anday ethay eadsthray inay ocadesbray edmstay, anday etway othingclay ouldway eakbray outay inay aay ashray ofay
affron-coloredsay ossmay. Ethay airay asway osay ampday atthay ishfay ouldcay avehay omecay inay oughthray ethay oorsday anday
umsway outay ethay indowsway, oatingflay oughthray ethay atmosphereay inay ethay oomsray. Oneay orningmay Ursulaay okeway
upay eelingfay atthay eshay asway eachingray erhay enday inay aay acidplay oonsway anday eshay adhay alreadyay askeday emthay otay aketay
erhay otay Atherfay Antonioay Isabelay, evenay ifay itay adhay otay ebay onay aay etcherstray, enwhay Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay
iscoveredday atthay erhay ackbay asway avedpay ithway eecheslay. Eshay ooktay emthay offay oneay ybay oneay, ushingcray emthay ithway
aay irebrandfay eforebay eythay edblay erhay otay eathday. Itay asway ecessarynay otay igday analscay otay etgay ethay aterway outay ofay ethay
ousehay anday idray itay ofay ethay ogsfray anday ailssnay osay atthay eythay ouldcay ydray ethay oorsflay anday aketay ethay icksbray omfray
underay ethay edpostsbay anday alkway inay oesshay onceay oremay. Occupieday ithway ethay anymay allsmay etailsday atthay alledcay
orfay ishay attentionay, Aurelianoay Egundosay idday otnay ealizeray atthay ehay asway ettinggay olday untilay oneay afternoonay enwhay
ehay oundfay imselfhay ontemplatingcay ethay ematurepray uskday omfray aay ockingray airchay anday inkingthay aboutay Etrapay
Otescay ithoutway uiveringqay. Erethay ouldway avehay eenbay onay oblempray inay oinggay ackbay otay Ernanda’sfay insipiday
ovelay, ecausebay erhay eautybay adhay ecomebay olemnsay ithway ageay, utbay ethay ainray adhay aredspay imhay omfray allay
emergenciesay ofay assionpay anday adhay illedfay imhay ithway ethay ongyspay erenitysay ofay aay acklay ofay appetiteay. Ehay amuseday
imselfhay inkingthay aboutay ethay ingsthay atthay ehay ouldcay avehay oneday inay otheray imestay ithway atthay ainray ichwhay adhay
alreadyay astedlay aay yearay. Ehay adhay eenbay oneay ofay ethay irstfay otay ingbray inczay eetsshay otay Acondomay, uchmay earlieray
anthay eirthay opularizationpay ybay ethay ananabay ompanycay, implysay otay oofray Etrapay Otes’scay edroombay ithway emthay
anday otay aketay easureplay inay ethay eelingfay ofay eepday intimacyay atthay ethay inklingspray ofay ethay ainray oducedpray atay atthay
imetay. Utbay evenay osethay ildway emoriesmay ofay ishay admay youthay eftlay imhay unmoveday, ustjay asay uringday ishay astlay
ebauchday ehay adhay exhausteday ishay uotaqay ofay alaciousnesssay anday allay ehay adhay eftlay asway ethay arvelousmay iftgay ofay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


eingbay ableay otay ememberray itay ithoutway itternessbay oray epentanceray. Itay ightmay avehay eenbay oughtthay atthay ethay
elugeday adhay ivengay imhay ethay opportunityay otay itsay anday eflectray anday atthay ethay usinessbay ofay ethay iersplay anday ethay
oilcanay adhay awakeneday inay imhay ethay ardytay yearningay ofay osay anymay usefulay adestray atthay ehay ightmay avehay ollowedfay
inay ishay ifelay anday idday otnay; utbay eithernay asecay asway etmay, ecausebay ethay emptationtay ofay aay edentarysay omesticityday
atthay asway esiegingbay imhay asway otnay ethay esultray ofay anyay ediscoveryray oray oralmay esionlay, itay amecay omfray uchmay
artherfay offay, uneartheday ybay ethay ain’sray itchforkpay omfray ethay aysday enwhay inay Elquiades’may oomray ehay ouldway
eadray ethay odigiouspray ablesfay aboutay yingflay arpetscay anday aleswhay atthay edfay onay entireay ipsshay anday eirthay ewscray. Itay
asway uringday osethay aysday atthay inay aay omentmay ofay arelessnesscay ittlelay Aurelianoay appeareday onay ethay orchpay anday
Inisay andfathergray ecognizedray ethay ecretsay ofay ishay identityay. Ehay utcay Inisay airhay, esseddray imhay aughttay imhay otnay otay
ebay afraiday ofay eoplepay, anday eryvay oonsay itay asway evidentay atthay ehay asway aay egitimatelay Aurelianoay Uendiabay, ithway ishay
ighhay eekboneschay, ishay artledstay ooklay, anday ishay olitarysay airay. Itay asway aay eliefray orfay Ernandafay. Orfay omesay imetay
eshay adhay easuredmay ethay extentay ofay erhay idefulnesspray, utbay eshay ouldcay otnay indfay anyay ayway otay emedyray itay
ecausebay ethay oremay eshay oughtthay ofay olutionssay ethay esslay ationalray eythay eemedsay otay erhay. Ifay eshay adhay ownknay
atthay Aurelianoay Egundosay asway oinggay otay aketay ingsthay ethay ayway ehay idday, ithway ethay inefay easureplay ofay aay
andfathergray, eshay ouldway otnay avehay akentay osay anymay urnstay oray otgay osay ixedmay upay, utbay ouldway avehay eedfray
erselfhay omfray ortificationmay ethay yearay eforebay Amarantaay Ursulaay, owhay alreadyay adhay erhay econdsay eethtay,
oughtthay ofay erhay ephewnay asay aay urryingscay oytay owhay asway aay onsolationcay orfay ethay ediumtay ofay ethay ainray.
Aurelianoay Egundosay ememberedray enthay ethay Englishay encyclopediaay atthay onay oneay adhay incesay ouchedtay inay
Eme’smay olday oomray. Ehay eganbay otay owshay ethay ildrenchay ethay icturespay, especiallyay osethay ofay animalsay, anday aterlay
onay ethay apsmay anday otographsphay ofay emoteray ountriescay anday amousfay eoplepay. Incesay ehay idday otnay owknay anyay
Englishay anday ouldcay identifyay onlyay ethay ostmay amousfay itiescay anday eoplepay, ehay ouldway inventay amesnay anday
egendslay otay atisfysay ethay ildren’schay insatiableay uriositycay.

Ernandafay eallyray elievedbay atthay erhay usbandhay asway aitingway orfay itay otay earclay otay eturnray otay ishay oncubinecay.
Uringday ethay irstfay onthsmay ofay ethay ainray eshay asway afraiday atthay ehay ouldway ytray otay ipslay intoay erhay edroombay anday
atthay eshay ouldway avehay otay undergoay ethay ameshay ofay evealingray otay imhay atthay eshay asway incapableay ofay
econciliationray incesay ethay irthbay ofay Amarantaay Ursulaay. Atthay asway ethay easonray orfay erhay anxiousay orrespon¬cay
enceday ithway ethay invisibleay octorsday, intermpteday ybay equentfray isastersday ofay ethay ailmay. Uringday ethay irstfay
onthsmay enwhay itay asway earnedlay atthay ethay ainstray ereway umpingjay eirthay ackstray inay ethay ainray, aay etterlay omfray ethay
invisibleay octorsday oldtay erhay atthay ershay ereway otnay arrivingay. Aterlay onay, enwhay ontactcay ithway ethay unknownay
orrespondentscay asway okenbray, eshay adhay eriouslysay oughtthay ofay uttingpay onay ethay igertay askmay atthay erhay usbandhay
adhay ornway inay ethay oodyblay arnivalcay anday avinghay erselfhay examineday underay aay ictitiousfay amenay ybay ethay ananabay
ompanycay octorsday. Utbay oneay ofay ethay anymay eoplepay owhay egularlyray oughtbray unpleasantay ewsnay ofay ethay elugeday
adhay oldtay erhay atthay ethay ompanycay asway ismantlingday itsay ispensariesday otay ovemay emthay otay erewhay itay asway otnay
ainingray. Enthay eshay avegay upay opehay. Eshay esignedray erselfhay otay aitingway untilay ethay ainray oppedstay anday ethay ailmay
ervicesay asway ackbay otay ormalnay, anday inay ethay eantimemay eshay oughtsay eliefray omfray erhay ecretsay ailmentsay ithway
ecourseray otay erhay imaginationay, ecausebay eshay ouldway atherray avehay iedday anthay utpay erselfhay inay ethay andshay ofay ethay
onlyay octorday eftlay inay Acondomay, ethay extravagantay Enchmanfray owhay ateay assgray ikelay aay onkeyday. Eshay ewdray oseclay
otay Ursulaay, ustingtray atthay eshay ouldway owknay ofay omesay alliativepay orfay erhay attacksay. Utbay erhay istedtway abithay ofay
otnay allingcay ingsthay ybay eirthay amesnay ademay erhay utpay irstfay ingsthay astlay anday useay expelled”“ay orfay ave“gay irth”bay
anday urning”“bay orfay ow”“flay osay atthay itay ouldway allay ebay esslay amefulshay, ithway ethay esultray atthay Ursulaay eachedray
ethay easonableray onclusioncay atthay erhay oubletray asway intestinalay atherray anthay uterineay, anday eshay adviseday erhay otay
aketay aay oseday ofay alomelcay onay anay emptyay omachstay. Ifay itay adhay otnay eenbay orfay atthay ufferingsay, ichwhay ouldway avehay
adhay othingnay amefulshay aboutay itay orfay omeonesay owhay idday otnay uffersay asay ellway omfray amefulnessshay, anday ifay itay
adhay otnay eenbay orfay ethay osslay ofay ethay etterslay, ethay ainray ouldway otnay avehay otheredbay Ernandafay, ecausebay, afteray
allay, erhay olewhay ifelay adhay eenbay entspay asay ifay itay adhay eenbay ainingray. Eshay idday otnay angechay erhay eduleschay oray
odifymay erhay itualray. Enwhay ethay abletay asway illstay aisedray upay onay icksbray anday ethay airschay utpay onay anksplay osay atthay
osethay atay ethay abletay ouldway otnay etgay eirthay eetfay etway, eshay illstay ervedsay ithway inenlay ableclothstay anday inefay
inawarechay anday ithway ightedlay andlescay, ecausebay eshay eltfay atthay ethay alamitiescay ouldshay otnay ebay useday asay aay

etextpray orfay anyay elaxationray inay ustomscay. Onay oneay entway outay intoay ethay eetstray anyay oremay. Ifay itay adhay ependedday
onay Ernandafay, eythay ouldway evernay avehay oneday osay, otnay onlyay incesay itay artedstay ainingray utbay incesay onglay eforebay
atthay, ecausebay eshay eltfay atthay oorsday adhay eenbay inventeday otay aystay osedclay anday atthay uriositycay orfay atwhay asway
oinggay onay inay ethay eetstray asway aay attermay orfay arlotshay. Yetay eshay asway ethay irstfay oneay otay ooklay outay enwhay eythay ereway
oldtay atthay ethay uneralfay ocessionpray orfay Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay asway assingpay ybay anday evenay oughthay eshay
onlyay atchedway itay oughthray ethay alf-openedhay indowway itay eftlay erhay inay uchsay aay atestay ofay afflictionay atthay orfay aay onglay
imetay eshay epentedray inay erhay eaknessway.

Eshay ouldcay otnay avehay onceivedcay ofay aay oremay esolateday ortegecay. Eythay adhay utpay ethay offincay inay anay oxcartay
overay ichwhay eythay uiltbay aay anopycay ofay ananabay eaveslay, utbay ethay essurepray ofay ethay ainray asway osay intenseay anday ethay
eetsstray osay uddymay atthay ithway everyay epstay ethay eelswhay otgay uckstay anday ethay overingcay asway onay ethay ergevay ofay
allingfay apartay. Ethay eamsstray ofay adsay aterway atthay ellfay onay ethay offincay ereway oakingsay ethay agflay atthay adhay eenbay
acedplay onay optay ichwhay asway actuallyay ethay agflay ainedstay ithway oodblay anday unpowdergay atthay adhay eenbay ejectedray
ybay oremay onorablehay eteransvay. Onay ethay offincay eythay adhay alsoay acedplay ethay abersay ithway asselstay ofay ilversay anday
oppercay, ethay amesay oneay atthay Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay useday otay anghay onay ethay oatcay ackray inay orderay otay ogay
intoay Amaranta’say ewingsay oomray unarmeday. Ehindbay ethay artcay, omesay arefootbay anday allay ofay emthay ithway eirthay
antspay olledray upay, ashingsplay inay ethay udmay ereway ethay astlay urvivorssay ofay ethay urrendersay atay Eerlandianay arryingcay
aay over’sdray affstay inay oneay andhay anday inay ethay otheray aay eathwray ofay aperpay owersflay atthay adhay ecomebay iscoloredday
inay ethay ainray. Eythay appeareday ikelay anay unrealay isionvay alongay ethay eetstray ichwhay illstay orebay ethay amenay ofay Olonelcay
Aurelianoay Uendiabay anday eythay allay ookedlay atay ethay ousehay asay eythay assedpay anday urnedtay ethay ornercay atay ethay
uaresqay, erewhay eythay adhay otay askay orfay elphay otay ovemay ethay artcay, ichwhay asway uckstay. Ursulaay adhay erselfhay arriedcay
otay ethay oorday ybay Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay. Eshay ollowedfay ethay ifficultiesday ofay ethay ocessionpray ithway uchsay
attentionay atthay onay oneay oubtedday atthay eshay asway eeingsay itay, especiallyay ecausebay erhay aisedray andhay ofay anay
archangelicay essengermay asway ovingmay ithway ethay ayingsway ofay ethay artcay.

ood-bye“Gay, Erineldogay, ymay on,”say eshay outedshay. ay“Say ellohay otay ymay eoplepay anday elltay emthay I’llay eesay emthay
enwhay itay opsstay aining.”ray

Aurelianoay Egundosay elpedhay erhay ackbay otay edbay anday ithway ethay amesay informalityay ithway ichwhay ehay alwaysay
eatedtray erhay, ehay askeday erhay ethay eaningmay ofay erhay arewellfay.

It’s“ay ue,”tray eshay aidsay. I’m“ay onlyay aitingway orfay ethay ainray otay opstay inay orderay otay ie.”day

Ethay onditioncay ofay ethay eetsstray alarmeday Aurelianoay Egundosay. Ehay inallyfay ecamebay orriedway aboutay ethay
atestay ofay ishay animalsay anday ehay ewthray anay oilclothay overay ishay eadhay anday entsay otay Etrapay Otes’scay ousehay. Ehay
oundfay erhay inay ethay ourtyardcay, inay ethay aterway upay otay erhay aistway, yingtray otay oatflay ethay orpsecay ofay aay orsehay.
Aurelianoay Egundosay elpedhay erhay ithway aay everlay, anday ethay enormousay ollensway odybay avegay aay urntay ikelay aay ellbay
anday asway aggeddray awayay ybay ethay orrenttay ofay iquidlay udmay. Incesay ethay ainray eganbay, allay atthay Etrapay Otescay adhay
oneday asway otay earclay erhay ourtyardcay ofay eadday animalsay. Uringday ethay irstfay eeksway eshay entsay essagesmay otay
Aurelianoay Egundosay orfay imhay otay aketay urgentay easuresmay anday ehay adhay answereday atthay erethay asway onay msh,ay
atthay ethay ituationsay asway otnay alarmingay, atthay erethay ouldway ebay entyplay ofay imetay otay inkthay aboutay omethingsay
enwhay itay earedclay. Eshay entsay imhay ordway atthay ethay orsehay asturespay ereway eingbay oodedflay, atthay ethay attlecay ereway
eeingflay otay ighhay oundgray, erewhay erethay asway othingnay otay eatay anday erewhay eythay ereway atay ethay ercymay ofay aguarsjay
anday icknesssay. ere’s“Thay othingnay otay ebay one,”day Aurelianoay Egundosay answereday erhay. Others“ay illway ebay ornbay
enwhay itay ears.”clay Etrapay Atescay adhay eensay emthay ieday inay ustersday anday ethay asway ableay otay utcherbay onlyay osethay
uckstay inay ethay udmay. Eshay awsay ithway uietqay impotenceay owhay ethay elugeday asway itilesslypay exterminatingay aay
ortunefay atthay atay oneay imetay asway onsideredcay ethay argestlay anday ostmay olidsay inay Acondomay, anday ofay ichwhay
othingnay emainedray utbay estilencepay. Enwhay Aurelianoay Egundosay ecidedday otay ogay eesay atwhay asway oinggay onay, ehay
oundfay onlyay ethay orpsecay ofay ethay orsehay anday aay ualidsqay ulemay inay ethay uinsray ofay ethay ablestay. Etrapay Otescay atchedway
imhay arriveay ithoutway urprisesay, oyjay, oray esentmentray, anday eshay onlyay alloweday erselfhay anay ironicay ilesmay.

It’s“ay aboutay ime!”tay eshay aidsay.

Eshay adhay ageday, allay inskay anday onesbay, anday erhay aperedtay eyesay ofay aay arnivorouscay animalay adhay ecomebay adsay
anday ametay omfray ookinglay atay ethay ainray osay uchmay. Aurelianoay Egundosay ayedstay atay erhay ousehay oremay anthay eethray
