onthsmay, otnay ecausebay ehay eltfay etterbay erethay anthay inay atthay ofay ishay amilyfay, utbay ecausebay ehay eedednay allay atthay
imetay otay akemay ethay ecisionday otay owthray ethay iecepay ofay oilclothay ackbay overay ishay eadhay. ere’s“Thay onay ush,”ray ehay
aidsay, asay ehay adhay aidsay inay ethay otheray omehay. et’s“Lay opehay atthay itay earsclay inay ethay extnay ewfay ours.”hay Uringday ethay
oursecay ofay ethay irstfay eekway ehay ecamebay accustomeday otay ethay inroadsay atthay imetay anday ethay ainray adhay ademay inay ethay
ealthhay ofay ishay oncubinecay, anday ittlelay ybay ittlelay ehay asway eeingsay erhay asay eshay adhay eenbay eforebay, ememberingray
erhay ubilantjay excessesay anday ethay eliriousday ertilityfay atthay erhay ovelay ovokedpray inay ethay animalsay, anday artlypay
oughthray ovelay, artlypay oughthray interestay, oneay ightnay uringday ethay econdsay eekway ehay awokeay erhay ithway urgentay
aressescay. Etrapay Otescay idday otnay eactray. o“Gay ackbay otay eep,”slay eshay urmuredmay. ese“Thay aren’tay imestay orfay
ingsthay ikelay at.”thay Aurelianoay Egundosay awsay imselfhay inay ethay irrorsmay onay ethay eilingcay, awsay Etrapay Otes’scay
inalspay olumncay ikelay aay owray ofay oolsspay ungstray ogethertay alongay aay usterclay ofay itheredway ervesnay, anday ehay awsay
atthay eshay asway ightray, otnay ecausebay ofay ethay imestay utbay ecausebay ofay emselvesthay, owhay ereway onay ongerlay upay otay
osethay ingsthay.

Aurelianoay Egundosay eturnedray omehay ithway Inisay tmnks,ay onvincedcay atthay otnay onlyay Ursulaay utbay allay ethay
inhabitantsay ofay Acondomay ereway aitingway orfay itay otay earday inay orderay otay ieday. Ehay adhay eensay emthay asay ehay assedpay
ybay, ittingsay inay eirthay arlorspay ithway anay absorbeday ooklay anday oldedfay armsay, eelingfay unbrokenay imetay asspay,
elentlessray imestay, ecausebay itay asway uselessay otay ivideday itay intoay onthsmay anday yearsay, anday ethay aysday intoay ourshay,
enwhay oneay ouldcay oday othingnay utbay ontemplatecay ethay ainray. Ethay ildrenchay eetedgray Aurelianoay Egundosay ithway
excitementay ecausebay ehay asway ayingplay ethay asthmaticay accordionay orfay emthay againay. Utbay ethay oncertscay idday otnay
attractay eirthay attentionay asay uchmay asay ethay essionssay ithway ethay encyclopediaay, anday onceay oremay eythay otgay
ogethertay inay Eme’smay oomray, erewhay Aurelianoay Egundo’ssay imaginationay angedchay aay irigibleday intoay aay yingflay
elephantay owhay asway ookinglay orfay aay aceplay otay eepslay amongay ethay oudsclay. Onay oneay occasionay ehay amecay acrossay aay
anmay onay orsebackhay owhay inay itespay ofay ishay angestray outfitay adhay aay amiliarfay ooklay, anday afteray examiningay imhay
oselyclay ehay amecay otay ethay onclusioncay atthay itay asway aay icturepay ofay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay. Ehay owedshay itay
otay Ernandafay anday eshay alsoay admitteday ethay esemblanceray ofay ethay orsemanhay otnay onlyay otay ethay olonelcay utbay otay
everybodyay inay ethay amilyfay, althoughay ehay asway actuallyay aay Artartay arriorway. Imetay assedpay inay atthay ayway ithway ethay
Olossuscay ofay Odesrhay anday akesnay armerschay untilay ishay ifeway oldtay imhay atthay erethay ereway onlyay eethray oundspay ofay
ieddray eatmay anday aay acksay ofay iceray eftlay inay ethay antrypay.

Anday atwhay oday youay antway emay otay oday aboutay it?”ay ehay askeday.

I“ay on’tday ow,”knay Ernandafay answereday. at’s“Thay en’smay usiness.”bay

ell,”“Way Aurelianoay Egundosay aidsay, omething“say illway ebay oneday enwhay itay ears.”clay

Ehay asway oremay interesteday inay ethay encyclopediaay anthay Inay ethay omesticday oblempray, evenay enwhay ehay adhay otay
ontentcay imselfhay ithway aay apscray ofay eatmay anday aay ittlelay iceray orfay unchlay. It’s“ay impossibleay otay oday anythingay ow,”nay
ehay ouldway aysay. It“ay an’tcay ainray orfay ethay estray ofay ouray ives.”lay Anday ilewhay ethay urgenciesay ofay ethay antrypay ewgray
eatergray, Ernanda’sfay indignationay alsoay ewgray, untilay erhay eventualay otestspray, erhay infrequentay outburstsay amecay
orthfay inay anay uncontaineday, unchaineday orrenttay atthay eginbay oneay orningmay ikelay ethay onotonousmay onedray ofay aay
uitargay anday asay ethay ayday advanceday oseray inay itchpay, icherray anday oremay endidsplay. Aurelianoay Egundosay asway otnay
awareay ofay ethay ingsongsay untilay ethay ollowingfay ayday afteray eakfastbray enwhay ehay eltfay imselfhay eingbay otheredbay ybay
aay uzzingbay atthay asway ybay enthay oremay uidflay anday ouderlay anthay ethay oundsay ofay ethay ainray, anday itay asway Ernandafay,
owhay asway alkingway oughoutthray ethay ousehay omplainingcay atthay eythay adhay aisedray erhay otay ebay aay ueenqay onlyay otay
avehay erhay enday upay asay aay ervantsay inay aay adhousemay, ithway aay azylay, idolatrousay, ibertinelay usbandhay owhay aylay onay ishay
ackbay aitingway orfay eadbray otay ainray ownday omfray eavenhay ilewhay eshay asway ainingstray erhay idneyskay yingtray otay eepkay
afloatay aay omehay eldhay ogethertay ithway inspay erewhay erethay asway osay uchmay otay oday, osay uchmay otay earbay upay underay
anday epairray omfray ethay imetay Odgay avegay Inisay orningmay unlightsay untilay itay asway imetay otay ogay otay edbay atthay enwhay eshay
otgay erethay erhay eyesay ereway ullfay ofay oundgray assglay, anday yetay onay oneay everay aidsay otay erhay, ood“Gay orningmay,
Ernandafay, idday youay eepslay ell?”way Ornay adhay eythay askeday erhay, evenay outay ofay ourtesycay, ywhay eshay asway osay alepay oray
ywhay eshay awokeay ithway urplepay ingsray underay erhay eyesay inay itespay ofay ethay actfay atthay eshay expecteday itay, ofay oursecay,
omfray aay amilyfay atthay adhay alwaysay onsideredcay erhay aay uisancenay, anay olday agray, aay oobybay aintedpay onay ethay allway, anday
owhay ereway alwaysay oinggay arounday ayingsay ingsthay againstay erhay ehindbay erhay ackbay, allingcay erhay urchchay ousemay.






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


allingcay erhay Ariseephay, allingcay erhay aftycray, anday evenay Amarantaay, aymay eshay estray inay eacepay, adhay aidsay alouday atthay
eshay asway oneay ofay osethay eoplepay owhay ouldcay otnay elltay eirthay ectumsray omfray eirthay ashesay, Odgay avehay ercymay,
uchsay ordsway, anday eshay adhay oleratedtay everythingay ithway esignationray ecausebay ofay ethay Olyhay Atherfay, utbay eshay
adhay otnay eenbay ableay otay oleratetay itay anyay oremay enwhay atthay evilay Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay aidsay atthay ethay
amnationday ofay ethay amilyfay adhay omecay enwhay itay openeday itsay oorsday otay aay uck-upstay ighlanderhay, ustjay imagineay, aay
ossybay ighlanderhay, Ordlay avesay usay, aay ighlanderhay aughterday ofay evilay itspay ofay ethay amesay ipestray asay ethay
ighlandershay ethay overnmentgay entsay otay illkay orkersway, youay elltay emay, anday ehay asway eferringray otay onay oneay utbay erhay,
ethay odchildgay ofay ethay Ukeday ofay Albaay, aay adylay ofay uchsay ineagelay atthay eshay ademay ethay iverlay ofay esidents’pray ivesway
uiverqay, aay oblenay ameday ofay inefay oodblay ikelay erhay, owhay adhay ethay ightray otay ignsay elevenay eninsularpay amesnay anday
owhay asway ethay onlyay ortalmay eaturecray inay atthay owntay ullfay ofay astardsbay owhay idday otnay eelfay allay onfusedcay atay ethay
ightsay ofay ixteensay iecespay ofay ilverwaresay, osay atthay erhay adulterousay usbandhay ouldcay ieday ofay aughterlay afterwarday
anday aysay atthay osay anymay ivesknay anday orksfay anday oonsspay ereway otnay eantmay orfay aay umanhay eingbay utbay orfay aay
entipedecay, anday ethay onlyay oneay owhay ouldcay elltay ithway erhay eyesay osedclay enwhay ethay itewhay ineway asway ervedsay anday
onay atwhay idesay anday inay ichwhay assglay anday enwhay ethay edray ineway anday onay atwhay idesay anday inay ichwhay assglay, anday otnay
ikelay atthay easantpay ofay anay Amarantaay, aymay eshay estray inay eacepay, owhay oughtthay atthay itewhay ineway asway ervedsay inay
ethay aytimeday anday edray ineway atay ightnay, anday ethay onlyay oneay onay ethay olewhay oastcay owhay ouldcay aketay idepray inay ethay
actfay atthay eshay ooktay arecay ofay erhay odilybay eedsnay onlyay inay oldengay amberpotschay, osay atthay Olonelcay Aurelianoay
Uendiabay, aymay ehay estray inay eacepay, ouldcay avehay ethay effronteryay otay askay erhay ithway ishay Asonicmay Illay umorhay
erewhay eshay adhay eceivedray atthay ivilegepray anday etherwhay eshay idday otnay itshay itshay utbay atshay eetsway asilbay, ustjay
imagineay, ithway osethay eryvay ordsway, anday osay atthay Enataray, erhay ownay aughterday, owhay oughthray anay oversightay
adhay eensay erhay oolstay inay ethay edroombay, adhay answereday atthay evenay ifay ethay otpay asway allay oldgay anday ithway aay oatcay ofay
armsay, atwhay asway insideay asway urepay itshay, ysicalphay itshay, anday orseway evenay anthay anyay otheray indkay ecausebay itay asway
uck-upstay ighlandhay itshay, ustjay imagineay, erhay ownay aughterday, osay atthay eshay evernay adhay anyay illusionsay aboutay ethay
estray ofay ethay amilyfay, utbay inay anyay asecay eshay adhay ethay ightray otay expectay aay ittlelay oremay onsiderationcay omfray erhay
usbandhay ecausebay, orfay etterbay oray orfay orseway, ehay asway erhay onsecratedcay ousespay erhay elpmatehay, erhay egallay
espoilerday, owhay ooktay uponay imselfhay ofay ishay ownay eefray anday overeignsay illway ethay avegray esponsibilityray ofay
akingtay erhay awayay omfray erhay aternalpay omehay, erewhay eshay evernay antedway orfay oray ufferedsay omfray anythingay,
erewhay eshay oveway uneralfay eathswray asay aay astimepay, incesay erhay odfathergay adhay entsay aay etterlay ithway ishay ignaturesay
anday ethay ampstay ofay ishay ingray onay ethay ealingsay axway implysay otay aysay atthay ethay andshay ofay ishay oddaughtergay ereway
otnay eantmay orfay askstay ofay isthay orldway exceptay otay ayplay ethay avichordclay, anday, everthelessnay, erhay insaneay
usbandhay adhay akentay erhay omfray erhay omehay ithway allay annermay ofay admonitionsay anday arningsway anday adhay
oughtbray erhay otay atthay yingfray anpay ofay ellhay erewhay aay ersonpay ouldcay otnay eathebray ecausebay ofay ethay eathay, anday
eforebay eshay adhay ompletedcay erhay Entecostalpay astfay ehay adhay onegay offay ithway ishay anderingway unkstray anday ishay
astrel’sway accordionay otay oaflay inay adulteryay ithway aay etchwray ofay omwhay itay asway onlyay enoughay otay eesay erhay ehindbay,
ellway, at’sthay eenbay aidsay, otay eesay erhay iggleway erhay are’smay ehindbay inay orderay otay uessgay atthay eshay asway aay, atthay eshay
asway aay, ustjay ethay oppositeay ofay erhay, owhay asway aay adylay inay aay alacepay oray aay igstypay, atay ethay abletay oray inay edbay, aay adylay ofay
eedingbray, Od-fearinggay, obeyingay Ishay awslay anday ubmissivesay otay Ishay ishesway, anday ithway omwhay ehay ouldcay otnay
erformpay, aturallynay, ethay acrobaticsay anday ampishtray anticsay atthay ehay idday ithway ethay otheray oneay, owhay, ofay oursecay,
asway eadyray orfay anythingay ikelay ethay Enchfray atronsmay, anday evenay orseway, ifay oneay onsiderscay ellway, ecausebay eythay
atay eastlay adhay ethay onestyhay otay utpay aay edray ightlay atay eirthay oorday, inishnesssway ikelay atthay, ustjay imagineay, anday atthay
asway allay atthay asway eedednay ybay ethay onlyay anday elovedbay aughterday ofay Onaday Enataray Argoteay anday Onday
Ernandofay elday Arpiocay, anday especiallyay ethay atterlay, anay uprightay anmay, aay inefay Istianchray, aay Ightknay ofay ethay
Orderay ofay ethay Olyhay Epulchersay, osethay owhay eceiveray irectday omfray Odgay ethay ivilegepray ofay emainingray intactay inay
eirthay avesgray ithway eirthay inskay oothsmay ikelay ethay eekschay ofay aay idebray anday eirthay eyesay aliveay anday earclay ikelay
emeraldsay.

at’s“Thay otnay ue,”tray Aurelianoay Egundosay interrupteday erhay. e“Hay asway alreadyay eginningbay otay ellsmay enwhay
eythay oughtbray imhay ere.”hay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Ehay adhay ethay atiencepay otay istenlay otay erhay orfay aay olewhay ayday untilay ehay aughtcay erhay inay aay ipslay. Ernandafay idday otnay
aypay imhay anyay indmay, utbay eshay oweredlay erhay oicevay. Atthay ightnay atay innerday ethay exasperatingay uzzingbay ofay ethay
ingsongsay adhay onqueredcay ethay oundsay ofay ethay ainray. Aurelianoay, Egundosay ateay eryvay ittlelay, ithway ishay eadhay
ownday, anday ehay entway otay ishay oomray earlyay. Atay eakfastbray onay ethay ollowingfay ayday Ernandafay asway emblingtray,
ithway aay ooklay ofay otnay avinghay eptslay ellway, anday eshay eemedsay ompletelycay exhausteday ybay erhay ancorray. Ever¬nay
elessthay, enwhay erhay usbandhay askeday ifay itay asway otnay ossiblepay otay avehay aay oft-boiledsay eggay, eshay idday otnay answeray
implysay atthay eythay adhay unray outay ofay eggsay ethay eekway eforebay, utbay eshay orkedway upay aay iolentvay iatribeday againstay
enmay owhay entspay eirthay imetay ontemplatingcay eirthay avelsnay anday enthay adhay ethay allgay otay askay orfay arks’lay iverslay atay
ethay abletay. Aurelianoay Egundosay ooktay ethay ildrenchay otay ooklay atay ethay encyclopediaay, asay alwaysay, anday Ernandafay
etendedpray otay aightenstray outay Eme’smay oomray ustjay osay atthay ehay ouldcay istenlay otay erhay utteringmay, ofay oursecay,
atthay itay ertainlycay ooktay eekchay orfay imhay otay elltay ethay oorpay innocentsay atthay erethay asway aay icturepay ofay Olonelcay
Aurelianoay Uendiabay inay ethay encyclopediaay. Uringday ethay afternoonay, ilewhay ethay ildrenchay ereway avinghay eirthay
apnay, Aurelianoay Egundosay atsay onay ethay orchpay anday Ernandafay ursuedpay imhay evenay erethay, ovokingpray imhay,
ormentingtay imhay, overinghay aboutay imhay ithway erhay implacableay orseflyhay uzzingbay, ayingsay atthay, ofay oursecay,
ilewhay erethay asway othingnay otay eatay exceptay onesstay, erhay usbandhay asway ittingsay erethay ikelay aay ultansay ofay Ersiapay,
atchingway itay ainray, ecausebay atthay asway allay ehay asway, aay obslay, aay ongespay, aay ood-for-nothinggay, oftersay anthay ottoncay
attingbay, useday otay ivinglay offay omenway anday onvincedcay atthay ehay adhay arriedmay Onah’sjay ifeway, owhay asway osay
ontentcay ithway ethay orystay ofay ethay alewhay. Aurelianoay Egundosay istenedlay otay erhay orfay oremay anthay otway ourshay,
impassiveay, asay ifay ehay ereway eafday. Ehay idday otnay interruptay erhay untilay atelay inay ethay afternoonay, enwhay ehay ouldcay onay
ongerlay earbay ethay echoay ofay ethay assbay umdray atthay asway ormentingtay ishay eadhay.

ease“Play utshay up,”ay ehay eggedbay.

Ernandafay, uiteqay ethay ontrarycay, aisedray erhay itchpay. I“ay on’tday avehay anyay easonray otay utshay up,”ay eshay aidsay.
Anyone“ay owhay oesn’tday antway otay istenlay otay emay ancay ogay omeplacesay else.”ay Enthay Aurelianoay Egundosay ostlay
ontrolcay. Ehay oodstay upay unhurriedlyay, asay ifay ehay onlyay intendeday otay etchstray, anday ithway aay erfectlypay egulatedray
anday ethodicalmay uryfay ehay abbedgray ethay otspay ithway ethay egoniasbay oneay afteray ethay otheray, osethay ithway ethay ernsfay,
ethay oreganoay, anday oneay afteray ethay otheray ehay ashedsmay emthay ontoay ethay oorflay. Ernandafay asway ightenedfray
ecausebay untilay enthay eshay adhay eallyray otnay adhay aay earclay indicationay ofay ethay emendoustray inneray orcefay ofay erhay
ingsongsay, utbay itay asway ootay atelay orfay anyay attemptay atay ectificationray. Intoxicateday ybay ethay uncontaineday orrenttay
ofay eliefray, Aurelianoay Egundosay okebray ethay assglay onay ethay inachay osetclay anday iecepay ybay iecepay, ithoutway urryinghay,
ehay ooktay outay ethay inawarechay anday atteredshay itay onay ethay oorflay. Ystematicallysay, erenelysay, inay ethay amesay
arsimoniouspay ayway inay ichwhay ehay adhay aperedpay ethay ousehay ithway anknotesbay, ehay enthay etsay aboutay ashingsmay
ethay Ohemianbay ystalcray areway againstay ethay allsway, ethay and-paintedhay asesvay, ethay icturespay ofay aidensmay inay ow¬flay
er-ladenay oatsbay, ethay irrorsmay inay eirthay ildedgay amesfray, everythingay atthay asway eakablebray, omfray arlorpay otay
antrypay, anday ehay inishedfay ithway ethay argelay earthenay arjay inay ethay itchenkay, ichwhay explodeday inay ethay iddlemay ofay ethay
ourtyardcay ithway aay ollowhay oombay. Enthay ehay ashedway ishay andshay, ewthray ethay oilclothay overay imselfhay, anday
eforebay idnightmay ehay eturnedray ithway aay ewfay ingsstray ofay ieddray eatmay, everalsay agsbay ofay iceray, orncay ithway eevilsway,
anday omesay emaciateday unchesbay ofay ananasbay. Omfray enthay onay erethay asway onay oremay acklay ofay oodfay.

Amarantaay Ursulaay anday ittlelay Aurelianoay ouldway ememberray ethay ainsray asay aay appyhay imetay. Inay itespay ofay
Ernanda’sfay ictnessstray, eythay ouldway ashsplay inay ethay uddlespay inay ethay ourtyardcay, atchcay izardslay anday issectday
emthay, anday etendpray atthay eythay ereway oisoningpay ethay oupsay ithway ustday omfray utterflybay ingsway enwhay Antasay
Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay asway otnay ookinglay Ursulaay asway eirthay ostmay amusingay aythingplay. Eythay ookedlay uponay erhay
asay aay ig,bay, oken-downbray ollday atthay eythay arriedcay ackbay anday orthfay omfray oneay ornercay otay anotheray appedwray inay
oloredcay othclay anday ithway erhay acefay aintedpay ithway ootsay anday annattoay, anday onceay eythay ereway onay ethay ointpay ofay
uckingplay outay erhay eyesay ithway ethay uningpray earsshay asay eythay adhay oneday ithway ethay ogsfray. Othingnay avegay emthay asay
uchmay excitementay asay ethay anderingsway ofay erhay indmay. Omethingsay, indeeday, ustmay avehay appenedhay otay erhay
indmay uringday ethay irdthay yearay ofay ethay ainray, orfay eshay asway aduallygray osinglay erhay ensesay ofay ealityray anday onfusingcay
esentpray imetay ithway emoteray eriodspay ofay erhay ifelay otay ethay ointpay erewhay, onay oneay occasionay, eshay entspay eethray
aysday eepingway eeplyday overay ethay eathday ofay Etronilapay Iguaranay, erhay eat-grandmothergray, uriedbay orfay overay aay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


enturycay. Eshay anksay intoay uchsay anay insaneay atestay ofay onfusioncay atthay eshay oughtthay ittlelay Aurelianoay asway erhay
onsay ethay olonelcay uringday ethay imetay ehay asway akentay otay eesay iceay, anday atthay ethay Osejay Arcadioay owhay asway atay atthay
imetay inay ethay eminarysay asway erhay irstbornfay owhay adhay onegay offay ithway ethay ypsiesgay. Eshay okespay osay uchmay aboutay
ethay amilyfay atthay ethay ildrenchay earnedlay otay akemay upay imaginaryay isitsvay ithway eingsbay owhay adhay otnay onlyay eenbay
eadday orfay aay onglay imetay, utbay owhay adhay existeday atay ifferentday imestay. Ittingsay onay ethay edbay, erhay airhay overedcay
ithway ashesay anday erhay acefay appedwray inay aay edray erchiefkay, Ursulaay asway appyhay inay ethay idstmay ofay ethay unrealay
elativesray omwhay ethay ildrenchay escribedday inay allay etailday, asay ifay eythay adhay eallyray ownknay emthay. Ursulaay ouldway
onversecay ithway erhay orebearsfay aboutay eventsay atthay ooktay aceplay eforebay erhay ownay existenceay, enjoyingay ethay
ewsnay eythay avegay erhay, anday eshay ouldway eepway ithway emthay overay eathsday atthay ereway uchmay oremay ecentray anthay
ethay uestsgay emselvesthay. Ethay ildrenchay idday otnay aketay onglay otay oticenay atthay inay ethay oursecay ofay osethay ostlyghay
isitsvay Ursulaay ouldway alwaysay askay aay uestionqay estinedday otay establishay ethay oneay owhay adhay oughtbray aay ife-sizelay
asterplay Aintsay Osephjay otay ethay ousehay otay ebay eptkay untilay ethay ainsray oppedstay. Itay asway inay atthay ayway atthay Aurelianoay
Egundosay ememberedray ethay ortunefay uriedbay inay omesay aceplay atthay onlyay Ursulaay ewknay, utbay ethay uestionsqay anday
astuteay aneuveringmay atthay occurreday otay imhay ereway ofay onay useay ecausebay inay ethay abyrinthlay ofay erhay adnessmay eshay
eemedsay otay eservepray enoughay ofay aay arginmay ofay uciditylay otay eepkay ethay ecretsay ichwhay eshay ouldway evealray onlyay otay
ethay oneay owhay ouldcay ovepray atthay ehay asway ethay ealray owneray ofay ethay uriedbay oldgay. Eshay asway osay illfulskay anday ictstray
atthay enwhay Aurelianoay Egundosay instmcteday oneay ofay ishay arousingcay ompanionscay otay asspay imselfhay offay asay ethay
owneray ofay ethay ortunefay, eshay otgay imhay allay aughtcay upay inay aay inutemay interrogationay ownsay ithway ubtlesay apstray.

Onvincedcay atthay Ursulaay ouldway arrycay ethay ecretsay otay erhay avegray, Aurelianoay Egundosay iredhay aay ewcray ofay
iggersday underay ethay etextpray atthay eythay ereway akingmay omesay ainagedray analscay inay ethay ourtyardcay anday ethay
ackyardbay, anday ehay imselfhay ooktay oundingssay inay ethay earthay ithway ironay arsbay anday allay annermay ofay etalmay-
etectorsday ithoutway indingfay anythingay atthay esembledray oldgay inay eethray onthsmay ofay exhaustiveay explorationay.
Aterlay onay ehay entway otay Ilarpay Erneratay ithway ethay opehay atthay ethay ardscay ouldway eway oremay anthay ethay iggersday, utbay
eshay eganbay ybay explainingay atthay anyay attemptay ouldway ebay uselessay unlessay Ursulaay utcay ethay ardscay. Onay ethay otheray
andhay, eshay onfirmedcay ethay existenceay ofay ethay easuretray ithway ethay ecisionpray ofay itsay onsistingcay ofay evensay
ousandthay otway undredhay ourteenfay oinscay uriedbay inay eethray anvascay ackssay einforcedray ithway oppercay ireway
ithinway aay irclecay ithway aay adiusray ofay eethray undredhay eighty-eightay eetfay ithway Ursula’say edbay asay ethay entercay, utbay
eshay arnedway atthay itay ouldway otnay ebay oundfay untilay itay oppedstay ainingray anday ethay unssay ofay eethray onsecutivecay
Unesjay adhay angedchay ethay ilespay ofay udmay intoay ustday. Ethay ofusionpray anday eticulousmay aguenessvay ofay ethay
informationay eemedsay otay Aurelianoay Egundosay osay imilarsay otay ethay alestay ofay iritualistsspay atthay ehay eptkay onay ithway
ishay enterpriseay inay itespay ofay ethay actfay atthay eythay ereway inay Augustay anday eythay ouldway avehay otay aitway atay eastlay eethray
yearsay inay orderay otay atisfysay ethay onditionscay ofay ethay edictionpray. Ethay irstfay ingthay atthay artledstay imhay, evenay
oughthay itay increaseday ishay onfusioncay atay ethay amesay imetay, asway ethay actfay atthay itay asway eciselypray eethray undredhay
eighty-eightay eetfay omfray Ursula’say edbay otay ethay ackyardbay allway. Ernandafay earedfay atthay ehay asway asay azycray asay ishay
intway otherbray enwhay eshay awsay imhay akingtay ethay easurementsmay, anday evenay oremay enwhay ehay oldtay ethay iggingday
ewcray otay akemay ethay itchesday eethray eetfay eeperday. Overcomeay ybay anay exploratoryay eliriumday omparablecay onlyay
otay atthay ofay ishay eat-grandfathergray enwhay ehay asway earchingsay orfay ethay outeray ofay inventionsay, Aurelianoay Egun¬say
oday ostlay ethay astlay ayerslay ofay atfay atthay ehay adhay eftlay anday ethay olday esemblanceray otay ishay intway otherbray asway
ecomingbay accentuateday againay, otnay onlyay ecausebay ofay ishay imslay igurefay, utbay alsoay ecausebay ofay ethay istantday airay
anday ethay ithdrawnway attitudeay. Ehay onay ongerlay otheredbay ithway ethay ildrenchay. Ehay ateay atay odday ourshay, uddledmay
omfray eadhay otay oetay, anday ehay idday osay inay aay ornercay inay ethay itchenkay, arelybay answeringay ethay occasionalay uestionsqay
askeday ybay Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay. Eeingsay imhay orkway atthay ayway, asay eshay adhay evernay eameddray imhay apablecay
ofay oingday, Ernandafay oughtthay atthay ishay ubbornnessstay asway iligenceday, ishay eedgray abnegationay, anday ishay ick¬thay
eadednesshay erseverancepay, anday erhay insidesay ightenedtay ithway emorseray overay ethay imlencevay ithway ichwhay eshay
adhay attackeday ishay idlenessay. Utbay Aurelianoay Egundosay asway inay onay oodmay orfay ercifulmay econciliationsray atay atthay
imetay. Unksay upay otay ishay ecknay inay aay orassmay ofay eadday andiesbray anday ottingray owersflay, ehay ungflay ethay irtday ofay ethay
ardengay allay aboutay afteray avinghay inishedfay ithway ethay ourtyardcay anday ethay ackyardbay, anday ehay excavateday osay
eeplyday underay ethay oundationsfay ofay ethay eastay ingway ofay ethay ousehay atthay oneay ightnay eythay okeway upay inay errortay atay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


atwhay eemedsay otay ebay anay earthquakeay, asay uchmay ecausebay ofay ethay emblingtray asay ethay earfulfay undergrounday
eakingcray. Eethray ofay ethay oomsray ereway ollapsingcay anday aay ighteningfray ackcray adhay openeday upay omfray ethay orchpay
otay Ernanda’sfay oomray. Aurelianoay Egundosay idday otnay ivegay upay ethay earchsay ecausebay ofay atthay. Evenay enwhay ishay
astlay opeshay adhay eenbay extinguisheday anday ethay onlyay ingthay atthay eemedsay otay akemay anyay ensesay asway atwhay ethay
ardscay adhay edictedpray, ehay einforcedray ethay aggedjay oundationfay, epairedray ethay ackcray ithway ortarmay, anday
ontinuedcay onay ethay idesay otay ethay estway. Ehay asway illstay erethay onay ethay econdsay eekway ofay ethay ollowingfay Unejay enwhay
ethay ainray eganbay otay abateay anday ethay oudsclay eganbay otay iftlay anday itay asway obviousay omfray oneay omentmay otay ethay extnay
atthay itay asway oinggay otay earclay. Atthay asway atwhay appenedhay. Onay Idayfray atay otway inay ethay afternoonay ethay orldway
ightedlay upay ithway aay azycray imsoncray unsay asay arshhay asay ickbray ustday anday almostay asay oolcay asay aterway, anday itay idday otnay
ainray againay orfay entay yearsay.

Acondomay asway inay insmay. Inay ethay ampysway eetsstray erethay ereway ethay emainsray ofay urniturefay, animalay
eletonsskay overedcay ithway edray ilieslay, ethay astlay emoriesmay ofay ethay ordeshay ofay ewcomersnay owhay adhay edflay
Acondomay asay ildlyway asay eythay adhay arriveday. Ethay ouseshay atthay adhay eenbay uiltbay ithway uchsay astehay uringday ethay
ananabay everfay adhay eenbay abandoneday. Ethay ananabay ompanycay oretay ownday itsay installationsay. Allay atthay
emainedray ofay ethay ormerfay ired-inway itycay ereway ethay uinsray. Ethay oodenway ouseshay, ethay oolcay erracestay orfay
eezybray ard-playingcay afternoonsay, eemedsay otay avehay eenbay ownblay awayay inay anay anticipationay ofay ethay opheticpray
indway atthay yearsay aterlay ouldway ipeway Acondomay offay ethay acefay ofay ethay earthay. Ethay onlyay umanhay acetray eftlay ybay
atthay oraciousvay astblay asway aay oveglay elongingbay otay Atriciapay Ownbray inay anay automobileay otheredsmay inay ildway
ansiespay. Ethay enchanteday egionray exploreday ybay Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay inay ethay aysday ofay ethay oundingfay, erewhay
aterlay onay ethay ananabay antationsplay ourishedflay, asway aay ogbay ofay ottingray ootsray, onay ethay orizonhay ofay ichwhay oneay
ouldcay anagemay otay eesay ethay ilentsay oamfay ofay ethay easay. Aurelianoay Egundosay entway oughthray aay isiscray ofay afflictionay
onay ethay irstfay Undaysay atthay ehay utpay onay ydray othesclay anday entway outay otay enewray ishay acquaintanceay ithway ethay
owntay. Ethay urvivorssay ofay ethay atastrophecay, ethay amesay onesay owhay adhay eenbay ivinglay inay Acondomay eforebay itay
adhay eenbay uckstray ybay ethay ananabay ompanycay urricanehay, ereway ittingsay inay ethay iddlemay ofay ethay eetstray enjoyingay
eirthay irstfay unshinesay. Eythay illstay adhay ethay eengray ofay ethay algaeay onay eirthay inskay anday ethay ustymay ellsmay ofay aay
ornercay atthay adhay eenbay ampedstay onay emthay ybay ethay ainray, utbay inay eirthay eartshay eythay eemedsay appyhay otay avehay
ecoveredray ethay owntay inay ichwhay eythay adhay eenbay ornbay. Ethay Eetstray ofay ethay Urkstay asway againay atwhay itay adhay
eenbay earlieray, inay ethay aysday enwhay ethay Arabsay ithway ippersslay anday ingsray inay eirthay earsay ereway oinggay aboutay ethay
orldway appingsway ickknacksknay orfay acawsmay anday adhay oundfay inay Acondomay aay oodgay endbay inay ethay oadray erewhay
eythay ouldcay indfay espiteray omfray eirthay age-olday otlay asay anderersway. Avinghay ossedcray oughthray otay ethay otheray idesay
ofay ethay ainray, ethay erchandisemay inay ethay oothsbay asway allingfay apartay, ethay othsclay eadspray overay ethay oorsday ereway
otchedsplay ithway oldmay, ethay ounterscay undermineday ybay ermitestay, ethay allsway eatenay awayay ybay ampnessday, utbay
ethay Arabsay ofay ethay irdthay enerationgay ereway ittingsay inay ethay amesay aceplay anday inay ethay amesay ositionpay asay eirthay
athersfay anday andfathersgray, aciturntay, auntlessday, invulnerableay otay imetay anday isasterday, asay aliveay oray asay eadday asay
eythay adhay eenbay afteray ethay insomniaay agueplay anday Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendia’sbay irty-twothay arsway. Eirthay
engthstray ofay iritspay inay ethay acefay ofay uinsray ofay ethay aminggay ablestay, ethay itterfray andsstay, ethay ootingshay alleriesgay,
anday ethay alleyay erewhay eythay interpreteday eamsdray anday edictedpray ethay uturefay ademay Aurelianoay Egundosay askay
emthay ithway ishay usualay informalityay atwhay ysteriousmay esourcesray eythay adhay eliedray uponay osay asay otnay otay avehay
onegay awashay inay ethay ormstay, atwhay ethay evilday eythay adhay oneday osay asay otnay otay owndray, anday oneay afteray ethay otheray,
omfray oorday otay oorday, eythay eturnedray aay aftycray ilesmay anday aay eamydray ooklay, anday ithoutway anyay eviouspray
onsultationcay eythay allay avegay ethay answeray:

imming.”“Sway

Etrapay Otescay asway erhapspay ethay onlyay ativenay owhay adhay anay Arabay earthay. Eshay adhay eensay ethay inalfay
estructionday ofay erhay ablesstay, erhay arnsbay aggeddray offay ybay ethay ormstay, utbay eshay adhay anagedmay otay eepkay erhay
ousehay andingstay. Uringday ethay econdsay yearay eshay adhay entsay essingpray essagesmay otay Aurelianoay Egundosay anday
ehay adhay answereday atthay ehay idday otnay owknay enwhay ehay ouldway ogay ackbay otay erhay ousehay, utbay atthay inay anyay asecay ehay
ouldway ingbray alongay aay oxbay ofay oldgay oinscay otay avepay ethay edroombay oorflay ithway. Atay atthay imetay eshay adhay ugday
eepday intoay erhay earthay, earchingsay orfay ethay engthstray atthay ouldway alloway erhay otay urvivesay ethay isfortunemay, anday

eshay adhay iscoveredday aay eflectiveray anday ustjay ageray ithway ichwhay eshay adhay ornsway otay estoreray ethay ortunefay
uanderedsqay ybay erhay overlay anday enthay ipedway outay ybay ethay elugeday. Itay asway uchsay anay unbreakableay ecisionday atthay
Aurelianoay Egundosay entway ackbay otay erhay ousehay eightay onthsmay afteray ethay astlay essagemay anday oundfay erhay eengray
isheveledday, ithway unkensay eyelidsay anday inskay angledspay ithway angemay, utbay eshay asway itingwray outay umbersnay onay
allsmay iecespay ofay aperpay otay akemay aay affleray. Aurelianoay Egundosay asway astonisheday, anday ehay asway osay irtyday anday
osay olemnsay atthay Etrapay Otescay almostay elievedbay atthay ethay oneay owhay adhay omecay otay eesay erhay asway otnay ethay overlay
ofay allay erhay ifelay utbay ishay intway otherbray.

You’re“ay azy,”cray ehay oldtay erhay. Unless“ay youay anplay otay affleray offay ones.”bay

Enthay eshay oldtay imhay otay ooklay inay ethay edroombay anday Aurelianoay Egundosay awsay ethay ulemay. Itsay inskay asway
ingingclay otay itsay onesbay ikelay atthay ofay itsay istressmay, utbay itay asway ustjay asay aliveay anday esoluteray asay eshay. Etrapay Otescay
adhay edfay itay ithway erhay athwray, anday enwhay erethay asway onay oremay ayhay oray orncay oray ootsray, eshay adhay ivengay itay eltershay
inay erhay ownay edroombay anday edfay itay onay ethay ercalepay eetsshay, ethay Ersianpay ugsray, ethay ushplay edspreadsbay, ethay
elvetvay apesdray, anday ethay anopycay embroidereday ithway oldgay eadthray anday ilksay asselstay onay ethay episcopalay edbay.






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Apterchay 


URSULAay ADhay otay akemay aay eatgray effortay otay ulfillfay erhay omisepray otay ieday enwhay itay earedclay. Ethay avesway ofay
uciditylay atthay ereway osay arcescay uringday ethay ainsray ecamebay oremay equentfray afteray Augustay, enwhay anay anday indway
eganbay otay owblay anday uffocatedsay ethay oseray ushesbay anday etrifiedpay ethay ilespay ofay udmay, anday endeday upay
atteringscay overay Acondomay ethay urningbay ustday atthay overedcay ethay ustedray inczay oofsray anday ethay age-olday almonday
eestray oreverfay. Ursulaay iedcray inay amentationlay enwhay eshay iscoveredday atthay orfay oremay anthay eethray yearsay eshay
adhay eenbay aay aythingplay orfay ethay ildrenchay. Eshay ashedway erhay aintedpay acefay, ooktay offay ethay ipsstray ofay ightlybray
oloredcay othclay, ethay ieddray izardslay anday ogsfray, anday ethay osariesray anday olday Arabay ecklacesnay atthay eythay adhay unghay
allay overay erhay odybay, anday orfay ethay irstfay imetay incesay ethay eathday ofay Amarantaay eshay otgay upay outay ofay edbay ithoutway
anybody’say elphay otay oinjay inay ethay amilyfay ifelay onceay oremay. Ethay iritspay ofay erhay invincibleay earthay uidedgay erhay
oughthray ethay adowsshay. Osethay owhay oticednay erhay umblingstay anday owhay umpedbay intoay ethay archangelicay armay
eshay eptkay aisedray atay eadhay evellay oughtthay atthay eshay asway avinghay oubletray ithway erhay odybay, utbay eythay illstay idday otnay
inkthay eshay asway indblay. Eshay idday otnay eednay otay eesay otay ealizeray atthay ethay owerflay edsbay, ultivatedcay ithway uchsay arecay
incesay ethay irstfay ebuildingray, adhay eenbay estroyedday ybay ethay ainray anday inedmay ybay Aurelianoay Egundo’ssay
excavationsay, anday atthay ethay allsway anday ethay ementcay ofay ethay oorsflay ereway ackedcray, ethay urniturefay ushymay anday
iscoloredday, ethay oorsday offay eirthay ingeshay, anday ethay amilyfay enacedmay ybay aay iritspay ofay esignationray anday espairday
atthay asway inconceivableay inay erhay imetay. Eelingfay erhay ayway alongay oughthray ethay emptyay edroomsbay eshay
erceivedpay ethay ontinuouscay umbleray ofay ethay ermitestay asay eythay arvedcay ethay oodway, ethay ippingsnay ofay ethay othsmay
inay ethay othesclay osetsclay, anday ethay evastatingday oisenay ofay ethay enormousay edray antsay atthay adhay osperedpray uringday
ethay elugeday anday ereway underminingay ethay oundationsfay ofay ethay ousehay. Oneay ayday eshay openeday ethay tmnkay ithway
ethay aintssay anday adhay otay askay Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay otay etgay offay erhay odybay ethay ockroachescay atthay umpedjay
outay anday atthay adhay alreadyay urnedtay ethay othingclay otay ustday. A“ay ersonpay an’tcay ivelay inay eglectnay ikelay is,”thay eshay
aidsay. If“ay eway ogay onay ikelay isthay e’llway ebay evouredday ybay animals.”ay Omfray enthay onay eshay idday otnay avehay aay omentmay
ofay eposeray. Upay eforebay awnday, eshay ouldway useay anybodyay availableay, evenay ethay ildrenchay. Eshay utpay ethay ewfay
articlesay ofay othingclay atthay ereway illstay usableay outay intoay ethay unsay, eshay ovedray ethay ockroachescay offay ithway
owerfulpay insecticideay attacksay, eshay atchedscray outay ethay einsvay atthay ethay ermitestay adhay ademay onay oorsday anday
indowsway anday asphyxiateday ethay antsay inay eirthay anthillsay ithway uicklimeqay. Ethay everfay ofay estorationray inallyfay
oughtbray erhay otay ethay orgottenfay oomsray. Eshay earedclay outay ethay ubbleray anday obwebscay inay ethay oomray erewhay Osejay
Arcadioay Uendfabay adhay ostlay ishay itsway ookinglay orfay ethay Ilosopher’sphay onestay, eshay utpay ethay ilversay opshay ichwhay
adhay eenbay upsetay ybay ethay oldierssay inay orderay, anday astlylay eshay askeday orfay ethay eyskay otay Elquiades’may oomray otay eesay
atwhay atestay itay asway inay. Aithfulfay otay ethay ishesway ofay Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay, owhay adhay orbiddenfay anyoneay otay
omecay inay unlessay erethay asway aay earclay indicationay atthay ehay adhay iedday, Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay iedtray allay indskay
ofay ubterfugessay otay owthray Ursulaay offay ethay acktray. Utbay osay inflexibleay asway erhay eterminationday otnay otay
urrendersay evenay ethay ostmay emoteray ornercay ofay ethay ousehay otay ethay insectsay atthay eshay ockedknay ownday everyay
obstacleay inay erhay athpay, anday afteray eethray aysday ofay insistenceay eshay ucceededsay inay ettinggay emthay otay openay ethay
oorday orfay erhay. Eshay adhay otay oldhay onay otay ethay oorjambday osay atthay ethay enchstay ouldway otnay ockknay erhay overay, utbay
eshay eedednay onlyay otway econdssay otay ememberray atthay ethay oolgirls’schay eventy-twosay amberpotschay ereway inay
erethay anday atthay onay oneay ofay ethay ainyray ightsnay aay atrolpay ofay oldierssay adhay earchedsay ethay ousehay ookinglay orfay Osejay
Arcadioay Egundosay anday adhay eenbay unableay otay indfay imhay.

ord“Lay avesay us!”ay eshay exclaimeday, asay ifay eshay ouldcay eesay everythingay. o“Say uchmay oubletray eachingtay youay
oodgay annersmay anday youay enday upay ivinglay ikelay aay ig.”pay

Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay asway illstay eadingray overay ethay archmentspay. Ethay onlyay ingthay isiblevay inay ethay
intricateay angletay ofay airhay asway ethay eethtay ipedstray ithway eengray imeday anday ishay otionlessmay eyesay. Enwhay ehay
ecognizedray ishay eat-grandmother’sgray oicevay ehay urnedtay ishay eadhay owardtay ethay oorday, iedtray otay ilesmay, anday
ithoutway owingknay itay epeatedray anay olday asephray ofay Ursula’say.
