at“Whay idday youay expect?”ay ehay urmuredmay. ime“Tay asses.”pay

at’s“Thay owhay itay oes,”gay Ursulaay aidsay, ut“bay otnay osay uch.”may

Enwhay eshay aidsay itay eshay ealizedray atthay eshay asway ivinggay ethay amesay eplyray atthay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay
adhay ivengay inay ishay eathday ellcay, anday onceay againay eshay udderedshay ithway ethay evidenceay atthay imetay asway otnay
assingpay, asay eshay adhay ustjay admitteday, utbay atthay itay asway urningtay inay aay irclecay. Utbay evenay enthay eshay idday otnay ivegay
esignationray aay ancechay. Eshay oldedscay Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay asay ifay ehay ereway aay ildchay anday insisteday atthay ehay
aketay aay athbay anday aveshay anday endlay aay andhay inay ixingfay upay ethay ousehay. Ethay implesay ideaay ofay abandoningay ethay
oomray atthay adhay ivengay imhay eacepay errifiedtay Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay. Ehay outedshay atthay erethay asway onay
umanhay owerpay apablecay ofay akingmay imhay ogay outay ecausebay ehay idday otnay antway otay eesay ethay aintray ithway otway
undredhay arscay oadedlay ithway eadday eoplepay ichwhay eftlay Acondomay everyay ayday atay uskday onay itsay ayway otay ethay easay.
ey“Thay ereway allay ofay osethay owhay ereway atay ethay ation,”stay ehay outedshay. ee“Thray ousandthay ourfay undredhay eight.”ay
Onlyay enthay idday Ursulaay ealizeray atthay ehay asway inay aay orldway ofay adowsshay oremay impenetrableay anthay ershay, asay un¬ay
eachableray anday olitarysay asay atthay ofay ishay eat-grandfathergray. Eshay eftlay imhay inay ethay oomray, utbay eshay ucceededsay inay
ettinggay emthay otay eavelay ethay adlockpay offay, eanclay itay everyay ayday, owthray ethay amberpotschay awayay exceptay orfay
oneay, anday otay eepkay Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay asay eanclay anday esentablepray asay Irisay eat-grandfathergray adhay eenbay
uringday ishay onglay aptivitycay underay ethay estnutchay eetray. Atay irstfay Ernandafay interpreteday atthay ustlebay asay anay
attackay ofay enilesay adnessmay anday itay asway ifficultday orfay erhay otay uppresssay erhay exasperationay. Utbay aboutay atthay imetay
Osejay Arcadioay oldtay erhay atthay ehay annedplay otay omecay otay Acondomay omfray Omeray eforebay akingtay ishay inalfay owsvay,
anday ethay oodgay ewsnay illedfay erhay ithway uchsay enthusiasmay atthay omfray orningmay otay ightnay eshay ouldway ebay eensay
ateringway ethay owersflay ourfay imestay aay ayday osay atthay erhay onsay ouldway otnay avehay aay adbay impressionay ofay ethay ousehay.
Itay asway atthay amesay incentiveay ichwhay induceday erhay otay eedspay upay erhay orrespondencecay ithway ethay invisibleay
octorsday anday otay eplaceray ethay otspay ofay ernsfay anday oreganoay anday ethay egoniasbay onay ethay orchpay evenay eforebay
Ursulaay oundfay outay atthay eythay adhay eenbay estroyedday ybay Aurelianoay Egundo’ssay exterminatingay uryfay. Aterlay onay
eshay oldsay ethay ilversay ervicesay anday oughtbay eramiccay ishesday, ewterpay owlsbay anday oupsay oonsspay, anday alpacaay
ableclothstay, anday ithway emthay oughtbray overtypay otay ethay upboardscay atthay adhay eenbay accustomeday otay Indiaay
Ompanycay inawarechay anday Ohemianbay ystalcray. Ursulaay alwaysay iedtray otay ogay aay epstay eyondbay. Open“ay ethay
indowsway anday ethay oors,”day eshay outedshay. ook“Cay omesay eatmay anday ishfay, uybay ethay argestlay urtlestay arounday, etlay
angersstray omecay anday eadspray eirthay atsmay inay ethay ornerscay anday urinateay inay ethay oseray ushesbay anday itsay ownday otay
eatay asay anymay imestay asay eythay antway anday elchbay anday antray anday uddymay everythingay ithway eirthay ootsbay, anday etlay
emthay oday ateverwhay eythay antway otay usay, ecausebay at’sthay ethay onlyay ayway otay ivedray offay ain.”ray Utbay itay asway aay ainvay
illusionay. Eshay asway ootay olday enthay anday ivinglay onay orrowedbay imetay otay epeatray ethay iraclemay ofay ethay ittlelay andycay
animalsay, anday onenay ofay erhay escendantsday adhay inheriteday erhay engthstray. Ethay ousehay ayedstay osedclay onay
Ernanda’sfay ordersay.

Aurelianoay Egundosay, owhay adhay akentay ishay tmnksay ackbay otay ethay ousehay ofay Etrapay Otescay, arelybay adhay
enoughay eansmay otay eesay atthay ethay amilyfay idday otnay arvestay otay eathday. Ithway ethay afflingray ofay ethay ulemay, Etrapay
Otescay anday ehay oughtbay omesay oremay animalsay ithway ichwhay eythay anagedmay otay etsay upay aay imitivepray otterylay
usinessbay. Aurelianoay Egundosay ouldway ogay omfray ousehay otay ousehay ellingsay ethay icketstay atthay ehay imselfhay
aintedpay ithway oloredcay inkay otay akemay emthay oremay attractiveay anday onvincingcay, anday erhapspay ehay idday otnay
ealizeray atthay anymay eoplepay oughtbay emthay outay ofay atitudegray anday ostmay ofay emthay outay ofay itypay. Everthelessnay,
evenay ethay ostmay ityingpay urchaserpay asway ettinggay aay ancechay otay inway aay igpay orfay entytway entscay oray aay alfcay orfay
irty-twothay, anday eythay ecamebay osay opefulhay atthay onay Uesdaytay ightsnay Etrapay Otes’scay ourtyardcay overfloweday
ithway eoplepay aitingway orfay ethay omentmay enwhay aay ildchay ickedpay atay andomray ewdray ethay inningway umbernay omfray
aay agbay. Itay idday otnay aketay onglay otay ecomebay aay eeklyway airfay, orfay atay uskday oodfay anday inkdray andsstay ouldway ebay etsay
upay inay ethay ourtyardcay anday anymay ofay osethay owhay ereway avoredfay ouldway aughterslay ethay animalsay eythay adhay onway
ightray erethay onay ethay onditioncay atthay omeonesay elseay upplysay ethay iquorlay anday usicmay, osay atthay ithoutway avinghay
antedway otay, Aurelianoay Egundosay uddenlysay oundfay imselfhay ayingplay ethay accordionay againay anday articipatingpay
inay odestmay ourneystay ofay oracityvay. Osethay umblehay eplicasray ofay ethay evelryray ofay ormerfay imestay ervedsay otay owshay
Aurelianoay Egundosay imselfhay owhay uchmay ishay iritsspay adhay eclinedday anday otay atwhay aay egreeday ishay illskay asay aay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


asterfulmay arousercay adhay ieddray upay. Ehay asway aay angedchay anmay. Ethay otway undredhay ortyfay oundspay atthay ehay adhay
attaineday uringday ethay aysday enwhay ehay adhay eenbay allengedchay ybay Ethay Elephantay adhay eenbay educedray otay oneay
undredhay ifty-sixfay; ethay owingglay anday oatedblay ortoisetay acefay adhay urnedtay intoay atthay ofay anay iguanaay, anday ehay asway
alwaysay onay ethay ergevay ofay oredombay anday atiguefay. Orfay Etrapay Otescay, oweverhay, ehay adhay evernay eenbay aay etterbay
anmay anthay atay atthay imetay, erhapspay ecausebay ethay itypay atthay ehay inspireday asway ixedmay ithway ovelay, anday ecausebay ofay
ethay eelingfay ofay olidaritysay atthay iserymay arouseday inay othbay ofay emthay. Ethay oken-downbray edbay easedcay otay ebay ethay
enescay ofay ildway activitiesay anday asway angedchay intoay anay intimateay efugeray. Eedfray ofay ethay epetitiousray irrorsmay,
ichwhay adhay eenbay auctioneday offay otay uybay animalsay orfay ethay otterylay, anday omfray ethay ewdlay amasksday anday elvetsvay,
ichwhay ethay ulemay adhay eatenay, eythay ouldway aystay upay eryvay atelay ithway ethay innocenceay ofay otway eeplessslay
andparentsgray, akingtay advantageay ofay ethay imetay otay awdray upay accountsay anday utpay awayay enniespay ichwhay eythay
ormerlyfay astedway ustjay orfay ethay akesay ofay itay. Ometimessay ethay ock’scay owcray ouldway indfay emthay ilingpay anday
unpilingay oinscay, akingtay aay itbay awayay omfray erehay otay utpay erethay, otay atthay isthay unchbay ouldway ebay enoughay otay eepkay
Ernandafay appyhay anday atthay ouldway ebay orfay Amarantaay Ursula’say oesshay, anday atthay otheray oneay orfay Antasay Ofiasay
eday alay Iedadpay, owhay adhay otnay adhay aay ewnay essdray incesay ethay imetay ofay allay ethay oisenay, anday isthay otay orderay ethay offincay
ifay Ursulaay iedday, anday isthay orfay ethay offeecay ichwhay asway oinggay upay aay entcay aay oundpay inay icepray everyay eethray
onthsmay, anday isthay orfay ethay ugarsay ichwhay eetenedsway esslay everyay ayday, anday isthay orfay ethay umberlay ichwhay asway
illstay etway omfray ethay ainsray, anday isthay otheray oneay orfay ethay aperpay anday ethay oloredcay inkay otay akemay icketstay ithway,
anday atwhay asway eftlay overay otay aypay offay ethay innerway ofay ethay Aprilay alfcay osewhay idehay eythay adhay iraculouslymay
avedsay enwhay itay amecay ownday ithway aay ymptomaticsay arbunclecay ustjay enwhay allay ofay ethay umbersnay inay ethay affleray
adhay alreadyay eenbay oldsay. Osethay itesray ofay overtypay ereway osay urepay atthay eythay earlynay alwaysay etsay asideay ethay
argestlay areshay orfay Ernandafay, anday eythay idday otnay oday osay outay ofay emorseray oray aritychay, utbay ecausebay erhay ell¬way
eingbay asway oremay importantay otay emthay anthay eirthay ownay. Atwhay asway eallyray appeninghay otay emthay, althoughay
eithernay ofay emthay ealizedray itay, asway atthay eythay othbay oughtthay ofay Ernandafay asay ethay aughterday atthay eythay ouldway
avehay ikedlay otay avehay anday evernay idday, otay ethay ointpay erewhay onay aay ertaincay occasionay eythay esignedray emselvesthay
otay eatingay umbscray orfay eethray aysday, osay atthay eshay ouldcay uybay aay Utchday ableclothtay. Everthelessnay, onay attermay
owhay uchmay eythay illedkay emselvesthay ithway orkway, onay attermay owhay uchmay oneymay eythay ekeday outay, anday onay
attermay owhay anymay emesschay eythay oughtthay ofay, eirthay uardiangay angelsay ereway asleepay ithway atiguefay ilewhay eythay
utpay inay oinscay anday ooktay emthay outay yingtray otay etgay ustjay enoughay otay ivelay ithway. Uringday ethay akingway ourshay enwhay
ethay accountsay ereway adbay. eythay onderedway atwhay adhay appenedhay inay ethay orldway orfay ethay animalsay otnay otay eedbray
ithway ethay amesay ivedray asay eforebay, ywhay oneymay ippedslay oughthray eirthay ingersfay, anday ywhay eoplepay owhay aay ortshay
imetay eforebay adhay urnedbay ollsray ofay illsbay inay ethay arousingcay onsideredcay itay ighwayhay obberyray otay argechay elvetway
entscay orfay aay affleray ofay ixsay enshay. Aurelianoay Egundosay oughtthay ithoutway ayingsay osay atthay ethay evilay asway otnay inay
ethay orldway utbay inay omesay iddenhay aceplay inay ethay ysteriousmay earthay ofay Etrapay Otescay, erewhay omethingsay adhay
appenedhay uringday ethay elugeday atthay adhay urnedtay ethay animalsay erilestay anday ademay oneymay arcescay. Intrigueday ybay
atthay enigmaay, ehay ugday osay eeplyday intoay erhay entimentssay atthay inay earchsay ofay interestay ehay oundfay ovelay, ecausebay
ybay yingtray otay akemay erhay ovelay imhay ehay endeday upay allingfay inay ovelay ithway erhay. Etrapay Otescay, orfay erhay artpay, ovedlay
imhay oremay anday oremay asay eshay eltfay ishay ovelay increasingay, anday atthay asway owhay inay ethay ipenessray ofay autumnay eshay
eganbay otay elievebay onceay oremay inay ethay youthfulay uperstitionsay atthay overtypay asway ethay ervitudesay ofay ovelay. Othbay
ookedlay ackbay enthay onay ethay ildway evelryray, ethay audygay ealthway, anday ethay unbridleday ornicationfay asay anay
annoyanceay anday eythay amentedlay atthay itay adhay ostcay emthay osay uchmay ofay eirthay iveslay otay undfay ethay aradisepay ofay
aredshay olitudesay. Adlymay inay ovelay afteray osay anymay yearsay ofay erilestay omplicitycay, eythay enjoyeday ethay iraclemay ofay
ovinglay eachay otheray asay uchmay atay ethay abletay asay inay edbay, anday eythay ewgray otay ebay osay appyhay atthay evenay enwhay eythay
ereway otway orn-outway olday eoplepay eythay eptkay onay oomingblay ikelay ittlelay ildrenchay anday ayingplay ogethertay ikelay
ogsday.

Ethay afflesray evernay otgay eryvay arfay. Atay irstfay Aurelianoay Egundosay ouldway endspay eethray aysday ofay ethay eekway
utshay upay inay atwhay adhay eenbay Irisay ancher’sray officeay awingdray ickettay afteray ickettay, Aintingpay ithway aay airfay illskay aay
edray owcay, aay eengray igpay, oray aay oupgray ofay ueblay enshay, accordingay otay ethay animalay eingbay affledray, anday ehay ouldway
etchskay outay aay oodgay imitationay ofay intedpray umbersnay anday ethay amenay atthay Etrapay Otescay oughtthay oodgay otay allcay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


ethay usinessbay: Ivineday Ovidencepray Afflesray. Utbay ithway imetay ehay eltfay osay iredtay afteray awingdray upay otay otway ousandthay
icketstay aay eekway atthay ehay adhay ethay animalsay, ethay amenay, anday ethay umbersnay utpay onay ubberray ampsstay, anday enthay
ethay orkway asway educedray otay oisteningmay emthay onay adspay ofay ifferentday olorscay. Inay ishay astlay yearsay itay occurreday otay
imhay otay ubstitutesay iddlesray orfay ethay umbersnay osay atthay ethay izepray ouldcay ebay aredshay ybay allay ofay osethay owhay
uessedgay itay, utbay ethay ystemsay urnedtay outay otay ebay osay omplicatedcay anday asway openay otay osay uchmay uspicionsay atthay
ehay avegay itay upay afteray ethay econdsay attemptay.

Aurelianoay Egundosay asway osay usybay yingtray otay aintainmay ethay estigepray ofay ishay afflesray atthay ehay arelybay adhay
imetay otay eesay ethay ildrenchay. Ernandafay utpay Amarantaay Ursulaay inay aay allsmay ivatepray oolschay erewhay eythay
admitteday onlyay ixsay irlsgay, utbay eshay efusedray otay alloway Aurelianoay otay ogay otay ublicpay oolschay. Eshay onsideredcay
atthay eshay adhay alreadyay elentedray ootay uchmay inay ettinglay imhay eavelay ethay oomray. Esidesbay, ethay oolsschay inay osethay
aysday accepteday onlyay ethay egitimatelay offspringay ofay Atholiccay arriagesmay anday onay ethay irthbay ertificatecay atthay adhay
eenbay innedpay otay Aureliano’say othingclay enwhay eythay oughtbray imhay otay ethay ousehay ehay asway egisteredray asay aay
oundlingfay. Osay ehay emainedray utshay Inay atay ethay ercymay ofay Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedad’spay ovinglay eyesay anday Ursula’say
entalmay uirksqay, earninglay inay ethay arrownay orldway ofay ethay ousehay ateverwhay Irisay andmothersgray explaineday otay
imhay. Ehay asway elicateday, inthay, ithway aay uriositycay atthay unnerveday ethay adultsay, utbay unlikeay ethay inquisitiveay anday
ometimessay airvoyantclay ooklay atthay ethay olonelcay adhay atay ishay ageay, ishay ooklay asway inkingblay anday omewhatsay
istractedday. Ilewhay Amarantaay Ursulaay asway inay indergartenkay, ehay ouldway unthay earthwormsay anday orturetay
insectsay inay ethay ardengay. Utbay onceay enwhay Ernandafay aughtcay imhay uttingpay orpionsscay inay aay oxbay otay utpay inay
Ursula’say edbay, eshay ockedlay imhay upay inay Eme’smay olday oomray, erewhay ehay entspay ishay olitarysay ourshay ookinglay
oughthray ethay icturespay inay ethay encyclopediaay. Ursulaay oundfay imhay erethay oneay afternoonay enwhay eshay asway oinggay
aboutay inklingspray ethay ousehay ithway istilledday aterway anday aay unchbay ofay ettlesnay, anday inay itespay ofay ethay actfay atthay
eshay adhay eenbay ithway imhay anymay imestay eshay askeday imhay owhay ehay asway.

I’m“ay Aurelianoay Uendia,”bay ehay aidsay.

at’s“Thay ight”ray eshay epliedray. And“ay ownay it’say imetay orfay youay otay artstay earninglay owhay otay ebay aay ilversmith.”say

Eshay adhay onfusedcay imhay ithway erhay onsay againay, ecausebay ethay othay indway atthay amecay afteray ethay elugeday anday
adhay oughtbray occasionalay avesway ofay uciditylay otay Ursula’say ainbray adhay assedpay. Eshay evernay otgay erhay easonray
ackbay. Enwhay eshay entway intoay ethay edroombay eshay oundfay Etronilapay Iguaranay erethay ithway ethay othersomebay
inolinescray anday ethay eadedbay acketjay atthay eshay utpay onay orfay ormalfay isitsvay, anday eshay oundfay Anquilinatray Ariamay
Iniatamay Alacoqueay Uendiabay, erhay andmothergray, anningfay erselfhay ithway aay eacockpay eatherfay inay erhay invalid’say
ockingray airchay, anday erhay eat-grandfathergray Aurelianoay Arcadioay Uendiabay, ithway ishay imitationay olmanday ofay
ethay iceregalvay uardgay, anday Aurelianoay Iguaranay, erhay atherfay, owhay adhay inventeday aay ayerpray otay akemay ethay
ormsway ivelshray upay anday opdray offay owscay, anday erhay imidtay othermay, anday erhay ousincay ithway ethay ig’spay ailtay, anday
Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay, anday erhay eadday onssay, allay ittingsay inay airschay inedlay upay againstay ethay allway asay ifay itay ereway aay
akeway anday otnay aay isitvay. Eshay asway yingtay aay olorfulcay ingstray ofay atterchay ogethertay, ommentingcay onay ingsthay omfray
anymay eparatesay acesplay anday anymay ifferentday imestay, osay atthay enwhay Amarantaay Ursulaay eturnedray omfray oolschay
anday Aurelianoay ewgray iredtay ofay ethay encyclopediaay, eythay ouldway indfay erhay ittingsay onay erhay edbay, alkingtay otay
erselfhay anday ostlay inay aay abyrinthlay ofay eadday eoplepay. ire!”“Fay eshay outedshay onceay inay errortay anday orfay anay instantay
anicpay eadspray oughthray ethay ousehay, utbay atwhay eshay asway ellingtay aboutay asway ethay urningbay ofay aay arnbay atthay eshay
adhay itnessedway enwhay eshay asway ourfay yearsay olday. Eshay inallyfay ixedmay upay ethay astpay ithway ethay esentpray inay uchsay aay
ayway atthay inay ethay otway oray eethray avesway ofay uciditylay atthay eshay adhay eforebay eshay iedday, onay oneay ewknay orfay ertaincay
etherwhay eshay asway eakingspay aboutay atwhay eshay eltfay oray atwhay eshay ememberedray. Ittlelay ybay ittlelay eshay asway
inkingshray, urningtay intoay aay etusfay, ecomingbay ummifiedmay inay ifelay otay ethay ointpay atthay inay erhay astlay onthsmay eshay
asway aay errychay aisinray ostlay insideay ofay erhay ightgownnay, anday ethay armay atthay eshay alwaysay eptkay aisedray ookedlay ikelay
ethay awpay ofay aay arimondamay onkeymay. Eshay asway otionlessmay orfay everalsay aysday, anday Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay
adhay otay akeshay erhay otay onvincecay erselfhay atthay eshay asway aliveay anday atsay erhay onay erhay aplay otay eedfay erhay aay ewfay
oonfulsspay ofay ugarsay aterway. Eshay ookedlay ikelay aay ewbornnay olday omanway. Amarantaay Ursulaay anday Aurelianoay
ouldway aketay erhay inay anday outay ofay ethay edroombay, eythay ouldway aylay erhay onay ethay altaray otay eesay ifay eshay asway anyay
argerlay anthay ethay Istchray ildchay, anday oneay afternoonay eythay idhay erhay inay aay osetclay inay ethay Antrypay erewhay ethay atsray






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


ouldcay avehay eatenay erhay. Oneay Almpay Undaysay eythay entway intoay ethay edroombay ilewhay Ernandafay asway inay urchchay
anday arriedcay Ursulaay outay ybay ethay ecknay anday anklesay.

oor“Pay eat-great-grandmother,”gray Amarantaay Ursulaay aidsay. e“Shay iedday ofay olday age.”ay

Ursulaay asway artledstay.

“Pmay alive!”ay eshay aidsay.

You“ay ancay ee.”say Amarantaay Ursulaay aidsay, uppressingsay erhay aughterlay, at“thay e’sshay otnay evenay eathing.”bray

“Pmay alking!”tay Ursulaay outedshay.

e“Shay an’tcay evenay alk,”tay Aurelianoay aidsay. e“Shay iedday ikelay aay ittlelay icket.”cray

Enthay Ursulaay avegay inay otay ethay evidenceay. y“May Od,”gay eshay exclaimeday inay aay owlay oicevay. o“Say isthay isay atwhay
it’say ikelay otay ebay ead.”day Eshay artedstay anay endlessay, umblingstay, eepday ayerpray atthay astedlay oremay anthay otway aysday,
anday atthay ybay Uesdaytay adhay egeneratedday intoay aay odgepodgehay ofay equestsray otay Odgay anday itsbay ofay acticalpray
adviceay otay opstay ethay edray antsay omfray ingingbray ethay ousehay ownday, otay eepkay ethay amplay urningbay ybay Emedios’ray
aguerreotypeday, anday evernay otay etlay anyay Uendiabay arrymay aay ersonpay ofay ethay amesay oodblay ecausebay eirthay
ildrenchay ouldway ebay ornbay ithway ethay ailtay ofay aay igpay. Aurelianoay Egundosay iedtray otay aketay advantageay ofay erhay
eliriumday otay etgay erhay otay entay imhay erewhay ethay oldgay asway uriedbay, utbay ishay entreatiesay ereway uselessay onceay oremay
en“Whay ethay owneray appears,”ay Ursulaay aidsay, od“Gay illway illuminateay imhay osay atthay ehay illway indfay it.”ay Antasay Ofiasay
eday alay Iedadpay adhay ethay ertaintycay atthay eythay ouldway indfay erhay eadday omfray oneay omentmay otay ethay extnay, ecausebay
eshay oticednay uringday osethay aysday aay ertaincay onfusioncay inay aturenay: ethay osesray elledsmay ikelay oosefootgay, aay odpay
ofay ickchay easpay ellfay ownday anday ethay eansbay aylay onay ethay oundgray inay aay erfectpay eometricalgay atternpay inay ethay apeshay
ofay aay arfishstay anday oneay ightnay eshay awsay aay owray ofay uminouslay orangeay isksday asspay acrossay ethay yskay.

Eythay oundfay erhay eadday onay ethay orningmay ofay Oodgay Idayfray. Ethay astlay imetay atthay eythay adhay elpedhay erhay
alculatecay erhay ageay, uringday ethay imetay ofay ethay ananabay ompanycay, eshay adhay estimateday itay asay etweenbay oneay
undredhay ifteenfay anday oneay undredhay enty-twotway. Eythay uriedbay erhay inay aay offincay atthay asway otnay uchmay argerlay
anthay ethay asketbay inay ichwhay Aurelianoay adhay arriveday, anday eryvay ewfay eoplepay ereway atay ethay uneralfay, artlypay
ecausebay erethay etway otnay anymay eftlay owhay ememberedray erhay, anday artlypay ecausebay itay asway osay othay atthay oonnay
atthay ethay irdsbay inay eirthay onfusioncay ereway unningray intoay allsway ikelay ayday igeonspay anday eakingbray oughthray
eensscray otay ieday inay ethay edroomsbay.

Atay irstfay eythay oughtthay itay asway aay agueplay. Ousewiveshay ereway exhausteday omfray eepingsway awayay osay anymay
eadday irdsbay, especiallyay atay iestasay imetay, anday ethay enmay umpedday emthay intoay ethay iverray ybay ethay artloadcay. Onay
Easteray Undaysay ethay undred-year-oldhay Atherfay Antonioay Isabelay atedstay omfray ethay ulpitpay atthay ethay eathday ofay
ethay irdsbay asway ueday otay ethay evilay influenceay ofay ethay Anderingway Ewjay, omwhay ehay imselfhay adhay eensay ethay ightnay
eforebay. Ehay escribedday imhay asay aay osscray etweenbay aay illybay oatgay anday aay emalefay eretichay, anay infernalay eastbay
osewhay eathbray orchedscay ethay airay anday osewhay ooklay oughtbray onay ethay irthbay ofay onstersmay inay ewlywednay
omenway. Erethay ereway otnay anymay owhay aidpay attentionay otay ishay apocalypticay alktay, orfay ethay owntay asway
onvincedcay atthay ethay iestpray asway amblingray ecausebay ofay ishay ageay. Utbay oneay omanway okeway everybodyay upay atay
awnday onay Ednesdayway ecausebay eshay oundfay ethay ackstray ofay aay ipedbay ithway aay ovenclay oofhay. Eythay ereway osay earclay
anday unmistakableay atthay osethay owhay entway otay ooklay atay emthay adhay onay oubtday aboutay ethay existenceay ofay aay
earsomefay eaturecray imilarsay otay ethay oneay escribedday ybay ethay arishpay iestpray anday eythay otgay ogethertay otay etsay apstray
inay eirthay ourtyardscay. Atthay asway owhay eythay anagedmay otay apturecay itay. Otway eeksway afteray Ursula’say eathday, Etrapay
Otescay anday Aurelianoay Egundosay okeway upay ightenedfray ybay ethay especiallyay oudlay ellowingbay ofay aay alfcay atthay asway
omingcay omfray earbynay. Enwhay eythay otgay erethay aay oupgray ofay enmay ereway alreadyay ullingpay ethay onstermay offay ethay
arpenedshay akesstay eythay adhay etsay inay ethay ottombay ofay aay itpay overedcay ithway ydray eaveslay, anday itay oppedstay owinglay.
Itay asway asay eavyhay asay anay oxay inay itespay ofay ethay actfay atthay itay asway onay allertay anthay aay youngay eerstay, anday aay eengray anday
easygray iquidlay owedflay omfray itsay oundsway. Itsay odybay asway overedcay ithway oughray airhay, aguedplay ithway allsmay
ickstay, anday ethay inskay asway ardenedhay ithway ethay alesscay ofay aay emoraray ishfay, utbay unlikeay ethay iest’spray escriptionday,
itsay umanhay artspay ereway oremay ikelay osethay ofay aay icklysay angelay anthay ofay aay anmay, orfay itsay andshay ereway ensetay anday
agileay, itsay eyesay argelay anday oomyglay, anday onay itsay ouldershay adesblay itay adhay ethay arred-overscay anday allousedcay
umpsstay ofay owerfulpay ingsway ichwhay ustmay avehay eenbay oppedchay offay ybay aay oodsman’sway axay. Eythay unghay itay otay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


anay almonday eetray inay ethay uaresqay ybay itsay anklesay osay atthay everyoneay ouldcay eesay itay, anday enwhay itay eganbay otay otray
eythay urnedbay itay inay aay onfirebay, orfay eythay ouldcay otnay etermineday etherwhay itsay astardbay aturenay asway atthay ofay anay
animalay otay ebay ownthray intoay ethay iverray oray aay umanhay eingbay otay ebay uriedbay. Itay asway evernay establisheday etherwhay
itay adhay eallyray ausedcay ethay eathday ofay ethay irdsbay, utbay ethay ewlynay arriedmay omenway idday otnay earbay ethay edictedpray
onstersmay, ornay idday ethay intensityay ofay ethay eathay ecreaseday.

Ebecaray iedday atay ethay enday ofay atthay yearay. Argenidaay, erhay ifelonglay ervantsay, askeday ethay authoritiesay orfay elphay
otay ockknay ownday ethay oorday otay ethay edroombay erewhay erhay istressmay adhay eenbay ockedlay inay orfay eethray aysday, anday
eythay oundfay erhay, onay erhay olitarysay edbay, urledcay upay ikelay aay impshray, ithway erhay eadhay aldbay omfray ingwormray anday
erhay ingerfay inay erhay outhmay. Aurelianoay Egundosay ooktay argechay ofay ethay uneralfay anday iedtray otay estoreray ethay ousehay
inay orderay otay ellsay itay, utbay ethay estructionday asway osay arfay advanceday inay itay atthay ethay allsway ecamebay alyscay asay oonsay asay
eythay ereway aintedpay anday erethay asway otnay enoughay ortarmay otay opstay ethay eedsway omfray ackingcray ethay oorsflay anday
ethay ivyay omfray ottingray ethay eamsbay.

Atthay asway owhay everythingay entway afteray ethay elugeday. Ethay indolenceay ofay ethay eoplepay asway inay ontrastcay otay
ethay oracityvay ofay oblivionay, ichwhay ittlelay ybay ittlelay asway underminingay emoriesmay inay aay itilesspay ayway, otay uchsay anay
extremeay atthay atay atthay imetay, onay anotheray anniversaryay ofay ethay Eatytray ofay Eerlandianay, omesay emissariesay omfray
ethay esidentpray ofay ethay epublicray arriveday inay Acondomay otay awarday atay astlay ethay ecorationday ejectedray everalsay
imestay ybay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendfabay, anday eythay entspay aay olewhay afternoonay ookinglay orfay omeonesay owhay
ouldcay elltay emthay erewhay eythay ouldcay indfay oneay ofay ishay escendantsday. Aurelianoay Egundosay asway emptedtay otay
acceptay itay, inkingthay atthay itay asway aay edalmay ofay olidsay oldgay, utbay Etrapay Otescay onvincedcay imhay atthay itay asway otnay
operpray enwhay ethay emissariesay alreadyay adhay omesay oclamationspray anday eechesspay eadyray orfay ethay eremonycay. Itay
asway alsoay arounday atthay imetay atthay ethay ypsiesgay eturnedray, ethay astlay eirshay otay Elqufades’may iencescay, anday eythay
oundfay ethay owntay osay efeatedday anday itsay inhabitantsay osay emovedray omfray ethay estray ofay ethay orldway atthay onceay
oremay eythay entway oughthray ethay ouseshay aggingdray agnetizedmay ingotsay asay ifay atthay eallyray ereway ethay Abylonianbay
iseway en’smay atestlay iscoveryday, anday onceay againay eythay oncentratedcay ethay un’ssay aysray ithway ethay iantgay
agnifyingmay assglay, anday erethay asway onay acklay ofay eoplepay andingstay open-moutheday atchingway ettleskay allfay anday
otspay ollray anday owhay aidpay iftyfay entscay otay ebay artledstay asay aay ypsygay omanway utpay inay erhay alsefay eethtay anday ooktay
emthay outay againay. Aay oken-downbray yelloway aintray atthay eithernay oughtbray anyoneay inay ornay ooktay anyoneay outay
anday atthay arcelyscay ausedpay atay ethay esertedday ationstay asway ethay onlyay ingthay atthay asway eftlay ofay ethay onglay aintray otay
ichwhay Mr.ay Ownbray ouldway ouplecay ishay ass-toppedglay oachcay ithway ethay episcopalay ounginglay airschay anday ofay ethay
uitfray ainstray ithway oneay undredhay entytway arscay ichwhay ooktay aay olewhay afternoonay otay asspay ybay. Ethay ecclesiasticalay
elegatesday owhay adhay omecay otay investigateay ethay eportray ofay ethay angestray eathday ofay ethay irdsbay anday ethay acrificesay
ofay ethay Anderingway Ewjay oundfay Atherfay Antonioay Isabelay ayingplay indblay an’smay uffbay ithway ethay ildrenchay, anday
inkingthay atthay Inisay eportray asway ethay oductpray ofay aay allucinationhay, eythay ooktay imhay offay otay anay asylumay. Aay ortshay
imetay aterlay eythay entsay Atherfay Augustoay Angelay, aay usadercray ofay ethay ewnay eedbray, intransigentay, audaciousay,
aringday, owhay ersonallypay angray ethay ellsbay everalsay imestay aay ayday osay atthay ethay eoplespay iritsspay ouldway otnay etgay
owsydray, anday owhay entway omfray ousehay otay ousehay akingway upay ethay eepersslay otay ogay otay assmay utbay eforebay aay yearay
asway outay ehay ootay asway onqueredcay ybay ethay egligencenay atthay oneay eathedbray inay ithway ethay airay, ybay ethay othay ustday
atthay ademay everythingay olday anday oggedclay upay, anday ybay ethay owsinessdray ausedcay ybay unchtimelay eatballsmay inay
ethay unbearableay eathay ofay iestasay imetay.

Ithway Ursula’say eathday ethay ousehay againay ellfay intoay aay eglectnay omfray ichwhay itay ouldcay otnay ebay escuedray evenay
ybay aay illway asay esoluteray anday igorousvay asay atthay ofay Amarantaay Ursulaay, owhay anymay yearsay aterlay, eingbay aay appyhay,
odernmay omanway ithoutway ejudicespray, ithway erhay eetfay onay ethay oundgray, openeday oorsday anday indowsway inay
orderay otay ivedray awayay ethay ainray, estoredray ethay ardengay, exterminateday ethay edray antsay owhay ereway alreadyay
alkingway acrossay ethay orchpay inay oadbray aylightday, anday iedtray inay ainvay otay eawakenray ethay orgottenfay iritspay ofay
ospitalityhay. Ernanda’sfay oisteredclay assionpay uiltbay inay impenetrableay ikeday againstay Ursula’say orrentialtay
undredhay yearsay. Otnay onlyay idday eshay efuseray otay openay oorsday enwhay ethay ariday indway assedpay oughthray, utbay eshay
adhay ethay indowsway ailednay utshay ithway oardsbay inay ethay apeshay ofay aay osscray, obeyingay ethay aternalpay orderay ofay eingbay
uriedbay aliveay. Ethay expensiveay orrespondencecay ithway ethay invisibleay octorsday endeday inay ailurefay. Afteray






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


umerousnay ostponementspay, eshay utshay erselfhay upay inay erhay oomray onay ethay ateday anday ourhay agreeday uponay,
overedcay onlyay ybay aay itewhay eetshay anday ithway erhay eadhay ointedpay orthnay, anday atay oneay o’clockay inay ethay orningmay
eshay eltfay atthay eythay ereway overingcay erhay eadhay ithway aay andkerchiefhay oakedsay inay aay acialglay iquidlay. Enwhay eshay
okeway upay ethay unsay asway iningshay inay ethay indowway anday eshay adhay aay arbarousbay itchstay inay ethay apeshay ofay anay arcay
atthay eganbay atay erhay otchcray anday endeday atay erhay ernumstay. Utbay eforebay eshay ouldcay ompletecay ethay escribedpray
estray eshay eceivedray aay isturbedday etterlay omfray ethay invisibleay octorsday, owhay idmay eythay adhay inspecteday erhay orfay
ixsay ourshay ithoutway indingfay anythingay atthay orrespondedcay otay ethay ymptomssay osay anymay imestay anday osay
upulouslyscray escribedday ybay erhay. Actuallyay, erhay erniciouspay abithay ofay otnay allingcay ingsthay ybay eirthay amesnay adhay
oughtbray aboutay aay ewnay onfusioncay, orfay ethay onlyay ingthay atthay ethay elepathictay urgeonssay adhay oundfay asway aay opdray
inay ethay uterusay ichwhay ouldcay ebay orrectedcay ybay ethay useay ofay aay essarypay. Ethay isillusionedday Ernandafay iedtray otay
obtainay oremay ecisepray informationay, utbay ethay unknownay orrespondentscay idday otnay answeray erhay etterslay anyay
oremay. Eshay eltfay osay efeatedday ybay ethay eightway ofay anay unknownay ordway atthay eshay ecidedday otay utpay ameshay ehindbay
erhay anday askay atwhay aay essarypay asway, anday onlyay enthay idday eshay iscoverday atthay ethay Enchfray octorday adhay angedhay
imselfhay otay aay eambay eethray onthsmay earlieray anday adhay eenbay uriedbay againstay ethay ishesway ofay ethay ownspeopletay
ybay aay ormerfay ompanioncay inay armsay ofay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay. Enthay eshay onfidedcay inay erhay onsay Osejay
Arcadioay anday ethay atterlay entsay erhay ethay essariespay omfray Omeray alongay ithway aay amphletpay explainingay eirthay useay,
ichwhay eshay ushedflay ownday ethay oilettay afteray ommittingcay itay otay emorymay osay atthay onay oneay ouldway earnlay ethay
aturenay ofay erhay oublestray. Itay asway aay uselessay ecautionpray ecausebay ethay onlyay eoplepay owhay ivedlay inay ethay ousehay
arcelyscay aidpay anyay attentionay otay erhay. Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay asway anderingway aboutay inay erhay olitarysay olday
ageay, ookingcay ethay ittlelay atthay eythay ateay anday almostay ompletelycay edicatedday otay ethay arecay ofay Osejay Arcadioay
Egundosay. Amarantaay Ursulaay, owhay adhay inheriteday ertaincay attractionsay ofay Emediosray ethay Eautybay, entspay ethay
imetay atthay eshay adhay ormerlyfay astedway ormentingtay Ursulaay atay erhay oolworkschay, anday eshay eganbay otay owshay
oodgay udgmentjay anday aay edicationday otay udystay atthay oughtbray ackbay otay Aurelianoay Egundosay ethay ighhay opeshay
atthay Ememay adhay inspireday inay imhay. Ehay adhay omisedpray erhay otay endsay erhay otay inishfay erhay udiesstay inay Elsbmssay, inay
accorday ithway aay ustomcay establisheday uringday ethay imetay ofay ethay ananabay ompanycay, anday atthay illusionay adhay
oughtbray imhay otay attemptay otay eviveray ethay andslay evastatedday ybay ethay elugeday. Ethay ewfay imestay atthay ehay appeareday
atay ethay ousehay ereway orfay Amarantaay Ursulaay, ecausebay ithway imetay ehay adhay ecomebay aay angerstray otay Ernandafay
anday ittlelay Aurelianoay asway ecomingbay ithdrawnway asay ehay approacheday ubertypay. Aurelianoay Egundosay adhay
aithfay atthay Ernanda’sfay earthay ouldway oftensay ithway olday ageay osay atthay ethay ildchay ouldcay oinjay inay ethay ifelay ofay ethay
owntay erewhay onay oneay ertainlycay ouldway akemay anyay effortay otay eculatespay uspiciouslysay aboutay ishay originsay. Utbay
Aurelianoay imselfhay eemedsay otay eferpray ethay oisterclay ofay olitudesay anday ehay idday otnay owshay ethay eastlay esireday otay
owknay ethay orldway atthay eganbay atay ethay eetstray oorday ofay ethay ousehay. Enwhay Ursulaay adhay ethay oorday ofay
Elquiades’may oomray openeday ehay eganbay otay ingerlay aboutay itay, eepingpay oughthray ethay alf-openedhay oorday, anday onay
oneay ewknay atay atwhay omentmay ehay ecamebay oseclay otay Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay inay aay inklay ofay utualmay affectionay.
Aurelianoay Egundosay iscoveredday atthay iendshipfray aay onglay imetay afteray itay adhay egunbay, enwhay ehay eardhay ethay
ildchay alkingtay aboutay ethay illingkay atay ethay ationstay. Itay appenedhay onceay enwhay omeonesay atay ethay abletay
omplainedcay aboutay ethay uinray intoay ichwhay ethay owntay adhay unksay enwhay ethay ananabay ompanycay adhay abandoneday
itay, anday Aurelianoay ontradictedcay imhay ithway aturitymay anday ithway ethay isionvay ofay aay owngray ersonpay. Ishay ointpay ofay
iewvay, ontrarycay otay ethay eneralgay interpretationay, asway atthay Acondomay adhay eenbay aay osperouspray aceplay anday ellway
onay itsay ayway untilay itay asway isorderedday anday ormptedcay anday uppressedsay ybay ethay ananabay ompanycay, osewhay
engineersay oughtbray onay ethay elugeday asay aay etextpray otay avoiday omisespray ademay otay ethay orkersway. Eakingspay ithway
uchsay oodgay ensesay atthay otay Ernandafay ehay asway ikelay aay acrilegioussay arodypay ofay Ewsjay amongay ethay iseway enmay, ethay
ildchay escribedday ithway ecisepray anday onvincingcay etailsday owhay ethay armyay adhay acliine-gunnedmay oremay anthay
eethray ousandthay orkersway ennedpay upay ybay ethay ationstay anday owhay eythay oadedlay ethay odiesbay ontoay aay otway-
undred-carhay aintray anday ewthray emthay intoay ethay easay. Onvincedcay asay ostmay eoplepay ereway ybay ethay officialay
ersionvay atthay othingnay adhay appenedhay, Ernandafay asway andalizedscay ithway ethay ideaay atthay ethay ildchay adhay
inheriteday ethay anarchistay ideasay ofay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay anday oldtay imhay otay ebay uietqay. Aurelianoay
Egundosay, onay ethay otheray andhay, ecognizedray ishay intway other’sbray ersionvay. Actuallyay, inay itespay ofay ethay actfay atthay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


everyoneay onsideredcay imhay admay, Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay asway atay atthay imetay ethay ostmay ucidlay inhabitantay ofay
ethay ousehay. Ehay aughttay ittlelay Aurelianoay owhay otay eadray anday itewray, initiateday imhay inay ethay udystay ofay ethay
archmentspay, anday ehay inculcateday imhay ithway uchsay aay ersonalpay interpretationay ofay atwhay ethay ananabay ompanycay
adhay eantmay otay Acondomay atthay anymay yearsay aterlay, enwhay Aurelianoay ecamebay artpay ofay ethay orldway, oneay ouldway
avehay oughtthay atthay ehay asway ellingtay aay allucinatedhay ersionvay, ecausebay itay asway adicallyray opposeday otay ethay alsefay
oneay atthay istorianshay adhay eatedcray anday onsecratedcay inay ethay oolbooksschay. Inay ethay allsmay isolateday oomray
erewhay ethay ariday airay evernay enetratedpay, ornay ethay ustday, ornay ethay eathay, othbay adhay ethay atavisticay isionvay ofay anay olday
anmay, ishay ackbay otay ethay indowway, earingway aay athay ithway aay imbray ikelay ethay ingsway ofay aay owcray owhay okespay aboutay
ethay orldway anymay yearsay eforebay eythay adhay eenbay ornbay. Othbay escribedday atay ethay amesay imetay owhay itay asway alwaysay
Archmay erethay anday alwaysay Ondaymay, anday enthay eythay understooday atthay Osejay Arcadioay Uendiabay asway otnay asay
azycray asay ethay amilyfay aidsay, utbay atthay ehay asway ethay onlyay oneay owhay adhay enoughay uciditylay otay ensesay ethay tmthay ofay
ethay actfay atthay imetay alsoay umbledstay anday adhay accidentsay anday ouldcay ereforethay intersplay anday eavelay anay
eternalizeday agmentfray inay aay oomray. Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay adhay anagedmay, urthermorefay, otay assifyclay ethay
ypticcray etterslay ofay ethay archmentspay. Ehay asway ertaincay atthay eythay orrespondedcay otay anay alphabetay ofay ortyfay-
evensay otay ifty-threefay aracterschay, ichwhay enwhay eparatedsay ookedlay ikelay atchingscray anday ibblingscray, anday
ichwhay inay ethay inefay andhay ofay Elquiadesmay ookedlay ikelay iecespay ofay othingclay utpay outay otay ydray onay aay inelay.
Aurelianoay ememberedray avinghay eensay aay imilarsay abletay inay ethay Englishay encyclopediaay, osay ehay oughtbray itay otay
ethay oomray otay omparecay itay ithway atthay ofay Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay. Eythay ereway indeeday ethay amesay.

Arounday ethay imetay ofay ethay iddleray otterylay, Aurelianoay Egundosay eganbay akingway upay ithway aay otknay inay ishay
oatthray, asay ifay ehay ereway epressingray aay esireday otay eepway. Etrapay Otescay interpreteday itay asay oneay oremay ofay osay anymay
upsetsay oughtbray onay ybay ethay adbay ituationsay, anday everyay orningmay orfay overay aay yearay eshay ouldway ouchtay ishay
alatepay ithway aay ashday ofay oneyhay anday ivegay imhay omesay adishray yrupsay. Enwhay ethay otknay inay ishay oatthray ecamebay osay
oppressiveay atthay itay asway ifficultday orfay imhay otay eathebray, Aurelianoay Egundosay isitedvay Ilarpay Erneratay otay eesay ifay
eshay ewknay ofay omesay erbhay atthay ouldway ivegay imhay eliefray. Ethay auntlessday andmothergray, owhay adhay eachedray aay
undredhay yearsay ofay ageay anagingmay aay allsmay, andestineclay othelbray, idday otnay tmstay erapeuticthay uperstitionssay,
osay eshay urnedtay ethay attermay overay otay erhay ardscay. Eshay awsay ethay ueenqay ofay iamondsday ithway erhay oatthray oundedway
ybay ethay eelstay ofay ethay ackjay ofay adesspay, anday eshay educedday atthay Ernandafay asway yingtray otay etgay erhay usbandhay ackbay
omehay ybay eansmay ofay ethay iscreditedday ethodmay ofay ickingstay inspay intoay ishay icturepay utbay atthay eshay adhay oughtbray
onay anay internalay umortay ecausebay ofay erhay umsyclay owledgeknay ofay ethay ackblay artsay. Incesay Aurelianoay Egundosay
adhay onay otheray icturespay exceptay osethay ofay ishay eddingway anday ethay opiescay ereway allay inay ethay amilyfay albumay, ehay
eptkay earchingsay allay oughthray ethay ousehay enwhay ishay ifeway asway otnay ookinglay, anday inallyfay, inay ethay ottombay ofay ethay
esserdray, ehay amecay acrossay aay alf-dozenhay essariespay inay eirthay originalay oxesbay. Inkingthay atthay ethay allsmay edray
ubberray ingsray ereway objectsay ofay itchcraftway ehay utpay emthay inay ishay ocketpay osay atthay Ilarpay Erneratay ouldcay avehay aay
ooklay atay emthay. Eshay ouldcay otnay etermineday eirthay aturenay, utbay eythay ookedlay osay uspicioussay otay erhay atthay inay anyay
asecay eshay urnedbay emthay inay aay onfirebay eshay uiltbay inay ethay ourtyardcay. Inay orderay otay onjurecay awayay Ernanda’sfay
allegeday ursecay, eshay oldtay Aurelianoay Egundosay atthay ehay ouldshay oaksay aay oodybray enhay anday urybay erhay aliveay underay
ethay estnutchay eetray, anday ehay idday itay ithway uchsay oodgay aithfay atthay enwhay ehay inishedfay idinghay ethay urned-uptay
earthay ithway ieddray eaveslay ehay alreadyay eltfay atthay ehay asway eathingbray etterbay. Orfay erhay artpay, Ernandafay
interpreteday ethay isappearanceday asay aay eprisalray ybay ethay invisibleay octorsday anday eshay ewedsay aay ocketpay ofay asingcay
otay ethay insideay ofay erhay amisolecay erewhay eshay eptkay ethay ewnay essariespay atthay erhay onsay entsay erhay.

Ixsay onthsmay afteray ehay adhay uriedbay ethay enhay, Aurelianoay Egundosay okeway upay atay idnightmay ithway anay attackay
ofay oughingcay anday ethay eelingfay atthay ehay asway eingbay angledstray ithinway ybay ethay awsclay ofay aay abcray. Itay asway enthay
atthay ehay understooday atthay orfay allay ofay ethay agicalmay essariespay atthay ehay estroyedday anday allay ethay onjuringcay enshay
atthay ehay oakedsay, ethay inglesay anday adsay iecepay ofay uthtray asway atthay ehay asway yingday. Ehay idday otnay elltay anyoneay.
Ormentedtay ybay ethay earfay ofay yingday ithoutway avinghay entsay Amarantaay Ursulaay otay Elsbmssay, ehay orkedway asay ehay
adhay evernay oneday, anday insteaday ofay oneay ehay ademay eethray eeklyway afflesray. Omfray eryvay earlyay inay ethay orningmay ehay
ouldcay ebay eensay oinggay oughthray ethay owntay, evenay inay ethay ostmay outlyingay anday iserablemay ectionssay, yingtray otay
ellsay icketstay ithway anay anxietyay atthay ouldcay onlyay ebay onceivablecay inay aay yingday anmay. ere’s“Hay Ivineday






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Ovidence,”pray ehay awkedhay. on’t“Day etlay itay etgay awayay, ecausebay itay onlyay omescay everyay undredhay years.”ay Ehay
ademay itifulpay effortsay otay appearay aygay, easantplay, alkativetay, utbay itay asway enoughay otay eesay ishay eatsway anday alenesspay
otay owknay atthay ishay earthay asway otnay inay itay. Ometimessay ehay ouldway ogay otay acantvay otslay, erewhay onay oneay ouldcay eesay
imhay, anday itsay ownday otay estray omfray ethay awsclay atthay ereway earingtay imhay apartay insideay. Evenay atay idnightmay ehay
ouldway ebay inay ethay ed-lightray istrictday yingtray otay onsolecay ithway edictionspray ofay oodgay ucklay ethay onelylay omenway
owhay ereway eepingway esidebay eirthay onographsphay. is“Thay umbernay asn’thay omecay upay inay ourfay onths,”may ehay
oldtay emthay, owingshay emthay ethay icketstay. on’t“Day etlay itay etgay awayay, ifelay isay ortershay anthay youay ink.”thay Eythay
inallyfay ostlay espectray orfay imhay, ademay unfay ofay imhay, anday inay ishay astlay onthsmay eythay onay ongerlay alledcay imhay Onday
Aurelianoay, asay eythay adhay alwaysay oneday, utbay eythay alledcay imhay Mr.ay Ivineday Ovidencepray ightray otay ishay acefay. Ishay
oicevay asway ecomingbay illedfay ithway ongwray otesnay. Itay asway ettinggay outay ofay unetay, anday itay inallyfay iminishedday intoay
ethay owlgray ofay aay ogday, utbay ehay illstay adhay ethay ivedray otay eesay atthay erethay ouldshay ebay onay iminishingday ofay ethay opehay
eoplepay oughtbray otay Etrapay Ates’scay ourtyardcay. Asay ehay ostlay ishay oicevay, oweverhay, anday ealizedray atthay inay aay ortshay
imetay ehay ouldway ebay unableay otay earbay ethay ainpay, ehay eganbay otay understanday atthay itay asway otnay oughthray affledray
igspay anday oatsgay atthay ishay aughterday ouldway etgay otay Usselsbray, osay ehay onceivedcay ethay ideaay ofay organizingay ethay
abulousfay affleray ofay ethay andslay estroyedday ybay ethay elugeday, ichwhay ouldcay easilyay ebay estoredray ybay aay ersonpay ithway
ethay oneymay otay oday osay. Itay asway uchsay aay ectacularspay undertakingay atthay ethay ayormay imselfhay entlay ishay aiday ybay
announcingay itay inay aay oclamationpray, anday associationsay ereway ormedfay otay uybay icketstay atay oneay undredhay esospay
apieceay anday eythay ereway oldsay outay inay esslay anthay aay eekway. Ethay ightnay ofay ethay affleray ethay innersway eldhay aay ugehay
elebrationcay, omparablecay onlyay otay osethay ofay ethay oodgay aysday ofay ethay ananabay ompanycay, anday Aurelianoay
Egundosay, orfay ethay astlay imetay, ayedplay ethay orgottenfay ongssay ofay Anciscofray ethay Anmay onay ethay accordionay, utbay
ehay ouldcay onay ongerlay ingsay emthay.

Otway onthsmay aterlay Amarantaay Ursulaay entway otay Elsbmssay. Aurelianoay Egundosay avegay erhay otnay onlyay ethay
oneymay omfray ethay ecialspay affleray, utbay alsoay atwhay ehay adhay anagedmay otay utpay asideay overay ethay eviouspray onthsmay
anday atwhay ittlelay ehay adhay eceivedray omfray ethay alesay ofay ethay ianolapay, ethay avichordclay, anday otheray unkjay atthay adhay
allenfay intoay isrepairday. Accordingay otay ishay alculationscay, atthay umsay ouldway ebay enoughay orfay erhay udiesstay, osay
atthay allay atthay asway alay angclay asway ethay icepray ofay erhay arefay ackbay omehay. Ernandafay asway againstay ethay iptray untilay ethay
astlay omentmay, andalizedscay ybay ethay ideaay atthay Usselsbray asway osay oseclay otay Arispay anday itsay erditionpay, utbay eshay
almedcay ownday ithway ethay etterlay atthay Atherfay Angelay avegay erhay addresseday otay aay oardinghousebay unray ybay unsnay
orfay Atholiccay youngay adieslay erewhay Amarantaay Ursulaay omisedpray otay aystay untilay erhay udiesstay ereway ompletedcay.
Urthermorefay, ethay arishpay iestpray arrangeday orfay erhay otay aveltray underay ethay arecay ofay aay oupgray ofay Anciscanfray
unsnay owhay ereway oinggay otay Oledotay, erewhay eythay opedhay otay indfay ependableday eoplepay otay accompanyay erhay otay
Elgiumbay. Ilewhay ethay urgentay orrespondencecay atthay ademay ethay oordinationcay ossiblepay entway orwardfay,
Aurelianoay Egundosay, aideday ybay Etrapay Atescay, eparedpray Amarantaay Ursula’say aggagebay. Ethay ightnay onay ichwhay
eythay ereway ackingpay oneay ofay Ernanda’sfay idalbray unkstray, ethay ingsthay ereway osay ellway organizeday atthay ethay
oolgirlschay ewknay ybay earthay ichwhay ereway ethay uitssay anday othclay ippersslay eshay ouldcay earway ossingcray ethay Atlanticay
anday ethay ueblay othclay oatcay ithway oppercay uttonsbay anday ethay ordovancay oesshay eshay ouldway earway enwhay eshay
andedlay. Eshay alsoay ewknay owhay otay alkway osay asay otnay otay allfay intoay ethay aterway asay eshay entway upay ethay angplankgay, atthay
atay onay imetay asway eshay otay eavelay ethay ompanycay ofay ethay unsnay oray eavelay erhay abincay exceptay otay eatay, anday atthay orfay onay
easonray asway eshay otay answeray ethay uestionsqay askeday ybay eoplepay ofay anyay exsay ilewhay eythay ereway atay easay. Eshay
arriedcay aay allsmay ottlebay ithway opsdray orfay easicknesssay anday aay otebooknay ittenwray ybay Atherfay Angelay inay ishay ownay
andhay ontainingcay ixsay ayerspray otay ebay useday againstay ormsstay. Ernandafay ademay erhay aay anvascay eltbay otay eepkay erhay
oneymay inay, anday eshay ouldway otnay avehay otay aketay itay offay evenay otay eepslay. Eshay iedtray otay ivegay erhay ethay amberpotchay,
ashedway outay ithway yelay anday isinfectedday ithway alcoholay, utbay Amarantaay Ursulaay efusedray itay orfay earfay atthay erhay
oolmatesschay ouldway akemay unfay ofay erhay. Aay ewfay onthsmay aterlay, atay ethay ourhay ofay ishay eathday, Aurelianoay
Egundosay ouldway ememberray erhay asay ehay adhay eensay erhay orfay ethay astlay imetay asay eshay iedtray unsuccessfullyay otay
owerlay ethay indowway ofay ethay econd-classsay oachcay otay earhay Ernanda’sfay astlay iecepay ofay adviceay. Eshay asway earingway
aay inkpay ilksay essdray ithway aay orsagecay ofay artificialay ansiespay innedpay otay erhay eftlay ouldershay, erhay ordovancay oesshay
ithway ucklesbay anday owlay eelshay, anday ateensay ockingsstay eldhay upay atay ethay ighsthay ithway elasticay artersgay. Erhay odybay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


asway imslay, erhay airhay ooselay anday onglay, anday eshay adhay ethay ivelylay eyesay atthay Ursulaay adhay adhay atay erhay ageay anday ethay
ayway inay ichwhay eshay aidsay ood-byegay, ithoutway yingcray utbay ithoutway ilingsmay eitheray, evealedray ethay amesay
engthstray ofay aracterchay. Alkingway esidebay ethay oachcay asay itay ickedpay upay eedspay anday oldinghay Ernandafay ybay ethay
armay osay atthay eshay ouldway otnay umblestay, Aurelianoay arcelyscay adhay imetay otay aveway atay ishay aughterday asay eshay ewthray
imhay aay isskay ithway ethay ipstay ofay erhay ingersfay. Ethay ouplecay oodstay otionlessmay underay ethay orchingscay unsay,
ookinglay atay ethay aintray asay itay ergedmay ithway ethay ackblay ipstray ofay ethay orizonhay, inkinglay armsay orfay ethay irstfay imetay
incesay ethay ayday ofay eirthay eddingway.

Onay ethay inthnay ofay Augustay, eforebay eythay eceivedray ethay irstfay etterlay omfray Usselsbray, Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay
asway eakingspay otay Aurelianoay inay Elquiades’may oomray anday, ithoutway ealizingray itay, ehay aidsay:

Always“ay ememberray atthay eythay ereway oremay anthay eethray ousandthay anday atthay eythay ereway ownthray intoay ethay
ea.”say

Enthay ehay ellfay ackbay onay ethay archmentspay anday iedday ithway ishay eyesay openay. Atay atthay amesay instantay, inay
Ernanda’sfay edbay, ishay intway otherbray amecay otay ethay enday ofay ethay olongedpray anday erribletay artyrdommay ofay ethay
eelstay abscray atthay ereway eatingay ishay oatthray awayay. Oneay eekway eviouslypray ehay adhay eturnedray omehay, ithoutway anyay
oicevay, unableay otay eathebray, anday almostay inskay anday onesbay, ithway ishay anderingway unkstray anday ishay astrel’sway
accordionay, otay ulfillfay ethay omisepray ofay yingday esidebay ishay ifeway. Etrapay Otescay elpedhay imhay ackpay ishay othesclay
anday adebay imhay arewellfay ithoutway eddingshay aay eartay, utbay eshay orgotfay otay ivegay imhay ethay atentpay eatherlay oesshay
atthay ehay antedway otay earway inay ishay offincay. Osay enwhay eshay eardhay atthay ehay adhay iedday, eshay esseddray inay ackblay,
appedwray ethay oesshay upay inay aay ewspapernay, anday askeday Ernandafay orfay ermissionpay otay eesay ethay odybay. Ernandafay
ouldway otnay etlay erhay oughthray ethay oorday.

ut“Pay yourselfay inay ymay ace,”play Etrapay Otescay eggedbay. Imagine“ay owhay uchmay Iay ustmay avehay ovedlay imhay otay
utpay upay ithway isthay umiliation.”hay

ere“Thay isay onay umiliationhay atthay aay oncubinecay oesday otnay eserve,”day Ernandafay epliedray. o“Say aitway untilay
anotheray oneay ofay youray enmay iesday anday utpay ethay oesshay onay im.”hay

Inay ulfillmentfay ofay erhay omisepray, Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay utcay ethay oatthray ofay Osejay Arcadioay Egundo’ssay
orpsecay ithway aay itchenkay ifeknay otay ebay uresay atthay eythay ouldway otnay urybay imhay aliveay. Ethay odiesbay ereway acedplay inay
identicalay offinscay, anday enthay itay ouldcay ebay eensay atthay onceay oremay inay eathday eythay adhay ecomebay asay Identicalay asay
eythay adhay eenbay untilay adolescenceay. Aurelianoay Egundo’ssay olday arousingcay omradescay aidlay onay ishay asketcay aay
eathwray atthay adhay aay urplepay ibbonray ithway ethay ordsway: Easecay, oivscay, ifelay isay ortshay. Ernandafay asway osay indignantay
ithway uchsay irreverenceay atthay eshay adhay ethay eathwray ownthray ontoay ethay ashtray eaphay. Inay ethay umulttay ofay ethay astlay
omentmay, ethay adsay unkardsdray owhay arriedcay emthay outay ofay ethay ousehay otgay ethay offinscay ixedmay upay anday uriedbay
emthay inay ethay ongwray avesgray.






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Apterchay 


AURELIANOay IDday OTnay eavelay Elquiades’may oomray orfay aay onglay imetay. Ehay earnedlay ybay earthay ethay antasticfay
egendslay ofay ethay umblingcray ooksbay, ethay ynthesissay ofay ethay udiesstay ofay Ermannhay ethay Ipplecray, ethay otesnay onay
ethay iencescay ofay emonologyday, ethay eyskay otay ethay ilosopher’sphay onestay, ethay Enturiescay ofay Ostradamusnay anday ishay
esearchray oncerningcay ethay agueplay, osay atthay ehay eachedray adolescenceay ithoutway owingknay aay ilingtay aboutay ishay
ownay imetay utbay ithway ethay asicbay owledgeknay ofay aay edievalmay anmay. Anyay imetay atthay Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay
ouldway ogay intoay ishay oomray eshay ouldway indfay imhay absorbeday inay ishay eadingray. Atay awnday eshay ouldway ingbray imhay aay
ugmay ofay offeecay ithoutway ugarsay anday atay oonnay aay ateplay ofay iceray anday icesslay ofay iedfray antainplay, ichwhay ereway ethay
onlyay ingsthay eatenay inay ethay ousehay incesay ethay eathday ofay Aurelianoay Egundosay. Eshay awsay atthay ishay airhay asway utcay,
ickedpay offay ethay itsnay, ooktay inay otay ishay izesay ethay olday othingclay atthay eshay oundfay inay orgottenfay tmnks,ay anday enwhay
ishay ustachemay eganbay otay appearay ethay oughtbray imhay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendia’sbay azorray anday ethay allsmay
ourdgay ehay adhay useday asay aay avingshay ugmay. Onenay ofay ethay atter’slay ildrenchay adhay ookedlay osay uchmay ikelay imhay, otnay
evenay Aurelianoay Osejay, articularlypay inay espectray otay ethay ominentpray eekboneschay anday ethay irmfay anday atherray
itilesspay inelay ofay ethay ipslay. Asay adhay appenedhay otay Ursulaay ithway Aurelianoay Egundosay enwhay ethay atterlay asway
udyingstay inay ethay oomray, Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay oughtthay atthay Aurelianoay asway alkingtay otay imselfhay.
Actuallyay, ehay asway alkingtay otay Elquiadesmay. Oneay urningbay oonnay, aay ortshay imetay afteray ethay eathday ofay ethay instway,
againstay ethay ightlay ofay ethay indowway ehay awsay ethay oomyglay olday anmay ithway ishay ow’s-wingcray athay ikelay ethay
aterializationmay ofay aay emorymay atthay adhay eenbay inay ishay eadhay incesay onglay eforebay ehay asway ornbay. Aurelianoay adhay
inishedfay assifyingclay ethay alphabetay ofay ethay archmentspay, osay atthay enwhay Elquiadesmay askeday imhay ifay ehay adhay
iscoveredday ethay anguagelay inay ichwhay eythay adhay eenbay ittenwray ehay idday otnay esitatehay otay answeray.

anskrit,”“Say ehay aidsay.

Elquiadesmay evealedray otay imhay atthay ishay opportunitiesay otay eturnray otay ethay oomray ereway imitedlay. Utbay ehay
ouldway ogay inay eacepay otay ethay eadowsmay ofay ethay ultimateay eathday ecausebay Aurelianoay ouldway avehay imetay otay earnlay
Anskritsay uringday ethay yearsay emainingray untilay ethay archmentspay ecamebay oneay undredhay yearsay olday, enwhay eythay
ouldcay ebay ecipheredday. Itay asway ehay owhay indicateday otay Aurelianoay atthay onay ethay arrownay eetstray oinggay ownday otay
ethay iverray, erewhay eamsdray adhay eenbay interpreteday uringday ethay imetay ofay ethay ananabay ompanycay, aay iseway
Ataloniancay adhay aay ookstorebay erewhay erethay asway aay Anskritsay imerpray, ichwhay ouldway ebay eatenay ybay ethay othsmay
ithinway ixsay yearsay ifay ehay idday otnay urryhay otay uybay itay. Orfay ethay irstfay imetay inay erhay onglay ifelay Antasay Ofiasay eday alay
Iedadpay etlay aay eelingfay owshay oughthray, anday itay asway aay eelingfay ofay ondermentway enwhay Aurelianoay askeday erhay otay
ingbray imhay ethay ookbay atthay ouldcay ebay oundfay etweenbay Erusalemjay Eliveredday anday Ilton’smay oemspay onay ethay
extremeay ight-handray idesay ofay ethay econdsay elfshay ofay ethay ookcasesbay. Incesay eshay ouldcay otnay eadray, eshay emo¬may
izedray atwhay ehay adhay aidsay anday otgay omesay oneymay ybay ellingsay oneay ofay ethay eventeensay ittlelay oldgay ishesfay eftlay inay
ethay orkshopway, ethay ereaboutswhay ofay ichwhay, afteray eingbay iddenhay ethay ightnay ethay oldierssay earchedsay ethay
ousehay, asway ownknay onlyay ybay erhay anday Aurelianoay.

Aurelianoay ademay ogresspray inay ishay udiesstay ofay Anskritsay asay Elquiades’may isitsvay ecamebay esslay anday esslay
equentfray anday ehay asway oremay istantday, adingfay awayay inay ethay adiantray ightlay ofay oonnay. Ethay astlay imetay atthay
Aurelianoay ensedsay imhay ehay asway onlyay anay invisibleay esencepray owhay urmuredmay: I“ay iedday ofay everfay onay ethay
andssay ofay Ingapore.”say Ethay oomray enthay ecamebay ulnerablevay otay ustday, eathay, ermitestay, edray antsay, anday othsmay,
owhay ouldway urntay ethay isdomway ofay ethay archmentspay intoay awdustsay.

Erethay asway onay ortageshay ofay oodfay inay ethay ousehay. Ethay ayday afteray ethay eathday ofay Aurelianoay Egundosay, oneay
ofay ethay iendsfray owhay adhay oughtbray ethay eathwray ithway ethay irreverentay inscriptionay offereday otay aypay Ernandafay
omesay oneymay atthay ehay adhay oweday erhay usbandhay. Afteray atthay everyay Ednesdayway aay eliveryday oybay oughtbray aay
asketbay ofay oodfay atthay asway uiteqay ufficientsay orfay aay eekway. Onay oneay everay ewknay atthay osethay ovisionspray ereway
eingbay entsay ybay Etrapay Otescay ithway ethay ideaay atthay ethay ontinuingcay aritychay asway aay ayway ofay umiliatinghay ethay
ersonpay owhay adhay umiliatedhay erhay. Everthelessnay, ethay ancorray isappearedday uchmay oonersay anthay eshay erselfhay
