adhay expecteday, anday enthay eshay ontinuedcay endingsay ethay oodfay outay ofay idepray anday inallyfay outay ofay ompassioncay.
Everalsay imestay, enwhay eshay adhay onay animalsay otay affleray offay anday eoplepay ostlay interestay inay ethay otterylay, eshay entway
ithoutway oodfay osay atthay Ernandafay ouldcay avehay omethingsay otay eatay, anday eshay ontinuedcay ulfillingfay ethay edgeplay
otay erselfhay untilay eshay awsay Ernanda’sfay uneralfay ocessionpray asspay ybay.

Orfay Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay ethay eductionray inay ethay umbernay ofay inhabitantsay ofay ethay ousehay ouldshay avehay
eantmay ethay estray eshay eservedday afteray oremay anthay alfhay aay enturycay ofay orkway. Evernay aay amentlay adhay eenbay eardhay
omfray atthay ealthystay, impenetrableay omanway owhay adhay ownsay inay ethay amilyfay ethay angelicay eedsay ofay Emediosray
ethay Eautybay anday ethay ysteriousmay olemnitysay ofay Osejay Arcadioay Egundosay; owhay edicatedday aay olewhay ifelay ofay
olitudesay anday iligenceday otay ethay earingray ofay ildrenchay althoughay eshay ouldcay arelybay ememberray etherwhay eythay
ereway erhay ildrenchay oray andchildrengray, anday owhay ooktay arecay ofay Aurelianoay asay ifay ehay adhay omecay outay ofay erhay
ombway, otnay owingknay erselfhay atthay eshay asway ishay eat-grandmothergray. Onlyay inay aay ousehay ikelay atthay asway itay
onceivablecay orfay erhay alwaysay otay eepslay onay aay atmay eshay aidlay outay onay ethay antrypay oorflay inay ethay idstmay ofay ethay
octurnalnay oisenay ofay ethay atsray, anday ithoutway ellingtay anyoneay atthay oneay ightnay eshay adhay awakeneday ithway ethay
ightenedfray eelingfay atthay omeonesay asway ookinglay atay erhay inay ethay arknessday anday atthay itay asway aay oisonouspay akesnay
awlingcray overay erhay omachstay. Eshay ewknay atthay ifay eshay adhay oldtay Ursulaay, ethay atterlay ouldway avehay ademay erhay
eepslay inay erhay ownay edbay, utbay osethay ereway imestay enwhay onay oneay asway awareay ofay anythingay unlessay itay asway
outedshay onay ethay orchpay, ecausebay ithway ethay ustlebay ofay ethay akerybay, ethay urprisessay ofay ethay arway, ethay arecay ofay ethay
ildrenchay, erethay asway otnay uchmay oomray orfay inkingthay aboutay otheray eoplespay appinesshay. Etrapay Otescay omwhay
eshay adhay evernay eensay, asway ethay onlyay oneay owhay ememberedray erhay. Eshay awsay otay itay atthay eshay adhay aay oodgay airpay ofay
oesshay orfay eetstray earway, atthay eshay alwaysay adhay othingclay, evenay uringday ethay imestay enwhay ethay afflesray ereway
orkingway onlyay oughthray omesay iraclemay. Enwhay Ernandafay arriveday atay ethay ousehay eshay adhay oodgay easonray otay
inkthay atthay eshay asway anay agelessay ervantsay, anday evenay oughthay eshay eardhay itay aidsay everalsay imestay atthay eshay asway
erhay usband’shay othermay itay asway osay incredibleay atthay itay ooktay erhay ongerlay otay iscoverday itay anthay otay orgetfay itay.
Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay evernay eemedsay otheredbay ybay atthay owlylay ositionpay. Onay ethay ontrarycay, oneay adhay ethay
impressionay atthay eshay ikedlay otay aystay inay ethay ornerscay, ithoutway aay ausepay, ithoutway aay omplaintcay, eepingkay eanclay
anday inay orderay ethay immenseay ousehay atthay eshay adhay ivedlay inay everay incesay adolescenceay anday atthay, especiallyay
uringday ethay imetay ofay ethay ananabay ompanycay, asway oremay ikelay aay arracksbay anthay aay omehay. Utbay enwhay Ursulaay
iedday ethay uperhumansay iligenceday ofay Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay, erhay emendoustray apacitycay orfay orkway, eganbay
otay allfay apartay. Itay asway otnay onlyay atthay eshay asway olday anday exhausteday, utbay overnightay ethay ousehay adhay ungedplay
intoay aay isiscray ofay enilitysay. Aay oftsay ossmay ewgray upay ethay allsway. Enwhay erethay asway onay ongerlay aay arebay otspay inay ethay
ourtyardcay, ethay eedsway okebray oughthray ethay ementcay ofay ethay orchpay, eakingbray itay ikelay assglay, anday outay ofay ethay
ackscray ewgray ethay amesay yelloway owersflay atthay Ursulaay adhay oundfay inay ethay assglay ithway Elquiades’may alsefay eethtay aay
enturycay eforebay. Ithway eithernay ethay imetay ornay ethay esourcesray otay althay ethay allengechay ofay aturenay, Antasay Ofiasay
eday alay Iedadpay entspay ethay ayday inay ethay edroomsbay ivingdray outay ethay izardslay owhay ouldway eturnray atay ightnay. Oneay
orningmay eshay awsay atthay ethay edray antsay adhay eftlay ethay undermineday oundationsfay, ossedcray ethay ardengay, imbedclay
upay ethay ailingray, erewhay ethay egoniasbay adhay akentay onay anay earthenay olorcay, anday adhay enetratedpay intoay ethay earthay
ofay ethay ousehay. Eshay irstfay iedtray otay illkay emthay ithway aay oombray, enthay ithway insecticidesay, anday inallyfay ithway yelay, utbay
ethay extnay ayday eythay ereway ackbay inay ethay amesay aceplay, illstay assingpay ybay, enacioustay anday invincibleay. Ernandafay,
itingwray etterslay otay erhay ildrenchay, asway otnay awareay ofay ethay uncheckeday estructiveday attackay. Antasay Ofiasay eday alay
Iedadpay ontinuedcay ugglingstray aloneay, ightingfay ethay eedsway otay opstay emthay omfray ettinggay intoay ethay itchenkay,
ullingpay omfray ethay allsway ethay asselstay ofay iderspay ebsway ichwhay ereway ebuiltray inay aay ewfay ourshay, apingscray offay ethay
ermitestay. Utbay enwhay eshay awsay atthay Elquiades’may oomray asway alsoay ustyday anday illedfay ithway obwebscay evenay
oughthay eshay eptsway anday ustedday eethray imestay aay ayday, anday atthay inay itespay ofay erhay uriousfay eaningclay itay asway
eatenedthray ybay ethay ebrisday anday ethay airay ofay iserymay atthay adhay eenbay oreseenfay onlyay ybay Olonelcay Aurelianoay
Uendiabay anday ethay youngay officeray, eshay ealizedray atthay eshay asway efeatedday. Enthay eshay utpay onay erhay ornway Undaysay
essdray, omesay olday oesshay ofay Ursula’say, anday aay airpay ofay ottoncay ockingsstay atthay Amarantaay Ursulaay adhay ivengay
erhay, anday eshay ademay aay undlebay outay ofay ethay otway oray eethray angeschay ofay othingclay atthay eshay adhay eftlay.

I“ay ivegay up,”ay eshay aidsay otay Aurelianoay. is“Thay isay ootay uchmay ousehay orfay ymay oorpay ones.”bay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Aurelianoay askeday erhay erewhay eshay asway oinggay anday eshay ademay aay aguevay ignsay, asay ifay eshay idday otnay avehay ethay
ightestslay ideaay ofay erhay estinationday. Eshay iedtray otay ebay oremay ecisepray, oweverhay, ayingsay atthay eshay asway oinggay otay
endspay erhay astlay yearsay ithway aay irstfay ousincay owhay ivedlay inay Iohacharay. Itay asway otnay aay ikelylay explanationay. Incesay
ethay eathday ofay erhay arentspay eshay adhay otnay adhay ontactcay ithway anyoneay inay owntay oray eceivedray etterslay oray
essagesmay, ornay adhay eshay eenbay eardhay otay eakspay ofay anyay elativesray. Aurelianoay avegay erhay ourteenfay ittlelay oldgay
ishesfay ecausebay eshay asway eterminedday otay eavelay ithway onlyay atwhay eshay adhay: oneay esopay anday enty-fivetway entscay.
Omfray ethay indowway ofay ethay oomray ehay awsay erhay osscray ethay ourtyardcay ithway erhay undlebay ofay othingclay, aggingdray
erhay eetfay anday entbay overay ybay erhay yearsay, anday ehay awsay erhay eachray erhay andhay oughthray anay openingay inay ethay ainmay
oorday anday eplaceray ethay arbay afteray eshay adhay onegay outay. Othingnay asway everay eardhay ofay erhay againay.

Enwhay eshay eardhay aboutay ethay ightflay, Ernandafay antedray orfay aay olewhay ayday asay eshay eckedchay unkstray,
essersdray, anday osetsclay, itemay ybay itemay, otay akemay uresay atthay Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay adhay otnay ademay offay ithway
anythingay. Eshay urnedbay erhay ingersfay yingtray otay ightlay aay irefay orfay ethay irstfay imetay inay erhay ifelay anday eshay adhay otay askay
Aurelianoay otay oday erhay ethay avorfay ofay owingshay erhay owhay otay akemay offeecay. Ernandafay ouldway indfay erhay
eakfastbray eadyray enwhay eshay aroseay anday eshay ouldway eavelay erhay oomray againay onlyay otay etgay ethay ealmay atthay
Aurelianoay adhay eftlay overedcay onay ethay embersay orfay erhay, ichwhay eshay ouldway arrycay otay ethay abletay otay eatay onay inenlay
ableclothstay anday etweenbay andelabracay, ittingsay atay ethay olitarysay eadhay ofay ethay abletay acingfay ifteenfay emptyay
airschay. Evenay underay osethay ircumstancescay Aurelianoay anday Ernandafay idday otnay areshay eirthay olitudesay, utbay
othbay ontinuedcay ivinglay onay eirthay ownay, eaningclay eirthay espectiveray oomsray ilewhay ethay obwebscay ellfay ikelay owsnay
onay ethay oseray ushesbay, arpetedcay ethay eamsbay, ushionedcay ethay allsway. Itay asway arounday atthay imetay atthay Ernandafay
otgay ethay impressionay atthay ethay ousehay asway illingfay upay ithway elvesay. Itay asway asay ifay ingsthay, especiallyay osethay orfay
everydayay useay, adhay evelopedday aay acultyfay orfay angingchay ocationlay onay eirthay ownay. Ernandafay ouldway asteway
imetay ookinglay orfay ethay earsshay atthay eshay asway uresay eshay adhay utpay onay ethay edbay anday afteray urningtay everythingay
upsideay ownday eshay ouldway indfay emthay onay aay elfshay inay ethay itchenkay, erewhay eshay oughtthay eshay adhay otnay eenbay orfay
ourfay aysday. Uddenlysay erethay asway onay orkfay inay ethay ilversay estchay anday eshay ouldway indfay ixsay onay ethay altaray anday
eethray inay ethay ashroomway. Atthay anderingway aboutay ofay ingsthay asway evenay oremay exasperatingay enwhay eshay atsay
ownday otay itewray. Ethay inkwellay atthay eshay adhay acedplay atay erhay ightray ouldway ebay onay ethay eftlay, ethay otterblay ouldway
ebay ostlay anday eshay ouldway indfay itay otway aysday aterlay underay erhay illowpay, anday ethay agespay ittenwray otay Osejay Arcadioay
ouldway etgay ixedmay upay ithway osethay ittenwray otay Amarantaay Ursulaay, anday eshay alwaysay adhay ethay eelingfay ofay
ortificationmay atthay eshay adhay utpay ethay etterslay inay oppositeay envelopesay, asay inay actfay appenedhay everalsay imestay.
Onay oneay occasionay eshay ostlay erhay ountainfay enpay. Otway eeksway aterlay ethay ailmanmay, owhay adhay oundfay itay inay ishay
agbay, eturnedray itay. Ehay adhay eenbay oinggay omfray ousehay otay ousehay ookinglay orfay itsay owneray. Atay irstfay eshay oughtthay
itay asway omesay usinessbay ofay ethay invisibleay octorsday, ikelay ethay isappearanceday ofay ethay essariespay, anday eshay evenay
artedstay aay etterlay otay emthay eggingbay emthay otay eavelay erhay aloneay, utbay eshay adhay otay interruptay itay otay oday omethingsay
anday enwhay eshay entway ackbay otay erhay oomray eshay otnay onlyay idday otnay indfay ethay etterlay eshay adhay artedstay utbay eshay adhay
orgottenfay ethay easonray orfay itingwray itay. Orfay aay imetay eshay oughtthay itay asway Aurelianoay. Eshay eganbay otay yspay onay
imhay, otay utpay ingsthay inay ishay athpay yingtray otay atchcay imhay enwhay ehay angedchay eirthay ocationlay, utbay eshay asway oonsay
onvincedcay atthay Aurelianoay evernay eftlay Elquiades’may oomray exceptay otay ogay otay ethay itchenkay oray ethay oilettay, anday
atthay ehay asway otnay aay anmay otay ayplay ickstray. Osay inay ethay enday eshay elievedbay atthay itay asway ethay ischiefmay ofay elvesay anday
eshay ecidedday otay ecuresay everythingay inay ethay aceplay erewhay eshay ouldway useay itay. Eshay iedtay ethay earsshay otay ethay eadhay
ofay erhay edbay ithway aay onglay ingstray. Eshay iedtay ethay enpay anday ethay otterblay otay ethay eglay ofay ethay abletay, anday ethay uedglay
ethay inkwellay otay ethay optay ofay itay otay ethay ightray ofay ethay aceplay erewhay eshay ormallynay otewray. Ethay oblemspray ereway
otnay olvedsay overnightay, ecausebay aay ewfay ourshay afteray eshay adhay iedtay ethay ingstray otay ethay earsshay itay asway otnay onglay
enoughay orfay erhay otay utcay ithway, asay ifay ethay elvesay adhay ortenedshay itay. Ethay amesay ilingtay appenedhay otay erhay ithway ethay
ingstray otay ethay enpay anday evenay ithway erhay ownay armay ichwhay afteray aay ortshay imetay ofay itingwray ouldcay otnay eachray ethay
inkwellay. Eithernay Amarantaay Ursulaay inay Usselsbray ornay Osejay Arcadioay inay Omeray everay eardhay aboutay osethay
insignificantay isfortunesmay. Ernandafay oldtay emthay atthay eshay asway appyhay anday inay ealityray eshay asway, eciselypray
ecausebay eshay eltfay eefray omfray anyay ompromisecay, asay ifay ifelay ereway ullingpay erhay onceay oremay owardtay ethay orldway
ofay erhay arentspay, erewhay oneay idday otnay uffersay ithway ay-to-dayday oblemspray ecausebay eythay ereway olvedsay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


eforehandbay inay one’say imaginationay. Atthay endlessay orrespondencecay ademay erhay oselay erhay ensesay ofay imetay,
especiallyay afteray Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay adhay eftlay. Eshay adhay eenbay accustomeday otay eepkay acktray ofay ethay aysday,
onthsmay, anday yearsay, usingay asay ointspay ofay eferenceray ethay atesday etsay orfay ethay eturnray ofay erhay ildrenchay. Utbay enwhay
eythay angedchay eirthay ansplay imetay anday imetay againay, ethay atesday ecamebay onfusedcay, ethay eriodspay ereway islaidmay,
anday oneay ayday eemedsay osay uchmay ikelay anotheray atthay oneay ouldcay otnay eelfay emthay asspay. Insteaday ofay ecomingbay
impatientay, eshay eltfay aay eepday easureplay inay ethay elayday. Itay idday otnay orryway erhay atthay anymay yearsay afteray
announcingay ethay eveay ofay ishay inalfay owsvay, Osejay Arcadioay asway illstay ayingsay atthay ehay asway aitingway otay inishfay ishay
udiesstay inay advanceday eologythay inay orderay otay undertakeay osethay inay iplomacyday, ecausebay eshay understooday owhay
eepstay anday avedpay ithway obstaclesay asway ethay iralspay airwaystay atthay edlay otay ethay onethray ofay Aintsay Eterpay. Onay ethay
otheray andhay, erhay iritsspay oseray ithway ewsnay atthay ouldway avehay eenbay insignificantay orfay otheray eoplepay, uchsay asay
ethay actfay atthay erhay onsay adhay eensay ethay Opepay. Eshay eltfay aay imilarsay easureplay enwhay Amarantaay Ursulaay otewray otay
elltay erhay atthay erhay udiesstay ouldway astlay ongerlay anthay ethay imetay oreseenfay ecausebay erhay excellentay adesgray adhay
earneday erhay ivilegespray atthay erhay atherfay adhay otnay akentay intoay accountay inay ishay alculationscay.

Oremay anthay eethray yearsay adhay assedpay incesay Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay adhay oughtbray imhay ethay ammargray
enwhay Aurelianoay ucceededsay inay anslatingtray ethay irstfay eetshay. Itay asway otnay aay uselessay orechay, utbay itay asway onlyay aay
irstfay epstay alongay aay oadray osewhay engthlay itay asway impossibleay otay edictpray, ecausebay ethay exttay inay Anishspay idday otnay
eanmay anythingay: ethay ineslay ereway inay odecay. Aurelianoay ackedlay ethay eansmay otay establishay ethay eyskay atthay ouldway
ermitpay imhay otay igday emthay outay, utbay incesay Elquiadesmay adhay oldtay imhay atthay ethay ooksbay ehay eedednay otay etgay otay
ethay ottombay ofay ethay archmentspay ereway inay ethay iseway Atalonian’scay orestay, ehay ecidedday otay eakspay otay Ernandafay
osay atthay eshay ouldway etlay imhay etgay emthay. Inay ethay oomray evouredday ybay ubbleray, osewhay uncheckeday oliferationpray
adhay inallyfay efeatedday itay, ehay oughtthay aboutay ethay estbay ayway otay amefray ethay equestray, utbay enwhay ehay oundfay
Ernandafay akingtay erhay ealmay omfray ethay embersay, ichwhay asway ishay onlyay ancechay otay eakspay otay erhay, ethay
aboriouslylay ormulatedfay equestray uckstay inay ishay oatthray anday ehay ostlay ishay oicevay. Atthay asway ethay onlyay imetay atthay
ehay atchedway erhay. Ehay istenedlay otay erhay epsstay inay ethay edroombay. Ehay eardhay erhay onay erhay ayway otay ethay oorday otay
awaitay ethay etterslay omfray erhay ildrenchay anday otay ivegay ershay otay ethay ailmanmay, anday ehay istenedlay untilay atelay atay ightnay
otay ethay arshhay, impassioneday atchingscray ofay erhay enpay onay ethay aperpay eforebay earinghay ethay oundsay ofay ethay ightlay
itchsway anday ethay urmurmay ofay erhay ayerspray inay ethay arknessday. Onlyay enthay idday ehay ogay otay eepslay, ustingtray atthay onay
ethay ollowingfay ayday ethay awaiteday opportunityay ouldway omecay. Ehay ecamebay osay inspireday ithway ethay ideaay atthay
ermissionpay ouldway ebay antedgray atthay oneay orningmay ehay utcay ishay airhay, ichwhay atay atthay imetay eachedray ownday otay
ishay ouldersshay, avedshay offay ishay angledtay eardbay, utpay onay omesay ight-fittingtay antspay anday aay irtshay ithway anay
artificialay ollarcay atthay ehay adhay inheriteday omfray ehay idday otnay owknay omwhay, anday aitedway inay ethay itchenkay orfay
Ernandafay otay etgay erhay eakfastbray. Ethay omanway ofay everyay ayday, ethay oneay ithway erhay eadhay eldhay ighhay anday ithway aay
onystay aitgay, idday otnay arriveay, utbay anay olday omanway ofay upernaturalsay eautybay ithway aay yelloweday ermineay apecay, aay
owncray ofay ildedgay ardboardcay, anday ethay anguidlay ooklay ofay aay ersonpay owhay eptway inay ecretsay. Actuallyay, everay incesay
eshay adhay oundfay itay inay Aurelianoay Egundo’ssay unkstray, Ernandafay adhay utpay onay ethay oth-eatenmay ueen’sqay essdray
anymay imestay. Anyoneay owhay ouldcay avehay eensay erhay inay ontfray ofay ethay irrormay, inay ecstasyay overay erhay ownay egalray
esturesgay, ouldway avehay adhay easonray otay inkthay atthay eshay asway admay. Utbay eshay asway otnay. Eshay adhay implysay urnedtay
ethay oyalray egaliaray intoay aay eviceday orfay erhay emorymay. Ethay irstfay imetay atthay eshay utpay itay onay eshay ouldcay otnay elphay aay
otknay omfray ormingfay inay erhay earthay anday erhay eyesay illingfay ithway earstay ecausebay atay atthay omentmay eshay elledsmay
onceay oremay ethay odoray ofay oeshay olishpay onay ethay ootsbay ofay ethay officeray owhay amecay otay etgay erhay atay erhay ousehay otay
akemay erhay aay ueenqay, anday erhay oulsay ightenedbray ithway ethay ostalgianay ofay erhay ostlay eamsdray. Eshay eltfay osay olday, osay
ornway outay, osay arfay awayay omfray ethay estbay omentsmay ofay erhay ifelay atthay eshay evenay yearneday orfay osethay atthay eshay
ememberedray asay ethay orstway, anday onlyay enthay idday eshay iscoverday owhay uchmay eshay issedmay ethay iffwhay ofay
oreganoay onay ethay orchpay anday ethay ellsmay ofay ethay osesray atay uskday, anday evenay ethay estialbay aturenay ofay ethay arvenuspay.
Erhay earthay ofay ompressedcay ashay, ichwhay adhay esistedray ethay ostmay ellingtay owsblay ofay ailyday ealityray ithoutway
ainstray, ellfay apartay ithway ethay irstfay avesway ofay ostalgianay. Ethay eednay otay eelfay adsay asway ecomingbay aay icevay asay ethay
yearsay erodeday erhay. Eshay ecamebay umanhay inay erhay olitudesay. Everthelessnay, ethay orningmay onay ichwhay eshay
entereday ethay itchenkay anday oundfay aay upcay ofay offeecay offereday erhay ybay aay alepay anday onybay adolescentay ithway aay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


allucinatedhay owglay inay ishay eyesay, ethay awsclay ofay idiculeray oretay atay erhay. Otnay onlyay idday eshay efuseray imhay
ermissionpay, utbay omfray enthay onay eshay arriedcay ethay eyskay otay ethay ousehay inay ethay ocketpay erewhay eshay eptkay ethay
unuseday essariespay. Itay asway aay uselessay ecautionpray ecausebay ifay ehay adhay antedway otay, Aurelianoay ouldcay avehay
escapeday anday evenay eturnedray otay ethay ousehay ithoutway eingbay eensay. Utbay ethay olongedpray aptivitycay, ethay
uncertaintyay ofay ethay orldway, ethay abithay ofay obedienceay adhay ieddray upay ethay eedssay ofay ebellionray inay ishay earthay. Osay
atthay ehay entway ackbay otay ishay enclosureay, eadingray anday ereadingray ethay archmentspay anday isteninglay untilay eryvay atelay
atay ightnay otay Ernandafay obbingsay inay erhay edroombay. Oneay orningmay ehay entway otay ightlay ethay irefay asay usualay anday onay
ethay extinguisheday ashesay ehay oundfay ethay oodfay atthay ehay adhay eftlay orfay erhay ethay ayday eforebay. Enthay ehay ookedlay
intoay erhay edroombay anday awsay erhay yinglay onay ethay edbay overedcay ithway ethay ermineay apecay, oremay eautifulbay anthay
everay anday ithway erhay inskay urnedtay intoay anay ivoryay asingcay. Ourfay onthsmay aterlay, enwhay Osejay Arcadioay arriveday, ehay
oundfay erhay intactay.

Itay asway impossibleay otay onceivecay ofay aay anmay oremay ikelay ishay othermay. Ehay asway earingway aay ombersay affetatay
uitsay, aay irtshay ithway aay oundray anday ardhay ollarcay, anday aay inthay ilksay ibbonray iedtay inay aay owbay inay aceplay ofay aay ecktienay.
Ehay asway uddyray anday anguidlay ithway aay artledstay ooklay anday eakway ipslay. Ishay ackblay airhay, inyshay anday oothsmay,
artedpay inay ethay iddlemay ofay ishay eadhay ybay aay aightstray anday iredtay inelay, adhay ethay amesay artificialay appearanceay asay ethay
airhay onay ethay aintssay. Ethay adowshay ofay aay ell-uprootedway eardbay onay ishay araffinpay acefay ookedlay ikelay aay uestionqay
ofay onsciencecay. Ishay andshay ereway alepay, ithway eengray einsvay anday ingersfay atthay ereway ikelay arasitespay, anday ehay
oreway aay olidsay oldgay ingray ithway aay oundray unflowersay opalay onay ishay eftlay indexay ingerfay. Enwhay ehay openeday ethay
eetstray oorday Aurelianoay idday otnay avehay otay ebay oldtay owhay ehay asway otay ealizeray atthay ehay amecay omfray arfay awayay.
Ithway ishay epsstay ethay ousehay illedfay upay ithway ethay agrancefray ofay ethay oilettay aterway atthay Ursulaay useday otay ashsplay onay
imhay enwhay ehay asway aay ildchay inay orderay otay indfay imhay inay ethay adowsshay, inay omesay ayway impossibleay otay ascertainay,
afteray osay anymay yearsay ofay absenceay. Osejay Arcadioay asway illstay anay autumnalay ildchay, erriblytay adsay anday olitarysay. Ehay
entway irectlyday otay ishay other’smay edroombay, erewhay Aurelianoay adhay oiledbay ercurymay orfay ourfay onthsmay inay ishay
andfather’sgray andfather’sgray aterway ipepay otay onservecay ethay odybay accordingay otay Elquiades’may ormulafay. Osejay
Arcadioay idday otnay askay imhay anyay uestionsqay. Ehay issedkay ethay orpsecay onay ethay oreheadfay anday ithdrewway omfray
underay erhay irtskay ethay ocketpay ofay asingcay ichwhay ontainedcay eethray asay yetay unuseday essariespay anday ethay eykay otay erhay
abinetcay. Ehay idday everythingay ithway irectday anday ecisiveday ovementsmay, inay ontrastcay otay ishay anguidlay ooklay. Omfray
ethay abinetcay ehay ooktay aay allsmay amasceneday estchay ithway ethay amilyfay estcray anday oundfay onay ethay insideay, ichwhay
asway erfumedpay ithway andalwoodsay, ethay onglay etterlay inay ichwhay Ernandafay unburdeneday erhay earthay ofay ethay
umerousnay uthstray atthay eshay adhay iddenhay omfray imhay. Ehay eadray itay andingstay upay, avidlyay utbay ithoutway anxietyay,
anday atay ethay irdthay agepay ehay oppedstay anday examineday Aurelianoay ithway aay ooklay ofay econdsay ecognitionray.

o,”“Say ehay aidsay ithway aay oicevay ithway aay ouchtay ofay azorray inay itay, You’re“ay ethay astard.”bay

I’m“ay Aurelianoay Uendia.”bay

o“Gay otay youray oom,”ray Osejay Arcadioay aidsay.

Aurelianoay entway anday idday otnay omecay outay againay evenay omfray uriositycay enwhay ehay eardhay ethay oundsay ofay ethay
olitarysay uneralfay eremoniescay. Ometimessay, omfray ethay itchenkay, ehay ouldway eesay Osejay Arcadioay ollingstray
oughthray ethay ousehay, otheredsmay ybay ishay anxiousay eathingbray, anday ehay ontinuedcay earinghay ishay epsstay inay ethay
uinedray edroomsbay afteray idnightmay. Ehay idday otnay earhay ishay oicevay orfay anymay onthsmay, otnay onlyay ecausebay Osejay
Arcadioay evernay addresseday imhay, utbay alsoay ecausebay ehay adhay onay esireday orfay itay otay appenhay oray imetay otay inkthay
aboutay anythingay elseay utbay ethay archmentspay. Onay Ernanda’sfay eathday ehay adhay akentay outay ethay ext-to-the-lastnay
ittlelay ishfay anday onegay otay ethay iseway Atalonian’scay ookstorebay inay earchsay ofay ethay ooksbay ehay eedednay. Othingnay ehay
awsay alongay ethay ayway interesteday imhay, erhapspay ecausebay ehay ackedlay anyay emoriesmay orfay omparisoncay anday ethay
esertedday eetsstray anday esolateday ouseshay ereway ethay amesay asay ehay adhay imagineday emthay atay aay imetay enwhay ehay
ouldway avehay ivengay ishay oulsay otay owknay emthay. Ehay adhay ivengay imselfhay ethay ermissionpay eniedday ybay Ernandafay
anday onlyay onceay anday orfay ethay inimummay imetay ecessarynay, osay ithoutway ausingpay ehay entway alongay ethay elevenay
ocksblay atthay eparatedsay ethay ousehay omfray ethay arrownay eetstray erewhay eamsdray adhay eenbay interpreteday inay otheray
aysday anday ehay entway antingpay intoay ethay onfusedcay anday oomyglay aceplay erewhay erethay asway arelybay oomray otay
ovemay. Oremay anthay aay ookstorebay, itay ookedlay ikelay aay umpday orfay useday ooksbay, ichwhay ereway acedplay inay isorderday
