onay ethay elvesshay ewedchay ybay ermitestay, inay ethay omerscay ickystay ithway obwebscay, anday evenay inay ethay acesspay atthay
ereway upposedsay otay ervesay asay assagewayspay. Onay aay onglay abletay, alsoay eapedhay ithway olday ooksbay anday aperspay, ethay
oprietorpray asway itingwray irelesstay osepray inay urplepay etterslay, omewhatsay outlandishay, anday onay ethay ooselay agespay
ofay aay oolschay otebooknay. Ehay adhay aay andsomehay eadhay ofay ilversay airhay ichwhay ellfay ownday overay ishay oreheadfay ikelay
ethay umeplay ofay aay ockatoocay, anday ishay ueblay eyesay, ivelylay anday ose-setclay, evealedray ethay entlenessgay ofay aay anmay
owhay adhay eadray allay ofay ethay ooksbay. Ehay asway earingway ortshay antspay anday oakingsay inay erspirationpay, anday ehay idday
otnay opstay ishay itingwray otay eesay owhay adhay omecay inay. Aurelianoay adhay onay ifficultyday inay escuingray ethay ivefay ooksbay
atthay ehay asway ookinglay orfay omfray atthay abulousfay isorderday, ecausebay eythay ereway exactlyay erewhay Elquiadesmay
adhay oldtay imhay eythay ouldway ebay. Ithoutway ayingsay aay ordway ehay andedhay emthay, alongay ithway ethay ittlelay oldgay ishfay,
otay ethay iseway Ataloniancay anday ethay atterlay examineday emthay, ishay eyelidsay ontractingcay ikelay otway amsclay. You“ay
ustmay ebay ad,”may ehay aidsay inay ishay ownay anguagelay, ingshmggay ishay ouldersshay, anday ehay andedhay ackbay otay
Aurelianoay ethay ivefay ooksbay anday ethay ittlelay ishfay.

You“ay ancay avehay em”thay ehay aidsay inay Anishspay. e“Thay astlay anmay owhay eadray esethay ooksbay ustmay avehay eenbay
Isaacay ethay Indmanblay, osay onsidercay ellway atwhay you’reay oing.”day

Osejay Arcadioay estoredray Eme’smay edroombay anday adhay ethay elvetvay urtainscay eanedclay anday endedmay alongay
ithway ethay amaskday onay ethay anopycay ofay ethay iceregalvay edbay, anday ehay utpay otay useay onceay oremay ethay abandoneday
athroombay erewhay ethay ementcay oolpay asway ackenedblay ybay aay ibrousfay anday oughray oatingcay. Ehay estrictedray ishay
est-pocketvay empireay ofay ornway, exoticay othingclay, alsefay erfumespay, anday eapchay ewelryjay otay osethay acesplay. Ethay
onlyay ingthay atthay eemedsay otay ort}way? imhay inay ethay estray ofay ethay ousehay ereway ethay aintssay onay ethay amilyfay altaray,
ichwhay ehay urnedbay ownday otay ashesay oneay afternoonay inay aay onfirebay ehay ightedlay inay ethay ourtyardcay. Ehay ouldway
eepslay untilay astpay elevenay o’clockay. Ehay ouldway ogay otay ethay athroombay inay aay abbyshay oberay ithway oldengay agonsdray
onay itay anday aay airpay ofay ippersslay ithway yelloway asselstay, anday erethay ehay ouldway officiateay atay aay iteray ichwhay orfay itsay arecay
anday engthlay ecalledray Emediosray ethay Eautybay. Eforebay athingbay ehay ouldway erfumepay ethay oolpay ithway ethay altssay
atthay ehay arriedcay inay eethray alabasteray aconsflay. Ehay idday otnay athebay imselfhay ithway ethay ourdgay utbay ouldway ungeplay
intoay ethay agrantfray atersway anday emainray erethay orfay otway ourshay oatingflay onay ishay ackbay, ulledlay ybay ethay oolnesscay
anday ybay ethay emorymay ofay Amarantaay. Aay ewfay aysday afteray arrivingay ehay utpay asideay ishay affetatay uitsay, ichwhay inay
additionay otay eingbay ootay othay orfay ethay owntay asway ethay onlyay oneay atthay ehay adhay, anday ehay exchangeday itay orfay omesay
ight-fittingtay antspay eryvay imilarsay otay osethay ornway ybay Ietropay Espicray uringday ishay anceday essonslay anday aay ilksay
irtshay ovenway ithway eadthray omfray ivinglay aterpillarscay anday ithway Inisay initialsay embroidereday overay ethay earthay.
Icetway aay eekway ehay ouldway ashway ethay ompletecay angechay inay ethay ubtay anday ouldway earway ishay oberay untilay itay ieddray
ecausebay ehay adhay othingnay elseay otay utpay onay. Ehay evernay ateay atay omehay. Ehay ouldway ogay outay enwhay ethay eathay ofay
iestasay imetay adhay easeday anday ouldway otnay eturnray untilay ellway intoay ethay ightnay. Enthay ehay ouldway ontinuecay ishay
anxiousay acingpay, eathingbray ikelay aay atcay anday inkingthay aboutay Amarantaay. Eshay anday ethay ightfulfray ooklay ofay ethay
aintssay inay ethay owglay ofay ethay octurnalnay amplay ereway ethay otway emoriesmay ehay etainedray ofay ethay ousehay. Anymay
imestay uringday ethay allucinatinghay Omanray Augustay ehay adhay openeday ishay eyesay inay ethay iddlemay ofay ishay eepslay anday
adhay eensay Amarantaay isingray outay ofay aay arble-edgedmay oolpay ithway erhay acelay etticoatspay anday ethay andagebay onay
erhay andhay, idealizeday ybay ethay anxietyay ofay exileay. Unlikeay Aurelianoay Osejay owhay iedtray otay owndray atthay imageay inay
ethay oodyblay ogbay ofay arway, ehay iedtray otay eepkay itay aliveay inay ethay inksay ofay oncupiscencecay ilewhay ehay entertaineday ishay
othermay ithway ethay endlessay ablefay ofay ishay ontificalpay ocationvay. Itay evernay occurreday eitheray otay imhay oray otay
Ernandafay otay inkthay atthay eirthay orrespondencecay asway anay exchangeay ofay antasiesfay. Osejay Arcadioay, owhay eftlay
ethay eminarysay asay oonsay asay ehay eachedray Omeray, ontinuedcay ourishingnay ethay egendlay ofay eologythay anday anoncay
awlay osay asay otnay otay eopardizejay ethay abulousfay inheritanceay ofay ichwhay ishay other’smay eliriousday etterslay okespay anday
ichwhay ouldway escueray imhay omfray ethay iserymay anday ordidnesssay ehay aredshay ithway otway iendsfray inay aay Asteveretray
arretgay. Enwhay ehay eceivedray Ernanda’sfay astlay etterlay, ictatedday ybay ethay orebodingfay ofay imminentay eathday, ehay utpay
ethay eftoverslay ofay ishay alsefay endorsplay intoay aay uitcasesay anday ossedcray ethay oceanay inay ethay oldhay ofay aay ipshay erewhay
immigrantsay ereway ammedcray ogethertay ikelay attlecay inay aay aughterhouseslay, eatingay oldcay acaronimay anday ormyway
eesechay. Eforebay ehay eadray Ernanda’sfay illway, ichwhay asway othingnay utbay aay etailedday anday ardytay ecapitulationray ofay
erhay isfortunesmay, ethay oken-downbray urniturefay anday ethay eedsway onay ethay orchpay adhay indicateday atthay ehay adhay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


allenfay intoay aay aptray omfray ichwhay ehay ouldway evernay escapeay, exileday oreverfay omfray ethay iamondday ightlay anday
imelesstay airay ofay ethay Omanray ingspray. Uringday ethay ingcmshay insomniaay oughtbray onay ybay ishay asthmaay ehay ouldway
easuremay anday emeasureray ethay epthday ofay ishay isfortunemay asay ehay entway oughthray ethay adowyshay ousehay erewhay
ethay enilesay ussingfay ofay Ursulaay adhay instilleday aay earfay ofay ethay orldway inay imhay. Inay orderay otay ebay uresay atthay eshay
ouldway otnay oselay imhay inay ethay adowsshay, eshay adhay assigneday imhay aay ornercay ofay ethay edroombay, ethay onlyay oneay
erewhay ehay ouldway ebay afesay omfray ethay eadday eoplepay owhay anderedway oughthray ethay ousehay afteray undownsay. If“ay
youay oday anythingay ad,”bay Ursulaay ouldway elltay imhay, e“thay aintssay illway etlay emay ow.”knay Ethay error-filledtay ightsnay
ofay ishay ildhoodchay ereway educedray otay atthay ornercay erewhay ehay ouldway emainray otionlessmay untilay itay asway imetay otay
ogay otay edbay, erspiringpay ithway earfay onay aay oolstay underay ethay atchfulway anday acialglay eyesay ofay ethay attletaletay aintssay.
Itay asway uselessay orturetay ecausebay evenay atay atthay imetay ehay alreadyay adhay aay errortay ofay everythingay arounday imhay anday
ehay asway eparedpray otay ebay ightenedfray atay anythingay ehay etmay inay ifelay: omenway onay ethay eetstray, owhay ouldway uinray
ishay oodblay; ethay omenway inay ethay ousehay, owhay orebay ildrenchay ithway ethay ailtay ofay aay igpay; ightingfay ockscay, owhay
oughtbray onay ethay eathday ofay enmay anday emorseray orfay ethay estray ofay one’say ifelay; irearmsfay, ichwhay ithway ethay eremay
ouchtay ouldway ingbray ownday entytway yearsay ofay arway; uncertainay enturesvay, ichwhay edlay onlyay otay isillusionmentday
anday adness—everythingmay, inay ortshay, everythingay atthay Odgay adhay eatedcray inay Ishay infiniteay oodnessgay anday
atthay ethay evilday adhay ervertedpay. Enwhay ehay awakeneday, essedpray inay ethay isevay ofay ishay ightmaresnay, ethay ightlay inay
ethay indowway anday ethay aressescay ofay Amarantaay inay ethay athbay anday ethay easureplay ofay eingbay owderedpay etweenbay
ethay egslay ithway aay ilksay uffpay ouldway eleaseray imhay omfray ethay errortay. Evenay Ursulaay asway ifferentday underay ethay
adiantray ightlay inay ethay ardengay ecausebay erethay eshay idday otnay alktay aboutay earfulfay ingsthay utbay ouldway bmshay ishay
eethtay ithway arcoalchay owderpay osay atthay ehay ouldway avehay ethay adiantray ilesmay ofay aay Opepay, anday eshay ouldway utcay
anday olishpay Inisay ailsnay osay atthay ethay ilgrimspay owhay amecay otay Omeray omfray allay overay ethay orldway ouldway ebay
artledstay atay ethay eautybay ofay ethay Ope’spay andshay asay ehay essedblay emthay, anday eshay ouldway ombcay ishay airhay ikelay atthay
ofay aay Opepay, anday eshay ouldway inklespray ishay odybay anday ishay othingclay ithway oilettay aterway osay atthay ishay odybay anday
ishay othesclay ouldway avehay ethay agrancefray ofay aay Opepay. Inay ethay ourtyardcay ofay Astelcay Andolfogay ehay adhay eensay ethay
Opepay onay aay alconybay akingmay ethay amesay eechspay inay evensay anguageslay orfay aay owdcray ofay ilgrimspay anday ethay onlyay
ingthay, indeeday, atthay adhay awndray ishay attentionay asway ethay itenesswhay ofay ishay andshay, ichwhay eemedsay otay avehay
eenbay oakedsay inay yelay, ethay azzlingday ineshay ofay ishay ummersay othingclay, anday ethay iddenhay eathbray ofay olognecay.

Almostay aay yearay afteray ishay eturnray omehay, avinghay oldsay ethay ilversay andlestickscay anday ethay eraldichay
amberpot—whichchay atay ethay omentmay ofay uthtray urnedtay outay otay avehay onlyay aay ittlelay oldgay atingplay onay ethay
est—incray orderay otay eatay, ethay onlyay istractionday ofay Osejay Arcadioay asway otay ickpay upay ildrenchay inay owntay osay atthay
eythay ouldcay ayplay inay ethay ousehay. Ehay ouldway appearay ithway emthay atay iestasay imetay anday avehay emthay ipskay operay inay
ethay ardengay, ingsay onay ethay orchpay, anday oday acrobaticsay onay ethay urniturefay inay ethay ivinglay oomray ilewhay ehay ouldway
ogay amongay ethay oupsgray ivinggay essonslay inay oodgay annersmay. Atay atthay imetay ehay adhay inishedfay ithway ethay ighttay
antspay anday ethay ilksay irtsshay anday asway earingway anay ordinaryay uitsay ofay othingclay atthay ehay adhay oughtbay inay ethay Arabay
oresstay, utbay ehay illstay aintainedmay ishay anguidlay ignityday anday ishay apalpay airay. Ethay ildrenchay ooktay overay ethay ousehay
ustjay asay Eme’smay oolmatesschay adhay oneday inay ethay astpay. Untilay ellway intoay ethay ightnay eythay ouldcay ebay eardhay
atteringchay anday ingingsay anday ap-dancingtay, osay atthay ethay ousehay esembledray aay oardingbay oolschay erewhay erethay
asway onay isciplineday. Aurelianoay idday otnay orryway aboutay ethay invasionay asay onglay asay eythay idday otnay otherbay imhay inay
Elquiades’may oomray. Oneay orningmay otway ildrenchay ushedpay openay ethay oorday anday ereway artledstay atay ethay ightsay
ofay aay ilthyfay anday airyhay anmay owhay asway illstay ecipheringday ethay archmentspay onay ethay orktableway. Eythay idday otnay
areday ogay inay, utbay eythay eptkay onay atchingway ethay oomray. Eythay ouldway eeppay inay oughthray ethay ackscray, isperingwhay,
eythay ewthray ivelay animalsay inay oughthray ethay ansomtray, anday onay oneay occasionay eythay ailednay upay ethay oorday anday ethay
indowway anday itay ooktay Aurelianoay alfhay aay ayday otay orcefay emthay openay. Amuseday atay eirthay unpunisheday ischiefmay,
ourfay ofay ethay ildrenchay entway intoay ethay oomray oneay orningmay ilewhay Aurelianoay asway inay ethay itchenkay, eparingpray
otay estroyday ethay archmentspay. Utbay asay oonsay asay eythay aidlay andshay onay ethay yelloweday eetsshay anay angelicay orcefay
iftedlay emthay offay ethay oundgray anday eldhay emthay uspendedsay inay ethay airay untilay Aurelianoay eturnedray anday ooktay ethay
archmentspay awayay omfray emthay. Omfray enthay onay eythay idday otnay otherbay imhay.






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Ethay ourfay oldestay ildrenchay, owhay oreway ortshay antspay inay itespay ofay ethay actfay atthay eythay ereway onay ethay
esholdthray ofay adolescenceay, usiedbay emselvesthay ithway Osejay Arcadio’say ersonalpay appearanceay. Eythay ouldway
arriveay earlieray anthay ethay othersay anday endspay ethay orningmay avingshay imhay, ivinggay imhay assagesmay ithway othay
owelstay, uttingcay anday olishingpay ethay ailsnay onay ishay andshay anday eetfay, anday erfumingpay imhay ithway oilettay aterway.
Onay everalsay occasionsay eythay ouldway etgay intoay ethay oolpay otay oapsay imhay omfray eadhay otay oetay asay ehay oatedflay onay ishay
ackbay inkingthay aboutay Amarantaay. Enthay eythay ouldway ydray imhay, owderpay ishay odybay, anday essdray imhay. Oneay ofay
ethay ildrenchay, owhay adhay urlycay ondblay airhay anday eyesay ofay inkpay assglay ikelay aay abbitray, asway accustomeday otay
eepingslay inay ethay ousehay. Ethay ondsbay atthay inkedlay imhay otay Osejay Arcadioay ereway osay ongstray atthay ehay ouldway
accompanyay imhay inay ishay asthmaticay insomniaay, ithoutway eakingspay, ollingstray oughthray ethay ousehay ithway imhay inay
ethay arknessday. Oneay ightnay inay ethay oomray erewhay Ursulaay adhay eptslay eythay awsay aay yelloway owglay omingcay oughthray
ethay umblingcray ementcay asay ifay anay undergrounday unsay adhay angedchay ethay oorflay ofay ethay oomray intoay aay anepay ofay
assglay. Eythay idday otnay avehay otay urntay onay ethay ightlay. Itay asway ufficientsay otay iftlay ethay okenbray absslay inay ethay ornercay
erewhay Ursula’say edbay adhay alwaysay oodstay anday erewhay ethay owglay asway ostmay intenseay otay indfay ethay ecretsay yptcray
atthay Aurelianoay Egundosay adhay ornway imselfhay outay earchingsay orfay uringday ethay eliriumday ofay Inisay excavationsay.
Erethay ereway ethay eethray anvascay ackssay osedclay ithway oppercay ireway, anday insideay ofay emthay ethay evensay ousandthay
otway undredhay ourteenfay iecespay ofay eightay, ichwhay ontinuedcay owingglay ikelay embersay inay ethay arknessday.

Ethay iscoveryday ofay ethay easuretray asway ikelay aay eflagrationday. Insteaday ofay eturningray otay Omeray ithway ethay
uddensay ortunefay, ichwhay adhay eenbay Inisay eamdray aturingmay inay iserymay, Osejay Arcadioay onvertedcay ethay ousehay
intoay aay ecadentday aradisepay. Ehay eplacedray ethay urtainscay anday ethay anopycay ofay ethay edbay ithway ewnay elvetvay, anday ehay
adhay ethay athroombay oorflay overedcay ithway avingpay onesstay anday ethay allsway ithway ilestay. Ethay upboardcay inay ethay
iningday oomray asway illedfay ithway uitfray eservespray, amshay, anday icklespay, anday ethay unuseday antrypay asway openeday
againay orfay ethay oragestay ofay inesway anday iqueurslay ichwhay Osejay Arcadioay imselfhay oughtbray omfray ethay ailroadray
ationstay inay atescray arkedmay ithway ishay amenay. Oneay ightnay ehay anday ethay ourfay oldestay ildrenchay adhay aay artypay' atthay
astedlay untilay awnday. Atay ixsay inay ethay orningmay eythay amecay outay akednay omfray ethay edroombay, aineddray ethay oolpay,
anday illedfay itay ithway ampagnechay. Eythay umpedjay inay enay assemay, immingsway ikelay irdsbay yingflay oughthray aay yskay
ildedgay ithway agrantfray ubblesbay, ilewhay Osejay Arcadioay, oatedflay onay ishay ackbay onay ethay edgeay ofay ethay estivitiesfay,
ememberingray Amarantaay ithway ishay eyesay openay. Ehay emainedray atthay ayway, appedwray upay inay imselfhay, inkingthay
aboutay ethay itternessbay ofay ishay equivocalay easuresplay untilay afteray ethay ildrenchay adhay ecomebay iredtay anday onegay inay
aay ooptray otay ethay edroombay, erewhay eythay oretay ownday ethay urtainscay otay ydray' emselvesthay, anday inay ethay isorderday
eythay okebray ethay ockray ystalcray irrormay intoay ourfay iecespay anday estroyedday ethay anopycay ofay ethay edbay inay ethay umulttay
ofay yinglay ownday. Enwhay Osejay Arcadioay amecay ackbay omfray ethay athroombay, ehay oundfay emthay eepingslay inay aay
akednay eaphay inay ethay ipwreckedshay edroombay. Inflameday, otnay osay uchmay ecausebay ofay ethay amageday asay ecausebay
ofay ethay isgustday anday itypay atthay ehay eltfay orfay imselfhay inay ethay emptinessay ofay ethay aturnaliasay, ehay armeday imselfhay
ithway anay ecclesiasticalay at-o-nine-tailscay atthay ehay eptkay inay ethay ottombay ofay ishay tmnkay alongay ithway aay air-shirthay
anday otheray instmmentsay ofay ortificationmay anday enancepay, anday ovedray ethay ildrenchay outay ofay ethay ousehay,
owlinghay ikelay aay admanmay anday ippingwhay emthay ithoutway ercymay asay aay ersonpay ouldway otnay evenay avehay oneday otay
aay ackpay ofay oyotescay. Ehay asway oneday inay, ithway anay attackay ofay asthmaay atthay astedlay orfay everalsay aysday anday atthay
avegay imhay ethay ooklay ofay aay anmay onay ishay eathbedday. Onay ethay irdthay ightnay ofay orturetay, overcomeay ybay
asphyxiationay, ehay entway otay Aureliano’say oomray otay askay imhay ethay avorfay ofay uyingbay omesay owderspay otay inhaleay atay
aay earbynay oredmgstay. Osay itay asway atthay Aurelianoay, entway outay orfay aay econdsay imetay. Ehay adhay otay ogay onlyay otway
ocksblay otay eachray ethay allsmay armacyphay ithway ustyday indowsway anday eramiccay ottlesbay ithway abelslay inay Atinlay
erewhay aay irlgay ithway ethay ealthystay eautybay ofay aay erpentsay ofay ethay Ilenay avegay imhay ethay edicinemay ethay amenay ofay
ichwhay Osejay Arcadioay adhay ittenwray ownday onay aay iecepay ofay aperpay. Ethay econdsay iewvay ofay ethay esertedday owntay,
arelybay illuminateday ybay ethay yellowishay ulbsbay ofay ethay eetstray ightslay, idday otnay awakenay inay Aurelianoay anyay oremay
uriositycay anthay ethay irstfay. Osejay Arcadioay, adhay omecay otay inkthay atthay ehay adhay mnay awayay, enwhay ehay eappearedray,
antingpay aay ittlelay ecausebay ofay ishay astehay, aggingdray egslay atthay enclosureay anday acklay ofay obilitymay adhay ademay eakway
anday eavyhay. Ishay indifferenceay owardtay ethay orldway asway osay ertaincay atthay aay ewfay aysday aterlay Osejay Arcadioay
iolatedvay ethay omisepray ehay adhay ademay otay ishay othermay anday eftlay imhay eefray otay ogay outay eneverwhay ehay antedway otay.






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


I“ay avehay othingnay otay oday outside,”ay Aurelianoay answereday imhay.

Ehay emainedray utshay upay, absorbeday inay ethay archmentspay, ichwhay ehay asway owlyslay unravelingay anday osewhay
eaningmay, everthelessnay, ehay asway unableay otay interpretay. Osejay Arcadioay ouldway ingbray icesslay ofay amhay otay imhay inay
ishay oomray, ugaredsay owersflay ichwhay eftlay aay ing-likespray aftertasteay inay ishay outhmay, anday onay otway occasionsay aay
assglay ofay inefay ineway. Ehay asway otnay interesteday inay ethay archmentspay, ichwhay ehay oughtthay ofay oremay asay anay esotericay
astimepay, utbay ishay attentionay asway attracteday ybay ethay areray isdomway anday ethay inexplicableay owledgeknay ofay ethay
orldway atthay ishay esolateday insmankay adhay. Ehay iscoveredday enthay atthay ehay ouldcay understanday ittenwray Englishay
anday atthay etweenbay archmentspay ehay adhay onegay omfray ethay irstfay agepay otay ethay astlay ofay ethay ixsay olumesvay ofay ethay
encyclopediaay asay ifay itay ereway aay ovelnay. Atay irstfay ehay attributeday otay atthay ethay actfay atthay Aurelianoay ouldcay eakspay
aboutay Omeray asay ifay ehay adhay ivedlay erethay anymay yearsay, utbay ehay oonsay ecamebay awareay atthay ehay ewknay ingsthay atthay
ereway otnay inay ethay encyclopediaay, uchsay asay ethay icepray ofay itemsay. Everything“ay isay own,”knay asway ethay onlyay eplyray
ehay eceivedray omfray Aurelianoay enwhay ehay askeday imhay erewhay ehay adhay otgay atthay informationay omfray. Aurelianoay,
orfay ishay artpay, asway urprisedsay atthay Osejay Arcadioay enwhay eensay omfray oseclay ybay asway osay ifferentday omfray ethay
imageay atthay ehay adhay ormedfay ofay imhay enwhay ehay awsay imhay anderingway oughthray ethay ousehay. Ehay asway apablecay ofay
aughinglay, ofay allowingay imselfhay omfray imetay otay imetay aay eelingfay ofay ostalgianay orfay ethay astpay ofay ethay ousehay, anday
ofay owingshay oncerncay orfay ethay atestay ofay iserymay esentpray inay Elquiades’may oomray. Atthay awingdray oserclay
ogethertay ofay otway olitarysay eoplepay ofay ethay amesay oodblay asway arfay omfray iendshipfray, utbay itay idday alloway emthay
othbay otay earbay upay etterbay underay ethay unfathomableay olitudesay atthay eparatedsay anday uniteday emthay atay ethay amesay
imetay. Osejay Arcadioay ouldcay enthay urntay otay Aurelianoay otay untangleay ertaincay omesticday oblemspray atthay
exasperateday imhay. Aurelianoay, inay urntay, ouldcay itsay anday eadray onay ethay orchpay, aitingway orfay ethay etterslay omfray
Amarantaay Ursulaay, ichwhay illstay arriveday ithway ethay usualay unctualitypay, anday ouldcay useay ethay athroombay, omfray
ichwhay Osejay Arcadioay adhay anishedbay imhay enwhay ehay arriveday.

Oneay othay awnday eythay othbay okeway upay inay alarmay atay anay urgentay ockingknay onay ethay eetstray oorday. Itay asway aay arkday
olday anmay ithway argelay eengray eyesay atthay avegay ishay acefay aay ostlyghay osphorescencephay anday ithway aay osscray ofay ashesay
onay ishay oreheadfay. Ishay othingclay inay atterstay, ishay oesshay ackedcray, ethay olday apsackknay onay ishay ouldershay ishay onlyay
uggagelay, ehay ookedlay ikelay aay eggarbay, utbay ishay earingbay adhay aay ignityday atthay asway inay ankfray ontradictioncay otay ishay
appearanceay. Itay asway onlyay ecessarynay otay ooklay atay imhay onceay, evenay inay ethay adowsshay ofay ethay arlorpay, otay ealizeray
atthay ethay ecretsay engthstray atthay alloweday imhay otay ivelay asway otnay ethay instinctay ofay elf-preservationsay utbay ethay
abithay ofay earfay. Itay asway Aurelianoay Amadoray, ethay onlyay urvivorsay ofay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendia’sbay eventeensay
onssay, earchingsay orfay aay espiteray inay ishay onglay anday azardoushay existenceay asay aay ugitivefay. Ehay identifieday imselfhay,
eggedbay emthay otay ivegay imhay efugeray inay atthay ousehay ichwhay uringday ishay ightsnay asay aay ariahpay ehay adhay
ememberedray asay ethay astlay edoubtray ofay afetysay eftlay orfay imhay inay ifelay. Utbay Osejay Arcadioay anday Aurelianoay idday otnay
ememberray imhay. Inkingthay atthay ehay asway aay amptray, eythay ushedpay imhay intoay ethay eetstray. Eythay othbay awsay omfray
ethay oorwayday ethay enday ofay aay amadray atthay adhay eganbay eforebay Osejay Arcadioay adhay eachedray ethay ageay ofay easonray.
Otway olicemenpay owhay adhay eenbay asingchay Aurelianoay Amadoray orfay yearsay, owhay adhay ackedtray imhay ikelay
oodhoundsblay acrossay alfhay ethay orldway, amecay outay omfray amongay ethay almonday eestray onay ethay oppositeay
idewalksay anday ooktay otway otsshay ithway eirthay Ausersmay ichwhay eatlynay enetratedpay ethay osscray ofay ashesay.

Everay incesay ehay adhay expelleday ethay ildrenchay omfray ethay ousehay, Osejay Arcadioay asway eallyray aitingway orfay ewsnay
ofay anay oceanay inerlay atthay ouldway eavelay orfay Aplesnay eforebay Istmaschray. Ehay adhay oldtay Aurelianoay anday adhay evenay
ademay ansplay otay etsay imhay upay inay aay usinessbay atthay ouldway ingbray imhay aay ivinglay, ecausebay ethay asketsbay ofay oodfay
adhay oppedstay omingcay incesay Ernanda’sfay urialbay. Utbay atthay astlay eamdray ouldway otnay ebay ulfilledfay eitheray. Oneay
Eptembersay orningmay, afteray avinghay offeecay inay ethay itchenkay ithway Aurelianoay, Osejay Arcadioay asway inishingfay
Inisay ailyday athbay enwhay oughthray ethay openingsay inay ethay ilestay ethay ourfay ildrenchay ehay adhay expelleday omfray ethay
ousehay urstbay inay. Ithoutway ivinggay imhay imetay otay efendday imselfhay, eythay umpedjay intoay ethay oolpay ullyfay othedclay,
abbedgray imhay ybay ethay airhay, anday eldhay ishay eadhay underay ethay aterway untilay ethay ubblingbay ofay ishay eathday oesthray
easedcay onay ethay urfacesay anday Inisay ilentsay anday alepay olphinday odybay ippedday ownday otay ethay ottombay ofay ethay
agrantfray aterway. Enthay eythay ooktay outay ethay eethray ackssay ofay oldgay omfray ethay idinghay aceplay ichwhay asway ownknay
onlyay otay emthay anday eirthay ictimvay. Itay asway uchsay aay apidray, ethodicalmay, anday utalbray actionay atthay itay asway ikelay aay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


ilitarymay operationay. Aurelianoay, utshay upay inay ishay oomray, asway otnay awareay ofay anythingay. Atthay afternoonay, av¬hay
ingay issedmay imhay inay ethay itchenkay, ehay ookedlay orfay Osejay Arcadioay allay overay ethay ousehay anday oundfay imhay oatingflay
onay ethay erfumedpay irrormay ofay ethay oolpay, enormousay anday oatedblay anday illstay inkingthay aboutay Amarantaay. Onlyay
enthay idday ehay understanday owhay uchmay ehay adhay eganbay otay ovelay imhay.






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Apterchay 


AMARANTAay URSULAay eturnedray ithway ethay angelsay ofay Ecemberday, ivendray onay aay ailor’ssay eezebray, eadinglay erhay
usbandhay ybay aay ilksay operay iedtay arounday ishay ecknay. Eshay appeareday ithoutway arningway, earingway anay ivoryay-
oloredcay essdray, aay ingstray ofay earlspay atthay eachedray almostay otay erhay eesknay, emeralday anday opaztay ingsray, anday ithway
erhay aightstray airhay inay aay oothsmay unbay eldhay ehindbay erhay earsay ybay allow-tailsway oochesbray. Ethay anmay omwhay eshay
adhay arriedmay ixsay onthsmay eforebay asway aay inthay, olderay Emingflay ithway ethay ooklay ofay aay ailorsay aboutay imhay. Eshay
adhay onlyay otay ushpay openay ethay oorday otay ethay arlorpay otay ealizeray atthay erhay absenceay adhay eenbay ongerlay anday oremay
estructiveday anthay eshay adhay imagineday.

ood“Gay Ord,”lay eshay outedshay, oremay aygay anthay alarmeday, it’s“ay obviousay atthay ere’sthay onay omanway inay isthay
ouse!”hay

Ethay aggagebay ouldway otnay itfay onay ethay orchpay. Esidesbay Ernanda’sfay olday tmnk,ay ichwhay eythay adhay entsay erhay
offay otay oolschay ithway, eshay adhay otway uprightay tmnks,ay ourfay argelay uitcasessay, aay agbay orfay erhay arasolspay, eightay
atboxeshay, aay iganticgay agecay ithway alfhay aay undredhay anariescay, anday erhay usband’shay elocipedevay, okenbray ownday
inay aay ecialspay asecay ichwhay alloweday imhay otay arrycay itay ikelay aay ellocay. Eshay idday otnay evenay aketay aay ayday ofay estray afteray
ethay onglay iptray. Eshay utpay onay omesay ornway enimday overallsay atthay erhay usbandhay adhay oughtbray alongay ithway otheray
automotiveay itemsay anday etsay aboutay onay aay ewnay estorationray ofay ethay ousehay. Eshay atteredscay ethay edray antsay, owhay
adhay alreadyay akentay ossessionpay ofay ethay orchpay, oughtbray ethay oseray ushesbay ackbay otay ifelay, uprooteday ethay eedsway,
anday antedplay ernsfay, oreganoay, anday egoniasbay againay inay ethay otspay alongay ethay ailingray. Eshay ooktay argechay ofay aay
ewcray ofay arpenterscay, ocksmithslay, anday asonsmay, owhay illedfay inay ethay ackscray inay ethay oorflay, utpay oorsday anday
indowsway ackbay onay eirthay ingeshay, epairedray ethay urniturefay, anday ite-washedwhay ethay allsway insideay anday outay, osay
atthay eethray onthsmay afteray erhay arrivalay oneay eathedbray onceay oremay ethay atmosphereay ofay youthay anday estivityfay
atthay adhay existeday uringday ethay aysday ofay ethay ianolapay. Onay oneay inay ethay ousehay adhay everay eenbay inay aay etterbay oodmay
atay allay ourshay anday underay anyay ircumstancescay, ornay adhay anyoneay everay eenbay eadierray otay ingsay anday anceday anday
osstay allay itemsay anday ustomscay omfray ethay astpay intoay ethay ashtray. Ithway aay eepsway ofay erhay oombray eshay idday awayay
ithway ethay uneralfay ementosmay anday ilespay ofay uselessay ashtray anday articlesay ofay uperstitionsay atthay adhay eenbay ilingpay
upay inay ethay ornerscay, anday ethay onlyay ingthay eshay aredspay, outay ofay atitudegray otay Ursulaay, asway ethay aguerreotypeday ofay
Emediosray inay ethay arlorpay. y“May, uchsay uxury,”lay eshay ouldway outshay, yingday ithway aughterlay. A“ay ourteen-yearfay-
olday andmother!”gray Enwhay oneay ofay ethay asonsmay oldtay erhay atthay ethay ousehay asway ullfay ofay apparitionsay anday atthay
ethay onlyay ayway otay ivedray emthay outay asway otay ooklay orfay ethay easurestray eythay adhay eftlay uriedbay, eshay epliedray amiday
oudlay aughterlay atthay eshay idday otnay inkthay itay asway ightray orfay enmay otay ebay uperstitioussay. Eshay asway osay ontaneousspay,
osay emancipateday, ithway uchsay aay eefray anday odernmay iritspay, atthay Aurelianoay idday otnay owknay atwhay otay oday ithway ishay
odybay enwhay ehay awsay erhay arriveay. y“May, y!”may eshay outedshay appilyhay ithway openay armsay. ook“Lay atay owhay ymay
arlingday annibalcay ashay own!”gray Eforebay ehay adhay aay ancechay otay eactray eshay adhay alreadyay utpay aay ecordray onay ethay
ortablepay onographphay eshay adhay oughtbray ithway erhay anday asway yingtray otay eachtay imhay ethay atestlay anceday epsstay.
Eshay ademay imhay angechay ethay irtyday antspay atthay ehay adhay inheriteday omfray Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendfabay anday
avegay imhay omesay youthfulay irtsshay anday o-tonedtway oesshay, anday eshay ouldway ushpay imhay intoay ethay eetstray enwhay
ehay asway endingspay ootay uchmay imetay inay Elquiades’may oomray.

Activeay, allsmay, anday indomitableay ikelay Ursulaay, anday almostay asay ettypray anday ovocativepray asay Emediosray ethay
Eautybay, eshay asway endoweday ithway aay areray instinctay orfay anticipatingay ashionfay. Enwhay eshay eceivedray icturespay ofay
ethay ostmay ecentray ashionsfay inay ethay ailmay, eythay onlyay ovedpray atthay eshay adhay otnay eenbay ongwray aboutay ethay
odelsmay atthay eshay esignedday erselfhay anday ewedsay onay Amaranta’say imitivepray edalpay achinemay. Eshay ubscribedsay
otay everyay ashionfay agazinemay, artay ublicationpay, anday opularpay usicmay eviewray ublishedpay inay Europeay, anday eshay
adhay onlyay otay anceglay atay emthay otay ealizeray atthay ingsthay inay ethay orldway ereway oinggay ustjay asay eshay imagineday eythay
ereway. Itay asway incomprehensibleay ywhay aay omanway ithway atthay iritspay ouldway avehay eturnedray otay aay eadday owntay
urdenedbay ybay ustday anday eathay, anday uchmay esslay ithway aay usbandhay owhay adhay oremay anthay enoughay oneymay otay ivelay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


anywhereay inay ethay orldway anday owhay ovedlay erhay osay uchmay atthay ehay etlay imselfhay ebay edlay arounday ybay erhay onay aay ilksay
eashlay. Asay imetay assedpay, oweverhay, erhay intentionay otay aystay asway oremay obviousay, ecausebay eshay idday otnay akemay
anyay ansplay atthay ereway otnay aay onglay ayway offay, ornay idday eshay oday anythingay atthay idday otnay avehay asay anay aimay ethay
earchsay orfay aay omfortablecay ifelay anday aay eacefulpay olday ageay inay Acondomay. Ethay anarycay agecay owedshay atthay osethay
aimsay ereway ademay upay onay ethay urspay ofay ethay omentmay. Ememberingray atthay erhay othermay adhay oldtay erhay inay aay
etterlay aboutay ethay exterminationay ofay ethay irdsbay, eshay adhay elayedday erhay iptray everalsay onthsmay untilay eshay oundfay aay
ipshay atthay oppedstay atay ethay Ortunatefay Islesay anday erethay eshay osechay ethay inestfay enty-fivetway airspay ofay anariescay
osay atthay eshay ouldcay epopulateray ethay iesskay ofay Acondomay. Atthay asway ethay ostmay amentablelay ofay erhay umerousnay
ustratedfray undertakingsay. Asay ethay irdsbay eproducedray Amarantaay Ursulaay ouldway eleaseray emthay inay airspay, anday
onay oonersay idday eythay eelfay emselvesthay eefray anthay eythay edflay ethay owntay. Eshay iedtray inay ainvay otay awakenay ovelay inay
emthay ybay eansmay ofay ethay irdbay agecay atthay Ursulaay adhay uiltbay uringday ethay irstfay econstructionray ofay ethay ousehay.
Alsoay inay ainvay ereway ethay artificialay estsnay uiltbay ofay espartoay assgray inay ethay almonday eestray anday ethay irdseedbay
ewnstray aboutay ethay oofsray, anday arousingay ethay aptivescay osay atthay eirthay ongssay ouldway issuadeday ethay esertersday,
ecausebay eythay ouldway aketay ightsflay onay eirthay irstfay attemptsay anday akemay aay urntay inay ethay yskay, ustjay ethay imetay
eedednay otay indfay ethay irectionday otay ethay Ortunatefay Islesay.

Aay yearay afteray erhay eturnray, althoughay eshay adhay otnay ucceededsay inay akingmay anyay iendsfray oray ivinggay anyay
artiespay, Amarantaay Ursulaay illstay elievedbay atthay itay asway ossiblepay otay escueray ethay ommunitycay ichwhay adhay eenbay
ingledsay outay ybay isfortunemay. Astongay, erhay usbandhay, ooktay arecay otnay otay antagonizeay erhay, althoughay incesay atthay
atalfay oonnay enwhay ehay otgay offay ethay aintray ehay ealizedray atthay ishay ife’sway eterminationday adhay eenbay ovokedpray ybay
aay ostalgicnay iragemay. Ertaincay atthay eshay ouldway ebay efeatedday ybay ethay ealitiesray, ehay idday otnay evenay aketay ethay
oubletray otay utpay ishay elocipedevay ogethertay, utbay ehay etsay aboutay untinghay orfay ethay argestlay eggsay amongay ethay
iderspay ebsway atthay ethay asonsmay adhay ockedknay ownday, anday ehay ouldway openay emthay ithway ishay ingernailsfay anday
endspay ourshay ookinglay oughthray aay agnifyingmay assglay atay ethay inytay idersspay atthay emergeday. Aterlay onay, inkingthay
atthay Amarantaay Ursulaay asway ontinuingcay ithway erhay epairsray osay atthay erhay andshay ouldway otnay ebay idleay, ehay
ecidedday otay assembleay ethay andsomehay icyclebay, onay ichwhay ethay ontfray eelwhay asway uchmay argerlay anthay ethay earray
oneay, anday ehay edicatedday imselfhay otay ethay apturecay anday uringcay ofay everyay ativenay insectay ehay ouldcay indfay inay ethay
egionray, ichwhay ehay entsay inay amjay arsjay otay ishay ormerfay ofessorpray ofay aturalnay istoryhay atay ethay Universityay ofay Iegelay
erewhay ehay adhay oneday advanceday orkway inay entomologyay, althoughay ishay ainmay ocationvay asway atthay ofay aviatoray.
Enwhay ehay oderay ethay icyclebay ehay ouldway earway acrobat’say ightstay, audygay ockssay, anday aay Erlockshay Olmeshay apcay,
utbay enwhay ehay asway onay ootfay ehay ouldway essdray inay aay otlessspay aturalnay inenlay uitsay, itewhay oesshay, aay ilksay owbay ietay, aay
awstray oaterbay, anday ehay ouldway arrycay aay illowway ickstay inay ishay andhay. Ishay alepay eyesay accentuateday ishay ooklay ofay aay
ailorsay anday ishay allsmay ustachemay ookedlay ikelay ethay urfay ofay aay uirrelsqay. Althoughay ehay asway atay eastlay ifteenfay yearsay
olderay anthay ishay ifeway, ishay alertay eterminationday otay akemay erhay appyhay anday ishay ualitiesqay asay aay oodgay overlay
ompensatedcay orfay ethay ifferenceday. Actuallyay, osethay owhay awsay atthay anmay inay ishay ortiesfay ithway arefulcay abitshay,
ithway ethay eashlay arounday ishay ecknay anday ishay ircuscay icyclebay, ouldway otnay avehay oughtthay atthay ehay adhay ademay aay
actpay ofay unbridleday ovelay ithway ishay ifeway anday atthay eythay othbay avegay inay otay ethay eciprocalray ivedray inay ethay eastlay
adequateay ofay acesplay anday ereverwhay ethay iritspay ovedmay emthay, asay eythay adhay oneday incesay eythay adhay eganbay otay
eepkay ompanycay, anday ithway aay assionpay atthay ethay assagepay ofay imetay anday ethay oremay anday oremay unusualay
ircumstancescay eepenedday anday enricheday. Astongay asway otnay onlyay aay iercefay overlay, ithway endlessay isdomway anday
imaginationay, utbay ehay asway alsoay, erhapspay, ethay irstfay anmay inay ethay istoryhay ofay ethay eciesspay owhay adhay ademay anay
emergencyay andinglay anday adhay omecay oseclay otay illingkay imselfhay anday ishay eetheartsway implysay otay akemay ovelay inay aay
ieldfay ofay ioletsvay.

Eythay adhay etmay otway yearsay eforebay eythay ereway arriedmay, enwhay ethay ortsspay iplanebay inay ichwhay ehay asway
akingmay ollsray overay ethay oolschay erewhay Amarantaay Ursulaay asway udyingstay ademay anay intrepiday aneuvermay otay
avoiday ethay agpoleflay anday ethay imitivepray ameworkfray ofay anvascay anday aluminumay oilfay asway aughtcay ybay ethay ailtay
onay omesay electricay iresway. Omfray enthay onay, ayingpay onay attentionay otay ishay eglay inay intssplay, onay eekendsway ehay
ouldway ickpay upay Amarantaay Ursulaay atay ethay un’snay oardinghousebay erewhay eshay ivedlay, erewhay ethay ulesray ereway
otnay asay everesay asay Ernandafay adhay antedway, anday ehay ouldway aketay erhay otay ishay ountrycay ubclay. Eythay eganbay otay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


ovelay eachay otheray atay anay altitudeay ofay ifteenfay undredhay eetfay inay ethay Undaysay airay ofay ethay oorsmay, anday eythay eltfay allay
ethay oserclay ogethertay asay ethay eingsbay onay earthay ewgray oremay anday oremay inutemay. Eshay okespay otay imhay ofay
Acondomay asay ethay ightestbray anday ostmay eacefulpay owntay onay earthay, anday ofay anay enormousay ousehay, entedscay
ithway oreganoay, erewhay eshay antedway otay ivelay untilay olday ageay ithway aay oyallay usbandhay anday otway ongstray onssay owhay
ouldway ebay amednay Odrigoray anday Onzalogay, evernay Aurelianoay anday Osejay Arcadioay, anday aay aughterday owhay
ouldway ebay amednay Irginiavay anday evernay Emediosray. Eshay adhay evokeday ethay owntay idealizeday ybay ostalgianay ithway
uchsay ongstray enacitytay atthay Astongay understooday atthay eshay ouldway otnay etgay arriedmay unlessay ehay ooktay erhay otay
ivelay inay Acondomay. Ehay agreeday otay itay, asay ehay agreeday aterlay onay otay ethay eashlay, ecausebay ehay oughtthay itay asway aay
assingpay ancyfay atthay ouldcay ebay overcomeay inay imetay. Utbay enwhay otway yearsay inay Acondomay adhay assedpay anday
Amarantaay Ursulaay asway asay appyhay asay onay ethay irstfay ayday, ehay eganbay otay owshay ignssay ofay alarmay. Ybay atthay imetay ehay
adhay issectedday everyay issectibleday insectay inay ethay egionray, ehay okespay Anishspay ikelay aay ativenay, anday ehay adhay olvedsay
allay ofay ethay osswordcray uzzlespay inay ethay agazinesmay atthay ehay eceivedray inay ethay ailmay. Ehay idday otnay avehay ethay
etextpray ofay imateclay otay astenhay eirthay eturnray ecausebay aturenay adhay endoweday imhay ithway aay olonialcay iverlay ichwhay
esistedray ethay owsinessdray ofay iestasay imetay anday aterway atthay adhay inegarvay ormsway inay itay. Ehay ikedlay ethay ativenay
ookingcay osay uchmay atthay onceay ehay ateay eighty-twoay iguanaay eggsay atay oneay ittingsay. Amarantaay Ursulaay, onay ethay
otheray andhay, adhay oughtbray inay ybay aintray ishfay anday ellfishshay inay oxesbay ofay iceay, annedcay eatsmay anday eservedpray
uitsfray, ichwhay ereway ethay onlyay ingsthay eshay ouldcay eatay, anday eshay illstay esseddray inay Europeanay ylestay anday eceivedray
esignsday ybay ailmay inay itespay ofay ethay actfay atthay eshay adhay onay aceplay otay ogay anday onay oneay otay isitvay anday ybay atthay imetay
erhay usbandhay asway otnay inay aay oodmay otay appreciateay erhay ortshay irtsskay, erhay iltedtay eltfay athay, anday erhay even-strandsay
ecklacesnay. Erhay ecretsay eemedsay otay ielay inay ethay actfay atthay eshay alwaysay oundfay aay ayway otay eepkay usybay, esolvingray
omesticday oblemspray atthay eshay erselfhay adhay eatedcray, anday oingday aay oorpay objay onay aay ousandthay ingsthay ichwhay
eshay ouldway ixfay onay ethay ollowingfay ayday ithway aay erniciouspay iligenceday atthay ademay oneay inkthay ofay Ernandafay anday
ethay ereditaryhay icevay ofay akingmay omethingsay ustjay otay unmakeay itay. Erhay estivefay eniusgay asway illstay osay aliveay enthay
atthay enwhay eshay eceivedray ewnay ecordsray eshay ouldway inviteay Astongay otay aystay inay ethay arlorpay untilay eryvay atelay otay
acticepray ethay anceday epsstay atthay erhay oolmatesschay escribedday otay erhay inay etchesskay anday eythay ouldway enerallygay
enday upay akingmay ovelay onay ethay Iennesevay ockingray airschay oray onay ethay arebay oorflay. Ethay onlyay ingthay atthay eshay
eedednay otay ebay ompletelycay appyhay asway ethay irthbay ofay erhay ildrenchay, utbay eshay espectedray ethay actpay eshay adhay
ademay ithway erhay usbandhay otnay otay avehay anyay untilay eythay adhay eenbay arriedmay orfay ivefay yearsay.

Ookinglay orfay omethingsay otay illfay ishay idleay ourshay ithway, Astongay ecamebay accustomeday otay endingspay ethay
orningmay inay Elqufades’may oomray ithway ethay yshay Aurelianoay. Ehay ooktay easureplay inay ecallingray ithway imhay ethay
ostmay iddenhay ornerscay ofay ishay ountrycay, ichwhay Aurelianoay ewknay asay ifay ehay adhay entspay uchmay imetay erethay.
Enwhay Astongay askeday imhay atwhay ehay adhay oneday otay obtainay owledgeknay atthay asway otnay inay ethay encyclopediaay,
ehay eceivedray ethay amesay answeray asay Osejay Arcadioay: Everything“ay Isay own.”knay Inay additionay otay Anskritsay ehay adhay
earnedlay Englishay anday Enchfray anday aay ittlelay Atinlay anday Eekgray. Incesay ehay entway outay everyay afternoonay atay atthay
imetay anday Amarantaay Ursulaay adhay etsay asideay aay eeklyway umsay orfay imhay orfay ishay ersonalpay expensesay, ishay oomray
ookedlay ikelay aay anchbray ofay ethay iseway Atalonian’scay ookstorebay. Ehay eadray avidlyay untilay atelay atay ightnay, althoughay
omfray ethay annermay inay ichwhay ehay eferredray otay ishay eadingray, Astongay oughtthay atthay ehay idday otnay uybay ethay ooksbay
inay orderay otay earnlay utbay otay erifyvay ethay tmthay ofay ishay owledgeknay, anday atthay onenay ofay emthay interesteday imhay
oremay anthay ethay archmentspay, otay ichwhay ehay edicatedday ostmay ofay ishay imetay inay ethay orningmay. Othbay Astongay anday
ishay ifeway ouldway avehay ikedlay otay incorporateay imhay intoay ethay amilyfay ifelay, utbay Aurelianoay asway aay ermetichay anmay
ithway aay oudclay ofay ysterymay atthay imetay asway akingmay enserday. Itay asway uchsay anay unfathomableay onditioncay atthay
Astongay ailedfay inay ishay effortsay otay ecomebay intimateay ithway imhay anday adhay otay eeksay otheray astimespay orfay ishay idleay
ourshay. Itay asway arounday atthay imetay atthay ehay onceivedcay ethay ideaay ofay establishingay anay airmailay ervicesay.

Itay asway otnay aay ewnay ojectpray. Actuallyay, ehay adhay itay airlyfay ellway advanceday enwhay ehay etmay Amarantaay Ursulaay,
exceptay atthay itay asway otnay orfay Acondomay, utbay orfay ethay Elgianbay Ongocay, erewhay ishay amilyfay adhay investmentsay inay
almpay oilay. Ethay arriagemay anday ethay ecisionday otay endspay aay ewfay onthsmay inay Acondomay otay easeplay ishay ifeway adhay
obligeday imhay otay ostponepay itay. Utbay enwhay ehay awsay atthay Amarantaay Ursulaay asway eterminedday otay organizeay aay
ommissioncay orfay ublicpay improvementay anday evenay aughedlay atay imhay enwhay ehay intedhay atay ethay ossibilitypay ofay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


eturningray, ehay understooday atthay ingsthay ereway oinggay otay aketay aay onglay imetay anday ehay eestablishedray ontactcay
ithway ishay orgottenfay artnerspay inay Usselsbray, inkingthay atthay itay asway ustjay asay ellway otay ebay aay ioneerpay inay ethay
Aribbeancay asay inay Africaay. Ilewhay ishay epsstay ereway ogressingpray ehay eparedpray aay andinglay ieldfay inay ethay olday
enchanteday egionray ichwhay atay atthay imetay ookedlay ikelay aay ainplay ofay ushedcray intstoneflay, anday ehay udiedstay ethay
indway irectionday, ethay eographygay ofay ethay oastalcay egionray, anday ethay estbay outesray orfay aerialay avigationnay, ithoutway
owingknay atthay ishay iligenceday, osay imilarsay otay atthay ofay Mr.ay Erberthay, asway illingfay ethay owntay ithway ethay angerousday
uspicionsay atthay ishay anplay asway otnay otay etsay upay outesray utbay otay antplay ananabay eestray. Enthusiasticay overay ethay ideaay
atthay, afteray allay, ightmay ustifyjay ishay ermanentpay establishmentay inay Acondomay, ehay ooktay everalsay ipstray otay ethay
apitalcay ofay ethay ovincepray, etmay ithway authoritiesay, obtaineday icenseslay, anday ewdray upay ontractscay orfay exclusiveay
ightsray. Inay ethay eantimemay ehay aintainedmay aay orrespondencecay ithway ishay artnerspay inay Usselsbray ichwhay
esembledray atthay ofay Ernandafay ithway ethay invisibleay octorsday, anday ehay inallyfay onvincedcay emthay otay ipshay ethay
irstfay airplaneay underay ethay arecay ofay anay expertay echanicmay, owhay ouldway assembleay itay inay ethay earestnay ortpay anday
yflay itay otay Acondomay. Oneay yearay afteray ishay irstfay editationsmay anday eteorologicalmay alculationscay, ustingtray inay ethay
epeatedray omisespray ofay ishay orrespondentscay, ehay adhay acquireday ethay abithay ofay ollingstray oughthray ethay eetsstray,
ookinglay atay ethay yskay, anginghay ontoay ethay oundsay ofay ethay eezebray inay opeshay atthay ethay airplaneay ouldway appearay.

Althoughay eshay adhay otnay oticednay itay, ethay eturnray ofay Amarantaay Ursulaay adhay oughtbray onay aay adicalray angechay
inay Aureliano’say ifelay. Afteray ethay eathday ofay Osejay Arcadioay ehay adhay ecomebay aay egularray ustomercay atay ethay iseway
Atalonian’scay ookstorebay. Alsoay, ethay eedomfray atthay ehay enjoyeday enthay anday ethay imetay atay ishay isposalday awokeay inay
imhay aay ertaincay uriositycay aboutay ethay owntay, ichwhay ehay amecay otay owknay ithoutway anyay urprisesay. Ehay entway
oughthray ethay ustyday anday olitarysay eetsstray, examiningay ithway ientificscay interestay ethay insideay ofay ouseshay inay inmay,
ethay etalmay eensscray onay ethay indowsway okenbray ybay mstay anday ethay yingday irdsbay, anday ethay inhabitantsay owedbay
ownday ybay emoriesmay. Ehay iedtray otay econstructray inay ishay imaginationay ethay annihilateday endorsplay ofay ethay olday
anana-companybay owntay, osewhay ydray immingsway oolpay asway illedfay otay ethay imbray ithway ottingray en’smay anday
omen’sway oesshay, anday inay ethay ouseshay ofay ichwhay, estroyedday ybay yeray assgray, ehay oundfay ethay eletonskay ofay aay
Ermangay epherdshay ogday illstay iedtay otay aay ingray ybay aay eelstay ainchay anday aay elephonetay atthay asway ingingray, ingingray,
ingingray untilay ehay ickedpay itay upay anday anay anguisheday anday istantday omanway okespay inay Englishay, anday ehay aidsay yesay,
atthay ethay ikestray asway overay, atthay eethray ousandthay eadday eoplepay adhay eenbay ownthray intoay ethay easay, atthay ethay
ananabay ompanycay adhay eftlay, anday atthay Acondomay inallyfay adhay eacepay afteray anymay yearsay. Osethay anderingsway
edlay imhay otay ethay ostratepray ed-lightray istrictday, erewhay inay otheray imestay undlesbay ofay anknotesbay adhay eenbay
urnedbay otay ivenlay upay ethay evelsray, anday ichwhay atay atthay imetay asway aay azemay ofay eetsstray oremay afflicteday anday
iserablemay anthay ethay othersay, ithway aay ewfay edray ightslay illstay urningbay anday ithway esertedday anceday allshay adorneday
ithway ethay emnantsray ofay eathswray, erewhay ethay alepay, atfay idowsway ofay onay oneay, ethay Enchfray eat-grandmothersgray
anday ethay Abylonianbay atriarchsmay, ereway illstay aitingway esidebay eirthay otographsphay. Aurelianoay ouldcay otnay indfay
anyoneay owhay ememberedray ishay amilyfay, otnay evenay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay, exceptay orfay ethay oldestay ofay
ethay Estway Indianay Egroesnay, anay olday anmay osewhay ottonycay airhay avegay imhay ethay ooklay ofay aay otographicphay ega¬nay
ivetay anday owhay asway illstay ingingsay ethay ournfulmay unsetsay almspsay inay ethay oorday ofay ishay ousehay. Aurelianoay ouldway
alktay otay imhay inay ethay orturedtay Apiamentopay atthay ehay adhay earnedlay inay aay ewfay eeksway anday ometimessay ehay ouldway
areshay ishay icken-headchay oupsay, eparedpray ybay ethay eat-granddaughtergray, ithway imhay. Eshay asway aay argelay ackblay
omanway ithway olidsay onesbay, ethay ipshay ofay aay aremay, eatstay ikelay ivelay elonsmay, anday aay oundray anday erfectpay eadhay
armoreday ithway aay ardhay urfacesay ofay iryway airhay ichwhay ookedlay ikelay aay edievalmay arrior’sway ailmay eaddresshay. Erhay
amenay asway Igromantanay. Inay osethay aysday Aurelianoay ivedlay offay ethay alesay ofay ilverwaresay, andlestickscay, anday
otheray ic-a-bracbray omfray ethay ousehay. Enwhay ehay asway ennilesspay, ichwhay asway ostmay ofay ethay imetay, ehay otgay
eoplepay inay ethay ackbay ofay ethay arketmay otay ivegay imhay ethay ickenchay eadshay atthay eythay ereway oinggay otay owthray awayay
anday ehay ouldway aketay emthay otay Igromantanay otay akemay erhay oupssay, ortifiedfay ithway urslanepay anday easonedsay
ithway intmay. Enwhay ethay eat-grandfathergray iedday Aurelianoay oppedstay oinggay ybay ethay ousehay, utbay ehay ouldway unray
intoay Igromantanay underay ethay arkday almonday eestray onay ethay uaresqay, usingay erhay ild-animalway istleswhay otay urelay
ethay ewfay ightnay owlsay. Anymay imestay ehay ayedstay ithway erhay, eakingspay inay Apiamentopay aboutay icken-headchay oupsay
anday otheray aintiesday ofay iserymay, anday ehay ouldway avehay eptkay ightray onay ifay eshay adhay otnay etlay imhay owknay atthay ishay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


esencepray ightenedfray offay ustomerscay. Althoughay ehay ometimessay eltfay ethay emptationtay anday althoughay
Igromantanay erselfhay ightmay avehay eemedsay otay imhay asay ethay aturalnay ulminationcay ofay aay aredshay ostalgianay, ehay
idday otnay ogay otay edbay ithway erhay. Osay Aurelianoay asway illstay aay irginvay enwhay Amarantaay Ursulaay eturnedray otay
Acondomay anday avegay imhay aay isterlysay embraceay atthay eftlay imhay eathlessbray. Everyay imetay ehay awsay erhay, anday orseway
yetay enwhay eshay owedshay imhay ethay atestlay ancesday, ehay eltfay ethay amesay ongyspay eleaseray inay ishay onesbay atthay adhay
isturbedday ishay eat-great-grandfathergray enwhay Ilarpay Erneratay ademay erhay etextspray aboutay ethay ardscay inay ethay
anarygray. Yingtray otay uelchsqay ethay ormenttay, ehay anksay eeperday intoay ethay archmentspay anday eludeday ethay innocentay
atteryflay ofay atthay auntay owhay asway oisoningpay ishay ightsnay ithway aay owflay ofay ibulationtray, utbay ethay oremay ehay
avoideday erhay ethay oremay ethay anxietyay ithway ichwhay ehay aitedway orfay erhay onystay aughterlay, erhay owlshay ofay aay appyhay
atcay, anday erhay ongssay ofay atitudegray, agonizingay inay ovelay atay allay ourshay anday inay ethay ostmay unlikelyay artspay ofay ethay
ousehay. Oneay ightnay irtythay eetfay omfray ishay edbay, onay ethay ilversay orkbenchway, ethay ouplecay ithway unhingeday elliesbay
okebray ethay ottlesbay anday endeday upay akingmay ovelay inay aay oolpay ofay uriaticmay aciday. Aurelianoay otnay onlyay ouldcay otnay
eepslay orfay aay inglesay econdsay, utbay ehay entspay ethay extnay ayday ithway aay everfay, obbingsay ithway ageray. Ethay irstfay ightnay
atthay ehay aitedway orfay Igromantanay otay omecay otay ethay adowsshay ofay ethay almonday eestray itay eemedsay ikelay anay
eternityay, ickedpray asay ehay asway ybay ethay eedlesnay ofay uncertaintyay anday utchingclay inay ishay istfay ethay esopay anday iftyfay
entscay atthay ehay adhay askeday Amarantaay Ursulaay orfay, otnay osay uchmay ecausebay ehay eedednay itay asay otay involveay erhay,
ebaseday erhay, ostitutepray erhay inay ishay adventureay inay omesay ayway. Igromantanay ooktay imhay otay erhay oomray, ichwhay
asway ightedlay ithway alsefay andlestickscay, otay erhay oldingfay otcay ithway ethay eddingbay ainedstay omfray adbay oveslay, anday
otay erhay odybay ofay aay ildway ogday, ardenedhay anday ithoutway oulsay, ichwhay eparedpray itselfay otay ismissday imhay asay ifay ehay
ereway aay ightenedfray ildchay, anday uddenlysay itay oundfay aay anmay osewhay emendoustray owerpay emandedday aay
ovementmay ofay eismicsay eadjustmentray omfray erhay insidesay.

Eythay ecamebay overslay. Aurelianoay ouldway endspay ishay orningsmay ecipheringday archmentspay anday atay iestasay
imetay ehay ouldway ogay otay ethay edroombay erewhay Igromantanay asway aitingway orfay imhay, otay eachtay imhay irstfay owhay otay
oday itay ikelay earthwormsay, enthay ikelay ailssnay, anday inallyfay ikelay abscray, untilay eshay adhay otay eavelay imhay anday ielay inay aitway
orfay agabondvay oveslay. Everalsay eeksway assedpay eforebay Aurelianoay iscoveredday atthay arounday erhay aistway eshay
oreway aay allsmay eltbay atthay eemedsay otay ebay ademay outay ofay aay ellocay ingstray, utbay ichwhay asway ardhay asay eelstay anday adhay
onay enday, asay ifay itay adhay eenbay ornbay anday owngray ithway erhay. Almostay alwaysay, etweenbay oveslay, eythay ouldway eatay
akednay inay ethay edbay, inay ethay allucinatinghay eathay anday underay ethay aytimeday arsstay atthay ethay mstay adhay ausedcay otay
ineshay onay ethay inczay eilingcay. Itay asway ethay irstfay imetay atthay Igromantanay adhay adhay aay eadystay anmay, aay onebay ercmshay
omfray eadhay otay oetay, asay eshay erselfhay aidsay, yingday ithway aughterlay, anday eshay adhay evenay egunbay otay etgay omanticray
illusionsay enwhay Aurelianoay onfidedcay inay erhay aboutay ishay epressedray assionpay orfay Amarantaay Ursulaay, ichwhay ehay
adhay otnay eenbay ableay otay urecay ithway ethay ubstitutionsay utbay ichwhay asway istingtway imhay insideay allay ethay oremay asay
experienceay oadenedbray ethay orizonshay ofay ovelay. Afteray atthay Igromantanay ontinuedcay otay eceiveray imhay ithway
ethay amesay armthway asay everay utbay eshay ademay imhay aypay orfay erhay ervicessay osay ictlystray atthay enwhay Aurelianoay adhay
onay oneymay eshay ouldway akemay anay additionay otay ishay illbay, ichwhay asway otnay iguredfay inay umbersnay utbay ybay arksmay
atthay eshay ademay ithway erhay umbnailthay ehindbay ethay oorday. Atay undownsay, ilewhay eshay asway iftingdray oughthray ethay
adowsshay inay ethay uaresqay, Aurelianoay, asway oinggay alongay ethay orchpay ikelay aay angerstray, arcelyscay eetinggray
Amarantaay Ursulaay anday Astongay, owhay usuallyay inedday atay atthay imetay, anday uttingshay erselfhay upay inay ishay oomray
againay, unableay otay eadray oray itewray oray evenay inkthay ecausebay ofay ethay anxietyay oughtbray onay ybay ethay aughterlay, ethay
isperingwhay, ethay eliminarypray olicsfray, anday enthay ethay explosionsay ofay agonizingay appinesshay atthay appedcay ethay
ightsnay inay ethay ousehay. Atthay asway ishay ifelay otway yearsay eforebay Astongay eganbay otay aitway orfay ethay airplaneay, anday itay
entway onay ethay amesay ayway onay ethay afternoonay atthay ehay entway otay ethay ookstorebay ofay ethay iseway Ataloniancay anday
oundfay ourfay antingray oysbay inay aay eatedhay argumentay aboutay ethay ethodsmay useday otay illkay ockroachescay inay ethay
Iddlemay Agesay. Ethay olday ooksellerbay, owingknay aboutay Aureliano’say ovelay orfay ooksbay atthay adhay eenbay eadray onlyay
ybay ethay Enerablevay Edebay, urgeday imhay ithway aay ertaincay atherlyfay alicemay otay etgay intoay ethay iscussionday, anday
ithoutway evenay akingtay aay eathbray, ehay explaineday atthay ethay ockroachcay, ethay oldestay ingedway insectay onay ethay acefay
ofay ethay earthay, adhay alreadyay eenbay ethay ictimvay ofay ippersslay inay ethay Olday Estamenttay, utbay atthay incesay ethay eciesspay
asway efinitelyday esistantray otay anyay anday allay ethodsmay ofay exterminationay, omfray omatotay icesday ithway oraxbay otay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


ourflay anday ugarsay, anday ithway itsay oneay ousandthay ixsay undredhay eethray arietiesvay adhay esistedray ethay ostmay ancientay,
enacioustay, anday itilesspay ersecutionpay atthay ankindmay adhay unleasheday againstay anyay ivinglay ingthay incesay ethay
eginningsbay, includingay anmay imselfhay, otay uchsay anay extentay atthay ustjay asay anay instinctay orfay eproductionray asway at¬ay
ibutedtray otay umankindhay, osay erethay ustmay avehay eenbay anotheray oneay oremay efiniteday anday essingpray, ichwhay asway
ethay instinctay otay illkay ockroachescay, anday ifay ethay atterlay adhay ucceededsay inay escapingay umanhay erocityfay itay asway
ecausebay eythay adhay akentay efugeray inay ethay adowsshay, erewhay eythay ecamebay invulnerableay ecausebay ofay an’smay
ongenitalcay earfay ofay ethay arkday, utbay onay ethay otheray andhay eythay ecamebay usceptiblesay otay ethay owglay ofay oonnay, osay
atthay ybay ethay Iddlemay Agesay alreadyay, anday inay esentpray imestay, anday erpay omniaay eculasay eculommsay  ethay onlyay effectiveay
ethodmay orfay illingkay ockroachescay asway ethay areglay ofay ethay unsay.

Atthay encyclopedicay oincidencecay asway ethay eginningbay ofay aay eatgray iendshipfray. Aurelianoay ontinuedcay
ettinggay ogethertay inay ethay afternoonay ithway ethay ourfay arguersay, osewhay amesnay ereway Alvaroay, Ermangay,
Alfonsoay, anday Abrielgay, ethay irstfay anday astlay iendsfray atthay ehay everay adhay inay ishay ifelay. Orfay aay anmay ikelay imhay, oledhay
upay inay ittenwray ealityray, osethay ormystay essionssay atthay eganbay inay ethay ookstorebay anday endeday atay awnday inay ethay
othelsbray ereway aay evelationray. Itay adhay evernay occurreday otay imhay untilay enthay otay inkthay atthay iteraturelay asway ethay
estbay aythingplay atthay adhay everay eenbay inventeday otay akemay unfay ofay eoplepay, asay Alvaroay emonstratedday uringday
oneay ightnay ofay evelsray. Omesay imetay ouldway avehay otay asspay eforebay Aurelianoay ealizedray atthay uchsay arbitraryay
attitudesay adhay eirthay originsay inay ethay exampleay ofay ethay iseway Ataloniancay, orfay omwhay isdomway asway orthway
othingnay ifay itay ouldcay otnay ebay useday otay inventay aay ayway ofay eparingpray ickchay easpay.

Ethay afternoonay onay ichwhay Aurelianoay avegay ishay ecturelay onay ockroachescay, ethay argumentay endeday upay inay
ethay ousehay ofay ethay irlsgay owhay entway otay edbay ecausebay ofay ungerhay, aay othelbray ofay ieslay onay ethay outskirtsay ofay
Acondomay. Ethay oprietresspray asway aay ilingsmay amasantamay  ormentedtay ybay aay aniamay orfay openingay anday osingclay
oorsday. Erhay eternalay ilesmay eemedsay otay avehay eenbay oughtbray onay ybay ethay edulitycray ofay erhay ustomerscay, owhay
accepteday asay omethingsay ertaincay anay establishmentay atthay idday otnay existay exceptay inay ethay imaginationay, ecausebay
evenay ethay angibletay ingsthay erethay ereway unrealay: ethay urniturefay atthay ellfay apartay enwhay oneay atsay onay itay, ethay
isemboweledday onographphay ithway aay estingnay enhay insideay, ethay ardengay ofay aperpay owersflay, ethay alendarscay
oinggay ackbay otay ethay yearsay eforebay ethay arrivalay ofay ethay ananabay ompanycay, ethay amesfray ithway intspray utcay outay ofay
agazinesmay atthay adhay evernay eenbay ublishedpay. Evenay ethay imidtay ittlelay oreswhay owhay amecay omfray ethay eigh¬nay
orhoodbay: enwhay ethay oprietresspray informeday emthay atthay ustomerscay adhay arriveday eythay ereway othingnay utbay anay
inventionay. Eythay ouldway appearay ithoutway anyay eetinggray inay eirthay ittlelay oweredflay essesdray eftlay overay omfray aysday
enwhay eythay ereway ivefay yearsay youngeray, anday eythay ooktay emthay offay ithway ethay amesay innocenceay ithway ichwhay eythay
adhay utpay emthay onay, anday inay ethay aroxysmspay ofay ovelay eythay ouldway exclaimay oodgay eavenshay, ooklay owhay atthay
oofray isay allingfay inay, anday asay oonsay asay eythay otgay eirthay esopay anday iftyfay entscay eythay ouldway endspay itay onay aay ollray ithway
eesechay atthay ethay oprietresspray oldsay emthay, ilingsmay oremay anthay everay, ecausebay onlyay eshay ewknay atthay atthay ealmay
asway otnay uetray eitheray. Aurelianoay, osewhay orldway atay atthay imetay eganbay ithway Elquiades’may archmentspay anday
endeday inay Igromanta’snay edbay, oundfay aay upidstay urecay orfay imiditytay inay ethay allsmay imaginaryay othelbray. Atay irstfay
ehay ouldcay etgay owherenay, inay oomsray erewhay ethay oprietresspray ouldway enteray uringday ethay estbay omentsmay ofay ovelay
anday akemay allay ortssay ofay ommentscay aboutay ethay intimateay armschay ofay ethay otagonistspray. Utbay ithway imetay ehay
eganbay otay etgay osay amiliarfay ithway osethay isfortunesmay ofay ethay orldway atthay onay oneay ightnay atthay asway oremay
unbalanceday anthay ethay othersay ehay otgay undresseday inay ethay allsmay eceptionray oomray anday anray oughthray ethay ousehay
alancingbay aay ottlebay ofay eerbay onay ishay inconceivableay alenessmay. Ehay asway ethay oneay owhay ademay ashionablefay ethay
extravagancesay atthay ethay oprietresspray elebratedcay ithway erhay eternalay ilesmay, ithoutway otestingpray, ithoutway
elievingbay inay emthay ustjay asay enwhay Ermangay iedtray otay urnbay ethay ousehay ownday otay owshay atthay itay idday otnay existay,
anday asay enwhay Alfonsoay ungwray ethay ecknay ofay ethay arrotpay anday ewthray itay intoay ethay otpay erewhay ethay ickenchay ewstay
asway eginningbay otay oilbay.

Althoughay Aurelianoay eltfay imselfhay inkedlay otay ethay ourfay iendsfray ybay aay ommoncay affectionay anday aay ommoncay
olidaritysay, evenay otay ethay ointpay erewhay ehay oughtthay ofay emthay asay ifay eythay ereway oneay ersonpay, ehay asway oserclay otay
Abrielgay anthay otay ethay othersay. Ethay inklay asway ornbay onay ethay ightnay enwhay ehay asuallycay entionedmay Olonelcay
Aurelianoay Uendiabay anday Abrielgay asway ethay onlyay oneay owhay idday otnay inkthay atthay ehay asway akingmay unfay ofay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


omebodysay. Evenay ethay oprietresspray, owhay ormallynay idday otnay aketay artpay inay ethay onversationcay argueday ithway aay
adam’smay athfulwray assionpay atthay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendlabay, ofay omwhay eshay adhay indeeday eardhay eakspay atay
omesay imetay, asway aay igurefay inventeday ybay ethay overnmentgay asay aay etextpray orfay illingkay Iberalslay. Abrielgay, onay ethay
otheray andhay, idday otnay oubtday ethay ealityray ofay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay ecausebay ehay adhay eenbay aay
ompanioncay inay armsay anday inseparableay iendfray ofay ishay eat-great-grandfathergray Olonelcay Erineldogay
Arquezmay. Osethay icklefay ickstray ofay emorymay ereway evenay oremay iticalcray enwhay ethay illingkay ofay ethay orkersway asway
oughtbray upay. Everyay imetay atthay Aurelianoay entionedmay ethay attermay, otnay onlyay ethay oprietresspray utbay omesay
eoplepay olderay anthay eshay ouldway epudiateray ethay ythmay ofay ethay orkersway emmedhay inay atay ethay ationstay anday ethay
aintray ithway otway undredhay arscay oadedlay ithway eadday eoplepay, anday eythay ouldway evenay insistay atthay, afteray allay,
everythingay adhay eenbay etsay orthfay inay udicialjay ocumentsday anday inay imary-schoolpray extbookstay: atthay ethay
ananabay ompanycay adhay evernay existeday. Osay atthay Aurelianoay anday Abrielgay ereway inkedlay ybay aay indkay ofay omplic¬cay
ityay asedbay onay ealray actsfay atthay onay oneay elievedbay inay, anday ichwhay adhay affecteday eirthay iveslay otay ethay ointpay atthay
othbay ofay emthay oundfay emselvesthay offay oursecay inay ethay idetay ofay aay orldway atthay adhay endeday anday ofay ichwhay onlyay
ethay ostalgianay emainedray. Abrielgay ouldway eepslay ereverwhay imetay overtookay imhay. Aurelianoay utpay imhay upay
everalsay imestay inay ethay ilversay orkshopway, utbay ehay ouldway endspay ishay ightsnay awakeay, isturbedday ybay ethay oisenay ofay
ethay eadday eoplepay owhay alkedway oughthray ethay edroomsbay untilay awnday. Aterlay ehay urnedtay imhay overay otay
Igromantanay, owhay ooktay imhay otay erhay ell-usedway oomray enwhay eshay asway eefray anday utpay ownday ishay accountay ithway
erticalvay arksmay ehindbay ethay oorday inay ethay ewfay acesspay eftlay eefray ybay Aureliano’say ebtsday.

Inay itespay ofay eirthay isorderedday ifelay, ethay olewhay oupgray iedtray otay oday omethingsay ermanentpay atay ethay urgingay
ofay ethay iseway Ataloniancay. Itay asway ehay, ithway ishay experienceay asay aay ormerfay ofessorpray ofay assicalclay iteraturelay anday
ishay orehousestay ofay areray ooksbay, owhay otgay emthay otay endspay aay olewhay ightnay inay earchsay ofay ethay irty-sevenththay
amaticdray ituationsay inay aay owntay erewhay onay oneay adhay anyay interestay anyay oremay inay oinggay eyondbay imarypray
oolschay. Ascinatedfay ybay ethay iscoveryday ofay iendshipfray, ewilderedbay ybay ethay enchantmentsay ofay aay orldway ichwhay
adhay eenbay orbiddenfay otay imhay ybay Ernanda’sfay eannessmay, Aurelianoay abandoneday ethay inyscmtay ofay ethay
archmentspay eciselypray enwhay eythay ereway eginningbay otay evealray emselvesthay asay edictionspray inay odedcay ineslay ofay
oetrypay. Utbay ethay ubsequentsay oofpray atthay erethay asway imetay enoughay orfay everythingay ithoutway avinghay otay ivegay
upay ethay othelsbray avegay imhay ethay ivedray otay eturnray otay Elquiades’may oomray, avinghay ecidedday otnay otay agflay inay ishay
effortsay untilay ehay adhay iscoveredday ethay astlay eyskay. Atthay asway uringday ethay imetay atthay Astongay eganbay otay aitway orfay
ethay airplaneay anday Amarantaay Ursulaay asway osay onelylay atthay oneay orningmay eshay appeareday inay ethay oomray.

ello“Hay, annibal,”cay eshay aidsay otay imhay. ack“Bay inay youray avecay again?”ay

Eshay asway irresistibleay, ithway aay essdray eshay adhay esignedday anday oneay ofay ethay onglay ad-vertebrashay ecklacesnay
atthay eshay erselfhay adhay ademay. Eshay adhay oppedstay usingay ethay eashlay, onvincedcay ofay erhay usband’shay aithfulnessfay,
anday orfay ethay irstfay imetay incesay erhay eturnray eshay eemedsay otay avehay aay omentmay ofay easeay. Aurelianoay idday otnay eednay
otay eesay erhay otay owknay atthay eshay adhay arriveday. Eshay utpay erhay elbowsay onay ethay abletay, osay oseclay anday osay elplesshay
atthay Aurelianoay eardhay ethay eepday oundsay ofay erhay onesbay, anday eshay ecamebay interesteday inay ethay archmentspay.
Yingtray otay overcomeay ishay isturbanceday, ehay aspedgray atay ethay oicevay atthay ehay asway osinglay, ethay ifelay atthay asway
eavinglay imhay, ethay emorymay atthay asway urningtay intoay aay etrifiedpay olyppay, anday ehay okespay otay erhay aboutay ethay
iestlypray estinyday ofay Anskritsay, ethay ientificscay ossibilitypay ofay eeingsay ethay uturefay owingshay oughthray inay imetay asay
oneay eessay atwhay isay ittenwray onay ethay ackbay ofay aay eetshay ofay aperpay oughthray ethay ightlay, ethay ecessitynay ofay
ecipheringday ethay edictionspray osay atthay eythay ouldway otnay efeatday emselvesthay, anday ethay Enturiescay ofay
Ostradamusnay anday ethay estructionday ofay Antabriacay edictedpray ybay Aintsay Ilanusmay. Uddenlysay, ithoutway
interruptingay ethay atchay, ovedmay ybay anay impulseay atthay adhay eenbay eepingslay inay imhay incesay ishay originsay,
Aurelianoay utpay ishay andhay onay ershay, inkingthay atthay atthay inalfay ecisionday ouldway utpay anay enday otay Irisay oubtsday. Eshay
abbedgray ishay indexay ingerfay ithway ethay affectionateay innocenceay ithway ichwhay eshay adhay oneday osay inay ildhoodchay,
oweverhay, anday eshay eldhay itay ilewhay ehay eptkay onay answeringay uestionsqay. Eythay emainedray ikelay atthay, inkedlay ybay
icyay indexay ingersfay atthay idday otnay ansmittray anythingay inay anyay ayway untilay eshay awokeay omfray erhay omentarymay
eamdray anday appedslay erhay oreheadfay ithway erhay andhay. e“Thay ants!”ay eshay exclaimeday. Anday enthay eshay orgotfay
aboutay ethay anuscriptsmay, entway otay ethay oorday ithway aay anceday epstay, anday omfray erethay eshay ewthray Aurelianoay aay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


isskay ithway ethay ipstay ofay erhay ingersfay asay eshay adhay aidsay ood-byegay otay erhay atherfay onay ethay afternoonay enwhay eythay
entsay erhay otay Usselsbray.

You“ay ancay elltay emay ater,”lay eshay aidsay. I“ay orgotfay atthay oday’stay ethay ayday otay utpay uicklimeqay onay ethay anthills.”ay

Eshay ontinuedcay oinggay otay ethay oomray occasionallyay enwhay eshay adhay omethingsay otay oday inay atthay artpay ofay ethay
ousehay anday eshay ouldway aystay erethay orfay aay ewfay inutesmay ilewhay erhay usbandhay ontinuedcay otay utinizescray ethay yskay.
Encourageday ybay atthay angechay, Aurelianoay ayedstay otay eatay ithway ethay amilyfay atay atthay imetay asay ehay adhay otnay oneday
incesay ethay irstfay onthsmay ofay Amarantaay Ursula’say eturnray. Astongay asway easedplay. Uringday ethay onversationscay
afteray ealsmay, ichwhay usuallyay entway onay orfay oremay anthay anay ourhay, ehay omplainedcay atthay ishay artnerspay ereway
eceivingday imhay. Eythay adhay informeday imhay ofay ethay oadinglay ofay ethay airplaneay onay oardbay aay ipshay atthay idday otnay
arriveay, anday althoughay ishay ippingshay agentsay insisteday, atthay itay ouldway evernay arriveay ecausebay itay asway otnay onay ethay
istlay ofay Aribbeancay ipsshay, ishay artnerspay insisteday atthay ethay ipmentshay asway orrectcay anday eythay evenay insinuateday
atthay Astongay asway yinglay otay emthay inay ishay etterslay. Ethay orrespondencecay eachedray uchsay aay egreeday ofay utualmay
uspicionsay atthay Astongay ecidedday otnay otay itewray againay anday ehay eganbay otay uggestsay ethay ossibilitypay ofay aay uickqay
iptray otay Usselsbray otay earclay ingsthay upay anday eturnray ithway ethay airplaneay. Ethay anplay evaporateday, oweverhay, asay
oonsay asay Amarantaay Ursulaay eiteratedray erhay ecisionday otnay otay ovemay omfray Acondomay evenay ifay eshay ostlay aay
usbandhay. Uringday ethay irstfay aysday Aurelianoay aredshay ethay eneralgay opinionay atthay Astongay asway aay oolfay onay aay
elocipedevay, anday atthay oughtbray onay aay aguevay eelingfay ofay itypay. Aterlay, enwhay ehay obtaineday eeperday informationay
onay ethay aturenay ofay enmay inay ethay othelsbray, ehay oughtthay atthay Aston’sgay eeknessmay adhay itsay originsay inay unbridleday
assionpay. Utbay enwhay ehay amecay otay owknay imhay etterbay anday ealizedray ishay etmay aracterchay asway ethay oppositeay ofay
ishay ubmissivesay onductcay, ehay onceivedcay ethay aliciousmay uspicionsay atthay evenay ethay aitway orfay ethay airplaneay asway
anay actay. Enthay ehay oughtthay atthay Astongay asway otnay asay oolishfay asay ehay appeareday, utbay, uiteqay ethay ontrarycay, asway aay
anmay ofay infiniteay eadinessstay, abilityay, anday atiencepay owhay adhay etsay aboutay otay onquercay ishay ifeway ithway ethay
earinessway ofay eternalay agreementay, ofay evernay ayingsay onay, ofay imulatingsay aay imitlesslay onformitycay, ettinglay erhay
ecomebay enmesheday inay erhay ownay ebway untilay ethay ayday eshay ouldcay onay ongerlay earbay ethay ediumtay ofay ethay illusionsay
oseclay atay andhay anday ouldway ackpay ethay agsbay erselfhay otay ogay ackbay otay Europeay. Aureliano’say ormerfay itypay urnedtay
intoay aay iolentvay islikeday. Aston’sgay ystemsay eemedsay osay erversepay otay imhay, utbay atay ethay amesay imetay osay effectiveay,
atthay ehay enturedvay otay arnway Amarantaay Ursulaay. Eshay ademay unfay ofay ishay uspicionssay, oweverhay, ithoutway evenay
oticingnay ethay eavyweighthay ofay ovelay, uncertaintyay, anday ealousyjay atthay ehay adhay insideay. Itay adhay otnay occurreday otay
erhay atthay eshay asway arousingay omethingsay oremay anthay aternalfray affectionay inay Aurelianoay untilay eshay ickedpray erhay
ingerfay yingtray otay openay aay ancay ofay eachespay anday ehay ashedday overay otay ucksay ethay oodblay outay ithway anay avidityay anday
aay evotionday atthay entsay aay illchay upay erhay inespay.

Aureliano!”“ay Eshay aughedlay, isturbedday. You’re“ay ootay uspicioussay otay ebay aay oodgay at.”bay

Enthay Aurelianoay entway allay outay. Ivinggay erhay omesay allsmay, orphaneday isseskay inay ethay ollowhay ofay erhay
oundedway andhay, ehay openeday upay ethay ostmay iddenhay assagewayspay ofay ishay earthay anday ewdray outay anay
interminableay anday aceratedlay intestineay, ethay erribletay arasiticpay animalay atthay adhay incubateday inay ishay ar¬may
yrdomtay. Ehay oldtay erhay owhay ehay ouldway etgay upay atay idnightmay otay eepway inay onelinesslay anday ageray overay ethay
underwearay atthay eshay adhay eftlay otay ydray inay ethay athroombay. Ehay oldtay erhay aboutay ethay anxietyay ithway ichwhay ehay adhay
askeday Igromantanay otay owlhay ikelay aay atcay anday obsay astongay astongay astongay inay ishay earay, anday ithway owhay uchmay
astutenessay ehay adhay ansackedray erhay ialsvay ofay erfumepay osay atthay ehay ouldcay ellsmay itay onay ethay ecksnay ofay ethay ittlelay
irlsgay owhay entway otay edbay ecausebay ofay ungerhay. Ightenedfray ybay ethay assionpay ofay atthay outburstay, Amarantaay
Ursulaay asway osingclay erhay ingersfay, ontractingcay emthay ikelay aay ellfishshay untilay erhay oundedway andhay, eefray ofay allay
ainpay anday anyay estigevay ofay itypay, asway onvertedcay intoay aay otknay ofay emeraldsay anday opazestay anday onystay anday
unfeelingay onesbay.

ool!”“Fay eshay aidsay asay ifay eshay ereway ittingspay. I’m“ay ailingsay onay ethay irstfay ipshay eavinglay orfay Elgium.”bay

Alvaroay adhay omecay otay ethay iseway Atalonian’scay ookstorebay oneay ofay osethay afternoonsay oclaimingpray atay ethay
optay ofay ishay ungslay ishay atestlay iscoveryday: aay oologicalzay othelbray. Itay asway alledcay Ethay Oldengay Ildchay anday itay asway
aay ugehay openay airay alonsay oughthray ichwhay onay esslay anthay otway undredhay itternsbay owhay oldtay ethay imetay ithway aay
eafeningday acklingcay olledstray atay illway. Inay ireway enspay atthay urroundedsay ethay anceday oorflay anday amongay argelay
