Amazonianay amelliascay erethay ereway eronshay ofay ifferentday olorscay, ocodilescray asay atfay asay igspay, akessnay ithway
elvetway attlesray, anday aay urtletay ithway aay ildedgay ellshay owhay oveday inay aay allsmay artificialay oceanay. Erethay asway aay igbay
itewhay ogday, eekmay anday aay ederastpay, owhay ouldway ivegay udstay ervicessay everthelessnay inay orderay otay ebay edfay. Ethay
atmosphereay adhay anay innocentay ensenessday, asay ifay itay adhay ustjay eenbay eatedcray, anday ethay eautifulbay ulattomay irlsgay
owhay aitedway opelesslyhay amongay ethay ood-redblay etalspay anday ethay outmodeday onographphay ecordsray ewknay
aysway ofay ovelay atthay anmay adhay eftlay ehindbay orgottenfay inay ethay earthlyay aradisepay. Ethay irstfay ightnay atthay ethay
oupgray isitedvay atthay eenhousegray ofay illusionsay ethay endidsplay anday aciturntay olday omanway owhay uardedgay ethay
entranceay inay aay ickerway ockingray airchay eltfay atthay imetay asway urningtay ackbay otay itsay earliestay originsay enwhay amongay
ethay ivefay owhay ereway arrivingay eshay awsay aay onybay, aundicedjay anmay ithway Artartay eekboneschay, arkedmay oreverfay
anday omfray ethay eginningbay ofay ethay orldway ithway ethay oxpay ofay olitudesay.

ord“Lay, Ord,”lay eshay ighedsay, Aureliano!”“ay

Eshay asway eeingsay Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay onceay oremay asay eshay adhay eensay imhay inay ethay ightlay ofay aay amplay
onglay eforebay ethay arsway, onglay eforebay ethay esolationday ofay oryglay anday ethay exileay ofay isillusionmentday, atthay
emoteray awnday enwhay ehay entway otay erhay edroombay otay ivegay ethay irstfay ommandcay ofay ishay ifelay: ethay ommandcay otay
ivegay imhay ovelay. Itay asway Ilarpay Erneratay. Yearsay eforebay, enwhay eshay adhay eachedray oneay undredhay orty-fivefay yearsay
ofay ageay, eshay adhay ivengay upay ethay erniciouspay ustomcay ofay eepingkay acktray ofay erhay ageay anday eshay entway onay ivinglay inay
ethay aticstay anday arginalmay imetay ofay emoriesmay, inay aay uturefay erfectlypay evealedray anday establisheday, eyondbay ethay
uturesfay isturbedday ybay ethay insidiousay aressnay anday uppositionssay ofay erhay ardscay.

Omfray atthay ightnay onay Aurelianoay, ooktay efugeray inay ethay ompassionatecay endernesstay anday understandingay ofay
ishay unknownay eat-great-grandmothergray. Ittingsay inay erhay ickerway ockingray airchay, eshay ouldway ecallray ethay astpay,
econstmctray ethay andeurgray anday isfortunesmay ofay ethay amilyfay anday ethay endorsplay ofay Acondomay, ichwhay asway
ownay eraseday, ilewhay Alvaroay ightenedfray ethay ocodilescray ithway ishay oisynay aughterlay anday Alfonsoay inventeday
outlandishay oriesstay aboutay ethay itternsbay owhay adhay eckedpay outay ethay eyesay ofay ourfay ustomerscay owhay
isbehavedmay ethay eekway eforebay, anday Abrielgay asway inay ethay oomray ofay ethay ensivepay ulattomay irlgay owhay idday otnay
ollectcay inay oneymay utbay inay etterslay otay aay ugglersmay oyfriendbay owhay asway inay isonpray onay ethay otheray idesay ofay ethay
Orinocoay ecausebay ethay orderbay uardsgay adhay aughtcay imhay anday adhay ademay imhay itsay onay aay amberpotchay atthay
illedfay upay ithway aay ixturemay ofay itshay anday iamondsday. Atthay uetray othelbray, ithway atthay aternalmay oprietresspray, asway
ethay orldway ofay ichwhay Aurelianoay adhay eameddray uringday ishay olongedpray aptivitycay. Ehay eltfay osay ellway, osay oseclay
otay erfectpay ompanionshipcay, atthay ehay oughtthay ofay onay otheray efugeray onay ethay afternoonay onay ichwhay Amarantaay
Ursulaay adhay ademay ishay illusionsay umblecray. Ehay asway eadyray otay unburdenay imselfhay ithway ordsway osay atthay
omeonesay ouldcay eakbray ethay otsknay atthay oundbay ishay estchay, utbay ehay onlyay anagedmay otay etlay outay aay uidflay, armway,
anday estorativeray eepingway inay Ilarpay Ernera’stay aplay. Eshay etlay imhay inishfay, atchingscray ishay eadhay ithway ethay ipstay ofay
erhay ingersfay, anday ithoutway ishay avinghay evealedray atthay ehay asway eepingway omfray ovelay, eshay ecognizedray
immediatelyay ethay oldestay obssay inay ethay istoryhay ofay anmay.

It’s“ay allay ightray, ild,”chay eshay onsoledcay imhay. ow“Nay elltay emay owhay itay is.”ay

Enwhay Aurelianoay oldtay erhay, Ilarpay Erneratay etlay outay aay eepday aughlay, ethay olday expansiveay aughlay atthay endeday
upay asay aay ooingcay ofay ovesday. Erethay asway onay ysterymay inay ethay earthay ofay aay Uendiabay atthay asway impenetrableay orfay
erhay ecausebay aay enturycay ofay ardscay anday experienceay adhay aughttay erhay atthay ethay istoryhay ofay ethay amilyfay asway aay
achinemay ithway unavoidableay epetitionsray, aay urningtay eelwhay atthay ouldway avehay onegay onay illingspay intoay eternityay
ereway itay otnay orfay ethay ogressivepray anday irremediableay earingway ofay ethay axleay.

on’t“Day orry,”way eshay aidsay, ilingsmay. erever“Whay eshay isay ightray ownay, e’sshay aitingway orfay you.”ay

Itay asway alfhay astpay ourfay inay ethay afternoonay enwhay Amarantaay Ursulaay amecay outay ofay erhay athbay. Aurelianoay
awsay erhay ogay ybay ishay oomray ithway aay oberay ofay oftsay oldsfay anday aay oweltay appedwray arounday erhay eadhay ikelay aay urbantay.
Ehay ollowedfay erhay almostay onay iptoestay, umblingstay omfray ennessdmnkay, anday ehay entway intoay ethay uptialnay
edroombay ustjay asay eshay openeday ethay oberay anday osedclay itay againay inay ightfray. Ehay ademay aay ilentsay ignalsay owardtay ethay
extnay oomray erewhay ethay oorday asway alfhay openay anday erewhay Aurelianoay ewknay atthay Astongay asway eginningbay otay
itewray aay etterlay.

o“Gay away,”ay eshay aidsay oicelesslyvay.






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Aurelianoay, iledsmay, ickedpay erhay upay ybay ethay aistway ithway othbay andshay ikelay aay otpay ofay egoniasbay, anday
oppeddray erhay onay erhay ackbay onay ethay edbay. Ithway aay utalbray ugtay ehay ulledpay offay erhay athrobebay eforebay eshay adhay
imetay otay esistray anday ehay oomedlay overay anay abyssay ofay ewlynay ashedway uditynay osewhay inskay olorcay, ineslay ofay uzzfay,
anday iddenhay olesmay adhay allay eenbay imagineday inay ethay adowsshay ofay ethay otheray oomsray. Amarantaay Ursulaay
efendedday erselfhay incerelysay ithway ethay astutenessay ofay aay iseway omanway, easelingway erhay ipperyslay, exibleflay, anday
agrantfray easel’sway odybay asay eshay iedtray otay eeknay imhay inay ethay idneyskay anday orpionscay ishay acefay ithway erhay ailsnay,
utbay ithoutway eitheray ofay emthay ivinggay aay aspgay atthay ightmay otnay avehay eenbay akentay orfay atthay eathingbray ofay aay
ersonpay atchingway ethay eagermay Aprilay unsetsay oughthray ethay openay indowway. Itay asway aay iercefay ightfay, aay attlebay otay
ethay eathday, utbay itay eemedsay otay ebay ithoutway iolencevay ecausebay itay onsistedcay ofay istortedday attacksay anday ostlyghay
evasionsay, owslay, autiouscay, olemnsay, osay atthay uringday itay allay erethay asway imetay orfay ethay etuniaspay otay oomblay anday
orfay Astongay otay orgetfay aboutay ishay aviator’say eamdray inay ethay extnay oomray, asay ifay eythay ereway otway enemyay overslay
eekingsay econciliationray atay ethay ottombay ofay anay aquariumay. Inay ethay eathay ofay atthay avagesay anday eremoniouscay
ugglestray, Amarantaay Ursulaay understooday atthay erhay eticulousmay ilencesay asway osay irrationalay atthay itay ouldcay
awakenay ethay uspicionssay ofay erhay earbynay usbandhay uchmay oremay anthay ethay oundsay ofay arfareway atthay eythay ereway
yingtray otay avoiday. Enthay eshay eganbay otay aughlay ithway erhay ipslay ighttay ogethertay, ithoutway ivinggay upay ethay ightfay, utbay
efendingday erselfhay ithway alsefay itesbay anday eweaselingday erhay odybay ittlelay ybay ittlelay untilay eythay othbay ereway
onsciouscay ofay eingbay adversariesay anday accomplicesay atay ethay amesay imetay anday ethay affrayay egeneratedday intoay aay
onventionalcay ambolgay anday ethay attacksay ecamebay aressescay. Uddenlysay, almostay ayfullyplay, ikelay oneay oremay itbay
ofay ischiefmay, Amarantaay Ursulaay oppeddray erhay efenseday, anday enwhay eshay iedtray otay ecoverray, ightenedfray ybay
atwhay eshay erselfhay adhay ademay ossiblepay, itay asway ootay atelay. Aay eatgray ommotioncay immobilizeday erhay inay erhay
entercay ofay avitygray, antedplay erhay inay erhay aceplay, anday erhay efensiveday illway asway emolishedday ybay ethay irresistibleay
anxietyay otay iscoverday atwhay ethay orangeay istleswhay anday ethay invisibleay obesglay onay ethay otheray idesay ofay eathday ereway
ikelay. Eshay arelybay adhay imetay otay eachray outay erhay andhay anday opegray orfay ethay oweltay otay utpay aay aggay etweenbay erhay
eethtay osay atthay eshay ouldway otnay etlay outay ethay atcay owlshay atthay ereway alreadyay earingtay atay erhay insidesay.






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Apterchay 


ILARpay ERNERAtay iedday inay erhay ickerway ockingray airchay uringday oneay ightnay ofay estivitiesfay asay eshay atchedway overay
ethay entranceay otay erhay aradisepay. Inay accordanceay ithway erhay astlay ishesway eshay asway otnay uriedbay inay aay offincay utbay
ittingsay inay erhay ockerray, ichwhay eightay enmay oweredlay ybay opesray intoay aay ugehay olehay ugday inay ethay entercay ofay ethay
anceday oorflay. Ethay ulattomay irlsgay, esseddray inay ackblay, alepay omfray eepingway, inventeday adowyshay itesray asay eythay
ooktay offay eirthay earringsay, oochesbray, anday ingsray anday ewthray emthay intoay ethay itpay eforebay itay asway osedclay overay
ithway aay abslay atthay orebay eithernay amenay ornay atesday, anday atthay asway overedcay ithway aay ilepay ofay Amazonianay
amelliascay. Afteray oisoningpay ethay animalsay eythay osedclay upay ethay oorsday anday indowsway ithway ickbray anday ortarmay
anday eythay atteredscay outay intoay ethay orldway ithway eirthay oodenway unkstray atthay ereway inedlay ithway icturespay ofay
aintssay, intspray omfray agazinesmay, anday ethay ortraitspay ofay ometimesay eetheartssway, emoteray anday antasticfay, owhay
atshay iamondsday, oray ateay annibalscay, oray ereway ownedcray aying-cardplay ingskay onay ethay ighhay eassay.

Itay asway ethay enday. Inay Ilarpay Ernera’stay ombtay, amongay ethay almpsay anday eapchay orewhay ewelryjay, ethay uinsray ofay
ethay astpay ouldway otray, ethay ittlelay atthay emainedray afteray ethay iseway Ataloniancay adhay auctioneday offay ishay ookstorebay
anday eturnedray otay ethay Editerraneanmay illagevay erewhay ehay adhay eenbay ornbay, overcomeay ybay aay yearningay orfay aay
astinglay ingtimespray. Onay oneay ouldcay avehay oreseenfay ishay ecisionday. Ehay adhay arriveday inay Acondomay uringday ethay
endorsplay ofay ethay ananabay ompanycay, eeingflay omfray oneay ofay anymay arsway, anday othingnay oremay acticalpray adhay
occurreday otay imhay anthay otay etsay upay atthay ookshopbay ofay incunabulaay anday irstfay editionsay inay everalsay anguageslay,
ichwhay asualcay ustomerscay ouldway umbthay oughthray autiouslycay, asay ifay eythay ereway unkjay ooksbay, asay eythay aitedway
eirthay urntay otay avehay eirthay eamsdray interpreteday inay ethay ousehay acrossay ethay ayway. Ehay entspay alfhay ishay ifelay inay ethay
ackbay ofay ethay orestay, ibblingscray inay ishay extra-carefulay andhay inay urplepay inkay anday onay agespay atthay ehay oretay outay ofay
oolschay otebooksnay, anday onay oneay asway uresay exactlyay atwhay ehay asway itingwray. Enwhay Aurelianoay irstfay etmay imhay
ehay adhay otway oxesbay ofay osethay otleymay agespay atthay inay omesay ayway ademay oneay inkthay ofay Elquiades’may
archmentspay, anday omfray atthay imetay untilay ehay eftlay ehay adhay illedfay aay irdthay oneay, osay itay asway easonableray otay elievebay
atthay ehay adhay oneday othingnay elseay uringday ishay aystay inay Acondomay. Ethay onlyay eoplepay ithway omwhay ehay
aintainedmay elationsray ereway ethay ourfay iendsfray, omwhay ehay adhay exchangeday eirthay opstay anday iteskay orfay ooksbay,
anday ehay etsay emthay otay eadingray Enecasay anday Oviday ilewhay eythay ereway illstay inay ammargray oolschay. Ehay eatedtray ethay
assicalclay iterswray ithway aay ouseholdhay amiliarityfay, asay ifay eythay adhay allay eenbay ishay oommatesray atay omesay eriodpay,
anday ehay ewknay anymay ilingstay atthay ouldshay otnay avehay eenbay ownknay, uchsay asay ethay actfay atthay Aintsay Augustineay
oreway aay oolway acketjay underay ishay abithay atthay ehay idday otnay aketay offay orfay ourteenfay yearsay anday atthay Arnaldoay ofay
Illanovavay, ethay ecromancernay, asway impotentay incesay ildhoodchay ecausebay ofay aay orpionscay itebay. Ishay ervorfay orfay
ethay ittenwray ordway asway anay interweavingay ofay olemnsay espectray anday ossipygay irreverenceay. Otnay evenay ishay ownay
anuscriptsmay ereway afesay omfray atthay ualismday. Avinghay earnedlay Atalancay inay orderay otay anslatetray emthay, Alfonsoay
utpay aay ollray ofay agespay inay ishay ocketspay, ichwhay ereway alwaysay ullfay ofay ewspapernay ippingsclay anday anualsmay orfay
angestray adestray, anday oneay ightnay ehay ostlay emthay inay ethay ousehay ofay ethay ittlelay irlsgay owhay entway otay edbay ecausebay ofay
ungerhay. Enwhay ethay iseway olday andfathergray oundfay outay, insteaday ofay aisingray aay owray asay adhay eenbay earedfay, ehay
ommentedcay, yingday ithway aughterlay, atthay itay asway ethay aturalnay estinyday ofay iteraturelay. Onay ethay otheray andhay,
erethay asway onay umanhay owerpay apablecay ofay ersuadingpay imhay otnay otay aketay alongay ethay eethray oxesbay enwhay ehay
eturnedray otay ishay ativenay illagevay, anday ehay unleasheday aay ingstray ofay Arthaginiancay ursescay atay ethay ailroadray
inspectorsay owhay iedtray otay ipshay emthay asay eightfray untilay ehay inallyfay ucceededsay inay eepingkay emthay ithway imhay inay
ethay assengerpay oachcay. e“Thay orldway ustmay ebay allay uckedfay up,”ay ehay aidsay enthay, en“whay enmay aveltray irstfay assclay
anday iteraturelay oesgay asay eight.”fray Atthay asway ethay astlay ilingtay ehay asway eardhay otay aysay. Ehay adhay entspay aay arkday eekway
onay ethay inalfay eparationspray orfay ethay iptray, ecausebay asay ethay ourhay approacheday ishay umorhay asway eakingbray ownday
anday ingsthay eganbay otay ebay isplacedmay, anday atwhay ehay utpay inay oneay aceplay ouldway appearay inay anotheray, attackeday
ybay ethay amesay elvesay atthay adhay ormentedtay Ernandafay.

 Ollonscay  ehay ouldway ursecay. I“ay itshay onay Anoncay Enty-seventway ofay ethay Ynodsay ofay Ondon.”lay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Ermangay anday Aurelianoay ooktay arecay ofay imhay. Eythay elpedhay imhay ikelay aay ildchay, asteningfay Inisay icketstay anday
immigrationay ocumentsday otay ishay ocketspay ithway afetysay inspay, akingmay imhay aay etailedday istlay ofay atwhay ehay ustmay
oday omfray ethay imetay ehay eftlay Acondomay untilay ehay andedlay inay Arcelonabay, utbay onethelessnay ehay ewthray awayay aay
airpay ofay antspay ithway alfhay ofay Inisay oneymay inay itay ithoutway ealizingray itay. Ethay ightnay eforebay ethay iptray, afteray ailingnay
upay ethay oxesbay anday uttingpay ishay othingclay intoay ethay amesay uitcasesay atthay ehay adhay oughtbray enwhay ehay irstfay amecay,
ehay arrowednay ishay amclay eyesay, ointedpay ithway aay indkay ofay impudentay enedictionbay atay ethay acksstay ofay ooksbay ithway
ichwhay ehay adhay endureday uringday ishay exileay, anday aidsay otay Inisay iendsfray:

All“ay atthay itshay erethay Iay eavelay otay youay eople!”pay

Eethray onthsmay aterlay eythay eceivedray inay aay argelay envelopeay enty-ninetway etterslay anday oremay anthay iftyfay
icturespay atthay ehay adhay accumulateday uringday ethay eisurelay ofay ethay ighhay eassay. Althoughay ehay idday otnay ateday emthay,
ethay orderay inay ichwhay ehay adhay ittenwray ethay etterslay asway obviousay. Inay ethay irstfay onesay, ithway ishay ustomarycay oodgay
umorhay, ehay okespay aboutay ethay ifficultiesday ofay ethay ossingcray, ethay urgeay ehay adhay otay owthray ethay argocay officeray
overboarday enwhay ehay ouldway otnay etlay imhay eepkay ethay eethray oxesbay inay ishay abincay, ethay earclay imbecilityay ofay aay adylay
owhay asway errifiedtay atay ethay umbernay irteenthay, otnay outay ofay uperstitionsay utbay ecausebay eshay oughtthay itay asway aay
umbernay atthay adhay onay enday, anday ethay etbay atthay ehay adhay onway uringday ethay irstfay innerday ecausebay ehay adhay
ecognizedray inay ethay inkingdray aterway onay oardbay ethay astetay ofay ethay ighttimenay eetsbay ybay ethay ingsspray ofay Eridalay.
Ithway ethay assagepay ofay ethay aysday, oweverhay, ethay ealityray ofay ifelay onay oardbay atteredmay esslay anday esslay otay imhay anday
evenay ethay ostmay ecentray anday ivialtray appeningshay eemedsay orthyway ofay ostalgianay, ecausebay asay ethay ipshay otgay
artherfay awayay, ishay emorymay eganbay otay owgray adsay. Atthay ocesspray ofay ostalgianay asway alsoay evidentay inay ethay
icturespay. Inay ethay irstfay onesay ehay ookedlay appyhay, ithway ishay ortspay irtshay ichwhay ookedlay ikelay aay ospitalhay acketjay
anday ishay owysnay anemay, inay anay Octoberay Aribbeancay illedfay ithway itecapswhay. Inay ethay astlay onesay ehay ouldcay ebay
eensay otay ebay earingway aay arkday oatcay anday aay ilkmay arfscay, alepay inay ethay acefay, aciturntay omfray absenceay onay ethay eckday
ofay aay ournfulmay ipshay atthay adhay omecay otay ebay ikelay aay eepwalkerslay onay ethay autumnalay eassay. Ermangay anday Aureli¬ay
anoay answereday ishay etterslay. Ehay otewray osay anymay uringday ethay irstfay onthsmay atthay atay atthay imetay eythay eltfay oserclay
otay imhay anthay enwhay ehay adhay eenbay inay Acondomay, anday eythay ereway almostay eedfray omfray ethay ancorray atthay ehay adhay
eftlay ehindbay. Atay irstfay ehay oldtay emthay atthay everythingay asway ustjay ethay amesay, atthay ethay inkpay ailssnay ereway illstay inay
ethay ousehay erewhay ehay adhay eenbay ornbay, atthay ethay ydray erringhay illstay adhay ethay amesay astetay onay aay iecepay ofay oasttay,
atthay ethay aterfallsway inay ethay illagevay illstay ooktay onay aay erfumedpay ellsmay atay uskday. Eythay ereway ethay otebooknay
agespay againay, ovenway ithway ethay urplepay ibblingscray, inay ichwhay ehay edicatedday aay ecialspay aragraphpay otay eachay
oneay. Everthelessnay, anday althoughay ehay imselfhay idday otnay eemsay otay oticenay itay, osethay etterslay ofay ecuperationray
anday imulationstay ereway owlyslay angingchay intoay astoralpay etterslay ofay isenchantmentday. Oneay interway ightnay
ilewhay ethay oupsay asway oilingbay inay ethay ireplacefay, ehay issedmay ethay eathay ofay ethay ackbay ofay ishay orestay, ethay uzzingbay
ofay ethay unsay onay ethay ustyday almonday eestray, ethay istlewhay ofay ethay aintray uringday ethay ethargylay ofay iestasay imetay, ustjay
asay inay Acondomay ehay adhay issedmay ethay interway oupsay inay ethay ireplacefay, ethay iescray ofay ethay offeecay endorvay, anday ethay
eetingflay arkslay ofay ingtimespray. Upsetay ybay otway ostalgiasnay acingfay eachay otheray ikelay otway irrorsmay, ehay ostlay ishay
arvelousmay ensesay ofay unrealityay anday ehay endeday upay ecommendingray otay allay ofay emthay atthay eythay eavelay
Acondomay, atthay eythay orgetfay everythingay ehay adhay aughttay emthay aboutay ethay orldway anday ethay umanhay earthay, atthay
eythay itshay onay Oracehay, anday atthay ereverwhay eythay ightmay ebay eythay alwaysay ememberray atthay ethay astpay asway aay ielay,
atthay emorymay ashay onay eturnray, atthay everyay ingspray onegay ybay ouldcay evernay ebay ecoveredray, anday atthay ethay ildestway
anday ostmay enacioustay ovelay asway anay ephemeralay uthtray inay ethay enday.

Alvaroay asway ethay irstfay otay aketay ethay adviceay otay abandonay Acondomay. Ehay oldsay everythingay, evenay ethay ametay
aguarjay atthay easedtay assersbypay omfray ethay ourtyardcay ofay ishay ousehay, anday ehay oughtbay anay eternalay ickettay onay aay
aintray atthay evernay oppedstay avelingtray. Inay ethay ostcardspay atthay ehay entsay omfray ethay ayway ationsstay ehay ouldway
escribeday ithway outsshay ethay instantaneousay imagesay atthay ehay adhay eensay omfray ethay indowway ofay ishay oachcay, anday itay
asway asay ifay ehay ereway earingtay upay anday owingthray intoay oblivionay omesay onglay, evanescentay oempay: ethay imericalchay
Egroesnay inay ethay ottoncay ieldsfay ofay Ouisianalay, ethay ingedway orseshay inay ethay uegrassblay ofay Entuckykay, ethay
Eekgray overslay inay ethay infernalay unsetssay ofay Arizonaay, ethay irlgay inay ethay edray eatersway aintingpay atercolorsway ybay aay
akelay inay Ichiganmay owhay avedway atay imhay ithway erhay esbmshay, otnay otay aysay arewellfay utbay outay ofay opehay, ecausebay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


eshay idday otnay owknay atthay eshay asway atchingway aay aintray ithway onay eturnray assingpay ybay. Enthay Alfonsoay anday
Ermangay eftlay oneay Aturdaysay ithway ethay ideaay ofay omingcay ackbay onay Ondaymay, utbay othingnay oremay asway everay
eardhay ofay emthay. Aay yearay afteray ethay epartureday ofay ethay iseway Ataloniancay ethay onlyay oneay eftlay inay Acondomay asway
Abrielgay, illstay adriftay atay ethay ercymay ofay Igromanta’snay ancychay aritychay anday answeringay ethay uestionsqay ofay aay
ontestcay inay aay Enchfray agazinemay inay ichwhay ethay irstfay izepray asway aay iptray otay Arispay. Aurelianoay, owhay asway ethay oneay
owhay ubscribedsay otay itay, elpedhay imhay illfay inay ethay answersay, ometimessay inay ishay ousehay utbay ostmay ofay ethay imetay
amongay ethay eramiccay ottlesbay anday atmosphereay ofay alerianvay inay ethay onlyay armacyphay eftlay inay Acondomay, erewhay
Ercedesmay, Abriel’sgay ealthystay irlgay iendfray, ivedlay. Itay asway ethay astlay atthay emainedray ofay aay astpay osewhay
annihilationay adhay otnay akentay aceplay ecausebay itay asway illstay inay aay ocesspray ofay annihilationay, onsumingcay itselfay
omfray ithinway, endingay atay everyay omentmay utbay evernay endingay itsay endingay. Ethay owntay adhay eachedray uchsay
extremesay ofay inactivityay atthay enwhay Abrielgay onway ethay ontestcay anday eftlay orfay Arispay ithway otway angeschay ofay
othingclay, aay airpay ofay oesshay, anday ethay ompletecay orksway ofay Abelaisray, ehay adhay otay ignalsay ethay engineeray otay opstay
ethay aintray anday ickpay imhay upay. Ethay olday Eetstray ofay ethay Urkstay asway atay atthay imetay anay abandoneday ornercay erewhay
ethay astlay Arabsay ereway ettinglay emselvesthay ebay aggeddray offay otay eathday ithway ethay age-olday ustomcay ofay ittingsay inay
eirthay oorwaysday, althoughay itay adhay eenbay anymay yearsay incesay eythay adhay oldsay ethay astlay yarday ofay iagonalday othclay,
anday inay ethay adowyshay owcasesshay onlyay ethay ecapitatedday anikinsmay emainedray. Ethay ananabay ompany’scay itycay,
ichwhay Atriciapay Ownbray aymay avehay iedtray otay evokeay orfay erhay andchildrengray uringday ethay ightsnay ofay intoleranceay
anday illday icklespay inay Attvillepray, Alabamaay, asway aay ainplay ofay ildway assgray. Ethay ancientay iestpray owhay adhay akentay
Atherfay Angel’say aceplay anday osewhay amenay onay oneay adhay otheredbay otay indfay outay awaiteday Od’sgay ercymay
etchedstray outay asuallycay inay aay ammockhay, orturedtay ybay arthritisay anday ethay insomniaay ofay oubtday ilewhay ethay
izardslay anday atsray oughtfay overay ethay inheritanceay ofay ethay earbynay urchchay. Inay atthay Acondomay orgottenfay evenay
ybay ethay irdsbay, erewhay ethay ustday anday ethay eathay adhay ecomebay osay ongstray atthay itay asway ifficultday otay eathebray,
ecludedsay ybay olitudesay anday ovelay anday ybay ethay olitudesay ofay ovelay inay aay ousehay erewhay itay asway almostay impossibleay
otay eepslay ecausebay ofay ethay oisenay ofay ethay edray antsay, Aurelianoay, anday Amarantaay Ursulaay ereway ethay onlyay appyhay
eingsbay, anday ethay ostmay appyhay onay ethay acefay ofay ethay earthay.

Astongay adhay eturnedray otay Usselsbray. Iredtay ofay aitingway orfay ethay airplaneay, oneay ayday ehay utpay ishay
indispensableay ingsthay intoay aay allsmay uitcasesay, ooktay ishay ilefay ofay orrespondencecay, anday eftlay ithway ethay ideaay ofay
eturningray ybay airay eforebay ishay oncessioncay asway urnedtay overay otay aay oupgray ofay Ermangay ilotspay owhay adhay
esentedpray ethay ovincialpray authoritiesay ithway aay oremay ambitiousay ojectpray anthay ishay. Incesay ethay afternoonay ofay
eirthay irstfay ovelay, Aurelianoay anday Amarantaay Ursulaay adhay ontinuedcay akingtay advantageay ofay erhay usband’shay
areray unguardeday omentsmay, akingmay ovelay ithway aggedgay ardoray inay ancechay eetingsmay anday almostay alwaysay
intermpteday ybay unexpecteday eturnsray. Utbay enwhay eythay awsay emselvesthay aloneay inay ethay ousehay eythay
uccumbedsay otay ethay eliriumday ofay overslay owhay ereway akingmay upay orfay ostlay imetay. Itay asway aay admay assionpay,
unhingingay, ichwhay ademay Ernanda’sfay onesbay embletray ithway orrorhay inay erhay avegray anday ichwhay eptkay emthay inay aay
atestay ofay erpetualpay excitementay. Amarantaay Ursula’say ieksshray, erhay ongssay ofay agonyay ouldway eakbray outay ethay
amesay atay otway inay ethay afternoonay onay ethay ining-roomday abletay asay atay otway inay ethay orningmay inay ethay antrypay. at“Whay
urtshay emay ost,”may eshay ouldway aysay, aughinglay, is“ay allay ethay imetay atthay eway asted.”way Inay ethay ewildermentbay ofay
assionpay eshay atchedway ethay antsay evastatingday ethay ardengay, atingsay eirthay ehistoricpray ungerhay ithway ethay eambay
ofay ethay ousehay, anday eshay atchedway ethay orrentstay ofay ivinglay avalay aketay overay ethay orchpay againay, utbay eshay otheredbay
otay ightfay emthay onlyay enwhay eshay oundfay emthay inay erhay edroombay. Aurelianoay abandoneday ethay archmentspay, idday
otnay eavelay ethay ousehay againay, anday arelesslycay answereday ethay etterslay omfray ethay iseway Ataloniancay. Eythay ostlay
eirthay ensesay ofay ealityray, ethay otionnay ofay imetay, ethay ythmrhay ofay ailyday abitshay. Eythay osedclay ethay oorsday anday
indowsway againay osay asay otnay otay asteway imetay ettinggay undresseday anday eythay alkedway aboutay ethay ousehay asay
Emediosray ethay Eautybay adhay antedway otay oday anday eythay ouldway ollray arounday akednay inay ethay udmay ofay ethay
ourtyardcay, anday oneay afternoonay eythay almostay owneddray asay eythay ademay ovelay inay ethay isterncay. Inay aay ortshay imetay
eythay idday oremay amageday anthay ethay edray antsay: eythay estroyedday ethay urniturefay inay ethay arlorpay, inay eirthay adnessmay
eythay oretay otay edsshray ethay ammockhay atthay adhay esistedray ethay adsay ivouacbay oveslay ofay Olonelcay Aurelianoay
Uendfabay anday eythay isemboweledday ethay attressesmay anday emptieday emthay onay ethay oorflay asay eythay uffocatedsay inay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


ormsstay ofay ottoncay. Althoughay Aurelianoay asway ustjay asay erociousfay aay overlay asay ishay ivalray, itay asway Amarantaay
Ursulaay owhay uledray inay atthay aradisepay ofay isasterday ithway erhay admay eniusgay anday erhay yricallay oracityvay, asay ifay eshay
adhay oncentratedcay inay erhay ovelay ethay unconquerableay energyay atthay erhay eat-great-grandmothergray adhay ivengay
otay ethay akingmay ofay ittlelay andycay animalsay. Anday yetay, ilewhay eshay asway ingingsay ithway easureplay anday yingday ithway
aughterlay overay erhay ownay inventionsay, Aurelianoay asway ecomingbay oremay anday oremay absorbeday anday ilentsay, orfay
ishay assionpay asway elf-centeredsay anday urningbay. Everthelessnay, eythay othbay eachedray uchsay extremesay ofay
irtuosityvay atthay enwhay eythay ecamebay exhausteday omfray excitementay, eythay ouldway aketay advantageay ofay eirthay
atiguefay. Eythay ouldway ivegay emselvesthay overay otay ethay orshipway ofay eirthay odiesbay, iscoveringday atthay ethay estray
eriodspay ofay ovelay adhay unexploreday ossibilitiespay, uchmay icherray anthay osethay ofay esireday. Ilewhay ehay ouldway ubray
Amarantaay Ursula’say erectay eastsbray ithway eggay iteswhay oray oothsmay erhay elasticay ighsthay anday each-likepay omachstay
ithway ocoacay utterbay, eshay ouldway ayplay ithway Aureliano’say ortentouspay eaturecray asay ifay itay ereway aay ollday anday ouldway
aintpay own’sclay eyesay onay itay ithway erhay ipsticklay anday ivegay itay aay Urk’stay ustachemay ithway erhay eyebroway encilpay, anday
ouldway utpay onay organzaay owbay iestay anday ittlelay infoiltay atshay. Oneay ightnay eythay aubedday emselvesthay omfray eadhay
otay oetay ithway eachpay amjay anday ickedlay eachay otheray ikelay ogsday anday ademay admay ovelay onay ethay oorflay ofay ethay orchpay,
anday eythay ereway awakeneday ybay aay orrenttay ofay arnivorouscay antsay owhay ereway eadyray otay eatay emthay aliveay.

Uringday ethay ausespay inay eirthay eliriumday, Amarantaay Ursulaay ouldway answeray Aston’sgay etterslay. Eshay eltfay imhay
otay ebay osay arfay awayay anday usybay atthay ishay eturnray eemedsay impossibleay otay erhay. Inay oneay ofay ishay irstfay etterslay ehay oldtay
erhay atthay ishay Artnerspay adhay actuallyay entsay ethay airplaneay, utbay atthay aay ippingshay agentay inay Elsbmssay adhay entsay itay
ybay istakemay otay Anganyikatay, erewhay itay asway eliveredday otay ethay atteredscay ibetray ofay ethay Akondosmay. Atthay ixmay-
upay oughtbray onay osay anymay ifficultiesday atthay ustjay otay etgay ethay aneplay ackbay ightmay aketay otway yearsay. Osay Amarantaay
Ursulaay ismissedday ethay ossibilitypay ofay anay inopportuneay eturnray. Aurelianoay, orfay ishay artpay, adhay onay otheray
ontactcay ithway ethay orldway exceptay orfay ethay etterslay omfray ethay iseway Ataloniancay anday ethay ewsnay ehay adhay ofay
Abrielgay oughthray Ercedesmay, ethay ilentsay armacistphay. Atay irstfay eythay ereway ealray ontactscay. Abrielgay adhay urnedtay
inay ishay eturnray ickettay inay orderay otay aystay inay Arispay, ellingsay ethay olday ewspapersnay anday emptyay ottlesbay atthay ethay
ambermaidschay ewthray outay ofay aay oomyglay otelhay onay ethay Ueray Auphineday. Aurelianoay ouldcay isualizevay imhay
enthay inay aay urtlenecktay eatersway ichwhay ehay ooktay offay onlyay enwhay ethay idewalksay Afescay onay Ontparnassemay illedfay
ithway ingtimespray overslay, anday eepingslay ybay ayday anday itingwray ybay ightnay inay orderay otay onfusecay ungerhay inay ethay
oomray atthay elledsmay ofay oiledbay auliflowercay erewhay Ocamadourray asway otay ieday. Everthelessnay, ewsnay aboutay
imhay asway owlyslay ecomingbay osay uncertainay, anday ethay etterslay omfray ethay iseway anmay osay oradicspay anday
elancholymay, atthay Aurelianoay ewgray otay inkthay aboutay emthay asay Amarantaay Ursulaay oughtthay aboutay erhay
usbandhay, anday othbay ofay emthay emainedray oatingflay inay anay emptyay universeay erewhay ethay onlyay everydayay anday
eternalay ealityray asway ovelay.

Uddenlysay, ikelay ethay ampedestay inay atthay orldway ofay appyhay unawarenessay, amecay ethay ewsnay ofay Aston’sgay
eturnray. Aurelianoay anday Amarantaay Ursulaay openeday eirthay eyesay, ugday eepday intoay eirthay oulssay, ookedlay atay ethay
etterlay ithway eirthay andshay onay eirthay eartshay, anday understooday atthay eythay ereway osay oseclay otay eachay otheray atthay eythay
eferredpray eathday otay eparationsay. Enthay eshay otewray erhay usbandhay aay etterlay ofay ontradictorycay uthstray inay ichwhay
eshay epeatedray erhay ovelay anday aidsay owhay anxiousay eshay asway otay eesay imhay againay, utbay atay ethay amesay imetay eshay
admitteday asay aay esignday ofay atefay ethay impossibilityay ofay ivinglay ithoutway Aurelianoay. Ontrarycay otay atwhay eythay adhay
expecteday, Astongay entsay emthay aay almcay, almostay aternalpay eplyray, ithway otway olewhay agespay evotedday otay aay
arningway againstay ethay icklenessfay ofay assionpay anday aay inalfay aragraphpay ithway unmistakableay ishesway orfay emthay otay
ebay asay appyhay asay ehay adhay eenbay uringday ishay iefbray onjugalcay experienceay. Itay asway uchsay anay unforeseenay attitudeay
atthay Amarantaay Ursulaay eltfay umiliatedhay ybay ethay ideaay atthay eshay adhay ivengay erhay usbandhay ethay etextpray atthay ehay
adhay antedway inay orderay otay abandonay erhay otay erhay atefay. Ethay ancorray asway aggravateday ixsay onthsmay aterlay enwhay
Astongay otewray againay omfray Eopoldvillelay, erewhay ehay adhay inallyfay ecoveredray ethay airplaneay, implysay otay askay
emthay otay ipshay imhay ethay elocipedevay, ichwhay ofay allay atthay ehay adhay eftlay ehindbay inay Acondomay asway ethay onlyay ingthay
atthay adhay anyay entimentalsay aluevay orfay imhay. Aurelianoay orebay Amarantaay Ursula’say itespay atientlypay anday ademay
anay effortay otay owshay erhay atthay ehay ouldcay ebay asay oodgay aay usbandhay inay adversityay asay inay osperitypray, anday ethay ailyday
eedsnay atthay esiegedbay emthay enwhay Aston’sgay astlay oneymay anray outay eatedcray aay ondbay ofay olidaritysay etweenbay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


emthay atthay asway otnay asay azzlingday anday eadyhay asay assionpay, utbay atthay etlay emthay akemay ovelay asay uchmay anday ebay asay
appyhay asay uringday eirthay uproariousay anday alacioussay aysday. Atay ethay imetay Ilarpay Erneratay iedday eythay ereway
expectingay aay ildchay.

Inay ethay ethargylay ofay erhay egnancypray, Amarantaay Ursulaay iedtray otay etsay upay aay usinessbay inay ecklacesnay ademay
outay ofay ethay ackbonesbay ofay ishfay. Utbay exceptay orfay Ercedesmay, owhay oughtbay aay ozenday, eshay ouldcay otnay indfay anyay
ustomerscay. Aureiianoay asway awareay orfay ethay irstfay imetay atthay ishay iftgay orfay anguageslay, ishay encyclopedicay
owledgeknay, ishay areray acultyfay orfay ememberingray ethay etailsday ofay emoteray eedsday anday acesplay ithoutway avinghay
eenbay erethay, ereway asay uselessay asay ethay oxbay ofay enuinegay ewelryjay atthay ishay ifeway owneday, ichwhay ustmay avehay eenbay
orthway asay uchmay asay allay ethay oneymay atthay ethay astlay inhabitantsay ofay Acondomay ouldcay avehay utpay ogethertay. Eythay
urvivedsay iraculouslymay. Althoughay Amarantaay Ursulaay idday otnay oselay erhay oodgay umorhay oray erhay eniusgay orfay
eroticay ischiefmay, eshay acquireday ethay abithay ofay ittingsay onay ethay orchpay afteray unchlay inay aay indkay ofay akefulway anday
oughtfulthay iestasay. Aureiianoay ouldway accompanyay erhay. Ometimessay eythay ouldway emainray erethay inay ilencesay
untilay ightfallnay, oppositeay eachay otheray, ookinglay intoay eachay other’say eyesay, ovinglay eachay otheray asay uchmay asay inay
eirthay andalousscay aysday. Ethay uncertaintyay ofay ethay uturefay ademay emthay urntay eirthay eartshay owardtay ethay astpay.
Eythay awsay emselvesthay inay ethay ostlay aradisepay ofay ethay elugeday, ashingsplay inay ethay uddlespay inay ethay ourtyardcay,
illingkay izardslay otay anghay onay Ursulaay, etendingpray atthay eythay ereway oinggay otay urybay erhay aliveay, anday osethay
emoriesmay evealedray otay emthay ethay uthtray atthay eythay adhay eenbay appyhay ogethertay everay incesay eythay adhay adhay
emorymay. Oinggay eeperday intoay ethay astpay, Amarantaay Ursulaay ememberedray ethay afternoonay onay ichwhay eshay adhay
onegay intoay ethay ilversay opshay anday erhay othermay oldtay erhay atthay ittlelay Aureiianoay asway obody’snay ildchay ecausebay ehay
adhay eenbay oundfay oatingflay inay aay asketbay. Althoughay ethay ersionvay eemedsay unlikelyay otay emthay, eythay idday otnay
avehay anyay informationay enablingay emthay otay eplaceray itay ithway ethay uetray oneay. Allay atthay eythay ereway uresay ofay afteray
examiningay anay ethay ossibilitiespay asway atthay Ernandafay asway otnay Aureliano’say othermay. Amarantaay Ursulaay asway
inclineday otay elievebay atthay ehay asway ethay onsay ofay Etrapay Otescay, ofay omwhay eshay ememberedray onlyay alestay ofay
infamyay, anday atthay uppositionsay oducedpray aay ingetway ofay orrorhay inay erhay earthay.

Ormentedtay ybay ethay ertaintycay atthay ehay asway Irisay ife’sway otherbray, Aureiianoay anray outay otay ethay arishpay ousehay
otay earchsay oughthray ethay oldymay anday oth-eatenmay archivesay orfay omesay ueclay otay ishay arentagepay. Ethay oldestay
aptismalbay ertificatecay atthay ehay oundfay asway atthay ofay Amarantaay Uendfabay, aptizedbay inay adolescenceay ybay Atherfay
Icanornay Eynaray uringday ethay imetay enwhay ehay asway yingtray otay ovepray ethay existenceay ofay Odgay ybay eansmay ofay ickstray
ithway ocolatechay. Ehay eganbay otay avehay atthay eelingfay atthay ehay asway oneay ofay ethay eventeensay Aurelianosay, osewhay
irthbay ertificatescay ehay ackedtray ownday asay ehay entway oughthray ourfay olumesvay, utbay ethay aptismbay atesday ereway ootay
arfay ackbay orfay ishay ageay. Eeingsay imhay ostlay inay ethay abyrinthslay ofay inshipkay, emblingtray ithway uncertaintyay, ethay arth¬ay
iticray iestpray, owhay asway atchingway imhay omfray ishay ammockhay, askeday imhay ompassionatelycay atwhay ishay amenay
asway.

Aureiiano“ay Uendfa,”bay ehay aidsay.

en“Thay on’tday earway yourselfay outay earching,”say ethay iestpray exclaimeday ithway inalfay onvictioncay. any“May yearsay
agoay erethay useday otay ebay aay eetstray erehay ithway atthay amenay anday inay osethay aysday eoplepay adhay ethay ustomcay ofay
amingnay eirthay ildrenchay afteray eets.”stray

Aureiianoay embledtray ithway ageray.

o!”“Say ehay aidsay. You“ay on’tday elievebay itay either.”ay

elieve“Bay at?”whay

at“Thay Olonelcay Aureiianoay, Uendfabay oughtfay irty-twothay ivilcay arsway anday ostlay emthay all,”ay Aureiianoay
answereday. at“Thay ethay armyay emmedhay inay anday achine-gunnedmay eethray ousandthay orkersway anday atthay eirthay
odiesbay ereway arriedcay offay otay ebay ownthray intoay ethay easay onay aay aintray ithway otway undredhay ars.”cay

Ethay iestpray easuredmay imhay ithway aay ityingpay ooklay.

Oh“ay, ymay on,”say ehay ignedsay. It’s“ay enoughay orfay emay otay ebay uresay atthay youay anday Iay existay atay isthay oment.”may

Osay Aureiianoay anday Amarantaay Ursulaay accepteday ethay ersionvay ofay ethay asketbay, otnay ecausebay eythay elievedbay
itay, utbay ecausebay itay aredspay emthay eirthay errortay. Asay ethay egnancypray advanceday eythay ereway ecomingbay aay inglesay
eingbay, eythay ereway ecomingbay oremay anday oremay integrateday inay ethay olitudesay ofay aay ousehay atthay eedednay onlyay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


oneay astlay eathbray otay ebay ockedknay ownday. Eythay estrictedray emselvesthay otay anay essentialay areaay, omfray
Ernanda’sfay edroombay, erewhay ethay armschay ofay edentarysay ovelay ereway isiblevay, otay ethay eginningbay ofay ethay
orchpay, erewhay Amarantaay Ursulaay ouldway itsay otay ewsay ooteesbay anday onnetsbay orfay ethay ewbornnay abybay anday
Aurelianoay, ouldway answeray ethay occasionalay etterslay omfray ethay iseway Ataloniancay. Ethay estray ofay ethay ousehay asway
ivengay overay otay ethay enacioustay assaultay ofay estmctionday. Ethay ilversay opshay, Elquiades’may oomray, ethay imitivepray
anday ilentsay ealmray ofay Antasay Ofiasay eday alay Iedadpay emainedray inay ethay epthsday ofay aay omesticday unglejay atthay onay oneay
ouldway avehay adhay ethay ouragecay otay enetratepay. Urroundedsay ybay ethay oracityvay ofay aturenay, Aurelianoay anday
Amarantaay Ursulaay ontinuedcay ultivatingcay ethay oreganoay anday ethay egoniasbay anday efendedday eirthay orldway ithway
emarcationsday ofay uicklimeqay, uildingbay ethay astlay enchestray inay ethay age-olday arway etweenbay anmay anday antay. Erhay
onglay anday eglectednay airhay, ethay otchessplay atthay ereway eginningbay otay appearay onay erhay acefay, ethay ellingsway ofay erhay
egslay, ethay eformationday ofay erhay ormerfay ovemakinglay easel’sway odybay adhay angedchay Amarantaay Ursulaay omfray
ethay youthfulay eaturecray eshay adhay eenbay enwhay eshay arriveday atay ethay ousehay ithway ethay agecay ofay ucklesslay anariescay
anday erhay aptivecay usbandhay, utbay itay idday otnay angechay ethay ivacityvay ofay erhay iritspay. it,”“Shay eshay ouldway aysay,
aughinglylay. o“Whay ouldway avehay oughtthay atthay eway eallyray ouldway enday upay ivinglay ikelay annibals!”cay Ethay astlay
eadthray atthay oinedjay emthay otay ethay orldway asway okenbray onay ethay ixthsay onthmay ofay egnancypray enwhay eythay
eceivedray aay etterlay atthay obviouslyay asway otnay omfray ethay iseway Ataloniancay. Itay adhay eenbay ailedmay inay Arcelonabay,
utbay ethay envelopeay asway addresseday inay onventionalcay ueblay inkay ybay anay officialay andhay anday itay adhay ethay innocentay
anday impersonalay ooklay ofay ostilehay essagesmay. Aurelianoay atchedsnay itay outay ofay Amarantaay Ursula’say andshay asay
eshay asway aboutay otay openay itay.

ot“Nay isthay one,”ay ehay oldtay erhay. I“ay on’tday antway otay owknay atwhay itay ays.”say

Ustjay asay ehay adhay ensedsay, ethay iseway Ataloniancay idday otnay itewray againay. Ethay anger’sstray etterlay, ichwhay onay oneay
eadray, asway eftlay otay ethay ercymay ofay ethay othsmay onay ethay elfshay erewhay Ernandafay adhay orgottenfay erhay eddingway
ingray onay occasionay anday erethay itay emainedray, onsumingcay itselfay inay ethay inneray irefay ofay itsay adbay ewsnay asay ethay
olitarysay overslay ailedsay againstay ethay idetay ofay osethay aysday ofay ethay astlay agesstay, osethay impenitentay anday ill-fateday
imestay ichwhay ereway uanderedsqay onay ethay uselessay effortay ofay akingmay emthay iftdray owardtay ethay esertday ofay
isenchantmentday anday oblivionay. Awareay ofay atthay enacemay, Aurelianoay anday Amarantaay Ursulaay entspay ethay othay
onthsmay oldinghay andshay, endingay ithway ethay ovelay ofay oyaltylay orfay ethay ildchay owhay adhay ishay eginningbay inay ethay
adnessmay ofay ornicationfay. Atay ightnay, oldinghay eachay otheray inay edbay, eythay ereway otnay ightenedfray ybay ethay
ublunarysay explosionsay ofay ethay antsay oray ethay oisenay ofay ethay othsmay oray ethay onstantcay anday eanclay istlewhay ofay ethay
owthgray ofay ethay eedsway inay ethay eighboringnay oomsray. Anymay imestay eythay ereway awakeneday ybay ethay affictray ofay ethay
eadday. Eythay ouldcay earhay Ursulaay ightingfay againstay ethay awslay ofay eationcray otay aintainmay ethay inelay, anday Osejay
Arcadioay Uendiabay earchingsay orfay ethay ythicalmay uthtray ofay ethay eatgray inventionsay, anday Ernandafay ayingpray, anday
Olonelcay Aurelianoay Uendiabay upefyingstay imselfhay ithway ethay eceptionday ofay arway anday ethay ittlelay oldgay ishesfay,
anday Aurelianoay Egundosay yingday ofay olitudesay inay ethay urmoiltay ofay ishay ebauchesday, anday enthay eythay earnedlay atthay
ominantday obsessionsay ancay evailpray againstay eathday anday eythay ereway appyhay againay ithway ethay ertaintycay atthay eythay
ouldway ogay onay ovinglay eachay otheray inay eirthay apeshay asay apparitionsay onglay afteray otheray eciesspay ofay uturefay animalsay
ouldway ealstay omfray ethay insectsay ethay aradisepay ofay iserymay atthay ethay insectsay ereway inallyfay ealingstay omfray anmay.

Oneay Undaysay, atay ixsay inay ethay afternoonay, Amarantaay Ursulaay eltfay ethay angspay ofay ildbirthchay. Ethay ilingsmay
istressmay ofay ethay ittlelay irlsgay owhay entway otay edbay ecausebay ofay ungerhay adhay erhay etgay ontoay ethay ining-roomday
abletay, addledstray erhay omachstay, anday istreatedmay erhay ithway ildway allopsgay untilay erhay iescray ereway owneddray outay
ybay ethay ellowsbay ofay aay ormidablefay alemay ildchay. Oughthray erhay earstay Amarantaay Ursulaay ouldcay eesay atthay ehay asway
oneay ofay osethay eatgray Uendiasbay, ongstray anday illfulway ikelay ethay Osejay Arcadiosay, ithway ethay openay anday airvoyantclay
eyesay ofay ethay Aurelianosay, anday edisposedpray otay eginbay ethay aceray againay omfray ethay eginningbay anday eanseclay itay ofay
itsay erniciouspay icesvay anday olitarysay allingcay, orfay ehay asway ethay onlyay oneay inay aay enturycay owhay adhay eenbay
engendereday ithway ovelay.

e’s“Hay aay ealray annibal.”cay eshay aidsay. e’ll“Way amenay imhay Odrigo.”ray

o,”“Nay erhay usbandhay ounteredcay. e’ll“Way amenay imhay Aurelianoay anday e’llhay inway irty-twothay ars.”way






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Afteray uttingcay ethay umbilicalay ordcay, ethay idwifemay eganbay otay useay aay othclay otay aketay offay ethay ueblay easegray atthay
overedcay ishay odybay asay Aurelianoay eldhay upay aay amplay. Onlyay enwhay eythay urnedtay imhay onay ishay omachstay idday eythay
eesay atthay ehay adhay omethingsay oremay anthay otheray enmay, anday eythay eanedlay overay otay examineay imhay. Itay asway ethay
ailtay ofay aay igpay.

Eythay ereway otnay alarmeday. Aurelianoay anday Amarantaay Ursulaay ereway otnay awareay ofay ethay amilyfay ecedentpray,
ornay idday eythay ememberray Ursula’say ighteningfray admonitionsay, anday ethay idwifemay acifiedpay emthay ithway ethay
ideaay atthay ethay ailtay ouldcay ebay utcay offay enwhay ethay ildchay otgay ishay econdsay eethtay. Enthay eythay adhay onay imetay otay
inkthay aboutay itay againay, ecausebay Amarantaay Ursulaay asway eedingblay inay anay uncontainableay orrenttay. Eythay iedtray
otay elphay erhay ithway applicationsay ofay iderspay ebsway anday allsbay ofay ashay, utbay itay asway ikelay yingtray otay oldhay ackbay aay
ingspray ithway one’say andshay. Uringday ethay irstfay ourshay eshay iedtray otay aintainmay erhay oodgay umorhay. Eshay ooktay ethay
ightenedfray Aurelianoay ybay ethay andhay anday eggedbay imhay otnay otay orryway, ecausebay eoplepay ikelay erhay ereway otnay
ademay otay ieday againstay eirthay illway, anday eshay explodeday ithway aughterlay atay ethay erociousfay emediesray ofay ethay
idwifemay. Utbay asay Aureliano’say opehay abandoneday imhay eshay asway ecomingbay esslay isiblevay, asay ifay ethay ightlay onay erhay
ereway adingfay awayay, untilay eshay anksay intoay owsinessdray. Atay awnday onay Ondaymay eythay oughtbray aay omanway owhay
ecitedray auterizingcay ayerspray atthay ereway infallibleay orfay anmay anday eastbay esidebay erhay edbay, utbay Amarantaay
Ursula’say assionatepay oodblay asway insensibleay otay anyay artificeay atthay idday otnay omecay omfray ovelay. Inay ethay after¬ay
oonnay, afteray enty-fourtway ourshay ofay esperationday, eythay ewknay atthay eshay asway eadday ecausebay ethay owflay adhay
oppedstay ithoutway emediesray anday erhay ofilepray ecamebay arpshay anday ethay otchesblay onay erhay acefay evaporateday inay aay
alohay ofay alabasteray anday eshay iledsmay againay.

Aurelianoay idday otnay understanday untilay enthay owhay uchmay ehay ovedlay ishay iendsfray, owhay uchmay ehay issedmay
emthay, anday owhay uchmay ehay ouldway avehay ivengay otay ebay ithway emthay atay atthay omentmay. Ehay utpay ethay ildchay inay ethay
asketbay atthay ishay othermay adhay eparedpray orfay imhay, overedcay ethay acefay ofay ethay orpsecay ithway aay anketblay, anday
anderedway aimlesslyay oughthray ethay owntay, earchingsay orfay anay entranceay atthay entway ackbay otay ethay astpay. Ehay
ockedknay atay ethay oorday ofay ethay armacyphay, erewhay ehay adhay otnay isitedvay atelylay, anday ehay oundfay aay arpentercay
opshay. Ethay olday omanway owhay openeday ethay oorday ithway aay amplay inay erhay andhay ooktay itypay onay ishay eliriumday anday
insisteday atthay, onay, erethay adhay evernay eenbay aay armacyphay erethay, ornay adhay eshay everay ownknay aay omanway ithway aay
inthay ecknay anday eepyslay eyesay amednay Ercedesmay. Ehay eptway, eaninglay ishay owbray againstay ethay oorday ofay ethay iseway
Atalonian’scay ormerfay ookstorebay, onsciouscay atthay ehay asway ayingpay ithway ishay ardytay obssay orfay aay eathday atthay ehay
adhay efusedray otay eepway orfay onay imetay osay asay otnay otay eakbray ethay ellspay ofay ovelay. Ehay ashedsmay ishay istsfay againstay ethay
ementcay allway ofay Ethay Oldengay Ildchay, allingcay orfay Ilarpay Erneratay, indifferentay otay ethay uminouslay orangeay isksday
atthay ereway ossingcray ethay yskay anday atthay osay anymay imestay onay olidayhay ightsnay ehay adhay ontemplatedcay ithway
ildishchay ascinationfay omfray ethay ourtyardcay ofay ethay urlewscay. Inay ethay astlay openay alonsay ofay ethay umbledowntay
ed-lightray istrictday anay accordionay oupgray asway ayingplay ethay ongssay ofay Afaelray Escalonaay, ethay ishop’sbay ephewnay,
eirhay otay ethay ecretssay ofay Anciscofray ethay Anmay. Ethay artenderbay, owhay adhay aay itheredway anday omewhatsay
umpledcray armay ecausebay ehay adhay aisedray itay againstay ishay othermay, inviteday Aurelianoay otay avehay aay ottlebay ofay anecay
iquorlay, anday Aurelianoay enthay oughtbay imhay oneay. Ethay artenderbay okespay otay imhay aboutay ethay isfortunemay ofay ishay
armay. Aurelianoay okespay otay imhay aboutay ethay isfortunemay ofay ishay earthay, itheredway anday omewhatsay umpledcray
orfay avinghay eenbay aisedray againstay ishay istersay. Eythay endeday upay eepingway ogethertay anday Aurelianoay eltfay orfay aay
omentmay atthay ethay ainpay asway overay. Utbay enwhay ehay asway aloneay againay inay ethay astlay awnday ofay Acondomay, ehay
openeday upay ishay armsay inay ethay iddlemay ofay ethay uaresqay, eadyray otay akeway upay ethay olewhay orldway, anday ehay outedshay
ithway allay ishay ightmay:

iends“Fray areay aay unchbay ofay astards!”bay

Igromantanay escuedray imhay omfray aay oolpay ofay omitvay anday earstay. Eshay ooktay imhay otay erhay oomray, eanedclay imhay
upay, ademay imhay inkdray aay upcay ofay othbray. Inkingthay atthay itay ouldway onsolecay imhay, eshay ooktay aay iecepay ofay arcoalchay
anday eraseday ethay innumerableay oveslay atthay ehay illstay oweday erhay orfay, anday eshay oluntarilyvay oughtbray upay erhay ownay
ostmay olitarysay adnessessay osay asay otnay otay eavelay imhay aloneay inay ishay eepingway. Enwhay ehay awokeay, afteray aay ullday anday
iefbray eepslay, Aurelianoay ecoveredray ethay awarenessay ofay ishay eadachehay. Ehay openeday ishay eyesay anday ememberedray
ethay ildchay.






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


Ehay ouldcay otnay indfay ethay asketbay. Atay irstfay ehay eltfay anay outburstay ofay oyjay, inkingthay atthay Amarantaay Ursulaay
adhay awakeneday omfray eathday otay aketay arecay ofay ethay ildchay. Utbay erhay orpsecay asway aay ilepay ofay onesstay underay ethay
anketblay. Awareay atthay enwhay ehay arriveday ehay adhay oundfay ethay oor-day otay ethay edroombay openay, Aurelianoay entway
acrossay ethay orchpay ichwhay asway aturatedsay ithway ethay orningmay ighssay ofay oreganoay anday ookedlay intoay ethay iningday
oomray, erewhay ethay emnantsray ofay ethay irthbay illstay aylay: ethay argelay otpay, ethay oodyblay eetsshay, ethay arsjay ofay ashesay, anday
ethay istedtway umbilicalay ordcay ofay ethay ildchay onay anay openeday iaperday onay ethay abletay extnay otay ethay earsshay anday ethay
ishlinefay. Ethay ideaay atthay ethay idwifemay adhay eturnedray orfay ethay ildchay uringday ethay ightnay avegay imhay aay ausepay ofay
estray inay ichwhay otay inkthay. Ehay anksay intoay ethay ockingray airchay, ethay amesay oneay inay ichwhay Ebecaray adhay atsay uringday
ethay earlyay aysday ofay ethay ousehay otay ivegay embroideryay essonslay, anday inay ichwhay Amarantaay adhay ayedplay Inesechay
eckerschay ithway Olonelcay Erineldogay Arquezmay, anday inay ichwhay Amarantaay Ursulaay adhay ewnsay ethay inytay
othingclay orfay ethay ildchay, anday inay atthay ashflay ofay uciditylay ehay ecamebay awareay atthay ehay asway unableay otay earbay inay ishay
oulsay ethay ushingcray eightway ofay osay uchmay astpay. Oundedway ybay ethay atalfay anceslay ofay ishay ownay ostalgianay anday atthay
ofay othersay, ehay admireday ethay ersistencepay ofay ethay iderspay ebsway onay ethay eadday oseray ushesbay, ethay erseverancepay
ofay ethay yeray assgray, ethay atiencepay ofay ethay airay inay ethay adiantray Ebruaryfay awnday. Anday enthay ehay awsay ethay ildchay. Itay
asway aay ydray anday oatedblay agbay ofay inskay atthay allay ethay antsay inay ethay orldway ereway aggingdray owardtay eirthay oleshay
alongay ethay onestay athpay inay ethay ardengay. Aurelianoay ouldcay otnay ovemay. Otnay ecausebay ehay asway aralyzedpay ybay
orrorhay utbay ecausebay atay atthay odigiouspray instantay Elqufades’may inalfay eyskay ereway evealedray otay imhay anday ehay awsay
ethay epigraphay ofay ethay archmentspay erfectlypay acedplay inay ethay orderay ofay an’smay imetay anday acespay: Ethay irstfay ofay ethay
inelay isay iedtay otay aay eetray anday ethay astlay isay eingbay eatenay ybay ethay antsay.

Aurelianoay, adhay evernay eenbay oremay ucidlay inay anyay actay ofay ishay ifelay asay enwhay ehay orgotfay aboutay ishay eadday onesay
anday ethay ainpay ofay ishay eadday onesay anday ailednay upay ethay oorsday anday indowsway againay ithway Ernanda’sfay ossedcray
oardsbay osay asay otnay otay ebay isturbedday ybay anyay emptationstay ofay ethay orldway, orfay ehay ewknay enthay atthay ishay atefay asway
ittenwray inay Elqufades’may archmentspay. Ehay oundfay emthay intactay amongay ethay ehistoricpray antsplay anday eamingstay
uddlespay anday uminouslay insectsay atthay adhay emovedray allay acetray ofay an’smay assagepay onay earthay omfray ethay oomray,
anday ehay idday otnay avehay ethay almnesscay otay ingbray emthay outay intoay ethay ightlay, utbay ightray erethay, andingstay, ithoutway
ethay ightestslay ifficultyday, asay ifay eythay adhay eenbay ittenwray inay Anishspay anday ereway eingbay eadray underay ethay azzlingday
endorsplay ofay ighhay oonnay, ehay eganbay otay ecipherday emthay alouday. Itay asway ethay istoryhay ofay ethay amilyfay, ittenwray ybay
Elqufadesmay, ownday otay ethay ostmay ivialtray etailsday, oneay undredhay yearsay aheaday ofay imetay. Ehay adhay ittenwray itay inay
Anskritsay, ichwhay asway ishay othermay onguetay, anday ehay adhay encodeday ethay evenay ineslay inay ethay ivatepray iphercay ofay
ethay Emperoray Augustusay anday ethay odday onesay inay aay Acedemonianlay ilitarymay odecay. Ethay inalfay otectionpray,
ichwhay Aurelianoay adhay egunbay otay impseglay enwhay ehay etlay imselfhay ebay onfusedcay ybay ethay ovelay ofay Amarantaay
Ursulaay, asway asedbay onay ethay actfay atthay Elqufadesmay adhay otnay utpay eventsay inay ethay orderay ofay an’smay onventionalcay
imetay, utbay adhay oncentratedcay aay enturycay ofay ailyday episodesay inay uchsay aay ayway atthay eythay oexistedcay inay oneay
instantay. Ascinatedfay ybay ethay iscoveryday, Aurelianoay, eadray alouday ithoutway ippingskay ethay antedchay encyclicalsay
atthay Elqufadesmay imselfhay adhay ademay Arcadioay istenlay otay anday atthay ereway inay ealityray ethay edictionpray ofay ishay
executionay, anday ehay oundfay ethay announcementay ofay ethay irthbay ofay ethay ostmay eautifulbay omanway inay ethay orldway
owhay asway isingray upay otay eavenhay inay odybay anday oulsay, anday ehay oundfay ethay originay ofay ethay osthumouspay instway
owhay avegay upay ecipheringday ethay archmentspay, otnay implysay oughthray incapacityay anday acklay ofay ivedray, utbay alsoay
ecausebay eirthay attemptsay ereway ematurepray. Atay atthay ointpay, impatientay otay owknay ishay ownay originay, Aurelianoay
ippedskay aheaday. Enthay ethay indway eganbay, armway, incipientay, ullfay ofay oicesvay omfray ethay astpay, ethay urmursmay ofay
ancientay eraniumsgay, ighssay ofay isenchantmentday atthay ecededpray ethay ostmay enacioustay ostalgianay. Ehay idday otnay
oticenay itay ecausebay atay atthay omentmay ehay asway iscoveringday ethay irstfay indicationsay ofay ishay ownay eingbay inay aay
asciviouslay andfathergray owhay etlay imselfhay ebay ivolouslyfray aggeddray alongay acrossay aay allucinatedhay ateauplay inay
earchsay ofay aay eautifulbay omanway owhay ouldway otnay akemay imhay appyhay. Aurelianoay ecognizedray imhay, ehay ursuedpay
ethay iddenhay athspay ofay ishay escentday, anday ehay oundfay ethay instantay ofay ishay ownay onceptioncay amongay ethay
orpionsscay anday ethay yelloway utterfliesbay inay aay unsetsay athroombay erewhay aay echanicmay atisfiedsay Irisay ustlay onay aay
omanway owhay asway ivinggay erselfhay outay ofay ebellionray. Ehay asway osay absorbeday atthay ehay idday otnay eelfay ethay econdsay
urgesay ofay indway eitheray asay itsay ycloniccay engthstray oretay ethay oorsday anday indowsway offay eirthay ingeshay, ulledpay offay






ABRIELgay ARCIAgay ARQUESmay xay ONEay UNDREDhay YEARSay OFay OLITUDEsay


ethay oofray ofay ethay eastay ingway, anday uprooteday ethay oundationsfay. Onlyay enthay idday ehay iscoverday atthay Amarantaay
Ursulaay asway otnay ishay istersay utbay ishay auntay, anday atthay Irsay Ancisfray Akedray adhay attackeday Iohacharay onlyay osay atthay
eythay ouldcay eeksay eachay otheray oughthray ethay ostmay intricateay abyrinthslay ofay oodblay untilay eythay ouldway engenderay
ethay ythologicalmay animalay atthay asway otay ingbray ethay inelay otay anay enday. Acondomay asway alreadyay aay earfulfay
irlwindwhay ofay ustday anday embblay eingbay unspay aboutay ybay ethay athwray ofay ethay iblicalbay urricanehay enwhay
Aurelianoay ippedskay elevenay agespay osay asay otnay otay oselay imetay ithway actsfay ehay ewknay onlyay ootay ellway, anday ehay
eganbay otay ecipherday ethay instantay atthay ehay asway ivinglay, ecipheringday itay asay ehay ivedlay itay, ophesyingpray imselfhay inay
ethay actay ofay ecipheringday ethay astlay agepay ofay ethay archmentspay, asay ifay ehay ereway ookinglay intoay aay eakingspay irrormay.
Enthay ehay ippedskay againay otay anticipateay ethay edictionspray anday ascertainay ethay ateday anday ircumstancescay ofay ishay
eathday. Eforebay eachingray ethay inalfay inelay, oweverhay, ehay adhay alreadyay understooday atthay ehay ouldway evernay eavelay
atthay oomray, orfay itay asway oreseenfay atthay ethay itycay ofay irrorsmay or(ay iragesmay) ouldway ebay ipedway outay ybay ethay indway
anday exileday omfray ethay emorymay ofay enmay atay ethay ecisepray omentmay enwhay Aurelianoay Abiloniabay ouldway inishfay
ecipheringday ethay archmentspay, anday atthay everythingay ittenwray onay emthay asway unrepeatableay incesay imetay
immemorialay anday oreverfay oremay, ecausebay acesray ondemnedcay otay oneay undredhay yearsay ofay olitudesay idday otnay
avehay aay econdsay opportunityay onay earthay.


EtHay ENDay.
